anya-e0104n0:5_1: āha. “Abhiññā sampādetuṃ yogo kātabbo”ti vatvā tattha payojanavisese dassetuṃ “evañhī”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:5_2: vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi thiratarabhāvo, vipassanābhāvanāsukhatā ca samādhibhāvanāya ānisaṃso
anya-e0104n0:5_3: eva, tathāpi pañca lokiyābhiññā yathāvuttasamādhibhāvanāya ānisaṃsabhāvena pākaṭā
anya-e0104n0:5_4: paññātāti tāsaṃyeva vasena yogino adhigatānisaṃsatā vuttā, cuddasadhā cittaparidamanena
anya-e0104n0:5_5: thirataratā vuttā. Lokiyābhiññāsu vasībhāvopi samādhisseva vasībhāvo, tathā ca “samāhito
anya-e0104n0:5_6: yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vacanato “sukheneva paññābhāvanaṃ sampādessatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:5_7: Tasmāti yasmā samādhibhāvanāya ānisaṃsalābho thirataratā, sukheneva ca paññābhāvanā
anya-e0104n0:5_8: ijjhati, tasmā abhiññākathaṃ tāva ārabhissāma, paññābhāvanāya okāse sampattepīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:6_0: Bhagavatā pañca lokikābhiññā vuttāti sambandho. Na catukkajjhānamattameva idha sāsane
anya-e0104n0:6_1: sampādetabbaṃ, napi iddhividhañāṇameva, atha kho aññampi atthīti uttaruttaripaṇītapaṇītadhammadesanatthañca.
anya-e0104n0:7_0: Iddhivikubbananti iddhisaṅkhātaṃ pakativaṇṇajahanakiriyaṃ, idaṃ iddhīsu vikubbaniddhiyā
anya-e0104n0:7_1: padhānatāya vuttaṃ, iddhiṃ vikubbanañcāti evaṃ vā attho daṭṭhabbo. Vikubbanassa visuṃ
anya-e0104n0:7_2: gahaṇampi vuttakāraṇeneva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ākāsakasiṇavasena arūpasamāpattiyo na sambhavanti,
anya-e0104n0:7_4: adhippetattā, ākāsanimmānādiatthaṃ pana tadubhayampi icchitabbameva. Aṭṭha aṭṭhāti
anya-e0104n0:7_5: yathāvuttesu kasiṇesu ekekasmiṃ aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Kasiṇānulomatoti kasiṇapaṭipāṭito,
anya-e0104n0:7_6: paṭipāṭi ca desanāvasena veditabbā. Jhānānulomo pana paṭipattivasenapi. Ukkamanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:7_7: ukkantaṃ, ukkantameva ukkantikaṃ, jhānassa ukkantikaṃ jhānukkantikaṃ, tato, jhānalaṅghanatoti
anya-e0104n0:7_8: attho. Aṅgasaṅkantito aṅgātikkamato. Cittaṃ paridametabbaṃ yadicchakaṃ yatthicchakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:7_9: jhānānaṃ samāpajjanādisukhatthaṃ, tesaṃ ārammaṇānañca sallakkhaṇatthaṃ. Evañhissa
anya-e0104n0:8_0: 366. Jhānaṃ samāpajjatīti kiṃ catubbidhampi jhānaṃ samāpajjati, udāhu ekekanti? Kiñcettha
anya-e0104n0:8_1: yadi catubbidhampi samāpajjati, aṅgasaṅkantito viseso na siyā, atha ekekaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkantito.
anya-e0104n0:8_2: Nāyaṃ doso ābhogavasena tesaṃ visesasiddhito. Yadā hi kasiṇānulomameva ābhujitvā
anya-e0104n0:8_3: tattha tattha kasiṇe jhānāni samāpajjati, na aṅgasaṅkantiṃ, tadā kasiṇānulomo. Yadā
anya-e0104n0:8_4: pana aṅgasaṅkantiṃ ābhujitvā jhānāni samāpajjati, tadā aṅgasaṅkanti veditabbā. Iminā
anya-e0104n0:8_5: nayena kasiṇānulomaārammaṇasaṅkantiādīnampi aññamaññaṃ viseso veditabbo. Idaṃ kasiṇānulomaṃ
anya-e0104n0:9_0: Tathevāti “paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu satakkhattumpi sahassakkhattumpī”ti etassa
anya-e0104n0:9_1: upasaṃhārattho tathā-saddo. Paṭilomato cettha paṭipāṭi. Tenāha “paṭilomakkamenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:9_2: Ayañhettha attho – paṭhamaṃ odātakasiṇe jhānaṃ samāpajjati, tato lohitakasiṇeti yāva
anya-e0104n0:11_0: Tatthevāti pathavīkasiṇeyeva. Tatoti pacchā tatiyajjhānato vuṭṭhānantarakālaṃ. Tadevāti
anya-e0104n0:11_1: pathavīkasiṇameva. Tato ākiñcaññāyatananti tato pathavīkasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattitaākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattito
anya-e0104n0:11_2: vuṭṭhāya viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ amanasikaritvā taṃ laṅghitvā yathāvuttaākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:11_4: pathavīkasiṇapakkhikameva hotīti vuttaṃ “kasiṇaṃ anukkamitvā”ti. Atha vā aṭṭhasu
anya-e0104n0:11_5: kasiṇesu kassaci ukkamanaṃ idha kasiṇukkantikaṃ nāmāti āha “kasiṇaṃ anukkamitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:11_6: Jhānukkantikanti ettha icchitaṃ avadhāraṇena nivattetabbaṃ, ukkamanassa ca sarūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:11_7: dassetuṃ “evaṃ kasiṇa”ntiādiṃ vatvā puna taṃ pakāraṃ saha nissayena sesakasiṇesu
anya-e0104n0:11_8: atidisanto “evaṃ āpokasiṇādi…pe… kātabbā”ti āha. Tenāha “iminā nayenā”tiādi. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:11_9: paṭhamajjhānamūlakaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīsu jhānukkantikaṃ dassitaṃ, evaṃ dutiyajjhānādimūlakampi
anya-e0104n0:12: Tadevāti paṭhamajjhānameva. Kasiṇukkantikepi āpokasiṇādimūlikā yojanā vuttanayeneva kātabbā, tathā yathārahaṃ dutiyajjhānādimūlikā.
anya-e0104n0:13_0: Lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti lohitakasiṇaṃ āvajjento abhimukhaṃ katvā tassa
anya-e0104n0:13_1: ugghāṭanena upaṭṭhite kasiṇugghāṭimākāse amanasikārena ākāsānañcāyatanajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
anya-e0104n0:13_2: tattha pubbe pavattaviññāṇassa apagamaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati.
anya-e0104n0:14_0: Itaresanti avasiṭṭharūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ. Na hi arūpajjhānesu aṅgasaṅkanti atthi,
anya-e0104n0:14_1: nāpi tāni pathavīkasiṇe pavattanti. Yaṃ pana aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantivacane “nīlakasiṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:14_2: ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatana”ntiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ yathālābhavasena vuttaṃ, pariyāyena
anya-e0104n0:14_3: vāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nippariyāyato pana yathā aṅgasaṅkanti rūpajjhānesu eva labbhati,
anya-e0104n0:14_4: evaṃ arūpajjhānesu eva ārammaṇasaṅkanti. Tassa tasseva hi jhānassa ārammaṇantare
anya-e0104n0:14_5: pavatti ārammaṇasaṅkanti. Tenāha “sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkantikaṃ nāmā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:15_0: Yathā pana “sabbakasiṇesū”ti iminā ākāsaviññāṇakasiṇānampi saṅgaho hotīti na sakkā
anya-e0104n0:15_1: vattuṃ idha aṭṭhannaṃyeva kasiṇānaṃ adhigatattā, evaṃ sabbampi arūpajjhānaṃ “ekaṃ
anya-e0104n0:15_2: jhāna”nti na sakkā vattuṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ vasena cittaparidamanassa icchitattā.
anya-e0104n0:15_3: Tasmā āruppajjhānānaṃ vasena aṅgārammaṇasaṅkanti pariyāyena vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:15_4: hi pītakasiṇugghāṭimākāse yaṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ, tadārammaṇaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:15_5: sandhāyāha “pītakasiṇato viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā”ti. Iminā nayena sesadvayepi
anya-e0104n0:15_6: attho veditabbo. Ekantarikavasenāti aññattho antara-saddo. Antarameva antarikaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:15_7: ekajjhaṃ antarikaṃ etasminti ekantarikaṃ, jhānasamāpajjanaṃ, tassa vasena. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:15_8: aṅgānaṃ, ārammaṇassa ca ekajjhaṃ aññathā viseso hoti, tathā samāpajjanavasenāti.
anya-e0104n0:15_9: So pana viseso heṭṭhimānaṃ tesaṃ aṅgārammaṇānaṃ samatikkamanavasena hotīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:15_11: aṅgesu, “idaṃ pathavīkasiṇa”ntiādinā ārammaṇesu ca vavatthāpitesu ekajjhaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:15_12: vavatthāpane na koci viseso atthīti aṭṭhakathāsu ayaṃ vidhi nābhato. Evañca katvā
anya-e0104n0:15_13: jhānukkantikādīsu paṭilomakkamena, anulomapaṭilomakkamena ca ekantarikabhāvena labbhamānampi
anya-e0104n0:15_14: jhānādīnaṃ ukkamanaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ, tehi nayehi vināpi cittaparidamanaṃ ijjhatīti papañcaparihāratthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:16_0: 367. Abhāvitabhāvano jhānābhiññāsu akatādhikāro. Tattha upanissayarahitopīti keci.
anya-e0104n0:16_1: Ādibhūtaṃ yogakammaṃ ādikammaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti ādikammiko, pubbe akataparicayo
anya-e0104n0:16_2: bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto. Tenāha “yogāvacaro”ti. Kasiṇaparikammampi bhāroti dosavivajjanādividhinā
anya-e0104n0:16_3: kasiṇamaṇḍale paṭipatti yāva uggahanimittuppatti kasiṇaparikammaṃ, tampi nāma bhāro,
anya-e0104n0:16_4: pageva iddhivikubbanāti adhippāyo. Nimittuppādananti paṭibhāganimittuppādanaṃ. Taṃ
anya-e0104n0:16_5: vaḍḍhetvāti taṃ nimittaṃ, bhāvanañca vaḍḍhetvā. Na hi bhāvanāya vināva nimittavaḍḍhanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:16_6: labbhati. Keci upacārasamādhiṃ labhitvā appanāsamādhiṃ adhigantuṃ na sakkonti, tādisāpi
anya-e0104n0:16_7: bahū hontevāti āha “appanādhigamo bhāro”ti. Appanādhigamoti vā aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:16_8: adhigamamāha. Aññova samāpattīnaṃ upanissayo, añño abhiññānanti āha “paridamitacittassāpi
anya-e0104n0:16_9: iddhivikubbanaṃ nāma bhāro”ti. Khippaṃ nisanti nisāmanaṃ jhānacakkhunā pathavīkasiṇādijhānārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:16_10: dassanaṃ etassāti khippanisanti, sīghataraṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitā, tassa bhāvo khippanisantibhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:16_11: Ambatarunicitaṃ mahāmahindattherādīhi otiṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ therambatthalaṃ. Yathā paṭipakkhavijayāya
anya-e0104n0:16_12: yodhājīvā nimmalameva asitomarādiṃ gahetvā vicaranti, evaṃ bhikkhunāpi kilesavijayāya
anya-e0104n0:16_13: nimmalāva jhānābhiññā vaḷañjitabbāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:17_0: Patiṭṭhābhāvoti idha parassa upaddavūpasamanaṃ adhippetaṃ. Taṃ hi khippanisantibhāvatopi
anya-e0104n0:17_1: garutaraṃ accāyikakiccasādhanavasena vidhātabbato durabhisambhavatarattā. Taṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:17_2: rakkhitattheranidassaneneva siddhampi tato garutarena aṅgāravassaparittāṇena vibhāvetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:17_3: “giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjāya…pe… thero viyā”ti āha. Giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjā nāma cetiyagirimādiṃ
anya-e0104n0:17_4: katvā sakaladīpe, samudde ca yāva yojanā mahatī dīpapūjā. Pathaviṃ māpetvāti mārena
anya-e0104n0:17_5: pavattitaṃ aṅgāravassaṃ phuliṅgamattenapi yāva manusse na pāpuṇāti, tāvadeva ākāse
anya-e0104n0:18_1: attho. Aggasāvakādīnanti ādi-saddena ekacce mahāsāvake saṅgaṇhāti. Bhāvanānukkamo
anya-e0104n0:18_3: saṅgaho veditabbo, na sesābhiññānameva. Sāvakānampi hi ṭhānāṭhānañāṇādīni padesavasena
anya-e0104n0:18_4: ijjhanti. Tasmāti yasmā pubbahetusampannasseva yathāvuttaṃ bhāvanānukkamaṃ vinā abhiññāyo
anya-e0104n0:18_5: ijjhanti, na itarassa, tasmā. Aggidhamanādīhīti aggimhi tāpanakoṭṭanādīhi. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:18_6: cāti ca-saddena lākhākārādīnaṃ lākhākoṭṭanādiṃ avuttampi saṅgaṇhāti. Chanda…pe… vasenāti
anya-e0104n0:18_7: “chandavato ce abhiññā sijjhati, mayhampi sijjhatī”ti kattukamyatāchandaṃ sīsaṃ dhuraṃ
anya-e0104n0:18_8: jeṭṭhaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā, chandaṃ vā uppādetvā taṃ bhāvanāya mukhaṃ katvā jhānassa
anya-e0104n0:18_9: samāpajjanavasena. Eseva nayo sesesupi. “Āvajjanādivasībhāvavasenā”ti idaṃ aṭṭhasupi
anya-e0104n0:18_10: samāpattīsu sātisayaṃ vasībhāvāpādanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañca kho ādikammikavasena,
anya-e0104n0:18_11: na katādhikāravasenāti āha “pubbahetu…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti. Pubbahetusampannassa hi yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:18_12: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā abhiññā nibbattetabbā, tattheva sātisayaṃ ciṇṇavasitāpi icchitabbā,
anya-e0104n0:18_13: na sabbatthevāti adhippāyo. “Catutthajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasinā”ti vacanato arūpasamāpattiyo
anya-e0104n0:18_14: vināpi abhiññā ijjhantīti vadanti. Tampi yadi pubbahetusampannassa vasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:18_15: yuttameva. Athetarassa, tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Yathāti yena pakārena yena vidhinā. Etthāti
anya-e0104n0:19_0: 368. Tatrāti ca tadeva paccāmasati. Pāḷinayānusārenevāti pāḷigatiyā anusaraṇeneva,
anya-e0104n0:19_2: “so”ti vuttattā āha “adhigatacatutthajjhāno yogī”ti. “Evaṃ samāhite”ti ettha evaṃ-saddo
anya-e0104n0:19_4: āha “evanti catutthajjhānakkamanidassanameta”nti, catutthajjhānassa, tassa ca adhigamakkamassa
anya-e0104n0:19_5: nidassanaṃ. Yena samādhānānukkamena catutthajjhānasamādhi laddho, tadubhayanidassananti
anya-e0104n0:19_6: attho. Tenāha “iminā…pe… vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Yadipi “eva”nti idaṃ āgamanasamādhinā saddhiṃ
anya-e0104n0:19_7: catutthajjhānasamādhānaṃ dīpeti. Satipārisuddhisamādhi eva pana iddhiyā adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:19_10: hi paccanīkasamanepi abyāvaṭāya pārisuddhiupekkhāya vattamānāya catutthajjhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:19_11: taṃsampayuttadhammā ca suparisuddhā, suvisadā ca honti, satisīsena pana tattha desanā
anya-e0104n0:19_12: katāti āha “upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena parisuddhe”ti. Parisuddhiyā eva paccayavisesena
anya-e0104n0:19_13: pavattiviseso pariyodātatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṃsanena pabhassaratā viyāti āha
anya-e0104n0:20_0: Sukhādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ ghātenāti sukhasomanassānaṃ, dukkhadomanassānañca yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:20_1: rāgadosapaccayānaṃ vikkhambhanena. “Sukhaṃ somanassassa paccayo, somanassaṃ rāgassa,
anya-e0104n0:20_2: dukkhaṃ domanassassā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Yathā rāgādayo cetaso malāsucibhāvena “aṅgaṇānī”ti
anya-e0104n0:20_3: vuccanti, evaṃ upagantvā kilesanaṭṭhena upakkilesāti āha “anaṅgaṇattāyeva vigatūpakkilese”ti.
anya-e0104n0:20_4: Tenāha “aṅgaṇena hi taṃ cittaṃ upakkilissatī”ti, vibādhīyati upatāpīyatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:20_6: āvajjanādinā pañcadhā, cuddasavidhena vā paridamanena vasavattitaṃ upagateti attho.
anya-e0104n0:20_7: Vase vattamānaṃ hi cittaṃ paguṇabhāvāpattiyā suparimadditaṃ viya cammaṃ, suparikammakatā
anya-e0104n0:20_8: viya ca lākhā mudunti vuccati. Kammakkhameti vikubbanādiiddhikammakkhame. Tañca ubhayanti
anya-e0104n0:21_0: Nāhantiādīsu na-kāro paṭisedhattho. Ahanti satthā attānaṃ niddisati. Bhikkhaveti
anya-e0104n0:21_1: bhikkhū ālapati. Aññanti idāni vuccamānacittato aññaṃ. Ekadhammampīti ekampi sabhāvadhammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:21_2: na samanupassāmīti sambandho. Ayaṃ hettha attho – ahaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaññutaññāṇena
anya-e0104n0:21_3: olokentopi aññaṃ ekadhammampi na samanupassāmi. Yaṃ vasībhāvāpādanena bhāvitaṃ, tathā
anya-e0104n0:21_4: punappunaṃ karaṇena bahulīkataṃ, evaṃ savisesamudubhāvappattiyā muduṃ, kammakkhamatāya
anya-e0104n0:21_5: kammaniyañca hoti. Yathayidaṃ cittanti attano, tesañca paccakkhatāya evamāhāti. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:21_6: yathāvuttā parisuddhatādayo na vigacchanti, evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:22_0: Tattha avaṭṭhitaṃ idha “ṭhitaṃ, āneñjappatta”nti ca vuttanti āha “etesu parisuddhatādīsu
anya-e0104n0:22_1: ṭhitattā ṭhite, ṭhitattāyeva āneñjappatte”ti. Yathā mudukammaññatā vasībhāvappattiyā
anya-e0104n0:22_2: lakkhīyanti, evaṃ vasībhāvappattipi mudukammaññatāhi lakkhīyatīti, mudukammaññabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:22_3: vā attano vase ṭhitattā “ṭhite”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā hi kāraṇena phalaṃ niddharīyati,
anya-e0104n0:22_4: evaṃ phalenāpi kāraṇaṃ niddharīyatīti niccalabhāvena avaṭṭhānaṃ āneñjappatti. Sā
anya-e0104n0:22_5: ca sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena, paṭipakkhehi akammaniyatāya ca sambhavantī saddhādibalānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:22_6: ānubhāvena hotīti “saddhādīhi pariggahitattā āneñjappatte”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:22_7: vivarituṃ “saddhāpariggahitaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha saddhāpariggahitanti evaṃ subhāvitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:22_8: vasībhāvappattaṃ etaṃ cittaṃ ekaṃsena abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya
anya-e0104n0:22_9: saṃvattatīti evaṃ pavattāya saddhāya pariggahitaṃ yathāvuttasaddhābalena upatthambhitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:22_10: Assaddhiyenāti tappaṭipakkhena assaddhiyena hetunā na iñjati na calati na kampati,
anya-e0104n0:22_11: aññadatthu upari visesāvahabhāveneva tiṭṭhati. Vīriyapariggahitantiādīsupi iminā
anya-e0104n0:22_12: nayena attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – vīriyapariggahitanti vasībhāvāpādanaparidamanasādhanena
anya-e0104n0:22_13: vīriyena upatthambhitaṃ. Satipariggahitanti yathāvutte bhāvanābahulīkāre asammosasādhikāya,
anya-e0104n0:22_14: kusalānañca dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesamānāya satiyā upatthambhitaṃ. Samādhipariggahitanti
anya-e0104n0:22_15: tattheva avikkhepasādhanena samādhānena upatthambhitaṃ. Paññāpariggahitanti tassā
anya-e0104n0:22_16: eva bhāvanāya upakārānupakāradhammānaṃ pajānanalakkhaṇāya paññāya upatthambhitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:22_18: ñāṇena saṃkilesapakkhaṃ yāthāvato passanto tato utrasanto ottappanto taṃ adhibhavati,
anya-e0104n0:22_19: na tena abhibhūyati. Tenāha “kilesandhakārena na iñjatī”ti. Etena ñāṇapariggahitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:23_1: anaṅgaṇatā, vigatūpakkilesatā, mudubhāvo, kammaniyatā, āneñjappattiyā ṭhitatā, samāhitassa
anya-e0104n0:23_2: vā cittassa imāni aṅgānīti “samāhite”ti imaṃ aṅgabhāvena aggahetvā ṭhitiāneñjappattiyo
anya-e0104n0:23_3: visuṃ gahetvā imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ. Abhinīhārakkhamanti iddhividhādiatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:24_0: Kāmaṃ nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā eva paṭhamajjhānasamadhigamo, vitakkādike vūpasame
anya-e0104n0:24_1: eva ca dutiyajjhānādisamadhigamo, tathāpi na tathā tehi dūrībhūtā apetā vā yathā
anya-e0104n0:24_3: vimuttiyā tassa parisuddhi, pariyodātatā ca yuttāti āha “nīvaraṇa…pe… pariyodāte”ti.
anya-e0104n0:24_5: Pāpakānanti lāmakānaṃ. Icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:24_6: “aho vata mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyā”tiādinayappavattānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:24_7: mānamāyāsāṭheyyādīnaṃ. Abhijjhādīnanti ādi-saddenāpi tesaṃyeva saṅgaho. Abhijjhā
anya-e0104n0:24_8: cettha paṭhamajjhānena avikkhambhaneyyā, mānādayo ca tadekaṭṭhā daṭṭhabbā “jhānapaṭilābhapaccayāna”nti
anya-e0104n0:24_9: anuvattamānattā. Vikkhambhaneyyā pana nīvaraṇaggahaṇeneva gahitā, kathaṃ pana paṭhamajjhānena
anya-e0104n0:24_10: avikkhambhaneyyā idha vigacchantīti? “Sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbākusalānaṃ paṭipakkhā”ti
anya-e0104n0:24_11: sallekhapaṭipattivasena evaṃ vuttaṃ jhānassa aparāmaṭṭhabhāvadassanato. Ye panettha
anya-e0104n0:24_14: pāṭhoti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ tathā pāṭhasseva abhāvato. Jhānapaṭilābhapaccanīkā
anya-e0104n0:24_15: ca nīvaraṇā ceva tadekaṭṭhā ca tesaṃ dūrībhāvaṃ vatvā puna abhāvavigamacodanāya ayujjamānattā.
anya-e0104n0:24_16: Nanu ca anaṅgaṇasutta- vatthasuttesu ayamattho na labbhati, oḷārikānaṃyeva pāpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:24_17: tattha adhippetattā? Saccametaṃ, idha pana adhigatacatutthajjhānassa vasena vuttattā
anya-e0104n0:24_18: sukhumāyeva te gahitā, aṅgaṇūpakkilesatāsāmaññena panettha suttānaṃ apadisanaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:24_19: hi “suttānusārenā”ti vuttaṃ, na pana suttavasenāti. Avassaṃ ce tamevaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:25_0: Iddhipādabhāvūpagamenāti iddhiyā pādakabhāvassa padaṭṭhānabhāvassa upagamanena. Bhāvanāpāripūriyāti
anya-e0104n0:25_1: ito paraṃ kattabbassa abhāvavasena abhinīhārakkhamabhāvanāya paripuṇṇattā. Paṇītabhāvūpagamenāti
anya-e0104n0:25_2: tato eva padhānabhāvaṃ nītatāya uttamaṭṭhena, atittikaraṭṭhena ca paṇītabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:25_3: upagamanena. Ubhayañcetaṃ ṭhitiyā kāraṇavacanaṃ paripuṇṇāya bhāvanāya paṇītabhāvappattiyā
anya-e0104n0:25_4: “ṭhite”ti. “Āneñjappatte”ti idaṃ ṭhitiyā visesanaṃ. Tenāha “yathā āneñjappattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:25_5: evaṃ ṭhite”ti. Imasmiṃ pakkhe “ṭhite āneñjappatte”ti ubhayamekaṃ aṅgaṃ, “samāhite”ti
anya-e0104n0:25_6: pana idampi ekamaṅgaṃ. Tenevassa paṭhamavikappato visesaṃ sandhāyāha “evampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgata”nti.
anya-e0104n0:27_0: 369. Nipphattiatthenāti sijjhanaṭṭhena. Paṭilābhaṭṭhenāti pāpuṇanaṭṭhena. Tanti kāmitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:27_1: vatthuṃ. Samijjhatīti nipphajjati. Pabbajjaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva jhānamaggā idha nekkhammaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:27_2: Ijjhatīti pāpuṇīyati. Paṭiharatīti pāṭihāriyanti yasmā paṭipakkhaṃ harati apaneti,
anya-e0104n0:27_3: tasmā pāṭihāriyaṃ. Attano paṭipakkhaṃ haratīti paṭihāriyaṃ, nekkhammādi, paṭihāriyameva
anya-e0104n0:28_1: attho. Ijjhatīti pasaveti. Sīlavāti ācārasīlena sīlavā. Kalyāṇadhammoti dasakusalakammapathavasena
anya-e0104n0:28_2: sundaradhammo. Sīlasampattiyā vā sīlavā. Dānādisesapuññakiriyavatthuvasena kalyāṇadhammo.
anya-e0104n0:29_1: hi iddhi vuttā. Sā dasavidhāti sabbā iddhiyo ānetvā atthuddhāravasena idhādhippetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:29_2: iddhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Bahubhāvādikassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhahanaṃ etissā atthīti
anya-e0104n0:29_3: adhiṭṭhānā. Vividhaṃ rūpanimmānasaṅkhātaṃ kubbanaṃ etissā atthīti vikubbanā. Manomayāti
anya-e0104n0:29_4: jhānamanena nibbattibhāvato manomayā. Ñāṇassa vipphāro vegāyitattaṃ etissā atthīti
anya-e0104n0:29_5: ñāṇavipphārā. Ariyānaṃ ayanti ariyā. Yato kutoci kammavipākato jātā iddhi kammavipākajā.
anya-e0104n0:29_6: Sātisayapuññanibbattā iddhi puññavato iddhi. Kammavipākajā iddhi jātito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0104n0:29_7: hoti, itarā yadā tadā puññassa vipaccanakāleti evaṃ vā imāsaṃ viseso veditabbo. Āthabbanavijjābhinibbattā
anya-e0104n0:30_0: 370. Pakatiyā ekoti sabhāvena eko. Bahukanti bahuṃ. Tena aggahitaparicchedaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbassa
anya-e0104n0:30_1: anekabhāvaṃ dassetvā puna paricchedato dassetuṃ “sataṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āvajjatīti
anya-e0104n0:30_2: parikammasaṅkhātena ābhogena ābhujati bhāvirūpe tena parikammamanasikārena manasi
anya-e0104n0:30_3: karoti. Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhātīti tathā parikammaṃ katvā abhiññāñāṇena yathādhippete bahuke
anya-e0104n0:30_4: adhiṭṭhāti, adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva bahubhāvāpattito bahubhāvāpādakaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:30_5: pavattento ca tathā adhiṭṭhātīti vuccati. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Evanti pakārattho
anya-e0104n0:30_6: evaṃ-saddo, tena sabbampi adhiṭṭhānappakāraṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Adhiṭṭhānavasenāti “ñāṇena
anya-e0104n0:31: 371. Pakativaṇṇanti pakatisaṇṭhānaṃ attano pākatikarūpaṃ. Pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasenāti attano pakativaṇṇavijahanapubbakassa kumārakavaṇṇādivaṇṇavikārassa vasena.
anya-e0104n0:32_0: 372. Imamhā kāyāti paccakkhabhāvena “imamhā”ti vuttā bhikkhussa karajakāyā. Aññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:32_1: kāyanti aññaṃ iddhimayaṃ kāyaṃ. Tato eva iddhimayarūpavantatāya rūpiṃ. Abhiññāmanena
anya-e0104n0:32_2: nibbattattā manomayaṃ. Nipphattivasenāti nipphajjanavasena. Abhiññāñāṇassa hi yathā
anya-e0104n0:32_3: manomayo kāyo nipphajjati, tathā pavatti manomayiddhi. Eseva nayo sesesupi. Yadi
anya-e0104n0:32_4: evaṃ kathamayameva manomayiddhīti? Ruḷhīvesā veditabbā yathā “manomayo attabhāvo”ti,
anya-e0104n0:32_5: yathā vā “gosamaññā visāṇādimati piṇḍe”. Atha vā abbhantarato nikkhante, iddhimatā
anya-e0104n0:32_6: ca ekantasadise imasmiṃ nimmāne supākaṭo manasā nibbattitabhāvoti yathā sātisayo
anya-e0104n0:32_7: manomayavohāro, na tathā aññāsu adhiṭṭhānavikubbaniddhīsu samaññantaravantāsūti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:33_0: 373. Ñāṇuppattito pubbe vāti arahattamaggañāṇuppattito pubbe vā vipassanākkhaṇe,
anya-e0104n0:33_1: tatopi vā pubbe antimabhavikassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya. Pacchā vā yāva khandhaparinibbānā.
anya-e0104n0:33_2: Taṅkhaṇe vā magguppattisamaye. Ñāṇānubhāvanibbatto visesoti sūriyassa uṭṭhitaṭṭhāne,
anya-e0104n0:33_3: samantato ca ālokakaraṇasamatthatā viya tasseva ñāṇassa ānubhāvena nibbatto sabbaso
anya-e0104n0:33_5: āgatāni. Aniccānupassanāyāti saṅkhāre aniccato anupassantiyā balavavipassanāya. Āraddhavipassanassa
anya-e0104n0:33_6: hi yathāvuttavipassanāya pavattikkhaṇe tato pubbe, pacchā ca pakiṇṇakasammasanavāre
anya-e0104n0:33_7: niccasaññāya pahānaṭṭho ijjhati. Eseva nayo sabbattha. Kāmaṃ ettakāya saṅkhepakathāyapi
anya-e0104n0:33_8: adhippetattho pakāsitova, vitthārakathāya pana vibhūtataro hotīti āha “vitthārena kathetabba”nti.
anya-e0104n0:34: Gabbhagatassevāti anādare sāmivacanaṃ. Vuttanayenāti “pacchimabhavikassā”tiādinā bākulattheravatthumhi vuttanayena.
anya-e0104n0:35_0: Dārubhāraṃ katvāti dārubhāraṃ sakaṭe katvā, āropetvāti attho. Ossajjitvāti chaḍḍetvā.
anya-e0104n0:35_1: Sakaṭamūleti sakaṭasamīpe. Vāḷayakkhānucariteti kururehi yakkhehi anuvicaritabbe.
anya-e0104n0:36_1: samāpattiyā ciṇṇapariyante. Taṅkhaṇeti samāpannakkhaṇe. Samathānubhāvanibbatto visesoti
anya-e0104n0:36_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jhāne samādhitejena nibbatto nīvaraṇavikkhambhanavitakkādisamatikkamasaññāvedayitanirodhaparissayasahanādiko viseso.
anya-e0104n0:37_0: Kapotakandarāyanti evaṃnāmake araññavihāre. Juṇhāya rattiyāti candālokavatiyā rattiyā.
anya-e0104n0:37_1: Navoropitehi kesehīti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ. Yassāti pahārassa. Tassāti
anya-e0104n0:37_2: yakkhassa. Khippanisantibhāvassa ukkaṃsagatattā thero tasmiṃ paharante eva samāpattiṃ
anya-e0104n0:37_3: samāpajjīti āha “paharaṇasamaye samāpattiṃ appesī”ti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “nisinno hoti
anya-e0104n0:37_4: aññataraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Ime pana therā samāpattito vuṭṭhānasamakālaṃ
anya-e0104n0:38_0: Sañjīvattheranti kakusandhassa bhagavato dutiyaṃ aggasāvakaṃ mahātheraṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0104n0:38_1: So hi āyasmā araññādīsu yattha katthaci nisinno appakasireneva nirodhaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0104n0:38_2: tasmā ekadivasaṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nirodhaṃ samāpajji, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:38_3: “nirodhasamāpanna”ntiādi. Cīvare aṃsumattampi na jhāyittha, sarīre kā kathā. Teneva
anya-e0104n0:38_4: hi thero “sañjīvo” tveva paññāyittha. Ayamassāti assa āyasmato sañjīvattherassa yo
anya-e0104n0:38_5: nirodhasamāpattiyaṃ aggiparissayābhāvo, ayaṃ samādhivipphārā iddhīti yojanā. Kathaṃ
anya-e0104n0:39_0: Paṭhamaṃ ṭhapitabhaṇḍakassāti sabbapaṭhamaṃ ṭhapitabhaṇḍakassa. Tañhi gahaṇakāle
anya-e0104n0:39_1: sabbapacchimaṃ gayhati. Kālaparicchedavasenāti “ettake kāle gate vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti
anya-e0104n0:39_2: samāpattito pubbe katakālaparicchedavasena. Bhītā viraviṃsūti rattandhakāre rūpadassanena
anya-e0104n0:39_3: “pisāco uṭṭhahatī”ti maññamānā. Ettakehi nāma bhaṇḍakehi ajjhotthaṭo nibbikāro “aho
anya-e0104n0:39_4: mahānubhāvo, aho vivekavāsī”ti ca theragatena pasādena.
anya-e0104n0:40: Tattatelakaṭāhanti ādhārasīsena ādheyyamāha, kaṭāhe tattatelaṃ kaṭāhena āsiñcīti adhippāyo. Vivaṭṭamānanti katthacipi alagganavasena bhassantaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:41: Saparivārāti pañcahi itthisatehi saparivārā. Rājānaṃ mettāya pharīti odissakamettāsamāpattiyā rājānaṃ phusi. Khipitunti vijjhituṃ. Oropetunti sarasannāhaṃ paṭisaṃharituṃ.
anya-e0104n0:42_0: 375. Paṭikkūlādīsūti aniṭṭhādīsu. Aniṭṭhaṃ hi paṭikkūlaṃ, amanuññampi “paṭikkūla”nti
anya-e0104n0:42_1: vuccati. Ādi-saddena apaṭikkūlādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tatthāti paṭikkūlārammaṇe. Upekkhakoti
anya-e0104n0:42_2: chaḷaṅgupekkhāya upekkhako. Tatthāti paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlabhede vatthusmiṃ. Satoti sativepullappattiyā
anya-e0104n0:42_3: satimā. Sampajānoti paññāvepullappattiyā sampajānakārī. Ayanti ayaṃ paṭikkūlādivatthūsu
anya-e0104n0:43_0: Aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ sattasaññite mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātuso paccavekkhaṇāya dhātumanasikāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:43_1: vā gūthādike dhātumanasikāraṃ karontoti yojetabbaṃ. Apaṭikkūlasaññī viharatīti hitesitāya,
anya-e0104n0:43_2: dhammasabhāvacintanāya ca na paṭikkūlasaññī hutvā iriyāpathavihārena viharati. Iṭṭhe
anya-e0104n0:43_3: vatthusmiṃ ñātimittādike. Kesādiasucikoṭṭhāsamattamevāti asubhapharaṇaṃ vā asubhamanasikāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:43_4: vā. Tattha rūpadhammajātaṃ aniccanti ādiattho iti-saddo, tasmā aniccadukkhānattavipariṇāmadhammoti
anya-e0104n0:43_5: manasikāraṃ vā karontoti yojanā. Paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlesūti iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni vatthūni ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:43_6: gahetvā vadati. Esa nayo itarattha. Yaṃ vā sattānaṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭikkūlato upaṭṭhitameva
anya-e0104n0:43_7: pacchā apaṭikkūlato upatiṭṭhati, yañca apaṭikkūlato upaṭṭhitameva pacchā paṭikkūlato
anya-e0104n0:43_8: upatiṭṭhati, tadubhayepi khīṇāsavo sace ākaṅkhati, vuttanayena apaṭikkūlasaññī vā
anya-e0104n0:44_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena “cakkhū”ti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena
anya-e0104n0:44_1: cakkhuviññāṇena, cakkhunā vā kāraṇabhūtena, dvārabhūtena vā rūpaṃ passitvā. Neva
anya-e0104n0:44_2: sumano hotīti gehassitasomanassassāyaṃ paṭikkhepo, na nekkhammapakkhikāya kiriyāsomanassavedanāya.
anya-e0104n0:44_4: chasu dvāresu pavattiyā “chaḷaṅgupekkhā”ti laddhanāmaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhaṃ. Yathāvuttamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:45_0: 376. Pakkhīādīnanti ādi-saddena devādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Vehāsagamanādikāti pana ādi-saddena
anya-e0104n0:45_2: sukhasamussayato vinipatitattā vinipātikānaṃ. Jhānanti abhiññāpattaṃ jhānaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0104n0:45_3: Vipassanāpi ukkaṃsagatā ubbegapītisahitā ākāse laṅghāpanamattāpi hotīti vuttaṃ “vipassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:45_4: vā”ti. “Paṭhamakappikāna”nti idaṃ “ekaccānaṃ manussāna”nti imassa visesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:46_0: 377. Vehāsanti bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ, accantasaṃyoge vā. Cakkavattī hi cakkaratanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:46_1: purakkhatvā attano bhavanato abbhuggantvā ākāseneva sineruṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
anya-e0104n0:46_2: anusaṃyāyatīti. Assabandhāti assapālā, ye assānaṃ yavadāyakā. Tathā gobandhā.
anya-e0104n0:47_0: Cakkavattiādīnaṃ puññiddhiyā vitthāriyamānāya atipapañco hotīti puññavato iddhiṃ
anya-e0104n0:47_1: lakkhaṇato dassentena “paripākaṃ gate puññasambhāre ijjhanakaviseso”ti vatvāpi jotikādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:47_2: puññiddhiṃ ekadesena dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha suvaṇṇapabbatoti sabbasuvaṇṇamayo
anya-e0104n0:47_3: pabbato. Tassa kira gahitagahitaṭṭhāne odhi na paññāyati. Ekasītāmatteti ettha sītā
anya-e0104n0:47_4: nāma kasanavasena naṅgalassa gatamaggo. Tumbaṃ nāma āḷhakaṃ. Cuddasa maggāti catuddasa kasanamaggā.
anya-e0104n0:48: 378. Vijjaṃ parijapitvāti gandhārīvijjādikaṃ attano vijjaṃ katūpacāraṃ parivattetvā mantapaṭhanakkamena paṭhitvā.
anya-e0104n0:49_0: 379. Sammāpayogenāti upāyapayogena, yathā yathicchitatthasiddhi hoti, tathā pavattitañāyārambhena.
anya-e0104n0:49_1: Tassa tassa kammassāti yathādhippetassa nipphādetabbakammassa. Ettha cāti “tattha
anya-e0104n0:49_2: tattha sammāpayogappaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī”ti imissā dasamāya iddhiyā niddesepi.
anya-e0104n0:49_5: Gaṇitagandhabbādi sippakammaṃ. Sallakattakādi vejjakammaṃ. Irubbedādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:50_0: “Ekopi hutvā bahudhāva hotī”tiādinā adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā eva gahitattā āha “adhiṭṭhānā
anya-e0104n0:50_1: iddhiyeva āgatā”ti. Imasmiṃ panattheti imasmiṃ abhiññānisaṃsasaṅkhāte, iddhividhasaṅkhāte vā atthe.
anya-e0104n0:51_1: dassetī”tiādīsu vikappattho, tadubhayampettha yujjatīti dassento āha “iddhividhāyāti
anya-e0104n0:51_2: iddhikoṭṭhāsāya, iddhivikappāya vā”ti. Iddhi hi abhiññāsu eko koṭṭhāso, vakkhamānehi
anya-e0104n0:51_3: bhedehi anekappabhedā ca. Vuttappakāravasenāti vuttassa cuddasappakārassa, cittaparidamanassa
anya-e0104n0:51_6: samānasantānatāya vuttaṃ, na parikammacittassa kasiṇārammaṇattā. Iddhividhābhimukhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:51_7: pesetīti nipphādetabbassa iddhividhassa abhimukhabhāvena pavatteti. Yaṃ hi “sataṃ
anya-e0104n0:51_8: homī”tiādinā parikammacittassa pavattanaṃ, tadevassa abhinīharaṇaṃ, iddhividhābhimukhapesanañca
anya-e0104n0:51_9: tatheva iddhividhassa pavattanato abhininnāmanaṃ idha parikammacittassa iddhividhe
anya-e0104n0:51_10: adhimuttīti āha “adhigantabbaiddhipoṇaṃ iddhipabbhāraṃ karotī”ti. Idha paccanubhavanaphusanā
anya-e0104n0:51_11: sacchikiriyāpattipariyāyā evāti dassento “pāpuṇātīti attho”ti āha. Assāti iddhividhassa.
anya-e0104n0:52_0: Ekopīti pi-saddo vakkhamānaṃ bahubhāvaṃ upādāya sampiṇḍanattho. So hissa paṭiyogī
anya-e0104n0:52_1: “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hotī”ti. So ca kho bahubhāvaṃ nimminitvā
anya-e0104n0:52_2: ṭhitassa antarāva ekabhāvūpagamo. Yathākālaparicchedaṃ pana saraseneva ekabhāvūpagamo
anya-e0104n0:52_3: idha nādhippeto aniddhinimmānabhāvato. Tampi pubbe katakālaparicchedavasena siddhattā
anya-e0104n0:52_4: iddhānubhāvoyevāti keci. Aṭṭhāne vāyaṃ pi-saddo, eko hutvā bahudhāpi hoti, bahudhā
anya-e0104n0:52_5: hutvā ekopi hotīti sambandho. Imasmiṃ pakkhe pi-saddo vakkhamānaṃ ekabhāvaṃ upādāya
anya-e0104n0:52_6: “sampiṇḍanattho”ti vatvā “so hī”tiādi sabbaṃ yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ. Bahubhāvanimmāne
anya-e0104n0:52_7: payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “bahūnaṃ santike”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bahūnaṃ santiketi attanā
anya-e0104n0:52_8: nimmitānaṃ bahūnaṃ samīpe, tehi parivārito hutvāti adhippāyo. Vā-saddo avuttavikappattho,
anya-e0104n0:52_9: tena “dhammaṃ vā kathetukāmo”ti evamādi saṅgayhati. “Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahanto evaṃ hotī”ti
anya-e0104n0:53_0: 381. Bhavati ettha iddhīti bhūmiyo, jhānāni. Etthāti ca hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ. Vivekato
anya-e0104n0:53_1: jātā bhūmi vivekajabhūmi. Vivekajaṃ hi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ nīvaraṇavivekasambhūtattā.
anya-e0104n0:53_2: Pītisukhabhūtā bhūmi pītisukhabhūmi. Dutiyajjhānañhi pītisukhabhūmibhūtañceva pītisukhasañjātañca
anya-e0104n0:53_3: samādhivasena. Upari dvīsupi eseva nayo. Iddhilābhāyāti iddhiyā adhigamāya. Iddhipaṭilābhāyāti
anya-e0104n0:53_4: iddhiyā punappunaṃ labhamānāya, bahulīkaraṇāyāti attho. Iddhivikubbanatāyāti iddhiyā
anya-e0104n0:53_5: vividharūpakāraṇāya, vikubbaniddhiyāti attho. Iddhivisavitāyāti iddhiyā vividhānisaṃsapasavanāya.
anya-e0104n0:53_7: iddhiyā paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena vigatasaṃkilesatāya suṭṭhu visāradabhāvāya. Catutthajjhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:53_8: tāva iddhiyā bhūmi hotu tattha patiṭṭhāya nipphādetabbato, itarāni pana kathanti
anya-e0104n0:53_9: āha “ettha cā”tiādi. Tattha tīṇi jhānāni sambhārabhūmiyoti veditabbānīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:53_10: Tatiyajjhāne sukhapharaṇena, paṭhamadutiyesu pītipharaṇena sukhapharaṇena ca hetubhūtenāti
anya-e0104n0:53_11: yathārahavasena yojanā. Pharaṇaṃ cettha jhānassa subhāvitabhāvena sātisayānaṃ pītisukhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:53_12: vasena jhānappaccayādinā sahajātanāmakāyassa paribrūhanaṃ, rūpakāyassa ca taṃsamuṭṭhānehi
anya-e0104n0:53_13: paṇītarūpehi paripphuṭatā. Tenāha bhagavā “pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti
anya-e0104n0:53_14: parippharatī”ti. Sukhasaññanti jhānasukhena sahagataṃ saññaṃ. Lahusaññanti taṃsampayuttalahutāsahagataṃ
anya-e0104n0:53_15: saññaṃ. Okkamitvāti anupavisitvā. Tesu hi jhānesu sātisayāya lahutāya sampayuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:53_16: sukhaṃ santānavasena pavattento yogī taṃ samokkanto viya hotīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Saññāsīsena
anya-e0104n0:53_17: niddeso. Jhānasampayuttā hi lahutā vināpi iddhiyā ākāsaṃ laṅghāpanappamāṇappattā
anya-e0104n0:53_18: viya hoti. Lahubhāvaggahaṇeneva cettha mudukammaññabhāvāpi gahitā eva. Tenāha “lahumudukammaññakāyo hutvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:54_0: Iminā pariyāyenāti tiṇṇaṃ jhānānaṃ samāpajjanena sukhalahubhāvappattanāmarūpakāyassa
anya-e0104n0:54_1: sati cittaparidamane catutthaṃ jhānaṃ sukheneva iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatīti iminā
anya-e0104n0:54_2: pariyāyena. Pakatibhūmiyā hi adhiṭṭhānabhūtā sambhārabhūmiyo pākārassa nemippadeso viyāti.
anya-e0104n0:55_0: 382. Iddhipādaniddese cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Iddhipādāti ettha ijjhatīti iddhi,
anya-e0104n0:55_1: samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā
anya-e0104n0:55_2: hontīti iddhi. Paṭhamenatthena iddhi eva pādoti iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:55_3: Dutiyenatthena iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo. Pādoti patiṭṭhā, adhigamūpāyoti attho. Tena
anya-e0104n0:55_4: hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti. Ayaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathānayo.
anya-e0104n0:55_5: Tattha iddhi-saddassa paṭhamo kattuattho, dutiyo karaṇattho vutto. Pāda-saddassa
anya-e0104n0:55_6: eko karaṇatthova. Pajjitabbāva iddhi vuttā, na ca ijjhantī, pajjitabbā ca iddhi pajjanakaraṇena
anya-e0104n0:55_7: pādena samānādhikaraṇā hotīti paṭhamena atthena “iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo”ti na sakkā
anya-e0104n0:55_8: vattuṃ. Tathā iddhikiriyākaraṇena sādhetabbāva vuddhisaṅkhātā iddhi pajjanakiriyākaraṇena
anya-e0104n0:55_9: pajjitabbāti dvinnaṃ karaṇānaṃ na asamānādhikaraṇatā sambhavatīti dutiyenatthena
anya-e0104n0:55_10: “iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo”ti ca na sakkā vattuṃ. Tasmā paṭhamenatthena samānādhikaraṇasamāso,
anya-e0104n0:55_11: dutiyena sāmivacanasamāso na yujjatīti paṭhamenatthena iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo, dutiyenatthena
anya-e0104n0:55_12: iddhi eva pādo iddhipādoti samāso yutto, yathāvuttopi vā, pādassa ijjhamānakoṭṭhāsaijjhanakaraṇūpāyabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:56_1: eva pana sahajātachandassāpi adhikatā veditabbā. Atha vā “chandañce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ
anya-e0104n0:56_2: karitvā labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassekaggataṃ, ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhī”ti
anya-e0104n0:56_3: imāya pāḷiyā chandādhipatisamādhi chandasamādhīti adhipati-saddalopaṃ katvā samāso
anya-e0104n0:56_5: chandādhiko vā samādhī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “chandaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā”tiādi. Padhānabhūtāti
anya-e0104n0:56_6: vīriyabhūtāti keci vadanti. Saṅkhatasaṅkhāranivattanatthaṃ pana padhānaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:56_7: Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro, sabbampi vīriyaṃ. Tattha catukiccasādhakato
anya-e0104n0:56_8: aññassa nivattanatthaṃ padhānaggahaṇaṃ. Padhānabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtāti attho. Catubbidhassa
anya-e0104n0:56_9: pana vīriyassa adhippetattā bahuvacananiddeso. Yo pana “iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo”ti
anya-e0104n0:56_10: evaṃ samāsayojanāvasena pādassa upāyatthataṃ gahetvā iddhipādattho vutto, so paṭilābhapubbabhāgānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:56_11: kattukaraṇiddhibhāvaṃ “chandiddhipādo”tiādinā vā abhidhamme āgatattā chandādīhi iddhipādehi
anya-e0104n0:56_12: sādhetabbāya vuddhiyā kattiddhibhāvaṃ, chandādīnaṃ karaṇiddhibhāvañca sandhāya vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:57_1: Tattha purimaṃ samādhivisesanaṃ vīriyādhipati samādhi vīriyasamādhīti. Dutiyaṃ samannāgamaṅgadassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:57_2: Dve eva hi sabbattha samannāgamaṅgāni samādhi, padhānasaṅkhāro ca. Chandādayo samādhivisesanāni,
anya-e0104n0:57_3: padhānasaṅkhāro pana padhānavacaneneva visesito, na chandādīhīti na idha vīriyādhipatitā
anya-e0104n0:57_4: padhānasaṅkhārassa vuttā hoti. Vīriyañca samādhiṃ visesetvā ṭhitameva samannāgamaṅgavasena
anya-e0104n0:57_5: padhānasaṅkhāravacanena vuttanti nāpi dvīhi vīriyehi samannāgamo vutto hotīti. Yasmā
anya-e0104n0:57_6: pana chandādīhi visiṭṭho samādhi, tathā visiṭṭheneva ca tena sampayutto padhānasaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n0:57_7: sesadhammā ca, tasmā samādhivisesanānaṃ vasena cattāro iddhipādā vuttā. Visesanabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:58_0: Atha vātiādinā nissayaṭṭhepi pāda-sadde upāyaṭṭhena chandādīnaṃ iddhipādatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:58_1: Teneva abhidhamme uttaracūḷabhājanīye “cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādo”tiādinā chandādīnameva
anya-e0104n0:58_2: iddhipādatā vuttā. Pañhāpucchake ca “cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhī”tiādināva
anya-e0104n0:58_3: uddesaṃ katvāpi puna chandādīnaṃyeva kusalādibhāvo vibhatto. Upāyiddhipādadassanatthameva
anya-e0104n0:58_4: hi sutte, abhidhamme ca nissayiddhipādadassanaṃ kataṃ, aññathā catubbidhatā na hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:59_0: 383. Chandādīni aṭṭhāti chandasamādhi vīriyasamādhi cittasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhīti
anya-e0104n0:59_1: evaṃ chandādīni aṭṭha. Kāmaṃ cettha catūsupi ṭhānesu samādhi samādhi eva, tathāpi
anya-e0104n0:59_2: iddhiṃ uppādetukāmatāchandasahitova samādhi iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattati, na kevalo.
anya-e0104n0:59_3: Evaṃ vīriyasamādhiādayopi. Tasmā chandādisahitā ete cattāro ca samādhī, chandādayo
anya-e0104n0:59_4: ca cattāroti aṭṭha pajjati iddhi etehi pāpuṇīyati, sayaṃ vā pajjanti iddhipaṭilābhāya
anya-e0104n0:59_5: sampajjantīti padānīti vuccanti. Tenāha “iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattantī”ti. Yaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:59_6: pāḷiyaṃ “chando na samādhī”tiādi, taṃ yadipi chandādayo samādhisahitāva iddhiṃ nipphādenti,
anya-e0104n0:59_7: tathāpi visuṃ nesaṃ padabhāvadassanaṃ. Ekato niyuttova, na ekeko hutvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:60_0: 384. Anonatanti na onataṃ, vīriyena paggahitattā alīnanti attho. Tenāha “kosajje
anya-e0104n0:60_1: na iñjatī”ti, kosajjanimittaṃ na calatīti attho. Uddhaṃ nataṃ unnataṃ, uddhataṃ vikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:60_2: Na unnataṃ anunnataṃ, avikkhittaṃ samāhitanti attho. Tenāha “uddhacce na iñjatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:60_3: Abhisaṅgavasena nataṃ abhinataṃ, na abhinataṃ anabhinataṃ, arattaṃ. Apagamanavasena
anya-e0104n0:60_4: nataṃ apanataṃ, kodhavasena vimukhaṃ. Na apanataṃ anapanataṃ, aduṭṭhaṃ. Diṭṭhiyā
anya-e0104n0:60_5: “ahaṃ, mama”nti nissayavasena na nissitanti anissitaṃ. Chandarāgavasena na paṭibaddhanti
anya-e0104n0:60_6: appaṭibaddhaṃ. Rāgo kevalaṃ āsattimattaṃ, chandarāgo pana bahalakileso. Tathā hissa
anya-e0104n0:60_7: dūre ṭhitampi ārammaṇaṃ paṭibaddhameva. Vippamuttanti visesato pamuttaṃ. Jhānānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:60_8: kāmarāgapaṭipakkhatāya āha “kāmarāge”ti. Visaṃyuttanti vivittaṃ saṃkilesato, na vā
anya-e0104n0:60_9: saṃyuttaṃ catūhipi yogehi. Vimariyādikataṃ kilesamariyādāya, yathā īsakampi kilesamariyādā
anya-e0104n0:60_10: na hoti, tathā paṭipannaṃ. Ekattagatanti ekaggataṃ upagataṃ accantameva samāhitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:60_11: Tato eva nānattakilesehi nānāsabhāvehi kilesehi na iñjati.
anya-e0104n0:61_0: Esa atthoti kosajjādinimittaṃ. Imassa cittassa āneñjanattho siddho eva āneñjappattiyā
anya-e0104n0:61_1: pakāsanavasena dassitattā. Puna vuttoti iddhiyā bhūmipādapadadassanappasaṅgena “imāni
anya-e0104n0:61_2: mūlāni nāmā”ti mūlabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna vutto. Purimoti “saddhādīhi pariggahitattā”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:61_3: pubbe chadhā dassitanayo. Ayanti adhunā soḷasadhā dassitanayo. Suttanaye, paṭisambhidānaye
anya-e0104n0:61_4: ca dassite tattha sammoho na hoti, na adassiteti āha “ubhayattha asammohattha”nti.
anya-e0104n0:62_0: 385. Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahantoti “kathaṃ panāyaṃ evaṃ hotī”ti ettha pubbe attanā vuttapadaṃ
anya-e0104n0:62_1: uddharati adhiṭṭhānavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:62_2: Ettha anupubbena cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā catutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāyāti keci, taṃ
anya-e0104n0:62_4: ca abhiññāpādakaṃ, na itarāni. Parikammaṃ katvāti pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kāmāvacaracittena
anya-e0104n0:62_5: “sataṃ homī”tiādinā cintanamevettha parikammakaraṇaṃ, tathāvajjanameva ca āvajjanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:62_6: Dutiyampīti pi-saddo samuccayattho, tena tatiyampi, tato bhiyyopīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0104n0:62_7: Yathā hi jhānabhāvanā, evamabhiññābhāvanāpi. “Ekavāraṃ dvevāra”nti idampi nidassanamattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:62_9: ekekassa parikammacittassa satārammaṇatā daṭṭhabbā “sataṃ homī”ti pavattanato. Sahassārammaṇānīti
anya-e0104n0:62_10: etthāpi eseva nayo. Vaṇṇavasenāti attanā parikappitavaṇṇavasena. No paṇṇattivasenāti
anya-e0104n0:62_11: na sattapaṇṇattivasena. Taṃ adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ appanācittamivāti ivaggahaṇaṃ abhiññācittassa
anya-e0104n0:62_12: jhānacittassa paṭhamuppattisadisabhāvato vuttaṃ, na tassa appanābhāvato. Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānikanti
anya-e0104n0:63_0: 386. Yadi evaṃ “āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhātī”ti paṭisambhidāvacanaṃ kathanti āha “yampī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:63_1: Tatrāpīti paṭisambhidāyampi. Āvajjatīti “bahukaṃ āvajjatī”ti idaṃ pāṭhapadaṃ parikammavaseneva
anya-e0104n0:63_2: vuttaṃ, na āvajjanavasena. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhātīti abhiññāñāṇavasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:63_3: na parikammacittasampayuttassa, aññassa vā kāmāvacarassa ñāṇassa vasena. Na hi tassa
anya-e0104n0:63_4: tādiso ānubhāvo atthīti. Tasmāti yasmā appanāppattassa abhiññāñāṇasseva vasena adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:63_5: tasmā. Ayamadhiṭṭhānakkamoti dassento “bahukaṃ āvajjatī”tiādimāha. Tattha sanniṭṭhāpanavasenāti nipphādanavasena.
anya-e0104n0:64: Kāyasakkhidassanatthanti na kevalaṃ vacanamattameva, atha kho ayametassatthassa attano kāyena sacchikatattā kāyasakkhīti sakkhidassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:65_0: Kokanadanti padumavisesanaṃ yathā “kokāsaka”nti. Taṃ kira bahupattaṃ, vaṇṇasampannaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:65_1: ativiya sugandhañca hoti. Pātoti pageva. Ayañhettha attho – yathā kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:65_2: padumaṃ pāto sūriyassuggamanavelāyaṃ phullaṃ vikasitaṃ avītagandhaṃ siyā virocamānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:65_3: evaṃ sarīragandhena, guṇagandhena ca sugandhaṃ saradakāle antalikkhe ādiccamiva attano
anya-e0104n0:65_4: tejasā tapantaṃ aṅgehi niccharaṇakajutitāya aṅgīrasaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ passāti.
anya-e0104n0:66_0: Abhabboti paṭipattisāramidaṃ sāsanaṃ, paṭipatti ca pariyattimūlikā, tvañca pariyattiṃ
anya-e0104n0:66_1: uggahetuṃ asamattho, tasmā abhabboti adhippāyo. Abhabbo nāma na hoti vāsadhurasseva padhānabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:67_0: Bhikkhūti pabbajitavohārena vuttaṃ, bhāvinaṃ vā bhikkhubhāvaṃ upādāya yathā “agamā
anya-e0104n0:67_1: rājagahaṃ buddho”ti. Pilotikakhaṇḍanti suvisuddhaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ. Rajo haratīti rajoharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:67_2: Abhinimminitvā adāsi tattha pubbe katādhikārattā. Tathā hi yoniso ummujjanto “attabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:67_3: panāyaṃ doso”ti asubhasaññaṃ, aniccasaññañca paṭilabhitvā nāmarūpapariggahādinā pañcasu
anya-e0104n0:67_4: khandhesu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā kalāpasammasanādikkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā udayabbayañāṇādipaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0104n0:67_5: vipassanaṃ anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ pāpesi. Obhāsavissajjanapubbikā bhāsitagāthā obhāsagāthā.
anya-e0104n0:68_0: Rāgo rajo ariyassa vinaye, na ca pana reṇu vuccati “rajo”ti. Kasmā? Cittassa malīnabhāvakaraṇato.
anya-e0104n0:68_1: Rāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ “rajo”ti. Etaṃ rajanti etaṃ rāgasaṅkhātaṃ rajaṃ. Vippajahitvāti
anya-e0104n0:68_2: aggamaggena visesato pajahanahetu. Paṇḍitā viharanti teti te pajahanakā paṇḍitā hutvā
anya-e0104n0:68_3: viharanti. Vītarajassa sabbaso pahīnarāgādirajassa buddhassa bhagavato sāsane. Tathā hi vadanti –
anya-e0104n0:70: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā”ti. ;
anya-e0104n0:71: Chaḷabhiññāgahaṇena gahitāya chaḷabhiññāya vibhāvitepi ariyamagge anuttarabhāvasāmaññena phalanibbānehi saddhiṃ saṅgaṇhanto āha “nava lokuttaradhammā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:72: Pattassa pidahanākārena hatthaṃ ṭhapento “hatthaṃ pidahī”ti vutto. Hatthanti vā karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ, hatthena pidahīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:73_0: Sahassakkhattunti sahassadhā. Sahassadhā hi attānaṃ ekacitteneva nimminantopi sahassavāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:73_1: nimminanto viya hoti. Asatipi kiriyābyāvuttiyaṃ tadatthasiddhitoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:73_2: “sahassakkhattu”nti vuttaṃ. Ambavaneti ambavane katavihāre. Rammeti ramaṇīye. Yāva
anya-e0104n0:74_1: nānākāre yathāvuttavaṇṇādivasena nānāvidhe. Missakakeseti palitehi missitakese. Upaḍḍharattavaṇṇaupaḍḍhapaṇḍuvaṇṇādīsu
anya-e0104n0:74_2: aññataravaṇṇanti evaṃ upaḍḍharattacīvare. Padavasena atthassa, gamanavasena pāḷiyā
anya-e0104n0:74_3: bhaṇanaṃ padabhāṇaṃ. Parikathādivasena dhammassa kathanaṃ dhammakathā. Sarena bhaññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:74_4: suttādīnaṃ uccāraṇaṃ sarabhaññaṃ. Aparepīti vuttākārato aññepi dīgharassakisathūlādike
anya-e0104n0:74_5: nānappakārake. Icchiticchitappakārāyeva hontīti yathā yathā icchitā, taṃtaṃpakārāyeva
anya-e0104n0:74_6: honti. Yattakā hi visesā vaṇṇādivasena tesu icchitā, tattakavisesavantova te honti.
anya-e0104n0:74_7: Te pana tathā bahudhā bhinnākārepi vaṇṇavasena ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekameva adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:74_8: pavattati. Ayaṃ hissa ānubhāvo – yathā ekāva cetanā nānāvisesavantaṃ attabhāvaṃ nibbatteti,
anya-e0104n0:74_9: tattha bhavapatthanā kammassa visesapaccayo hoti. Acinteyyo ca kammavipākoti ce,
anya-e0104n0:74_10: idhāpi parikammacittaṃ visesapaccayo hoti, acinteyyo ca iddhivisayoti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:74_11: Esa nayoti yvāyaṃ bahubhāvanimmāne “abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā”tiādinā adhiṭṭhānanayo
anya-e0104n0:75_0: Iti avisesaṃ atidesena dassetvā visesaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:75_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha iminā bhikkhunā icchantenāti sambandho. Maṃ jānissantīti “iddhimā”ti
anya-e0104n0:75_2: maṃ jānissanti. Antarāvāti paricchinnakālassa abbhantare eva. Pādakajjhānantiādi
anya-e0104n0:75_3: parikammakaraṇākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, itaraṃ pana atideseneva vibhāvitanti. Evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:75_5: iminā “sataṃ homī”tiādinā adhiṭṭhānaṃ karontena kālaparicchedavaseneva kātabbanti
anya-e0104n0:75_6: dasseti. Sayameva eko hoti adhiṭṭhānassa paṭippassaddhattā. Ettha ca parikammādhiṭṭhānacittānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:75_7: iddhimā vaṇṇavasena sayameva ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Tesu parikammacittāni santatipaccuppannārammaṇāni.
anya-e0104n0:76_0: 387. “Āvibhāva”nti padassa heṭṭhā vuttena hoti-saddena sambandho na yujjati upayogavacanena
anya-e0104n0:76_1: vuttattā, tathā vakkhamānena ca gacchati-saddena attano, paresañca āvibhāvassa icchitattā,
anya-e0104n0:76_2: nāmapadañca kiriyāpadāpekkhanti kiriyāsāmaññavācinā karoti-saddena yojetvā āha “āvibhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:76_3: karotī”ti. Tirobhāvanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ paṭisambhidāyanti codanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:76_4: sandhāyāha “idameva hī”tiādi. Kāmaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “āvibhāvanti kenaci anāvaṭaṃ
anya-e0104n0:76_5: hotī”tiādinā āgataṃ, tampi idameva āvibhāvakaraṇaṃ, tirobhāvakaraṇañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:76_6: Sesapadāni tesaṃyeva vevacanāni. Andhakāranti rattandhakāraṃ, divāpi vā bilaguhādigataṃ
anya-e0104n0:76_7: andhakāraṃ. Paṭicchannanti kuṭṭakavāṭādinā paṭicchāditaṃ. Anāpāthanti dūratāsukhumataratādinā
anya-e0104n0:76_8: na āpāthagataṃ. Ayanti iddhimā. Paṭicchannopi dūre ṭhitopi attā vā paro vā yathā
anya-e0104n0:76_9: dissatīti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ. Ālokajātanti ālokabhūtaṃ, jātālokaṃ vā.
anya-e0104n0:77_0: 388. Etaṃ pana pāṭihāriyanti āvibhāvapāṭihāriyamāha. Kena katapubbanti tattha kāyasakkhiṃ
anya-e0104n0:77_1: pucchitvā “satthā tāva kāyasakkhī”ti dassentena “bhagavatā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:77_2: “bhagavā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sāvatthivāsike passantīti ānetvā sambandho, tathā “yāva
anya-e0104n0:77_3: avīciṃ dassesī”ti. Ākāsagatesu heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimavimānesu uparūparivimānaṃ byavadhāyakesu
anya-e0104n0:77_4: byūhiyamānesu taggataṃ ākāsaṃ byūḷhaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “ākāsañca dvidhā viyūhitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:78_0: Ayamatthoti āvibhāvapāṭihāriyassa satthārā katabhāvo. Purimabuddhānaṃ paṭipattiāvajjanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:78_1: buddhappaveṇiyā anupālanatthaṃ. “Ekena pādenā”tiādi tivikkamadassanaṃ. Nayaṃ deti
anya-e0104n0:80: Sinerupabbataṃ nibbijjhitvāti taṃ parisāya dissamānarūpaṃyeva katvā nibbijjhitvā. Nanti sinerupabbataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:81: Anekasatasahassasaṅkhassa okāsalokassa, taṃnivāsisattalokassa ca vivaṭabhāvakaraṇapāṭihāriyaṃ lokavivaraṇaṃ nāma. Mahābrahmāti sahampatimahābrahmā.
anya-e0104n0:82: Passatha tāva apaṇṇakapaṭipadāya phalanti nirayabhayena tajjetvā satthu anupubbikathānayena saggasukhena palobhetvā, na pana saggasampattiyaṃ ninnabhāvāpādanena.
anya-e0104n0:83_0: 389. Yathā āvibhāvakaraṇe ālokakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ ālokanimmānāya, evaṃ tirobhāvakaraṇe
anya-e0104n0:83_1: andhakāranimmānāya nīlakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ. Kāmañcetaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato nāgataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:83_2: “vivaṭaṃ āvaṭa”nti pana vacanato atthato āgatameva. Odātakasiṇantogadhaṃ vā ālokakasiṇanti
anya-e0104n0:85_0: 391. Pākaṭo iddhimā etassa atthīti pākaṭaṃ, pākaṭañca taṃ pāṭihāriyañcāti pākaṭapāṭihāriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:85_1: Na ettha iddhimā pākaṭoti apākaṭaṃ, apākaṭañca taṃ pāṭihāriyañcāti apākaṭapāṭihāriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:85_2: Iddhimato eva hi pākaṭāpākaṭabhāvenāyaṃ bhedo, na pāṭihāriyassa. Na hi taṃ apākaṭaṃ atthi.
anya-e0104n0:86_0: Uttarimanussadhammāti manussadhammo vuccati dasa kusalakammapathadhammā, tato manussadhammato
anya-e0104n0:86_1: uttari. Iddhisaṅkhātaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ. Āḷindeti pamukhe. Okāsehīti
anya-e0104n0:86_2: pakira. Iddhābhisaṅkhāranti iddhipayogaṃ. Abhisaṅkhāsīti abhisaṅkhari, akāsīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:87_0: Antarahitoti antaradhāyitukāmo. Bako brahmā yathā antaradhāyituṃ na sakkoti, tathā
anya-e0104n0:87_1: katvā bhagavā sayaṃ tassa, brahmagaṇassa ca anāpāthabhāvagamanena antarahito hutvā
anya-e0104n0:87_2: “samaṇassa gotamassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne atthibhāvo vā natthibhāvo vā na sakkā jānitu”nti
anya-e0104n0:87_3: evaṃ brahmagaṇassa vacanokāso mā hotūti “bhavevāha”nti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
anya-e0104n0:88_0: Tattha bhavevāhaṃ bhayaṃ disvāti ahaṃ bhave saṃsāre jātijarādibhedaṃ bhayaṃ disvā
anya-e0104n0:88_1: eva. Bhavañca vibhavesinanti imañca kāmabhavādiṃ tividhampi sattabhavaṃ, vibhavesinaṃ
anya-e0104n0:88_2: vibhavaṃ gavesamānampi pariyesamānampi punappunaṃ bhave eva disvā. Bhavaṃ nābhivadinti
anya-e0104n0:88_3: taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kiñci bhavaṃ na abhivadiṃ na gahesiṃ. Nandiñca na upādiyinti bhavataṇhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:89_0: 392. Alaggamānoti vinivijjhitvā gamanena kuṭṭādīsu katthaci na laggamāno. Āvajjitvā
anya-e0104n0:89_1: kataparikammenāti yassa parato gantukāmo, taṃ āvajjitvā “ākāso hotu, ākāso hotū”ti
anya-e0104n0:89_2: evaṃ kataparikammena iddhimatā. Pākārapabbatāpekkhāya “susiro, chiddo”ti ca pulliṅgavasena
anya-e0104n0:89_3: vuttaṃ. Ubbedhavasena pavattaṃ vivaraṃ susiraṃ. Tiriyaṃ pavattaṃ chiddaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:90_0: Yattha katthaci kasiṇe parikammaṃ katvāti pathavīkasiṇādīsu yattha katthaci kasiṇe
anya-e0104n0:90_1: jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā “ākāso hotū”ti adhiṭṭhātabbo. Tattha kāraṇamāha
anya-e0104n0:90_2: “aṭṭhasamāpattivasībhāvoyeva pamāṇa”nti. Tasmā yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ tadeva hoti.
anya-e0104n0:90_3: Etena pathaviyā ummujjananimujjane āpokasiṇasamāpajjanaṃ, udakādīsu pathavīnimmāne
anya-e0104n0:90_4: pathavīkasiṇasamāpajjanaṃ na ekantato icchitabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Etanti etaṃ tirokuṭṭādigamanapāṭihāriyakaraṇe
anya-e0104n0:90_5: ākāsakasiṇasamāpajjanaṃ avassaṃ vattabbaṃ anucchavikabhāvato. Evañca katvā “ākāsakasiṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:90_6: paṭicchannānaṃ vivaṭakaraṇa”ntiādivacanaṃ viya pathavīkasiṇavasena “ekopi hutvā bahudhā
anya-e0104n0:90_7: hotī”tiādibhāvo “ākāse vā udake vā pathaviṃ nimminitvā padasā gamanaṃ icchatī”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:90_8: yaṃ pakiṇṇakanaye vuttaṃ, tampi samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:91_0: “Doso natthī”ti dvikkhattuṃ baddhaṃ subaddhaṃ viya daḷhīkaraṇaṃ nāma hotīti adhippāyena
anya-e0104n0:91_1: vatvā tena payojanābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “puna samāpajjitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Adhiṭṭhitattā
anya-e0104n0:91_2: ākāso hotiyevāti sacepi kiñci antarā upaṭṭhitaṃ pabbatādi siyā, tampi “ākāso hotū”ti
anya-e0104n0:91_3: adhiṭṭhitattā ākāso hotiyeva. Idampi aṭṭhānaparikappanamattaṃ, tādisassa upaṭṭhānameva
anya-e0104n0:92_0: 393. Paricchinditvāti yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇena paricchinditvā. Tatrāti tasmiṃ pathaviyā
anya-e0104n0:92_1: udakabhāvādhiṭṭhāne ayaṃ yathāvuttapaṭipattivibhāvinī pāḷi. Parato “tatrāyaṃ pāḷī”ti
anya-e0104n0:93: Soti iddhimā. Adhiṭṭhānakāle kālaparicchedaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ “paricchinnakālaṃ pana atikkamitvā”ti. Pakatiyā udakaṃ animmānaudakaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:94: 394. Viparītanti yaṃ udakaṃ akkamitvā akkamanto na saṃsīdati, taṃ panettha iddhiyā pathavīnimmānavasena veditabbaṃ. Pathavīkasiṇanti pathavīkasiṇajjhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:95_0: 395. Pallaṅkanti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. Chinnapakkho, asañjātapakkho vā sakuṇo
anya-e0104n0:95_1: ḍetuṃ na sakkotīti pāḷiyaṃ “pakkhī sakuṇo”ti pakkhī-saddena visesetvā sakuṇo vuttoti
anya-e0104n0:95_2: “pakkhehi yuttasakuṇo”ti āha. Parikammaṃ katvāti “pathavī hotū”ti parikammaṃ katvā.
anya-e0104n0:96_0: Ākāse antalikkheti antalikkhasaññite ākāse. Yattha yattha hi āvaraṇaṃ natthi, taṃ
anya-e0104n0:96_1: taṃ “ākāsa”nti vuccati. Ayañca iddhimā na pathaviyā āsanne ākāse gacchati. Yattha
anya-e0104n0:96_2: pana pakkhīnaṃ agocaro, tattha gacchati, tādisañca loke “antalikkha”nti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:97_0: Theroti pubbe vutta tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero. Samāpattisamāpajjananti puna samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:97_1: Nanu samāhitamevassa cittanti iddhimato pāṭihāriyavasena pavattamānassa cittaṃ accantaṃ
anya-e0104n0:97_2: samāhitameva hoti, na aññadā viya asamāhitanti adhippāyo. Taṃ pana therassa matimattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:97_3: Pubbe hi pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā pathaviṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati, idāni pana ākāso
anya-e0104n0:97_4: icchitabbo, tasmā ākāsakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitabbameva. Tenāha “kiñcāpī”tiādi. Tirokuṭṭapāṭihāriye
anya-e0104n0:97_5: vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbanti yathā tattha kuṭṭādi “ākāso hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena
anya-e0104n0:97_6: ākāso hoti, evaṃ idhāpi pabbatarukkhādiṃ adhiṭṭhānena ākāsaṃ katvā gantabbanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:97_7: Atha vā tirokuṭṭapāṭihāriye vuttanayenevāti “sace panassa bhikkhuno adhiṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0104n0:97_8: gacchantassā”tiādinā tattha vuttanayena. Etena “purimādhiṭṭhānabaleneva cassa antarā
anya-e0104n0:97_9: añño pabbato vā rukkho vā utumayo uṭṭhahissatīti aṭṭhānameveta”nti nāgādīhi kayiramāno
anya-e0104n0:98: Okāseti janavivitte yuttaṭṭhāne. Pākaṭo hoti ākāsacārī ayaṃ samaṇoti.
anya-e0104n0:99_0: 396. Dvācattālīsayojanasahassaggahaṇaṃ paṭhamakappavasena kataṃ, tato paraṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:99_1: anukkamena pathaviyā ussitabhāvena tato katipayayojanūnatā siyā, appakaṃ adhikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:99_2: vā ūnaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti tathā vuttaṃ. Tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇenāti
anya-e0104n0:99_3: yadā yasmiṃ dīpe majjhe tiṭṭhanti, tadā tato purimasmiṃ atthaṃ gacchantā pacchime
anya-e0104n0:99_4: udentā hutvā ālokakaraṇena. Aññajotīnaṃ vā abhibhavanena, duddasatāya ca mahiddhike.
anya-e0104n0:99_5: Sattānaṃ sītapariḷāhavūpasamanena, osadhitiṇavanappatīnaṃ paribrūhanena ca mahānubhāve.
anya-e0104n0:99_6: Chupatīti phusati. Parimajjatīti hatthaṃ ito cito ca sañcārento ghaṃseti. Abhiññāpādakajjhānavasenevāti
anya-e0104n0:99_7: yassa kassaci abhiññāpādakajjhānavasena. Eva-kārena pādakajjhānavisesaṃ nivatteti,
anya-e0104n0:99_9: viya imasmiṃ nāma kasiṇe jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti na ettha koci niyamo
anya-e0104n0:99_10: atthīti attho. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ kiñci samāpattiṃ aparāmasitvā “idha so iddhimā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:99_11: vuttaṃ. Hatthapāse hoti “candimasūriye”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ candimasūriyamaṇḍalaṃ. Rūpagataṃ
anya-e0104n0:99_12: hatthapāseti hatthapāse ṭhitaṃ rūpagataṃ, hatthapāse vā rūpagataṃ. Hatthaṃ vā vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e0104n0:100_0: Upādinnakaṃ nissāya anupādinnakassa vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Yuttiyā panettha upādinnakassapi
anya-e0104n0:100_1: vaḍḍhanacchāyā dissati. Attano aṇumahantabhāvāpādane upādinnakassa hāpanaṃ viya vaḍḍhanampi
anya-e0104n0:100_2: labbhateva. Yathā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa nandopanandadamaneti evaṃ pavattaṃ sahavatthunā
anya-e0104n0:100_3: theravādaṃ āharitvā tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero āhā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:100_4: Kiṃ pana na hoti, hotiyevāti adhippāyo. Dve hi paṭisedhā pakatiṃ gamentīti. “Tadā
anya-e0104n0:100_5: mahantaṃ hoti mahāmoggallānattherassa viyā”ti idaṃ yathādhikatatthadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:102_0: Olokesi buddhāciṇṇavasena “atthi nu kho assa upanissayo”ti. Lokiyaṃ ratanattaye pasādalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:102_1: sāsanāvatāraṃ sandhāyāha “appasanno”ti. Micchādiṭṭhito vivecetvā pasādetabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:103_0: Taṃ divasanti yadā bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tāvatiṃsabhavanābhimukho gacchati,
anya-e0104n0:103_1: taṃ divasabhāgaṃ. Āpānabhūmiṃ sajjayiṃsūti yattha so nisinno bhojanakiccaṃ karoti,
anya-e0104n0:103_2: taṃ parivesanaṭṭhānaṃ sittaṃ sammaṭṭhaṃ bhojanūpakaraṇūpanayanādinā sajjayiṃsu paṭiyādesuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:104_0: Uparūparīti matthakamatthake. Bhavanenāti bhavanapadesena. Bhogehīti sarīrabhogehi.
anya-e0104n0:104_1: Avakujjenāti nikujjitena. Gahetvāti yathā tāvatiṃsabhavanassa padesopi nāvasissati, evaṃ pariyādāya.
anya-e0104n0:105_0: Sineruparibhaṇḍanti sinerumekhalaṃ. Sinerussa kira samantato bahalato, puthulato
anya-e0104n0:105_1: ca pañcayojanasahassaparimāṇāni cattāri paribhaṇḍāni tāvatiṃsabhavanassa ārakkhāya
anya-e0104n0:105_2: nāgehi, garuḷehi, kumbhaṇḍehi, yakkhehi ca adhiṭṭhitāni, tāni paribhaṇḍabhāvasāmaññena
anya-e0104n0:105_3: ekajjhaṃ katvā “paribhaṇḍa”nti vuttaṃ. Tehi kira sinerussa upaḍḍhaṃ pariyādinnaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:106: Attabhāvaṃ vijahitvāti manussarūpaṃ antaradhāpetvā. Bādhatīti khedamattaṃ uppādeti.
anya-e0104n0:107_0: Attabhāvaṃ vijahitvāti sukhumattabhāvanimmānena nāgarūpaṃ vijahitvā. Mukhaṃ vivari
anya-e0104n0:107_1: “mukhagataṃ samaṇaṃ saṃkhādissāmī”ti. Pācīnena ca pacchimena cāti nāgassa tathānipannattā
anya-e0104n0:108: Ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyānīti tadā therena katapāṭihāriyāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Imaṃ pana ṭhānanti imaṃ nāsāvātavissajjanakāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:109: Anubandhīti “na sakkā evaṃmahiddhikassa imassa samaṇassa paṭipaharitu”nti bhayena palāyantaṃ anubandhi.
anya-e0104n0:110_0: Ekapaṭipāṭiyāti ekāya paṭipāṭiyā, nirantaranti attho. Ayamevāti yā upādinnakaṃ nissāya
anya-e0104n0:110_1: anupādinnakassa vaḍḍhi, ayameva. Ettha edise hatthavaḍḍhanādipāṭihāriye yutti yuttarūpā
anya-e0104n0:110_2: cittato, ututo vā upādinnakarūpānaṃ anuppajjanato. Atha vā upādinnanti sakalameva
anya-e0104n0:110_3: indriyabaddhaṃ adhippetaṃ. Evampi tassa tathā vaḍḍhi na yujjati evāti vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n0:110_4: vaḍḍhi veditabbā. Ekasantāne upādinnaṃ, anupādinnañca sambhinnaṃ viya pavattamānampi
anya-e0104n0:110_5: atthato asambhinnameva. Tattha yathā āḷhakamatte khīre anekāḷhake udake āsitte yadipi
anya-e0104n0:110_6: khīraṃ sabbena sambhinnaṃ sabbatthakameva lambamānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, tathāpi na tattha
anya-e0104n0:110_7: khīraṃ vaḍḍhati, udakameva vaḍḍhati, evamevaṃ yadipi upādinnaṃ anupādinnañca sambhinnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:110_8: viya pavattati, tathāpi upādinnaṃ na vaḍḍhati, iddhānubhāvena cittajaṃ, tadanusārena
anya-e0104n0:111_0: Soti so iddhimā. Evaṃ katvāti vuttākārena hatthaṃ vā vaḍḍhetvā te vā āgantvā hatthapāse
anya-e0104n0:111_1: ṭhite katvā. Pādaṭṭhapanādipi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Aparopi iddhimā. Tathevāti
anya-e0104n0:111_2: pāṭihāriyakaraṇato pubbe viya. Tathūpamametanti yathā udakapuṇṇāsu nānāpātīsu bahūhi
anya-e0104n0:111_3: nānācandamaṇḍalesu dissamānesu na tena candamaṇḍalassa gamanādiuparodho, bahūnañca
anya-e0104n0:111_4: paccekaṃ dassanaṃ ijjhati, tathūpamametaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ candimasūriyānaṃ gamanādiuparodhābhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:111_5: bahūnañca iddhimantānaṃ tattha iddhipayogassa yathicchitaṃ samijjhanatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:112: 397. Paricchedaṃ katvāti abhividhivasena pana paricchedaṃ katvā, na mariyādavasena. Tathā hesa brahmaloke attano kāyena vasaṃ vatteti. Pāḷīti paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷi.
anya-e0104n0:113_0: Yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattetīti ettha yasmā na brahmalokasseva gamanaṃ adhippetaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:113_1: nāpi brahmalokassa gamanameva, atha kho aññathā aññampi. Yāva brahmalokāti pana dūrāvadhinidassanametaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:113_2: tasmā “sace brahmalokaṃ gantukāmā hotī”ti vatvāpi itarampi dassetuṃ “santikepi dūre
anya-e0104n0:113_3: adhiṭṭhātī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pi-saddo samuccayattho, tena vuttāvasesassa adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā
anya-e0104n0:113_4: nipphādetabbassa sabbassāpi saṅgaho, na vuttassevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:114: Yamakapāṭihāriyāvasānetiādinā tivikkamassa adhiṭṭhāniddhinipphannatā vuttā, aññattha pana lakkhaṇānisaṃsatā. Tadubhayaṃ yathā aññamaññaṃ na virujjhati, tathā vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:116: Mahābodhinti aparājitapallaṅkaṃ mahābodhiṃ. Citte uppanne santike akāsīti tathā cittuppattisamanantarameva pathaviṃ, samuddañca saṃkhipitvā mahābodhisantike akāsi.
anya-e0104n0:117: Nakkhattadivaseti mahadivase. Candapūveti candasadise candamaṇḍalākāre pūve. Ekapattapūramattamakāsīti yathā te pamāṇato sarūpeneva antopattapariyāpannā honti, tathā akāsi.
anya-e0104n0:118_0: Kākavaliyavatthusmiñca “bhagavā thokaṃ bahuṃ akāsī”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Taṃ
anya-e0104n0:118_1: pana vatthuṃ saṅkhepatova dassetuṃ “mahākassapatthero kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samāpattiyāti nirodhasamāpattiyā.
anya-e0104n0:119: Gaṅgātīreti tambapaṇṇidīpe gaṅgānadiyā tīre. Saññaṃ adāsīti yathā te yathādhiṭṭhitaṃ sappiṃ passanti, tathā saññaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0104n0:120_0: Tassāti yassa brahmuno rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo, tassa brahmuno rūpaṃ passati. Saddaṃ suṇātīti
anya-e0104n0:120_1: dibbāya sotadhātuyā brahmuno saddaṃ suṇāti. Cittaṃ pajānātīti cetopariyañāṇena brahmuno
anya-e0104n0:120_2: cittaṃ pajānāti. Karajakāyassa vasenāti cātumahābhūtikarūpakāyassa vasena. “Cittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:120_3: pariṇāmetī”ti ettha kiṃ taṃ cittaṃ, kathaṃ vā pariṇāmananti āha “pādakajjhānacittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:120_4: gahetvā kāye āropetī”ti. Kathaṃ pana kāye āropetīti āha “kāyānugatikaṃ karotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:120_5: Evampi saddadandharovāyanti vacanapathaṃ pacchindanto āha “dandhagamana”nti. Karotīti
anya-e0104n0:120_6: sambandho. Kāyagamanaṃ hi dandhaṃ, dandhamahābhūtapaccayattāti adhippāyo. Ayañhettha
anya-e0104n0:120_7: attho – dissamānena kāyena gantukāmatāya vasena cittaṃ pariṇāmento yogī pādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:120_8: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “idaṃ cittaṃ kāyo viya dandhagamanaṃ hotū”ti parikammaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n0:120_9: Tathā parikammakaraṇaṃ hi sandhāya “pādakajjhānacittaṃ gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Parikammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:120_10: pana katvā puna samāpajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahanto taṃ cittaṃ kāye āropeti, kāyānugatikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:121_0: Sukhasaññanti sukhasahagataṃ saññaṃ, saññāsīsena niddeso. Lahubhāvena saññātanti
anya-e0104n0:121_1: lahusaññaṃ. Kathaṃ pana iddhicittena saha sukhasaññāya sambhavoti āha “sukhasaññā
anya-e0104n0:121_2: nāma upekkhāsampayuttā saññā”ti. Sukhanti saññātanti vā sukhasaññaṃ. Tenevāha “upekkhā
anya-e0104n0:121_3: hi santaṃ sukhanti vuttā”ti ekantagarukehi nīvaraṇehi, oḷārikehi anupasantasabhāvehi
anya-e0104n0:121_4: ca vitakkādīhi vippayogo cittacetasikānaṃ lahubhāvassa kāraṇanti dassento āha “sāyeva…pe…
anya-e0104n0:121_5: veditabbā”ti. Taṃ okkantassāti taṃ sukhalahusaññaṃ anuppattassa. Assāti yogino. Gantukāmatā
anya-e0104n0:121_6: eva ettha pamāṇanti ettha etasmiṃ dissamānena kāyena gamane yaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantukāmo,
anya-e0104n0:121_7: taṃ uddissa gantukāmatāvasena pavattaparikammādhiṭṭhānāni eva pamāṇaṃ, tāvatā gamanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:121_8: ijjhati. Tasmā magganimmānavāyuadhiṭṭhānehi vināpi icchitadesappatti hotīti. Idāni
anya-e0104n0:122_0: Kāyaṃ gahetvāti karajakāyaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena parikammacittena gahetvā. Citte
anya-e0104n0:122_1: āropetīti “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti pādakajjhānacitte āropeti taggatikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:122_2: karoti. Tenāha “cittānugatikaṃ karoti sīghagamana”nti. Cittagamananti cittappavattimāha.
anya-e0104n0:122_3: Idaṃ pana cittavasena kāyapariṇāmanapāṭihāriyaṃ. Cittagamanamevāti cittena samānagamanameva.
anya-e0104n0:122_4: Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattinā cittena samānagatiko hotīti? Na
anya-e0104n0:122_5: sabbathā samānagatiko. Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena
anya-e0104n0:122_6: samānagatikaṃ na hoti. Na hi tadā cittaṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā
anya-e0104n0:122_7: garuvuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattati. “Idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū”ti
anya-e0104n0:122_8: pana adhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti,
anya-e0104n0:122_9: tāva kāyagatianulomeneva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatiyā pariṇāmitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:122_10: nāma hoti, evaṃ “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva sukhalahusaññāya
anya-e0104n0:122_11: sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahukatipayacittavāreheva
anya-e0104n0:122_12: icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti, evaṃ pavattamāno kāyo cittagatiyā pariṇāmito nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n0:123_0: Evañca katvā “seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ
anya-e0104n0:123_1: vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyyā”ti idampi upamāvacanaṃ nippariyāyeneva samatthitaṃ hoti. Avassaṃ
anya-e0104n0:123_2: cetaṃ evaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, aññathā suttābhidhammapāṭhehi, vinayaaṭṭhakathāya ca
anya-e0104n0:123_3: virodho siyā, dhammatā ca vilomitā. “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampī”ti hi ettha
anya-e0104n0:123_4: aññagahaṇena rūpadhammā gahitā alahuparivattitāya. Abhidhamme ca purejātapaccayo
anya-e0104n0:123_5: rūpameva vutto, pacchājātapaccayo ca tasseva. Yattha yattha ca dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:123_6: tattha tattheva bhijjanti. Natthi desantarasaṅkamanaṃ, na ca sabhāvo aññathā hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:123_7: Na hi iddhibalena dhammānaṃ kenaci lakkhaṇaṃ aññathattaṃ kātuṃ sakkā, bhāvaññathattameva
anya-e0104n0:123_8: pana kātuṃ sakkā. “Tīsupi khaṇesū”ti idampi gamanārambhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na gamananiṭṭhānanti
anya-e0104n0:123_9: vadanti. Theroti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ antare eko thero. Idhāti idaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ vibhajitvā
anya-e0104n0:123_10: vuttapāṭhe. Sayaṃ gamanameva āgataṃ “brahmalokaṃ gacchatī”ti vuttattā.
anya-e0104n0:124_0: Cakkhusotādīnanti cakkhusotādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sabbaṅgapaccaṅga”nti,
anya-e0104n0:124_1: sabbaaṅgapaccaṅgavantanti attho. Pasādo nāma natthīti imināva bhāvajīvitindriyānampi
anya-e0104n0:124_2: abhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rucivasenāti icchāvasena. Aññampīti bhagavatā kariyamānato
anya-e0104n0:124_3: aññampi kiriyaṃ karoti. Ayañcettha buddhānubhāvo. Yadi sāvakanimmitesu nānappakāratā
anya-e0104n0:124_4: natthi, “sace pana nānāvaṇṇe kātukāmo hotī”tiādi yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti?
anya-e0104n0:124_5: Taṃ tathā tathā parikammaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhahantassa te te vaṇṇavayādivisesā parikammānurūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:124_6: ijjhantīti katvā vuttaṃ. Idha pana yathādhiṭṭhite nimmitarūpe sace sāvako “ime visesā
anya-e0104n0:124_7: hontū”ti icchati, na ijjhati, buddhānaṃ pana ijjhatīti ayamattho dassitoti na koci virodho.
anya-e0104n0:125_0: Idāni yāni tāni “yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattetī”ti pāḷiyā atthadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:125_1: vibhattāni “dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhātī”tiādīni cuddasa pāṭihāriyāni, tattha sikhāppattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:125_2: kāyena vasavattanapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:125_3: tena “rūpaṃ passatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ rūpadassanaṃ, “saddaṃ suṇātī”ti ettha yadetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:125_4: saddasavanaṃ, “cittaṃ pajānātī”ti ettha yadetaṃ cittajānananti evaṃ dibbacakkhusotacetopariyañāṇakattukaṃ
anya-e0104n0:125_5: dassanasavanajānanakiriyaṃ parāmasatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ito paresu santiṭṭhatītiādīsupi
anya-e0104n0:125_6: eseva nayo. Yampissāti yampi assa. Yogino adhiṭṭhānanti sambandho. Yañca khoti ettha
anya-e0104n0:125_7: kho-saddo avadhāraṇattho, visesattho vā, tena ayamevettha kāyena vasavattanapāṭihāriyesu
anya-e0104n0:125_8: ukkaṭṭhataranti dīpeti. Kasmā? “Ayaṃ nu kho iddhimā, ayaṃ nu kho nimmito”ti ekaccassa
anya-e0104n0:125_9: brahmuno āsaṅkuppādanato. Yadaggena cetaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ visesato manomayanti vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:125_10: tadaggena ukkaṭṭhataranti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha “ettāvatā kāyena vasaṃ vatteti nāmā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:125_11: Yadi evaṃ kasmā idha sesāni gahitānīti āha “sesaṃ…pe… vutta”nti.
anya-e0104n0:126_0: 398. Idaṃ nānākaraṇanti kāmamimāpi dve iddhiyo adhiṭṭhānavaseneva ijjhanti, tathāpi
anya-e0104n0:126_1: idaṃ idāni vuccamānaṃ imāsaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ viseso. Pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvāti attano
anya-e0104n0:126_2: pakatirūpaṃ vijahitvā apanetvā, paresaṃ adassetvāti attho. Kumārakavaṇṇanti kumārakasaṇṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:126_3: Dassetīti tathā vikubbanto attani dasseti. Nāgavaṇṇaṃ vātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Hatthimpi
anya-e0104n0:126_4: dassetīti attānampi hatthiṃ katvā dasseti, bahiddhāpi hatthiṃ dasseti. Etadatthameva
anya-e0104n0:126_5: hi idha “hatthivaṇṇaṃ vā dassetī”ti avatvā “hatthimpi dassetī”ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:126_6: keci bahiddhā hatthiādidassanavacanaṃ “pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā”ti vacanena vikubbaniddhibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:126_7: virujjhatīti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ. Kasmā? Pakativaṇṇavijahanaṃ nāma attano pakatirūpassa
anya-e0104n0:126_8: aññesaṃ adassanaṃ, na sabbena sabbaṃ tassa nirodhanaṃ. Evaṃ sati attānaṃ adassetvā
anya-e0104n0:126_9: bahiddhā hatthiṃ dassento “pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā hatthiṃ dassetī”ti vuccamāne ko
anya-e0104n0:126_10: ettha virodho, attanā pana hatthivaṇṇo hutvā bahiddhāpi hatthiṃ dassante vattabbameva
anya-e0104n0:126_11: natthi. Tenevāha “bahiddhāpi hatthiādidassanavasena vutta”nti. Evañca katvā vikubbaniddhibhāvena ca na koci virodho.
anya-e0104n0:127_0: Pāḷiyañca kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vātiādīsu aniyamattho vā-saddo vutto. Tesu ekekasseva karaṇadassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:127_1: Hatthimpītiādīsu pana hatthiādīnaṃ bahūnaṃ ekajjhaṃ kātabbābhāvadassanatthaṃ samuccayattho
anya-e0104n0:127_2: pi-saddo vutto. Tena “hatthimpi dassetī”tiādīsu dutiye vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:128_0: Iddhimato attano kumārakākārena paresaṃ dassanaṃ kumārakavaṇṇanimmānaṃ, na ettha
anya-e0104n0:128_1: kiñci apubbaṃ pathavīādivatthu nipphādīyatīti kasiṇaniyamena payojanābhāvato “pathavīkasiṇādīsu
anya-e0104n0:128_2: aññatarārammaṇato”ti vuttaṃ. Satipi vā vatthunipphādane yathārahaṃ taṃ pathavīkasiṇādivaseneva
anya-e0104n0:128_3: ijjhatīti evampettha kasiṇaniyamena payojanaṃ nattheva. Kumārakavaṇṇañhi dassentena
anya-e0104n0:128_4: nīlavaṇṇaṃ vā dassetabbaṃ siyā, pītādīsu aññataravaṇṇaṃ vā. Tathā sati nīlādikasiṇāni
anya-e0104n0:128_5: samāpajjitabbānīti āpannova kasiṇaniyamo. Eseva nayo sesesupi. Evamadhiṭṭhite yadeke
anya-e0104n0:128_6: pathavīkasiṇavasena “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”tiādi bhāvoti evaṃ pavattena kasiṇaniddesena
anya-e0104n0:128_8: āsaṅkanti, so anokāsovāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nimminitabbabhāvena attanā icchitoti attano
anya-e0104n0:128_9: kumārakavaṇṇo, na pana attano daharakāle kumārakavaṇṇoti. Nāgādivaṇṇesupi ayaṃ nayo
anya-e0104n0:128_10: byāpī evāti yadeke “nāgādinimmāne na yujjati viyā”ti vadanti, tadapohataṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:129_0: Bahiddhāpīti pi-saddena ajjhattaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Ayañhettha attho – hatthimpi dassetītiādi
anya-e0104n0:129_1: ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhāpi hatthiādidassanavasena vuttaṃ, na “kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:129_2: viya ajjhattameva kumārakavaṇṇādīnaṃ dassanavasenāti. Yaṃ ettha vattabbaṃ adhiṭṭhānavidhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:130_0: 399. Kāyanti attano karajakāyaṃ. Vuttanayenevāti “ayaṃ kāyo susiro hotū”ti parikammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:130_1: katvā puna “pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāyā”ti imaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāramāha.
anya-e0104n0:130_2: Aññaṃ kāyanti yaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ nimminitukāmo, taṃ. Muñjamhāti muñjatiṇato. Īsikanti
anya-e0104n0:130_3: tassa kaṇḍaṃ. Kosiyāti asikosato. Karaṇḍāyāti peḷāya, nimmokatoti ca vadanti. Abbāhatīti
anya-e0104n0:135_0: 400. Tatthāti dibbasotadhātuyā niddese. Abhiññāpāḷiyā hi niddesamukhena abhiññānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:135_1: nibbattanavidhi vidhīyati. Abhiññāsīsenettha abhiññāpāḷi vuttā. Tenāha “tato parāsu
anya-e0104n0:135_2: ca tīsu abhiññāsū”ti. Tato parāsūti ca satthuno desanākkamaṃ, attano ca uddesakkamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:135_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ, na paṭipattikkamaṃ. Na hi paṭipajjantā imināva kamena paṭipajjanti.
anya-e0104n0:135_4: Sabbatthāti dibbasotadhātupāḷiyaṃ, sesābhiññāpāḷiyañcāti sabbattha. Tatrāti vākyopaññāse
anya-e0104n0:135_5: nipātamattaṃ, tatra vā yathāvuttapāṭhe. Dibbasadisattāti dibbe bhavāti dibbā, devānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:135_6: sotadhātu, tāya dibbāya sadisattā. Idāni taṃ dibbasadisataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “devānaṃ hī”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:135_8: suṭṭhu caritattā sucaritena devūpapattijanakena puññakammena nibbattā. Pittasemharuhirādīhīti
anya-e0104n0:135_9: ādi-saddena vātarogādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Apalibuddhāti anupaddutā. Pittādīhi anupaddutattā,
anya-e0104n0:135_10: kammassa ca uḷāratāya upakkilesavimutti veditabbā. Upakkilesadosarahitaṃ hi kammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:135_11: tiṇādidosarahitaṃ viya sassaṃ uḷāraphalaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ hoti. Kāraṇūpacārena cassa
anya-e0104n0:135_12: phalaṃ tathā voharīyati, yathā “sukkaṃ sukkavipāka”nti. Dūrepīti pi-saddena sukhumassāpi
anya-e0104n0:136_0: Vīriyārambhavaseneva ijjhanato sabbāpi kusalabhāvanā vīriyabhāvanā, padhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatā
anya-e0104n0:136_1: vā iddhipādabhāvanāpi visesato vīriyabhāvanā, tassā ānubhāvena nibbattā vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattā.
anya-e0104n0:136_2: Ñāṇamayā sotadhātu ñāṇasotadhātu. Tādisāyevāti upakkilesavimuttatāya, dūrepi sukhumassapi
anya-e0104n0:136_3: ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchanasamatthatāya ca taṃsadisā eva. Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattāti
anya-e0104n0:136_4: dibbavihārasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ bhūmīnaṃ vasena paṭiladdhattā, iminā kāraṇavasenassā
anya-e0104n0:136_5: dibbabhāvamāha. Yaṃ cettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Dibbavihārasannissitattāti
anya-e0104n0:136_7: pavattattā, dibbavihārapariyāpannaṃ vā attanā sampayuttaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:136_8: nissayapaccayabhūtaṃ sannissitattāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Savanaṭṭhenāti saddagahaṇaṭṭhena.
anya-e0104n0:136_9: Yāthāvato hi saddūpaladdhi saddasabhāvāvabodho savanaṃ. Santesupi aññesu sabhāvadhāraṇādīsu
anya-e0104n0:136_10: dhātuatthesu attasuññatāsandassanatthā satthu dhātudesanāti āha “nijjīvaṭṭhena cā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:137_0: Ñāṇassa parisuddhi upakkilesavigamenevāti āha “nirupakkilesāyā”ti. Mānusikā manussa
anya-e0104n0:137_2: atikkantaṃ mānusikaṃ etāyāti atikkantamānusikā. Tenāha “manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā
anya-e0104n0:137_3: saddasavanenā”ti. Tattha manussūpacāranti manussehi upacaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ, pakatiyā
anya-e0104n0:137_4: sotadvārena gahetabbaṃ visayanti adhippāyo. Tenāha “saddasavanenā”ti. Dibbeti devalokapariyāpanne.
anya-e0104n0:137_5: Te pana visesato devānaṃ kathā saddā hontīti āha “devānaṃ sadde”ti. Manussānaṃ eteti
anya-e0104n0:137_6: mānusā, te mānuse. Evaṃ devamanussasaddānaṃyeva gahitattā vuttaṃ “padesapariyādāna”nti,
anya-e0104n0:137_7: ekadesaggahaṇanti attho. Sadehasannissitā attano sarīre sannissitā. Nippadesapariyādānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:138_2: Parikammasamādhi nāma dibbasotadhātuyā upacārāvatthātipi vadanti. Sā pana nānāvajjanavasena
anya-e0104n0:138_3: vuttāti daṭṭhabbā. Sabboḷārikasaddadassanatthaṃ sīhādīnaṃ saddo paṭhamaṃ gahito.
anya-e0104n0:138_4: Tiyojanamatthakepi kira kesarasīhassa sīhanādasaddo suyyati. Ādi-saddena meghasaddabyagghasaddādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:138_5: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Ettha ca yathā oḷārikasaddāvajjanaṃ yāvadeva sukhumasaddāvajjanūpāyadassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:139_2: Tattha saddanimittanti ñāṇuppattihetubhāvato saddo eva saddanimittaṃ, yo vā yathāvutto
anya-e0104n0:139_3: upādāyupādāya labbhamāno saddānaṃ oḷārikasukhumākāro, taṃ saddanimittaṃ. Tenevāha
anya-e0104n0:139_4: “saddānaṃ saddanimitta”nti. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “oḷārikānampi sukhumānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:139_6: Tañca sabbaṃ sukhume ñāṇaparicayadassanatthaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saddanimittassa apaccuppannasabhāvattā
anya-e0104n0:139_7: “saddova saddanimitta”nti ayameva pakkho ñāyāgatoti keci, taṃ na oḷārikasukhumānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:139_8: saddānaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇena ñāṇena nīlapītādivaṇṇānaṃ viya tattheva gahetabbato. Oḷārikasukhumabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:139_9: cettha saddanimittanti adhippetanti. Tassāti yathāvuttena vidhinā paṭipajjantassa
anya-e0104n0:139_10: yogino. Te saddāti ye sabboḷārikato pabhuti āvajjantassa anukkamena sukhumasukhumā
anya-e0104n0:139_11: saddā āvajjitā, te. Pākatikacittassāpīti pādakajjhānasamāpajjanato pubbe pavattacittassāpi.
anya-e0104n0:139_14: Pubbepi ñāṇena parimadditattā ativiya pākaṭā hontīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:140_0: Tesu saddesūti ye parikammassa visayadassanatthaṃ bahū saddā vuttā, tesu saddesu.
anya-e0104n0:140_1: Aññataranti yatthassa parikammakaraṇavasena abhiṇhaṃ manasikāro pavatto, taṃ ekaṃ
anya-e0104n0:140_2: saddaṃ. Tato paranti tato appanuppattito paraṃ. Tasmiṃ soteti tasmiṃ ñāṇasote. Patito
anya-e0104n0:140_3: hotīti dibbasotadhātu antogadhā hoti appanācittassa uppattito pabhuti dibbasotañāṇalābhī
anya-e0104n0:140_4: nāma hoti, na dānissa tadatthaṃ bhāvanābhiyogo icchitabboti attho. Tanti dibbasotadhātuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:140_5: Thāmajātanti jātathāmaṃ daḷhabhāvappattaṃ. Vaḍḍhetabbaṃ pādakajjhānārammaṇaṃ. Kinti
anya-e0104n0:140_6: kittakanti āha “etthantare saddaṃ suṇāmīti ekaṅgulamattaṃ paricchinditvā”ti. Pādakajjhānassa
anya-e0104n0:140_7: hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharatū”ti manasi karitvā pādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:140_8: samāpajjantassa kasiṇanimittaṃ tattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati. So samāpattito
anya-e0104n0:140_9: vuṭṭhāya tattha gate sadde āvajjati, subhāvitabhāvanattā tattha aññataraṃ saddaṃ
anya-e0104n0:140_10: ārabbha uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ cattāri, pañca vā javanāni uppajjanti. Tesu pacchimaṃ
anya-e0104n0:140_11: iddhicittaṃ, itarassa punapi pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitabbameva. Tato eva hi pādakajjhānārammaṇena
anya-e0104n0:140_12: phuṭṭhokāsabbhantaragatepi sadde suṇātiyevāti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Ekaṅguladvaṅgulādiggahaṇañcettha
anya-e0104n0:141_0: Evaṃ suṇantovāti evaṃ paricchinditvā paricchinditvā savanena vasīkatābhiñño hutvā
anya-e0104n0:141_1: yathāvajjite sadde suṇanto eva. Pāṭiyekkanti ekajjhaṃ pavattamānepi te sadde paccekaṃ
anya-e0104n0:144_0: 401. Pariyātīti sarāgādivibhāgena paricchijja jānāti. Tenāha “paricchindatīti attho”ti.
anya-e0104n0:144_1: Yesañhi dhātūnaṃ gati attho, buddhipi tesaṃ attho. “Parasattāna”nti ettha para-saddo
anya-e0104n0:144_2: aññatthoti āha “attānaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasattāna”nti, yathā hi yo paro na hoti, so attā.
anya-e0104n0:144_3: Yo attā na hoti, so paroti. Sattānanti cettha rūpādīsu sattāti sattā. Tassā pana
anya-e0104n0:144_4: paññattiyā saviññāṇakasantāne niruḷhattā nicchandarāgāpi sattātveva vuccanti, bhūtapubbagatiyā
anya-e0104n0:144_5: vā. “Pu”nti narakaṃ, tattha galanti papatantīti puggalā, pāpakārino. Itarepi saṃsāre
anya-e0104n0:144_6: saṃsārino taṃsabhāvānātivattanato puggalātveva vuccanti. Taṃtaṃsattanikāyassa vā
anya-e0104n0:144_7: tattha tattha upapattiyā pūraṇato, aniccatāvasena galanato ca puggalāti neruttā.
anya-e0104n0:145_0: Etañhīti ettha hi-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā “etaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:145_1: ijjhatī”ti taṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ, etassa cetopariyañāṇassa uppādane parikammaṃ, tasmā
anya-e0104n0:145_2: tena cetopariyañāṇaṃ uppādetukāmena adhigatadibbacakkhuñāṇena bhikkhunāti evaṃ yojanā
anya-e0104n0:145_3: kātabbā. Hadayarūpanti na hadayavatthu, atha kho hadayamaṃsapesi. Yaṃ bahi kamalamakuḷasaṇṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:145_4: anto kosātakīphalasadisanti vuccati, tañhi nissāya dāni vuccamānaṃ lohitaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n0:145_5: Hadayavatthu pana imaṃ lohitaṃ nissāya pavattatīti. Kathaṃ pana dibbacakkhunā lohitassa
anya-e0104n0:145_6: vaṇṇadassanena arūpaṃ cittaṃ pariyesatīti āha “yadā hī”tiādi. Kathaṃ pana somanassasahagatādicittavuttiyā
anya-e0104n0:145_7: kammajassa lohitassa vividhavaṇṇabhāvāpattīti? Ko vā evamāha “kammajameva taṃ lohita”nti
anya-e0104n0:145_8: catusantatirūpassāpi tattha labbhamānattā. Tenevāha “idaṃ rūpaṃ somanassindriyasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:145_9: Evampi yaṃ tattha acittajaṃ, tassa yathāvuttavaṇṇabhedena na bhavitabbanti? Bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:145_10: sesatisantatirūpānaṃ tadanuvattanato. Yathā hi gamanādīsu cittajarūpāni utukammāhārasamuṭṭhānarūpehi
anya-e0104n0:145_11: anuvattīyanti, aññathā kāyassa desantaruppattiyeva na siyā, evamidhāpi cittajarūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:145_12: sesatisantatirūpāni anuvattamānāni pavattanti. Pasādakodhavelāsu cakkhussa vaṇṇabhedāpattiyeva
anya-e0104n0:146_0: Pariyesantenāti paṭhamaṃ tāva anumānato ñāṇaṃ pesetvā gavesantena. Cetopariyañāṇañhi
anya-e0104n0:146_1: uppādetukāmena yoginā heṭṭhā vuttanayena rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ
anya-e0104n0:146_2: abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā dibbacakkhuñāṇassa lābhī samāno ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena
anya-e0104n0:146_3: cakkhunā parassa hadayamaṃsapesiṃ nissāya pavattamānassa lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena
anya-e0104n0:146_5: vā nayaggāhavasenapi vavatthapetvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “imassa cittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:146_6: jānāmī”ti parikammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Kālasatampi kālasahassampi punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:146_7: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Tassevaṃ dibbacakkhunā hadayalohitavaṇṇadassanādividhinā
