anya-e0104n0:146_8: paṭipajjantassa idāni cetopariyañāṇaṃ uppajjissatīti yaṃ tadā pavattatīti vavatthāpitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:146_9: cittaṃ, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati, tasmiṃ niruddhe cattāri,
anya-e0104n0:146_10: pañca vā javanāni javanti. Tesaṃ purimāni tīṇi, cattāri vā parikammādisamaññāni kāmāvacarāni,
anya-e0104n0:146_11: catutthaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānikaṃ. Tattha yaṃ antena
anya-e0104n0:146_12: appanācittena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, idaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ. Tañhi yatthānena parikammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:146_13: kataṃ, taṃ parassa cittaṃ paccakkhato paṭivijjhantaṃ vibhāventameva hutvā pavattati
anya-e0104n0:146_14: rūpaṃ viya ca dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ, saddaṃ viya ca dibbasotañāṇaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana kāmāvacaracittehi
anya-e0104n0:146_15: sarāgādivavatthāpanaṃ hoti nīlādivavatthāpanaṃ viya. Evamadhigatassa pana cetopariyañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:147_0: Evaṃ thāmagate hītiādi thāmagatānisaṃsadassanaṃ. Sabbampi kāmāvacaracittanti catupaṇṇāsavidhampi
anya-e0104n0:147_2: sambandhitabbaṃ. Tena pañcadasavidhampi rūpāvacaracittaṃ, dvādasavidhampi arūpāvacaracittanti
anya-e0104n0:147_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Pajānātīti sarāgādipakārehi jānāti, paccakkhato paṭivijjhatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:147_4: Puthujjanavasenāyaṃ abhiññākathāti lokuttaraṃ cittaṃ idha anuddhaṭaṃ. Tampi hi uparimo,
anya-e0104n0:147_5: sadiso vā ariyo heṭṭhimassa, sadisassa ca cittampi pajānāti eva. Tenāha “anuttaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:147_6: vā citta”ntiādi. Saṅkamantoti ñāṇena upasaṅkamanto. Ekaccañhi cittaṃ ñatvā parikammena
anya-e0104n0:147_7: vinā tadaññaṃ cittaṃ jānanto “cittā cittaṃ saṅkamanto”ti vutto. Tenāha “vināpi hadayarūpadassanenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:147_8: Hadayarūpadassanādividhānaṃ hi ādikammikavasena vuttaṃ. Tenāha “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:147_9: Yattha katthacīti pañcavokārabhave, catuvokārabhavepi vā. Na kato abhiññānuyogasaṅkhāto
anya-e0104n0:147_10: abhiniveso etenāti akatābhiniveso, tassa, ādikammikassāti attho. Ayaṃ kathāti “ālokaṃ
anya-e0104n0:148_0: Avasesanti vuttāvasesaṃ. Evaṃ avibhāgena vuttaṃ vibhāgato dassetuṃ “catubhūmakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:148_1: kusalābyākataṃ cittaṃ vītarāga”nti āha. Tañhi yonisomanasikārappaccayataṃhetukatāhi
anya-e0104n0:148_3: rāgena sampayogābhāvato nattheva sarāgatā, taṃnimittakatāya pana siyā taṃsahitatālesoti
anya-e0104n0:148_4: nattheva vītarāgatāpīti dukavinimuttatāva yuttāti vuttaṃ “imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na
anya-e0104n0:148_5: gacchantī”ti. Yadi evaṃ padesikaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, dukantarapariyāpannattā
anya-e0104n0:148_6: tesaṃ. Ye pana “paṭipakkhabhāve asatipi sampayogābhāvo evettha pamāṇaṃ ekaccaabyākatānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:148_7: viyā”ti sesākusalacittānampi vītarāgataṃ paṭijānanti, te sandhāyāha “keci pana therā
anya-e0104n0:148_8: tānipi saṅgaṇhantī”ti. Sadosadukepi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:149_0: Pāṭipuggalikanayenāti āveṇikanayena, tadaññākusalacittesu viya lobhadosehi amissitassa
anya-e0104n0:149_1: mohasseva sabbhāvatoti attho. Akusalamūlasaṅkhātesu saha mohenevāti samohaṃ paṭhamanaye,
anya-e0104n0:149_2: dutiyanaye pana saheva mohenāti samohanti evaṃ uttarapurimapadāvadhāraṇato dvīsu
anya-e0104n0:149_3: nayesu bhedo veditabbo. Attanā sampayuttaṃ thinamiddhaṃ anuvattanavasena gataṃ pavattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:149_4: thinamiddhānugataṃ pañcavidhaṃ sasaṅkhārikākusalacittaṃ saṃkhittaṃ, ārammaṇe saṅkocanavasena
anya-e0104n0:149_5: pavattanato. Vuttanayena uddhaccānugataṃ veditabbaṃ, taṃ pana uddhaccasahagataṃ cittaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:149_6: yattha vā uddhaccaṃ paccayavisesena thāmajātaṃ hutvā pavattati. Kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya,
anya-e0104n0:149_7: vipulaphalatāya, dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ gataṃ, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandavīriyacittapaññehi
anya-e0104n0:149_8: gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ. Avasesanti parittaappamāṇaṃ. Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi
anya-e0104n0:149_9: saha uttarehīti sauttaraṃ. Uttiṇṇanti uttaraṃ, loke apariyāpannabhāvena lokato uttaranti
anya-e0104n0:149_10: lokuttaraṃ. Tato eva natthi etassa uttaranti anuttaraṃ. Upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattena
anya-e0104n0:149_11: samādhinā sammadeva āhitanti samāhitaṃ. Tadaṅgavimuttippattaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:149_14: Kāmaṃ kānici paccavekkhaṇacittādīni nibbānārammaṇāni honti, nissaraṇavimuttippattāni
anya-e0104n0:149_15: pana na honti tādisakiccāyogato. Pāḷiyaṃ āgatasarāgādibhedavasena ceva tesaṃ antarabhedavasena ca sabbappakārampi.
anya-e0104n0:152_0: 402. Pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, tassa vā anussaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussati, taṃ nissayādipaccayabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:152_1: paṭicca uppajjanato “pubbenivāsānussatimhi yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tadatthāyā”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:152_2: vivaranto pubbenivāsaṃ tāva dassetvā tattha satiñāṇāni dassetuṃ “pubbenivāso”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:152_3: Tattha “pubbe”ti idaṃ padaṃ “ekampi jāti”ntiādivacanato atītabhavavisayaṃ idhādhippetanti
anya-e0104n0:152_4: āha “atītajātīsū”ti nivāsa-saddo kammasādhano, khandhavinimutto ca nivasitadhammo
anya-e0104n0:152_5: natthīti āha “nivutthakkhandhā”ti. Nivutthatā cettha sasantāne pavattatā, tathābhūtā
anya-e0104n0:152_6: ca te anu anu bhūtā jātā pavattā tattha uppajjitvā vigatāva hontīti āha “nivutthāti
anya-e0104n0:152_7: ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā”ti. Evaṃ sasantatipariyāpannadhammavasena
anya-e0104n0:152_8: nivāsa-saddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni avisesena vattuṃ “nivutthadhammā vā nivutthā”ti
anya-e0104n0:152_9: vatvā taṃ vivarituṃ “gocaranivāsenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gocarabhūtāpi hi gocarāsevanāya
anya-e0104n0:152_10: āsevitā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anubhūtā nivutthā nāma hontīti. Te pana duvidhā saparaviññāṇagocaratāyāti
anya-e0104n0:153_0: Tattha “attano viññāṇena viññātā”ti vatvā “paricchinnā”ti vacanaṃ ye te gocaranivāsena
anya-e0104n0:153_1: nivutthadhammā, te na kevalaṃ viññāṇena viññāṇamattā, atha kho yathā pubbe jātināmagottavaṇṇaliṅgāhārādivisesehi
anya-e0104n0:153_2: paricchedakārikāya paññāya paricchijja gahitā, tathevetaṃ ñāṇaṃ paricchijja gaṇhātīti
anya-e0104n0:153_3: imassa atthassa dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Paraviññāṇaviññātāpi vā nivutthāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:153_4: Na kevalaṃ attanova viññāṇena, atha kho paresaṃ viññāṇena viññātāpi vāti attho. Idhāpi
anya-e0104n0:153_5: “paricchinnā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ “paresampi vā viññāṇena viññātā paricchinnā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:153_6: Tassa ca gahaṇe payojanaṃ vuttanayeneva vattabbaṃ. Te ca kho yasmā abhītāsu eva jātīsu
anya-e0104n0:153_7: aññehi viññātā paricchinnā, te ca parinibbutāpi honti. Ye hi te viññātā, tesaṃ tadā
anya-e0104n0:153_8: vattamānasantānānusārena tesampi atīte pavatti ñāyatīti sikhāppattaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:153_10: sammāsambuddhā, tesaṃ anussaraṇā chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇaṃ. Ādi-saddena paccekasambuddhabuddhasāvakānussaraṇāni
anya-e0104n0:153_11: gayhantīti vadanti. Chinnavaṭumakā pana sabbeva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutā.
anya-e0104n0:153_12: Tesaṃ anussaraṇaṃ nāma tesaṃ paṭipattiyā anussaraṇaṃ, sā pana paṭipatti saṅkhepato
anya-e0104n0:153_13: chaḷārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇāti tāni idha paraviññāṇaviññātaggahaṇena gahitāni, te
anya-e0104n0:153_14: panete sammāsambuddhānaṃyeva visayā, na aññesanti āha “te buddhānaṃyeva labbhantī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:153_15: Na hi atīte buddhā bhagavanto evaṃ vipassiṃsu, evaṃ maggaṃ bhāvesuṃ, evaṃ phalanibbānāni
anya-e0104n0:153_16: sacchākaṃsu, evaṃ veneyye vinesunti ettha sabbadā aññesaṃ ñāṇassa gati atthīti. Yāya
anya-e0104n0:153_17: satiyā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, sā pubbenivāsānussatīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:154_1: nāmagottādiākārehi saddhiṃ, sahayoge cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Pavattitaṃ desanāvasena.
anya-e0104n0:154_3: te bhede byāpanicchāvasena saṅgahetvā dassento “tattha tattha nivutthasantāna”nti
anya-e0104n0:154_4: āha. Sāvakassevetaṃ anussaraṇaṃ, na satthunoti vuttaṃ “khandhapaṭipāṭivasena cutipaṭisandhivasena
anya-e0104n0:154_5: vā”ti. Khandhapaṭipāṭi khandhānaṃ anukkamo. Sā ca kho cutito paṭṭhāya uppaṭipāṭivasena.
anya-e0104n0:154_6: Keci panettha “iriyāpathapaṭipāṭi khandhapaṭipāṭī”ti vadanti. Anugantvā anugantvāti
anya-e0104n0:154_7: ñāṇagatiyā anugantvā anugantvā. Titthiyāti aññatitthiyā, te pana kammavādino kiriyavādino
anya-e0104n0:154_8: tāpasādayo. Ṭhapetvā aggasāvakamahāsāvake itare satthu sāvakā pakatisāvakā.
anya-e0104n0:155_0: Yasmā titthiyānaṃ brahmajālādīsu cattālīsāya eva saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭānaṃ anussaraṇaṃ āgataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:155_1: tasmā “na tato para”nti vatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ vadanto “dubbalapaññattā”tiādimāha, tena
anya-e0104n0:155_3: ettha nāmarūpaparicchedādiyeva paññāya balavakāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tañhettha nesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:155_4: sādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ. Ettakoti kappānaṃ lakkhaṃ, tadadhikaṃ ekaṃ, dve ca asaṅkhyeyyānīti
anya-e0104n0:155_5: kālavasena evaṃparimāṇo yathākkamaṃ tesaṃ mahāsāvakaaggasāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ puññañāṇābhinīhāro
anya-e0104n0:155_7: tesaṃ ariyānaṃ abhiññāñāṇavibhāgo, evaṃ sante buddhānampi visayaparicchedatā āpannāti
anya-e0104n0:155_8: āha “buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo nāma natthī”ti. “Yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇa”nti
anya-e0104n0:155_9: vacanato sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya buddhānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānampi visaye paricchedo nāma
anya-e0104n0:155_10: natthi. Tattha yaṃ yaṃ ñātuṃ icchanti, taṃ taṃ jānanti eva. Atha vā satipi kālaparicchede
anya-e0104n0:155_12: paricchedo nāma natthi, kuto tannibbattānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānanti āha “buddhānaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:155_13: paricchedo nāma natthī”ti. Atīte ettakāni kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānīti evaṃ kālaparicchedo
anya-e0104n0:156_0: Evaṃ channaṃ janānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ kālavibhāgato dassetvā idāni ārammaṇaggahaṇato
anya-e0104n0:156_1: ānubhāvavisesato, pavattiākārato ca dassetuṃ “titthiyā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cutipaṭisandhivasenāti
anya-e0104n0:156_2: attano, parassa vā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve cutiṃ disvā antarā kiñci anāmasitvā paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0104n0:156_3: eva gahaṇavasena. Vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekato, anvayato ca vibhāvetuṃ “tesañhī”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:156_4: vuttaṃ. Pakatisāvakā cutipaṭisandhivasenapi saṅkamantīti ayamattho heṭṭhā vuttanayena
anya-e0104n0:157_0: Taṃ taṃ pākaṭamevāti yathā nāma saradasamaye ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ caturatanike
anya-e0104n0:157_1: gehe cakkhumato purisassa rūpagataṃ supākaṭameva hotīti lokasiddhametaṃ, siyā pana
anya-e0104n0:157_2: tassa sukhumataratirohitādibhedassa rūpagatassa agocaratā. Nattheva buddhānaṃ ñātuṃ
anya-e0104n0:157_3: icchitassa ñeyyassa agocaratā, atha kho taṃ ñāṇālokena obhāsitaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:157_4: viya supākaṭaṃ suvibhūtameva hoti tathā ñeyyāvaraṇassa supahīnattā. Peyyālapāḷiṃ
anya-e0104n0:157_5: viya saṅkhipitvāti yathā peyyālapāḷiṃ paṭhantā “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ…pe… pañcamaṃ jhāna”nti
anya-e0104n0:157_6: ādipariyosānameva gaṇhantā saṅkhipitvā sajjhāyanti, na anupadaṃ, evaṃ anekāpi kappakoṭiyo
anya-e0104n0:157_7: saṅkhipitvā. Yaṃ yaṃ icchantīti yasmiṃ kappe, yasmiṃ bhave yaṃ yaṃ jānituṃ icchanti,
anya-e0104n0:157_8: tattha tattheva ñātuṃ icchite eva ñāṇena okkamantā. Sīhokkantavasena sīhagatipatanavasena
anya-e0104n0:157_9: ñāṇagatiyā gacchanti. Satadhā bhinnassa vāḷassa koṭiyā koṭipaṭipādanavasena katavālavedhaparicayassa.
anya-e0104n0:158_0: Khajjupanakappabhāsadisaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti ñāṇassa ativiya appānubhāvatāya khajjotobhāsasamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:158_1: hutvā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Esa nayo sesesupi. Dīpappabhāsadisanti pākatikadīpālokasadisaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:158_2: Ukkāpabhā mahāummukāloko. Osadhitārakappabhāti ussannā pabhā etāya dhīyatīti osadhi,
anya-e0104n0:158_3: osadhīnaṃ vā anubalappadāyikattā osadhīti evaṃ laddhanāmāya tārakāya pabhā. Saradasūriyamaṇḍalasadisaṃ
anya-e0104n0:159_0: Yaṭṭhikoṭigamanaṃ viya khandhapaṭipāṭiyā amuñcanato. Kunnadīnaṃ atikkamanāya ekeneva
anya-e0104n0:159_1: rukkhadaṇḍena katasaṅkamo daṇḍakasetu. Catūhi, pañcahi vā janehi gantuṃ sakkuṇeyyo
anya-e0104n0:159_2: phalake attharitvā āṇiyo koṭṭetvā katasaṅkamo jaṅghasetu. Jaṅghasatthassa gamanayoggo
anya-e0104n0:159_3: saṅkamo jaṅghasetu jaṅghamaggo viya. Sakaṭassa gamanayoggo saṅkamo sakaṭasetu sakaṭamaggo
anya-e0104n0:159_4: viya. Mahatā jaṅghasatthena gantabbamaggo mahājaṅghamaggo. Bahūhi vīsāya vā tiṃsāya
anya-e0104n0:160: Imasmiṃ pana adhikāreti “cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti cittasīsena sāvakassa niddiṭṭhasamādhibhāvanādhikāre.
anya-e0104n0:161_0: 403. Tasmāti yasmā sāvakānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, tasmā. Evanti yathā
anya-e0104n0:161_1: te anussaranti, evaṃ anussaritukāmena. Heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu yathārahaṃ pītisukhehi
anya-e0104n0:161_2: kāyacittānaṃ sampīnanāya “cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā”ti vuttaṃ, aññathā pādakajjhānameva
anya-e0104n0:161_3: samāpajjitabbaṃ siyā. Yāya nisajjāya nisinnassa anussaraṇārambho, sā idha sabbapacchimā
anya-e0104n0:161_4: nisajjā. Tato āsanapaññāpananti tato nisajjāya purimakaṃ āsanapaññāpanaṃ āvajjitabbanti
anya-e0104n0:161_5: sambandho. Esa nayo sesesupi. Bhojanakālotiādīsu kālasīsena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle katakiccamāha.
anya-e0104n0:162_0: Kiñci kiccaṃ. Ettakenāti pādakajjhānasamāpajjanena. Pādakajjhānañhi satthakassa viya
anya-e0104n0:162_1: nisānasilā satipaññānampi nisitabhāvāvahaṃ. Yaṃ tassa, tā taṃ samāpajjanena paramanepakkappattā
anya-e0104n0:162_2: honti. Tenāha “dīpe jalite viya pākaṭaṃ hotī”ti, andhakāraṭṭhāneti adhippāyo. Purimabhaveti
anya-e0104n0:162_3: imassa bhavassa anantare purimasmiṃ bhave. Pavattitanāmarūpanti attano paccayehi
anya-e0104n0:162_4: pavattitanāmarūpaṃ. Tañca kho paṭhamaṃ rūpaṃ āvajjitvā nāmaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:162_5: nāmaṃ āvajjitvā pacchā rūpanti apare. Pahotīti sakkoti. Paṇḍito nāma imissā abhiññābhāvanāya katādhikāro.
anya-e0104n0:163_0: “Aññaṃ uppanna”nti idaṃ aññasmā kammabhavā añño upapattibhavo uppannoti katvā vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:163_1: addhāpaccuppannantarabhāvato. Aññathā ekabhavepi aññamaññameva nāmarūpaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:166: Taṃ ṭhānanti taṃ nikkhepaṭṭhānaṃ. Āhundarikanti samantato, upari ca ghanasañchannaṃ sambādhaṭṭhānaṃ. Andhatamamivāti andhakāratimisā viya.
anya-e0104n0:167_0: Kūṭāgārakaṇṇikatthāyāti kūṭāgārassa kūṭatthāya. Kūṭāgārassa kaṇṇikā viya pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:167_1: mahārukkho viya purimabhave cutikkhaṇe pavattanāmarūpaṃ, sākhāpalāsā viya tena sambandhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:167_2: imasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhicittaṃ, pharasudhārā viya parikammabhāvanā, kammārasālā viya
anya-e0104n0:167_3: pādakajjhānanti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kaṭṭhaphālakopamāpi “yathā nāma
anya-e0104n0:167_4: balavā puriso odanapacanādiatthaṃ mahantaṃ dāruṃ phālento tassa tacapheggumattaphālane
anya-e0104n0:167_5: pharasudhārāya vipannāya mahantaṃ dāruṃ phāletuṃ asakkonto dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:168_0: Pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ nāma na hoti atītāsu jātīsu nivutthadhammārammaṇattābhāvā. Tanti
anya-e0104n0:168_1: pacchimanisajjato pabhuti yāva paṭisandhi pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:168_2: parikammabhāvena pavattasamādhinā sampayuttañāṇaṃ parikammasamādhiñāṇaṃ. Taṃ rūpāvacaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:168_3: sandhāya na yujjatīti taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ atītaṃsañāṇaṃ ce, rūpāvacaraṃ adhippetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:168_4: na yujjati parikammasamādhiñāṇassa kāmāvacarabhāvato. Na hi anantaracuticittassa
anya-e0104n0:168_5: orato pavattikkhandhe ārabbha rūpāvacaraṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:168_6: vā āgataṃ atthi. Yesaṃ javanānaṃ purimānīti yojanā. Yadā pana appanācittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:168_7: tadāssāti sambandho. Idaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ nāmāti kāmaṃ anantarassa bhavassa
anya-e0104n0:168_8: cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattañāṇaṃ dassitaṃ, taṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:168_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ ñāṇasāmaññassa jotitabhāvato. Yatheva hi tato nāmarūpato pabhuti sabbe
anya-e0104n0:168_10: atītā khandhā, khandhapaṭibaddhā ca sabbo pubbenivāso, evaṃ tassa paṭivijjhanavasena
anya-e0104n0:168_11: pavattañāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ. Tenāha “tena ñāṇena sampayuttāya satiyā anekavihitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:169_0: 404. Ekampi jātinti ekampi bhavaṃ. So hi ekakammanibbatto ādānanikkhepaparicchinno
anya-e0104n0:169_1: antogadhadhammappabhedo khandhappabandho idha jātīti adhippeto. Tenāha “ekampi…pe…
anya-e0104n0:169_2: khandhasantāna”nti. Parihāyamānoti khīyamāno vinassamāno. Kappoti asaṅkhyeyyakappo.
anya-e0104n0:169_3: So pana atthato kālo, tadā pavattamānasaṅkhāravasenassa parihāni veditabbā. Vaḍḍhamāno
anya-e0104n0:169_4: vivaṭṭakappoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Yo pana “kālaṃ khepetī”ti, “kālo ghasati bhūtāni,
anya-e0104n0:169_5: sabbāneva sahattanā”ti ca ādīsu kālassāpi khayo vuccati, so idha nādhippeto aniṭṭhappasaṅgato.
anya-e0104n0:169_6: Saṃvaṭṭanaṃ vinassanaṃ saṃvaṭṭo, saṃvaṭṭato uddhaṃ tathā ṭhāyī saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī. Taṃmūlakattāti
anya-e0104n0:169_7: taṃpubbakattā. Vivaṭṭanaṃ nibbattanaṃ, vaḍḍhanaṃ vā vivaṭṭo.
anya-e0104n0:170_0: Tejosaṃvaṭṭo āposaṃvaṭṭo vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti evaṃ saṃvaṭṭasīmānukkamena saṃvaṭṭesu vattabbesu
anya-e0104n0:170_1: tathā avatvā “āposaṃvaṭṭo tejosaṃvaṭṭo vāyosaṃvaṭṭo”ti vacanaṃ saṃvaṭṭakamahābhūtadesanānupubbiyāti
anya-e0104n0:170_2: keci. Saṃvaṭṭānupubbiyāti apare. Āpena saṃvaṭṭo āposaṃvaṭṭo. Saṃvaṭṭasīmāti saṃvaṭṭamariyādā.
anya-e0104n0:171: Saṃvaṭṭatīti vinassati. Sadāti sabbakālaṃ, tīsupi saṃvaṭṭakālesūti attho.
anya-e0104n0:172_0: “Ekaṃ buddhakhetta”nti idha yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṃ niyametvā dassetuṃ “buddhakhettaṃ
anya-e0104n0:172_1: nāma tividha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yattake ṭhāne tathāgatassa paṭisandhiñāṇānubhāvo puññaphalasamuttejito
anya-e0104n0:172_2: saraseneva pathavī vijambhati, taṃ sabbampi buddhaṅkurassa nibbattanakhettaṃ nāmāti
anya-e0104n0:172_3: āha “jātikhettaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyanta”nti. Ānubhāvo vattatīti idha iddhimā
anya-e0104n0:172_4: cetovasippatto āṇākhettapariyāpanne yattha katthaci cakkavāḷe ṭhatvā attano atthāya
anya-e0104n0:172_5: parittaṃ katvā tattheva aññaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ gatopi kataparitto eva hoti. Atha vā tattha
anya-e0104n0:172_6: ekacakkavāḷe ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ atthāya paritte kate āṇākhette sabbasattānaṃ abhisambhuṇātveva
anya-e0104n0:172_7: parittānubhāvo tattha devatāhi parittāṇāya sampaṭicchitabbato. Yaṃ visayakhettaṃ
anya-e0104n0:172_8: sandhāya ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe sarena abhiviññāpanaṃ, attano rūpadassanañca paṭijānantena
anya-e0104n0:172_9: bhagavatā “yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Yatthāti yasmiṃ anantāparimāṇe visayakhette.
anya-e0104n0:172_10: Yaṃ yaṃ tathāgato ākaṅkhati, taṃ taṃ jānāti ākaṅkhāmattapaṭibaddhavuttitāya buddhañāṇassa.
anya-e0104n0:173: 405. Gokhāyitakamattesūti gohi khāditabbappamāṇesu. Yanti yasmiṃ samaye. Pupphaphalūpajīviniyo ca devatā brahmaloke nibbattantīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:174_0: Etesanti “vassūpajīvino”tiādinā vuttasattānaṃ. Tatthāti brahmaloke. So ca kho parittābhādibrahmaloko
anya-e0104n0:174_2: “tadā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Lokaṃ byūhenti sampiṇḍentīti lokabyūhā. Te kira disvā manussā
anya-e0104n0:174_3: tattha tattha ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi saṃvegajātā, sambhamappattā ca hutvā tesaṃ āsanne
anya-e0104n0:174_4: ṭhāne sannipatanti. Sikhābandhassa muttatāya muttasirā. Ito cito ca vidhūyamānakesatāya
anya-e0104n0:174_5: vikiṇṇakesā. Lokavināsabhayena sokavantacittatāya ativiya virūpavesadhārino. Mārisāti
anya-e0104n0:174_6: devānaṃ piyasamudācāro. Kathaṃ panete kappavuṭṭhānaṃ jānantīti? Dhammatāya sañcoditāti
anya-e0104n0:174_7: ācariyā. Tādisanimittadassanenāti eke. Brahmadevatāhi uyyojitāti apare.
anya-e0104n0:175_0: Mettādīnīti mettāmanasikārādīni kāmāvacarapuññāni. Devaloketi kāmadevaloke. Devānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:175_1: kira sukhasamphassavātaggahaṇaparicayena vāyokasiṇe jhānāni sukheneva ijjhanti. Tena
anya-e0104n0:175_2: vuttaṃ “vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhantī”ti. Tadaññe panāti āpāyike
anya-e0104n0:176_0: Dutiyo sūriyoti dutiyaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ. Sattasūriyanti sattasūriyapātubhāvasuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:176_1: Pakatisūriyeti kappavuṭṭhānakālato pubbe uppannasūriyavimāne. Kappavuṭṭhānakāle pana
anya-e0104n0:176_2: yathā aññe kāmāvacaradevā, evaṃ sūriyadevaputtopi jhānaṃ nibbattetvā brahmalokaṃ
anya-e0104n0:176_3: upapajjati, sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ pana pabhassaratarañceva tejavantatarañca hutvā pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:176_4: Taṃ antaradhāyitvā aññameva uppajjatīti apare. Gaṅgā yamunā sarabhū aciravatī mahīti
anya-e0104n0:179_0: Pariyādinnasinehanti parikkhīṇasinehaṃ. Yāya āpodhātuyā tattha tattha pathavīdhātu
anya-e0104n0:179_1: ābandhattā sampiṇḍatā hutvā tiṭṭhati, sā chasūriyapātubhāvena parikkhayaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0104n0:179_2: Yathā cidanti yathā ca idaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ. Evaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānipīti vipattimahāmeghuppattito
anya-e0104n0:179_3: paṭṭhāya idha vuttaṃ sabbaṃ kappavuṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ tattha atidisati.
anya-e0104n0:180_0: Palujjitvāti chijjitvā. Saṅkhāragatanti bhūtupādāyappabhedaṃ saṅkhārajātaṃ. Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayāti
anya-e0104n0:180_1: jhāpetabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā. Sayampi saṅkhāragataṃ samānaṃ indhanābhāvato chārikampi
anya-e0104n0:181_1: accayena. Tālakkhandhādīti ādi-saddena sākasālādirukkhe saṅgaṇhāti. Ghanaṃ karotīti
anya-e0104n0:181_2: visarituṃ adatvā piṇḍitaṃ karoti. Tenāha “parivaṭuma”nti, vaṭṭabhāvena paricchinnaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:181_3: Tanti udakaṃ. Assāti vātassa. Vivaraṃ detīti yathā ghanaṃ karoti sampiṇḍeti, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:181_4: tattha antaraṃ deti. Parikkhayamānanti pubbe yāva brahmalokā ekoghabhūtena vātena
anya-e0104n0:181_5: parisosiyamānatāya parikkhayaṃ gacchantaṃ. Brahmaloko pātubhavatīti yojanā. Brahmalokoti
anya-e0104n0:182: Rundhantīti yathā heṭṭhā na bhassati, evaṃ nirodhenti.
anya-e0104n0:183_0: “Paṭhamatarābhinibbattā”ti idaṃ āyukkhayassa sambhavadassanaṃ, tena dvinnaṃ, catunnaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:183_1: aṭṭhannaṃ vā kappānaṃ ādimhi nibbattāti dasseti. Tatoti ābhassarabrahmalokato. Parittābhaappamāṇābhāpi
anya-e0104n0:183_2: hi ābhassaraggahaṇeneva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. “Te honti sayaṃpabhā antalikkhacarā”ti
anya-e0104n0:183_3: idaṃ upacārajjhānapuññassa mahānubhāvatāya vuttaṃ. Āluppakārakanti ālopaṃ katvā katvāti
anya-e0104n0:184: Haṭṭhatuṭṭhāti ativiya haṭṭhā uppilāvitacittā. Nāmaṃ karontīti tathā voharanti.
anya-e0104n0:185: Sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatāti ettha dīpasamuddāpīti vattabbaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “ninnaninnaṭṭhāne samuddā, samasamaṭṭhāne dīpā”ti. Thūpathūpāti unnatunnatā.
anya-e0104n0:186_0: Atimaññantīti atikkamitvā maññanti, hīḷentīti attho. Teneva nayenāti “ekacce vaṇṇavanto
anya-e0104n0:186_1: hontī”tiādinā vuttena nayeneva. Padālatāti evaṃnāmikā latājāti. Tassā kira pārāsavajāti
anya-e0104n0:186_2: gaḷocīti vadanti. Akaṭṭhe eva bhūmippadese paccanako akaṭṭhapāko. Akaṇoti kuṇḍakarahito.
anya-e0104n0:187_0: Sumanasaṅkhātajātipupphasadiso sumanajātipupphasadiso. Yo yo raso etassāti yaṃyaṃraso,
anya-e0104n0:187_1: odano, taṃ yaṃyaṃrasaṃ, yādisarasavantanti attho. Rasapathavī, bhūmipappaṭako, padālatā
anya-e0104n0:187_2: ca paribhuttā sudhāhāro viya khuddaṃ vinodetvā rasaharaṇīhi rasameva brūhentā tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n0:187_3: na vatthuno sukhumabhāvena nissandā, sukhumabhāveneva gahaṇindhanameva ca honti.
anya-e0104n0:187_4: Odano pana paribhutto rasaṃ vaḍḍhentopi vatthuno oḷārikabhāvena nissandaṃ vissajjento
anya-e0104n0:187_5: passāvaṃ, kasaṭañca uppādetīti āha “tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyatī”ti. Purimattabhāvesu
anya-e0104n0:187_6: pavattaupacārajjhānānubhāvena yāva sattasantāne kāmarāgavikkhambhanavego na samito,
anya-e0104n0:187_7: na tāva balavakāmarāgūpanissayāni itthipurisindriyāni pāturahesuṃ. Yadā panassa vicchinnatāya
anya-e0104n0:187_8: balavakāmarāgo laddhāvasaro ahosi, tadā tadupanissayāni tāni sattānaṃ attabhāvesu
anya-e0104n0:187_9: sañjāyiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “purisassa…pe… pātubhavatī”ti. Tenevāha “tatra suda”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:188: Alasajātikassāti sajjukameva taṇḍulaṃ aggahetvā paradivasassatthāya gahaṇena alasapakatikassa.
anya-e0104n0:189: Anutthunantīti anusocanti. Sammanneyyāmāti samanujāneyyāma. Noti amhesu. Sammāti sammadeva yathārahaṃ. Khīyitabbanti khīyanārahaṃ nindanīyaṃ. Garahitabbanti hīḷetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:190: Ayameva bhagavā paṭibalo paggahaniggahaṃ kātunti yojanā. Rañjetīti saṅgahavatthūhi sammadeva rameti pīṇeti.
anya-e0104n0:191: Vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyaṃ catusaṭṭhiantarakappasaṅgahaṃ. Vīsatiantarakappasaṅgahanti keci. Sesāsaṅkhyeyyāni kālato tena samappamāṇāneva.
anya-e0104n0:192_1: sabbaso. Pathavitoti pathaviyā heṭṭhimantato pabhuti. Tena hi khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:192_2: pathavīpabbatādayo udake pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya vilīyanteva, tasmā pathavīsandhārudakena
anya-e0104n0:192_3: saddhiṃ ekūdakameva taṃ hotīti keci. Apare “pathavīsandhārakaṃ udakakkhandhañca udakasandhārakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:192_4: vāyukkhandhañca anavasesato vināsetvā sabbattha sayameva ekoghabhūtaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti
anya-e0104n0:192_5: vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ. Tayopi brahmaloketi parittābhaappamāṇābhaābhassarabrahmaloke,
anya-e0104n0:192_6: tayidaṃ “ayaṃ pana viseso”ti āraddhattā vuttaṃ, aññathā “chapi brahmaloke”ti vattabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:192_7: siyā. Subhakiṇheti ukkaṭṭhaniddesena tatiyajjhānabhūmiyā upalakkhaṇaṃ. Parittāsubhaappamāṇāsubhepi
anya-e0104n0:192_8: hi āhacca udakaṃ tiṭṭhati. Heṭṭhā “ābhassare āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:192_9: Tanti taṃ kappavināsakaudakaṃ. Udakānugatanti udakena anugataṃ phuṭṭhaṃ. Abhibhavitvāti vilīyāpetvā.
anya-e0104n0:193: Idamekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyanti idaṃ saṃvaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ kappassa ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:194_0: 408. Thūlaraje apagate eva pathavīnissitaṃ saṇharajaṃ apagacchatīti vuttaṃ “tato
anya-e0104n0:194_1: saṇharaja”nti. Samuṭṭhāpetīti sambandho. “Visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkhe”ti idaṃ paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:195_1: cakkavāḷapabbatampi sinerupabbatampi vāto ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati. Te cakkavāḷapabbatādayo.
anya-e0104n0:195_2: Abhihantvāti ghaṭṭetvā. Aññamaññanti ekissā lokadhātuyā cakkavāḷahimavantasineruṃ
anya-e0104n0:195_3: aññissā lokadhātuyā cakkavāḷādīhīti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ samāgamavasena ghaṭṭetvā. Sabbasaṅkhāragatanti
anya-e0104n0:195_4: pathavīsandhārakaudakaṃ, taṃsandhārakavātanti sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ vināsetvā sayampi
anya-e0104n0:196_0: 409. Yadipi saṅkhārānaṃ ahetuko sarasanirodho vināsakābhāvato, santānanirodho pana
anya-e0104n0:196_1: hetuvirahito natthi yathā taṃ sattakāyesūti. Bhājanalokassāpi sahetukena vināsena
anya-e0104n0:196_2: bhavitabbanti hetuṃ pucchati “kiṃ kāraṇā evaṃ loko vinassatī”ti. Itaro yathā tattha
anya-e0104n0:196_3: nibbattanakasattānaṃ puññabalena paṭhamaṃ loko vivaṭṭati, evaṃ tesaṃ pāpabalena saṃvaṭṭatīti
anya-e0104n0:196_4: dassento “akusalamūlakāraṇā”ti āha. Yathā hi rāgadosamohānaṃ adhikabhāvena yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:196_5: rogantarakappo, satthantarakappo, dubbhikkhantarakappoti ime tividhā antarakappā
anya-e0104n0:196_6: vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyimhi asaṅkhyeyyakappe jāyanti, evamete yathāvuttā tayo saṃvaṭṭā rāgādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:196_7: adhikabhāveneva hontīti dassento “akusalamūlesu hī”tiādimāha. Ussannatareti ativiya
anya-e0104n0:196_8: ussanne. Dose ussannatare adhikataradosena viya tikkhatarena khārudakena vināso yuttoti
anya-e0104n0:196_9: vuttaṃ “dose ussannatare udakena vinassatī”ti. Pākaṭasattusadisassa dosassa aggisadisatā,
anya-e0104n0:196_10: apākaṭasattusadisassa rāgassa khārudakasadisatā ca yuttāti adhippāyena “dose ussannatare
anya-e0104n0:196_11: agginā, rāge ussannatare udakenā”ti kecivādassa adhippāyo veditabbo. Rāgo sattānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:197: 410. Evaṃ pasaṅgena saṃvaṭṭādike pakāsetvā idāni yathādhikataṃ nesaṃ anussaraṇākāraṃ dassetuṃ “pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantopī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:198_0: “Amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe”ti idaṃ saṃvaṭṭakappassa ādito pāḷiyaṃ gahitattā vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi
anya-e0104n0:198_1: hi imassa katipayaṃ kālaṃ bhavādīsu saṃsaraṇaṃ upalabbhatīti. Saṃvaṭṭakappe vā vaṭṭamānesu
anya-e0104n0:198_2: bhavādīsu imassa upapatti ahosi, taṃdassanametaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappeti
anya-e0104n0:198_3: ettha vā-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho daṭṭhabbo, tena ca aniyamatthena itarāsaṅkhyeyyānampi
anya-e0104n0:198_4: saṅgaho siddho hoti. Bhave vātiādīsu kāmādibhave vā aṇḍajādiyoniyā vā devādi gatiyā
anya-e0104n0:198_5: vā nānattakāyanānattasaññīādiviññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā khattiyādi sattanikāye
anya-e0104n0:198_6: vā. Āsinti ahosiṃ. Vaṇṇasampattiṃ vāti vā-saddena vaṇṇavipattiṃ vāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:199: Sālimaṃsodanāhāro vā gihikāle. Pavattaphalabhojano vā tāpasādikāle. Sāmisā gehassitā somanassādayo. Nirāmisā nekkhammassitā. Ādi-saddena vivekajasamādhijasukhādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
anya-e0104n0:200_0: “Amutrāsi”ntiādinā sabbaṃ yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni aññathā atthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:200_1: dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha amutrāsinti sāmaññaniddesoyaṃ, byāpanicchālopo
anya-e0104n0:200_2: vā, amutra amutrāsinti vuttaṃ hoti. Anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇanti
anya-e0104n0:200_3: ettha ārohantassāti paṭilomato ñāṇena pubbenivāsaṃ ārohantassa. Paccavekkhaṇanti
anya-e0104n0:200_4: anussaritānussaritassa paccavekkhaṇaṃ, na anussaraṇaṃ. Itīti vuttatthanidassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:200_5: Tañca kho yathārahato, na yathānupubbatoti dassento “nāmagottavasenā”tiādimāha. Vaṇṇādīhīti
anya-e0104n0:200_6: vaṇṇāhāravedayitāyuparicchedehi. Odātotīti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā,
anya-e0104n0:203_0: 411. Cutiyāti cavane. Upapāteti upapajjane. Samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ, cutikkhaṇasāmantā,
anya-e0104n0:203_1: upapattikkhaṇasāmantā cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi vakkhati “ye pana āsannacutikā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:203_2: Dibbacakkhuñāṇeneva sattānaṃ cuti ca upapatti ca ñāyatīti āha “dibbacakkhuñāṇatthanti
anya-e0104n0:203_3: vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Dibbasadisattātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Ayaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:203_4: viseso – tattha “sotadhātū”ti padaṃ apekkhitvā itthiliṅgavasena vuttaṃ, idha napuṃsakaliṅgavasena
anya-e0104n0:203_5: vattabbaṃ. Tattha ca ālokapariggahena payojanaṃ natthi, idha atthīti vuttaṃ “ālokapariggahena
anya-e0104n0:203_6: mahājutikattāpi dibba”nti, kasiṇālokānuggahena pattabbattā, sayaṃ ñāṇālokapharaṇabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:203_7: ca mahājutikabhāvatoti attho. Mahājutikampi hi “dibba”nti vuccati “dibbamidaṃ byamha”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0104n0:203_8: Mahāgatikattāti mahanīyagamanattā, vimhayanīyapavattikattāti attho. Vimhayanīyā hissa
anya-e0104n0:203_10: dibbacakkhutopi imassa mahānubhāvattā. Tena dibbacakkhulābhāya yogino parikammakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:203_11: tappaṭipakkhābhibhavassa atthato tassa vijayicchā nāma hoti, dibbacakkhulābhī ca
anya-e0104n0:203_13: viya dānaggahaṇalakkhaṇe, vohāre ca pavatteyyāti evaṃ vihāravijayicchāvohārajutigatisaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:203_14: atthānaṃ vasena imassa abhiññāñāṇassa dibbacakkhubhāvasiddhito. Saddavidū ca tesu
anya-e0104n0:203_15: eva atthesu divu-saddaṃ icchantīti vuttaṃ “taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabba”nti.
anya-e0104n0:204_0: Dassanaṭṭhenāti rūpadassanabhāvena. Cakkhunā hi sattā rūpaṃ passanti. Yathā maṃsacakkhu
anya-e0104n0:204_1: viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya pavattati, na tathā idaṃ. Idaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:204_2: sayameva tato sātisayaṃ cakkhukiccakārīti āha “cakkhukiccakaraṇena cakkhumivātipi
anya-e0104n0:204_4: vuttaṃ. Ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti parato upapattiyā adassanato etthevāyaṃ satto ucchinno,
anya-e0104n0:204_5: evamitarepīti. Navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti lābhī adhiccasamuppattiko viya.
anya-e0104n0:204_6: Buddhaputtā passantiyevāti uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ, na purimapadāvadhāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ hi
anya-e0104n0:205_0: Manussānaṃ idanti mānusakaṃ, manussānaṃ gocarabhūtaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ. Tadaññassa pana
anya-e0104n0:205_2: manussūpacāraṃ atikkantaṃ nāma hotīti āha “manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:205_3: Evaṃ visayamukhena dassetvā idāni visayīmukhena dassetuṃ “mānusakaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:206_0: Dibbacakkhunāti dibbacakkhuñāṇenapi. Daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā khaṇassa atiittaratāya atisukhumatāya
anya-e0104n0:206_1: kesañci rūpassa. Apica dibbacakkhussa paccuppannaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, tañca purejātapaccayabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:206_2: na ca āvajjanaparikammehi vinā mahaggatassa pavatti atthi, nāpi uppajjamānameva rūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:206_3: ārammaṇapaccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti, bhijjamānaṃ vā. Tasmā “cutūpapātakkhaṇe rūpaṃ dibbacakkhunā
anya-e0104n0:206_4: daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā”ti suvuttametaṃ. Yadi dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ rūpārammaṇameva, atha kasmā
anya-e0104n0:206_5: “satte passatī”ti vuttanti? Yebhuyyena sattasantānagatarūpadassanato evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:206_6: Sattagahaṇassa vā kāraṇabhāvato vohāravasena vuttantipi keci. Te cavamānāti adhippetāti
anya-e0104n0:207_0: Mohūpanissayaṃ nāma kammaṃ nihīnaṃ nihīnaphalaṃ hotīti āha “mohanissandayuttattā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:207_1: Tabbiparīteti tassa hīḷitādibhāvassa viparīte, ahīḷite anohīḷite anoññāte anavaññāte
anya-e0104n0:207_2: cittīkateti attho. Suvaṇṇeti sundaravaṇṇe. Dubbaṇṇeti asundaravaṇṇe. Sā panāyaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇatā
anya-e0104n0:207_4: Sundaraṃ gatiṃ gatā sugatāti āha “sugatigate”ti, sugatiṃ upapanneti attho. Alobhajjhāsayā
anya-e0104n0:207_5: sattā vadaññū vigatamaccherā alobhūpanissayena kammunā subhagā samiddhā hontīti āha
anya-e0104n0:207_6: “alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane”ti. Dukkhaṃ gatiṃ gatā duggatāti āha
anya-e0104n0:207_7: “duggatigate”ti. Lobhajjhāsayā sattā luddhā maccharino lobhūpanissayena kammunā duggatā
anya-e0104n0:207_8: durupetā hontīti āha “lobhanissandayuttattā vā dalidde appannapāne”ti.
anya-e0104n0:208_0: Upacitanti phalāvahabhāvena kataṃ. Yathā kataṃ hi kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:208_1: tathā kataṃ upacitaṃ. Cavamānetiādīhi dibbacakkhukiccaṃ vuttanti visayamukhena visayībyāpāramāha.
anya-e0104n0:208_2: Purimehīti vā “dibbena cakkhunā”tiādīni padāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ādīhīti ettha ca-saddo
anya-e0104n0:208_3: luttaniddiṭṭho. Tasmā “dibbena…pe… passatī”ti imehi, “cavamāne”tiādīhi ca dibbacakkhukiccaṃ vuttanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:209_0: Iminā pana padenāti “yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti iminā vākyena. Idha bhikkhūti
anya-e0104n0:209_1: imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu, dibbacakkhuñāṇalābhīti adhippāyo. So ca dibbacakkhuñāṇalābhī
anya-e0104n0:209_2: nerayike ca satte paccakkhato disvā ṭhito. Evaṃ manasi karotīti tesaṃ nerayikānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:209_3: nirayasaṃvattaniyassa kammassa ñātukāmatāvasena pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0104n0:209_4: parikammavasena manasi karoti. Kiṃ nu khotiādi manasikāravidhidassanaṃ. Evaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:209_5: parikammaṃ katvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitassa taṃ kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
anya-e0104n0:209_6: āvajjanaṃ uppajjati, tasmiṃ niruddhe cattāri, pañca vā javanāni javantītiādi sabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:209_7: vuttanayameva. “Visuṃ parikammaṃ nāma natthī”ti idaṃ pana dibbacakkhuñāṇena vinā
anya-e0104n0:209_8: yathākammūpagañāṇassa visuṃ parikammaṃ natthīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ. Evañcetaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:209_9: aññathā yathākammūpagañāṇassa mahaggatabhāvo eva na siyā. Devānaṃ dassanepi eseva
anya-e0104n0:209_10: nayo. Nerayikadevaggahaṇaṃ cettha nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ākaṅkhamāno hi dibbacakkhulābhī
anya-e0104n0:209_11: aññagatikesupi evaṃ paṭipajjatiyeva. Tathā hi vakkhati “apāyaggahaṇena tiracchānayoniṃ
anya-e0104n0:209_12: dīpetī”ti, “sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhatī”ti ca. Taṃ nirayasaṃvattaniyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:209_13: kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etassāti taṃkammārammaṇaṃ. Phārusakavanādīsūti ādi-saddena cittalatāvanādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
anya-e0104n0:210_0: Yathā cimassāti yathā ca imassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa visuṃ parikammaṃ natthi, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:210_1: anāgataṃsañāṇassapīti visuṃ parikammābhāvaṃ nidasseti. Tattha kāraṇamāha “dibbacakkhupādakāneva
anya-e0104n0:210_2: hi imānī”ti. Tatrāyamadhippāyo – yathā dibbacakkhulābhī nirayādiabhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ
anya-e0104n0:210_3: vaḍḍhetvā, nerayikādike satte disvā tehi pubbe āyūhitaṃ nirayasaṃvattaniyādikaṃ kammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:210_4: tādisena samādānena, tajjena ca manasikārena parikkhate citte yāthāvato jānāti, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:210_5: yassa yassa sattassa samanantarā anāgataṃ attabhāvaṃ ñātukāmo taṃ taṃ odissa ālokaṃ
anya-e0104n0:210_6: vaḍḍhetvā tena tena atīte, etarahi vā āyūhitaṃ tassa nibbattakaṃ kammaṃ yathākammūpagañāṇena
anya-e0104n0:210_7: disvā tena nibbattetabbaṃ anāgataṃ attabhāvaṃ ñātukāmo tādisena samādānena, tajjena
anya-e0104n0:210_8: ca manasikārena parikkhate citte yāthāvato jānāti. Eseva nayo tato paresupi attabhāvesu.
anya-e0104n0:210_9: Etaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ nāma. Yasmā etaṃ dvayaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇe satiyeva sijjhati, nāsati.
anya-e0104n0:211_0: Kāyena duṭṭhu caritaṃ, kāyato vā uppannaṃ kilesapūtikattā duṭṭhaṃ caritaṃ kāyaduccaritanti
anya-e0104n0:211_1: evaṃ yojetabbo. Kāyoti cettha copanakāyo adhippeto. Kāyaviññattivasena pavattaṃ akusalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:211_2: kāyakammaṃ kāyaduccaritanti. Itaresūti vacīmanoduccaritesu. Yasmiṃ santāne kammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:211_3: katūpacitaṃ, asatissa antarupacchede vipākārahabhāvassa avigacchanato so tena sahitoyevāti
anya-e0104n0:211_4: vattabboti āha “samannāgatāti samaṅgībhūtā”ti. “Anatthakāmā hutvā”ti etena mātāpitaro
anya-e0104n0:211_5: viya puttānaṃ, ācariyupajjhāyā viya ca nissitakānaṃ atthakāmā hutvā garahakā upavādakā
anya-e0104n0:211_6: na hontīti dasseti. Guṇaparidhaṃsanenāti vijjamānānaṃ guṇānaṃ viddhaṃsanena, vināsanenāti
anya-e0104n0:211_7: attho. Nanu ca antimavatthunāpi upavādo guṇaparidhaṃsanamevāti? Saccametaṃ. Guṇāti
anya-e0104n0:211_8: panettha jhānādivisesā uttarimanussadhammā adhippetāti sīlaparidhaṃsanaṃ visuṃ gahitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:211_9: Tenāha “natthi imesaṃ samaṇadhammo”tiādi. Samaṇadhammoti ca sīlasaṃyamaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0104n0:211_10: vadati. Jānaṃ vāti yaṃ upavadati, tassa ariyabhāvaṃ jānanto vā. Ajānaṃ vāti ajānanto
anya-e0104n0:211_11: vā. Jānanaṃ ajānanaṃ cettha appamāṇaṃ, ariyabhāvo eva pamāṇaṃ. Tenāha “ubhayathāpi
anya-e0104n0:211_12: ariyūpavādova hotī”ti. “Ariyo”ti pana ajānato aduṭṭhacittasseva tattha ariyaguṇābhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:211_13: pavedentassa guṇaparidhaṃsanaṃ na hotīti tassa ariyūpavādo natthīti vadanti. Satekicchaṃ
anya-e0104n0:211_14: pana hoti khamāpanena, na anantariyaṃ viya atekicchaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:212_0: Rujjhatīti tudati, dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ uppādetīti attho. Tanti taṃ theraṃ, taṃ vā kiriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:212_1: Jānanto eva thero “atthi te, āvuso, patiṭṭhā”ti pucchi. Itaropi saccābhisamayo sāsane
anya-e0104n0:212_2: patiṭṭhāti āha “sotāpanno aha”nti. Thero taṃ karuṇāyamāno “khīṇāsavo tayā upavadito”ti attānaṃ āvikāsi.
anya-e0104n0:213: Sace navakatarā honti tasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū. Sammukhā akhamāpentepīti purato khamāpane asambhavantepi. “Akhamante”ti vā pāṭho. Taṃ sotāpannassa vasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:215_0: Samādātabbaṭṭhena samādānāni, kammāni samādānāni yesaṃ, te kammasamādānā, micchādiṭṭhivasena
anya-e0104n0:215_1: kammasamādānā, hetuatthaṃ vā antogadhaṃ katvā micchādiṭṭhivasena pare kammesu samādāpakā
anya-e0104n0:215_3: Sīlasampannotiādi paripakkindriyassa maggasamaṅgino vasena vuttaṃ. Aggamaggaṭṭhe
anya-e0104n0:215_4: pana vattabbameva natthi. Aññanti arahattaṃ. Evaṃsampadanti yathā taṃ avassambhāvī,
anya-e0104n0:215_5: evamidampīti attho. Taṃ vācaṃ appahāyātiādīsu ariyūpavādaṃ sandhāya “puna evarūpiṃ
anya-e0104n0:215_6: vācaṃ na vakkhāmī”ti vadanto vācaṃ pajahati nāma, “puna evarūpaṃ cittaṃ na uppādessāmī”ti
anya-e0104n0:215_7: cintento cittaṃ pajahati nāma, “puna evarūpiṃ diṭṭhiṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti pajahanto
anya-e0104n0:215_8: diṭṭhiṃ pajahati nāma, tathā akaronto neva pajahati, na paṭinissajjati. Yathābhataṃ
anya-e0104n0:215_9: nikkhitto, evaṃ nirayeti yathā nirayapālehi āharitvā niraye ṭhapito, evaṃ niraye
anya-e0104n0:215_10: ṭhapitoyevāti attho. Micchādiṭṭhivasena akattabbaṃ nāma pāpaṃ natthi, yato saṃsārakhāṇubhāvopi
anya-e0104n0:216_0: “Ucchinnabhavanettiko, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa kāyo tiṭṭhati, ayañceva kāyo, bahiddhā
anya-e0104n0:216_1: ca nāmarūpa”nti evamādīsu viya idha kāya-saddo khandhapañcakavisayoti āha “kāyassa
anya-e0104n0:216_2: bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā”ti. Avītarāgassa maraṇato paraṃ nāma bhavantarūpādānamevāti
anya-e0104n0:216_3: āha “paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattikkhandhaggahaṇe”ti. Yena tiṭṭhati, tassa
anya-e0104n0:216_4: upacchedeneva kāyo bhijjatīti āha “kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:217_0: Eti imasmā sukhanti ayo, puññanti āha “puññasammatā ayā”ti. Ayanti etasmā sukhānīti
anya-e0104n0:217_1: āyo, puññakammādisukhasādhanaṃ. Tenāha “sukhānaṃ vā āyassa abhāvā”ti. Iyati assādiyatīti
anya-e0104n0:218_0: Nāgarājādīnanti ādi-saddena supaṇṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Asurasadisanti petāsurasadisaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:218_1: Soti asurakāyo. Sabbasamussayehīti sabbehi sampattisamussayehi. Vuttavipariyāyenāti
anya-e0104n0:219: Nigamanavacanaṃ vuttassevatthassa puna vacananti katvā. Ayamettha saṅkhepatthoti “dibbena cakkhunā…pe… passatī”ti ettha ayaṃ yathāvutto saṅkhepattho.
anya-e0104n0:220_0: 412. Kasiṇārammaṇanti aṭṭhannampi kasiṇānaṃ vasena kasiṇārammaṇaṃ. Sabbākārenāti
anya-e0104n0:220_2: iminā sabbappakārena. Abhinīhārakkhamaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇābhimukhaṃ pesanārahaṃ pesanayoggaṃ
anya-e0104n0:220_3: katvā. Āsannaṃ kātabbanti dibbacakkhuñāṇuppattiyā samīpabhūtaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tattha upacārajjhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:220_4: paguṇataraṃ katvā ārammaṇañca vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Tenāha “upacārajjhānagocaraṃ katvā vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e0104n0:220_5: ṭhapetabba”nti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ vaḍḍhite kasiṇārammaṇe. Appanāti jhānavasena appanā.
anya-e0104n0:220_6: Na hi akataparikammassa abhiññāvasena appanā ijjhati. Tenāha “pādakajjhānanissayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:220_7: hotī”ti, pādakajjhānārammaṇaṃ hotīti attho. Na parikammanissayanti parikammassa taṃ
anya-e0104n0:220_8: kasiṇārammaṇaṃ apassayo na hoti. Tathā sati rūpadassanaṃ na siyā. Imesūti yathāvuttesu
anya-e0104n0:220_9: tejokasiṇādīsu tīsu kasiṇesu. Uppādetvāti upacārajjhānuppādanena uppādetvā. Upacārajjhānapavattiyā
anya-e0104n0:221_0: Antoyeva rūpagataṃ passitabbaṃ na bahiddhā vikkhepāpattihetubhāvato. Parikammassa
anya-e0104n0:221_1: vāro atikkamatīti idha parikammaṃ nāma yathāvuttakasiṇārammaṇaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0104n0:221_2: rūpagataṃ passato na pavattati. Kasiṇālokavasena ca rūpagatadassanaṃ, kasiṇāloko
anya-e0104n0:221_3: ca parikammavasenāti tadubhayampi parikammassa appavattiyā na hoti. Tenāha “tato
anya-e0104n0:221_4: āloko antaradhāyati, tasmiṃ antarahite rūpagatampi na dissatī”ti. Rūpagataṃ passato
anya-e0104n0:221_5: parikammassa vāro atikkamati, parikammamatikkantassa kasiṇārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ na hotīti
anya-e0104n0:221_6: rūpagataṃ na dissati, kathaṃ pana paṭipajjitabbanti āha “athānenā”tiādi. Evaṃ anukkamenāti
anya-e0104n0:221_7: punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato tato vuṭṭhāya abhiṇhaṃ ālokassa pharaṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:221_8: āloko thāmagato hoti ciraṭṭhāyī. Tathā ca sati tattha sucirampi rūpagataṃ passateva.
anya-e0104n0:222_0: Svāyamattho tiṇukkūpamāya vibhāvetabboti dassento āha “rattiṃ tiṇukkāyā”tiādi. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:222_1: punappunaṃ pavesananti punappunaṃ pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ. Thāmagatālokassa yathāparicchedena
anya-e0104n0:222_2: ṭhānanti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchinditvā kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ, thāmagatassa ālokassa
anya-e0104n0:223_0: Anāpāthagatanti āpāthagamanayogyassa vasena vuttaṃ. Antokucchigatādi pana tadabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:223_1: tena visesitabbameva. Tadevāti dibbacakkhumeva. Etthāti etesu rūpamārabbha pavattacittesu.
anya-e0104n0:223_2: Rūpadassanasamatthanti rūpaṃ sabhāvato vibhāvanasamatthaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya. Pubbabhāgacittānīti
anya-e0104n0:223_3: āvajjanaparikammasaṅkhātāni pubbabhāgacittāni. Tāni hi ārammaṇaṃ karontānipi na yāthāvato
anya-e0104n0:224_0: Taṃ panetaṃ dibbacakkhu. Paripanthoti antarāyiko. Jhānavibbhantakoti jhānummattako
anya-e0104n0:224_1: jhānabhāvanāmukhena ummādappatto. Appamattena bhavitabbanti “dibbacakkhu mayā adhigata”nti
anya-e0104n0:224_2: santosaṃ anāpajjitvā vipassanānuyogavasena vā saccābhisamayavasena vā appamattena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:225_1: dassitaṃ, na tassa uppattikkamoti taṃ dassetuṃ “tatrāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ heṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:228_0: 413. Itīti evaṃ vuttappakārenāti attho. Tena “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādinā yathādassitapāḷigatiṃ,
anya-e0104n0:228_1: tassā atthavivaraṇanayañca paccāmasati. Saccesu viya ariyasaccāni khandhesu upādānakkhandhā
anya-e0104n0:228_2: antogadhā. Tadubhaye ca sabhāvato, samudayato, atthaṅgamato, assādato, ādīnavato,
anya-e0104n0:228_3: nissaraṇato ca yathābhūtaṃ sayambhuñāṇena avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi pavedesi vāti sātisayena
anya-e0104n0:228_4: pañcakkhandhāvabodhena bhagavāva thometabboti āha “pañcakkhandhavidū”ti. Ñatvā viññeyyāti
anya-e0104n0:228_5: sambandho. Tāsūti pañcasu abhiññāsu. Taggahaṇeneva ca paribhaṇḍañāṇānaṃ gahitattā
anya-e0104n0:229_0: Tattha paribhaṇḍañāṇānīti parivārañāṇāni. Yathā hi sinerussa parivāraṭṭhānāni yāni
anya-e0104n0:229_1: taṃsiddhiyā siddhāni mekhalaṭṭhānāni paribhaṇḍānīti vuccanti, evaṃ imānipi dibbacakkhusiddhiyā
anya-e0104n0:229_2: siddhāni tassa paribhaṇḍānīti vuttāni. Idhāgatānīti ettha idhāti yathādassitāni suttapadāni
anya-e0104n0:229_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tato aññesu pana sāmaññaphalādīsu manomayañāṇampi visuṃ abhiññāñāṇabhāvena āgataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:230_0: “Tesū”ti idaṃ paccāmasanaṃ kiṃ tikānaṃ, udāhu ārammaṇānanti? Kiñcettha yadi tikānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:230_1: tadayuttaṃ. Na hi tikesu abhiññāñāṇāni pavattanti. Atha ārammaṇānaṃ, tampi ayuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:230_2: Na hi aññaṃ uddisitvā aññassa paccāmasanaṃ yuttanti. Yathā icchati, tathā bhavatu
anya-e0104n0:230_3: tāva tikānaṃ, nanu vuttaṃ “na hi tikesu abhiññāñāṇāni pavattantī”ti? Nāyaṃ virodho
anya-e0104n0:230_4: tikavohārena ārammaṇānaṃyeva gayhamānattā. Atha vā pana hotu ārammaṇānaṃ, nanu vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:230_5: “na hi aññaṃ uddisitvā aññassa paccāmasanaṃ yutta”nti? Ayampi na doso yathāvuttakāraṇenevāti.
anya-e0104n0:231_0: 414. Asatipi vatthubhede bhūmikālasantānabhedavasena bhinnesu sattasu ārammaṇesu.
anya-e0104n0:231_1: Tikavasena hesa bhedo gahito. Iddhividhañāṇassa maggārammaṇatāya abhāvato idha maggārammaṇatiko
anya-e0104n0:231_2: na labbhati. Tanti iddhividhañāṇaṃ. Kāyaṃ cittasannissitaṃ katvātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:231_3: taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Upayogaladdhanti laddhaupayogavacanaṃ. Dutiyāvibhattivasena
anya-e0104n0:231_4: vuttaṃ “kāyaṃ pariṇāmetī”ti. Tenāha “rūpakāyārammaṇato”ti, rūpakāyassa vaṇṇārammaṇatoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:232_0: Tadeva cittanti yadeva kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane vuttaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ, tadeva.
anya-e0104n0:232_1: Rāmagāme cetiyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesesu sattasu cetiyesu dhātuyo iddhiyā āharitvā rājagahe
anya-e0104n0:232_2: bhūmigharamaṇḍape kataṃ mahādhātunidhānaṃ. “Ime gandhā”tiādinā paccuppanne gandhādike
anya-e0104n0:232_3: gahetvāpi asussanādivisesayuttaṃ anāgatameva nesaṃ rūpaṃ adhiṭṭhānacittassa ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:232_4: hoti anāgatādhiṭṭhānattā. Vattaniyasenāsanaṃ nāma viñjhāṭaviyaṃ vihāro. Dadhirasanti
anya-e0104n0:232_5: dadhimaṇḍo, taṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa anāgataṃ dadhivaṇṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:234: 415. Saddo ca paritto sabbassa rūpassa kāmāvacarabhāvato. Vijjamānamevāti vattamānaṃyeva.
anya-e0104n0:235_0: 416. Sotāpannassa cittanti sotāpannassa āveṇikaṃ cittaṃ. Sakadāgāmissātiādīsupi eseva
anya-e0104n0:235_1: nayo. Yāva arahato netabbanti “sakadāgāmī anāgāmino cittaṃ na jānāti, anāgāmī arahato”ti
anya-e0104n0:235_2: evaṃ netabbaṃ. Sabbesanti sabbesaṃ ariyānaṃ jānāti, ko pana vādo anariyānaṃ. Aññopi
anya-e0104n0:235_3: ca uparimo anāgāmiādi heṭṭhimassa sakadāgāmiādikassa cittaṃ jānātīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:236_0: Atītassa, anāgatassa ca parassa cittassa jānanaṃ sambhavati, paccuppannassa pana
anya-e0104n0:236_1: na sambhavatīti adhippāyena pucchati “kathaṃ paccuppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotī”ti. Itaro
anya-e0104n0:236_2: yattha sambhavati, taṃdassanatthaṃ paccuppannaṃ tāva vibhajitvā dassento “paccuppannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:236_3: nāma tividha”ntiādimāha. Tattha uppādaṭṭhitibhaṅgappattanti uppādaṃ, ṭhitiṃ, bhaṅgañca
anya-e0104n0:236_4: pattaṃ, khaṇattayapariyāpannanti attho. Etthantare ekadvesantativārā veditabbāti
anya-e0104n0:236_5: etthantare pavattā rūpasantativārā ekadvesantativārā nāmāti veditabbāti attho. Ālokaṭṭhānato
anya-e0104n0:236_6: ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassa pageva tattha nisinnassa viya yāva rūpagataṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:236_7: upaḍḍhavelā avibhūtavārā, upaḍḍhavelā vibhūtavārā, tadubhayaṃ gahetvā “dve santativārā”ti
anya-e0104n0:236_8: vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ na sabbasādhāraṇaṃ, ekaccassa sīghampi pākaṭaṃ hotīti “ekadvesantativārā”ti
anya-e0104n0:236_9: ekaggahaṇampi kataṃ, atiparittasabhāvautuādisamuṭṭhānā vā ekadvesantativārā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:237_0: Tīre akkantaudakalekhā nāma kālussiyaṃ gatā tīrasamīpe udakarāji. Yāva na vippasīdatīti
anya-e0104n0:237_1: kālussiyavigamena yāva vippasannā na hoti. Keci pana “atinte tīre allapādena akkante
anya-e0104n0:237_2: yāva pāde udakalekhā na vippasīdati, na saṃsīdati, na vūpasammatī”ti evamettha atthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:237_3: vadanti. Te panete kiriyābhedena vuttā kālavisesā, na aññamaññaṃ samasamā, ūnādhikabhāgavantova
anya-e0104n0:237_4: daṭṭhabbā. Dve tayo javanavārā kāmāvacarajavanavasena veditabbā, na itarajavanavasena.
anya-e0104n0:237_5: Na hi te parimitakālā, anantarā pavattabhavaṅgādayopi tadantogadhāva daṭṭhabbā. Tadubhayanti
anya-e0104n0:238_1: etarahīti vattabbaṃ addhāpaccuppannaṃ nāma. Manoti sasampayuttaṃ viññāṇamāha. Dhammāti
anya-e0104n0:238_2: ārammaṇadhammā. Manoti vā manāyatanaṃ. Dhammāti vedanādayo arūpakkhandhā. Ubhayametaṃ
anya-e0104n0:238_3: paccuppannanti addhāpaccuppannaṃ hontaṃ etaṃ ubhayaṃ hotīti attho. Viññāṇanti nikantiviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:238_4: Tañhi tasmiṃ paccuppanne chandarāgavasena paṭibaddhaṃ hoti. Abhinandatīti taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanāhi
anya-e0104n0:238_5: abhinandati. Tathābhūto ca vatthupariññāya abhāvato tesu paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati
anya-e0104n0:238_6: taṇhādiṭṭhīhi ākaḍḍhīyati. Ettha ca dvādasāyatanānaṃ “etaṃ paccuppanna”nti āgatattā
anya-e0104n0:238_7: tattha pavatto chandarāgo addhāpaccuppannārammaṇo, na khaṇapaccuppannārammaṇoti viññāyatīti
anya-e0104n0:238_8: dassento “yaṃ sandhāya bhaddekarattasutte…pe… saṃhīratīti vutta”nti āha. “Paccuppannañca
anya-e0104n0:238_9: yo dhammaṃ, tattha tattha vipassatī”ti etthāpi vipassanācittaṃ khaṇapaccuppannaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:238_10: vipassitabbadhammā addhāpaccuppannāti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā vipassanāva na sambhaveyya.
anya-e0104n0:238_11: “Khaṇapaccuppannaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgata”nti na vuttaṃ tassa vasena ārammaṇakaraṇassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anāgatattā.
anya-e0104n0:239_0: Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjatīti iddhicittassa uppattisamakālameva
anya-e0104n0:239_1: paracittassapi uppattisambhavatoti yuttidassanaṃ. Yathā ākāsetiādi sadisūdāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:239_2: Taṃ pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ ayuttaṃ. Kasmā? Maggaphalavīthito aññattha aniṭṭhe ṭhāne āvajjanajavanānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:240_0: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hotīti āha “santatipaccuppannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:240_1: panā”tiādi. Addhāpaccuppannaṃ pana javanavārena dīpetabbaṃ, na sakalena paccuppannaddhunāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:241_1: pavattiākāradīpanaṃ. Itarānīti āvajjanaparikammacittāni. Ettha ca “kecī”ti yadipi
anya-e0104n0:241_2: abhayagirivāsino adhippetā, te pana cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ na icchantīti “ṭhitikkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:241_3: vā paṭivijjhatī”ti na vattabbaṃ siyā. Tathā ye “iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:241_4: cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vadanti, tesaṃ “ṭhitikkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā paṭivijjhatī”ti
anya-e0104n0:241_5: vacanaṃ na sameti. Na hi tasmiṃ khaṇadvaye uppajjamānaṃ paracittena saha ekakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:241_6: uppajjati nāmāti. Ṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu ca uppajjamānaṃ ekadesaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:241_7: ekadesaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ āpajjati. Yañca vuttaṃ “parassa cittaṃ jānissāmīti rāsivasena
anya-e0104n0:241_8: mahājanassa citte āvajjite”ti, ettha ca mahājano atthato pare anekapuggalāti “paresaṃ
anya-e0104n0:241_9: cittaṃ jānissāmī”ti āvajjanappavatti vattabbā siyā. Athāpi parassāti mahājanassāti
anya-e0104n0:241_10: attho sambhaveyya, tathāpi tassa ekapuggalasseva vā cittarāsiṃ āvajjitvā ekassa paṭivijjhanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:241_11: ayuttaṃ. Na hi rāsiāvajjanaṃ ekadesāvajjanaṃ hotīti, tasmā tehi “mahājanassa citte
anya-e0104n0:242_0: Yaṃ pana te vadanti “yasmā iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:242_1: Tatthāyaṃ adhippāyo yutto siyā, cetopariyañāṇalābhī parassa cittaṃ ñātukāmo pādakajjhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:242_2: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya atītādivibhāgaṃ akatvā cittasāmaññena “imassa cittaṃ jānāmi,
anya-e0104n0:242_3: imassa cittaṃ jānāmī”ti parikammaṃ katvā puna pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0104n0:242_4: sāmaññeneva cittaṃ āvajjitvā tiṇṇaṃ, catunnaṃ vā parikammānaṃ anantarā cetopariyañāṇena
anya-e0104n0:242_5: paracittaṃ paṭivijjhati vibhāveti rūpaṃ viya dibbacakkhunā. Tato paraṃ pana kāmāvacaracittehi
anya-e0104n0:242_6: sarāgādivavatthānaṃ hoti nīlādivavatthānaṃ viya. Tattha dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhahadayavatthurūpassa
anya-e0104n0:242_7: sattassa abhimukhībhūtassa cittasāmaññena cittaṃ āvajjayamānaṃ āvajjanaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:242_8: vijjamānaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ āvajjeti. Parikammāni ca taṃ taṃ vijjamānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:242_9: cittaṃ cittasāmaññeneva ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittajānanaparikammāni hutvā pavattanti.
anya-e0104n0:242_10: Cetopariyañāṇaṃ pana vijjamānaṃ cittaṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ vibhāventaṃ tena saha ekakkhaṇe eva uppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:243_0: Tattha yasmā santānassa santānaggahaṇato ekattavasena āvajjanādīni “citta”ntveva
anya-e0104n0:243_1: pavattāni. Tañca cittameva, yaṃ cetopariyañāṇena vibhāvitaṃ. Tasmā samānākārappavattito
anya-e0104n0:243_2: na aniṭṭhe maggaphalavīthito aññasmiṃ ṭhāne nānārammaṇatā āvajjanajavanānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:243_4: paccayoti siddhaṃ hoti. Atītattiko ca evaṃ upapanno hoti. Aññathā santatipaccuppanne,
anya-e0104n0:243_5: addhāpaccuppanne ca “paccuppanna”nti idha vuccamāne atītānāgatānañca paccuppannatā
anya-e0104n0:243_6: āpajjeyya. Tathā ca sati “paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:243_7: paccayo”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca taṃ vuttaṃ. “Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa
anya-e0104n0:243_8: anantarapaccayena paccayo. Purimā purimā atītā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ paccuppannānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:243_9: khandhānaṃ anantara …pe… anulomaṃ gotrabhussā”tiādi vacanato na addhāsantatipaccuppannesveva
anya-e0104n0:243_10: ca anantarātītā cattāro khandhā atītāti viññāyanti. Na ca abhidhammamātikāyaṃ āgatassa
anya-e0104n0:243_11: paccuppannapadassa addhāsantatipaccuppannapadatthatā katthaci pāḷiyaṃ vuttā. Tasmā
anya-e0104n0:243_12: tehi iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittuppattiyā cetopariyañāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇatā
anya-e0104n0:243_13: vuttā. Yadā pana “yaṃ imassa cittaṃ pavattaṃ, taṃ jānāmi. Yaṃ bhavissati, taṃ jānāmī”ti
anya-e0104n0:243_14: vā ābhogaṃ katvā pādakajjhānasamāpajjanādīni karoti, tadā āvajjanaparikammāni, cetopariyañāṇañca
anya-e0104n0:244_0: Ye pana “iddhimā parassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo āvajjeti, āvajjanaṃ khaṇapaccuppannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:244_1: ārammaṇaṃ katvā teneva saha nirujjhati. Tato cattāri, pañca vā javanāni, yesaṃ pacchimaṃ
anya-e0104n0:244_2: iddhicittaṃ, sesāni kāmāvacarāni, tesaṃ sabbesampi tadeva niruddhaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:244_3: hoti, na ca tāni nānārammaṇāni honti addhānavasena paccuppannārammaṇattā”ti idaṃ
anya-e0104n0:244_6: yathāsambhavaṃ anāgatapaccuppannātītārammaṇabhāvepi nānārammaṇatā na siyā. Tena catupañcacittakkhaṇānāgate
anya-e0104n0:244_8: siddha”nti vadanti. Tesaṃ vādo “anāgatārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa
anya-e0104n0:244_9: āsevanapaccayena paccayo, paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:244_10: paccayo”ti imesaṃ pañhānaṃ anuddhaṭattā, gaṇanāya ca “āsevane tīṇī”ti vuttattā na
anya-e0104n0:244_11: sijjhati. Na hi kusalakiriyāmahaggataṃ anāsevanaṃ atthīti. Etassa ca vādassa nissayabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:244_13: pavattissati cā”ti visesaṃ akatvā gahaṇe āvajjanassa anāgataggahaṇābhāvaṃ, tadabhāvā
anya-e0104n0:244_14: javanānampi vattamānaggahaṇābhāvañca sandhāyeva tassa vuttattā. Tadā hi bhavaṅgacalanānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:244_15: abhimukhībhūtameva cittaṃ ārabbha āvajjanā pavattatīti jānanacittassapi vattamānārammaṇabhāve
anya-e0104n0:244_17: ca aniṭṭhe ṭhāne āvajjanajavanānaṃ nānārammaṇabhāvadosāpattiyā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ “khaṇapaccuppannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:244_18: cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hotī”ti, taṃ ayuttanti paṭikkhipitvā yathāvuttadosāpattiṃ,
anya-e0104n0:244_19: kālavasena ca addhāsantatipaccuppannārammaṇattā nānārammaṇatābhāvaṃ disvā āvajjanajavanānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:244_20: vattamānataṃ niruddhārammaṇabhāvo vuttoti. Tampi vacanaṃ purimavādino nānujāneyyuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:244_21: Tasmiṃ hi sati “āvajjanā kusalāna”ntiādīsu (paṭṭhā 1.1.417) viya aññapadasaṅgahitassa
anya-e0104n0:244_23: paccayo”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca vuttanti.
anya-e0104n0:245_0: Kasmā panevaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇatā vicāritā, nanu “atīto dhammo
anya-e0104n0:245_1: paccuppannassa dhammassa, anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:245_2: paccayo”ti etesaṃ vibhaṅgesu “atītā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:245_3: yathākammūpagañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, anāgatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:245_4: cetopariyañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti, uppannattike
anya-e0104n0:245_5: ca “anuppannā khandhā uppādino khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:245_7: dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassā”ti etassa vibhaṅge “paccuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:245_8: āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti, uppannattike ca “uppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:245_9: āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti ettakasseva vuttattā paccuppanne citte cetopariyañāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:245_10: nappavattatīti viññāyati. Yadi hi pavatteyya, purimesu viya itaresu ca cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:245_11: kattabbaṃ siyāti? Saccaṃ kattabbaṃ, nayadassanavasena pana taṃ saṃkhittanti aññāya pāḷiyā viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:246_0: “Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, anāgatārammaṇo
anya-e0104n0:246_3: jānāti, atītārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:246_5: anāgatārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:246_7: paccuppannārammaṇā paccuppannā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:246_8: paccayo”ti cetopariyañāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇe pavatti vuttāti. Tenevāyaṃ vicāraṇā katāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:247_0: 417. Tesanti tesu dvīsu ñāṇesūti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Cittameva ārammaṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇattāti
anya-e0104n0:247_1: adhippāyo. Tenāha “aññaṃ khandhaṃ vā khandhappaṭibaddhaṃ vā na jānātī”ti. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:247_2: khandhappaṭibaddhaṃ nāmagottādi. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ maggārammaṇanti āha “maggasampayuttacittārammaṇattā
anya-e0104n0:247_3: pana pariyāyato maggārammaṇanti vutta”nti. Cetanāmattameva ārammaṇaṃ, tathā hi taṃ
anya-e0104n0:247_5: khandhappaṭibaddhameva. Khandhehi visayīkatattāti vadanti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:247_6: “atīte buddhā maggaṃ bhāvayiṃsu, phalaṃ sacchākaṃsu, anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
anya-e0104n0:247_9: maggaphalesu ñāṇesu pavattanti. Nibbānapaccavekkhaṇañca nibbānārammaṇesu appamāṇadhammesu
anya-e0104n0:247_12: hi vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “nibbāna”nti. Tasmā pubbenivāsañāṇena eva maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇakicce
anya-e0104n0:247_13: vuccamānepi nibbānapaccavekkhaṇatā na sakkā vattuṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana nibbānārammaṇatā nidassitā.
anya-e0104n0:248_0: Kusalā khandhāti iddhividhapubbenivāsānāgataṃsañāṇāpekkho bahuvacananiddeso, na cetopariyayathākammūpagañāṇāpekkhāti
anya-e0104n0:248_1: tesaṃ catukkhandhārammaṇabhāvassa asādhakoti ce? Na, aññattha “avitakkavicāramattā
anya-e0104n0:248_2: khandhā ca vicāro ca cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:248_3: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti, “savitakkasavicārā khandhā ca vitakko ca cetopariyañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:248_4: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti ca vuttattā
anya-e0104n0:248_5: cetopariyañāṇāpekkhāpi bahuvacananiddesoti imassa atthassa siddhito. Evampi yathākammūpagañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:248_6: “avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vicāro cā”tiādīsu avuttattā catukkhandhārammaṇatā
anya-e0104n0:248_7: na sijjhatīti? Na, tattha avacanassa aññakāraṇattā. Yathākammūpagañāṇena hi kammasaṃsaṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:248_8: cattāro khandhā kammamukhena gayhati. Tañhi yathā cetopariyañāṇaṃ purimaparikammavasena
anya-e0104n0:248_9: avitakkādivibhāgaṃ, sarāgādivibhāgañca cittaṃ vibhāveti, na evaṃ vibhāgaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n0:248_10: Kammavaseneva pana samudāyaṃ vibhāveti, tasmā “avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vicāro
anya-e0104n0:248_11: cā”tiādike vibhāgakaraṇe taṃ na vuttaṃ, na catukkhandhānārammaṇatoti. Idaṃ panassa
anya-e0104n0:248_13: paṭhanti eva. Na hi taṃ kusalākusalavibhāgaṃ viya savitakkādivibhāgaṃ kammaṃ vibhāvetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:249_1: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Nāmagottaṃ pana khandhūpanibandho sammutisiddho byañjanattho,
anya-e0104n0:249_2: na byañjananti. Ayamettha amhākaṃ khantīti ācariyassāyaṃ attano mati. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:251_1: bahiddhārammaṇañcā”ti ekajjhaṃ gahetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, taṃ “kālena…pe…
anya-e0104n0:251_2: hotiyevā”ti iminā adhippāyena vuttanti attho. Na hi ajjhattabahiddhā nāma visuṃ ekaṃ
anya-e0104n0:251_3: atthi, nāpi taṃ ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karīyatīti. Yadi evaṃ tiko eva na pūrati padadvayāsaṅgahitassa
anya-e0104n0:251_4: tatiyassa atthantarassa abhāvato, na, pakārabhedavisayattā tikaniddesassa. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:251_5: hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “te eva tippakārepi dhamme”ti vuttaṃ. Te eva ajjhattādivasena tividhepi
anya-e0104n0:251_6: dhammeti attho. Ettha hi “te eva dhamme”ti avatvā “tippakāre”ti vacanaṃ pakārabhedanibandhanā
anya-e0104n0:251_7: ayaṃ tikadesanāti dassanatthaṃ. Yathā hi kusalattikādīnaṃ desanā yathārahaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:251_10: atha kho pakārabhedanibandhanā. Pañceva hi khandhā sasantatipariyāpannataṃ upādāya
anya-e0104n0:251_13: siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā”ti. Nanu cettha atthantarābhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:251_14: pakārantarassa ca anāmaṭṭhattā tatiyo rāsi natthīti? Nayidamevaṃ. Yadipi hi paṭhamapadena
anya-e0104n0:251_15: asaṅgahitasaṅgaṇhanavasena dutiyapadassa pavattattā sabbepi sabhāvadhammā padadvayeneva
anya-e0104n0:251_16: pariggahitā, tehi pana visuṃ visuṃ gahitadhamme ekajjhaṃ gahaṇavasena tatiyapadaṃ
anya-e0104n0:251_17: vuttanti attheva tatiyo rāsi. Na hi samudāyo avayavo hoti, bhinnavatthuke pana dhamme
anya-e0104n0:251_18: adhiṭṭhānabhedaṃ amuñcitvā ekajjhaṃ gahaṇaṃ na sambhavatīti kālena ajjhattaṃ, kālena
anya-e0104n0:256_1: rūpādīhi virajjanākāro, cuddasadhā cittassa paridamanākāro, pañcavidhaānisaṃsādhigamākāroti
anya-e0104n0:257_0: Tadanantarāti “cittaṃ pañña”nti evaṃ desanākkamena, paṭipattikkamena ca tassa samādhissa
anya-e0104n0:257_1: anantarā. Paññā bhāvetabbā samādhibhāvanāya samannāgatena bhikkhunāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:257_3: sunisitaṃ vipassanāpaññāsattha”nti evaṃ ativiya saṅkhepena bhāsitattā ayaṃ sā paññāti
anya-e0104n0:257_4: sabhāvato viññātumpi tāva na sukarā. Bhāvanāvidhānassa pana adassitattā pageva bhāvetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:257_5: na sukarāti sambandho. Pucchanaṭṭhena pañhā, kammaṃ kiriyā karaṇaṃ, pañhāva kammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:258_0: Kā paññāti sarūpapucchā. Kenaṭṭhena paññāti kena atthena paññāti vuccati, “paññā”ti
anya-e0104n0:258_1: padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ nissāya pavattanti attho. Sā panāyaṃ paññā sabhāvato, kiccato,
anya-e0104n0:258_2: upaṭṭhānākārato, āsannakāraṇato ca kathaṃ jānitabbāti āha “kānassā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:258_3: Katividhāti pabhedapucchā. Kasmā panettha saṃkilesavodānapucchā na gahitāti? Vuccate
anya-e0104n0:258_4: – lokuttarāya tāva paññāya nattheva saṃkileso. Asati ca tasmiṃ kuto vodānapucchāti
anya-e0104n0:258_5: tadubhayaṃ na gahitaṃ. Lokiyāya pana tāni bhāvanāvidhāne eva antogadhānīti katvā
anya-e0104n0:258_7: vuttanayānusārena veditabbānīti na gahitāni. Paṭipatti nāma diṭṭhānisaṃse eva hotīti
anya-e0104n0:259_0: 422. Tatrāti tasmiṃ, tassa vā pañhākammassa. Vissajjananti vivaraṇaṃ. Pucchito hi
anya-e0104n0:259_1: attho avibhāvitattā nigūḷho muṭṭhiyaṃ kato viya tiṭṭhati, tassa vivaraṇaṃ vissajjanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:259_2: vibhūtabhāvakaraṇato. Kā paññāti kāmañcāyaṃ sarūpapucchā, vibhāgavantānaṃ pana sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:259_3: vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti vibhāgo tāva anavasesato dassetabbo. Taṃdassanena
anya-e0104n0:259_4: ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ “paññā bahuvidhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bahuvidhāti kusalādivasena
anya-e0104n0:259_5: anekavidhā. Nānappakārāti atthajāpikādibhedena, sutamayañāṇādibhedena ca nānāvidhā.
anya-e0104n0:259_6: Taṃ sabbanti taṃ anavasesaṃ paññāvibhāgaṃ. Na sādheyyāti vipassanābhāvanāya saddhiṃ
anya-e0104n0:259_7: maggabhāvanā idha adhippetattho. Tāya hi taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanaṃ, tañca na sādheyya. Anavasesato
anya-e0104n0:259_8: hi paññāpabhede vissajjiyamāne “ekavidhena ñāṇavatthū”tiādiko sabbo ñāṇavatthu vibhaṅge,
anya-e0104n0:259_9: suttantesu ca tattha tattha āgato paññāpabhedo. Sakalopi vā abhidhammanayo āharitvā
anya-e0104n0:259_10: vissajjetabbo bhaveyya, tathā ca sati yvāyaṃ idha paññābhāvanāvidhi adhippeto, tassa
anya-e0104n0:259_11: vissajjanāya okāsova na bhaveyya. Kiñca yvāyaṃ ṭhānāṭhānakammantaravipākantarādivisaye
anya-e0104n0:259_12: paññāya pavattibhedo, sopi yathārahaṃ saddhiṃ phalāphalabhedena vibhajitvā vissajjetabbo
anya-e0104n0:259_13: siyā. So ca pana vissajjiyamāno aññadatthu vikkhepāya saṃvatteyya, yathā taṃ avisaye.
anya-e0104n0:259_14: Tenāha “uttari ca vikkhepāya saṃvatteyyā”ti. Kusalacittasampayuttaṃ vipassanāñāṇanti
anya-e0104n0:259_15: ettha kusala-ggahaṇena duvidhampi abyākataṃ nivatteti, tathā “atthi saṃkiliṭṭhapaññā”ti
anya-e0104n0:259_16: evaṃ pavattaṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭisedheti. Vipassanāñāṇa-ggahaṇena sesakusalapaññā.
anya-e0104n0:260_1: nānappakārato jānanaṃ jānanabhāvo visayaggahaṇākāro. So hi nesaṃ samāno, na sañjānanādiākāro.
anya-e0104n0:260_2: Pītakantīti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, tena “lohitakaṃ odātaṃ dīghaṃ rassa”ntiādike
anya-e0104n0:260_3: saññāya gahetabbākāre saṅgaṇhāti. Sañjānanamattamevāti ettha sañjānanaṃ nāma “nīlaṃ
anya-e0104n0:260_4: pīta”ntiādikaṃ ārammaṇe vijjamānaṃ vā avijjamānaṃ vā saññānimittaṃ katvā jānanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:260_5: Tathā hesā puna sañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā. Matta-saddena visesanivattiatthena
anya-e0104n0:260_6: vijānanapajānanākāre nivatteti, eva-saddena kadācipi imissā te visesā natthevāti
anya-e0104n0:260_7: avadhāreti. Tenāha “aniccaṃ dukkha”ntiādi. Tattha viññāṇakiccampi kātuṃ asakkontī
anya-e0104n0:260_8: saññā kuto paññākiccaṃ kareyyāti “lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti”cceva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:260_9: na vuttaṃ “maggapātubhāva”nti. Ārammaṇe pavattamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ na tattha saññā viya
anya-e0104n0:260_10: nīlapītādikassa sañjānanavaseneva pavattati, atha kho tattha aññañca visesaṃ jānantameva
anya-e0104n0:260_11: pavattatīti āha “viññāṇa”ntiādi. Kathaṃ pana viññāṇaṃ lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ pāpetīti?
anya-e0104n0:260_12: Paññāya dassitamaggena. Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya hi anekavāraṃ lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā
anya-e0104n0:260_14: vipassanā sambhavati, yathā taṃ paguṇassa ganthassa sajjhāyane ñāyāgatāpi vārā na
anya-e0104n0:260_15: viññāyanti. Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhanti ca lakkhaṇānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:260_16: na paṭivijjhanaṃ. Ussakkitvāti udayabbayañāṇapaṭipāṭiyā āyūhitvā. Maggapātubhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:260_17: pāpetuṃ na sakkoti asambodhasabhāvattā. Vuttanayavasenāti viññāṇe vuttanayavasena
anya-e0104n0:260_18: ārammaṇañca jānāti, lakkhaṇapaṭivedhañca pāpeti. Attano pana anaññasādhāraṇena ānubhāvena
anya-e0104n0:261_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ajātabuddhīti
anya-e0104n0:261_2: paṭilābhayogyanti attho. Chekoti mahāsāro. Kūṭoti kahāpaṇapatirūpako tambakaṃsādimayo.
anya-e0104n0:261_3: Addhasāroti upaḍḍhagghanako. Iti-saddo ādiattho, tena pādasāra samasāraparopādasārādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:261_4: saṅgaho. Te pakāreti indajālājātipupphādippakāre ceva chekādippakāre ca.
anya-e0104n0:262_0: Saññā hītiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Saññā vibhāgaṃ akatvā piṇḍavaseneva ārammaṇassa gahaṇato
anya-e0104n0:262_1: dārakassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisī vuttā. Tathā hi sā “yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā”
anya-e0104n0:262_2: vuccati. Viññāṇaṃ ārammaṇe ekaccavisesagahaṇasamatthatāya gāmikapurisassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisaṃ
anya-e0104n0:262_3: vuttaṃ. Paññā ārammaṇe anavasesavisesāvabodhato heraññikassa kahāpaṇadassanasadisī
anya-e0104n0:262_4: vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Nānappakārato jānana”nti iminā ñeyyadhammā paccekaṃ nānappakārāti
anya-e0104n0:262_5: tesaṃ yāthāvato avabodho paññāti dasseti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena
anya-e0104n0:263_0: Yatthāti yasmiṃ cittuppāde. Na tattha ekaṃsena hotīti tasmiṃ cittuppāde paññā ekantena
anya-e0104n0:263_1: na hoti. Na hi duhetukaahetukacittuppādesu paññā uppajjati. Avinibbhuttāti aviyuttā.
anya-e0104n0:263_2: Tehīti saññāviññāṇehi. Yathā hi sukhaṃ pītiyā na niyamato aviyuttaṃ, evaṃ saññāviññāṇāni
anya-e0104n0:263_3: paññāya na niyamato aviyuttāti. Yathā pana pīti sukhena niyamato aviyuttā, evaṃ paññā
anya-e0104n0:263_4: saññāviññāṇehi niyamato aviyuttā. Tasmā evaṃ avinibbhuttesu imesu tīsu dhammesu tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:263_5: vinibbhogo dukkaroti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ kahāpaṇadassanaṃ nidassitanti. Tesaṃ duviññeyyanānattataṃyeva
anya-e0104n0:263_6: vacanantarenapi dassetuṃ “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha rūpadhammesupi tāva nānānadīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:263_7: udakassa, nānātelassa vā ekasmiṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā mathitassa “idaṃ asukāya nadiyā
anya-e0104n0:263_8: udakaṃ, idaṃ asukatela”nti niddhāretvā sarūpato dassanaṃ dukkaraṃ, kimaṅgaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:264_0: 424. Dhammānaṃ sako bhāvo, samāno ca bhāvo dhammasabhāvo. Tattha paṭhamena kakkhaḷaphusanādisalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:264_1: gahitaṃ, dutiyena aniccadukkhatādisāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ. Tadubhayassa ca yāthāvato paṭivijjhanalakkhaṇā
anya-e0104n0:264_4: viddhaṃsanarasā. Uppajjamāno eva hi paññāloko hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamento evaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:264_5: tato eva dhammasabhāvesu asammuyhanākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:264_6: Kāraṇabhūtā vā sayaṃ phalabhūtaṃ asammohaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti evampi asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:264_7: Vipassanāpaññāya idha adhippetattā “samādhi tassā padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi
anya-e0104n0:266_0: 425. Dhammasabhāvapaṭivedho nāma paññāya āveṇiko sabhāvo, na tenassā koci vibhāgo
anya-e0104n0:266_2: loko vuccati vaṭṭaṃ, tappariyāpannatāya loke niyuttā, tattha vā viditāti lokiyā.
anya-e0104n0:266_3: Tattha apariyāpannatāya lokato uttarā uttiṇṇāti lokuttarā. Lokuttarāpi hi maggasampayuttā
anya-e0104n0:266_4: bhāvetabbā. Vipassanāpariyāyopi tassā labbhatevāti lokuttara-ggahaṇaṃ na virujjhati.
anya-e0104n0:266_5: Attānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattehi saha āsavehīti sāsavā, ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi natthi
anya-e0104n0:266_6: etissā āsavāti anāsavā. Ādi-saddena āsavavippayuttasāsavadukādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:266_8: nibbānadassanato dassanañca, nissayabhāvato sampayuttā dhammā bhavanti ettha, sayampi
anya-e0104n0:266_9: vā bhavati uppajjati na nibbānaṃ viya apātubhāvanti bhūmi cāti dassanabhūmi, paṭhamamaggo.
anya-e0104n0:266_10: Sesamaggattayaṃ pana yasmā paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhasmiṃyeva dhamme bhāvanāvasena uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:266_11: na adiṭṭhapubbaṃ kiñci passati, tasmā bhāvanā ca yathāvuttenatthena bhūmi cāti bhāvanābhūmi.
anya-e0104n0:266_12: Tattha paññā dassanabhūmibhāvanābhūmivasena duvidhāti vuttā. Sutādinirapekkhāya cintāya
anya-e0104n0:266_13: nibbattā cintāmayā. Evaṃ sutamayā, bhāvanāmayā ca. Mayasaddo paccekaṃ sambandhitabbo.
anya-e0104n0:266_14: Āye vaḍḍhiyaṃ kosallaṃ āyakosallaṃ, apāye avaḍḍhiyaṃ kosallaṃ apāyakosallaṃ, upāye
anya-e0104n0:266_15: tassa tassa atthassa nibbattikāraṇe kosallaṃ upāyakosallanti visuṃ visuṃ kosallapadaṃ
anya-e0104n0:266_16: sambandhitabbaṃ. Ajjhattaṃ abhiniveso paṭipajjanaṃ etissāti ajjhattābhinivesā. Evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:267_1: Samudāyesu pavattā samaññā tadekadesesupi vattatīti āha “maggasampayuttā”ti, paccekampi
anya-e0104n0:267_2: vā sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ maggasamaññāti katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:268_2: viseso, atthato lokiyalokuttarāva paññāti āha “eseva nayo”ti. Ādi-saddena oghanīyaoghavippayuttaoghanīyādidukānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:268_3: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Paṭhamajjhānikāni cattāri maggacittāni, tathā dutiyādijjhānikāni
anya-e0104n0:268_4: cāti evaṃ soḷasasu maggacittesu. Vipassanāpaññāya idha adhippetattā mahaggatapaññā na gahitā.
anya-e0104n0:269_0: 427. Attano cintāvasenāti tassa tassa anavajjassa atthassa sādhane paropadesena vinā
anya-e0104n0:269_1: attano upāyacintāvaseneva. Sutavasenāti yathāsutassa paropadesassa vasena. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:269_2: tathā vāti parato upadesaṃ sutvā vā asutvā vā sayameva bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa. “Appanāppattā”ti
anya-e0104n0:269_3: idaṃ sikhāppattabhāvanāmayaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, na pana “appanāppattāva bhāvanāmayā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:270_1: ettha kammameva kammāyatanaṃ, kammañca taṃ āyatanañca ājīvānanti vā kammāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:270_2: Esa nayo sippāyatanesupi. Tattha duvidhaṃ kammaṃ hīnañca vaḍḍhakīkammādi, ukkaṭṭhañca
anya-e0104n0:270_3: kasivāṇijādi. Sippampi duvidhaṃ hīnañca naḷakārasippādi, ukkaṭṭhañca muddāgaṇanādi.
anya-e0104n0:270_5: veditabbaṃ. Tāni panetāni ekacce paṇḍitā bodhisattasadisā manussānaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:270_6: ākaṅkhantā neva aññehi kariyamānāni passanti, na vā katāni uggaṇhanti, na kathentānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:270_7: suṇanti. Atha kho attano dhammatāya cintāya karonti, paññavantehi attano dhammatāya
anya-e0104n0:270_8: cintāya katānipi aññehi uggaṇhitvā karontehi katasadisāneva honti.
anya-e0104n0:271_0: Kammassakatanti “idaṃ kammaṃ sattānaṃ sakaṃ, idaṃ no saka”nti evaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ. Saccānulomikanti
anya-e0104n0:271_1: vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Taṃ hi saccapaṭivedhassa anulomanato “saccānulomika”nti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:271_2: Idānissa pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ aniccanti vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha vā-saddena
anya-e0104n0:271_4: Yaṃ hi aniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattāti. Yaṃ evarūpinti yaṃ evaṃ heṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:271_5: niddiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ. Anulomikaṃ khantintiādīni paññāvevacanāni. Sā hi heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:271_6: kammāyatanādīnaṃ apaccanīkadassanena anulomanato, tathā sattānaṃ hitacariyāya maggasaccassa,
anya-e0104n0:271_7: paramatthasaccassa, nibbānassa ca avilomanato anulometīti anulomikā. Sabbānipi etāni
anya-e0104n0:271_8: kāraṇāni khamati daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti khanti. Passatīti diṭṭhi. Rocetīti ruci. Munātīti
anya-e0104n0:271_9: muti. Pekkhatīti pekkhā. Te ca kammāyatanādayo dhammā etāya nijjhāyamānā nijjhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:271_10: khamantīti dhammanijjhānakhanti. Parato asutvā paṭilabhatīti aññassa upadesavacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:271_11: asutvā sayameva cintento paṭilabhati. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ cintāmayā paññā nāma vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:271_12: Sā panesā abhiññātānaṃ bodhisattānameva uppajjati. Tatthāpi saccānulomikañāṇaṃ dvinnaṃyeva
anya-e0104n0:271_13: bodhisattānaṃ antimabhavikānaṃ, sesapaññā sabbesampi pūritapāramīnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:271_14: uppajjati. Parato sutvā paṭilabhatīti kammāyatanādīni parena kariyamānāni vā katāni
anya-e0104n0:271_15: vā disvāpi parassa kathayamānassa vacanaṃ sutvāpi ācariyasantike uggahetvāpi paṭiladdhā
anya-e0104n0:271_16: sabbā parato sutvāva paṭiladdhā nāmāti veditabbā. Samāpannassāti samāpattisamaṅgissa,
anya-e0104n0:272_1: Sā lokuttaravipassanāti yā nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattā appamāṇārammaṇā paññā vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:272_2: sā lokuttaravipassanāti maggapaññaṃ sandhāyāha. Sā hi saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādiṃ agaṇhantīpi
anya-e0104n0:272_3: vipassanākiccapāripūriyā, nibbānassa vā tathalakkhaṇaṃ visesato passatīti vipassanāti
anya-e0104n0:272_4: vuccati. Gotrabhuñāṇaṃ pana kiñcāpi appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, maggassa pana āvajjanaṭṭhāniyattā
anya-e0104n0:273: Ayanti etāya sampattiyoti āyo, vuddhi. Tattha kosallanti tasmiṃ anatthahāniatthuppattilakkhaṇe āye kosallaṃ kusalatā nipuṇatā.
anya-e0104n0:274_0: Taṃ pana ekantikaṃ āyakosallaṃ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “ime dhamme”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:274_1: idaṃ vuccatīti yā imesaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ anuppattipahānesu, kusaladhammānañca uppattiṭṭhitīsu
anya-e0104n0:275_0: Vuddhilakkhaṇā āyato apetattā apāyo, avuddhi. Tattha kosallanti tasmiṃ atthahānianatthuppattilakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:275_1: apāye kosallaṃ kusalatā apāyakosallaṃ. Tampi pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “ime dhamme”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:275_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha idaṃ vuccatīti yā imesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ anuppajjananirujjhanesu,
anya-e0104n0:275_3: akusaladhammānaṃ vā uppattiṭṭhitīsu paññā, idaṃ apāyakosallaṃ nāmāti vuccati. Āyakosallaṃ
anya-e0104n0:275_4: tāva paññā hotu, apāyakosallaṃ kathaṃ paññā nāma jātāti? Evaṃ maññati “apāyuppādanasamatthatā
anya-e0104n0:275_5: apāyakosallaṃ nāma siyā”ti, taṃ pana tassa matimattaṃ. Kasmā? Paññavā eva hi “mayhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:275_6: evaṃ manasi karoto anuppannā kusalā dhammā nuppajjanti, uppannā nirujjhanti. Anuppannā
anya-e0104n0:275_7: akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā pavaḍḍhantī”ti pajānāti, so evaṃ ñatvā anuppanne
anya-e0104n0:275_8: akusale na uppādeti, uppanne pajahati. Anuppanne kusale uppādeti, uppanne bhāvanāpāripūriṃ
anya-e0104n0:276_0: Sabbatthāti sabbesu. Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānanti sattānaṃ taṃtaṃhitasukhadhammānaṃ. Taṅkhaṇappavattanti
anya-e0104n0:276_1: accāyike kicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanatthaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pavattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:276_2: Ṭhānena uppatti etassa atthīti ṭhānuppattikaṃ, ṭhānaso eva uppajjanakaṃ. Tatrupāyāti
anya-e0104n0:277_0: Gahetvāti “idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā pariggaṇhanavasena gahetvā. Ubhayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:277_1: gahetvāti “ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā”ti ubhayaṃ anupubbato pariggahetvā. Atha vā “yaṃ kiñci
anya-e0104n0:277_2: samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti ekappahāreneva sabbepi pañcakkhandhe
anya-e0104n0:277_3: avibhāgena pariggahetvā. Ayaṃ pana tikkhavipassakassa mahāpuññassa bhikkhuno vipassanābhiniveso.
anya-e0104n0:278_0: 428. Dukkhasaccaṃ ārabbhāti dukkhasaccaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā, tappaṭicchādakasammohavidhaṃsanavasena
anya-e0104n0:278_1: ca pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhe ñāṇaṃ. Dukkhasamudayaṃ ārabbhāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:278_2: sesapadadvayepi. Paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ hi catusaccaṃ ārabbha pavattañāṇaṃ nāma, tatiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:279_0: “Atthādīsu pabhedagatāni ñāṇānī”ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ pāḷivaseneva vivarituṃ
anya-e0104n0:279_1: “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāti yaṃ atthappabhedassa
anya-e0104n0:279_3: nāma. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Dhammappabhedassa hi sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:279_6: paṭibhāne pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Niruttipaṭibhānappabhedā tabbisayānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:280_0: Nibbānampi sampāpakahetuanusārena arīyati, adhigammatīti attho. “Yaṃ kiñci paccayasambhūta”nti
anya-e0104n0:280_1: etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni dukkhādīni gahitāni. Saccapaccayākāravāresu
anya-e0104n0:280_2: nibbānaṃ, pariyattivāre bhāsitattho, abhidhammabhājanīye vipāko, kiriyā cāti evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:280_3: pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ eva vasena pañca atthā veditabbā. Dahatīti vidahati, nibbattakahetuādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:280_4: sādhāraṇametaṃ nibbacanaṃ. Tadatthaṃ pana vibhāvetuṃ “pavatteti vā sampāpuṇituṃ vā
anya-e0104n0:280_5: detī”ti vuttaṃ. Tesu purimo attho maggavajjesu daṭṭhabbo. Bhāsitampi hi avabodhanavasena
anya-e0104n0:280_6: atthaṃ pavatteti, maggo pana nibbānaṃ pāpetīti tasmiṃ pacchimo attho. Nibbānaṃ hi
anya-e0104n0:280_7: pattabbo attho, bhāsitattho ñāpetabbo attho, itaro nibbattetabbo atthoti evaṃ tividho hoti.
anya-e0104n0:281_0: “Yo koci phalanibbattako hetū”ti etena saccahetudhammapaccayākāravāresu āgatāni samudayādīni
anya-e0104n0:281_1: gahitāni, saccapaccayākāravāresu maggo, pariyattivāre bhāsitaṃ, abhidhammabhājanīye
anya-e0104n0:281_2: kusalākusalanti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttānaṃ eva vasena pañca dhammā veditabbā. Tattha maggo
anya-e0104n0:281_3: sampāpako, bhāsitaṃ ñāpako, itaraṃ nibbattakoti evaṃ tividho hetu veditabbo. Ettha
anya-e0104n0:281_4: ca kiriyānaṃ avipākatāya dhammabhāvo na vutto. Yadi evaṃ vipākā na hontīti atthabhāvopi
anya-e0104n0:281_5: na vattabbo? Na, paccayuppannabhāvato. Evaṃ sati kusalākusalānampi atthabhāvo āpajjatīti
anya-e0104n0:281_6: ce? Nāyaṃ doso appaṭisiddhattā. Vipākassa pana padhānahetutāya pākaṭabhāvato dhammabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:281_7: eva tesaṃ vutto. Kiriyānaṃ paccayabhāvato dhammabhāvo āpajjatīti ce? Nāyaṃ doso appaṭisiddhattā.
anya-e0104n0:281_8: Kammaphalasambandhassa pana hetubhāvassābhāvato dhammabhāvo na vutto. Apica “ayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:281_9: imassa paccayo, ayaṃ paccayuppanno”ti etaṃ bhedamakatvā kevalaṃ kusalākusale, vipākakiriyādhamme
anya-e0104n0:281_10: ca paccavekkhantassa dhammatthapaṭisambhidā hontīti tesaṃ atthadhammatā na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:282: Ayameva hi atthoti yvāyaṃ atthadhammānaṃ pañcadhā vibhajanavasena attho vutto, ayameva abhidhamme vibhajitvā dassitoti sambandho.
