anya-e0104n0:283_1: aviparītaniruttīti attho. Tenāha “abyabhicārī vohāro”ti, tassa tassa atthassa bodhane
anya-e0104n0:283_2: paṭiniyatasambandho saddavohāroti attho. Tadabhilāpeti tassa sabhāvaniruttisaññitassa
anya-e0104n0:283_3: abyabhicārivohārassa abhilāpane. Sā panāyaṃ sabhāvanirutti māgadhabhāsā. Atthato
anya-e0104n0:283_4: nāmapaññattīti ācariyā. Apare pana yadi sabhāvanirutti paññattisabhāvā, evaṃ sati
anya-e0104n0:283_5: paññatti abhilapitabbā, na vacananti āpajjati. Na ca vacanato aññaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:283_6: uccāretabbaṃ atthi. Atha phassādivacanehi bodhetabbaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ, evañca sati
anya-e0104n0:283_7: atthadhammānampi bodhetabbattā tesampi niruttibhāvo āpajjati. Phassoti ca sabhāvanirutti,
anya-e0104n0:283_8: phassaṃ phassāti na sabhāvaniruttīti dassitovāyamattho. Na ca avacanaṃ evaṃpakāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:283_9: atthi. Tasmā vacanabhūtāya eva tassā sabhāvaniruttiyā abhilāpe uccāraṇeti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:284_0: Taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe
anya-e0104n0:284_2: nāma jātā, na paññattiārammaṇā”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā niruttisaddārammaṇāya
anya-e0104n0:284_3: sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato manodvāre niruttipaṭisambhidā pavattatīti vadanti. “Niruttipaṭisambhidā
anya-e0104n0:284_4: paccuppannārammaṇā”ti ca vacanasaddaṃ gahetvā pacchā jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti. Evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:284_5: pana aññasmiṃ paccuppannārammaṇe aññaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ vuttanti āpajjati. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:284_8: taṃvibhāvakaṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti vuccamāne na koci pāḷivirodho. “Taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ
anya-e0104n0:284_10: pavattentassā”ti na nasakkā vattuṃ. Tañhi ñāṇaṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ vibhāventameva taṃtaṃsaddapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:285_0: Sabbattha ñāṇanti sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ, sabbampi ñāṇanti adhippāyo. Tenāha “ñāṇārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:285_1: ñāṇa”nti. Sabbatthāti vā sabbesu atthādīsu, tīsu, catūsupi vā pavattattā, kusalakiriyābhūtāya
anya-e0104n0:285_2: paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya dhammatthabhāvato tīsu eva vā pavattattā “sabbattha ñāṇa”nti
anya-e0104n0:285_3: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “yathāvuttesu vā”tiādi. Tattha sagocarakiccādivasenāti sagocarassa,
anya-e0104n0:285_4: kiccādikassa ca vasena “idaṃ ñāṇaṃ idaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ iminā nāma
anya-e0104n0:286: 429. Pabhedaṃ gacchantīti anekabhedabhinnesu ārammaṇesu tesaṃ yāthāvato taṃtaṃpabhedāvabodhanasamatthataṃ upagacchanti.
anya-e0104n0:287: Mahāsāvakānañca asekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedaṃ gatāti sāmaññavidhinā dassitamatthaṃ apavādena nivattetuṃ ānandatthera-ggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:288_0: Etā paṭisambhidā. Sekkhabhūmiyaṃ pabhedagamanaṃ appavisayaṃ, asekkhabhūmiyaṃ bahuvisayanti
anya-e0104n0:288_1: āha “adhigamo nāma arahattappattī”ti, sātisayaṃ vā adhigamaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:288_2: Sekkhena pattānampi hi imāsaṃ arahattappattiyā visadabhāvādhigamoti. Pubbayogo viya
anya-e0104n0:288_3: pana arahattappatti arahatopi paṭisambhidāvisadatāya paccayo na na hotīti pañcannampi
anya-e0104n0:288_5: anavasesasaṅgaṇhanato buddhavacanavisayā eva pariyattiādayo dassitā. Pāḷiyā sajjhāyo
anya-e0104n0:288_6: pariyāpuṇanaṃ, tadatthasavanaṃ savanaṃ, parito sabbaso ñātuṃ icchā paripucchāti āha
anya-e0104n0:288_8: ca duviññeyyaṭṭhānaṃ vitthārato sanniṭṭhānakathāti attho. Yassa hi padassa attho
anya-e0104n0:288_9: duviññeyyo, taṃ gaṇṭhipadaṃ, yassa adhippāyo duviññeyyo, taṃ atthapadaṃ. Ādi-saddena
anya-e0104n0:288_10: khandhādipaṭisaṃyutte kathāmagge saṅgaṇhāti. Bhāvanānuyogasahitaṃ gataṃ, paccāgatañca
anya-e0104n0:288_11: etassa atthīti gatapaccāgatiko, tassa bhāvo, tena gatapaccāgatikabhāvena. Vasanaṭṭhānato
anya-e0104n0:288_12: yāva gocaragāmo, tato ca yāva vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyuttoti attho. Yāva anulomagotrabhusamīpanti
anya-e0104n0:289_0: Satthesūti anavajjesu sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahesu ganthesu. Tathā sippāyatanesūti etthāpi.
anya-e0104n0:289_1: Pubbakāle ekasatarājūnaṃ desabhāsā ekasatavohārā. Dhammapade yamakavaggo opammavaggoti
anya-e0104n0:289_2: vadanti, mūlapaṇṇāse yamakavaggo opammavaggo evāti apare. Sutapaṭibhānabahulānanti
anya-e0104n0:290_0: Sabbānīti pubbe vuttāni pañca, pacchā vuttāni aṭṭhapi vā. Sekkhaphalavimokkhapariyosāne
anya-e0104n0:290_2: pākaṭatarānīti vuttaṃ “dasa balāni viyā”ti, aññe vā sabbaññutaññāṇādayopi sabbe bhagavato
anya-e0104n0:292_0: 430. Imāya paññāyāti vipassanāpaññāya. Bhūmi sallakkhaṇādiggahaṇavasena pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:292_1: Ādi-saddena āhārādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Kasmā panete evaṃ bahudhammā bhūmibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:292_2: gayhanti, nanu khandhādīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhi hotīti? Na, tividhasattānuggahatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:292_3: khandhādittayaggahaṇaṃ kattabbaṃ, aññathā sabbasādhāraṇo anuggaho na kato siyā. Tividhā
anya-e0104n0:292_4: hi sattā rūpasammūḷhā arūpasammūḷhā ubhayasammūḷhāti. Tesu ye arūpasammūḷhā, tadatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:292_5: khandhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ catudhā vibhattattā. Ye rūpasammūḷhā, tadatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:292_6: āyatanānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ addhekādasadhā vibhattattā. Ye pana ubhayasammūḷhā, tadatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:292_7: dhātūnaṃ ubhayesampi vibhattattā. Tathā indriyabhedena tikkhindriyā majjhimindriyā
anya-e0104n0:292_8: mudindriyā, saṃkhittarucī majjhimarucī vitthārarucīti ca tividhā sattā, tesampi atthāya
anya-e0104n0:292_9: yathākkamaṃ khandhādiggahaṇaṃ katanti yojetabbaṃ. Indriyaggahaṇaṃ pana kāmaṃ ete
anya-e0104n0:292_10: dhammā issarā viya sahajātadhammesu issariyaṃ ādhipaccaṃ pavattenti, taṃ pana nesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:292_11: dhammasabhāvasiddhaṃ, na ettha kassaci vasībhāvo “suññā ete avasavattino”ti anattalakkhaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:292_12: sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ catubbidhampi pavattinivattitadubhayahetuvasena diṭṭhameva
anya-e0104n0:292_13: upakārāvahaṃ, na aññathāti saccādidvayaṃ gahitaṃ. Ādi-saddena gahitadhammesupi ayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:292_14: nayo netabbo. Mūlaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvato. Sati hi sīlavisuddhiyaṃ, cittavisuddhiyañca
anya-e0104n0:292_15: ayaṃ paññā mūlajātā hoti, nāsatīti. Sarīraṃ paribrūhetabbato. Imissā hi paññāya santānavasena
anya-e0104n0:292_16: pavattamānāya pādapāṇisīsaṭṭhāniyā diṭṭhivisuddhiādikā imā pañca visuddhiyo avayavena
anya-e0104n0:293_0: 431. Pañca khandhāti ettha pañcāti gaṇanaparicchedo, tena na tato heṭṭhā, na uddhanti
anya-e0104n0:293_1: dasseti. Khandhāti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. Yasmā cettha khandha-saddo rāsaṭṭho
anya-e0104n0:293_2: “mahāudakakkhandho”tiādīsu viya, tasmā atītādivibhāgabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ rāsivasena
anya-e0104n0:293_3: buddhiyā ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “rūpameva khandho rūpakkhandho”ti samānādhikaraṇasamāso
anya-e0104n0:293_4: daṭṭhabbo. “Tīhi khandhehi iṇaṃ dassāmā”tiādīsu viya koṭṭhāsaṭṭhe pana khandha-sadde
anya-e0104n0:293_5: nibbānassāpi khandhantarabhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati atītādivibhāgābhāvato. Na hi
anya-e0104n0:293_6: ekassa niccassa sato nibbānassa atītādivibhāgo atthīti. Paṭhamenatthena rūparāsīti
anya-e0104n0:293_7: attho, dutiyena rūpakoṭṭhāsoti. Vedanākkhandhotiādīsupi eseva nayo. Kasmā panete
anya-e0104n0:293_8: khandhā pañceva vuttā iminā eva ca kamenāti? Bhājanabhojanabyañjanabhattakārakabhuñjakavikappadassanato,
anya-e0104n0:293_10: kammahetutañca cintetvā vedanāsaññā saṅkhārakkhandhato nīharitvā visuṃ khandhabhāvena desitā.
anya-e0104n0:295_0: 432. Tatthāti tesu pañcasu khandhesu. Yaṃ kiñcīti anavasesapariyādānaṃ. Ruppanalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0104n0:295_1: atippasaṅganiyamanaṃ. Yaṃ-saddena hi sanipātena kiṃ-saddena ca gahitena aniyamatthatāya
anya-e0104n0:295_2: atippasaṅge āpanne taṃ ruppanasaddo nivatteti, tena rūpassa anavasesapariggaho kato
anya-e0104n0:295_3: hoti. Sītādīhīti sītuṇhajighacchāpipāsādīhi. Hetuatthe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Ruppanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:295_4: lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ. Dhammo eva dhammajātaṃ. Ruppanañcettha sītādivirodhipaccayasannipāte
anya-e0104n0:295_5: visadisuppatti. Nanu ca arūpadhammānampi virodhipaccayasamāgame visadisuppatti labbhatīti?
anya-e0104n0:295_6: Saccaṃ labbhati, na pana vibhūtataraṃ. Vibhūtataraṃ hettha ruppanaṃ adhippetaṃ sītādiggahaṇato.
anya-e0104n0:295_7: Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ brahmaloke rūpasamaññā? Tatthāpi taṃsabhāvānativattanato hotiyeva
anya-e0104n0:295_8: rūpasamaññā, anuggāhakapaccayavasena vā. Virodhipaccayasannipāte yo attano santāne
anya-e0104n0:295_9: bhinne bhijjamānasseva visadisuppattihetubhāvo, taṃ ruppananti aññe. Imasmiṃ pakkhe
anya-e0104n0:295_10: rūpayati vikāraṃ āpādetīti rūpaṃ, purimapakkhe pana ruppatīti. Saṅghaṭṭanena vikārāpattiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:295_11: ruppanasaddo niruḷhoti keci. Imasmiṃ pakkhe arūpadhammesu rūpasamaññāya pasaṅgo eva
anya-e0104n0:295_12: natthi saṅghaṭṭanābhāvato. Paṭighāto ruppananti apare. Sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvāti rāsaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:296: Bhūtopādāyabhedatoti ettha tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavati ettha upādāyarūpanti bhūtaṃ. Bhūtāni upādiyateva, na pana sayaṃ tehi, aññehi vā upādīyatīti upādāyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:297_0: Kāmaṃ catudhātuvavatthāne vacanatthāditopi bhūtāni vibhāvitāneva, sabhāvadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:297_2: vuttānī”ti. Tattha padaṭṭhānassa avuttattā āha “padaṭṭhānato panā”tiādi. Avacanañca
anya-e0104n0:297_3: tassa tassatthassa paccayatoti ettha pakārantarena vibhāvitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sabbāpīti
anya-e0104n0:297_4: catassopi dhātuyo. Āposaṅgahitāya tejonupālitāya vāyovitthambhitāya eva pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0104n0:297_5: pavatti, na aññathāti sā sesabhūtattayapadaṭṭhānā, evamitarāpīti āha “avasesadhātuttayapadaṭṭhānā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:298_0: Catuvīsatividhanti gaṇanaparicchedo balarūpādīnaṃ paṭisedhanattho. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:298_1: taṃ parato āvi bhavissati. Cakkhatīti cakkhu, viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ assādentaṃ
anya-e0104n0:298_2: viya hotīti attho. Cakkhatīti hi ayaṃ cakkhati-saddo “madhuṃ cakkhati, byañjanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:298_3: cakkhatī”tiādīsu viya assādanattho. Vuttañhetaṃ “cakkhuṃ kho, māgaṇḍiya, rūpārāmaṃ
anya-e0104n0:298_4: rūparataṃ rūpasamudita”nti. Aṭṭhakathāyampi vuccati “rūpesu āviñchanarasa”nti. Satipi
anya-e0104n0:298_5: sotādīnaṃ saddārammaṇādibhāve niruḷhattā dassane eva cakkhu-saddo pavattati padumādīsu
anya-e0104n0:298_6: paṅkajādisaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā cakkhatīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:298_7: ācikkhantaṃ viya abhibyattaṃ vadantaṃ viya hotīti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vibhāveti
anya-e0104n0:298_8: cā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ vibhāvanatthatāpi cakkhati-saddassa sambhavatīti
anya-e0104n0:298_9: katvā vuttaṃ. Suṇāti etena, viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ sayaṃ vā suṇātīti sotaṃ. Ghāyati etena,
anya-e0104n0:298_10: sayaṃ vā ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitanimittaṃ āhāraraso
anya-e0104n0:298_11: jīvitaṃ, tasmiṃ ninnatāya taṃ avhāyatīti jivhā niruttinayena. Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:298_12: āyo uppattiṭṭhānanti kāyo anuttariyahetubhāvaṃ anāgacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu,
anya-e0104n0:298_13: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesato sāsavapaccayattā.
anya-e0104n0:298_14: Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti. Kāyindriyavatthukā vā
anya-e0104n0:298_15: cattāro khandhā balavakāmāsavādihetubhāvato visesena sāsavāti kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:298_16: āyoti kāyo vutto. Vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ rūpayatīti rūpaṃ, rūpamiva
anya-e0104n0:298_17: pakāsaṃ karoti saviggahamiva dassetīti attho. Anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho
anya-e0104n0:298_18: eva rūpasaddo daṭṭhabbo. Sappatīti saddo, udāharīyati, sakehi vā paccayehi sappīyati
anya-e0104n0:298_19: sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ upanīyatīti attho. Gandhayatīti gandho, attano vatthuṃ sūcayati
anya-e0104n0:298_20: apākaṭaṃ “idaṃ sugandhaṃ, duggandha”nti pakāseti, paṭicchannaṃ vā pupphaphalādiṃ
anya-e0104n0:298_21: “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti attho. Rasanti taṃ sattāti raso, asādentīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:299_0: Itthiyāva indriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ, tathā purisindriyaṃ. Jīvanti tena sahajātadhammāti
anya-e0104n0:299_1: jīvitaṃ, tadeva indriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ. Hadayañca taṃ vatthu ca, hadayassa vā manoviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:299_2: vatthu hadayavatthu. Copanakāyabhāvato kāyo ca so adhippāyaviññāpanato viññatti cāti
anya-e0104n0:299_3: kāyaviññatti. Copanavācābhāvato, adhippāyaviññāpanato ca vacī ca sā viññatti cāti
anya-e0104n0:299_4: vacīviññatti. Viggahābhāvato na kassati, kasituṃ chindituṃ na sakkā, na vā kāsati
anya-e0104n0:299_5: dibbatīti akāsaṃ, akāsameva ākāsaṃ, tadeva nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena ākāsadhātu. Rūpassāti
anya-e0104n0:299_6: nipphannarūpassa. Lahubhāvo lahutā. Sayaṃ anipphannatāya “rūpassā”ti visesitaṃ. Esa
anya-e0104n0:299_7: nayo sesesupi. Ayaṃ pana viseso – kammani sādhu kammaññaṃ, tassa bhāvo kammaññatā.
anya-e0104n0:299_8: Paṭhamaṃ, upari ca cayo pavatti upacayo. Pubbāparavasena sambandhā tati pavatti santati.
anya-e0104n0:299_9: Aniccassa vināsino bhāvo aniccatā. Kabalaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāro. Āharatīti āhāro.
anya-e0104n0:300_0: Kamato pana sabbesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ nissayabhāvena mūlabhūtattā paṭhamaṃ bhūtarūpāni
anya-e0104n0:300_1: uddiṭṭhāni. Itaresu ajjhattikabhāvena attabhāvasamaññāya mūlabhāvato cakkhādīni pañca
anya-e0104n0:300_2: ādito uddiṭṭhāni. Tesaṃ visayīnaṃ ime visayāti dassetuṃ rūpādīni cattāri uddiṭṭhāni.
anya-e0104n0:300_3: Phoṭṭhabbaṃ pana anupādārūpattā, bhūtaggahaṇena gahitattā ca idha na gahitaṃ. Svāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:300_4: attabhāvo imehi “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:300_5: itthipurisindriyadvayaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ. “Iminā jīvatī”ti vohāraṃ labbhatīti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:300_6: tato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tassa imaṃ nissāya viññāṇappavattiyaṃ attahitādisiddhīti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:300_7: hadayavatthu. Tassa imāsaṃ vasena sabbe kāyavacīpayogāti dassanatthaṃ viññattidvayaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:300_8: Imāya rūpakāyassa paricchedo, añjaso cāti dassanatthaṃ ākāsadhātu. Imehissa sukhappavatti,
anya-e0104n0:300_9: uppattiādayo cāti dassanatthaṃ lahutādayo. Sabbo cāyaṃ catusantatirūpasantāno iminā
anya-e0104n0:300_10: upatthambhīyatīti dassanatthaṃ ante kabaḷīkāro āhāro uddiṭṭhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:301_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu upādārūpesu. Rūpe, rūpassa vā abhighāto rūpābhighāto,
anya-e0104n0:301_2: taṃ arahatīti rūpābhighātāraho, rūpābhighāto hotu vā mā vā evaṃsabhāvo catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:301_3: pasādo rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādo, evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ cakkhūti attho. Yasmā paccayantarasahito
anya-e0104n0:301_4: eva cakkhupasādo rūpābhihananavasena pavattati, na kevalo. Tasmā taṃsabhāvatāva pamāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:301_5: na rūpābhighātoti dassanatthaṃ rūpābhighātārahatā vuttā yathā vipākārahaṃ kusalākusalanti.
anya-e0104n0:301_6: Abhighāto ca visayavisayīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ abhimukhībhāvo yogyadesāvaṭṭhānaṃ abhighāto
anya-e0104n0:301_7: viyāti katvā. So rūpe cakkhussa, rūpassa vā cakkhumhi hoti. Tenāha “yaṃ cakkhu anidassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:301_8: sappaṭighaṃ rūpamhi sanidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā”ti, “yamhi cakkhumhi
anya-e0104n0:301_9: anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ paṭihaññi vā paṭihaññati
anya-e0104n0:301_11: kāmataṇhā, rūpataṇhā ca tadāyatanikabhavapatthanābhāvato daṭṭhukāmatādivohāraṃ arahatīti
anya-e0104n0:301_12: dutiyanayo sabbattha vutto. Tattha daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ etesanti
anya-e0104n0:301_14: pasādo, evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ cakkhu. Tassa tassa hi bhavassa mūlakāraṇabhūtā taṇhā tasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:301_15: tasmiṃ bhave uppajjanārahāyatanavisayāpi nāma hotīti kāmataṇhādīnaṃ daṭṭhukāmatādivohārārahatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:302_0: Daṭṭhukāmatāti hi daṭṭhumicchā, rūpataṇhāti attho. Ettha ca daṭṭhukāmatāya, sesānañca
anya-e0104n0:302_2: asati pana maggena asamugghātitabhāvoyeva kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yato maggena asamucchinnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:302_3: kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjitvā attano phalassa paccayabhāvūpagamanato vijjamānamevāti
anya-e0104n0:302_4: uppannatā atthitā pariyāyehi vuccati “ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:302_5: maggaṃ bahulīkaronto uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:302_6: “santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ kāmacchando’ti pajānātī”ti ca evamādīsu.
anya-e0104n0:303_0: Rūpesu puggalassa, viññāṇassa vā āviñchanarasaṃ. Ādhārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ nissayapaccayabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:303_1: Daṭṭhukāmatānidānakammajabhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ yesaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasādo, tevassa āsannakāraṇanti
anya-e0104n0:303_3: vuttaṃ kāraṇavisesassa anāmaṭṭhattā. “Evarūpaṃ nāma me cakkhu hotū”ti evaṃ nibbattitaāveṇikakammavasena
anya-e0104n0:303_4: dutiyanti vadanti. Satipi pana pañcannaṃ pasādabhāvasāmaññe savisayāvabhāsanasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0104n0:303_5: pasādabyāpārassa vasena purimaṃ vuttaṃ. Pasādakāraṇassa satipi kammabhāvasāmaññe,
anya-e0104n0:303_6: ekatte vā attano kāraṇabhedena bhedadassanavasena dutiyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sotādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:304_0: Etthāha – cakkhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ kiṃ ekakammunā uppatti, udāhu nānākammunāti? Ubhayathāpīti
anya-e0104n0:304_1: porāṇā. Tattha nānākammunā tāva uppattiyaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visese vattabbaṃ natthi kāraṇassa
anya-e0104n0:304_2: bhinnattā. Ekakammunā pana uppattiyaṃ kathaṃ nesaṃ visesoti? Kāraṇassa bhinnattā
anya-e0104n0:304_3: eva. Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:304_5: Yato tadāhitavisesaṃ taṃ tathārūpasamatthatāyogenānekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekaṃ visiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:304_6: phalaṃ nibbatteti. Na cettha samatthatā samatthabhāvato aññā veditabbā kāraṇavisesena
anya-e0104n0:304_7: āhitavisesassa visiṭṭhaphalanipphādanayogyatāmattato. Ayañca ekassapi kammassa anekindriyahetutāvisesayogo
anya-e0104n0:304_8: yuttito, āgamanato ca parato āgamissati. Apica ekasseva kusalacittassa soḷasādivipākacittanibbattihetutā
anya-e0104n0:304_10: dissateva, kiṃ vā etāya yutticintāya. Yato kammaphalaṃ cakkhādīni, kammavipāko ca
anya-e0104n0:305_0: 434. Kecīti mahāsaṅghikesu ekacce. Tesu hi vasudhammo evaṃ vadati “cakkhumhi tejo
anya-e0104n0:305_1: adhikaṃ, sote vāyu, ghāne pathavī, jivhāya āpo, kāye sabbepi samā”ti. Cakkhādīsu
anya-e0104n0:305_2: tejādiadhikatā nāma tannissayabhūtānaṃ tadadhikatāyāti dassento “tejādhikānaṃ bhūtānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:305_3: pasādo cakkhū”tiādimāha. Kāyo sabbesanti ko ettha viseso, nanu tejādiadhikānañca
anya-e0104n0:305_4: bhūtānaṃ pasādā sabbesaṃyevāti? Saccametaṃ, idaṃ pana “sabbesa”nti vacanaṃ samānānanti
anya-e0104n0:305_5: imamatthaṃ dīpeti anuvattamānassa ekadesādhikabhāvassa nivāraṇavasena vuttattā. Tejādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:305_6: hi paccekaṃ adhikabhāve viya dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vā adhikabhāvepi yathāvuttādhikabhāveneva
anya-e0104n0:305_7: ekakādivasena labbhamānāya omattatāyapi kāyappasādo na hotīti pākaṭoyamattho. Tasmā
anya-e0104n0:305_8: catunnampi bhūtānaṃ samabhāvena kāyappasādo hotīti sabbasaddo idha samabhāvadīpako
anya-e0104n0:305_9: daṭṭhabbo. Tejādīnanti padīpasaṅkhātassa tejassa obhāsarūpena, vāyussa saddena, pathaviyā
anya-e0104n0:305_10: gandhena, kheḷasaṅkhātassa udakassa rasenāti purimavāde, pacchimavāde ca yathāyogaṃ
anya-e0104n0:305_11: taṃtaṃbhūtaguṇehi anuggayhabhāvato, rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇe upakāritabbatoti attho. Ālokādisahakārīkāraṇasahitānaṃyeva
anya-e0104n0:305_12: cakkhādīnaṃ rūpādiavabhāsanasamatthatā, vivarassa ca sotaviññāṇūpanissayabhāvo guṇoti
anya-e0104n0:305_13: tesaṃ laddhi. Tejādīnaṃ viya pana vivarassa bhūtabhāvābhāvato yathāyoga-ggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:305_14: Atha vā rūpādayo viya vivarampi bhūtaguṇoti parādhippāye tejassa ālokarūpena, ākāsasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0104n0:305_15: vivarassa saddena, vāyussa gandhena, udakassa rasena, pathaviyā phoṭṭhabbenāti evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:306_0: Rūpādīnaṃ adhikabhāvadassanatoti aggimhi rūpassa pabhassarassa, vāyumhi saddassa
anya-e0104n0:306_1: sabhāvena suyyamānassa, pathaviyā surabhiādino gandhassa, āpe ca rasassa madhurassāti
anya-e0104n0:306_2: imesaṃ visesayuttānaṃ dassanato “rūpādayo tesaṃ guṇā”ti paṭhamavādī āhāti. Tasseva
anya-e0104n0:306_3: “iccheyyāmā”tiādinā uttaramāha. Imināva upāyena dutiyavādinopi niggaho hotīti. Atha
anya-e0104n0:306_4: vā rūpādivisesaguṇehi tejaākāsapathavīāpavāyūhi cakkhādīni katānīti vadantassa kaṇādassa
anya-e0104n0:306_5: vādaṃ uddharitvā taṃ niggahetuṃ “athāpi vadeyyu”ntiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Āsave
anya-e0104n0:306_6: upalabbhamānopi gandho pathaviyā āposaṃyuttāya kappāsato visadisāyāti na kappāsagandhassa
anya-e0104n0:306_7: adhikabhāvāpattīti ce? Na, anabhibhūtattā. Āsave hi udakasaṃyuttā pathavī udakena
anya-e0104n0:306_8: abhibhūtā, na kappāsapathavīti tassa eva gandhena adhikena bhavitabbaṃ. Uṇhodakasaṃyutto
anya-e0104n0:306_9: ca aggi upalabbhanīyo mahantoti katvā tassa phasso viya vaṇṇopi pabhassaro upalabbheyyāti
anya-e0104n0:306_10: uṇhodake vaṇṇato agginā anabhisambandhassa sītodakassa vaṇṇo parihāyetha. Tasmāti
anya-e0104n0:306_11: etassa ubhayassa abhāvā. Tadabhāvena hi rūpādīnaṃ tejādivisesaguṇatā nivattitā. Tannivattanena
anya-e0104n0:306_12: “tejādīnaṃ guṇehi rūpādīhi anuggayhabhāvato”ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ nivattitanti evaṃ paramparāya
anya-e0104n0:306_13: ubhayābhāvo visesaparikappanapahānassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti āha “tasmā pahāyeta”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:306_14: Ekakalāpepi rūparasādayo visadisā, ko pana vādo nānākalāpe cakkhādayo bhūtavisesābhāvepīti
anya-e0104n0:307_0: Yadi bhūtaviseso natthi, kiṃ pana cakkhādivisesassa kāraṇanti taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ aññamaññassā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:307_2: aññamaññassa asādhāraṇanti ca kammavisesoti ca vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi taṃ yena
anya-e0104n0:307_3: visesena cakkhussa paccayo, teneva sotassa paccayo hoti indriyantarābhāvappattito.
anya-e0104n0:307_4: “Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatā cetanā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanena
anya-e0104n0:307_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vijjamānānaṃ sabbesaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ ekā cetanā kammapaccayo hotīti
anya-e0104n0:307_6: viññāyati. Nānācetanāya hi tadā indriyuppattiyaṃ sati parittena ca mahaggatena ca
anya-e0104n0:307_7: kammunā nibbattitaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ āpajjeyyāti. Na cekā paṭisandhi anekakammanibbattā
anya-e0104n0:308_0: 435. Anallīno nissayo etassāti anallīnanissayo, rūpasaddasaṅkhāto visayo. Gandharasānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:308_1: nissayā ghānajivhānaṃ nissaye allīyantīti te nissayavasena allīnā. Phoṭṭhabbaṃ sayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:308_2: kāyanissayaallīnaṃ bhūtattā. Aparo nayo – cakkhusotāni appattavisayaggāhakāni sāntare,
anya-e0104n0:308_3: adhike ca visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato. Sotampi sampattavisayaggāhīti keci. Yadi
anya-e0104n0:308_4: sotaṃ sampattaggāhi, cittajo saddo sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ na siyā. Na hi bahiddhā
anya-e0104n0:308_5: cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ uppatti atthi. Pāḷiyañca avisesena saddārammaṇassa sotaviññāṇārammaṇabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:308_6: vutto. Kiñca disādesavavatthānañca saddassa na siyā, attano visayipadesassa eva gahetabbato
anya-e0104n0:308_7: gandho viya. Tasmā yattha uppanno saddo, tattheva ṭhito. Sace sotapathe āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0104n0:308_8: nanu dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā cirena suyyantīti? Na dūrāsannānaṃ yathāpākaṭe sadde
anya-e0104n0:308_9: gahaṇavisesato. Yathā hi dūrāsannānaṃ vacanasadde yathāpākaṭe gahaṇavisesato ākāravisesānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:308_10: aggahaṇaṃ, gahaṇañca hoti, evaṃ rajakādisaddepi āsannassa ādito pabhuti yāva avasānā
anya-e0104n0:308_11: kamena pākaṭībhūte, dūrassa ca avasāne, majjhe vā piṇḍavasena pavattipākaṭībhūte
anya-e0104n0:308_12: nicchayaggahaṇānaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattānaṃ visesato lahukaṃ suto “cirena
anya-e0104n0:308_13: suto”ti adhimāno hoti. So pana saddo yattha uppanno, tannissitova attano vijjamānakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:308_14: sotassa āpāthamāgacchati. Yadi saddassa bhūtaparamparāya samantato pavatti natthi,
anya-e0104n0:308_15: kathaṃ paṭighosuppattīti? Dūre ṭhitopi saddo aññattha paṭighosuppattiyā, bhājanādicalanassa
anya-e0104n0:308_16: ca ayokanto viya ayocalanassa paccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:309_0: 436. Pubbe lakkhaṇādinā vibhāvitampi cakkhuṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānādito vibhāvetuṃ “cakkhu cetthā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:309_1: āraddhaṃ. Tattha cakkhu sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. Ca-kāro byatirekattho,
anya-e0104n0:309_2: tenassa vuccamānameva visesaṃ joteti. Etthāti etesu yathāniddiṭṭhesu pañcasu upādārūpesu.
anya-e0104n0:309_4: satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāheva attano nissayabhūtāhi catūhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:309_5: tannissiteheva āyuvaṇṇādīhi anupālitaṃ parivāritaṃ tisantatirūpasamuṭṭhāpakehi utucittāhārehi
anya-e0104n0:309_7: dasseti. Pamāṇato ūkāsiramattanti ūkāsiramatte padese pavattanato vuttaṃ. Cakkhuviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:309_9: samavasaraṭṭhānato. Taṃ panetaṃ cakkhu adhiṭṭhānabhedato, tatthāpi paccekaṃ anekakalāpagatabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:309_10: anekampi samānaṃ sāmaññaniddesena āvajjanāya ekattā, ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva ca kiccakarattā
anya-e0104n0:309_11: ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Evampi bahūsu kathamekasseva kiccakarattaṃ. Yaṃ tattha visadaṃ
anya-e0104n0:309_12: hutvā rūpābhighātārahaṃ, taṃ viññāṇassa nissayo hotīti gahetabbaṃ. Phoṭṭhabbaviseso
anya-e0104n0:310: Manupassatīti ma-kāro padasandhikaro, atha vā manūti macco.
anya-e0104n0:312_0: Visamajjhāsayatāya cakkhu vammikachiddābhiratasappo viya, bilajjhāsayatāya sotaṃ
anya-e0104n0:312_1: udakabilābhiratakumbhīlo viya, ākāsajjhāsayatāya ghānaṃ ajaṭākāsābhiratapakkhī viya,
anya-e0104n0:312_2: gāmajjhāsayatāya jivhā gāmābhiratakukkuro viya, upādinnakajjhāsayatāya kāyo āmakasusānābhiratasiṅgālo
anya-e0104n0:312_3: viya passitabboti dassento “vammi…pe… daṭṭhabbā”ti āha. Visamajjhāsayatā ca cakkhussa
anya-e0104n0:312_4: visamajjhāsayaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttā, cakkhumato vā puggalassa ajjhāsayavasena
anya-e0104n0:312_5: cakkhu visamajjhāsayaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Sabbopi ca yathāvutto papañco
anya-e0104n0:313_0: 437. Cakkhumhi, cakkhussa vā paṭihananaṃ cakkhupaṭihananaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti
anya-e0104n0:313_2: ārammaṇapaccayatā. Kāmaṃ sā eva gocaratā, tathāpi visayagocarānaṃ ayaṃ viseso – anaññatthabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:313_3: tabbahulacāritā ca cakkhuviññāṇassa. Visayabhāve cassa yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato
anya-e0104n0:314_0: 438. Itthiyā bhāvo, “itthī”ti vā bhavati etena cittaṃ, abhidhānañcāti itthibhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:314_1: taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti itthibhāvalakkhaṇaṃ. Tato eva “itthī”ti taṃsahitaṃ santānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:314_2: pakāsentaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “itthīti pakāsanarasa”nti. Vaṭṭaṃsatā avisadahatthapādāditā
anya-e0104n0:314_3: ca itthiliṅgaṃ. Thanamaṃsāvisadatā, nimmassudāṭhitā, kesabandhanaṃ, vatthaggahaṇañca
anya-e0104n0:314_5: kīḷā, mattikatakkena suttakantanādi ca itthikuttaṃ, itthikiriyāti attho. Avisadaṭṭhānagamanādiko
anya-e0104n0:314_6: ākāro itthākappo. Aparo nayo – itthīnaṃ muttakaraṇaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ. Sarādhippāyā itthinimittaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:314_8: Imāni ca itthiliṅgādīni yathāsakaṃ kammādinā paccayena uppajjamānānipi yebhuyyena
anya-e0104n0:314_9: itthindriyasahite eva santāne taṃtadākārāni hutvā uppajjantīti itthindriyaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:314_11: Itthiliṅgādīsu eva ca kāraṇabhāvasaṅkhātena adhipatibhāvena tassa indriyatā vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:314_12: indriyasahite santāne itthiliṅgādiākārarūpapaccayānaṃ aññathā anuppādanato, itthiggahaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:315_0: Yasmā pana bhāvadasakepi rūpānaṃ itthindriyaṃ na janakaṃ, nāpi anupālakaṃ, upatthambhakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:315_1: vā, na ca aññesaṃ kalāparūpānaṃ, tasmā taṃ jīvitindriyaṃ viya sakalāparūpānaṃ, āhāro
anya-e0104n0:315_2: viya vā kalāpantararūpānañca “indriyaatthiavigatapaccayo”ti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ. Yasmā
anya-e0104n0:315_3: ca paccayantarādhīnāni liṅgādīni, tasmā yatthassa ādhipaccaṃ, taṃsadisesu matacittakatarūpesupi
anya-e0104n0:315_4: taṃsaṇṭhānatā dissati. Esa nayo purisindriyepi. Yaṃ panettha visadisaṃ, taṃ vuttanayānusārena
anya-e0104n0:315_5: veditabbaṃ. Tayidaṃ dvayaṃ yasmā ekasmiṃ santāne saha na pavattati “yassa itthindriyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:315_6: uppajjati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No”tiādi vacanato, tasmā ubhatobyañjanakassāpi
anya-e0104n0:315_7: ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekameva hotīti veditabbaṃ. Ye pana “sarīrekadesavutti bhāvarūpa”nti
anya-e0104n0:315_8: vadanti, tesampi taṃ micchāti dassetuṃ “tadubhayampi…pe… byāpakamevā”ti vatvā yadi
anya-e0104n0:315_9: evaṃ kāyappasādena saṅkaro siyāti āsaṅkaṃ nivattento “na ca kāyappasādenā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:315_10: Tassattho – yadipi sakalasarīrabyāpitāya kāyappasādena aṭṭhitokāse ṭhitanti vattabbataṃ
anya-e0104n0:315_11: nāpajjati, tena pana bhinnanissayattā ṭhitokāse ṭhitantipi vattabbataṃ nāpajjatīti
anya-e0104n0:315_12: ayameva cettha nippariyāyakathā. “Rūparasādayo viyā”ti etena samānanissayesupi nāma
anya-e0104n0:315_13: saṅkaro natthi lakkhaṇabhedato, kimaṅgaṃ pana bhinnanissayasabhāvesūti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:316_1: ekantakammajattā sahaja-ggahaṇeneva anupāletabbānampi kammajabhāvo siddhoti kammaja-ggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:316_2: na kataṃ. Yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyinopi kammajarūpassa pavattihetubhāvena taṃ anupālakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:316_3: tasmā sahajarūpānupālanalakkhaṇaṃ. Na hi kammajānaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitihetu bhavituṃ
anya-e0104n0:316_4: arahati āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Taṅkhaṇābhāvato. Tesanti sahajarūpānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:316_5: Pavattanaṃ yāpanaṃ. Ṭhapanaṃ ṭhitihetutā. Attanā anupālanavasena yāpetabbāni pavattetabbāni
anya-e0104n0:316_7: ādi-saddena pavattanarasādimeva saṅgaṇhāti. Atthikkhaṇeyevāti anupāletabbānaṃ atthikkhaṇeyeva.
anya-e0104n0:316_8: Asati anupāletabbe uppalādimhi kiṃ udakaṃ anupāleyya. Yadi kammajānaṃ ṭhitihetumantarena
anya-e0104n0:316_9: ṭhiti na hoti, jīvitindriyassa ko ṭhitihetūti āha “saya”ntiādi. Yadi kammajānaṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:316_10: jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ, atha kasmā sabbakālaṃ na ṭhapetīti āha “na bhaṅgato”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:316_11: Tassa tassa anupālanādikassa sādhanato. Taṃ sādhanañca jīvamānatāvisesassa paccayabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:316_12: Indriyabaddharūpassa hi matarūpato kammajassa, tadanubandhabhūtassa ca utusamuṭṭhānādito
anya-e0104n0:316_13: jīvitindriyakato viseso, na kevalaṃ khaṇaṭṭhitiyā eva, pabandhānupacchedassāpi jīvitindriyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:316_14: kāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, itarathā āyukkhayato maraṇaṃ na yujjeyyāti.
anya-e0104n0:317_1: Āgamato, yuttito ca. “Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca pavattanti,
anya-e0104n0:317_2: taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:317_3: paccayo”ti evamādi āgamo. Yadi evaṃ, kasmā rūpakaṇḍe taṃ na vuttanti? Tattha avacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:317_4: aññakāraṇaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti? Desanābhedo. Yathā hi cakkhuviññāṇādīni ekantato cakkhādinissayāni,
anya-e0104n0:317_5: na evaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ ekantena hadayavatthunissayaṃ. Nissitavasena ca vatthudukādidesanā
anya-e0104n0:317_6: pavattā “atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu, atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa na vatthū”tiādinā.
anya-e0104n0:317_7: Yampi ekantato hadayavatthunissayaṃ, tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:317_8: dukādīsu vuccamānesupi na tadanuguṇā ārammaṇadukādayo sambhavanti. Na hi “atthi rūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:317_9: manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa”nti sakkā vattunti
anya-e0104n0:317_10: vatthārammaṇadukā bhinnagatikā siyunti ekarasā desanā na bhaveyya. Ekarasañca desanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:317_11: desetuṃ idha satthu ajjhāsayo. Tasmā tattha hadayavatthu na vuttaṃ, na alabbhamānattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:318_0: Yutti pana evaṃ veditabbā – nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ dhātudvayaṃ pañcavokārabhave.
anya-e0104n0:318_1: Tattha rūpāyatanādīnaṃ, ojāya ca indriyabaddhato bahipi pavattidassanato na taṃnissayatā
anya-e0104n0:318_2: yujjati, itthipurisindriyānampi tadubhayarahitepi santāne dhātudvayadassanato na
anya-e0104n0:318_3: taṃnissayatā yujjati, jīvitindriyassāpi aññakiccaṃ vijjatīti na taṃnissayatā yujjati
anya-e0104n0:318_4: evāti pārisesato hadayavatthu, tesaṃ nissayoti viññāyati. Sakkā hi vattuṃ nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:318_5: dhātudvayaṃ pañcavokārabhave rūpapaṭibaddhavuttibhāvato. Yaṃ yañhi rūpapaṭibaddhavutti,
anya-e0104n0:318_7: ca visesanaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuvasena kataṃ. Manodhātu pana catuvokārabhave nattheva.
anya-e0104n0:318_8: Nanu ca indriyanissayatāyapi sādhanato viruddho hetu āpajjatīti? Na diṭṭhabādhanato.
anya-e0104n0:318_9: Diṭṭhaṃ hetaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa viya dhātudvayassa vatthuno mandatikkhādiananuvidhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:318_10: Tathā hissa pāḷiyaṃ indriyapaccayatā na vuttā. Tena tadanuvidhānasaṅkhātā indriyanissayatā
anya-e0104n0:318_11: bādhīyati. Hotu dhātudvayanissayo hadayavatthu, upādāyarūpañca, etaṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:318_12: paṭiniyatakiccaṃ, hadayapadese ṭhitamevāti kathaṃ viññāyatīti? Vuccate – vatthurūpabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:318_13: kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ cakkhu viya, tato eva paṭiniyatakiccaṃ, vatthurūpabhāvatoti ca viññāṇanissayabhāvatoti
anya-e0104n0:318_14: attho. Aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā kiñci cintentassa hadayassa
anya-e0104n0:318_15: khijjanato tatthetamavaṭṭhitanti viññāyati. Tāsaññeva dhātūnanti manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃyeva.
anya-e0104n0:318_16: Nissayabhāvato upari āropetvā vahantaṃ viya paccupatiṭṭhatīti ubbahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:319_0: 441. Abhikkamo ādi yesaṃ te abhikkamādī. Ādi-saddena paṭikkamasamiñjanapasāraṇaukkhepanaavekkhepanādikā
anya-e0104n0:319_1: sabbā kiriyā pariggayhati. Tesaṃ abhikkamādīnaṃ pavattakaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassā
anya-e0104n0:319_2: sā abhikkamādippavattakacittasamuṭṭhānā, vāyodhātu. Tassā yaṃ sahajarūpakāyassa thambhanasandhāraṇacalanasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:319_3: kiccaṃ, tassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūto ākāraviseso kāyaviññatti nāmāti dassento āha “abhikkamādi…pe… kāyaviññattī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:320_0: Kassa pana ākāravikāroti? Sāmatthiyato vāyodhātuadhikānaṃ cittajamahābhūtānaṃ. Kiṃ
anya-e0104n0:320_1: taṃ sāmatthiyaṃ? Cittajatā, upādāyarūpatā ca. Atha vā vāyodhātuyā ākāravikāro sahaja…pe…
anya-e0104n0:320_2: paccayoti sambandhitabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ viññattiyā upādāyarūpabhāvo na yujjati. Na hi
anya-e0104n0:320_3: upādāyarūpaṃ ekabhūtasannissayaṃ atthi. “Catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti hi
anya-e0104n0:320_4: vuttaṃ, nāyaṃ doso catunnaṃ vikāro catūsu ekassāpi hoti catusādhāraṇadhanaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n0:320_5: Vāyodhātuadhikatāya ca kalāpassa “vāyodhātuyā”ti vacanaṃ na virujjhati. Evaṃ adhikatā
anya-e0104n0:320_6: ca sāmatthiyato, na pamāṇato. Aññathā hi avinibbhogavuttitā na yujjeyya. Vāyodhātuyā
anya-e0104n0:320_7: evāti keci. Tesaṃ matena viññattiyā upādāyarūpatā durupapādā. Na hi ekassa vikāro
anya-e0104n0:320_9: manodvārajavanena gayhati. Phandamānavaṇṇavinimutto koci vikāro atthi. Tassa ca taggahaṇānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:320_10: gahaṇaṃ hotīti kathametaṃ viññāyatīti adhippāyaggahaṇato. Na hi viññattivikārarahitesu
anya-e0104n0:320_11: rukkhacalanādīsu “idamesa kāreti maññe”ti adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, hatthacalanādīsu
anya-e0104n0:320_12: pana diṭṭhaṃ. Tasmā phandamānavaṇṇavinimutto koci vikāro atthi adhippāyassa ñāpakoti
anya-e0104n0:320_13: viññāyati. Ñāpako ca hetu ñāpetabbamatthaṃ sayaṃ gahito eva ñāpeti, na vijjamānatāmattenāti
anya-e0104n0:320_14: vaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ vikāraggahaṇampi anumānato viññāyati. Tathā hi vadanti –
anya-e0104n0:322: Na sattāmattato atthe, te aññātā pakāsakā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:323_0: Yadi vikāraggahaṇameva kāraṇaṃ adhippāyaggahaṇassa, kasmā aggahitasaṅketānaṃ adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:323_1: na hotīti? Na kevalaṃ vikāraggahaṇameva adhippāyaggahaṇassa kāraṇaṃ, atha kho purimasiddhasambandhaggahaṇañca
anya-e0104n0:323_3: vāyodhātuyā hontīti vuttaṃ. Kiṃ sabbāva vāyodhātū sabbāni tāni karontīti? Nayidamevaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:323_4: Sattamajavanasambhūtā hi vāyodhātu purimajavanasambhūtā vāyodhātuyo upathambhakapaccaye
anya-e0104n0:323_5: labhitvā desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati cittajarūpaṃ, na itarā. Itarā pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:323_6: karontiyo tassā upakārāya honti. Desantaruppatti eva calananti nimitte ca kattubhāvo
anya-e0104n0:323_7: samāropitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññathā dhammānaṃ abyāpāratā, khaṇikatā ca na siyā. Sattahi
anya-e0104n0:323_8: yugehi ākaḍḍhitabbasakaṭamettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nidassitaṃ. Cittajarūpe pana calante
anya-e0104n0:323_10: viya phandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ viññattiggahaṇassa vuttattā. Kiṃ calanakarā eva
anya-e0104n0:323_11: vāyodhātu viññattivikārasahitāti? Nayidamevaṃ, tathā calayitumasakkuṇantiyopi thambhanasandhāraṇamattakarā
anya-e0104n0:323_12: paṭhamajavanādisambhūtāpi vāyodhātuyo viññattivikārasahitā evāti gahetabbaṃ. Yena
anya-e0104n0:323_14: hi vikāro viññatti. Evañca katvā manodvārāvajjanassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakavacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:323_15: suṭṭhu yujjati. Yathāvuttavikāraggahaṇamukhena taṃsamaṅgino adhippāyo viññāyatīti
anya-e0104n0:324_0: Kāyavipphandanassa hetubhūtāya vāyodhātuyā vikārabhāvato pariyāyena viññatti kāyavipphandanahetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā
anya-e0104n0:324_1: vuttā. Cittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātupadaṭṭhānāti ca vāyodhātuyā kiccādhikatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:324_3: viññāpanahetubhāvato kāyaviññattīti vuccatīti sambandho. Ayañhettha attho – viññāpetīti
anya-e0104n0:324_4: viññatti. Kiṃ viññāpeti? Adhippāyaṃ. Kena? Kāyena. Kīdisena? Vipphandamānenāti. Dutiyanaye
anya-e0104n0:324_5: pana yathāvuttena kāyena viññāyatīti kāyaviññatti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n0:325_0: Atthāvabodhanasamattho vacīviseso vacībhedo. Tena vāyuvanappatinadīghosādiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0104n0:325_1: Tassa pavattakaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yassā sā vacībhedappavattakacittasamuṭṭhānā,
anya-e0104n0:325_2: pathavīdhātu. Tassā yaṃ upādinnasaṅkhātassa akkharuppattiṭṭhānassa ghaṭṭanasaññitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:325_3: kiccaṃ, tassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūto ākāraviseso vacīviññatti nāmāti dassento āha “vacībhe…pe… vacīviññattī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:326_0: Idāni “kassa pana ākāravikāro”tiādi kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:326_1: pana viseso – yathā tattha “phandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantara”nti vuttaṃ, evamidha “suyyamānasaddasavanānantara”nti
anya-e0104n0:326_2: yojetabbaṃ. Idha ca thambhanādīnaṃ abhāvato “sattamajavanasambhūtā”tiādinayo na labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:326_3: Ghaṭṭanena hi saddhiṃ saddo uppajjati. Ghaṭṭanañca paṭhamajavanādīsupi labbhateva.
anya-e0104n0:326_4: Ghaṭṭanaṃ paccayavasena bhūtakalāpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āsannataruppādo. Calanaṃ ekassāpi
anya-e0104n0:326_5: desantaruppādaparamparatāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Yathā ca vāyodhātuyā calanaṃ kiccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:326_6: evaṃ pathavīdhātuyā ghaṭṭanaṃ. Tenevāha “pathavīdhātuyā upādinnaghaṭṭanassa paccayo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:326_7: Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Yathā hītiādi kāyavacīviññattīnaṃ anumānavasena gahetabbabhāvavibhāvanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:326_8: Yathā hi ussāpetvā baddhagosīsādirūpāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya
anya-e0104n0:326_10: hoti, evaṃ vipphandamānasamuccāriyamānavaṇṇasadde gahetvā tadanantarapavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya
anya-e0104n0:327_0: 442. Rūpāni paricchindati, sayaṃ vā tehi paricchijjati, rūpānaṃ vā paricchedamattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:327_1: rūpaparicchedo, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti rūpaparicchedalakkhaṇā. Ayaṃ hi ākāsadhātu
anya-e0104n0:327_2: taṃ taṃ rūpakalāpaṃ paricchindantī viya hoti. Tenāha “rūpapariyantappakāsanarasā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:327_3: Atthato pana yasmā rūpānaṃ paricchedamattaṃ hutvā gayhati, tasmā vuttaṃ “rūpamariyādapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:327_4: Yasmiṃ kalāpe bhūtānaṃ paricchedo, teheva asamphuṭṭhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā. Vijjamānepi
anya-e0104n0:327_5: hi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhabhāve taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatā rūpapariyanto
anya-e0104n0:327_6: ākāsoti yesaṃ so paricchedo, tehi so asamphuṭṭhova. Aññathā paricchinnatā na siyā
anya-e0104n0:327_7: tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ byāpibhāvāpattito. Abyāpitā hi asamphuṭṭhatā. Tenāha bhagavā “asamphuṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:327_9: vā. Yesaṃ rūpānaṃ paricchedo, tattheva tesaṃ paricchedabhāvena labbhatīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:328_0: 443. Adandhatāti agarutā. Vinodanaṃ vikkhipanaṃ, apanayananti attho. Athaddhatāti
anya-e0104n0:328_1: akathinatā. Attano mudubhāveneva sabbakiriyāsu avirodhitā. Mudu hi katthaci na virujjhati.
anya-e0104n0:328_2: Tīsupi ṭhānesu paṭipakkhe a-kāro dandhatādihetūnaṃ paṭipakkhasamuṭṭhānattā lahutādīnanti
anya-e0104n0:328_3: keci. Apare pana “sattāpaṭisedhe”ti vadanti. Sarīrena kattabbakiriyānaṃ anukūlatāsaṅkhātakammaññabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:328_4: lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sarīrakiriyānukūlakammaññabhāvalakkhaṇā. Akammaññaṃ dubbalaṃ nāma
anya-e0104n0:329_2: rasādidhātūnaṃ vā vikārāvatthā. Dvidhā vuttopi atthato pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃyeva
anya-e0104n0:329_3: vikāroti daṭṭhabbo. Paṭipakkhapaccayā sappāyautuāhārāvikkhittacittatā. Te ca taṃtaṃvikārassa
anya-e0104n0:329_4: visesapaccayabhāvato vuttā, avisesena pana sabbe sabbesaṃ paccayā. Yato nesaṃ aññamaññāvijahanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:329_6: mudukammaññasadisarūpanidassanamattaṃ, na taṃ idha adhippetaṃ mudutākammaññatāsabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:329_7: Na hi anindriyabaddharūpasantāne lahutādīni sambhavanti, indriyabaddhepi rūpabhave
anya-e0104n0:329_8: na santi dandhattakarādidhātukkhobhābhāvato. Sati hi tādise dhātukkhobhe tappaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhānāhi
anya-e0104n0:329_9: lahutādīhi bhavitabbanti keci, taṃ akāraṇaṃ. Na hi vūpasametabbapaccanīkāpekkho tabbirodhidhammasamuppādo,
anya-e0104n0:329_10: tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittuppādesu kāyalahutādīnaṃ abhāvova siyā. Kasmā pana kammajarūpesu
anya-e0104n0:329_11: lahutādayo na hontīti? Paccuppannapaccayāpekkhattā. Aññathā sabbadābhāvīhi lahutādīhi bhavitabbaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0104n0:330_0: 444. Ādi cayo, īsaṃ vā cayoti ācayo, yathāpaccayaṃ tato tato āgatassa viya cayoti
anya-e0104n0:330_1: vā ācayo, tadubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ācayo lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ācayalakkhaṇo. Rūpassa
anya-e0104n0:330_2: upacayo paṭhamuppādo, vaḍḍhi ca “upaññattaṃ upasitta”ntiādīsu viya upa-saddassa paṭhamūpariatthassa
anya-e0104n0:330_3: nidassanato. Pubbantatoti pubbakoṭṭhāsato, anāgatabhāvatoti attho. Uppajjamāne rūpadhamme
anya-e0104n0:330_4: uppādo anāgatakkhaṇato ummujjāpento viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ummujjāpanaraso”ti. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:330_5: so “ime rūpadhammā”ti niyyātento viya gayhatīti āha “niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti. Paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatā
anya-e0104n0:330_6: “uparicayo upacayo”ti imassa atthassa vasena veditabbā. Pavattilakkhaṇāti rūpānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:330_7: pavattananti lakkhitabbā. Anuppabandhanarasāti pubbāparavasena anu anu pabandhanakiccā.
anya-e0104n0:331_0: Ubhayampīti upacayo santatīti ubhayampi. Jātirūpassevāti rūpuppādasseva adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:331_1: Yadi evaṃ kasmā vibhajja vuttāti āha “ākāranānattato”ti, jātirūpassa pavattiākārabhedatoti
anya-e0104n0:331_2: attho. Veneyyavasena vibhajjakathane kāraṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati. Kathaṃ panetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:331_3: viññātabbaṃ, pavattiākāranānattato jātirūpassa bhedo, na sabhāvatoti? Niddesatoti
anya-e0104n0:331_4: dassento “yasmā panā”tiādimāha. Tattha yo āyatanānanti yo aḍḍhekādasannaṃ rūpāyatanānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:331_5: ādicayattā “ācayo”ti vutto. So eva upacayo paṭhamuppādabhāvato upa-saddo paṭhamatthoti
anya-e0104n0:331_6: katvā. Yo pana tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ upari cayattā upacayo, sā eva santati anupabandhavasena
anya-e0104n0:331_7: uppattibhāvato. Atha vā yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo paṭhamabhāvena upalakkhito uppādo, so
anya-e0104n0:331_8: pana tattheva uppajjamānānaṃ upari cayattā upacayo, vaḍḍhīti attho. Upacayo vaḍḍhibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:331_9: upalakkhito uppādo, sā eva santati pabandhākārena uppattibhāvato. Tenāha “aṭṭhakathāyampī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:332_0: Tattha evaṃ kiṃ kathitanti “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo”tiādinā niddesena kiṃ atthajātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:332_1: kathitaṃ hoti? Āyatanena ācayo kathito. Ācayupacayasantatiyo hi nibbattibhāvena ācayo
anya-e0104n0:332_2: evāti āyatanehi ācayādīnaṃ pakāsitattā tehi ācayo kathito. Āyatanānaṃ ācayādivacaneneva
anya-e0104n0:332_3: ācayasabhāvāni uppādadhammāni āyatanānīti ācayena taṃpakatikaṃ āyatanaṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:333_0: Rūpaparipāko rūpadhammānaṃ jiṇṇatā. Upanayanarasāti bhaṅgupanayanakiccā. Sabhāvānapagamepīti
anya-e0104n0:333_1: kakkhaḷatādisabhāvassa avigamepi. Ṭhitikkhaṇe hi jarā, na ca tadā dhammo sabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:333_2: vijahati nāma. Navabhāvo uppādāvatthā, tassa apagamabhāvena gayhatīti āha “navabhāvāpagamapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:333_3: “Arūpadhammāna”nti idaṃ tesaṃ jarāya suṭṭhu paṭicchannatāya vuttaṃ. Rūpadhammānampi
anya-e0104n0:333_4: hi khaṇikajarā paṭicchannā eva, yā avīcijarātipi vuccati. Esa vikāroti khaṇḍiccādivikāramāha.
anya-e0104n0:333_5: So hi arūpadhammesu na labbhati. Yā avīcijarā nāma, tassāpi esa vikāro natthīti sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:333_6: Natthi etissā jarāya vīcīti avīcijarā, navabhāvato duviññeyyantarajarāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:334_0: Parito sabbaso “bhijjana”nti lakkhitabbāti paribhedalakkhaṇā. Niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:334_1: rūpaṃ pana khaṇabhaṅgitāya yena bhaṅgena na niccanti aniccaṃ, so aniccassa bhāvoti
anya-e0104n0:334_2: aniccatā. Sā pana yasmā ṭhitippattaṃ rūpaṃ vināsabhāvena saṃsīdantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:334_3: “saṃsīdanarasā”ti. Yasmā ca sā rūpadhammānaṃ bhaṅgabhāvato khayavayākāreneva gayhati,
anya-e0104n0:335_0: 445. Ojālakkhaṇoti ettha aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassa sāro upathambhabalakaro bhūtanissito
anya-e0104n0:335_1: eko viseso ojā. Kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāro. Āharīyatīti āhāro, kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharīyatīti
anya-e0104n0:335_2: attho. Idaṃ pana savatthukaṃ ojaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Bāhiraṃ āhāraṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā
anya-e0104n0:335_3: eva ajjhattikāhāro rūpaṃ uppādeti, so pana rūpaṃ āharatīti āhāro. Tenāha “rūpāharaṇaraso”ti.
anya-e0104n0:335_4: Tato eva ojaṭṭhamakarūpuppādanena imassa kāyassa upathambhanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Ojāya
anya-e0104n0:336_0: 446. Balarūpantiādīsu imasmiṃ kāye balaṃ nāma atthi, sambhavo nāma atthi, rogo nāma
anya-e0104n0:336_1: atthi, “jāti sañjātī”ti vacanato jāti nāma atthi, tehipi catūhi mahābhūtehi vinā
anya-e0104n0:336_2: abhāvato upādāyarūpehi bhavitabbanti adhippāyo. Ekaccānanti abhayagirivāsīnaṃ. Paṭikkhittanti
anya-e0104n0:336_3: ettha evaṃ paṭikkhepo veditabbo – middhaṃ rūpameva na hoti nīvaraṇesu desitattā.
anya-e0104n0:336_4: Yassa hi nīvaraṇesu desanā, taṃ na rūpaṃ yathā kāmacchando. Siyā panetaṃ duvidhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:336_5: middhaṃ rūpaṃ, arūpañcāti. Tattha yaṃ arūpaṃ, taṃ nīvaraṇesu desitaṃ “na rūpa”nti?
anya-e0104n0:336_6: Taṃ na, visesavacanābhāvato. Na hi visesetvā middhaṃ nīvaraṇesu desitaṃ, tasmā middhassa
anya-e0104n0:336_7: duvidhataṃ parikappetvāpi na sakkā nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ nivattetuṃ. Sakkā hi vattuṃ “yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:336_8: taṃ arūpato aññaṃ middhaṃ parikappitaṃ, tampi nīvaraṇaṃ middhasabhāvattā itaraṃ middhaṃ viyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:337_0: Bhavatu nīvaraṇaṃ, ko virodhoti ce? Nīvaraṇañca pahātabbaṃ. Pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya
anya-e0104n0:337_1: “addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”ti vacanato. Appahātabbañca rūpaṃ “katame
anya-e0104n0:337_2: dhammā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā? Catūsu bhūmīsu kusalaṃ, catūsu bhūmīsu
anya-e0104n0:337_3: vipāko, tīsu bhūmīsu kiriyābyākataṃ, rūpañca nibbānañca. Ime dhammā neva dassanena
anya-e0104n0:337_4: na bhāvanāya pahātabbā”ti vacanato. Na cettha tadārammaṇakilesappahānaṃ adhippetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:337_5: “rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahathā”tiādīsu viya kāmacchandādīnaṃ tathā
anya-e0104n0:337_6: pahānassa anadhippetattā. Tasmā na middhaṃ rūpaṃ. Yadi middhassa rūpabhāvaṃ na sampaṭicchatha,
anya-e0104n0:337_7: kathaṃ bhagavato niddā. Middhañhi “niddāpacalāyikā”tiādinā vibhaṅge vibhattattā niddāti?
anya-e0104n0:337_8: Na middhaṃ niddā, niddāhetubhāvato pana taṃ “niddā”ti vibhattaṃ yathā itthiliṅgādi.
anya-e0104n0:337_9: Evampi niddāhetuno middhassa abhāvato kathaṃ bhagavato niddāti? Niddā bhagavato sarīragilāniyā,
anya-e0104n0:337_10: na middhena. Sā ca natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “piṭṭhi me āgilāyati, tamahaṃ āyamissāmī”ti
anya-e0104n0:337_11: vacanato. Na cettha evamavadhāraṇaṃ middhameva niddāhetūti, niddāhetu eva middhanti
anya-e0104n0:337_12: evamavadhāraṇā. Tasmā aññopi atthi niddāhetu, ko pana soti? Sarīragilāniyā. Tena
anya-e0104n0:338_0: Niddā ca bhagavato natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ aggivessana…pe…
anya-e0104n0:338_1: divā supitā”ti vacanato. Itopi na middhaṃ rūpaṃ sampayogavacanato. Vuttañhi “thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:338_2: avijjānīvaraṇena nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañcā”tiādi. Na cettha yathālābhabhavanaṃ?
anya-e0104n0:338_4: viya appasiddhatāya rūpabhāvassa. Siddhe hi tassa rūpabhāve sambhavato yathālābhapaccayo
anya-e0104n0:338_5: yujjeyyāti. Itopi na rūpaṃ middhaṃ āruppesu uppajjanato. Vuttampi cetaṃ “nīvaraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:338_6: dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā”ti imassa vibhaṅge “āruppe
anya-e0104n0:338_8: uppajjatī”ti vitthāro. Tasmā “na middhaṃ rūpa”nti yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:339_0: Itaresūti balarūpādīsu. Kammasamuṭṭhānassāpi rogassa visabhāgapaccayasamuppanno dhātukkhobho
anya-e0104n0:339_1: āsannakāraṇaṃ, pageva itarassa. So ca atthato rūpadhammānaṃ vikārāvatthāṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu
anya-e0104n0:339_2: eva siyāti vuttaṃ “rogarūpaṃ jaratāaniccatāgahaṇena gahitamevā”ti. Upacayasantatigahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:339_3: gahitamevāti tabbinimuttassa rūpuppādassa abhāvato. Upādāvatthāya ca aññā jāti nāma
anya-e0104n0:339_4: nattheva. Sambhavo kāmadhātuyaṃ ekacciyasattānaṃ indriyaparipākapaccayo āpodhātuyā
anya-e0104n0:339_6: nāma atthato vāyodhātuyā pavattiākāraviseso tassā vipphārabhāvato. Yato naṃ “pāṇabala”nti
anya-e0104n0:339_7: vadanti, tenāha “balarūpaṃ vāyodhātuggahaṇena gahitamevā”ti. Kasmā pana nesaṃ ayathākkamato
anya-e0104n0:339_8: paṭikkhepo katoti? Visuṃ natthīti katvā anupalabbhamānattā anādaradassanatthaṃ, middhapaṭikkhepo
anya-e0104n0:339_9: vā mahāpañhoti paṭhamaṃ kato. Tadanusārena paṭilomanayena itaresampi abhāvo vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:340_0: “Itī”ti idaṃ “aṭṭhavīsatividha”nti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ, iminā vuttakkamena aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:340_1: hotīti. So ca kho pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayenevāti anūnatā veditabbā. Anadhikabhāvo pana dassito eva.
anya-e0104n0:341_0: 447. Sampayuttadhammarāsi hinoti etena patiṭṭhahatīhi hetu, mūlaṭṭhena lobhādiko,
anya-e0104n0:341_1: alobhādiko ca, tādiso hetu na hotīti nahetu. Nāssa hetu atthīti ahetukaṃ, sahetukapaṭiyogibhāvato
anya-e0104n0:341_2: hetunā saha na uppajjatīti attho. Ahetukameva hetunā vippayuttatāya hetuvippayuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:341_3: Dhammanānattābhāvepi hi saddatthanānattena veneyyavasena dukantaradesanā hotīti dukapadavasena
anya-e0104n0:341_4: cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Paccayādhīnavuttitāya saha paccayenāti sappaccayaṃ. Attano paccayehi
anya-e0104n0:341_5: loke niyuttaṃ, viditanti vā lokiyaṃ. Ā bhavaggaṃ, ā gotrabhuṃ vā savantīti āsavā,
anya-e0104n0:341_6: saha āsavehīti sāsavaṃ, āsavehi ālambitabbanti attho. Ādisaddena saṃyojanīyaṃ oghanīyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:341_7: yoganīyaṃ nīvaraṇīyaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ acetasikaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ narūpāvacaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:341_8: naarūpāvacaraṃ naapariyāpannaṃ aniyataṃ aniyyānikaṃ aniccanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:342_0: Āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā, attabhāvo. Taṃ attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā ajjhattā,
anya-e0104n0:342_1: indriyabaddhadhammā, tesu bhavaṃ ajjhattikaṃ, cakkhādi. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttanayena
anya-e0104n0:342_2: ajjhattameva ajjhattikaṃ yathā venayikoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “attabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:342_3: adhikicca pavattattā ajjhattika”nti. Sesaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ. “Tato bāhirattā”ti idaṃ
anya-e0104n0:342_4: ajjhattikalakkhaṇābhāvato vuttaṃ. Ghaṭṭanavasenāti visayī, visayo ca hutvā saṅghaṭṭanavasena.
anya-e0104n0:342_5: Sesaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ. Viparītattāti ghaṭṭanavasena agahetabbato. Duppaṭivijjhasabhāvattāti
anya-e0104n0:342_6: sukhumabhāvena duviññeyyasabhāvattā. Ñāṇassa āsanne na hotīti dūre. Terasa hadayavatthupariyosānāni.
anya-e0104n0:342_7: Sabhāvenevāti “rūpassa paricchedo, rūpassa vikāro, rūpassa upacayo”tiādinā aggahetvā
anya-e0104n0:342_8: attano sabhāveneva kakkhaḷattādinā ñāṇena paricchijja gahetabbato. Sesaṃ dasavidhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:342_9: Tabbiparītatāyāti sabhāvena apariggahitabbato. Sotādīnampi cakkhuno viya pasannasabhāvattā
anya-e0104n0:342_10: eva yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇapaccayatāti dassento āha “cakkhādi…pe… pasādarūpa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:342_11: Viparītattāti tabbidhurasabhāvattā. Adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti ettha cakkhādīnaṃ tāva pañcannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:342_13: sakicce jīvitindriyassa sahajarūpānupālane. Tadubhayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Upādinnattāti
anya-e0104n0:342_14: gahitattā. Kammanibbattañhi “mametaṃ phalaṃ”nti kammunā gahitaṃ viya hoti apaṭikkhepato.
anya-e0104n0:343_1: Oḷāriketi dvādasavidhe oḷārikarūpe. Rūpanti rūpāyatanaṃ. Daṭṭhabbabhāvasaṅkhātena
anya-e0104n0:343_2: saha nidassanenāti sanidassanaṃ, paṭihananabhāvasaṅkhātena saha paṭighenāti sappaṭighaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:343_3: sanidassanañca taṃ sappaṭighañcāti sanidassanasappaṭighaṃ. Tattha yassa daṭṭhabbabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:343_4: atthi, taṃ sanidassanaṃ. Cakkhuviññāṇagocarabhāvova daṭṭhabbabhāvo. Tassa rūpāyatanato
anya-e0104n0:343_5: anaññattepi aññehi dhammehi rūpāyatanaṃ visesetuṃ aññaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ “saha nidassanena
anya-e0104n0:343_6: sanidassana”nti. Dhammabhāvasāmaññena hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro viseso,
anya-e0104n0:343_7: so añño viya katvā upacarituṃ yutto. Evaṃ hi atthavisesāvabodho hotīti. Yo sayaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:343_8: nissayavasena ca sampattānaṃ, asampattānañca paṭimukhabhāvo aññamaññaṃ patanaṃ, so
anya-e0104n0:343_9: paṭihananabhāvo, yena byāpārādivikārapaccayantarasahitesu cakkhādīnaṃ visayesu vikāruppatti.
anya-e0104n0:343_10: Sesaṃ ekādasavidhaṃ oḷārikarūpaṃ. Tañhi sanidassanattābhāvato anidassanaṃ, vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n0:343_11: sappaṭighaṃ. Ubhayapaṭikkhepena anidassanaappaṭighaṃ. Kammato jātanti ettha yaṃ ekantakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:343_12: aṭṭhindriyāni, hadayañcāti navavidhaṃ rūpaṃ, yañca navavidhe catusamuṭṭhāne kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:343_13: navavidhameva rūpanti evaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhampi kammato uppajjanato kammajaṃ. Yañhi
anya-e0104n0:343_14: jātañca yañca jāyati yañca jāyissati, taṃ sabbampi “kammaja”nti vuccati yathā duddhanti.
anya-e0104n0:343_15: Tadaññapaccayajātanti kammato aññapaccayato jātaṃ utucittāhārajaṃ. Nakutocijātanti
anya-e0104n0:343_16: lakkhaṇarūpamāha. Viññattidvayaṃ, saddo, ākāsadhātu, lahutādittayaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānāni
anya-e0104n0:343_17: avinibbhogarūpānīti etaṃ pañcadasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ cittajaṃ. Ākāsadhātu, lahutādittayaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:343_18: āhārasamuṭṭhānāni avinibbhogarūpānīti etaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ āhārajaṃ. Ettha saddaṃ
anya-e0104n0:343_19: pakkhipitvā terasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ututo samuṭṭhitaṃ utujaṃ. Sesaṃ kammajatike vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:344_1: catukkasaddo yojetabbo. Yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ adakkhi yaṃ passati yaṃ dakkhissati yaṃ passeyya,
anya-e0104n0:344_2: taṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ nāma diṭṭhasabhāvānātivattanato yathā duddhanti. Esa nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0104n0:344_4: Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbattayanti gandho raso phoṭṭhabbanti etaṃ tayaṃ. Mutaṃ nāma mutvā
anya-e0104n0:345_0: Kimidaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ nāmāti? Pathavītejovāyodhātuttayaṃ. Kasmā panettha āpodhātu aggahitā,
anya-e0104n0:345_1: nanu sītatā phusitvā gayhati, sā ca āpodhātūti? Saccaṃ gayhati, na pana sā āpodhātu.
anya-e0104n0:345_2: Kiñcarahīti? Tejodhātu eva. Mande hi uṇhabhāve sītabuddhi. Na hi sītaṃ nāma koci
anya-e0104n0:345_3: guṇo atthi, kevalaṃ pana uṇhabhāvassa mandatāya sītatābhimāno. Kathametaṃ viññātabbanti
anya-e0104n0:345_4: ce? Anavaṭṭhitattā sītabuddhiyā yathā pārāpāre. Tathā hi ghammakāle ātape ṭhitānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:345_5: chāyaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ sītabuddhi hoti, tattheva pana pathavīgabbhato uṭṭhitānaṃ uṇhabuddhi.
anya-e0104n0:345_6: Yadi hi sītatā āpodhātu siyā, ekasmiṃ kalāpe uṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ upalabbheyya, na
anya-e0104n0:345_7: ca upalabbhati. Tasmā viññāyati na āpodhātu sītatāti. Idañca bhūtānaṃ avinibbhogavuttitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:345_8: icchantānaṃ uttaraṃ, anicchantānampi pana catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ ekasmiṃ kalāpe kiccadassanena
anya-e0104n0:345_9: sabhāgavuttitāya sādhitāya uttarameva. Ye pana “vāyodhātuyā lakkhaṇaṃ sītatā”ti vadanti,
anya-e0104n0:345_10: tesampi idameva uttaraṃ. Yadi hi vāyodhātu sītatā siyā, ekasmiṃ kalāpe uṇhabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:345_11: saddhiṃ sītatā upalabbheyya, na ca upalabbhati. Tasmā viññāyati na vāyodhātu sītatāti.
anya-e0104n0:345_12: Yesaṃ pana dravatā āpodhātu, sā ca phusitvā gayhatīti dassanaṃ. Te vattabbā “dravabhāvopi
anya-e0104n0:345_13: phusīyatīti āyasmantānaṃ adhimānamattaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ viyā”ti. Vuttañhetaṃ purātanehi –
anya-e0104n0:350_0: Sesanti yathāvuttaṃ rūpādisattavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhaṃ ekavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:351_0: Nipphannarūpaṃ panettha rūparūpaṃ nāmāti yadettha aṭṭhavīsatividhe rūpe “nipphanna”nti
anya-e0104n0:351_1: vuttaṃ rūpaṃ, tadeva rūpalakkhaṇayogato rūpaṃ. Ruppanaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti
anya-e0104n0:351_2: yathā arisasoti, rūpaguṇayogato vā yathā nīlaguṇayogato nīlaṃ vatthanti. Svāyaṃ rūpasaddo
anya-e0104n0:351_3: ruḷhiyā ataṃsabhāvepi pavattatīti aparena rūpasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “rūparūpa”nti
anya-e0104n0:351_4: yathā tilatelaṃ, dukkhadukkhanti ca, ruppanasabhāvaṃ rūpanti attho. Yadi evaṃ, ākāsadhātuādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:352_0: Vasanti ettha cittacetasikā pavattantīti vatthu, cittataṃsampayuttānaṃ ādhārabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:352_1: rūpaṃ. Taṃ pana chabbidhaṃ. Tattha hadayarūpaṃ vatthu eva manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:352_2: nissayabhāvato. Na dvāraṃ aññanissayānaṃ cakkhādi viya. Yathā hi cakkhādīni sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:352_3: pavattiyā dvāraṃ honti, na evaṃ hadayavatthu. Tena vuttaṃ “yaṃ panettha hadayarūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:352_4: nāma, taṃ vatthu, na dvāra”nti. Viññattidvayaṃ dvāraṃ kammadvārabhāvato. Tannissitassa
anya-e0104n0:352_5: cittuppādassa abhāvato na vatthu. Pasādarūpaṃ vatthu ceva attasannissitassa cakkhuviññāṇādikassa,
anya-e0104n0:352_6: dvārañca aññanissitassa sampaṭicchanādikassa. Sesaṃ ekavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ vuttavipariyāyato
anya-e0104n0:353_0: 450. Ekato eva jātaṃ ekajaṃ. Nanu ca ekato eva paccayato paccayuppannassa uppatti
anya-e0104n0:353_1: natthīti? Saccaṃ natthi, rūpajanakapaccayesu ekatoti ayamettha adhippāyo. Na hi rūpuppatti
anya-e0104n0:353_2: rūpajanakato aññaṃ paccayaṃ apekkhati. Dvijantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Imesanti imesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:353_3: pabhedānaṃ vasena. Kammajamevāti kammato eva jātaṃ. Cittajamevāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:353_4: Cittato ca ututo ca jātanti kālena cittato, kālena ututoti evaṃ cittato ca ututo
anya-e0104n0:353_5: ca jātaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃ dvijaṃ dvīhi jātanti. Parato dvīsupi eseva nayo. Saddāyatanamevāti
anya-e0104n0:353_6: ettha yaṃ cittajaṃ saddāyatanaṃ, taṃ saviññattikamevāti eke. Aviññattikopi atthi
anya-e0104n0:354_0: Vitakkavipphārasaddo na sotaviññeyyoti hi evaṃ pavattamahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ nissāya
anya-e0104n0:354_1: cittasamuṭṭhānassa saddassa viññattiyā vināpi uppatti icchitabbā. Na hi viññatti
anya-e0104n0:354_2: “kāyavācāya viññattī”ti vacanato asotaviññeyyena saddena saha uppajjati, evaṃ sante
anya-e0104n0:354_3: cittajenāpi saddanavakena bhavitabbaṃ. So ca vādo “saddo ca hoti, na sotaviññeyyo
anya-e0104n0:354_4: cā”ti viruddhamevetanti maññamānehi saṅgahakārehi paṭikkhitto. Apare pana mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ
anya-e0104n0:354_5: appaṭikkhipitvā tassa adhippāyaṃ vaṇṇenti. Kathaṃ? “Jivhātālucalanādikaṃ vitakkasamuṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:354_6: viññattisahajameva sukhumasaddaṃ dibbasotena sutvā ādisatī”ti sutte, paṭṭhāne ca
anya-e0104n0:354_7: oḷārikaṃ saddaṃ sandhāya sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo vuttoti iminā adhippāyena
anya-e0104n0:354_8: vitakkavipphārasaddassa asotaviññeyyatā vuttāti. Taṃ catujaṃ. Avasesanti avinibbhogarūpena
anya-e0104n0:355_0: Lakkhaṇarūpaṃ pana nakutocijātanti kutocipi paccayato na jātaṃ, nāpi sayameva jātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:355_1: paccayehi vinā sayameva jātassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato. Kathaṃ panetaṃ viññātabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:355_2: lakkhaṇarūpaṃ na jāyatīti? Lakkhaṇābhāvato. Uppattimantānaṃ hi rūpāyatanādīnaṃ jātiādīni
anya-e0104n0:355_3: lakkhaṇāni vijjanti, na evaṃ jātiādīnaṃ. Tasmā viññātabbametaṃ jātiādīni na jāyantīti.
anya-e0104n0:355_4: Siyā panetaṃ “jātiādīnaṃ jātiādīni lakkhaṇāni vijjantī”ti? Taṃ na, kasmā? Tathā sati
anya-e0104n0:355_5: anavaṭṭhānāpattito. Yadi hi jātiādīni jātiādimantāni siyuṃ, tānipi jātiādimantāni,
anya-e0104n0:355_6: tānipi jātiādimantānīti anavaṭṭhānameva āpajjati. Tasmā suṭṭhu vuttaṃ “jātiādīni
anya-e0104n0:355_7: na jāyantī”ti. Tenāha “na hi uppādassa uppādo atthi, uppannassa ca paripākabhedamattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:356_0: Tattha “uppādo natthī”ti etena uppādassa jarāmaraṇābhāvamāha. Asati uppāde kuto jarāmaraṇanti
anya-e0104n0:356_1: mattaggahaṇena jarāmaraṇassa uppādābhāvampi. Yadi evaṃ jātiyā kutoci jātatāvacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:356_2: kathanti āha “yampī”tiādi. Tattha kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe diṭṭhattāti ye te cittādayo
anya-e0104n0:356_3: rūpāyatanādīnaṃ rūpānaṃ janakapaccayā, tesaṃ taduppādanaṃ pati anuparatabyāpārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:356_4: yo so paccayabhāvūpalakkhaṇīyo kiccānubhāvakkhaṇo, tadā jāyamānānaṃ rūpāyatanādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:356_5: dhammānaṃ vikārabhāvena upalabbhamānataṃ sandhāya veneyyapuggalavasena jātiyā kutoci
anya-e0104n0:356_6: paccayato jātattaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anuññātaṃ yathā taṃ cittasamuṭṭhānatādi viññattiādīnaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:356_7: Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – yehi paccayadhammehi rūpādayo uppajjeyyuṃ, tesaṃ paccayabhāvūpagamanakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:356_8: upalabbhamānā rūpādayo tato pure, pacchā ca anupalabbhamānā tato uppajjantīti viññāyanti,
anya-e0104n0:356_9: evaṃ jātipi veditabbā. Yadi evaṃ nippariyāyato jātiyā kutoci jātatā siddhā, atha
anya-e0104n0:356_10: kasmā veneyyapuggalavasenāti vuttanti? Nayidamevaṃ jāyamānadhammavikārabhāvena upalabbhamānattā.
anya-e0104n0:356_11: Yadi hi dhammo viya upalabbheyya jāti, nippariyāyova tassā kutoci jātabhāvo, na evamupalabbhati,
anya-e0104n0:357_0: Tadā kira sotūnaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ “ayaṃ jāti sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ pabhavo, sayañca
anya-e0104n0:357_1: na kutoci jāyati yathā taṃ pakativādīnaṃ pakatī”ti, taṃ nesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ vidhamento
anya-e0104n0:357_2: satthā “upacayo santatī”ti dvidhā bhinditvā kutoci paccayato jātañca katvā desesi,
anya-e0104n0:357_3: na pana jarāmaraṇaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe adassanato. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ
anya-e0104n0:357_4: “jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”nti vuttaṃ? Yasmā paṭiccasamuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ paripākabhaṅgatāya
anya-e0104n0:357_5: tesu santesu honti, na asantesu. Na hi ajātaṃ paripaccati, bhijjati vā, tasmā taṃ
anya-e0104n0:357_6: jātipaccayataṃ sandhāya “jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”nti pariyāyena suttesu vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:357_7: Yo panettha kāmabhavādīsu kammādinā paccayena yonivibhāgato paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavattiyañca
anya-e0104n0:357_8: rūpadhammānaṃ pavattibhedo vattabbo, so parato paṭiccasamuppādakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissatīti
anya-e0104n0:360_0: 451. Yaṃ kiñcīti anavasesapariyādānadīpakena padadvayena vedayitassa bahubhedataṃ
anya-e0104n0:360_1: dassento vuccamānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ ulliṅgeti. Vedayitaṃ ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:360_2: etassāti vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ. Sabbaṃ taṃ dhammajātanti adhippāyo, pubbe vā rūpakkhandhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:360_3: vuttaṃ adhikārato ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Ekato katvāti atītādibhedabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:360_4: taṃ buddhiyā ekato katvā. Evañhi rāsaṭṭhassa sambhavo. Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:360_5: sañjānanaṃ, “nīlaṃ pītaṃ dīghaṃ rassa”nti ca ādinā saññuppādavasena jānanaṃ gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:360_6: lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ. Abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ āyūhanaṃ byāpārāpatti, abhisandahanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:360_7: vā, ubhayathāpi cetanāpadhānatāya saṅkhārakkhandhassa evaṃ vuttaṃ “abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:360_8: Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā “cakkhusamphassajā
anya-e0104n0:360_9: cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā. Minitabbavatthuṃ nāḷiyā minamāno puriso viya yena
anya-e0104n0:360_10: sañjānanākāravisiṭṭhena ākārena visayaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ ārammaṇūpaladdhisaṅkhātaṃ vijānanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:360_11: lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ. Itare vedanākkhandhādayo suviññeyyā hontīti
anya-e0104n0:361_0: Attanā “vijānanalakkhaṇa”nti vuttamatthaṃ suttena samatthetuṃ “yaṃ kiñcī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:361_2: bhāvasādhanavasena vuttaṃ. Dhammasabhāvā vinimutto koci kattā nāma natthīti tasseva
anya-e0104n0:361_3: kattubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “vijānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ, tadeva cintanādiatthena
anya-e0104n0:361_4: cittaṃ, mananaṭṭhena manoti pariyāyatopi naṃ bodheti. Ettāvatā ca khandhato, bhedato,
anya-e0104n0:362_0: Jāyanti ettha visadisāpi sadisākārāti jāti, samānākāro. Sā panāyaṃ jāti kāmaṃ anekavidhā
anya-e0104n0:362_1: nānappakārā, taṃ idhādhippetameva pana dassento “kusalaṃ, akusalaṃ, abyākatañcā”ti
anya-e0104n0:362_2: āha. Tattha kusalaṭṭhena kusalaṃ. Koyaṃ kusalaṭṭho nāma? Ārogyaṭṭho anavajjaṭṭho
anya-e0104n0:362_3: sukhavipākaṭṭho. Ārogyaṭṭhenāpi hi kusalaṃ vuccati “kacci nu bhoto kusala”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0104n0:362_4: Anavajjaṭṭhenāpi “katamo pana, bhante, kusalo kāyasamācāro? Yo kho, mahārāja, anavajjo
anya-e0104n0:362_6: Kusalacittañhi rāgādīnaṃ cetasikarogānaṃ avajjasabhāvānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato, sukhavipākavipaccanato
anya-e0104n0:363_0: Saddatthato pana kucchite pāpadhamme salayati calayati kammeti viddhaṃsetīti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:363_1: Kucchitena vā ākārena sayantīti kusā, pāpadhammā, te kuse lunāti chindatīti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:363_2: Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato tanukaraṇato ñāṇaṃ kusaṃ nāma, tena lātabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
anya-e0104n0:363_3: kusalaṃ. Yathā vā kuso ubhayabhāgagataṃ hatthapadesaṃ lunāti, evamidaṃ uppannānuppannavasena
anya-e0104n0:363_4: ubhayabhāgagataṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ lunāti chindati, tasmā kuso viya lunātīti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:363_5: Kucchitānaṃ vā sāvajjadhammānaṃ salanato saṃvaraṇato kusalaṃ. Kusaladhammavasena
anya-e0104n0:363_6: hi akusalā pavattinivāraṇena, appavattibhāvāpādanena ca manacchaṭṭhesu dvāresu appavattiyā
anya-e0104n0:363_7: saṃvutā pihitā honti. Kucchite vā pāpadhamme salayati kampeti apanetīti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:363_8: Kucchitānaṃ vā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ sānato nisānato tejanato kusā, dosalobhādayo.
anya-e0104n0:363_9: Dosādīnañhi vasena cetanāya tikkhabhāvappattiyā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ mahāsāvajjatā, te
anya-e0104n0:363_10: kuse lunāti chindatīti kusalaṃ. Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato antakaraṇato vināsanato kusāni,
anya-e0104n0:363_11: puññakiriyavasena pavattāni saddhādīni indriyāni, tehi lātabbaṃ pavattetabbanti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:363_12: “Ku” iti vā bhūmi vuccati, adhiṭṭhānabhāvena taṃsadisassa attano nissayabhūtassa
anya-e0104n0:363_13: rūpārūpappabandhassa sampati, āyatiñca anudahanena vināsanato kuṃ siyantīti kusā,
anya-e0104n0:363_14: rāgādayo, te viya attano nissayassa lavanato chindanato kusalaṃ. Payogasampāditā
anya-e0104n0:363_15: hi kusaladhammā accantameva rūpārūpadhamme appavattikaraṇena samucchindantīti.
anya-e0104n0:364_0: Na kusalanti akusalaṃ, kusalapaṭipakkhanti attho. Na kusalanti hi kusalapaṭikkhepena
anya-e0104n0:364_1: akusalapadassa avayavabhedena atthe vuccamāne yathā yaṃ dhammajātaṃ na arogaṃ, na
anya-e0104n0:364_2: anavajjaṃ, na sukhavipākaṃ, na ca kosallasambhūtaṃ, taṃ akusalanti ayamattho dassito
anya-e0104n0:364_3: hoti, evaṃ yaṃ na kucchitānaṃ salanasabhāvaṃ, na kusānaṃ lavanasabhāvaṃ, na kusena
anya-e0104n0:364_4: kusehi vā pavattetabbaṃ, na ca kuso viya lavanakaṃ, taṃ akusalaṃ nāmāti ayampi attho
anya-e0104n0:364_5: dassito hoti. Ettha ca yasmā kusalaṃ akusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ, yato cetasikarogapaṭipakkhādibhāvato
anya-e0104n0:364_6: arogādipariyāyenapi bodhitaṃ, tasmā akusalaṃ pana kusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtanti
anya-e0104n0:364_7: vuttaṃ “kusalapaṭipakkhanti attho”ti. Taṃ pana yathākkamaṃ pahāyakapahātabbabhāvenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:365_0: Na byākatanti abyākataṃ, kusalākusalabhāvena akathitanti attho. Tattha kusalabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:365_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Eteneva arogasarogādibhāvena ca avuttatā vaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbā. Ettha
anya-e0104n0:365_3: ca “kusalaṃ akusala”nti ca vatvā “abyākata”nti vuttattā kusalākusalabhāveneva avuttatā
anya-e0104n0:365_4: viññāyati, na pakārantarena. Avuttatā cettha na tathā avattabbatāmattena, atha kho
anya-e0104n0:365_5: tadubhayavinimuttasabhāvatāya tesaṃ dhammānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hetaṃ “avipākalakkhaṇa”nti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:366_0: 452. Bhūmibhedatoti bhavanti ettha dhammāti bhūmi, ṭhānaṃ, avatthā ca. Avatthāpi
anya-e0104n0:366_1: hi avatthāvantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ viya gayhati, evaṃ nesaṃ sukhaggahaṇaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:366_2: Tattha lokiyā bhūmi ṭhānavaseneva veditabbā, lokuttarā avatthāvasena. Lokiyā vā ṭhānāvatthāvasena,
anya-e0104n0:366_3: lokuttarā avatthāvaseneva. Kāmāvacaranti ettha vatthukāmo kilesakāmoti dve kāmā.
anya-e0104n0:366_4: Tesu vatthukāmo visesato pañca kāmaguṇā kāmīyantīti, kilesakāmo taṇhā kāmetīti. Te
anya-e0104n0:366_5: dvepi sahitā hutvā yattha avacaranti, taṃ kāmāvacaraṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti? Ekādasavidho
anya-e0104n0:366_6: kāmabhavo. Idaṃ yebhuyyena tattha avacarati pavattatīti kāmāvacaraṃ ekassa avacarasaddassa
anya-e0104n0:366_7: lopaṃ katvā. Evaṃ rūpārūpāvacarānipi veditabbāni rūpataṇhā rūpaṃ, arūpataṇhā arūpanti
anya-e0104n0:366_8: katvā. Atha vā kāmataṇhā kāmo uttarapadalopena, avacarati etthāti avacaraṃ, kāmassa
anya-e0104n0:366_9: avacaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ. Evaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacarānipi veditabbāni. Lokato uttaratīti
anya-e0104n0:366_10: lokuttaraṃ kusalassa adhippetattā. Itaraṃ pana lokato uttiṇṇanti lokuttaraṃ.
anya-e0104n0:367_0: Somanassupekkhāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedatoti ettha somanassupekkhābhedo tāva yutto tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:367_1: bhinnasabhāvattā, ñāṇasaṅkhārabhedo pana kathanti? Nāyaṃ doso ñāṇasaṅkhārakato bhedoñāṇasaṅkhārabhedo,
anya-e0104n0:367_2: so ca tesaṃ bhāvābhāvakatoti katvā. Sobhanaṃ mano, sundaraṃ vā mano etassāti sumano,
anya-e0104n0:367_3: sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ, mānasikasukhā vedanā ruḷhiyā, somanassena uppādato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0104n0:367_4: yāva bhaṅgā sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, sampayuttanti attho. Somanassasahagatatā
anya-e0104n0:367_5: cassa ārammaṇavasena veditabbā. Iṭṭhārammaṇe hi cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ hoti. Nanu
anya-e0104n0:367_6: ca iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ lobhassa vatthu, kathaṃ tattha kusalaṃ hotīti? Nayidamekantikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:367_7: iṭṭhepi ābhogādivasena kusalassa uppajjanato. Yassa hi catusampatticakkasamāyogādivasena
anya-e0104n0:367_8: yonisova ābhogo hoti, kusalameva ca mayā kattabbanti kusalakaraṇe cittaṃ niyamitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:367_9: akusalappavattito ca nivattetvā kusalakaraṇe eva pariṇāmitaṃ, abhiṇhakaraṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:367_10: ca samudācaritaṃ, tassa iṭṭhepi ārammaṇe alobhādisampayuttameva cittaṃ hoti, na lobhādisampayuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:368_0: Ñāṇena samaṃ pakārehi yuttanti ñāṇasampayuttaṃ. Ekuppādādayo eva cettha pakārāti
anya-e0104n0:368_2: Yo hi paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, anavajjāni sippāyatanakammāyatanavijjaṭṭhānāni sikkhāpetīti
anya-e0104n0:368_3: evamādikaṃ paññāsaṃvattaniyaṃ karoti, tassa kammūpanissayavasena kusalacittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:368_4: ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti. Tathā abyāpajje loke uppannassa upapattiṃ nissāya ñāṇasampayuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:368_5: hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ “tassa tattha sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, dandho, bhikkhave, satuppādo,
anya-e0104n0:368_6: atha kho so satto khippaṃyeva visesabhāgī hotī”ti. Tathā paññādasakapattassa indriyaparipākaṃ
anya-e0104n0:368_7: nissāya kusalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti. Yena pana kilesā vikkhambhitā,
anya-e0104n0:368_8: tassa kilesadūrībhāvaṃ nissāya ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ “yogā ve jāyate
anya-e0104n0:368_9: bhūri, ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo”ti. Attano vā parassa vā samussāhajanitaṃ cittapayogasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:368_10: saṅkharaṇaṃ saṅkhāro, so etassa natthīti asaṅkhāraṃ. Tena pana saha saṅkhārena pavattatīti
anya-e0104n0:368_11: sasaṅkhāraṃ. Ñāṇena vippayuttaṃ virahitanti ñāṇavippayuttaṃ. Vippayogoti cettha ñāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:368_12: abhāvo appavattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Upekkhatīti upekkhā, vedayamānāpi ārammaṇaṃ ajjhupekkhati
anya-e0104n0:368_13: majjhattatākārasaṇṭhitattāti attho. Atha vā upetā sukhadukkhānaṃ aviruddhā ikkhā
anya-e0104n0:368_14: anubhavananti upekkhā. Atha vā iṭṭhe ca aniṭṭhe ca ārammaṇe pakkhapātābhāvena upapattito
anya-e0104n0:368_15: yuttito ikkhati anubhavatīti upekkhā, tāya sahagatanti upekkhāsahagataṃ. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:369_0: Evaṃ aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacittāni uddisitvā idāni tesaṃ pavattiākāraṃ dassetuṃ “yadā
anya-e0104n0:369_1: hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha paṭiggāhakādisampattinti ettha ādi-saddena desakālakalyāṇamittādisampattiṃ
anya-e0104n0:369_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Aññaṃ vā somanassahetunti ettha aññaggahaṇena saddhābahulatā, visuddhadiṭṭhitā,
anya-e0104n0:369_4: dhammāti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Ādinayappavattanti ettha ādi-saddena na kevalaṃ “atthi
anya-e0104n0:369_5: yiṭṭha”ntiādīnaṃ navannaṃyeva sammādiṭṭhivatthūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ, atha kho dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyādīnampi
anya-e0104n0:369_6: saṅgaho veditabbo. Purakkhatvāti pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā. Tañca kho sahajātapubbaṅgamavasena
anya-e0104n0:369_7: “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”tiādīsu viya sampayogassa adhippetattā. Asaṃsīdantoti silokamacchariyādivasena
anya-e0104n0:369_8: puññakiriyāyaṃ saṃsīdaṃ saṅkocaṃ anāpajjanto, tena muttacāgatādiṃ dasseti. Anussāhitoti
anya-e0104n0:369_9: kenacipi na ussāhito. Sarasato hi puññapaṭipattidassanamidaṃ. Parehīti pana pākaṭussāhanadassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:370_0: Dānādīnīti dānaṃ sīlaṃ yāva diṭṭhijukammanti imāni dānādīni dasa puññāni, dānādīnīti
anya-e0104n0:370_1: vā dānasīlabhāvanāmayāni itaresampi sattannaṃ etthevantogadhattā. Yattha sayaṃ uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:370_2: taṃ santānaṃ punanti, pujjaṃ bhavaphalaṃ nibbattentīti vā puññāni. Assa puññacetanāsamaṅgino.
anya-e0104n0:370_3: Amuttacāgatā deyyadhamme sāpekkhacittatā. Ādi-saddena sīlasamādānādīsu anadhimuttatādiṃ
anya-e0104n0:370_4: saṅgaṇhāti. Tadevāti somanassasahagatādinā sadisatāya vuttaṃ. Sadisampi hi “tadevā”ti
anya-e0104n0:370_5: voharīyati yathā “sā eva tittirī, tāniyeva osadhānī”ti. Imasmiñhi attheti līnassa
anya-e0104n0:370_6: cittassa ussāhanapayogasaṅkhāte atthe. Etanti “saṅkhāro”ti etaṃ padaṃ. Pubbapayogassāti
anya-e0104n0:370_7: puññakiriyāyaṃ saṅkoce jāyamāne tato vivecetvā samussāhanavasena pavattassa cittapayogassa,
anya-e0104n0:370_8: pubbaggahaṇañcettha tathāpavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena so saṅkhāro hotīti katvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:370_9: na tassa saṅkhārassa pubbakālikattā. “Atthi dinna”ntiādi nayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0104n0:370_11: Somanassarahitā honti puññaṃ karontāti adhippāyo. Somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgammāti
anya-e0104n0:371_0: Evantiādi nigamanaṃ. Tayidaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi kāmāvacaraṃ kusalacittaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:371_1: yāva dhammārammaṇanti chasu ārammaṇesu yaṃ vā taṃ vā ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:371_2: kāyadvārādīhi tīhi dvārehi kāyakammādivasena uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ. Tattha ñāṇasampayuttāni
anya-e0104n0:371_3: cattāri yadā tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ uppādenti, tadā soḷasa vipākacittāni phalanti. Yadā
anya-e0104n0:371_4: pana duhetukaṃ, tadā dvādasa tihetukavajjāni. Ahetukaṃ pana paṭisandhiṃ tihetukāni
anya-e0104n0:371_5: na uppādenteva, duhetukāni pana duhetukapaṭisandhidānakāle dvādasa, ahetukapaṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0104n0:371_6: dānakāle aṭṭha phalanti. Tihetukā pana paṭisandhi duhetukehi na hotiyeva. “Aṭṭha
anya-e0104n0:371_7: phalantī”ti cetaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janakakammavasena vuttaṃ. Aññena pana kammunā “sahetukaṃ
anya-e0104n0:371_8: bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato sahetukampi
anya-e0104n0:371_9: vipākacittaṃ ahetukapaṭisandhikassa hotiyeva. Imasmiṃ ca pakkhe balavatā paccayena
anya-e0104n0:371_10: uppannaṃ asaṅkhāraṃ, dubbalena sasaṅkhāranti veditabbaṃ. Ye pana āgamanato ca vipākassa
anya-e0104n0:371_11: asaṅkhārasasaṅkhārabhāvaṃ icchanti, tesaṃ matena dvādasa, aṭṭha ca phalantīti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:371_12: Evaṃ tidhā phalaṃ dadantañcetaṃ kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ upapattiṃ, sugatiduggatīsu bhogasampadañca
anya-e0104n0:371_13: karoti. Nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi hi yaṃ devabhogasampattisadisaṃ bhogajātaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:371_14: tampi kāmāvacarakusalasseva phalaṃ. Na hi akusalassa iṭṭhaṃ phalaṃ atthīti.
anya-e0104n0:372_0: Rūpāvacaraṃ panāti pana-saddo visesatthajotako. Tena yathā kāmāvacaraṃ kilesānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:372_1: tadaṅgappahānamattakaraṃ, na evamidaṃ, idaṃ pana vikkhambhanappahānakaraṃ. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:372_2: vā taṃ vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedato aṭṭhadhā bhijjati, na evamidaṃ, idaṃ pana tato aññathā
anya-e0104n0:372_3: vāti vakkhamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti. Taṃ panetaṃ savatthukaṃ, sāsavaṃ, vinīvaraṇañca
anya-e0104n0:372_4: rūpāvacaranti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Savatthukaṃ evā”ti hi iminā arūpāvacaraṃ nivatteti, “sāsava”nti
anya-e0104n0:372_5: iminā paṭhamamaggacittaṃ, “vinīvaraṇa”nti iminā paṭighasahitadvayaṃ. Katthaci pañca
anya-e0104n0:372_6: jhānaṅgāni, katthaci cattāri, katthaci tīṇi, katthaci dve, katthaci aparāni dveti
anya-e0104n0:372_7: evaṃ jhānaṅgayogabhedato pañcavidhanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “seyyathida”ntiādi
anya-e0104n0:372_8: āraddhaṃ. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā jhānakathāyaṃ vuttameva. Tayidaṃ bhāvanāmayameva
anya-e0104n0:372_9: hutvā vuttanayena pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ ālambitvā yathārahaṃ ñāṇasampayuttakusalānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:372_10: uppajjati, hīnādibhedabhinnaṃ panetaṃ yathākkamaṃ brahmapārisajjādīsu soḷasasupi
anya-e0104n0:373_0: Rūpasaññāsamatikkamādinā samadhigantabbaṃ arūpāvacaraṃ. Catunnaṃ arūpānanti upekkhāsamādhisaṅkhātehi
anya-e0104n0:373_1: catūhi arūpajjhānehi. Karaṇe hi etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Arūpānaṃ vā yo ārammaṇādikato sampayuttadhammehi
anya-e0104n0:373_2: yogo yogabhedo, tassa vasena. Vuttappakārenāti heṭṭhā āruppakathāyaṃ vuttappakārena.
anya-e0104n0:373_3: Paṭhamanti paṭhamaṃ arūpāvacarakusalacittaṃ. Dutiyatatiyacatutthānīti etthāpi eseva
anya-e0104n0:373_4: nayo. Tānimāni bhāvanāmayāneva hutvā yathānupubbaṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ, paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:373_6: uppajjitvā catūsu arūpībrahmalokesu paṭisandhipavattivipākadāyīni. Sesaṃ panettha
anya-e0104n0:373_7: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Chavisuddhiparamparāya samadhigantabbaṃ lokuttaraṃ.
anya-e0104n0:373_8: Tattha vattabbaṃ parato āgamissati. Catumaggasampayogatoti sotāpattimaggo yāva arahattamaggoti
anya-e0104n0:373_9: imehi catūhi ariyamaggehi sampayogato. Catubbidhampi cetaṃ bhāvanāmayameva hutvā
anya-e0104n0:373_10: nibbānaṃ ālambitvā suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkhoti nāmena
anya-e0104n0:374_0: 453. Kāmāvacaramevāti ettha nikāyantariyā rūpārūpāvacarampi akusalaṃ icchantīti tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:374_1: matinisedhanatthaṃ kāmāvacaraggahaṇaṃ. Mahaggatabhūmiyaṃ uppajjantampi tattha rūpadhātuyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:374_2: pavattivipākaṃ dentampi ekantena kāmāvacaramevāti dassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ. Yadi
anya-e0104n0:374_3: evaṃ, kasmā kāmāvacaramevāti? Tattha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Kathaṃ vuttaṃ? “Kāmataṇhā
anya-e0104n0:374_4: kāmo uttarapadalopato, avacarati etthāti avacaraṃ, kāmassa avacaraṃ kāmāvacara”nti.
anya-e0104n0:374_5: Ettha hi kāmataṇhāvisayatā “kāmāvacarabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ” vuttā yathā rūpārūpataṇhāvisayatā
anya-e0104n0:374_6: “rūpārūpāvacarabhāvassa”. Ekaṃsena cetaṃ evaṃ icchitabbaṃ. Aññathā byāpilakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:374_7: na siyā. Yadi hi ālambitabbadhammavasena bhūmivavatthānaṃ kareyya, evaṃ sati anārammaṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:374_8: saṅgaho na siyā. Atha vipākadānavasena, evampi avipākānaṃ saṅgaho na siyā. Tasmā
anya-e0104n0:374_9: ālambaṇadhammavasena pariyāpannānaṃ sā kātabbā, apariyāpannānaṃ pana lokato uttiṇṇatāya
anya-e0104n0:375_0: Pariyāpannāti ca paricchedakārikāya taṇhāya paricchijja āpannā, gahitāti attho. Nanu
anya-e0104n0:375_1: cettha kāmataṇhā katamā? Kāmāvacaradhammārammaṇā taṇhā, kāmāvacaradhammā katame?
anya-e0104n0:375_3: kañci taṇhaṃ kāmataṇhābhāvena gahetvā taṃsabhāvāya taṇhāya visayabhāvena kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:375_5: kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Tadokāsatā ca taṇhāya tanninnatāya veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:376_0: Mūlato tividhanti tīṇi akusalamūlāni lobhādīni, tesaṃ vasena taṃsahitampi tividhanti
anya-e0104n0:376_1: attho. Tāni hi suppatiṭṭhitabhāvakāraṇattā mūlamivāti mūlāni, lobho mūlaṃ etassāti
anya-e0104n0:376_2: lobhamūlaṃ. Asādhāraṇena niddeso yathā bherisaddo, yavaṅkuroti. Tathā dosamūlaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:376_3: Moho eva mūlaṃ imassa, nāññanti mohamūlaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:377_1: saṅkhārabhedatoti paccekaṃ bhedasaddo yojetabbo. Yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n0:377_3: Atha vā vipariyesaggāhatāya diṭṭhiyā gatameva, na ettha gantabbavatthu tathā sabhāvanti
anya-e0104n0:377_4: diṭṭhigataṃ. Tayidaṃ “idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti abhinivesabhāvato lobheneva
anya-e0104n0:378_1: Tāya hi vipallatthacittā sattā “etāvako jīvavisayo yāva indriyagocaro”ti paralokaṃ
anya-e0104n0:378_2: paṭikkhipitvā “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”ti yathā tathā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0104n0:378_3: Ādi-saddena “esa pantho pageva vihito devayāne, yena yanti puttavanto visokā. Taṃ
anya-e0104n0:378_4: passanti pasavo, pakkhino ca, tena te mātaripi mithunaṃ carantī”tiādinā nayena puttamukhadassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:379_0: Kāme vāti ettha vā-saddo aniyamattho, tena brāhmaṇānaṃ suvaṇṇaharaṇameva adinnādāne
