anya-e0104n0:379_1: sāvajjaṃ, itaraṃ anavajjaṃ. Garūnaṃ, gunnaṃ, attano, jīvitassa, vivāhassa ca atthāya
anya-e0104n0:379_2: musāvādo anavajjo, itaro sāvajjo. Garuādīnaṃ atthāya pesuññaharaṇaṃ anavajjaṃ, itaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:379_3: sāvajjaṃ. Bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādikathā pāpavūpasamāya hotīti evamādike micchāgāhe
anya-e0104n0:379_5: micchābhinivesassa vā vasena saraseneva tikhiṇena kurūrena. Mandenāti dandhena atikhiṇena.
anya-e0104n0:379_6: Tādisaṃ pana attano, parassa vā samussāhanena pavattatīti āha “samussāhitenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:379_7: Parabhaṇḍaṃ vā haratīti vā-saddena tathāpavattanakamusāvādādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:379_8: Kāmānaṃ vā anubhuyyamānānaṃ. Vā-saddena parasantakassa vā ayathādhippetatāya yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:380_0: Duvidhameva hoti sampayuttadhammavasena bhedābhāvato. Yadi evaṃ, kasmā “domanassasahagataṃ
anya-e0104n0:380_1: paṭighasampayutta”nti vuttanti? Asādhāraṇadhammehi tassa cittassa upalakkhaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:380_3: saṅgaṇhāti. Sabhāvatikkhaṃ hutvā pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ asaṅkhārameva hoti, itaraṃ sasaṅkhāranti
anya-e0104n0:380_4: adhippāyenāha “tikkhamandappavattikāle”ti. Mandaṃ pana hutvā pavattamānaṃ ekaṃsena
anya-e0104n0:380_5: sasaṅkhāramevāti na sakkā viññātuṃ. Yaṃ sasaṅkhārena sappayogena pavattati, taṃ mandameva
anya-e0104n0:381_0: Mohekahetukaṃ cittaṃ mūlantaravirahato atimūḷhaṃ, vicikicchuddhaccayogato cañcalañcāti
anya-e0104n0:381_1: upekkhāsahagatameva hoti, na tassa kadācipi sabhāvatikkhatā atthi. Ārammaṇe hi saṃsappanavasena,
anya-e0104n0:381_2: vikkhipanavasena ca pavattamānassa cittadvayassa kīdise kicce sabhāvatikkhatāya,
anya-e0104n0:381_3: ussāhetabbatāya vā bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā na tattha saṅkhārabhedo atthi. Aññesu akusalacittesu
anya-e0104n0:381_4: labbhamānampi uddhaccaṃ visesato ettheva balavaṃ, tato eva sampayuttadhammesu padhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:381_5: hutvā pavattatīti idameva uddhaccena visesetvā vuttaṃ “uddhaccasampayutta”nti. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:381_6: hi pāḷiyaṃ idha sarūpato uddhaccaṃ āgataṃ, evaṃ asādhāraṇapadhānadhammavasena mohamūlaṃ
anya-e0104n0:382_0: Tayidaṃ dvādasavidhampi akusalacittaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu yaṃ vā taṃ vā ālambitvā upekkhāsahagatāhetukakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:382_1: kāyadvārādīhi tīhi dvārehi kāyakammādivasena yathārahaṃ pāṇātipātādikammapathavasena
anya-e0104n0:383_0: Tattha ṭhapetvā uddhaccasahagataṃ sesaṃ ekādasavidhampi catūsupi apāyesu paṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0104n0:383_1: deti, pavattivipākaṃ sugatiyampi. Uddhaccasahagataṃ pana pavattivipākamevāti. Etthāha
anya-e0104n0:383_2: – kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ sabbadubbalaṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ paṭisandhiṃ deti, adhimokkhasabbhāvato
anya-e0104n0:383_3: tato balavantampi uddhaccasahagataṃ na detīti? Dassanena pahātabbesu avuttattā. Idaṃ
anya-e0104n0:383_4: hi paṭisandhiṃ dentaṃ apāyesu dadeyya, apāyagamanīyañca dassanapahātabbanti tattha
anya-e0104n0:383_5: vucceyya, na ca vuttaṃ. Tasmā paṭisandhiṃ na deti, pavattivipākadānaṃ panassa na
anya-e0104n0:384_0: Apare panāhu – puthujjanassa uppajjamānaṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ dassanappahātabbasahāyasabbhāvato
anya-e0104n0:384_1: ubhayavipākampi deti, na sekkhassa tadabhāvatoti. Idamettha vicāretabbaṃ, yassa vipākadānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:384_2: vuttaṃ, kiṃ taṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ, udāhu noti? Kiñcettha – yadi tāva bhāvanāya
anya-e0104n0:384_3: pahātabbaṃ, paṭṭhāne bhāvanāya pahātabbassa nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo vattabbo
anya-e0104n0:384_4: siyā. Atha na bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ, dassanenapahātabbattike “nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabba”miccassa
anya-e0104n0:384_5: vibhaṅge vattabbaṃ siyā. Yadi tabbiruddhasabhāvatāya tattha na vucceyya, evampi tasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:384_6: tike tassa navattabbatā āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Cittuppādakaṇḍe āgatānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:384_7: dvādasannaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ dvīhi padehi saṅgahitattā vibhajitvā dassetabbassa
anya-e0104n0:384_8: niyogato kassaci cittuppādassa abhāvā, yathā uppannattike atītādīnaṃ navattabbatā
anya-e0104n0:384_9: na vuttā, evametassāpi. Atha vā bhāvanāya pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyassāpi tassa puthujjane
anya-e0104n0:384_10: vattamānassa bhāvanāya pahātabbasabhāvasāmaññato, sāvajjato ca bhāvanāya pahātabbapariyāyo
anya-e0104n0:384_11: vijjatīti natthi navattabbatāpasaṅgadoso. Nippariyāyena ca na bhāvanāya pahātabbanti
anya-e0104n0:384_12: tassa vasena nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvopi na vutto. Dassanapahātabbapaccayassāpi
anya-e0104n0:384_13: uddhaccasahagatassa sahāyavekallamattameva dassanena kataṃ, na kocipi bhāvo anuppādadhammataṃ
anya-e0104n0:384_14: tassa āpāditoti ekantena bhāvanāya pahātabbatā vuttā. Atha vā apāyagamanīyabhāvāpekkhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:385_1: tato eva adhikatābyākatāpekkhāya duvidhanti vuttaṃ. Aññathā rūpanibbānānampi abyākatabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:385_2: taṃ catubbidhanti vattabbaṃ siyā. Vipākassa kāmāvacarādibhāvo kusale vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n0:385_3: veditabbo. Ahetukatā sahetukatā viya sampayuttahetuvasena, na nibbattakahetuvasena.
anya-e0104n0:385_4: Vipākassa hi sahetukatā sahetukakammavasena sijjhamānāpi sampayuttahetuvaseneva vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:385_5: aññathā ahetukānampi sahetukatā āpajjeyyāti. Kasmā pana sahetukassa ahetuko vipāko
anya-e0104n0:385_6: hotīti? Tattha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Kiñca ārammaṇābhinipātamattesu pañcasu viññāṇesu
anya-e0104n0:385_7: yathā alobhādisampayogo na sambhavati, evaṃ mandataramandakiccesu sampaṭicchanasantīraṇesūti
anya-e0104n0:385_8: hetūnaṃ uppattiyā asambhavatopi nesaṃ ahetukatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:386: Manoviññāṇato uppajjanavisiṭṭhamananakiccānaṃ abhāvato manomattā dhātu manodhātu.
anya-e0104n0:387_0: Cakkhusannissitaṃ hutvā rūpassa vijānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti cakkhusannissitarūpavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:387_1: Tattha cakkhusannissitavacanena rūpārammaṇaṃ aññaṃ viññāṇaṃ nivatteti. Vijānanaggahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:387_2: cakkhusannissite phassādike nivatteti. Cakkhurūpaggahaṇena nissayato, ārammaṇato
anya-e0104n0:387_3: ca viññāṇaṃ vibhāveti ubhayādhīnavuttikattā. Yadi hi cakkhu nāma na siyā, andhāpi
anya-e0104n0:387_4: rūpaṃ passeyyuṃ, na ca passanti. Yadi ca nīlādirūpaṃ nāma na siyā, desādiniyamena
anya-e0104n0:387_5: na bhavitabbaṃ, attheva ca niyamo, ekantasārammaṇatā ca cittassa vuttāti “ārammaṇena
anya-e0104n0:387_6: vinā nīlādiābhāsaṃ cittaṃ pavattatī”ti evaṃ pavatto vādo micchāvādoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:387_7: Tenāha bhagavā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:388_0: Kasmā panettha vacanabhedo katoti? Ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hoti, rūpaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:388_1: anekameva saṃhatanti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ. Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ ekampi cakkhu
anya-e0104n0:388_2: viññāṇassa paccayo hoti, rūpaṃ pana anekamevāti? Paccayabhāvavisesato. Cakkhu hi
anya-e0104n0:388_4: hoti, tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato, asati abhāvato. Yato taṃ atthiavigatapaccayehissa
anya-e0104n0:388_5: paccayo hotīti vuccati, taṃnissayatā cassa na ekadesena allīyanavasena icchitabbā
anya-e0104n0:388_6: arūpabhāvato, atha kho garurājādīsu sissarājapurisādīnaṃ viya tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya.
anya-e0104n0:388_7: Itare pana paccayā tena tena visesena veditabbā. Svāyaṃ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṃ na
anya-e0104n0:388_8: sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti “cakkhuñca paṭiccā”ti ekavacanena niddeso kato.
anya-e0104n0:389_0: Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti puretaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:389_1: hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva upakārakattā, tathāpi anekameva saṃhataṃ hutvā paccayo
anya-e0104n0:389_2: hoti ārammaṇabhāvato. Yañhi paccayadhammaṃ sabhāvabhūtaṃ, parikappitākāramattaṃ vā
anya-e0104n0:389_3: viññāṇaṃ vibhāventaṃ pavattati, tadaññesañca satipi paccayabhāve so tassa sārammaṇasabhāvatāya
anya-e0104n0:389_4: yaṃ kiñci anālambitvā pavattituṃ asamatthassa olubbha pavattikāraṇatāya ālambanīyato
anya-e0104n0:389_5: ārammaṇaṃ nāma. Tassa yasmā yathā tathā sabhāvūpaladdhivasena ārammaṇapaccayalābho,
anya-e0104n0:389_6: tasmā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvaṃ vibhāventameva pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:389_7: Sā cassa indriyādhīnavuttikassa ārammaṇasabhāvūpaladdhi, na ekadvikalāpagatavaṇṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:389_8: hoti, nāpi katipayakalāpagatavaṇṇavasena, atha kho ābhogānurūpaṃ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti
anya-e0104n0:389_9: anekameva rūpaṃ saṃhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti dassento bhagavā “rūpe
anya-e0104n0:390_0: Yaṃ pana “rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:390_1: paccayo”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti? Tampi yādisaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:390_2: paccayo hoti, tādisameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kīdisaṃ pana tanti? Samuditanti pākaṭoyamattho.
anya-e0104n0:390_3: Evañca katvā yadeke vadanti “āyatanasallakkhaṇavasena cakkhuviññāṇādayo sallakkhaṇārammaṇā,
anya-e0104n0:390_4: na dabbasallakkhaṇavasenā”ti, tampi yuttameva hoti. Na cettha samudāyārammaṇatā āsaṅkitabbā
anya-e0104n0:390_5: samudāyābhogassevābhāvato. Samuditā pana vaṇṇadhammā ārammaṇapaccayā honti. Kathaṃ
anya-e0104n0:390_6: pana paccekaṃ asamatthā samuditā ārammaṇā paccayā honti, na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontā
anya-e0104n0:390_7: andhā samuditā passantīti? Nayidamekantikaṃ visuṃ visuṃ asamatthānaṃ sivikāvahanādīsu
anya-e0104n0:390_8: samatthatāya dassanato. Kesādīnañca yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitānaṃ paccekaṃ vaṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:390_9: na sakkā, tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samuditānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ sakkāti bhiyyopi tesaṃ saṃhaccakāritā
anya-e0104n0:390_10: paribyattā. Etena cakkhuviññāṇassa paramāṇurūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, udāhu taṃsamudāyotiādikā
anya-e0104n0:390_11: codanā paṭikkhittāti veditabbā. “Sotañca paṭicca sadde cā”tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:390_12: ubhayādhīnavuttikatāya cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayato, ārammaṇato ca vibhāvanaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:391_1: ārammaṇantaraṃ nivatteti, evaṃ rūpāyatanepi labbhamāne ekacce visese nivatteti. Na
anya-e0104n0:391_2: hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vaṇṇamattato aññaṃ kiñci visesaṃ tattha gahetuṃ sakkoti. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:391_3: bhagavā “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:391_4: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpārammaṇe eva uppajjanato tadabhimukhabhāvena gayhatīti
anya-e0104n0:391_7: upakārakā nissayārammaṇadhammā viya āsannakāraṇanti dassento āha “rūpārammaṇāya kiriyamanodhātuyā
anya-e0104n0:392_0: Cakkhuviññāṇādigahitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ tadanantarameva aparipatantaṃ katvā sampaṭicchantī
anya-e0104n0:392_1: gaṇhantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “rūpādisampaṭicchanarasā”ti. Tathābhāvena sampaṭicchanabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:393_0: Chasu ārammaṇesu kadāci pañcannaṃ, tato vā katipayānaṃ vijānanasabhāvāpi chaḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā
anya-e0104n0:393_1: vuttā taṃsabhāvānativattanato, chasveva vā itaresaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ antogadhattā. Santīraṇādikiccāti
anya-e0104n0:393_3: adhippāyo. “Hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā”ti idaṃ imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ ekanteneva
anya-e0104n0:393_5: vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Tassā bhedoti tassā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā “duvidhā”ti vuttāya
anya-e0104n0:393_6: duvidhatāsaṅkhāto bhedo. Ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇeti ekanteneva iṭṭhe ārammaṇe, ativiya
anya-e0104n0:393_7: iṭṭhārammaṇeti attho. Pañcadvāre ceva javanāvasāne cāti ettha pañcadvāre sampaṭicchanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:393_8: antarāḷaṃ ṭhānaṃ, itaratra javanabhavaṅgānanti evaṃ dviṭhānā hoti. Itarāyapi santīraṇatadārammaṇakāle
anya-e0104n0:393_9: yathāvuttameva ṭhānaṃ, paṭisandhiādikāle pana cutibhavaṅgānaṃ antarāḷaṃ paṭisandhiyā,
anya-e0104n0:393_11: antarāḷaṃ bhavaṅgassa, tadārammaṇapaṭisandhīnaṃ javanapaṭisandhīnaṃ vā antarāḷaṃ
anya-e0104n0:394_0: Chasūti ettha pubbe vuttanayeneva vibhāgo veditabbo. Kāyassa nissayabhūtānaṃ nātiiṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:394_2: ghaṭṭanā dubbalāti cakkhuviññāṇādīni upekkhāsahagatāni. Tenāha “sesaṃ upekkhāyutta”nti. Sesaṃ chabbidhampi.
anya-e0104n0:395_0: Alobhādosāmohā ceva alobhādosā ca alobhādayo, tehi alobhādīhi vipākahetūhi sampayuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:395_3: aṭṭhavidhatāya sadisataṃ dasseti. Kāmāvacarabhāvato hīnādito, yonīsu uppattito ca
anya-e0104n0:395_4: sadisameva, sampayuttadhammato pana ārammaṇato, pavattiākārato ca visadisaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:395_5: hi kusalaṃ kammadvāravasena pavattati, na idaṃ, vipākānaṃ aviññattijanakattā. Uppattidvāravasena
anya-e0104n0:395_6: pana imassāpi attheva pavattibhedo pañcadvāramanodvāresu mahāvipākānaṃ tadārammaṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:395_7: pavattisambhavato. Yathā pana kusalaṃ gativasena pañcavidhaṃ, viññāṇaṭṭhitivasena
anya-e0104n0:395_8: sattavidhañca, na evamidaṃ tadekadese eva uppajjanato. Tattha ārammaṇato, ekaccapavattiākārato
anya-e0104n0:395_9: ca visadisataṃ dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Chasu ārammaṇesūti parittādiatītādiajjhattādippabhedesu chasu ārammaṇesu.
anya-e0104n0:396_0: Āgamanādivasenāti āgamanapaccayavasena. Tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena mukhe
anya-e0104n0:396_1: calite ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ calanaṃ viya asaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko asaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n0:396_2: sasaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko sasaṅkhāroti evaṃ āgamanavasena. Ekaccānaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:396_3: matena balavantehi vibhūtehi paccayehi kammādīhi uppanno asaṅkhāro, dubbalehi sasaṅkhāroti
anya-e0104n0:396_4: evaṃ paccayavasena. Sampayuttadhammānanti pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatasampayuttadhammānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:396_5: Tesaṃ hi vasena kusalato vipākassa visesābhāvo. Nirussāhanti ettha ussāho nāma anupacchinnāvijjātaṇhāmānasantāne
anya-e0104n0:396_6: vipākuppādanasamatthatāsaṅkhāto byāpāro, so vipākesu natthīti taṃ nirussāhaṃ. Kusalesu
anya-e0104n0:397_0: Lobhādīnaṃ ekantasāvajjatāya ayonisomanasikārahetukānaṃ natthi vipākabhāvo, alobhādīnampi
anya-e0104n0:397_1: ekantaanavajjasabhāvānaṃ kāraṇassa tabbidhuratāya nattheva akusalavipākabhāvoti āha
anya-e0104n0:397_2: “akusalavipākaṃ ahetukamevā”ti. Yathā atiiṭṭhe, iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedasabbhāvato
anya-e0104n0:397_3: kusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu duvidhā hoti somanassasahagatā, upekkhāsahagatāti, na
anya-e0104n0:397_4: evaṃ atianiṭṭhe, aniṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedo atthīti akusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0104n0:397_5: ekamevāti “sattavidha”nti vuttaṃ. Sati hi tattha vedanābhede atianiṭṭhe domanassena
anya-e0104n0:397_6: bhavitabbaṃ, na ca paṭighena vinā domanassaṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0104n0:398_0: Kāyaviññāṇassa dukkhasahagatatā kusalavipāke vuttavipariyāyena veditabbā. Upekkhā
anya-e0104n0:398_1: hīnāti ekantanihīnassa akusalassa vipākabhāvato upekkhāpi samānā hīnā eva dukkhasabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n0:398_2: Tenāha “dukkhaṃ viya nātitikhiṇā”ti. Yathā dukkhaṃ ativiya tikhiṇaṃ kaṭukaṃ, na evamayaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:398_3: tathāpi dukkhasabhāveneva pavattati. Na hi akusalassa vipāko adukkho hoti. Upekkhābhāvo
anya-e0104n0:398_4: cassa balavatā bādhiyamānassa paṭippaharituṃ asakkontassa dubbalassa purisassa tena
anya-e0104n0:398_5: kariyamānabādhāya upekkhanā viyāti daṭṭhabbo. Itaresūti kusalavipākesu.
anya-e0104n0:399_0: Rūpāvacaranti rūpāvacaravipākaviññāṇaṃ. Vipākakathā hesāti. Kusalaṃ viyāti rūpāvacarakusalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:399_1: viya. Na hi rūpāvacaravipāko tadaññakusalasadiso. Apica sambandhisaddā ete, yadidaṃ
anya-e0104n0:399_2: “kusalaṃ, vipāko”ti ca. Tasmā yathā “mātaraṃ payirupāsatī”ti vutte attano mātaranti
anya-e0104n0:399_3: avuttampi siddhamevetaṃ, evaṃ idhāpīti attano kusalaṃ viyāti attho. Kusalasadisatā
anya-e0104n0:399_4: cettha dhammato, ārammaṇato ca veditabbā. Tathā hi ye phassādayo kusale labbhanti,
anya-e0104n0:399_5: te vipākepi labbhanti. Yasmiṃ ca ārammaṇe kusalaṃ pavattati, tattheva ayaṃ vipākopi
anya-e0104n0:399_6: pavattati. Yaṃ panettha pañcamajjhānacittaṃ abhiññāppattaṃ, tassa vipāko eva natthi.
anya-e0104n0:399_7: Kasmā natthi? Asambhavato, ānisaṃsabhūtattā ca. Tañhi vipākaṃ dentaṃ rūpāvacarameva
anya-e0104n0:399_8: dadeyya. Na hi aññabhūmikaṃ kammaṃ aññabhūmikaṃ vipākaṃ deti. Kammanimittārammaṇatā
anya-e0104n0:399_9: ca rūpāvacaravipākassa vuttāti na taṃ aññaṃ ārabbha pavattati. Parittārammaṇādiārammaṇañca
anya-e0104n0:399_10: taṃ na hotīti ayamasambhavo. Jhānassa ānisaṃsabhūtañca dānādīnaṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve
anya-e0104n0:400_0: Pavattito pana vipākassa, kusalassa ca attheva bhedoti taṃ dassetuṃ “kusalaṃ panā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:400_1: vuttaṃ. Kusalaṃ viya kasiṇugghāṭimākāsādiārammaṇabhedato catubbidhaṃ. Pavattibhedo
anya-e0104n0:401_2: vā phalasamāpattiyaṃ aparicchinnaparimāṇaṃ pavattamānampi dvīsu ṭhānesu pavattiyā
anya-e0104n0:401_3: “dvidhā pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbampīti tevīsatividhaṃ kāmāvacaravipākaṃ, pañcavidhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:402_0: Bhūmibhedato tividhaṃ lokuttarassa abhāvato. Lokuttarañhi kiriyacittaṃ natthi ekantena
anya-e0104n0:402_2: uppajjamānaṃ anuttaraṃ kusalaṃ puggalantarabhāvūpanayanato saphalaṃ, arahato pana
anya-e0104n0:402_3: uppajjamānaṃ puggalantarabhāvūpanayanato nipphalaṃ, tassa kiriyabhāvo kasmā na icchitoti?
anya-e0104n0:402_4: Icchitabbo siyā. Yadi tassa punappunaṃ uppatti siyā, sakiṃyeva pana lokuttarakusalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:402_5: pavattati. Yadi hi punappunaṃ pavatteyya, maggacittaṃ arahatopi pavattatīti lokuttarakiriyacittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:402_6: siyā, na cetaṃ atthi payojanābhāvato. Tasmā natthi lokuttarakiriyaviññāṇaṃ. Kiriyaviññāṇanti
anya-e0104n0:402_7: ca kiriyāmattaṃ viññāṇaṃ, kusalākusalaṃ viya kiñci vipākaṃ anuppādetvā kiriyāmattameva
anya-e0104n0:402_8: hutvā pavattanakaviññāṇanti attho. Kasmā panetaṃ vipākaṃ na uppādetīti? Vuccate –
anya-e0104n0:402_9: ettha hi yadetaṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ, taṃ anupacchinnabhavamūlepi santāne pavattaṃ anāsevanatāya
anya-e0104n0:402_10: dubbalabhāvato abījasāmatthiyaṃ viya pupphaṃ aphalameva hoti. Yaṃ pana ucchinnabhavamūlāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:402_11: santatiyaṃ pavattaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ, taṃ samucchinnamūlāya latāya pupphaṃ
anya-e0104n0:402_12: viya phaladāyi na hotīti veditabbaṃ. Aññassa asambhavato kiriyahetunā nāma alobhādināva
anya-e0104n0:403_1: Ayaṃ pana manoviññāṇato uppannāpi visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvena manomattā dhātūti manodhātu.
anya-e0104n0:403_2: Tathā hesā manoviññāṇassa paccayo na hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana dhātuniddese
anya-e0104n0:403_3: āgamissati. Āvajjanarasāti ābhogarasā, cittasantānassa vā purimākārato aññathā oṇojanarasā.
anya-e0104n0:403_5: pavattamānā sabbathā visayarasaṃ anubhavituṃ na sakkotīti iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha upekkhāyuttāva hoti.
anya-e0104n0:404_0: Sādhāraṇāti sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ sādhāraṇā. Asādhāraṇāti asekkhānaṃyeva āveṇikā.
anya-e0104n0:404_1: Voṭṭhabbanāvajjanarasāti pañcadvāre santīraṇena gahitārammaṇaṃ vavatthapentī viya
anya-e0104n0:404_2: pavattanato voṭṭhabbanarasā, manodvāre pana vuttanayena āvajjanarasā. Tathābhāvena
anya-e0104n0:404_5: yassa kassaci bhavaṅgassāti imesaṃ aññatarāpagamo etissā āsannakāraṇanti āha “ahetuka…pe… padaṭṭhānā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:405_1: aññesu vā appaṇītesu vatthūsu. Hasituppādanarasāti hasitasseva uppādanarasā. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:405_2: hi taṃ cittaṃ “hasituppādana”ntveva vuccati, na aññesaṃ hasituppādakacittānaṃ abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:405_3: Aññānipi hi dvādasa somanassasahagatāni parittakusalākusalakiriyacittāni yathārahaṃ
anya-e0104n0:405_4: puthujjanādīnaṃ hasituppādakāni vijjanti, idaṃ pana cittaṃ vicāraṇapaññāvirahitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:405_5: parittesu appaṇītesu ārammaṇesu arahantānaṃ somanassamattaṃ uppādentaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:405_6: Bhagavatopi uppajjatīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ vatvā
anya-e0104n0:405_7: “imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:405_8: ñāṇānuparivattī”ti vacanato vicāretabbanti eke. Tattha hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi
anya-e0104n0:405_10: evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷiaṭṭhakathānaṃ virodho. Evañca katvā
anya-e0104n0:405_11: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Avassañca
anya-e0104n0:405_12: etaṃ evaṃ icchitabbaṃ, aññathā aññassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa ahetukacittassa
anya-e0104n0:405_13: bhagavato uppatti na yujjeyya. Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa taṃsamuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā
anya-e0104n0:405_14: kāyakammādibhāvaṃ āpajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti. Ekantato hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā pañcavokārabhave eva uppajjanato.
anya-e0104n0:406_0: Ayamettha visesoti ayaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ uppattiyā vipākuppādanasamatthatā, arahataṃ
anya-e0104n0:406_1: uppattiyā tadabhāvoti ubhayesaṃ santāne uppattisamupalakkhito ettha kusalakiriyaviññāṇesu
anya-e0104n0:406_2: viseso. Evañca katvā paccayavekallena avipākassāpi kusalākusalassa kiriyabhāvappasaṅgo
anya-e0104n0:406_3: nivattito hoti. Parato kusalato visesoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:407_0: 455. Sabbānipi kusalākusalabyākatāni ekūnanavuti viññāṇāni honti nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayenāti
anya-e0104n0:407_1: adhippāyo. Paṭisandhiviññāṇādīnaṃ kiccaṃ nāma bhavantarapaṭisandhādinā ākārena pavatti
anya-e0104n0:407_2: eva. Tabbinimuttañca cittassa aññaṃ kiccaṃ natthīti āha “cuddasahi ākārehi pavattantī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:408_0: Ānubhāvenāti sāmatthiyena. Katūpacitaṃ hi kammaṃ avasesapaccayasamavāye vipākaṃ dentaṃ
anya-e0104n0:408_1: attano ānubhāvaṃ vissajjantaṃ viya hoti. Devamanussesūti chasu kāmāvacaradevesu ceva
anya-e0104n0:408_2: manussesu ca. Kammakammanimittagatinimittānanti ettha kammaṃ nāma katūpacitaṃ kāmāvacarakusalakammaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:408_3: tañca kho vipākadānāya laddhokāsaṃ. Tenāha “paccupaṭṭhita”nti. Kammanimittaṃ kammāyūhanakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:408_4: cetanāya paccayabhūtaṃ deyyadhammādi. Gatinimittaṃ yaṃ gatiṃ upapajjati, tappariyāpannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:408_7: bhāvitarūpārūpāvacarakusalānaṃ sattānaṃ. Kammanimittamevāti pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ attano kammārammaṇameva.
anya-e0104n0:409_0: Evaṃ tāvetthāti ettha viññāṇakkhandhaniddese evaṃ saṅkhepato sarūpadassanamatteneva
anya-e0104n0:409_1: ekūnavīsatiyā vipākaviññāṇānaṃ paṭisandhivasena pavatti veditabbā. Bhavālambanādivibhāgena
anya-e0104n0:409_2: pana yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ paṭiccasamuppādakathāyaṃ āgamissatīti.
anya-e0104n0:410_0: Taṃ tanti ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhiviññāṇesu yaṃ yaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhaṃ, taṃ taṃ
anya-e0104n0:410_1: anantaraṃ uppattiyā anubandhamānaṃ. Tassa tassevāti yassa yassa kammassa vipākabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:410_2: paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ, tassa tasseva. Tasmiññevāti kammādike eva. Kammañce paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:410_3: ārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ kamme, atha kammanimittaṃ, gatinimittañca, tasmiṃ kammanimitte
anya-e0104n0:410_4: gatinimitteti attho. Tādisamevāti yādisaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ hetuto, sesasampayuttadhammato
anya-e0104n0:410_5: ca tādisameva. Santānavinivattaketi bhavaṅgasantānassa vinivattanake. Aññasmiṃ āvajjanasaṅkhāte
anya-e0104n0:410_6: cittuppāde. Kiriyamayacitteneva supinadassanaṃ hotīti āha “supinaṃ apassato”ti. Aparimāṇasaṅkhyampi
anya-e0104n0:410_7: pavattatiyeva, tathā hidaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgabhāvena pavattanato “bhavaṅga”nti
anya-e0104n0:411_0: Indriyānīti cakkhādīni indriyāni. Ārammaṇagahaṇakkhamānīti rūpādiārammaṇaṃ gahetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:411_1: samatthāni. Mātukucchigatakāle viya hi bahinikkhantakālepi na tāva indriyāni sakiccakāni
anya-e0104n0:411_2: honti, anukkamena pana visadabhāvaṃ pattakāle eva sakiccakāni honti. Tenevāha “idha
anya-e0104n0:411_3: paripakkattā āyatanāna”nti. Āpāthagateti yogyadesāvaṭṭhite. Tameva yogyadesāvaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:411_4: rūpaṃ paṭicca ghaṭṭanā paccayaṃ laddhā. Ghaṭṭanāti paṭighāto, yena byāpārādivisesapaccayantarasahite
anya-e0104n0:411_6: upaghāto cāti attho. Tatoti ghaṭṭanānantaraṃ. Ghaṭṭanānubhāvenāti ghaṭṭanābalena.
anya-e0104n0:411_7: Bhavaṅgacalananti bhavaṅgacittassa pakampanaṃ, tathā dvikkhattuṃ pavattiyā visadisassa
anya-e0104n0:411_8: kāraṇabhāvūpagamananti attho. Tañhi cittasantānassa purimāvatthāya bhinnāvatthāhetutāya
anya-e0104n0:411_9: calanaṃ viyāti “calana”nti vuttaṃ. Visayavisayībhāvasiddhāya dhammatāya ārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:411_10: abhimukhībhāvena pasādassa tāva ghaṭṭanā hotu, aññasannissitassa pana bhavaṅgassa
anya-e0104n0:411_11: calanaṃ kathaṃ hotīti? Taṃsambandhabhāvato. Bheritale ṭhapitāsu sakkharāsu ekissā
anya-e0104n0:411_12: sakkharāya ghaṭitāya tadaññasakkharāyaṃ ṭhitamakkhikā calanaṃ cettha udāharaṇanti.
anya-e0104n0:411_13: Tadeva rūpanti tadeva bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayabhūtaṃ āpāthagataṃ rūpāyatanaṃ. Bhavaṅgaṃ
anya-e0104n0:411_14: vicchindamānā viyāti bhavaṅgasantānaṃ vicchindantī viya. Tadārammaṇuppattiyā parato
anya-e0104n0:411_15: bhavaṅgassa uppajjanato visayaggahaṇaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ dassanādīsu
anya-e0104n0:411_16: vattabbesu tāni avatvā manodvārāvajjanassa gahaṇaṃ uddese dvinnaṃ āvajjanānaṃ āvajjanasāmaññena gahitattā.
anya-e0104n0:412_0: Āvajjanānantaranti pañcadvārāvajjanānantaraṃ. Ye hadayavatthu viya sampaṭicchanādivīthicittānipi
anya-e0104n0:412_1: nānujānanti, tesaṃ “sampaṭicchanāya cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā”tiādinā tattha tattha pāḷi
anya-e0104n0:412_2: āgatā. Na hi sakkā pāḷiṃ paṭisedhetuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:413_0: “Sace mahantaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ javanapariyosānāya cittappavattiyā vuccamānattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:414_0: Yathāvavatthāpiteti voṭṭhabbanena vuttākārena katavavatthāpane. Āvajjanāya, voṭṭhabbanassa
anya-e0104n0:414_1: ca vuttattā “avasesakāmāvacarakiriyāna”nti avasesaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Cha satta vāti
anya-e0104n0:414_2: vā-saddena “pañca vā”ti idampi vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Suttamucchitādikāle hi pañcapi javanāni javantīti.
anya-e0104n0:415_0: Tāniyevāti “aṭṭhannaṃ vā”tiādinā vuttāni ekūnatiṃsa kāmāvacarajavanāniyeva. Ito aññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:415_1: manodvārāvajjanānantaraṃ uppajjanakacittaṃ nāma natthīti dassanatthaṃ evakāraggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:415_2: “Gotrabhūto”ti idaṃ gotrabhuṭṭhāniyānaṃ parikammavodānānampi gahaṇaṃ, na gotrabhuno
anya-e0104n0:415_3: eva. Phalacittānīti samāpattivasena pavattanakaphalacittāni. Yaṃ yaṃ laddhapaccayanti
anya-e0104n0:415_4: yaṃ yaṃ javanaṃ rūpāvacarajavanādivasena gotrabhuanantaraṃ uppattiyā laddhapaccayaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:416_0: Atimahantanti soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ. Tattha hi tadārammaṇacittaṃ uppajjati, na aññattha.
anya-e0104n0:416_1: Vibhūtanti supākaṭaṃ, tañca kāmāvacarameva. Tattha hi tadārammaṇassa uppatti. Kāmāvacarajavanāvasāneti
anya-e0104n0:416_2: kāmāvacarajavanasseva avasāne. Na hi taṃ kāmataṇhāhetukakammanibbattaṃ mahaggatānuttarajavanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:416_3: anubandhati ajanakattā, janakāsadisattā ca. Yathā gehato bahi gantukāmo taruṇadārako
anya-e0104n0:416_4: janakaṃ, janakasadisaṃ vā anubandhati, na aññaṃ, evamidampi. Tatthāpi na sabbasmā
anya-e0104n0:416_5: javanā sabbaṃ javanena tadārammaṇassa niyametabbato, ārammaṇena ca vedanāya parivattetabbato.
anya-e0104n0:416_7: atimahati visaye pañcannaṃ somanassasahagatānaṃ aññataraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:416_9: channaṃ tadārammaṇānaṃ aññataraṃ pavattati. Iṭṭhārammaṇādīnanti iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhārammaṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:416_10: vasenāti sambandho. Tayidaṃ ārammaṇena vedanāparivattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. “Purimakammavasenā”ti
anya-e0104n0:416_11: idaṃ tadārammaṇavisesadassanatthaṃ. Na hi paṭisandhijanakameva kammaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:416_12: janeti, atha kho aññakammampi. Taṃ pana paṭisandhidāyinā kammena nibbattetabbatadārammaṇato
anya-e0104n0:416_14: “Javanena tadārammaṇaṃ niyametabba”nti hi vuttaṃ. Ādi-saddena paṭisandhicittaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:416_15: Tañhi attano ukkaṭṭhatarassa tadārammaṇassa paccayo na hoti. Yo yo paccayo laddho
anya-e0104n0:416_16: hotīti yathāvuttesu iṭṭhārammaṇādīsu yo yo tadārammaṇassa uppattiyā paccayo samaveto
anya-e0104n0:416_17: hoti. Kiñci antaranti kiñci khaṇantaraṃ. Udakamivāti paṭisotaṃ gacchantaṃ udakamiva.
anya-e0104n0:417_0: Dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃ vāti vacanasiliṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ “aṭṭha vā dasa vā”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n0:417_1: Dvikkhattuṃyeva pana vaṇṇenti. Vipākacittattā, āvajjanassa ca vidūrattā, mūlabhavaṅgādibhavaṅgasāmaññasabbhāvato
anya-e0104n0:417_2: ca bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇe pavattanārahaṃ samānaṃ tassa javanassa ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:417_3: etassāti tadārammaṇanti vuccati ekassa ārammaṇasaddassa lopaṃ katvā “kāmāvacaraṃ,
anya-e0104n0:417_4: oṭṭhamukha”nti ca yathā. Ettha ca keci “paṭṭhāne ‘kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā
anya-e0104n0:417_5: uppajjatī’ti vipākadhammadhammānaṃ eva anantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ vutta”nti kiriyājavanānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:417_6: na icchanti. Vipphāravantaṃ hi javanaṃ nāvaṃ viya nadīsoto bhavaṅgaṃ anubandhati,
anya-e0104n0:417_7: na pana chaḷaṅgupekkhāvato santavuttikiriyajavanaṃ paṇṇapuṭaṃ viya nadīsototi. Tayidaṃ
anya-e0104n0:417_8: labbhamānassāpi kenaci adhippāyena katthaci avacanaṃ dissati, yathā taṃ dhammasaṅgahe
anya-e0104n0:417_9: akusalaniddese labbhamānopi adhipati na vutto. Yañca paṇṇapuṭaṃ nidassitaṃ, tampi
anya-e0104n0:417_10: nidassitabbena na samānaṃ. Nāvāpaṇṇapuṭānañhi nadīsotassa āvaṭṭanaṃ, gati ca visadisīti
anya-e0104n0:417_11: nāvāya nadīsotassa anubandhanaṃ, paṇṇapuṭassa ananubandhanañca yujjati, idha pana
anya-e0104n0:417_12: kiriyajavanetarajavanānaṃ bhavaṅgasotassa āvaṭṭanaṃ, gati ca sadisīti etassa ananubandhanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:417_13: itarassa anubandhanañca na yujjati. Tasmā vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:418_0: Bhavaṅgamevāti avadhāraṇaṃ bhavapariyosānassa idha na adhippetattā. Aññathā tadārammaṇāvasāne
anya-e0104n0:418_1: cutipi na hotiyeva. Dassanādīnīti dassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanāni. Iti-saddo
anya-e0104n0:418_2: ādiattho, tena sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Paṭisandhito bhavaṅgameva, bhavaṅgato
anya-e0104n0:418_3: āvajjanamevāti evaṃ pavattacittaniyamavaseneva. Tampīti cuticittampi. Paṭisandhibhavaṅgacittāni
anya-e0104n0:419_0: Bhavagatiṭhitinivāsesūti tīsu bhavesu, pañcasu gatīsu, sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu, navasu
anya-e0104n0:419_1: sattāvāsesu ca. Yo panettha acittako, so idha na gahetabbo viññāṇakathābhāvato. “Etthā”ti
anya-e0104n0:419_2: idaṃ “saṃsaramānānaṃ sattāna”nti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ. Ettha etesu vuttanayena saṃsaramānesu
anya-e0104n0:419_3: sattesu yo pana arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti sammāpaṭipattimanvāyāti adhippāyo. Tassa arahato
anya-e0104n0:422_0: 456. Vedena anubhavanākārena ayitaṃ pavattaṃ vedayitaṃ, vedayitanti lakkhitabbadhammajātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:422_1: vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ. Taṃ pana atthato vedanā evāti āha “vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ nāma vedanāvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:422_2: Atha vā vedayitaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti kappanāsiddhaṃ bhedaṃ nissāya aññapadatthasamāsavasenāpi
anya-e0104n0:422_3: vedanāva vuccatīti āha “vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ nāma vedanāvā”ti. Vedayati vedayatīti byāpanicchāvasena
anya-e0104n0:422_4: vacanaṃ vedanāya savisaye abhiṇhappavattidassanatthaṃ. Sabhāvadhammato añño kattā
anya-e0104n0:422_5: natthīti dassanatthaṃ kattuniddeso. Itīti aniyamato hetuattho. Khoti vacanālaṅkāramattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:422_6: Tasmāti tassa niyamanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā yathāpaccayaṃ ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati,
anya-e0104n0:423_0: “Kusalaviññāṇena sampayuttā”ti idaṃ kusalāya vedanāya upalakkhaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yā
anya-e0104n0:423_1: kāci kusalā vedanā, sabbā sā kusalena viññāṇena sampayuttāti, na pana tassā kusalabhāvasaṃsiddhidassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:423_2: Na hi kusalena viññāṇena sampayogato kusalāya vedanāya kusalabhāvo, atha kho yonisomanasikārādikato.
anya-e0104n0:423_3: Tenāha “jātivasenā”ti. Akusalādīsupi eseva nayo. Yathā pana jātivasena kusalādiviññāṇasampayuttatāya
anya-e0104n0:423_4: tividhā, evaṃ yāva ekūnanavutiviññāṇasampayuttāti ekūnanavutividhā veditabbā. Sabhāvabhedatoti
anya-e0104n0:423_5: sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇādivasena labbhamānaṃ bhedaṃ aggahetvā kevalaṃ sabhāvakatabhedato evāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:424_0: “Pañcavidhā”ti vatvā taṃ pañcavidhataṃ dassetuṃ “sukha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sukhayatīti
anya-e0104n0:424_1: sukhaṃ, kāyaṃ, sampayuttadhamme ca laddhassāde karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khādati,
anya-e0104n0:424_2: khaṇati vā kāyikaṃ ābādhanti sukhaṃ. Sukaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etassāti sukhanti apare.
anya-e0104n0:424_3: Dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ, kāyaṃ, sampayuttadhamme ca vibādhatīti attho. Duṭṭhu vā khādati,
anya-e0104n0:424_4: khaṇati vā kāyikaṃ assādanti dukkhaṃ. Dukkaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etassāti dukkhanti apare.
anya-e0104n0:424_5: Somanassupekkhānaṃ saddattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Domanassassa somanasse vuttanayānusārena
anya-e0104n0:424_6: veditabbaṃ. Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ mānasetarasātāsātavasena sukhaṃ, dukkhañca vibhajitvā
anya-e0104n0:424_7: vuttaṃ “sukhaṃ somanassaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassa”nti, upekkhā pana mānasī, itarā ca ekadhāva
anya-e0104n0:424_8: vuttāti? Bhedābhāvato. Yathā hi anuggahūpaghātakatāya sukhadukkhāni aññathā kāyassa
anya-e0104n0:424_9: anuggahamupaghātañca karonti, aññathā manaso, na evamupekkhā. Tasmā bhedābhāvato
anya-e0104n0:425_0: Tattha yena sabhāvabhedena vedanā pañcavidhā, sā pavattiṭṭhāne dassite supākaṭā hotīti
anya-e0104n0:425_1: pavattiṭṭhānaṃ tāva dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Akusalavipākenāti etthāpi “kāyaviññāṇena
anya-e0104n0:425_2: sampayutta”nti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Yathā adhikaraṇīmatthake kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ
anya-e0104n0:425_3: ṭhapetvā ayokūṭena paharantassa picupiṇḍaṃ atikkamitvā kūṭaṃ adhikaraṇiṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0104n0:425_4: nighaṃso balavā hoti, evaṃ paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsassa balavabhāvato iṭṭhe, iṭṭhamajjhatte
anya-e0104n0:425_5: ca ārammaṇe kāyaviññāṇaṃ sukhasahagataṃ hoti. Aniṭṭhe, aniṭṭhamajjhatte ca dukkhasahagatanti
anya-e0104n0:425_6: āha “kusala…pe… dukkha”nti. Kāmāvacaravipākaviññāṇāni pañca kammārammaṇavasena somanassasahagatāni
anya-e0104n0:425_7: honti, rūpāvacaravipākāni cattāri kammavasena, sesāni terasa kāmāvacarāni, aṭṭha
anya-e0104n0:425_9: somanassasahagatāni hontīti āha “somanassaṃ dvāsaṭṭhiyā viññāṇehi sampayutta”nti.
anya-e0104n0:426_0: Avasesapañcapaññāsāyāti yathāvuttāni chasaṭṭhi viññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasesāya pañcapaññāsāya.
anya-e0104n0:426_2: bhavituṃ yuttānipi dvinnaṃ picupiṇḍānaṃ viya dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ upādārūpānaṃ ghaṭṭanānighaṃsassa
anya-e0104n0:426_3: mandabhāvato cakkhādisannissitāni aṭṭhapi viññāṇāni sabbattha upekkhāsampayuttāneva
anya-e0104n0:426_4: honti, tathā balavapaccayatāya sukhadukkhānaṃ tesañca tadabhāvato. Apubbārammaṇanissayappavattīni
anya-e0104n0:426_8: honti. Kammavasena vā vipākānubhavanassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇesu adukkhamasukhabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:426_9: yutto. Sati ca vipākabhūtāya upekkhāya sukhadukkhamajjhattabhāve kammārammaṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:426_10: kusalavipākāya iṭṭhabhāvo, akusalavipākāya aniṭṭhabhāvo ca veditabbo. Avasiṭṭhāni
anya-e0104n0:426_12: hontīti evaṃ pañcapaññāsāya viññāṇehi upekkhāya sampayuttatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:427_0: Salakkhaṇaṃ nāma dhammānaṃ anaññasādhāraṇo sabhāvo, anubhavanañca sabbavedanānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:427_1: sādhāraṇalakkhaṇanti taṃ paṭiniyatena ārammaṇena niyametvā dassento āha “iṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:427_2: sukha”nti tassa byabhicārābhāvato. Bhusaṃ brūhanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ upabrūhanaṃ. Tayidaṃ
anya-e0104n0:427_3: kāmañca cetasikasukhepi labbhati, taṃ pana savikappakaṃ cetobhisaṅkhāravasenāpi hoti.
anya-e0104n0:427_4: Idantu nibbikappakaṃ sabhāvasiddhattā tato sātisayanti āha “sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:427_5: Assādiyatīti assādo, sukhāvedanā. Tenāha bhagavā “yaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhe
anya-e0104n0:427_6: paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhesu
anya-e0104n0:427_7: assādo”ti. Kāyanissitattā kāye bhavo kāyiko, so eva assādo tathā paccupatiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0104n0:429_0: Sabhāvato, parikappato vā iṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:429_1: Tenāha “yathā tathā vā iṭṭhākārasambhogarasa”nti, yathābhūtena vā ayathābhūtena vā
anya-e0104n0:429_3: idaṃ “passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedetī”ti suttapadaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ, taṃ pana nirāmisasomanassavasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:430: Somanasse vuttavipariyāyena domanassassa lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni. Domanassassa kāmadhātuyaṃ uppajjanato ekantena hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānatā tato viseso.
anya-e0104n0:431_0: Majjhattassa, ārammaṇassa majjhattaṃ vā vedayitaṃ anubhavanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti
anya-e0104n0:431_2: “Santabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti idaṃ anavajjāya nirāmisāya upekkhāya vasena veditabbaṃ, na sabbāya.
anya-e0104n0:434: 457. Sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ nāma saññāvātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vedanākkhandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:435_0: Kāmaṃ vedanāyapi vippayuttaṃ viññāṇaṃ natthi, tassā pana sabhāvato bhinnattā kāyaci
anya-e0104n0:435_1: vedanāya sampayuttampi kāyaci vippayuttaṃ hoti. Saññāya pana īdisaṃ natthīti āha
anya-e0104n0:436_0: Sabbāvāti catubhūmikāpi. Atha vā yathā vedanā bhinnasabhāvattā bhedanalakkhaṇādito
anya-e0104n0:436_1: vuttā, na evamayaṃ, ayaṃ pana sabbāva sañjānanalakkhaṇā. Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:436_2: sañjānanaṃ saññaṃ katvā jānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sañjānanalakkhaṇā. Tathā hi sā
anya-e0104n0:436_3: abhiññāṇena sañjānanato paccābhiññāṇarasāti vuccati. Nimittena hi puna sañjānanakiccā
anya-e0104n0:436_4: paccābhiññāṇarasā. Tassā vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇaṃ katvā tena abhiññāṇena paccābhijānanakāle
anya-e0104n0:436_5: pavatti veditabbā. Tenāha “tadeveta”ntiādi. Puna sañjānanassa paccayo punasañjānanapaccayo,
anya-e0104n0:436_6: tadeva nimittaṃ puna…pe… nimittaṃ, tassa karaṇaṃ, puna…pe… karaṇaṃ, punasañjānanapaccayabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:436_7: vā nimittakaraṇaṃ puna…pe… karaṇaṃ, tadassā kiccanti punasañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā.
anya-e0104n0:436_8: Punasañjānananimittakaraṇaṃ nimittakārikāya, nimittena sañjānanantiyā ca sabbāya
anya-e0104n0:436_9: saññāya samānaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Abhinivesakaraṇaṃ “idameva sacca”nti saññābhinivesamatteneva
anya-e0104n0:436_11: saññā ñāṇameva anuvattati, tasmā abhinivesakārikā, viparītaggāhikā ca na hoti. Eteneva
anya-e0104n0:436_12: samādhisampayuttatāya aciraṭṭhānatā ca na hotīti veditabbā. Evaṃ rāgadiṭṭhimānādisampayuttāya
anya-e0104n0:439_0: 458. Rāsikaraṇalakkhaṇanti sampiṇḍanalakkhaṇaṃ, tato saṅkhārā āyūhanarasā vuccanti.
anya-e0104n0:439_1: Cetanāpadhānatāya hi saṅkhārakkhandhadhammā evaṃ vuttā. Tenevāha “kiṃ pana tanti
anya-e0104n0:439_2: saṅkhārāyevā”tiādi. Tattha saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti yathā attano phalaṃ saṅkhataṃ
anya-e0104n0:439_3: sammadeva nipphannaṃ hoti, evaṃ abhisaṅkharontīti attho. Vipphārapaccupaṭṭhānāti
anya-e0104n0:439_4: ettha vipphāro nāma vipphāravantatā, tasmā sabyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:440_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ citte uppanne niyamena uppajjanato niyatā. Sarūpena āgatāti evaṃ piṭṭhivattake
anya-e0104n0:440_1: akatvā pāḷiyā sarūpeneva āgatā. Kadācideva uppajjanato na niyatāti aniyatā. Yadipi
anya-e0104n0:440_2: aniyatā ekajjhaṃ na uppajjanti, tasmiṃ pana citte uppajjanadhammatāya “chattiṃsā”ti
anya-e0104n0:440_3: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “uppajjamānāpi ca na ekato uppajjantī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:441_0: 459. Phusatīti kattuniddeso. Yaṃ tattha kāraṇaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Phusanti etenāti
anya-e0104n0:441_1: vā phasso. Sampayuttadhammā hi ārammaṇe pavattamānā taṃ phusanalakkhaṇena phassena
anya-e0104n0:441_2: phusantā viya honti. Ārammaṇaphusanamattaṃ vā phassoti sādhanattayampi yujjateva.
anya-e0104n0:441_5: Yadi ayaṃ dhammo cetasiko, svāyaṃ arūpadhammo samāno kathaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo, saṅghaṭṭanarasādiko
anya-e0104n0:441_6: ca hotīti antolīnaṃ codanaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā tassa sodhanatthaṃ “arūpadhammopi samāno”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:441_7: vuttaṃ. Tattha “phusanākāreneva pavattatī”ti iminā arūpassāpi tassa dhammassa ayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:441_8: sabhāvoti dasseti. Sā ca tassa phusanākārappavatti ambilaambapakkādiṃ khādantaṃ passantassa
anya-e0104n0:441_9: parassa kheḷuppatti, paraṃ vibādhiyamānaṃ disvā dayālukassa sarīrakampanaṃ, rukkhasākhagge
anya-e0104n0:441_10: duṭṭhitaṃ purisaṃ disvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa bhīrukapurisassa jaṅghacalanaṃ, pisācādibhāyitabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:442_0: Ekadesenāti kaṭṭhadvayādi viya attano ekapassena. Anallīyamānopīti asaṃsiliyamānopi.
anya-e0104n0:442_1: Rūpasaddehi saha phassassa sāmaññaṃ anallīyamānasaṅghaṭṭanameva, na visayabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:442_2: Yathā rūpasaddā cakkhusotāni anallīyamānā eva “phusita”ntiādinā vuttā, evaṃ phassassāpi
anya-e0104n0:442_4: eva. Tenāha “cittamārammaṇañca saṅghaṭṭetī”ti. Kiccaṭṭhena rasena saṅghaṭṭanarasatā
anya-e0104n0:442_5: vuttā, vatthārammaṇasannipātena vā sampajjatīti saṅghaṭṭanasampattiko phasso saṅghaṭṭanaraso
anya-e0104n0:442_6: vutto. Yathā “dve pāṇī vajjeyyu”ntiādīsu pāṇissa pāṇimhi saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūtā
anya-e0104n0:442_7: rūpadhammā, evaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūto eko cetasikadhammo
anya-e0104n0:442_8: daṭṭhabbo. “Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti vacanato cakkhurūpaviññāṇādīnaṃ saṅgativasena
anya-e0104n0:442_9: gahetabbattā āha “tikasannipātasaṅkhātassā”tiādi. Tassa phassassa kāraṇabhūto tadanurūpo
anya-e0104n0:442_10: samannāhāro tajjāsamannāhāro. Indriyassa tadabhimukhabhāvo, āvajjanāya ca ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:442_11: visayassa parikkhatatā abhisaṅkhatatā, viññāṇassa visayabhāvakaraṇanti attho. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:442_12: niccammā gāvī yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatā, tattha tattha dukkhameva pāpuṇāti, evaṃ phasse
anya-e0104n0:442_13: sati vedanā uppajjateva. Vedanā ca dukkhasallādisabhāvāti vuttaṃ “vedanādhiṭṭhānabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:443_0: 460. Abhisandahati pabandhati pavatteti. Cetanābhāvo byāpārabhāvo. Āyūhanaṃ cetayanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:443_1: īriyanaṃ. Saṃvidahanaṃ vicāraṇaṃ. Āyūhanarasāya cetanāya pavattamānāya sabbepi sampayuttadhammā
anya-e0104n0:443_2: yathāsakaṃ kiccappasutā hontīti sā sakiccaparakiccasādhikā vuttā. Jeṭṭhasisso pare
anya-e0104n0:443_3: sajjhāyane uyyojento sayampi sajjhāyati. Mahāvaḍḍhakimhi vaḍḍhakikammaṃ kātumāraddhe
anya-e0104n0:443_4: itarepi karontiyeva. Ussāhanabhāvenāti ādarakaraṇabhāvena. Sā hi sayaṃ ādarabhūtā
anya-e0104n0:443_5: sampayuttadhamme ādarayatīti. Āyūhanavasena ussāhanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na vīriyussāhavasena.
anya-e0104n0:444_0: 461. Vīrabhāvoti yena vīro nāma hoti, so dhammoti attho. Vidhinā īretabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
anya-e0104n0:444_1: vā vīriyaṃ, ussāho, taṃtaṃkiccasamārambho, parakkamo vā. Upatthambhanaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:444_2: kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā dhāraṇaṃ anubalappadānaṃ, sampaggaṇhanaṃ vā. Saṃsīdanapaṭipakkho
anya-e0104n0:444_3: dhammo asaṃsīdanaṃ, na saṃsīdanābhāvamattanti asaṃsīdanabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0104n0:444_5: kusalakiriyāya vīriyārambhavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ. “Maggo gantabbo hoti, maggo gato, kammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:444_6: kātabbaṃ, kammaṃ kataṃ, appamattako ābādho uppanno, gilānā vuṭṭhito hoti, aciravuṭṭhito
anya-e0104n0:444_7: gelaññā, gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya vicaranto na labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā
anya-e0104n0:444_8: bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, labhati…pe… pāripūri”nti evaṃ vuttāni etāni anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni
anya-e0104n0:445_0: 462. Attanā anupāletabbānaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ anupālanaṃ jīvitassa byāpāro, tañca
anya-e0104n0:445_1: nesaṃ jīvananti taṃ tassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ purakkhatvā vuttaṃ “jīvanti tenā”ti. Tampi
anya-e0104n0:445_2: cassa atthato jīvanamevāti āha “jīvanamattameva vā ta”nti.
anya-e0104n0:446_0: 463. Ādhiyatīti ṭhapeti. Avisāro attano eva avisaraṇasabhāvo. Avikkhepo sampayuttānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:446_1: dhammānaṃ avikkhittatā. Yena sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so dhammo avikkhepoti.
anya-e0104n0:446_2: Avūpasamalakkhaṇassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhatāya cittassa upasamanākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti
anya-e0104n0:446_3: upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno. Visesatoti yebhuyyena. Sukhavirahitopi hi atthi samādhīti.
anya-e0104n0:447_0: 464. Saddahanti etāyāti saddahanakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:447_1: saddhāya paccayataṃ dasseti. Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathāpaccayabhāve sati puggalo saddahatīti
anya-e0104n0:447_2: vohāro hoti. Saddahanaṃ saddheyyavatthuno pattiyāyanaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti saddahanalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0104n0:447_3: Okappanalakkhaṇāti anupavisitvā evametanti kappanalakkhaṇā. Kālussiyamalaṃ vidhametvā
anya-e0104n0:447_4: sampayuttānaṃ, puggalasseva vā pasādanaṃ anāvilabhāvakaraṇaṃ raso etissāti pasādanarasā.
anya-e0104n0:447_5: Pakkhandanaṃ adhimuccanavasena ārammaṇassa anupavisanaṃ. Akālusabhāvo akālussiyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:447_6: anāvilabhāvoti attho. Pasādanīyaṭṭhānesu pasādaviparītaṃ akusalaṃ assaddhiyaṃ, micchādhimutti
anya-e0104n0:447_7: ca, tappaccanīkova pasādabhūto vatthugato nicchayo adhimutti, na yevāpanakādhimokkho.
anya-e0104n0:447_9: sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Kusaladhammānaṃ ādāne hatthaṃ viya, sabbasampattisampadāne vittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:448_0: 465. Saranti tāyāti saraṇakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:448_1: satiyā paccayataṃ dasseti. Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathāpaccayabhāve sati taṃsamaṅgipuggalo
anya-e0104n0:448_2: saratīti vohāro hoti. Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa
anya-e0104n0:448_3: ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ saraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ. Sammosapaccanīkaṃ kiccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:448_4: asammoso, na sammosābhāvamattaṃ. “Satārakkhena cetasā”ti vacanato ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:448_5: Aññato āgantvā cittavisaye abhimukho bhavati etāyāti visayābhimukhabhāvo, sati. Satiyā
anya-e0104n0:448_6: vatthubhūtā kāyādayova kāyādisatipaṭṭhānāni, sati eva vā purimā pacchimāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:449_0: 466. Kāyaduccaritādīhīti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ. Hiriyatīti lajjākārena jigucchati.
anya-e0104n0:449_1: Tehiyevāti kāyaduccaritādīhiyeva. Ottappatīti ubbijjati. Hirī pāpadhamme gūthaṃ viya
anya-e0104n0:449_2: passantī jigucchatīti āha “pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī”ti. Ottappaṃ te uṇhaṃ viya
anya-e0104n0:449_3: passantaṃ tato uttasatīti vuttaṃ “uttāsalakkhaṇaṃ ottappa”nti. Vuttappakārenāti lajjākārena,
anya-e0104n0:449_4: uttāsākārena ca. Attagāravapadaṭṭhānā hirī ajjhattasamuṭṭhānatāya, attādhipatitāya
anya-e0104n0:449_5: ca. Paragāravapadaṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānatāya, lokādhipatitāya ca. Tamevatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:449_6: pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “attānaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca hiriottappānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:449_7: tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā, na panetesaṃ kadāci aññamaññavippayogā. Na hi
anya-e0104n0:449_8: lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ, pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthīti. Lokapālakāti ettha “dveme, bhikkhave,
anya-e0104n0:449_9: sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālentī”ti suttapadaṃ attādhipati, lokādhipatibhāve ca “so attānaṃyeva
anya-e0104n0:449_10: adhipatiṃ karitvā, so lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā”ti ca suttapadāni āharitvā vattabbāni.
anya-e0104n0:450_0: 467. Yasmā lobhapaṭipakkho alobhoti ye dhammā tena sampayuttā, taṃsamaṅgino vā sattā
anya-e0104n0:450_1: tena na lubbhanti, sayaṃ kadācipi na lubbhateva, atthato vā alubbhanākāro eva ca
anya-e0104n0:450_2: hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “na lubbhantī”tiādi. Eseva nayoti “na dussanti tenā”tiādinā kārakattayayojanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:450_3: atidisati. Agedho agijjhanaṃ anabhikaṅkhanaṃ. Alaggabhāvo anāsattatā. Apariggaho
anya-e0104n0:450_4: kassaci vatthuno mamattavasena asaṅgaho. Anallīno bhāvo adhippāyo etassāti anallīnabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:451_0: 468. Caṇḍikassa bhāvo caṇḍikkaṃ, kopo. Tappaṭipakkho acaṇḍikkaṃ, abyāpādo. Avirodho
anya-e0104n0:451_1: aviggaho. Anukūlamitto anuvattako. Vinayarasoti vinayanaraso. Sommabhāvo mejjanavasena hilādanīyatā.
anya-e0104n0:452_0: 469. Dhammānaṃ yo yo sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo, tassa tassa paṭivijjhanaṃ yathāsabhāvapaṭivedho.
anya-e0104n0:452_1: Akkhalitaṃ avirajjhitvā paṭivedho akkhalitapaṭivedho. Visayassa obhāsanaṃ tappaṭicchādakasammohandhakāravidhamanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:452_2: visayobhāsanaṃ. Katthacipi visaye asammuyhanākāreneva paccupatiṭṭhati, sammohapaṭipakkhatāya
anya-e0104n0:452_3: vā tadabhāvaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti asammohapaccupaṭṭhāno. Sabbakusalānaṃ mūlabhūtāti
anya-e0104n0:452_5: tesaṃ kusalabhāvasādhanena. Yadi hi tesaṃ kusalabhāvo kusalamūlapaṭibaddho siyā,
anya-e0104n0:452_6: evaṃ sati taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpesu hetupaccayatā na siyā. Na hi te tesaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:452_7: sādhenti, na ca paccayā na honti. Vuttañhetaṃ “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:452_8: taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti. Yathā ca kusalabhāvo, evaṃ abyākatabhāvopi
anya-e0104n0:452_9: abyākatamūlappaṭibaddho siyā. Tathā sati ahetukacittānaṃ abyākatabhāvo eva na siyā,
anya-e0104n0:452_10: akusalesu ca yattha ekaṃyeva mūlaṃ, tassa akusalabhāvo na siyā, ubhayampi hotiyeva.
anya-e0104n0:452_11: Tasmā na mūlappaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo, atha kho yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho. Tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:453_0: 470. Passambhanaṃ darathavūpasamo. Kāyasaddo samūhavācī, so ca kho vedanādikkhandhattayavasenāti
anya-e0104n0:453_1: āha “kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā”ti. Tenevāha “tattha katamā tasmiṃ samaye
anya-e0104n0:453_2: kāyapassaddhi hoti? Yā tasmiṃ samaye vedanākkhandhassā”tiādi. Daratho sārambho, domanassapaccayānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:453_3: uddhaccādhikānaṃ kilesānaṃ, tathāpavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:453_5: Uddhaccappadhānā kilesā uddhaccādikilesā, uddhaccaṃ vā ādiṃ katvā sabbakilese saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:454: Garubhāvo dandhatā, thinamiddhādhikānaṃ, tathāpavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Dandhatāya paṭipakkho adandhatā, na dandhatāya abhāvamattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:455_0: Thaddhabhāvo thambho, diṭṭhimānādhikānaṃ, tappadhānānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānametaṃ
anya-e0104n0:455_1: nāmaṃ. Thaddhabhāvanimmaddanato eva katthaci ārammaṇe appaṭihatākārena paccupatiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n0:455_2: sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha appaṭighātaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentīti appaṭighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:456_0: Kammani sādhu kammaññaṃ, na kammaññaṃ akammaññaṃ, tassa bhāvo akammaññabhāvo, dānasīlādipuññakiriyāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:456_1: ayogyatā. Atthato kāmacchandādisaṃkilesadhammā, tappadhānā vā cattāro akusalakkhandhā.
anya-e0104n0:456_2: Kammaññabhāveneva sampannākārena ārammaṇassa gahaṇaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇasampatti. Vuttāvasesā
anya-e0104n0:456_3: kāmacchandādayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca saṃkilesadhammā avasesanīvaraṇādayo. Vinibandhanimmaddanena
anya-e0104n0:456_4: sukhappavattihetutāya pasādanīyavatthūsu pasādāvahā. Suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyāti yathā
anya-e0104n0:457_0: Kāyacittānaṃ gelaññaṃ, assaddhiyādi, tadekaṭṭhā ca pāpadhammā. Gelaññapaṭipakkho
anya-e0104n0:457_1: agelaññaṃ, tabbhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ etāsanti agelaññabhāvalakkhaṇā. Yathāvuttagelaññanimmaddaneneva
anya-e0104n0:457_2: natthi etāsaṃ ādīnavo doso, na vā etā ādīnaṃ kapaṇaṃ vanti pavattantīti nirādīnavā,
anya-e0104n0:457_3: tenākārena paccupatiṭṭhanti, taṃ vā sampayuttesu paccupaṭṭhapentīti nirādīnavapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:458_0: Kāyasambandhī, cittasambandhī ca ujubhāvoti lakkhitabbatāya kāyacittaajjavalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0104n0:458_2: kāyacittakuṭilabhāvanimmaddanarasā. Tato eva sabbathāpi ajimhabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n0:458_4: māyā, asantaguṇasambhāvanalakkhaṇaṃ sāṭheyya”nti evaṃ vuttā tadākārappavattā akusalā
anya-e0104n0:458_5: khandhā, tadekaṭṭhā ca saṃkilesadhammā māyāsāṭheyyādikā. Ettha ca cittapassaddhiādīhi
anya-e0104n0:458_6: cittameva passaddhaṃ, lahu, mudu, kammaññaṃ, paguṇaṃ, uju ca hoti. Kāyapassaddhiādīhi
anya-e0104n0:458_7: pana rūpakāyopi. Tenevettha bhagavatā dhammānaṃ duvidhatā vuttā, na sabbattha.
anya-e0104n0:459_0: 471. Chandanaṃ chando, ārammaṇena atthikatā. “Chando kāmo”tiādīsu pana taṇhāpi vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:459_2: adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ. Kattukāmatā vuccati karaṇicchā. Cetasikassa ca dhammassa sārammaṇattā
anya-e0104n0:459_3: karaṇicchā nāma ālambanassa ālambitukāmatāmukheneva hotīti ārammaṇakaraṇicchālakkhaṇo
anya-e0104n0:459_4: chando kattukāmatālakkhaṇo vutto. Tenevāha “ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, ārammaṇena atthikatāpaccupaṭṭhāno”ti
anya-e0104n0:459_5: ca. Yadaggena panāyaṃ attano ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, tadaggena sampayuttānampi hotiyeva
anya-e0104n0:459_6: ekārammaṇatāya tena tesaṃ. Tenevāha “ārammaṇaggahaṇe cāyaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:459_7: viya daṭṭhabbo”ti. Svāyaṃ kusalesu uppanno kusalacchandoti vuccati yonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0104n0:460_0: 472. Adhimuccanaṃ ārammaṇe sanniṭṭhānavasena veditabbaṃ, na pasādanavasena. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:460_1: tathā vā hi ārammaṇe nicchayanaṃ adhimuccanaṃ anadhimuccantassa pāṇātipātādīsu, dānādīsu
anya-e0104n0:460_2: vā pavattiyā abhāvā, saddhā pana pasādanīyesu pasādādhimokkhāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n0:460_3: Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana yathā santīrite atthe nicchayanākārena pavattitvā parato ttamānānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:460_4: tathā pavattiyā paccayo hoti. Yadi evaṃ, vicikicchāsampayuttesu kathanti? Tesampi
anya-e0104n0:460_5: ekaṃseneva saṃsappanākārassa paccayatāya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dārakassa viya ito cito ca saṃsappanassa
anya-e0104n0:460_6: “karissāmi na karissāmī”ti anicchayassa paṭipakkhakiriyā asaṃsappanaṃ, yesu cittuppādesu
anya-e0104n0:460_7: ayaṃ sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo adhimokkho, tesaṃ ārammaṇadhammo eva sanniṭṭheyyadhammo.
anya-e0104n0:461_0: 473. Kiriyā kāroti kārasaddassa bhāvasādhanatamāha. Manamhi kāroti manasi ārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:461_1: karaṇaṃ. Yena hi mano ārammaṇe karīyati ārammaṇenassa saṃyojanato, tato eva tena
anya-e0104n0:461_2: ārammaṇampi manasi karīyatīti. Purimamanatoti bhavaṅgamanato. Visadisamananti vīthijavanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:462_0: Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ sārento viya hotīti manasikāro sāraṇalakkhaṇo
anya-e0104n0:462_2: pana saṃyojanavasena ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Ārammaṇapaṭipādakassa
anya-e0104n0:462_4: jotetīti tathājotitaṃ taṃ viññāṇakkhandhe otāretvā dassetuṃ “vīthipaṭipādako”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:463_0: 474. Tesu dhammesūti yesu dhammesu sayaṃ uppannā, tesu attanā sampayuttesu cittacetasikadhammesu.
anya-e0104n0:463_1: Anārammaṇattepi hi tesu samappavattesu udāsinabhāvato “tatramajjhattatā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:463_2: Samavāhitalakkhaṇāti samaṃ avisamaṃ yathāsakakiccesu pavattanalakkhaṇā. Udāsinabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:463_3: pavattamānāpi hesā sampayuttadhamme yathāsakakiccesu pavatteti, yathā rājā tuṇhī
anya-e0104n0:463_4: nisinnopi atthakaraṇe dhammaṭṭhe yathāsakakiccesu appamatte pavatteti. Alīnānuddhatapavattipaccayatā
anya-e0104n0:463_5: ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā, kiccavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ, sahajātādhipatino kathanti?
anya-e0104n0:463_6: Tampi tassā kiccameva. Yaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ adhipatibhāvoti, tassāpi tathāpavattanamevāti
anya-e0104n0:463_7: nāyaṃ doso. “Idaṃ nihīnakiccaṃ hotu, idaṃ atirekatarakicca”nti evaṃ pakkhapātavasena
anya-e0104n0:463_8: viya pavatti pakkhapāto, taṃ upacchindantī viya hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:464_0: “Aniyatesu icchantī”ti iminā cetasikantarabhāvena icchantīti dasseti. Adosoyeva mettā.
anya-e0104n0:464_1: Tathā hi soyeva “mettā mettāyanā”tiādinā niddiṭṭho. Upekkhāti yaṃ upekkhaṃ mettāya
anya-e0104n0:465_2: vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi viratiyo duccaritavatthuno akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā yujjanti,
anya-e0104n0:465_3: atha kho duccaritassa, viratīnañca soraccavasena saṅkocanaṃ, akiriyānañca hirottappānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:466_0: 476. Saṅkhārāti saṅkhārakkhandhadhamme sandhāyāha. Te hi idhādhippetā, aññathā aṭṭhatiṃsāti
anya-e0104n0:466_1: vattabbaṃ siyā. Yathā cittaṃ, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi dutiye sasaṅkhārā evāti
anya-e0104n0:466_2: āha “sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso”ti. Avasesā paṭhame vuttadhammā.
anya-e0104n0:467_0: Avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti ettha kathaṃ karuṇāmuditāupekkhāsahagate
anya-e0104n0:467_1: sambhavantīti? Pubbabhāgabhāvato. Appanāppattā eva hi karuṇāmuditā upekkhāsahagatā
anya-e0104n0:467_2: na honti, tato aññattha pana upekkhāsahagatāpi hontīti ācariyā.
anya-e0104n0:468_1: na kāyakammādīnaṃ sodhanavasena, nāpi duccaritadurājīvānaṃ samucchindanapaṭippassambhanavasenāti
anya-e0104n0:468_2: mahaggatacittuppādesu viratīnaṃ asambhavoyevāti āha “ṭhapetvā viratittaya”nti. Tatoti
anya-e0104n0:468_3: rūpāvacarapaṭhame vuttacetasikato. Teyevāti rūpāvacarapañcame vuttacetasikā eva.
anya-e0104n0:468_4: Yadi eva rūpāvacarato ko visesoti āha “arūpāvacarabhāvoyeva hi ettha viseso”ti.
anya-e0104n0:469_0: Paṭhamajjhāniketi paṭhamajjhānavati. Maggaviññāṇeti catubbidhepi maggaviññāṇe vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n0:469_1: veditabbāti sambandho. Dutiyajjhānikādibhede maggaviññāṇeti ettha ādi-saddena tatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānikāni
anya-e0104n0:469_2: saṅgaṇhāti. “Vuttanayenā”ti vuttaṃ kiṃ avisesenāti codanāyane taṃ dassento “karuṇāmuditāna”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:469_3: Tattha maggaviññāṇānaṃ nibbānārammaṇattā, karuṇāmuditānañca sattārammaṇattā na tāsaṃ
anya-e0104n0:469_4: tattha sambhavo. Maggadhammesu ca pādakādiniyamena kadāci sammāsaṅkappaviraho siyā,
anya-e0104n0:469_5: na pana virativiraho kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ samucchindanavaseneva ariyamaggassa pavattanatoti niyataviratitā.
anya-e0104n0:470_0: 478. Na hiriyati na lajjatīti ahiriko, puggalo, cittaṃ, taṃsampayuttadhammasamudāyo
anya-e0104n0:470_1: vā. “Ahirikka”nti vattabbe ekassa kakārassa lopaṃ katvā “ahirika”nti vuttaṃ. “Na
anya-e0104n0:470_2: ottappa”nti ottappassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ dhammamāha. Ajigucchanaṃ ahīḷanaṃ. Alajjā
anya-e0104n0:470_3: aviriḷā. Tehevāti kāyaduccaritādīhi eva. Asārajjaṃ nibbhayatā. Anuttāso asambhamo.
anya-e0104n0:470_4: Vuttapaṭipakkhavasenāti alajjanākārena pāpānaṃ karaṇarasaṃ ahirikaṃ, anuttāsākārena
anya-e0104n0:470_5: anottappaṃ, vuttappakāreneva pāpato asaṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānāni attani, paresu ca agāravapadaṭṭhānāni.
anya-e0104n0:470_6: Gāmasūkarassa viya asucito kilesāsucito ajigucchanaṃ ahirikena hoti, salabhassa viya
anya-e0104n0:470_7: aggito pāpato anuttāso anottappena hotīti evaṃ vuttappaṭipakkhavasena vitthāro veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:471_0: 479. Lubbhanti tenātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:471_1: Lubbhantīti abhigijjhanti. Muyhantīti na bujjhanti. Ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ “mama ida”nti
anya-e0104n0:471_2: taṇhābhinivesavasena abhinivissa ārammaṇassa avissajjanaṃ, na ārammaṇakaraṇamattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:471_3: Abhisaṅgo abhimukhabhāvena āsatti. Apariccāgo avijahanaṃ, dummocanīyatā vā. Assādadassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:471_4: assādadiṭṭhi. “Assādānupassino ca taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:472_0: 480. Dhammasabhāvassa yāthāvato adassanaṃ cittassa andhabhāvo. Aññāṇaṃ ñāṇapaṭipakkho.
anya-e0104n0:472_1: Sampaṭivijjhituṃ asamatthatā asampaṭivedho. Yathā ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
anya-e0104n0:472_2: na labbhati, mohassa tathā pavatti ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaṃ. Asammāpaṭipattiṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti,
anya-e0104n0:472_3: sammāpaṭipattiyā paṭipakkhabhāvena gayhatīti vā asammāpaṭipattipaccupaṭṭhāno. Yassa
anya-e0104n0:472_4: uppajjati, tassa andhakaraṇaṃ andhakāro, tathā paccupatiṭṭhatīti andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0104n0:473_0: 481. Micchāti dhammasabhāvassa viparītaṃ, niccāditoti attho. Ayoniso abhiniveso anupāyābhiniveso
anya-e0104n0:473_1: uppathābhiniveso. Dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasanaṃ parāmāso. Viparītaggāhavasena
anya-e0104n0:474_0: 482. Yassa dhammassa vasena uddhataṃ hoti cittaṃ, taṃsampayuttadhammā vā, so dhammo
anya-e0104n0:474_2: Bhantattanti paribbhamanākāraṃ. Cetaso avūpasameti nipphādetabbe payojane bhummaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:474_3: avūpasamapaccayabhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vā “avūpasamo”ti vuttaṃ. Akusaladhammānaṃ ekantanihīnatāya
anya-e0104n0:475: 483. Thinamiddhamettha aniyataṃ, na mānādīti thinamiddhassa aniyatatā ca ettha dutiyacitte paṭhamākusalato viseso.
anya-e0104n0:476_0: Anussāhanāvasīdanabhāvena saṃhatabhāvo thinaṃ, tena yogato cittaṃ thinaṃ, tassa bhāvoti
anya-e0104n0:476_1: thinatā. Asamatthatāvighātavasena akammaññatā middhaṃ. Yasmā tato eva tena sampayuttadhammā
anya-e0104n0:476_2: medhitā vihatasāmatthiyā honti, tasmā “middhanatā middha”nti vuttaṃ. Anussāhalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0104n0:476_3: ussāhapaṭipakkhalakkhaṇaṃ. Vīriyassa avanodanaṃ khipanaṃ vīriyāvanodanaṃ. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:476_4: saṃsīdanākārena paccupatiṭṭhati, tesaṃ vā saṃsīdanaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti saṃsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:476_5: Akammaññatālakkhaṇanti ettha kāmaṃ thinampi akammaññasabhāvameva, taṃ pana cittassa,
anya-e0104n0:476_6: middhaṃ vedanādikkhandhattayassāti ayamettha viseso. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “tattha katamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:476_7: thinaṃ? Yā cittassa akallatā akammaññatā. Tattha katamaṃ middhaṃ? Yā kāyassa akallatā
anya-e0104n0:476_8: akammaññatā”ti ca ādinā imesaṃ niddeso pavatto. Onahanaṃ viññāṇadvārānaṃ pidahanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:476_9: Līnatā līnākāro ārammaṇaggahaṇe saṅkoco. Yasmā thinena cittasseva saṃhananaṃ hoti,
anya-e0104n0:476_10: middhena pana vedanādikkhandhattayassa viya rūpakāyassāpi, tasmā taṃ pacalāyikāniddaṃ
anya-e0104n0:476_11: paccupaṭṭhapetīti pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Arati pantasenāsanesu, adhikusaladhammesu
anya-e0104n0:476_12: ca arocanā. Vijambhikā vijambhanasaṅkhātassa kāyaduṭṭhullassa kāraṇabhūtā saṃkilesappavatti.
anya-e0104n0:476_13: Arativijambhikādīsūti ca ādi-saddena tandiādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Nipphādetabbe payojane
anya-e0104n0:477_0: Avasesā soḷasa. Māno panettha aniyato hoti, tena saddhiṃ sattaraseva honti. Paṭṭhāne
anya-e0104n0:477_1: hi “saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā”ti ettha catukkhattuṃ
anya-e0104n0:477_2: kāmarāgena, tikkhattuṃ paṭighena ca māno vicikicchā bhavarāgoti tayopete sakadāgāmino
anya-e0104n0:477_3: saṃyojanānaṃ saṃyojanehi dasavidhā yojanāti dassitāya dasavidhāya yojanāya “kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:477_4: paṭicca mānasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojana”nti vatvā “kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojana”nti
anya-e0104n0:477_6: vatvā “bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojana”nti ca evamāgatāhi yojanāhi mānassa
anya-e0104n0:477_7: aniyatabhāvo pakāsito. Yadi hi māno niyato siyā, kāmarāgassa mānarahitā pavatti na
anya-e0104n0:477_8: siyā, tathā bhavarāgassa. Evaṃ sati paṭṭhāne catukkhattuṃ kāmarāgena yojanā na siyā,
anya-e0104n0:477_9: tikkhattuṃyeva siyā. Bhavarāgamūlikā ca na siyā. Evañca saṃyojanānaṃ saṃyojanehi
anya-e0104n0:477_10: aṭṭhavidhena yojanā siyā, na dasavidhena. Dasavidhāva ca dassitāti. Seyyādivasena
anya-e0104n0:477_11: uccato namanaṃ unnati. Unnamanavaseneva saṃpaggaharaso. Na vīriyaṃ viya taṃtaṃkiccasādhane
anya-e0104n0:477_12: abbhussahanavasena. Omānassāpi attānaṃ avaṃ katvā gahaṇampi sampaggahaṇavasenevāti
anya-e0104n0:477_13: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ketu vuccati accuggatadhajo, idha pana ketu viyāti ketu, uḷāratamādibhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:477_14: Taṃ ketubhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ketuṃ kāmetīti ketukamyaṃ, cittaṃ. Yassa dhammassa vasena
anya-e0104n0:477_15: ketukamyaṃ, sā ketukamyatā. “Aha”nti pavattanato mānassa diṭṭhisadisī pavattīti so
anya-e0104n0:477_16: diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ ekacittuppāde na pavattati, attasinehasannissayo cāti āha “diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno”ti.
anya-e0104n0:479_0: 485. Dussantīti byāpajjanti. Caṇḍikkaṃ kujjhanaṃ. Attano pavattiākāravasena, virūpasaṃsappanakaaniṭṭharūpasamuṭṭhāpanavasena
anya-e0104n0:479_1: ca visappanaraso. Kāyassa vijjhattabhāvāpādanato attano nissayadahanaraso. Dussanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:479_2: attano, parassa ca upabhogaphalakālesu aniṭṭhattā visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabboti
anya-e0104n0:480_0: 486. Yaṃ parasampattīsu issākaraṇaṃ, sā issāti dassento āha “issāyanā issā”ti. Usūyanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:480_1: asahanaṃ. Tatthevāti parasampattīsu eva. Abhiratipaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ issāya kiccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:481_1: macchariya”nti. Niruttinayena pana mā idaṃ acchariyaṃ aññesaṃ hotu, mayhameva hotūti
anya-e0104n0:481_2: macchariyanti porāṇā. Taṃ macchariyaṃ vuccamānāni lakkhaṇādīni pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n0:482_0: 488. Kukatanti ettha akatampi kukatameva. Evañhi vattāro honti “yaṃ mayā na kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:482_1: taṃ kukata”nti. Tathā hi vakkhati “katākatānusocanarasa”nti. Evaṃ katākataṃ duccaritaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:482_2: sucaritañca kukataṃ, taṃ ārabbha vippaṭisāravasena pavattaṃ pana cittaṃ taṃsahacaritatāya
anya-e0104n0:482_3: idha “kukata”nti gahetvā “tassa bhāvo kukkucca”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pacchā anutāpanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:482_5: anusocanavasena virūpaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ vippaṭisāro. Parāyattatāhetutāya dāsabyamiva
anya-e0104n0:482_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā hi dāsabye sati dāso parāyatto hoti, evaṃ kukkucce sati taṃsamaṅgī.
anya-e0104n0:482_7: Na hi so attano dhammatāya kusale pavattituṃ sakkoti. Atha vā katākatākusalakusalānusocane
anya-e0104n0:482_8: āyattatāya tadubhayavasena kukkuccena taṃsamaṅgī hotīti taṃ dāsabyaṃ viya hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:483: Aniyatesu issādīsu thinamiddhasambhavova cāti ca-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:484_0: 490. Pavattiṭṭhitimattoti khaṇaṭṭhitimatto. “Nivāte dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhiti viyā”ti hi evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:484_1: vuttacittaṭṭhiti viya santānaṭṭhitiyā paccayo bhavituṃ asamattho nicchayābhāvena
anya-e0104n0:484_3: samādhī”ti. Vigatā cikicchāti cikicchituṃ dukkaratāya vuttaṃ, na sabbathā vicikicchāya
anya-e0104n0:484_4: cikicchābhāvatoti tadatthamattaṃ dasseti. “Evaṃ nu kho, nanu kho”tiādinā saṃsappanavasena
anya-e0104n0:484_5: setīti saṃsayo. Kampanarasāti nānārammaṇe cittassa kampanakiccā. Uddhaccañhi attanā
anya-e0104n0:484_6: gahitākāre eva ṭhatvā bhamatīti ekārammaṇasmiṃyeva vipphandanavasena pavattati. Vicikicchā
anya-e0104n0:484_7: pana yadipi rūpādīsu ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe uppajjati, tathāpi “evaṃ nu kho, nanu kho,
anya-e0104n0:484_8: idaṃ nu kho, aññaṃ nu kho”ti aññaṃ gahetabbākāraṃ apekkhatīti nānārammaṇe kampanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:484_9: hotīti. Anicchayaṃ dveḷhakaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti anicchayapaccupaṭṭhānā. Anekaṃsassa
anya-e0104n0:485_0: 491. Sattārammaṇattāti sattapaññattiārammaṇattā. Nanu ca paññattiārammaṇāpi vipākā
anya-e0104n0:485_1: hontīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “ekantaparittārammaṇā hi kāmāvacaravipākā”ti. Viratiyopi
anya-e0104n0:485_2: vipākesu na santīti etthāpi nanu kesuci vipākesu viratiyopi santīti codanaṃ manasi
anya-e0104n0:485_3: katvā āha “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāyevāti hi vutta”nti, tena lokiyavipākesu viratiyo na santīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:486: Tesanti rūpāvacarādivipākaviññāṇānaṃ. Janetabbajanakasambandhe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:487_0: 492. Teti te ahetukakiriyasaṅkhārā. Tattha kusalavipākamanodhātusampayuttehi samānā
anya-e0104n0:487_3: “kusala…pe… samānā”ti vatvā tato labbhamānaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “manoviññāṇadhātudvaye
anya-e0104n0:487_4: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vīriyasabbhāvato balappatto samādhi hoti “vīriyantaṃ bala”nti katvā.
anya-e0104n0:488_0: Samucchedaviratīhi eva arahantānaṃ viramanakiccassa niṭṭhitattā kiriyacittesu viratiyo
anya-e0104n0:488_1: na santīti āha “ṭhapetvā viratiyo”ti. Kāmāvacarasahetukakiriyasaṅkhārānaṃ kāmāvacarakusalehi
anya-e0104n0:488_2: viratikato viseso atthi, mahaggatesu pana tādisopi natthīti āha “sabbākārenapī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:491: Abhidhammantogadhampi suttantabhājanīyaṃ suttantanayo eva, ekantaabhidhammanayo pana abhidhammabhājanīyanti āha “abhidhamme padabhājanīyanayenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:492_0: 493. Bhagavatā pana evaṃ khandhā vitthāritāti sambandho. Tasmā imāyapi pāḷiyā vasena
anya-e0104n0:492_1: khandhānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissāmāti adhippāyo. Yaṃ kiñcīti ettha yanti sāmaññena aniyamadassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:492_2: Kiñcīti pakārabhedaṃ āmasitvā aniyamadassanaṃ. Ubhayenāpi atītaṃ vā…pe… santike vā
anya-e0104n0:492_3: appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā yādisaṃ vā tādisaṃ vā napuṃsakaniddesārahaṃ sabbaṃ byāpetvā gaṇhātīti
anya-e0104n0:492_4: āha “anavasesapariyādāna”nti. Evaṃ pana aññesupi napuṃsakaniddesārahesu pasaṅgaṃ
anya-e0104n0:492_5: disvā tattha adhippetatthaṃ aticca pavattanato atippasaṅgassa niyamanatthaṃ rūpanti
anya-e0104n0:492_6: vuttanti dassento “rūpanti atippasaṅganiyamana”nti āha. Yaṃ kiñcīti ca yaṃ-saddaṃ
anya-e0104n0:492_7: ekaṃ padaṃ, sanipātaṃ kiṃ-saddañca ekaṃ padanti gahetvā aniyamekatthadīpanato “padadvayenāpī”ti
anya-e0104n0:492_8: vuttaṃ. Assāti rūpassa. Atītādinā vibhāgaṃ ārabhati atītānāgatapaccuppannantiādinā.
anya-e0104n0:493_1: vattatīti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”ntiādisuttavasena viññāyati. Tathā hi
anya-e0104n0:493_3: “Tayome, bhikkhave, addhā, katame tayo? Atīto addhā anāgato addhā paccuppanno addhā”ti
anya-e0104n0:493_4: pana paramatthato paricchijjamāno addhā niruttipathasuttavasena khaṇaparicchinno
anya-e0104n0:493_5: vutto. Tattha hi “yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ jātaṃ…pe… pātubhūtaṃ. Atthīti tassa saṅkhā”ti
anya-e0104n0:493_6: vijjamānassa paccuppannatā, tato pubbe, pacchā ca atītānāgatatā vuttā. Tadaññasuttesu
anya-e0104n0:493_7: pana yebhuyyena cutipaṭisandhiparicchinno atītādiko addhā vuttoti so eva idhāpi “addhāvasenā”ti vutto.
anya-e0104n0:494_0: Sītaṃ sītassa sabhāgo, tathā uṇhaṃ uṇhassa. Yaṃ pana sītaṃ, uṇhaṃ vā sarīre sannipatitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:494_1: santānavasena pavattamānaṃ anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ ekākāraṃ, taṃ eko utūti vuccatīti sabhāgautuno
anya-e0104n0:494_2: anekattā eka-ggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, evaṃ āhārepi. Ekavīthiekajavanasamuṭṭhānanti pañcachaṭṭhadvāravasena
anya-e0104n0:494_3: vuttaṃ. Santatisamayakathā vipassakānaṃ upakāratthāya aṭṭhakathāsu kathitā. Janako
anya-e0104n0:494_4: hetu, upathambhako paccayo, tesaṃ uppādanaṃ, upatthambhanañca kiccaṃ. Yathā bījassa
anya-e0104n0:494_6: āhārādīnaṃ tadupatthambhanaṃ, evaṃ ekekassa kalāpassa, cittuppādassa ca janakānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:494_8: yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ utuādīnaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgatāsambhavato taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:494_9: rūpānaṃ santativasena atītādivibhāgo vutto, kammassa pana ekabhavanibbattakassa sabhāgavisabhāgatā
anya-e0104n0:494_10: natthīti taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ santativasena atītādivibhāgaṃ avatvā upatthambhakavaseneva
anya-e0104n0:494_11: vutto. Yadā pana liṅgaparivattanaṃ hoti, tadā balavatā akusalena purisaliṅgaṃ antaradhāyati,
anya-e0104n0:494_12: dubbalena kusalena itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavati. Dubbalena ca akusalena itthiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyati,
anya-e0104n0:494_13: balavatā kusalena purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhavatīti kammasamuṭṭhānarūpānampi attheva visabhāgatāti
anya-e0104n0:494_14: tesampi santativasena atītādivibhāgo sambhavati, so pana na sabbakālikoti na gahito.
anya-e0104n0:495: Taṃtaṃsamayanti ekamuhuttādiko so so samayo etassāti taṃtaṃsamayaṃ, rūpaṃ, taṃtaṃsamayavantanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:496_0: Tato pubbeti tato khaṇattayassa pariyāpattito pubbe. Anuppannattā anāgataṃ. Pacchāti
anya-e0104n0:496_1: tato pacchā. Khaṇattayaṃ atikkantattā atītaṃ. Yassa hetukiccaṃ, paccayakiccañca niṭṭhitattā
anya-e0104n0:496_2: atikkantaṃ, taṃ atītaṃ uppādakkhaṇe hetukiccaṃ, uppannaphalattā niṭṭhitañcāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:496_3: Tīsupi khaṇesu paccayakiccaṃ. Pathavīādīnaṃ sandhāraṇādikaṃ, phassādīnaṃ phusanādikañca
anya-e0104n0:496_4: attano kiccaṃ sakiccaṃ, sakiccassa karaṇakkhaṇo sakiccakkhaṇo, saha vā kiccena sakiccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:496_5: yasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccaṃ rūpaṃ vā arūpaṃ vā hoti, so sakiccakkhaṇo, tasmiṃ khaṇe paccuppannaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:496_6: Ettha ca khaṇādikathāyaṃ “tato pubbe anāgataṃ, pacchā atīta”nti vacanaṃ addhādīsu
anya-e0104n0:496_7: viya bhedābhāvato nippariyāyaṃ. Addhādivasena hi aññeva dhammā atītā aññe anāgatā
anya-e0104n0:496_8: aññe paccuppannā labbhanti, khaṇādivasena pana natthi dhammato bhedo, kālato eva
anya-e0104n0:496_9: bhedo. Uppādato pubbe anāgato, khaṇattaye vattamāno, tato paraṃ atītoti nippariyāyā,
anya-e0104n0:496_10: addhāpaccuppannādi viya kenaci pariyāyena atītamanāgatanti ca vattabbatābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:497_0: 495. Heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ajjhattikabāhirabhedaṃ sandhāya “vuttanayo evā”ti vatvā tena aparitussamānena
anya-e0104n0:497_1: yadipi tattha ajjhattameva ajjhattikanti saddattho labbhati, tathāpi attheva ajjhattaajjhattikasaddānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:497_2: bahiddhābāhirasaddānañca aññamaññaṃ atthabhedo. Tathā hi ajjhattikasaddo saparasantānikesu
anya-e0104n0:497_3: cakkhādīsu rūpādīsu bāhirasaddo viya pavattati, ajjhattasaddo pana tassa tassa sattassa
anya-e0104n0:497_4: sasantānikesveva cakkhurūpādīsu tato aññesu bahiddhāsaddo viya pavattati. Tasmā tamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:497_5: dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha idhāti imasmiṃ suttantanaye. Niyakajjhattampi
anya-e0104n0:497_6: na pubbe vuttaajjhattikameva, parapuggalikampi na pubbe vuttabāhiramevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:498_0: 496. Hīnapaṇītabhedo pariyāyato, nippariyāyato ca veditabboti sambandho. Tadeva sudassīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:498_1: rūpaṃ. Yatthāti yasmiṃ ārammaṇabhūte. Yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā akusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:498_2: taṃ hīnaṃ aniṭṭhabhāvato. Yaṃ kusalavipākaṃ, taṃ paṇītaṃ iṭṭhabhāvato. Yathā hi akusalavipāko
anya-e0104n0:498_3: sayaṃ aniṭṭho aniṭṭhe eva uppajjati, na iṭṭhe, evaṃ kusalavipākopi sayaṃ iṭṭho iṭṭhe
anya-e0104n0:498_4: eva uppajjati, na aniṭṭhe. Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
anya-e0104n0:499_0: “Akusalakammajavasena aniṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇā vibhattā, kusalakammajaṃ pana aniṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:499_1: nāma natthi, sabbaṃ iṭṭhameva. Kusalakammajavasena iṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇā vibhattā.
anya-e0104n0:499_2: Kusalakammajañhi aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi, sabbaṃ iṭṭhamevā”ti ca.
anya-e0104n0:500_0: Tattha manāpānipi kānici hatthirūpādīni akusalakammanibbattāni santi, na pana tāni
anya-e0104n0:500_1: tesaṃyeva hatthiādīnaṃ sukhassa hetubhāvaṃ gacchanti. Tassa tasseva hi sattassa attanā
anya-e0104n0:500_2: katena kusalena nibbattaṃ sukhassa paccayo hoti, akusalena nibbattaṃ dukkhassa. Tasmā
anya-e0104n0:500_3: kammajānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhatā kammakārakasattassa vasena yojanārahā siyā. Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:500_4: “kusalakammajaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī”ti, na ca vuttaṃ “akusalakammajaṃ iṭṭhaṃ nāma
anya-e0104n0:500_5: natthī”ti, tena akusalakammajampi sobhanaṃ parasattānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ atthīti anuññātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:501_0: Tiracchānagatānaṃ pana kesañci manussarūpaṃ amanāpaṃ, yato te disvāva palāyanti,
anya-e0104n0:501_1: manussā ca devatārūpaṃ passitvā bhāyanti, tesampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0104n0:501_2: kusalavipākameva uppajjati, tādisassa pana puññassa abhāvā na tesaṃ tattha abhirati
anya-e0104n0:501_3: hoti. Kusalakammajassa pana aniṭṭhassa abhāvo viya akusalakammajassa ca iṭṭhassa
anya-e0104n0:501_4: abhāvo vattabbo. Hatthiādīnampi hi akusalakammajaṃ manussānaṃ akusalavipākasseva
anya-e0104n0:501_5: ārammaṇaṃ, kusalakammajaṃ pana pavatte samuṭṭhitaṃ kusalavipākassa. Iṭṭhārammaṇena
anya-e0104n0:501_6: pana vomissakattā appakaṃ akusalakammajaṃ bahulaṃ akusalavipākuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ na
anya-e0104n0:501_7: bhavissatīti sakkā viññātuṃ, vipākaṃ pana na sakkā vañcetunti vipākavasena iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇavavatthānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:501_8: suṭṭhu yujjati. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “aniṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇā”ti, taṃ rūpādibhāvasāmaññato
anya-e0104n0:501_9: kāmaguṇasadisatāya taṃsadisesu tabbohārena vuttaṃ. Iṭṭhāneva hi rūpādīni “kāmaguṇā”ti
anya-e0104n0:501_10: pāḷiyaṃ vuttāni. Kāmaguṇavisabhāgā vā rūpādayo “kāmaguṇā”ti vuttā asive sivoti vohāro
anya-e0104n0:501_11: viya, sabbāni vā iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni rūpādīni taṇhāvatthubhāvato kāmaguṇā eva. Vuttañhi
anya-e0104n0:501_12: “rūpā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa”ntiādi. Atisayena pana kamanīyattā suttesu kāmaguṇāti
anya-e0104n0:502_0: Vuttanayamevāti abhidesena lakkhaṇato dūrasantikaṃ dassitanti āha “okāsatopettha
anya-e0104n0:502_1: upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā veditabbā”ti. Tattha kittakato paṭṭhāya rūpaṃ okāsavasena
anya-e0104n0:502_2: santike nāma, kittakato pana paṭṭhāya dūre nāma? Pakatikathāya kathentānaṃ dvādasa
anya-e0104n0:502_3: hatthā savanūpacāro nāma, tassa orato santike, parato dūre. Tattha sukhumarūpaṃ dūre
anya-e0104n0:502_4: hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi dūre hoti, santike hontaṃ pana okāsatova santike hoti,
anya-e0104n0:502_5: na lakkhaṇato. Oḷārikarūpaṃ santike hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi santike hoti, dūre
anya-e0104n0:502_6: hontaṃ okāsatova hoti, na lakkhaṇato. “Upādāyupādāyā”ti pana vuttattā attano rūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:502_7: santike nāma, antokucchigatassāpi parassa dūre. Antokucchigatassa santike, bahi ṭhitassa
anya-e0104n0:503_0: 497. Tadekajjhanti taṃ ekajjhaṃ ekato. Abhisaṃyūhitvāti saṃharitvā, samūhaṃ vā katvā.
anya-e0104n0:503_1: Abhisaṅkhipitvāti saṅkhipitvā saṅkhepaṃ katvā. “Sabbampi rūpaṃ…pe… dassitaṃ hotī”ti
anya-e0104n0:503_2: iminā rūpakhandhasaddānaṃ samānādhikaraṇasamāsabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenevāha “na hi rūpato
anya-e0104n0:504: 498. Rāsibhāvūpagamanena vedanākkhandhādayoti dassitā hontīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:505_0: Santativasena, khaṇādivasena cāti ettha addhāsamayavasena atītādivibhāgassa avacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:505_1: sukhādivasena bhinnāya atītādibhāvavacanato. Na hi sukhā eva addhāvasena, samayavasena
anya-e0104n0:505_2: ca atītādikā hoti, tathā dukkhā eva, adukkhamasukhā eva ca kāyikacetasikādibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:505_3: bhinnā, tena vedanāsamudāyo addhāsamayavasena atītādibhāvena vattabbataṃ arahati
anya-e0104n0:505_4: samudāyassa tehi paricchinditabbattā, vedanekadesā pana gayhamānā santatikhaṇehi
anya-e0104n0:505_5: paricchedaṃ arahanti tathā paricchinditvā gahetabbato. Ekasantatiyaṃ pana sukhādīsu
anya-e0104n0:505_6: anekabhedabhinnesu yo bhedo paricchinditabbabhāvena gahito, tassa ekappakārassa pākaṭassa
anya-e0104n0:505_8: ca santati bhavituṃ arahatīti tassā bhedantaraṃ anāmasitvā paricchedakabhāvena gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:505_9: kataṃ, lahuparivattino vā arūpadhammā parivattaneneva paricchedena paricchindanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:505_11: divasampi buddharūpaṃ passantassa, dhammaṃ suṇantassa pavattasaddhādisahitavedanā
anya-e0104n0:506_0: 499. Sabyāpārasaussāhasavipākatā kusalādīhi tīhipi sādhāraṇāti asādhāraṇameva dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:506_3: vedanāya oḷārikā. Sabyāpāratoti saīhato. Tena yathā pavattamānāyassā vipākena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:506_4: tathā pavattiṃ vadanto vipākuppādanayogyatamāha. Saussāhatoti sasattito, tena vipākuppādanasamatthataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:506_6: Tīhipi padehi vipākadhammataṃyeva dasseti. Kāyakammādibyāpārasabbhāvato vā sabyāpārato,
anya-e0104n0:506_8: attho veditabbo. Vipākaṃ anuppādentīpi kiriyā kusalā viya sabyāpārā, saussāhā eva
anya-e0104n0:506_9: ca hotīti tadubhayaṃ anāmasitvā kiriyābyākatavāre “savipākato” icceva vuttaṃ. Sabyābajjhatoti
anya-e0104n0:506_11: abyābajjhato ca vūpasantavuttīti evaṃ akusalāya vuttavipallāsato. Yathāyoganti yogānurūpaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:506_12: Tīsu kāraṇesu yaṃ yaṃ yassā yassā yujjati, tadanurūpanti attho. Kusalākusalavedanāhi
anya-e0104n0:506_13: vipākabyākatāya tīhipi kāraṇehi oḷārikā. Kiriyābyākatāya savipākato savipākatāvisiṭṭhasabyāpārasaussāhato
anya-e0104n0:506_14: vāti. Vuttapariyāyenāti vipākabyākatā abyāpārato, anussāhato, avipākato ca tāhi kusalākusalavedanāhi
anya-e0104n0:506_15: sukhumā. Kiriyābyākatā avipākato, avipākatāvisiṭṭhasabyāpārasaussāhato vāti evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:506_16: kusalākusalāya vuttavipallāsena. Kammavegakkhittā hi kammapaṭibimbabhūtā ca kāyakammādibyāpāravirahato
anya-e0104n0:506_17: nirussāhā vipākā. Saussāhā ca kiriyā avipākadhammā. Savipākadhammā hi sagabbhā viya oḷārikāti.
anya-e0104n0:507_1: anupasantatoti attho. Abhibhavanatoti ajjhottharaṇato. Sukhāya majjhattatā natthi,
anya-e0104n0:507_2: upekkhāya sātatā. Santatādayo pana sabbattha sukhupekkhāsu labbhantīti “yathāyoga”nti
anya-e0104n0:507_3: vuttaṃ. Pākaṭatoti sukhito dukkhitoti disvāpi jānitabbattā vibhūtabhāvato. Sā adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
anya-e0104n0:508: 501. Asamāpannasamāpanna-ggahaṇena cettha bhūmivasenāpi vedanānaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā vuttāti veditabbā. Itarā samāpannassa vedanā.
anya-e0104n0:509_0: Oghaniyatoti oghehi ārammaṇaṃ katvā atikkamitabbato. Tathā yoganiyato, ganthaniyato
anya-e0104n0:509_1: cāti etthāpi ganthova ganthanaṃ, tassa hitaṃ ārammaṇabhāvena sambandhanatoti ganthaniyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:509_2: Evaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ, upādāniyañca veditabbaṃ. Saṃkilese niyuttā, saṃkilesaṃ vā arahantīti
anya-e0104n0:510_0: 502. Tatthāti yathāvuttāya oḷārikasukhumatāya. Sambhedoti saṅkaro. “Oḷārikā, sukhumā”ti
anya-e0104n0:510_1: ca vuttānampi jātiādivasena puna sukhumoḷārikabhāvāpattidoso yathā na hoti, tathā
anya-e0104n0:510_2: pariharitabbo. Jātivasena sukhumāya vedanāya sabhāvapuggalalokiyavasena oḷārikataṃ
anya-e0104n0:510_3: pāḷivasena dassetuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sukhādayopīti ettha akusalā vedanā
anya-e0104n0:510_4: jātivasena oḷārikā, sabhāvavasena sukhumā. Kusalajjhānasahagatā sukhā vedanā jātivasena
anya-e0104n0:510_5: oḷārikā, samāpannassa vedanāti katvā puggalavasena sukhumāti evamādinā yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:510_6: “Na parāmasitabbo”ti etena jātiādayo cattāro koṭṭhāsā aññamaññaṃ avomissakā eva gahetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:510_7: Evaṃ sambhedassa parihāro, na aññathāti dasseti. Yathā abyākatamukhena, evaṃ kusalākusalamukhenapi,
anya-e0104n0:510_8: yathā ca jātimukhena, evaṃ sabhāvādimukhenapi dassetabbanti imamatthaṃ “esa nayo
anya-e0104n0:511_0: Idāni jātiādikoṭṭhāsesupi mitho akusalādīnaṃ upādāyupādāya oḷārikasukhumataṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:511_2: dasseti. Niyatāti micchattaniyāmena niyatā, ānantariyabhāvappattā kappatiṭṭhanakavipākatāya
anya-e0104n0:511_3: kappaṭṭhitikā devadattādīnaṃ viya. Asaṅkhārikā sabhāvatikhiṇatāya oḷārikā. Diṭṭhisampayuttā
anya-e0104n0:511_4: mahāsāvajjatāya oḷārikā. Sāpi diṭṭhisampayuttā niyatā oḷārikā, tato kappaṭṭhitikā,
anya-e0104n0:511_5: tato asaṅkhārikāti tividhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā ekajjhaṃ vuttā visuṃ visuṃyeva yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:511_6: Tenāha “itarā sukhumā”ti. Avisesenāti dosasahagatā, lobhasahagatāti abhedena. Akusalā
anya-e0104n0:511_7: bahuvipākā dosussannatāya oḷārikā. Tathā kusalā appavipākā. Mandadosattā akusalā
anya-e0104n0:512_1: ekantasukhumāva. Tatthāpi ca vibhāgaṃ parato vakkhati. Bhāvanāmayāpīti bhāvanāmayāya
anya-e0104n0:512_2: bhedanena dānasīlamayānampi bhedanaṃ nayato dassitanti veditabbaṃ. Bhāvanāya paguṇabalavakālādīsu
anya-e0104n0:512_3: kadāci ñāṇavippayuttacittenapi manasikāro hotīti vuttaṃ “bhāvanāmayāpi duhetukā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:512_5: yāva arahattaphalā netabbaṃ. “Kāmāvacarakiriyā oḷārikā, rūpāvacarakiriyā sukhumā”tiādinā
