anya-e0104n0:512_6: kāmāvacarā ca “dānākārappavattā oḷārikā, sīlākārappavattā sukhumā”tiādinā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā
anya-e0104n0:512_7: netabbaṃ. Yathā ca jātikoṭṭhāse ayaṃ vibhāgo, evaṃ sabhāvakoṭṭhāsādīsupīti dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:513_0: Sabbo cāyaṃ vibhāgo lakkhaṇasannissito vuttoti katvā āha “okāsavasena cāpī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:513_1: Sukhāpīti pi-saddena adukkhamasukhaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Sabbatthāti sabbāsu bhūmīsu. Yathānurūpanti
anya-e0104n0:513_2: yā yā vedanā yattha yattha labbhati, tadanurūpaṃ. Vatthuvasenāti yaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha
anya-e0104n0:513_3: vedanā pavattati, tassa vasenāpi. Hīnavatthukāti hīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kaṅgubhattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:513_4: bhuñjantassa vedanā hīnavatthukatāya oḷārikā. Sālimaṃsodanaṃ bhuñjantassa paṇītavatthukatāya sukhumāti.
anya-e0104n0:514_0: 503. Ādinā nayenāti sabbaṃ pāḷigatiṃ āmasati. Jātiādivasena asamānakoṭṭhāsatā visabhāgatā.
anya-e0104n0:514_1: Dukkhavipākatādivasena asadisakiccatā asaṃsaṭṭhatā, na asampayogo. Yadi siyā, dūravipariyāyena
anya-e0104n0:514_2: santikaṃ hotīti saṃsaṭṭhatā santikatā āpajjati, na ca vedanāya vedanāsampayogo atthi.
anya-e0104n0:514_3: Santikapadavaṇṇanāya ca “sabhāgato ca sarikkhato cā”ti vakkhatīti vuttanayeneva attho
anya-e0104n0:514_4: veditabbo. Asadisasabhāvatā asarikkhatā. Sabbavāresūti oḷārikasukhumabhede vuttanayānusārena
anya-e0104n0:514_5: vattabbesu sabbesu vāresu. Jātiādivasena samānakoṭṭhāsatā sabhāgatā, dukkhavipākatādivasena
anya-e0104n0:514_6: pana sadisasabhāvatā sarikkhatā. Tenāha “akusalā pana…pe… santike”ti.
anya-e0104n0:517_0: 504. Etanti evaṃ atītādivibhāge vitthārakathāmukhaṃ. Ñāṇabhedatthanti nānappakāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:517_1: ñāṇappabhedatthaṃ. Kamatoti desanākkamato, yena kāraṇenāyaṃ desanākkamo kato, tatoti
anya-e0104n0:517_2: attho. Visesatoti bhedato, khandhupādānakkhandhavibhāgatoti attho. Anūnādhikatoti
anya-e0104n0:517_3: pañcabhāvato. Upamātoti upamāhi upametabbato. Daṭṭhabbato dvidhāti dvīhi ākārehi
anya-e0104n0:517_4: ñāṇena passitabbato. Passantassatthasiddhitoti yathā passantassa yathādhippetatthanipphattito.
anya-e0104n0:518_1: paṭhamaṃ pahātabbā paṭhamaṃ vuttā, dutiyaṃ pahātabbā dutiyaṃ vuttāti ayaṃ pahānakkamo.
anya-e0104n0:518_2: Sīlavisuddhiṃ paṭipajja cittavisuddhi paṭipajjitabbā, tathā tato parāpīti āha “sīlavisuddhi…pe…
anya-e0104n0:518_3: paṭipattikkamo”ti, anupubbapaṇītā bhūmiyo anupubbena vavatthitāti ayaṃ bhūmikkamo.
anya-e0104n0:518_5: Dānakathādayo anupubbukkaṃsato kathitā, uppattiādivavatthānābhāvato pana dānādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:518_6: idha desanākkamavacanaṃ. Uppattiādivavatthānahetukatāya hi “paṭhamaṃ kalalaṃ hotī”tiādikā
anya-e0104n0:518_7: desanāpi samānā uppattiādikamabhāveneva vuttā. Yathāvuttavavatthānābhāvena pana anekesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:518_8: vacanānaṃ sahapavattiyā asambhavato yena kenaci pubbāpariyena desetabbatāya tena
anya-e0104n0:518_9: tena adhippāyena desanāmattasseva kamo desanākkamo daṭṭhabbo. Pubbāpariyavavatthānenāti
anya-e0104n0:518_10: paṭhamaṃ rūpakkhandho, tato vedanākkhandhoti evaṃ pubbāpariyavavatthānena anuppattito.
anya-e0104n0:518_11: Appahātabbatoti khandhesu ekaccānaṃ pahātabbatāva natthi, kuto pahānakkamo. Sati
anya-e0104n0:518_12: hi sabbesaṃ pahātabbatāya pahānakkamena nesaṃ desanā siyā. Appaṭipajjanīyatoti sammāpaṭipattivasena
anya-e0104n0:519_0: Abhedenāti rūpādīnaṃ bhedaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā ekajjhaṃ piṇḍaggahaṇena. Attagāhapatitanti
anya-e0104n0:519_1: attagāhasaṅkhāte diṭṭhoghe nipatitaṃ. Samūhaghanavinibbhogadassanenāti rūpato arūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:519_3: ekadesena samudāyabhūtaṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ vadati. Yā ettha iṭṭhaṃ, aniṭṭhañca rūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:519_4: saṃvedeti, ayaṃ vedanākkhandhoti iṭṭhāniṭṭharūpasaṃvedanikaṃ vedanaṃ desesīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:519_6: gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evanti yathāvuttanayena. Saññāya gahitākāre visaye abhisaṅkhārappavattīti
anya-e0104n0:519_7: āha “saññāvasena abhisaṅkhārake”ti. Yathā viññāṇassa sampayuttadhammānaṃ nissayabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:519_8: pākaṭo, na tathā vedanādīnanti āha “vedanādīnaṃ nissaya”nti. “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā,
anya-e0104n0:519_9: cittānuparivattino dhammā, chadvārādhipati rājā”ti vacanato viññāṇaṃ adhipati.
anya-e0104n0:520: 505. Rūpakkhandhe “sāsavaṃ upādāniya”nti vacanaṃ anāsavānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabbhāvato rūpakkhandhassa taṃsabhāvatānivattanatthaṃ, na anāsavarūpanivattanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:521: Anāsavāva khandhesu vuttāti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto eva-saddo, anāsavā khandhesveva vuttāti attho. Idha pana visuddhimagge sabbepete khandhāpi upādānakkhandhāpi.
anya-e0104n0:522_0: 506. Sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ sabhāgena ekajjhaṃ saṅgaho sabbasaṅkhatasabhāgekasaṅgaho. Sabhāgasabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:522_1: hi saṅgayhamānā sabbasaṅkhatā pañcakkhandhā honti. Tattha ruppanādisāmaññena samānakoṭṭhāsā
anya-e0104n0:522_2: sabhāgāti veditabbā. Tesu saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccaṃ āyūhanarasāya cetanāya balavanti
anya-e0104n0:522_3: sā “saṅkhārakkhandho”ti vuttā. Aññe ca ruppanādivisesalakkhaṇarahitā phassādayo saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇasāmaññenāti
anya-e0104n0:522_4: daṭṭhabbā, phusanādayo pana sabhāvā visuṃ khandhasaddavacanīyā na hontīti dhammasabhāvaññunā
anya-e0104n0:522_5: tathāgatena phassakkhandhādayo na vuttāti veditabbā. “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā
anya-e0104n0:522_6: vā brāhmaṇā vā sassatavādā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti, sabbe te ime eva
anya-e0104n0:522_7: pañcupādānakkhandhe nissāya paṭicca, etesaṃ vā aññatara”nti evamādisuttānañca vasena
anya-e0104n0:522_8: attattaniyagāhassa etapparamatā daṭṭhabbā. Etena ca vakkhamānasuttavasena ca khandhe
anya-e0104n0:522_9: eva nissāya parittārammaṇādivasena na vattabbā ca diṭṭhi uppajjati khandhanibbānavajjassa
anya-e0104n0:522_10: sabhāvadhammassa abhāvatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Rūpanti ruppanasabhāvaṃ dhammajātamāha.
anya-e0104n0:522_11: Vedanantiādīsupi eseva nayo. “Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho”tiādi vacanato aññesañca
anya-e0104n0:522_12: khandhasaddavacanīyānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ sabbhāvato na pañcevāti codanaṃ nivattetumāha
anya-e0104n0:523_1: vedanāya ābādhakattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rāgādisampayuttassa vipariṇāmādidukkhassa itthipurisādiākāragāhikā
anya-e0104n0:523_2: taṃtaṃsaṅkappamūlabhūtā saññā samuṭṭhānaṃ. Pittādi viya rogassa āsannakāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:523_3: Utubhojanavisamatāvisamaparihārādi viya mūlakāraṇaṃ nidānaṃ. Cittassa aṅgabhūtā cetasikāti
anya-e0104n0:523_4: viññāṇaṃ gilānūpamaṃ vuttaṃ. Kuṭṭharogavato siniyhanaṃ tassa bhiyyobhāvāya viya bālassa
anya-e0104n0:523_7: ca cārakūpamaṃ, bhājanūpamañca rūpaṃ. Subhasaññādivasena vedanākāraṇassa hetubhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:523_8: vedanābhojanassa chādāpanato ca aparādhūpamā, byañjanūpamā ca saññā. Vedanāhetuto
anya-e0104n0:523_9: kāraṇakārakūpamo, parivesakūpamo ca saṅkhārakkhandho. Bhattakāro eva yebhuyyena parivisatīti
anya-e0104n0:523_10: parivesakaggahaṇaṃ. Vedanāya vibādhitabbato, anuggahetabbato ca aparādhikūpamaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:524_0: 508. “Pañca vadhakā paccatthikā ukkhittāsikāti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:524_1: adhivacana”nti āsīvisūpame vadhakāti vuttā, “bhāroti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:524_2: upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti bhārasutte bhārāti, “atītampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva
anya-e0104n0:524_3: rūpena khajjiṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena rūpena khajjāmi. Ahañceva kho pana
anya-e0104n0:524_4: anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ, anāgatampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva rūpena khajjeyyaṃ, seyyathāpi…pe…
anya-e0104n0:524_5: khajjāmī”tiādinā khajjanīyapariyāye khādakāti, “so aniccaṃ rūpaṃ ‘aniccaṃ rūpa’nti
anya-e0104n0:524_6: yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”tiādinā yamakasutte aniccādikāti. Yadipi “idha pana sabbepete
anya-e0104n0:524_7: ekajjhaṃ katvā khandhāti adhippetā”ti vuttaṃ, bāhullena pana upādānakkhandhānaṃ tadantogadhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:525_0: Pheṇapiṇḍo viyātiādīsu rūpādīnaṃ evaṃ pheṇapiṇḍādisadisatā daṭṭhabbā, yathā pheṇapiṇḍo
anya-e0104n0:525_1: nissāro paridubbalo agayhupago; gahitopi kiñci atthaṃ na sādheti, chiddāvachiddo
anya-e0104n0:525_2: anekasandhisaṅghaṭito bahūnaṃ pāṇakānaṃ āvāso anupubbūpacito sabbāvatthanipātī avassaṃbhedī,
anya-e0104n0:525_3: evaṃ rūpampi niccasārādivirahato nissāraṃ pheggu viya, sukhabhañjanīyato dubbalaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:525_4: niccanti vā dhuvanti vā ahanti vā mamanti vā na gahetabbaṃ, gahitampi tathā na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:525_6: kalalakālato paṭṭhāya sabbāsupi avatthāsu vinassati, avassameva ca bhijjati. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:526_0: Yathā pubbuḷo nissāro paridubbalo agayhupago, gahitopi na kiñci atthaṃ sādheti, na
anya-e0104n0:526_1: ciraṭṭhitiko, tathā vedanāpi. Yathā ca pubbuḷo, udakatalaṃ, udakabinduṃ, udakajallikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:526_2: saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca jāyati, evaṃ vedanāpi
anya-e0104n0:526_3: vatthuṃ, ārammaṇaṃ, kilesajallaṃ, phassasaṅghaṭṭanañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca
anya-e0104n0:526_4: uppajjati. Yathā hi udakatale bindunipātajanito vāto udakajallikasaṅkhātaṃ udakalasikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:526_5: saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā pubbuḷaṃ nāma karoti, evaṃ vatthumhi ārammaṇāpāthagamanajanito
anya-e0104n0:526_6: phasso anupacchinnaṃ kilesajallaṃ sahakārīpaccayabhāvena saṅkaḍḍhitvā vedanaṃ nāma
anya-e0104n0:526_7: karoti. Idañca kilesehi mūlakāraṇabhūtehi, ārammaṇassādanabhūtehi ca nibbattaṃ vaṭṭagataṃ
anya-e0104n0:526_8: vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena vā cattāro paccayā vuttā, ūnehipi pana
anya-e0104n0:527_0: Yathā pana marīcikā asārā agayhupagā. Na hi taṃ gahetvā pātuṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:527_1: vā pūretuṃ sakkā, evaṃ saññāpi asārā agayhupagā. Yathā ca marīcikā vipphandamānā
anya-e0104n0:527_2: sañjātūmivegā viya khāyantī mahājanaṃ vippalambeti, evaṃ saññāpi “nīlaṃ pītaṃ dīghaṃ
anya-e0104n0:527_3: rassa”ntiādinā ārammaṇe pavattamānā sabhāvamatte aṭṭhatvā “subhaṃ sukhaṃ nicca”ntiādimicchāgāhassa
anya-e0104n0:528_0: Yathā kadalikkhandho asāro agayhupago. Na hi taṃ gahetvā gopānasīādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:528_1: sakkā, upanītampi tathā na hoti, bahuvaṭṭisamodhāno ca hoti, evaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhopi
anya-e0104n0:528_2: asāro agayhupago. Na hi taṃ niccādivasena gahetuṃ sakkā, gahitampi tathā na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:528_3: bahudhammasamodhāno ca. Aññadeva hi phassassa lakkhaṇaṃ, aññaṃ cetanādīnaṃ, te pana
anya-e0104n0:529_0: Yathā ca māyā asārā agayhupagā. Na hi taṃ gahetvā kiñci atthaṃ kiccaṃ sādhetuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0104n0:529_1: ittarā lahupaccupaṭṭhānā amaṇiādimeva maṇiādirūpena dassentī mahājanaṃ vañceti, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:529_2: viññāṇampi asāraṃ ittaraṃ lahupaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, teneva cittena āgacchantaṃ viya, gacchantaṃ
anya-e0104n0:529_3: viya, ṭhitaṃ viya, nisinnaṃ viya ca katvā gāhāpeti, aññadeva cittaṃ āgamane, aññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:530_0: Pañcapi upādānakkhandhā asubhādisabhāvā eva saṃkilesāsucivatthubhāvāditoti asubhādito
anya-e0104n0:530_1: daṭṭhabbā eva, tathāpi katthaci koci viseso sukhaggahaṇīyo hotīti āha “visesato cā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:530_2: Tattha cattāro satipaṭṭhānā catuvipallāsappahānakarāti tesaṃ gocarabhāvena rūpakkhandhādīsu
anya-e0104n0:531: 509. Khandhehi na vihaññati parividitasabhāvattā. Vipassakopi tesaṃ vipattiyaṃ na dukkhamāpajjati, khīṇāsavesu pana vattabbameva natthi. Te hi āyatimpi khandhehi na bādhīyantīti.
anya-e0104n0:532_1: chandarāgaṃ pajahanto tassa samudayabhūte kabaḷīkārāhārepi chandarāgaṃ pajahatīti
anya-e0104n0:532_2: attho. Ayaṃ pahānapariññā. Ajjhattikarūpaṃ pana pariggaṇhanto tassa paccayabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:532_3: kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ pariggaṇhātīti ñātapariññā. Tassa ca udayabbayānupassī hotīti tīraṇapariññā
anya-e0104n0:532_4: ca yojetabbā. Evaṃ pariññattaye sijjhante ime vipallāsādayo vidhamīyanti evāti āha
anya-e0104n0:532_5: “asubhe subhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahatī”tiādi. Tattha kāmarāgabhūtaṃ abhijjhaṃ sandhāyāha
anya-e0104n0:532_7: vā sabbalobhappahānaṃ vadati. Na upādiyati na gaṇhati na uppādeti.
anya-e0104n0:533_0: “Phassapaccayā vedanā”ti vuttattā “vedanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahanto tassā paccayabhūte
anya-e0104n0:533_1: phassāhārepi chandarāgaṃ pajahatī”tiādinā āhāraparijānane vuttanayena phassaparijānanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:533_2: yojetabbaṃ. Vedanāya dukkhato dassanena tattha sukhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati. Sukhatthameva
anya-e0104n0:533_3: bhavapatthanā hotīti vedanāya taṇhaṃ pajahanto bhavoghaṃ uttarati. Tato eva bhavayogena
anya-e0104n0:533_4: visaṃyujjati. Bhavāsavena ca anāsavo hoti, sabbavedanaṃ dukkhato passanto attano
anya-e0104n0:533_5: parena apubbaṃ dukkhaṃ uppāditaṃ, sukhaṃ vā vināsitaṃ na cinteti, tato “anatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:533_6: me acarī”tiādi āghātavatthuppahānato byāpādakāyaganthaṃ bhindati. “Sukhabahule sugatibhave
anya-e0104n0:533_7: suddhī”ti aggahetvā gosīlagovatādīhi suddhiṃ parāmasanto sukhapatthanāvaseneva parāmasatīti
anya-e0104n0:533_8: vedanāya taṇhaṃ pajahantopi sīlabbatupādānaṃ na upādiyati.
anya-e0104n0:534_0: Manosañcetanā saṅkhārakkhandho, saññā pana taṃsampayuttāti saññāsaṅkhāre anattato
anya-e0104n0:534_1: passanto manosañcetanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahati, tañca pariggaṇhāti, tīreti cāti “saññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:534_2: saṅkhāre…pe… parijānātī”ti vuttaṃ. Saññāsaṅkhāre anattāti passanto attadiṭṭhimūlakattā
anya-e0104n0:534_3: sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ attadiṭṭhiṃ viya sabbadiṭṭhiyopi vidhamatīti dassento “diṭṭhoghaṃ
anya-e0104n0:535_0: Viññāṇaṃ aniccato passanto aniccānupassanāmukhena tissopi anupassanā ussukkanto tīhipi
anya-e0104n0:535_1: pariññāhi viññāṇāhāraṃ parijānāti. Visesato panettha anicce niccanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n0:535_2: Tattha niccaggāhabāhullato avijjāya viññāṇe ghanagahaṇaṃ hotīti ghanavinibbhogaṃ
anya-e0104n0:535_3: katvā taṃ aniccato passanto avijjoghaṃ uttarati. Tato eva avijjāyogena visaṃyutto
anya-e0104n0:535_4: avijjāsavena anāsavo ca hoti. Mohabaleneva sīlabbataparāmasanaṃ hotīti taṃ pajahanto
anya-e0104n0:536_0: “Yañca kho idaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati cittaṃ itipi, mano itipi, viññāṇaṃ itipi, tatrāssutavā
anya-e0104n0:536_1: puthujjano nālaṃ nibbindituṃ, nālaṃ virajjituṃ, nālaṃ vimuccituṃ. Taṃ kissa hetu?
anya-e0104n0:536_2: Dīgharattaṃ hetaṃ, bhikkhave, assutavato puthujjanassa ajjhositaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:537: Vacanato yathā viññāṇaṃ niccato passanto diṭṭhupādānaṃ upādiyati, evaṃ taṃ aniccato passanto diṭṭhupādānaṃ na upādiyatīti.
anya-e0104n0:538_1: evaṃ vipuludayaṃ. Vadhakādivasenāti ukkhittāsikavadhakādivasena. Passeyyāti ñāṇadassanena
anya-e0104n0:543_1: gaṇanaparicchedenāha “dvādasāyatanānī”ti. Tattha vattabbaṃ parato sayameva vakkhati.
anya-e0104n0:544_0: Attho nāma saddattho, bhāvattho pana lakkhaṇameva. So pana saddattho duvidho – asādhāraṇo
anya-e0104n0:544_1: sādhāraṇoti. Tattha asādhāraṇo cakkhādisaddattho, sādhāraṇo āyatanasaddattho dvādasannampi samānattā.
anya-e0104n0:545_0: Tesu asādhāraṇaṃ tāva dassento “visesato tāvā”tiādimāha. Tattha visesatoti visesatthato,
anya-e0104n0:545_1: cakkhādisaddatthatoti attho. Assādetīti cakkhati-saddo “madhuṃ cakkhati, byañjanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:545_2: cakkhatī”ti rasasāyanattho atthīti tassa vasena atthaṃ vadati. “Cakkhuṃ kho pana,
anya-e0104n0:545_3: māgaṇḍiya, rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammudita”nti vacanato cakkhu rūpaṃ assādeti.
anya-e0104n0:545_4: Satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārāmatādibhāve yo “yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya
anya-e0104n0:545_6: vutto atthaviseso, tattheva niruḷhattā cakkhumhi eva cakkhusaddo pavattati gavādīsu
anya-e0104n0:546_0: Vibhāveti cāti saddalakkhaṇasiddhassa cakkhati-saddassa vasena atthaṃ vadati. Cakkhatīti
anya-e0104n0:546_1: hi ācikkhati, abhibyattaṃ vadatīti attho. Nettassa ca vadantassa viya samavisamavibhāvanameva
anya-e0104n0:546_2: ācikkhananti katvā āha “vibhāveti cāti attho”ti, anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ vibhāvanatthatā
anya-e0104n0:546_3: ca cakkhati-saddassa daṭṭhabbā. Rattaduṭṭhādikālesu kakaṇṭakarūpaṃ viya, uddarūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:546_4: viya ca vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ rūpayati rūpamiva pakāsaṃ
anya-e0104n0:546_5: karoti, saviggahamiva katvā dassetīti attho. Vitthāraṇaṃ vā rūpasaddassa attho, vitthāraṇañca
anya-e0104n0:546_6: pakāsanamevāti āha “pakāsetīti attho”ti. Anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho eva
anya-e0104n0:546_7: rūpasaddo daṭṭhabbo. Vaṇṇavācakassa rūpasaddassa rūpayatīti nibbacanaṃ, rūpakkhandhavācakassa
anya-e0104n0:546_8: ruppatīti ayaṃ viseso. Udāharīyatīti vuccatīti atthe vacanasaddo eva gahito siyā,
anya-e0104n0:546_9: na ca vacanasaddo evettha saddo, atha kho sabbopi sotaviññeyyoti. Sappatīti sakehi
anya-e0104n0:547_0: Sūcayatīti attano vatthuṃ apākaṭaṃ gandhavasena “idaṃ sugandhaṃ, duggandha”nti pakāseti,
anya-e0104n0:547_1: paṭicchannaṃ vā pupphādivatthuṃ “ettha pupphamatthi, campakādiphalamatthi, ambādī”ti
anya-e0104n0:547_2: pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti attho. Rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitahetumhi
anya-e0104n0:547_3: āhārarase ninnatāya jīvitaṃ avhayatīti jivhā niruttilakkhaṇena. Kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:547_4: āyoti visesena kāyo vutto anuttariyahetubhāvaṃ anāgacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu,
anya-e0104n0:547_5: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesatarasāsavapaccayattā.
anya-e0104n0:547_6: Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti. Uppattidesoti uppattiṭṭhānanti
anya-e0104n0:547_7: attho, kāyindriyavatthukā vā cattāro khandhā balavakāmāsavādihetubhāvato visesena
anya-e0104n0:548_0: Munātīti nāḷiyā minamāno viya, mahātulāya dhārayamāno viya ca ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti
anya-e0104n0:548_1: attho. Manate iti vā mano, taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paricchedavasena jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:548_2: Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti ye visesalakkhaṇena āyatanasaddaparā vattabbā, te cakkhādayo
anya-e0104n0:548_3: tathā vuttāti tato aññe manogocarabhūtā dhammā sāmaññalakkhaṇeneva ekāyatanabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:548_4: upanetvā vuttā. Yathā hi oḷārikavatthārammaṇamananasaṅkhātehi visayavisayībhāvehi
anya-e0104n0:548_5: purimāni pākaṭāni, tathā apākaṭā ca aññe manogocarā na attano sabhāvaṃ na dhārentīti
anya-e0104n0:548_6: imassa atthassa dīpanattho dhammasaddo. Dhārīyanti sāmaññarūpena avadhārīyantīti
anya-e0104n0:548_7: vā dhammā. Yathā hi rūpādayo cakkhuviññāṇādīhi asādhāraṇato eva yathāsakaṃ sabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:548_8: viññāyanti, na evamete, ete pana anekadhammabhāvato, sādhāraṇato, sabhāvasāmaññatopi
anya-e0104n0:549_0: 511. Sena senāti sakena sakena. Uṭṭhahantīti uṭṭhānaṃ karonti. Vāyamantīti ussahanti,
anya-e0104n0:549_1: attano kiccaṃ karonticceva attho. Imasmiṃ ca atthe āyatanti etthāti āyatanānīti adhikaraṇattho
anya-e0104n0:549_2: āyatanasaddo, dutiyatatiyesu kattuattho. Te cāti cittacetasike dhamme. Te hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇesu
anya-e0104n0:549_3: ayanti gacchanti pavattantīti āyā. Vitthārentīti pubbe anuppannattā līnāni apākaṭāni
anya-e0104n0:549_4: pubbantato uddhaṃ pattharenti pākaṭāni karonti, uppādentīti attho. Idañca saṃsāradukkhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:549_5: Na nivattatīti anuppādanirodhavasena na nirujjhati. Āyatanaṃ āyatananti āmeḍitavacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:550: 512. Evaṃ avayavabhedavasena āyatanasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni tattha pariyāyatopi dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Sādhuphalabharitatāya, aparissayatāya ca manoramme.
anya-e0104n0:551_0: Tattha nivasantīti nivasantā viya honti. Tenāha “tadāyattavuttitāyā”ti. Yattha suvaṇṇaratanādīni
anya-e0104n0:551_1: nivutthāni viya ākiṇṇāni tiṭṭhanti, so padeso tesaṃ ākaro, evaṃ cittacetasikā cakkhādīsūti
anya-e0104n0:551_2: te tesaṃ ākaroti dassento āha “cakkhādīsu ca…pe… ākaro”ti. Tannissitattāti ettha
anya-e0104n0:551_3: mano manoviññāṇādīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ nissayapaccayo na hotīti tassa tesaṃ dvārabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:551_4: nissayabhāvoti daṭṭhabbo. Ahutvā eva paccayasāmaggivasena uppajjantāpi cittacetasikā
anya-e0104n0:551_5: aneke ekajjhaṃ tattha labbhamānā samosaṭā viya hontīti vuttaṃ “vatthudvārārammaṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:551_6: samosaraṇato”ti. Na hi dhammānaṃ anāgataddhe vijjamānatālesopi atthi. Tenāha “puñjo
anya-e0104n0:551_7: natthi anāgate”ti. Tattheva uppattitoti tesu cakkhādīsu eva uppattito. Uppattiyā
anya-e0104n0:551_8: paccayabhūte cakkhādike uppattiṭṭhānaṃ viya katvā upacāravasena vuttaṃ. Na hi arūpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:551_9: nippariyāyato uppattideso nāma atthi. Yadaggena vā te tesaṃ nissayārammaṇabhūtā,
anya-e0104n0:551_10: tadaggena sañjātideso. Na hi paccayabhāvamantarena rūpadhammānampi ādhārādheyyabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:552_1: ca vuttappakārena atthena. Dhammāyatanapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ bahubhāvato yebhuyyena
anya-e0104n0:552_2: ca te bahū eva hutvā kiccakarāti “dhammā ca te āyatanañcā”ti bahuvacananiddeso.
anya-e0104n0:553: 513. Tathā tathā lakkhitabbato lakkhīyati etenāti vā lakkhaṇaṃ, sabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:554_0: Tāvabhāvatoti tattakato, tena anūnādhikabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tattha dvādasāyatanavinimuttassa
anya-e0104n0:554_1: kassaci dhammassa abhāvā adhikabhāvato codanā natthi, salakkhaṇadhāraṇaṃ pana sabbesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:554_2: sāmaññalakkhaṇanti ūnacodanā sambhavatīti taṃ dassento āha “cakkhādayopi hī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:554_4: bhavaṅgappavattiyā sati eva āvajjanuppatti, na aññatthāti āvajjanassāpi kāraṇabhūtanti
anya-e0104n0:554_6: asādhāraṇaṃ. Satipi asādhāraṇabhāve cakkhādīnaṃ dvārabhāvena gahitattā dhammāyatanena
anya-e0104n0:554_7: aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dvārārammaṇabhāvehi vā asādhāraṇataṃ sandhāya “asādhāraṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:555_0: 514. Yebhuyyasahuppattiādīhi uppattikkamādīsu ayutti yojetabbā. Yebhuyyena hi cakkhāyatanādīni
anya-e0104n0:555_1: kassaci kadāci ekato uppajjanti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci
anya-e0104n0:555_2: ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”tiādi. Tasmā āyatanānaṃ uppattikkamo tāva na yujjati,
anya-e0104n0:555_3: na pahānakkamo kusalābyākatānaṃ appahātabbato, na paṭipattikkamo akusalānaṃ ekaccaabyākatānañca
anya-e0104n0:555_4: appaṭipajjanīyato, na bhūmikkamo aḍḍhekādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ ekantakāmāvacarattā,
anya-e0104n0:555_6: hī”ti etena ajjhattikabhāvena, visayībhāvena ca ajjhattikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desetabbataṃ
anya-e0104n0:555_7: dasseti, tesupi paṭhamaṃ desetabbesu pākaṭattā paṭhamataraṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ desitanti.
anya-e0104n0:556_0: Tato ghānāyatanādīnīti ettha bahupakārattābhāvena cakkhusotehi purimataraṃ adesetabbāni,
anya-e0104n0:556_1: saha vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ekena kamena desetabbānīti ghānādikkamena desitānīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:556_2: Aññathāpi hi desitesu na na sakkā codetuṃ, na ca sakkā bodhetabbāni na desetunti.
anya-e0104n0:556_3: Paccuppannārammaṇattā vā cakkhādīni paṭhamaṃ vuttāni ārammaṇato supākaṭānīti, manāyatanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:556_4: pana kiñci paccunnārammaṇaṃ…pe… kiñci yāva navattabbārammaṇanti pacchā vuttaṃ. Paccuppannārammaṇesupi
anya-e0104n0:556_5: upādārūpārammaṇāni cattāri paṭhamaṃ vuttāni, tato bhūtarūpārammaṇaṃ. Upādārūpārammaṇesupi
anya-e0104n0:556_6: dūratare dūre, sīghataraṃ sīghañca ārammaṇasampaṭicchanadīpanatthaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ desanākkamo.
anya-e0104n0:556_7: Cakkhusotadvayañhi dūragocaranti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ, tatrāpi cakkhu dūrataragocaranti
anya-e0104n0:556_8: sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. Passantopi hi dūratare nadīsotaṃ, na tassa sotapaṭighātasaddaṃ
anya-e0104n0:556_9: suṇāti. Ghānajivhāsupi ghānaṃ sīghataravuttīti paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ purato ṭhapitamattassapi
anya-e0104n0:556_10: bhojanassa gandho gayhatīti. Yathāṭhānaṃ vā tesaṃ desanākkamo. Imasmiñhi sarīre sabbupari
anya-e0104n0:556_11: cakkhussa adhiṭṭhānaṃ, tassa adho sotassa, tassa adho ghānassa, tassa adho jivhāya,
anya-e0104n0:556_12: tathā kāyassa yebhuyyato, mano pana arūpibhāvato sabbapacchā vutto. Taṃtaṃgocarattā
anya-e0104n0:556_13: tassa tassa anantaraṃ bāhirāyatanāni vuttānīti vuttovāyamatthoti evampi imesaṃ kamo
anya-e0104n0:556_14: veditabbo. Gocaro visayo etassāti gocaravisayo, mano. Kassa pana gocaro etassa visayo?
anya-e0104n0:556_16: vavatthitabhāvato savibhattibhāvato. Etena cakkhādianantaraṃ rūpādivacanassa ca kāraṇamāha.
anya-e0104n0:557_2: tassa ca sahakārīkāraṇabhūtānaṃ abbhantarānaṃ, bāhirānañca paccayānaṃ bhedena cakkhāyatanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:557_3: bhinnaṃ visadisaṃ hotīti. Nirayādiko, apadādigatinānākaraṇañca gatibhedo gatīnaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:557_4: gatīsu vā bhedoti katvā. Hatthiassādiko, khattiyādiko ca nikāyabhedo. Taṃtaṃsattasantānabhedo
anya-e0104n0:557_5: puggalabhedo. Yā cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ anantappabhedatā vuttā, so eva hadayavatthussa
anya-e0104n0:557_6: bhedo tādisabhedānātivattanato. Tato manāyatanassa anantappabhedatā yojetabbā. Yasmā
anya-e0104n0:557_7: jhānavirahitaṃ nāma lokuttaraṃ natthi, tasmā pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena aṭṭha lokuttaracittāni
anya-e0104n0:557_8: cattālīsaṃ hontīti tāni ekāsītiyā lokiyacittesu pakkhipitvā āha “ekavīsuttarasatappabhedañcā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:557_9: Vatthūti cakkhādivatthu. Tappabhedena viññāṇaṃ anantappabhedaṃ. Paṭipadā dukkhāpaṭipadādi.
anya-e0104n0:557_10: Ādi-saddena jhānādhipatibhūmiārammaṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Nīlaṃ nīlassa sabhāgaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:557_11: aññaṃ visabhāgaṃ. Paccayo kammādi. Tatthāpi kusalasamuṭṭhānāditā, sītautusamuṭṭhānāditā
anya-e0104n0:557_12: ca bhedo veditabbo. Ādisaddena gatinikāyabhedo. Sabhāvanānattabhedatoti sukhā dukkhā
anya-e0104n0:557_13: adukkhamasukhāti evamādiko sabhāvabhedo. Cakkhusamphassajā sotasamphassajāti evamādikaṃ nānattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:558_1: vuttaṃ. Pubbantāparantesu avijjamānasarūpattā udayato pubbe kutoci nāgacchanti, vayato
anya-e0104n0:558_2: ca uddhaṃ na katthaci gacchanti, vijjamānakkhaṇepi ittarakālatāya aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā.
anya-e0104n0:558_3: Tenāha “atha kho”tiādi. Saparipphandakiriyāvasena īhanaṃ īhā, cintanavasena byāpāranaṃ
anya-e0104n0:558_4: byāpāro, tattha byāpāraṃ dassento āha “na hi cakkhurūpādīnaṃ evaṃ hotī”ti. Īhaṃ dassento
anya-e0104n0:558_5: “na ca tānī”tiādi. Ubhayampi pana īhā ca hoti byāpāro cāti uppaṭipāṭivacanaṃ. Dhammatāvāti
anya-e0104n0:558_6: sabhāvo eva, kāraṇasamatthatā vā īhābyāpārarahitānaṃ dvārādibhāvo dhammatā. Imasmiñca
anya-e0104n0:558_7: atthe “ya”nti etassa yasmāti attho. Purimasmiṃ sambhavanavisesanaṃ yaṃ-saddo. “Suñño
anya-e0104n0:558_8: gāmoti kho, bhikkhave, channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato
anya-e0104n0:558_9: suññagāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni. Annapānasahitanti gahite suññagāme yaṃ yadeva bhājanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:558_10: parāmasīyati, taṃ taṃ rittakaṃyeva parāmasīyati, evaṃ dhuvādibhāvena gahitāni yoniso
anya-e0104n0:561_0: 517. Cakkhussa viññāṇanti cakkhussa kāraṇabhūtassa viññāṇaṃ. Kāmaṃ rūpālokamanasikārādayopi
anya-e0104n0:561_1: tassa viññāṇassa kāraṇā, te pana sādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ, cakkhu asādhāraṇanti asādhāraṇakāraṇenāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:561_2: niddeso yathā bherisaddo, yavaṅkuroti. Tathā hi cakkhu puggalantarāsādhāraṇaṃ, nīlādisabbarūpasādhāraṇañcāti
anya-e0104n0:562_0: Vidahatīti evaṃ evañca tayā pavattitabbanti viniyuñjamānaṃ viya uppādetīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:562_1: Vidahatīti ca dhātvattho eva visiṭṭho upasaggena dīpīyatīti vināpi upasaggena dhātūti
anya-e0104n0:562_2: esa saddo tamatthaṃ vadatīti daṭṭhabbo. Kattukammabhāvakaraṇādhikaraṇesu ca dhātusaddasiddhi
anya-e0104n0:562_3: hotīti pañcāpi te atthā vuttā. Lokuttarā dhātuyo saṃsāradukkhaṃ na vidahanti, aññadatthu
anya-e0104n0:562_4: vidhaṃsentīti katvā “lokiyā”ti visesitaṃ. Vavatthitāti avatthitā, aññamaññaṃ vā asaṃkiṇṇā.
anya-e0104n0:562_5: Suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo suvaṇṇādīnaṃ bījabhūtā selādayo. Yathāsambhavanti ettha keci
anya-e0104n0:562_6: “lokiyalokuttarāsu dhātūsu yo yo attho sambhavati, tadanurūpa”nti atthaṃ vadanti,
anya-e0104n0:562_7: tadayuttaṃ “lokiyā hi dhātuyo”ti visesetvā vuttattā. Atthavasena cetaṃ yathāsambhavaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:562_8: kataṃ, na dhātuvasena. Kāmaṃ pañcapi atthā cakkhādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ icchitabbā, tathāpi
anya-e0104n0:562_9: cakkhādīsu yassa yassa dhammassa yadā kattuvacanicchā, na tadā kammabhāvo. Yadā pana
anya-e0104n0:562_10: kammavacanicchā, na tadā kattubhāvo. Evaṃ sesesupīti yathāsambhavaggahaṇaṃ. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:563_0: 518. Attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyoti etthāpi dhātīti dhātūti padasiddhi veditabbā
anya-e0104n0:563_1: dhāraṇattho dhā-saddoti katvā. Kattuatthopi cāyaṃ purimena asadiso vidhānadhāraṇatthānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:563_2: bhinnasabhāvattā. Nissattasabhāvamattadhāraṇañca dhātusaddassa padhāno atthoti visuṃ
anya-e0104n0:563_3: vutto. Dhātuyo viya dhātuyoti ettha sīhasaddo viya kesarimhi niruḷhā purise selāvayavesu
anya-e0104n0:563_4: niruḷho dhātusaddo cakkhādīsu upacaritoti daṭṭhabbo. Ñāṇañca ñeyyañca ñāṇañeyyāni,
anya-e0104n0:563_5: tesaṃ avayavā tappabhedabhūtā dhātuyo ñāṇañeyyāvayavā. Tattha ñāṇappabhedo dhammadhātuekadeso,
anya-e0104n0:563_6: ñeyyappabhedo aṭṭhārasāpīti ñāṇañeyyāvayavamattā dhātuyo hontīti. Atha vā ñāṇena
anya-e0104n0:563_7: ñātabbo sabhāvo aviparīto dhātusaddena vuccamāno ñāṇañeyyo, na diṭṭhiādīhi viparītaggāhakehi
anya-e0104n0:563_8: ñeyyoti attho, tassa ñāṇañeyyassa avayavā cakkhādayo, visabhāgalakkhaṇāvayavesu rasādīsu
anya-e0104n0:563_9: niruḷho dhātusaddo tādisesu aññāvayavesu cakkhādīsu upacaritoti daṭṭhabbo. Rasādīsu
anya-e0104n0:563_10: viya vā cakkhādīsupi niruḷho eva. “Nijjīvamattassetaṃ adhivacana”nti etena nijjīvamattapadatthe
anya-e0104n0:563_11: dhātusaddassa niruḷhataṃ dasseti. Cha dhātuyo etassāti chadhāturo. Yo loke purisoti
anya-e0104n0:563_12: dhammasamudāyo vuccati, so chadhāturo channaṃ pathavīādīnaṃ nijjīvamattānaṃ sabhāvānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:563_13: samudāyamatto, na ettha jīvo vā puriso vā atthīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:564_0: 519. Cakkhādīnaṃ kamo pubbe vuttoti idhekekasmiṃ tike tiṇṇaṃ dhātūnaṃ kamaṃ dassento
anya-e0104n0:564_2: eva, manodhammadhātūnañca manoviññāṇassa hetubhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. Kiriyamanodhātu
anya-e0104n0:564_4: itarassa sabbāpi upanissayakoṭiyā ca, dhammadhātu pana vedanādikā sahajātā sahajātādinā,
anya-e0104n0:564_5: asahajātā anantarādinā, upanissayena, ārammaṇādinā ca manoviññāṇassa paccayo hotīti
anya-e0104n0:564_6: dvārabhūtamanovasena vā. Dvārabhūtamanopi hi suttesu manodhātūti vuccatīti tassā
anya-e0104n0:564_7: vā manodhātuyā manoviññāṇassa hetubhāvo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. Tattha hetūti paccayo
anya-e0104n0:565_0: 520. Sabbāsaṃ vasenāti yathāvuttānaṃ ābhādhātuādīnaṃ pañcatiṃsāya dhātūnaṃ vasena.
anya-e0104n0:565_1: Aparamatthasabhāvassa paramatthasabhāvesu na kadāci antogadhatā atthīti āha “sabhāvato vijjamānāna”nti.
anya-e0104n0:566_0: Candābhāsūriyābhādikā vaṇṇanibhā evāti āha “rūpadhātuyeva hi ābhādhātū”ti. Rūpādipaṭibaddhāti
anya-e0104n0:566_1: rāgavatthubhāvena gahetabbākāro subhanimittanti katvā “rūpādayo evā”ti avatvā paṭibaddhavacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:566_2: vuttaṃ. Asatipi rāgavatthubhāve kusalavipākārammaṇaṃ subhadhātūti dutiyo vikappo
anya-e0104n0:567_1: kāmarāgasampayutto, ārammaṇakaraṇena vā kāmaguṇopasaṃhito. Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti ye
anya-e0104n0:567_2: etasmiṃ avīciparanimmitavasavattiparicchinne okāse. Ogāḷhā hutvā adhobhāge ca okāse
anya-e0104n0:567_3: carantīti etthāvacarā. Aññattha carantāpi yathāvutte eva ṭhāne pariyāpannāti ettha pariyāpannā.
anya-e0104n0:568_0: Nekkhammadhātu dhammadhātu eva vitakkapakkhe. Sabbepi kusalā dhammāti dānamayapuññakiriyato,
anya-e0104n0:568_1: sīlamayapuññakiriyato, pabbajjato ca paṭṭhāya yāva aggamaggādhigamā pavattā sabbepi
anya-e0104n0:568_2: anavajjadhammā. Vihiṃsādhātu cetanā, paraviheṭhanacchando vā. Avihiṃsā karuṇā.
anya-e0104n0:569_0: Hīnāti hīḷitā. Paṇītāti sambhāvitā. “Nātihīḷitā nātisambhāvitā majjhimā”ti khandhaniddese
anya-e0104n0:569_1: āgatā hīnadukato eva nīharitvā majjhimā dhātu vuttāti veditabbā. Ubhopīti dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuyo.
anya-e0104n0:570_0: Viññāṇadhātu yadipi chaviññāṇadhātuvasena vibhattā, tathāpi viññāṇadhātuggahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:570_1: tassa purecārikapacchācārikattā manodhātu gahitāva hotīti āha “viññāṇadhātu cakkhuviññāṇādisattaviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0104n0:570_2: saṅkhepoyevā”ti. Anekesaṃ cakkhudhātuādīnaṃ, tāsu ca ekekissā nānappakāratāya nānādhātūnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:570_3: vasena anekadhātu nānādhātu loko vuttoti āha “aṭṭhārasadhātuppabhedamattamevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:571_2: na cakkhādīnaṃ kevalena dhātusaddena sambandho adhippeto vijānanasabhāvassa pabhedavacanato.
anya-e0104n0:571_3: Viññāṇadhātusaddena ca sambandhe kariyamāne dve manogahaṇāni na kātabbāni. Na hi
anya-e0104n0:571_4: dve manoviññāṇadhātuyo santi. Antarā vā manodhātugahaṇaṃ akatvā “cakkhu…pe… kāyamanoviññāṇadhātumanodhātū”ti
anya-e0104n0:571_5: vattabbaṃ atulyayoge dvandasamāsābhāvato. Ayaṃ panettha pāṭho siyā “cakkhu…pe… kāyaviññāṇamanomanoviññāṇadhātubhedenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:571_6: Tassa viññāṇassa yebhuyyena attavādino tassa ekamekassa attassa advayataṃ, niccattañca
anya-e0104n0:571_7: pavedentīti anekatāniccatāpakāsanaṃ tesaṃ jīvasaññāsamūhananāya hoti. Khandhāyatanadesanā
anya-e0104n0:571_8: saṅkhepadesanā, indriyadesanā vitthāradesanā, tadubhayaṃ apekkhitvā ayaṃ anatisaṅkhepavitthārā
anya-e0104n0:571_9: dhātudesanā. Abhidhamme vā suttantabhājanīye vuttā dhātudesanā atisaṅkhepadesanā,
anya-e0104n0:571_10: ābhādhātuādīnaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuantānaṃ vasena desetabbā ativitthāradesanā, tadubhayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:573_0: 522. Saṅkhatoti gaṇanato. Jātitoti cakkhubhāvasāmaññato. Atha vā jātitoti cakkhusabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:573_1: Tenāha “cakkhupasādo”ti. Vīsati dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati vedanādīnaṃ abhinditvā
anya-e0104n0:575_0: Purimehevāti anantarādīhi eva. Javanamanoviññāṇadhātu pana javanamanoviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0104n0:575_1: āsevanapaccayenāpi paccayo hotīti vuttovāyamattho. Dhammadhātūti pana sahajāto vedanādikkhandho
anya-e0104n0:575_2: adhippeto. Tenāha “sahajāta…pe… paccayo hotī”ti. Avigatādīhīti ettha ādi-saddena
anya-e0104n0:575_4: saṅgayhati. Tenāha “bahudhā paccayo hotī”ti. Ekaccā ca dhammadhātu sukhumarūpanibbānappakārā,
anya-e0104n0:575_5: yā ca sampayogānantarabhāvādīnaṃ abhāvena ārammaṇakaraṇe yogyā. Pañcadvārikavipākavajjanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:575_6: “ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā”ti vuttaṃ, manodvārikā pana vipākāpi tadārammaṇabhūtā
anya-e0104n0:575_7: ekaccaṃ dhammadhātuṃ ārabbha pavattatīti. Atha vā “ekaccāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā”ti
anya-e0104n0:575_8: idaṃ sabbaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ abhiññādvayaṃ āruppadvayanti evarūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:575_9: manoviññāṇadhātuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, lokuttaramanoviññāṇadhātuyā pana ekaccā dhammadhātu
anya-e0104n0:575_11: atirekepi paccayadhamme dassetuṃ “na kevala”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ālokādayoti āloko
anya-e0104n0:575_12: nāma sūriyālokādi. Tassa suttantanayena upanissayabhāvo veditabbo, evaṃ sesānipi.
anya-e0104n0:576_0: Vivaraṃ nāma visesato sotabilaṃ. Vāyu gandhūpasaṃharaṇakavāto. Āpo mukhe pakkhittaāhārassa
anya-e0104n0:576_1: temanakaudakaṃ. Pathavī kāyappasādassa nissayabhūtā pathavīdhātu. Bhavaṅgamanaṃ dvikkhattuṃ
anya-e0104n0:577_0: 524. Avisesato daṭṭhabbākārassa vuccamānattā āha “sabbā evā”ti. Visesato vipassanāya
anya-e0104n0:577_2: atīto addhā, aparanto nāma anāgato. Ubhayattha ca saṅkhatā dhātuyo sabhāvavivittā
anya-e0104n0:577_3: anupalabbhamānasabhāvattā. Pubbanto vā sabhāvadhammassa udayo tato pubbe avijjamānattā.
anya-e0104n0:577_4: Aparanto vayo tato paraṃ abhāvato. Tasmā pubbantāparantavivittatoti pākābhāvato viddhaṃsābhāvatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:578_0: Bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudātu saddassa viya viññāṇassa nissayabhāvato. Ādāsatalādīsupi
anya-e0104n0:578_1: eseva nayo. Yantaṃ nāma ucchuyantaṃ. Cakkayaṭṭhīti tilamanthaṃ āha. So hi acakkabaṇdhopi
anya-e0104n0:578_2: taṃsadisatāya cakkayaṭṭhītveva vuccati, cakkabandhameva vā sandhāya tathā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:578_3: Imāhi ca upamāhi nijjīvāna. Bheritaladaṇḍādīnaṃ samāyoge, nijjīvānaṃ saddādīnaṃ viya
anya-e0104n0:578_4: nijjīvānaṃ cakkhurūpādīnaṃ samāyoge nijjīvānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pavattīti kāraṇaphalānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:579_0: Purecarānucarā viyāti nijjīvassa kassaci keci nijjīvā purecarānucarā viyāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:579_1: Manodhātuyeva vā attano khaṇaṃ anativattantī attano khaṇa anativattantānaṃyeva cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:579_2: avijjamānāyapi purecarānucarābhisandhiyaṃ anantarapubbakālāparakālatāya purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:580_0: Channañhi viññāṇadhātūnaṃ ekajjhaṃ anekānantarapaccayābhāvato ekajjhaṃ uppattiabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:580_1: viya aññamaññānantarapaccayatābhāvato anantaruppattipi natthi. Yadi siyā, chaḷārammaṇasannidhāne
anya-e0104n0:580_2: manasikāramantarenāpi chaḷārammaṇūpaladdhi siyā, na ca hoti, tasmā dassanādianantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:580_3: savanādīnaṃ abhāvo viya manoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ na dassanādīni, na ca dassanādianantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:580_4: manoviññāṇadhātu hoti. Tattha bhavaṅgassa, dassanādīnañca bhinnārammaṇatāya manoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:580_5: dassanādīni, dassanādīnaṃ anantarañca savanādīni na uppajjantīti yuttametaṃ. Dassanādīnaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:580_6: pana santīramaṇassa ca abhinnavisayatāya dassanādianantaraṃ na manāviññāṇadātu hotīti
anya-e0104n0:580_7: ayuttanti? Nayidamevaṃ niyatāniyatavisayānaṃ bhinnavisayabhāvupapattito. Yadi ca
anya-e0104n0:580_8: dassanādianantaraṃ kāci viññāṇadhātu uppajjeyya, sāpi dassanādidvāratāya dassanādiviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0104n0:580_9: eva siyā, na manoviññāṇadhātu, tato ca dassanādikiccavidhuraṃ cintanaṃ manananti
anya-e0104n0:580_11: āpajjati. Tathā tadanantarassāti sabbāyapi dassanaviññāṇabhāvato ca viññāṇakāyā na bhaveyyuṃ.
anya-e0104n0:581_0: Yathā pana manoviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ manodhātu, tato cakkhuviññāṇādīni, evaṃ dassanaviññāṇadhātānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:581_1: manodhātu, tato sotaviññāṇādīni hontīti ce? Na, manodhātuyā dassanadhātubhāvappasaṅgato.
anya-e0104n0:581_2: Yathā hi manaso nibbisesāvatthā mananamattatāya manodhātu, evaṃ dassanassa nibbisesāvatthā
anya-e0104n0:581_3: dassanamattatāya dassanadhātu siyā. Tañca cakkhūviññāṇaṃ rūpavisayanti saddādivisayābhogābhāvato
anya-e0104n0:581_4: savanaviññāṇādīnaṃ asambhavo. Tato ca rūpārammaṇapasutameva viññāṇaṃ siyā manoviññāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:581_6: na siyā, na cetaṃ yuttaṃ. Tasmā sukhadukkhānaṃ viya upekkhā cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ, manoviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:581_7: ca byavadhāyikā manodhātu daṭṭhabbā, na cassā upekkhāya viya adukkhamasukhatā adassanādiamananatā,
anya-e0104n0:581_8: ata kho mananakiccāvisesato manoviññāṇasabhāgatā. Mano hi hadayavatthumhi vattamāno
anya-e0104n0:581_9: aññavatthusannissitānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ visayaṃ dassetvā nivattamāno aggi viya usumamatte
anya-e0104n0:581_10: mananamatte ṭhatvā nivattati, aññavatthusannissitaviññāṇanirodhe ca uṭṭhahanto aggi
anya-e0104n0:581_11: viya usumamatte uṭṭhahati. Paccayānurūpapavattikāni ca mananamattāni manoviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0104n0:581_12: antāni honti. Paṭighasaññāsahagatānañhi pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ indriyārammanapaṭighātajatāya
anya-e0104n0:581_15: cittaṃ calanāvatthaṃ hutvā nivattamānaṃ cintanāvisesavirahato abhinipātānuguṇaṃ cintanāvasānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:582_0: Dassanādipi abhinipātamattaṃ dutiyaṃ khaṇaṃ anativattamānaṃ attānuguṇaṃ cintanāmananasamaññāvirahato
anya-e0104n0:582_2: nibbatteti, tasmā vatthukiccehi taṃ manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahitāpi manodhātu manodvāranikkhamapavesabhūtā
anya-e0104n0:582_4: yathākkamaṃ purecarā, anucarāti ca vuttā. Sā panāyaṃ satipi viññāṇabhāve manaso sambhūya
anya-e0104n0:582_5: visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvato dhātubhāvasāmaññena manomattā dhātu manodhātūti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:583_0: Yathāvutteneva ca hetunā matta-saddalopaṃ katvā viññāṇaṭṭhayogato manomattaṃ viññāṇanti
anya-e0104n0:583_1: manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahopi cassā yujjati eva. Aññaviññāṇehi pana dvārārammaṇehi ca
anya-e0104n0:583_3: manogahaṇaṃ. Dhātuvisesanatthe ca manoviññāṇaggahaṇe viññāṇavisesanaṃ dvārabhūtamanodassanamevāti
anya-e0104n0:583_4: dvārasamaññārahattā na manodhātūti vuccati. Tañhi manodvārantogadhaṃ, na ca dassanādipurecarānucaranti
anya-e0104n0:583_5: manaso viññāṇadhātu, manaso viññāṇanti ca manodvārasamaññārahaṃ, savisesañca tassa
anya-e0104n0:584_0: Sallamiva sūlamiva tividhadukkhatāsamāyogato daṭṭhabbo. Vedanāsallasūlayogāti vedanāsaṅkhātasallasūlayogato.
anya-e0104n0:584_1: Āturā viyāti tena āturibhūtā puggalā viya. Āsāyeva dukkhaṃ āsādukkhaṃ, āsāvighātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:584_2: dukkhaṃ vā. Saññā hi asubhādikampi subhādito sajjānantī āsaṃ, tassā ca vighātaṃ āsīsitasubhādiasiddhiyā
anya-e0104n0:584_3: janetīti. Vanamigo tiṇapurisaṃ purisoti gaṇhanto ayathābhūccanimittaggāhako, tathā
anya-e0104n0:584_4: saññāpīti āha “vanamigo viyā”ti. Kammapadhānā saṅkhārāti “paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanato”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:584_5: vuttaṃ. Jātidukkhānubandhatoti attanā nibbattiyamānena jātidukkhena anubandhatā.
anya-e0104n0:584_6: Bhavapaccayā jāti hi jātidukkhanti. Padumaṃ viya dissamānaṃ khuracakkaṃ viya rūpampi
anya-e0104n0:584_7: itthiādibhāvena dissamānaṃ nānāvidhupaddavaṃ janeti. Sabbe anatthā rāgādayo, jātiādayo
anya-e0104n0:584_8: ca visayabhūtā, anupasantā, sappaṭibhayā cāti. Tappaṭipakkhabhūtattā asaṅkhatā dhātu
anya-e0104n0:585_0: Vavatthānābhāvo “idameva imassa ārammaṇa”nti niyamābhāvo, tena yathā araññamakkaṭo
anya-e0104n0:585_1: kenaci anivārito gahitaṃ ekaṃ rukkhasākhaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhāti, tampi muñcitvā
anya-e0104n0:585_2: aññanti katthaci anavaṭṭhito paribbhamati, evaṃ gahitaṃ ekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:585_3: tampi muñcitvā aññanti anavaṭṭhitatā, ārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā pavattituṃ asamatthatā
anya-e0104n0:585_4: ca makkaṭasamānatāti dasseti. Aṭṭhivedhaviddhopi uppathaṃ anugaccchanto duṭṭhasso
anya-e0104n0:585_5: assakhaḷuṅko. Yatthakāmanipātitoti yattha katthaci icchitārammaṇe nipātibhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:590_1: tesaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ. Tattha cakkhudvāre indaṭṭhaṃ kāreti cakkhudvārabhāve taṃdvārikehi
anya-e0104n0:590_2: attano indabhāvaṃ paramissarabhāvaṃ kārayatīti cakkhundriyaṃ. Tañhi te rūpaggahaṇe
anya-e0104n0:590_3: attānaṃ anuvatteti, te ca taṃ anuvattanti. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Tasmā sotaghānajivhākāyadvāre
anya-e0104n0:590_4: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti. Kāyindriyaṃ. Vijānanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti manindriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:590_7: upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe, avikkhepalakkhaṇe, dassanalakkhaṇe, anaññātaṃ ñassāmīti pavatte
anya-e0104n0:590_8: jānanalakkhaṇe, ñātānaṃ eva dhammānaṃ puna ājānane aññātāvibhāve indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti aññātāvindriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:591_0: Vijāniyāti vijāneyya. Bhūmito cāti ca-saddo avuttasampipaṇḍanattho, tena tāvatvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:591_1: saṅgaṇhāti, taṃ pana tāvatvaṃ parato vaṇṇayissāma. Asammasanupagānampi atthibhāvato
anya-e0104n0:592_0: Pubbabhāgeti ariyamaggato pubbabhāge. Anaññātanti na aññātaṃ na adhigataṃ. Niccatāya
anya-e0104n0:592_1: natthi etassa mataṃ bhaṅgo, na vā etasmiṃ adhigate maraṇanti amataṃ, pajjitabbato
anya-e0104n0:592_2: padañcāti amatapadaṃ nibbānaṃ. “Evaṃ paṭipannassa uppajjanato”ti etena pubbabhāgavasenetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:592_3: indriyaṃ evaṃ voharīyatīti dasseti. Ājānanatoti paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvāva
anya-e0104n0:592_4: jānanato. Yena taṃsamaṅgipuggalo, taṃsampayuttadhammā vā aññātāvino honti, so aññātāvibhāvo
anya-e0104n0:592_5: pariniṭṭhitakiccajānanakhīṇāsavassa bhāvabhūto hutvā uppattito “khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:593_0: Liṅgeti gameti ñāpetīti liṅgaṃ, liṅgīyati vā etenāti liṅgaṃ. Kiṃ liṅgeti, kiṃ vā
anya-e0104n0:593_1: liṅgīyatīti? Indaṃ, indo vā. Indassa liṅga indaliṅgaṃ, indaliṅgassa attho taṃsabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:593_2: indaliṅgaṭṭho, indaliṅgameva vā indriyasaddassa atthoti indaliṅgaṭṭho. Sajjitaṃ uppāditanti
anya-e0104n0:593_3: siṭṭhaṃ, indena siṭṭhaṃ indasiṭṭhaṃ. Juṭṭhaṃ sevitaṃ. Kammasaṅkhātassa indassa liṅgāni,
anya-e0104n0:593_4: tena ca siṭṭhānīti kammajāneva yojetabbāni, na aññāni, te ca dve atthā kamme eva
anya-e0104n0:593_5: yojetabbā, itare ca bhagavati evāti āha “yathāyoga”nti. Tenāti bhagavato, kammassa
anya-e0104n0:593_6: ca indattā. Etthāti etesu indriyesu. Ulliṅgenti ñāpenti pakāsenti phalasampattivipattīhi
anya-e0104n0:593_8: āsevanā vuttāti āha “kānici gocarāsevanāyā”ti. Tattha sabbesaṃ gocarikātabbattepi
anya-e0104n0:593_9: “kānicī”ti vacanaṃ avipassitabbānaṃ bahulaṃ manasikaraṇena anāsevanīyattā. Paccavekkhanāmattameva
anya-e0104n0:593_10: hi tesu hotīti. “Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato”tiādīsu bhāvanā āsevanāti vuttāti bhāvetabbāni
anya-e0104n0:594_0: Ādhipaccaṃ indriyapaccayabhāvo. Asatipi ca indriyapaccayabhāve itthipurisindriyānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:594_1: attano attano paccayavasena pavattamāne taṃsahitasantāne aññākārena appavattamānehi
anya-e0104n0:594_2: liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyabhāve ādhipaccaṃ. Imasmiṃ ca atthe indanti parimissariyaṃ karonticceva
anya-e0104n0:594_3: indriyāni. Cakkhādīsu dassitena nayena aññesañca jīvitādīnaṃ tadanuvattīsu ādhipaccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:595_0: Amohoyeva na visuṃ cattāro dhammā, tasmā tassa saṅkhārakkhandhakathāyaṃ vibhāvitāni
anya-e0104n0:595_1: lakkhaṇādīni tesañca veditabbānīti adhippāyo. Sesāni tattha khandhaniddese lakkhaṇādīhi arūpeneva āgatāni.
anya-e0104n0:596_0: 526. Sattānaṃ ariyabhūmipaṭilābho bhagavato desanāya sādhāraṇaṃ, padānañca payojananti
anya-e0104n0:596_2: satipi attabhāvapaññāpanāya mūlabhāvato cakkhādīnaṃ sātisayā attabhāvapariyāpannāti
anya-e0104n0:596_4: jīvitindriyadesanākkamo vuttoti idhāpi “tato jīvitindriya”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ indriyayamakadesanāya
anya-e0104n0:596_5: sameti. Indriyavibhaṅge pana manindriyānantaraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ purimapacchimānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:596_6: ajjhāttikabāhirānaṃ anupālakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ tesa majjhe vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Yañca
anya-e0104n0:596_7: kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ. Yāva ca duvidhattabhāvānupālakassa jīvitindriyassa
anya-e0104n0:596_8: pavatti, tāva dukkhabhūtānaṃ etesaṃ vedayitānaṃ anivattīti ñāpanatthaṃ, tena ca cakkhādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:596_10: Tassevāti anaññātaññassāmītindriyasseva. Tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbattāti bhāvanāmaggasampayuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:596_11: aññindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dassanāntarā hi bhāvanāti.
anya-e0104n0:597_0: Bhedoti idha sabhāvato bhedo adhippeto, na bhūmipuggalādivasenāti āha “sesānaṃ abhedo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:597_1: Nanu ca jīvitindriyassa anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo, tenassa duvidhassāpi abhedoti?
anya-e0104n0:597_2: Saccametaṃ, tassa pana rūpārūpasabhāvakato bhedo gahito, na evaṃ sesānaṃ koci bhedo
anya-e0104n0:597_3: atthīti tesaṃ abhedoti bhedābhāvo vutto. Nanu cettha vedanā, paññā ca bhinditvā vuttāti?
anya-e0104n0:597_4: Na, yathā desitesu bāvīsatiyā indriyesu bhedābhedassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0104n0:598_1: kiccaṃ kiccanti vuttaṃ tassa anaññasādhāraṇattā, indriyakathāya ca adhikatattā. Attano
anya-e0104n0:598_2: tikkhamandādiākāro attākāro, tassa anuvattāpanaṃ attākārānuvattāpanaṃ. Tenāha “tikkhamandādisaṅkhātaattākārānuvattāpana”nti.
anya-e0104n0:598_3: Atha vā tikkhamandādisaṅkhātassa ca attākārassa ca anuvattāpanaṃ tikkha…pe… vattāpanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:598_4: Visuṃ attākāraggahaṇena cettha rūpāvabhāsanādikassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Cakkhundriyassa
anya-e0104n0:598_5: hi rūpābhihananayogyatāsaṅkhāte rūpāvabhāsanasāmatthiye asati na kadācipi cakkhuviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:598_6: dassanakiccaṃ sambhavati. Esa nayo sotindriyādīsupi. Pubbaṅgamabhāvena manindriyassa
anya-e0104n0:598_7: vasāvattāpanaṃ hoti, na aññesaṃ. Taṃsampayuttānipi hi indriyāni tabbaseneva hutvā
anya-e0104n0:598_8: attano attano indriyakiccaṃ sādhenti cetasikabhāvato, na tesaṃ vasena manindriyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:598_9: Ayañhissa pubbaṅgamatā. Sabbattha ca indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbanti adhikāro
anya-e0104n0:598_10: anuvattatīti daṭṭhabbo. Satipi anuppādane, anupatthambhane ca tappaccayānaṃ tappavattane
anya-e0104n0:599_0: Chādetvā pharitvā uppajjamānā sukhadukkhavedanā sahajātadhamme abhibhavitvā ajjottharitvā
anya-e0104n0:599_1: sayameva pākaṭā hoti, sahajātadhammā ca tassā vasena sukhadukkhabāvappatā viya hontīti
anya-e0104n0:599_3: yathārahaṃ majjhattākārānupāpanaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Samānajātiyehi vā sukhadukkhehi santapaṇītākārānupāpanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:599_6: ādi-saddena uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni gahitāni. Maggasampayuttasseva ca aññindriyassa
anya-e0104n0:599_8: dassitā hotīti. Katasabbakiccassa aññātāvindriyaṃ aññassa kātabbassa abhāvā amatābhimukhameva
anya-e0104n0:599_9: tabbhāvapaccayo ca hoti, na itarāni viya kiccantarapasutaṃ. Tenāha “amatābhimukhabhāvapaccayatā cā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:600_0: 528. Bhūmito vinicchayo uttānattho eva. Etthāha – kasmā pana ettakeneva indriyāni
anya-e0104n0:600_1: vuttāni, etāni eva ca vuttānīti? Ādhipaccaṭṭhavasena, ādhipaccaṃ nāma issariyanti
anya-e0104n0:600_2: vuttamevetaṃ. Tayidaṃ ādhipaccaṃ attano attano kicce, phale cāti aññesampi sabhāvadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:600_3: kasmā na labbhati? Paccayādhīnavuttikā hi paccayuppannāti siyā phalahetudhammesu
anya-e0104n0:600_4: anuvattanānuvattanīyatāti? Saccametaṃ, tathāpi atthi tesaṃ viseso. Svāyaṃ “cakkhuviññāṇādippavattiyañhi
anya-e0104n0:600_5: cakkhādīnaṃ siddhamādhipacca”ntiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitoyeva. Apica khandhapañcake
anya-e0104n0:600_6: yāyaṃ sattapaññatti, tassā visesanissayo “cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānī”ti tāni tāva
anya-e0104n0:600_8: imesaṃ vasena “itthī puriso”ti samaññaṃ labhatīti dassanatthaṃ bhāvadvayaṃ. Tayime
anya-e0104n0:600_9: upādinnadhammā yena dhammena pavattanti, ayaṃ so dhammo tesaṃ ṭhitihetūti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:600_10: jīvitindriyaṃ. Svāyaṃ sattasaññito dhammapuñjo pabandhavasena pavattamāno imāhi vedanāhi
anya-e0104n0:600_11: saṃkilissatīti dassanatthaṃ vedanāpañcakaṃ. Tato visuddhikāmānaṃ vodānasambhāradassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:600_12: saddhādipañcakaṃ. Sambhavavodānasambhārā imehi visujjanti, visuddhippattā niṭṭhitakiccāva
anya-e0104n0:600_13: hontīti dassanatthaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīni tīṇi vuttāni. Sabbattha “ādhipaccattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:600_14: upādāyā”ti padaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Ettāvatā adhippetatthasiddhīti aññesaṃ aggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:601_0: Atha vā pavattinivattīnaṃ nissarādidassanattampi etāniyeva vuttāni. Pavattiyā hi
anya-e0104n0:601_1: visesato mūlanissayabhūtāni cha ajjhattikāyatanāni. Yathāha “chasu loko samuppanno”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:601_2: Tassa uppatti itthipurisindriyehi visabhāgavatthusarāganimittehi yebhuyyena sattakāyassa
anya-e0104n0:601_3: abhinibbatti. Vuttañhetaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ kho, mahārāja, sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hoti
anya-e0104n0:601_4: mātā ca utunī hoti, gandhabbo ca paccupaṭṭhito hoti, mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā hontī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:601_5: Avaṭṭhānaṃ jīvitindriyena tena anupāletabbato. Tenāha “āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:601_6: Upabhogo vedanāhi. Vedanāvasena hi iṭṭhādisabbavisayūpabhogo. Yathāha “vedayati vedayatīti
anya-e0104n0:601_7: kho, bhikkhave, tasmā vedanāti vuccatī”ti. Evaṃ pavattiyā nissayasamuppādaṭṭhitisambhogadassanattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:601_8: cakkhundriyaṃ yāva upekkhindriyanti cuddasindriyāni desitāni. Yathā cetāni pavattiyā,
anya-e0104n0:601_9: evaṃ itarāni nivattiyā. Vivaṭṭasannissitena hi nibbattitāni saddhādīni pañcindriyāni
anya-e0104n0:601_10: nivattiyā nissayo. Uppādo anaññātaññassāmītindriyena tassa nivattivasena paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:601_11: uppajjanato. Avaṭṭhānaṃ aññindriyena, upabhogo aññātāvindriyena aggaphalasamupabhogato.
anya-e0104n0:601_12: Khīṇāsavāhi visavitāya nibbutisukhaṃ paribhujjanti. Evampi etāni eva indriyāni desitāni.
anya-e0104n0:601_13: Ettāvatā yathādhippetatthasiddhito aññesaṃ aggahaṇaṃ. Imināva nesaṃ desanākkamopi
anya-e0104n0:604_0: 529. Ariyasaddena visesanaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ saccasaddena uddhiṭṭhānipi ariyasaccāni
anya-e0104n0:604_1: evāti dassento “saccānīti cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti āda. Samāññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n0:604_2: visesatthinā ca viseso anupayujjitabboti. Ariyasaccesu vā vicāritesu itarānipi atthato
anya-e0104n0:604_3: vicāritāneva hontīti vipassanāya ca bhūmibhūtāni, ariyasaccānevāti ca katvā “saccānī”ti
anya-e0104n0:605_0: Sāsanakkamoti ariyasaccāni vuccanti, ariyasaccadesanā vā. Sakalañhi sāsanaṃ bhagavato
anya-e0104n0:605_2: Tasmā saccesu kamati, sīlasamādhipañmāsaṅkhātaṃ vā sāsanaṃ etesu kamati, pariññādikiccasādhanavasena
anya-e0104n0:605_3: pavattati, tasmā kamati etthāti kamo, kiṃ kamati? Sāsanaṃ. Sāsanassa kamo “sāsanakkamo”ti
anya-e0104n0:605_4: saccāni sāsanappavattiṭṭhānāni vuccanti, taṃdesanā ca tabbohārenāti.
anya-e0104n0:606_0: Tathāti taṃsabhāvā dukkhādisabhāvā. Avitathāti amusāsabhāvā bādhanādibhāvena bhūtasabhāvā.
anya-e0104n0:606_2: pīḷanaṭṭho. Samecca sambhūya paccayehi katabhāvo saṅkhataṭṭho. Dukkhadukkhatātannimittatāhi
anya-e0104n0:606_3: paridahanaṃ, kilesadāhasamāyogo vā santāpaṭṭho. Jarāya, maraṇena cāti dvedā vipariṇāmetabbatā
anya-e0104n0:606_4: vipariṇāmaṭṭho. Ettha ca pīḷanaṭṭho dukkhassa saraseneva āvibhavanākāro, itare yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:606_5: samudayamagganirodhadassanehi āvibhavanākārāti ayaṃ catunnampi viseso. Tatratrābhinandanavasena
anya-e0104n0:606_6: byāpitvā ūhanaṃ rāsikaraṇaṃ dukkhassa nibbattanaṃ āyūhanaṃ ākārassa byāpanatthattā.
anya-e0104n0:606_7: Āgacchati samudayatoti vā āyaṃ, dukkhaṃ, tassa ūhanaṃ pavattanaṃ āyūhanaṃ, ayaṃ saraseneva
anya-e0104n0:606_8: āvibhavanākāro. Nidadāti dukkhanti nidānaṃ, “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti sampaṭicchāpentaṃ
anya-e0104n0:606_9: viya samuṭṭhāpetīti attho. Ayaṃ nidānaṭṭho dukkhadassanena āvibhavanākāro. Saṃsāradukkhena
anya-e0104n0:606_10: saṃyojanaṃ saṃyogaṭṭho. Maggādhigamananivāraṇaṃ palibodhaṭṭho. Ime ca saṃyogapalibodhaṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:606_11: nirodhamaggadassanehi āvibhavanākārā. Nissaranti sattā ettha, sayameva vā nissaṭaṃ
anya-e0104n0:607_0: Saṃsārato niggamanaṃ niyyānaṃ. Ayamassa sarasena āvibhavanākāro. Paribodhūpacchedanena
anya-e0104n0:607_1: nibbānādhigamova nibbānanimittattā maggassa hetuṭṭho. Paññāpadhānattā cassa nibbānadassanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:607_3: ca ādhipaccaṃ karonti maggadhammā sampayuttadhammesūti so maggassa ādhipateyyaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:607_4: Visesato vā ālambanādhipatibhūtā maggadhammā honti “maggādhipatino”ti vacanatoti
anya-e0104n0:607_5: so tesaṃ ākāro ādhipateyyaṭṭho. Ete hetudassanādhipateyyaṭṭhā samudayanirodhadukkhadassanehi
anya-e0104n0:607_6: āvibhavanākārā. Evamādi āhāti sambandho. Abhisamayaṭṭhoti abhisametabbaṭṭho. Abhisamayassa
anya-e0104n0:607_7: vā visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭho. Atha vā abhisamayassa pavattiākāro abhisamayaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:607_8: So cettha abhisametabbena pīḷanādinā dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:608: 530. Kucchitaṃ khaṃ dukkhaṃ, gārayhaṃ hutvā asāranti attho.
anya-e0104n0:609_0: “Samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu kevalassa āgamasaddassa, eta-saddassa ca payoge saṃyogatthassa
anya-e0104n0:609_1: anupalabbhanato, saṃ-saddassa ca saṃyoge upalabbhanato “saṃyogaṃ dīpetī”ti āha anvayato,
anya-e0104n0:609_2: byatirekato ca tadatthajotakatāsiddhito. Uppannaṃ uditanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Aya-saddo
anya-e0104n0:609_3: gatiatthe siddho hetusaddoviya kāraṇaṃ dīpeti. Attano phalanipphādanena ayati pavattati,
anya-e0104n0:609_4: eti vā etasmā phalanti ayoti, saṃyoge uppattikāraṇaṃ samudayoti. Ettha visuṃ payujjamānāpi
anya-e0104n0:609_5: upasaggasaddā sadhātukaṃ saṃyogatthaṃ, uppādatthañca dīpenti, kiriyāvisesakattāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:610_0: “Abhāvo ettha rodhassāti nirodho”ti etena nibbānassa dukkhavivittabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:610_1: Samadhigate tasmiṃ tadadhigamato puggalassa rodhābhāvo pavattisaṅkhātassa rodhassa
anya-e0104n0:610_2: paṭipakkhabhūtāya nivattiyā adhigatattāti. Etasmiñca atthe abhāvo etasmiṃ rodhassāti
anya-e0104n0:610_3: nirodho icceva padasamāso. Dukkhābhāvo panettha puggalassa, na nibbānasseva. Anuppādo
anya-e0104n0:610_4: eva nirodho anuppādanirodho. Āyatiṃ bhavādīsu appavatti, na pana bhaṅgoti bhaṅgavācakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:610_5: nirodhasaddaṃ nivattetvā anuppādavācakaṃ gaṇhāti. Etasmiṃ atthe kāraṇe phalūpacāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:611_0: Paṭipadā ca hoti puggalassa dukkhanirodappattiyā. Nanu ca sā eva dukkhanirodappattīti
anya-e0104n0:611_1: tassā eva sā paṭipadāti na yujjatīti? Na puggalādhigamassa pattibhāvena, yehi so
anya-e0104n0:611_2: adhigacchati, tesaṃ kāraṇabhūtānaṃ paṭipadābhāvena ca vuttattā. Sacchi kiriyāsacchikaraṇadhammānañhi
anya-e0104n0:611_3: aññatthābhāvepi puggalasacchikiriyādhammabhāvehi nānattaṃ katvā niddeso katoti. Atha
anya-e0104n0:611_4: vā yaṃ dukkhanirodhappattiyā niṭṭhānaṃ phalaṃ, sayañca dukkhanirodhappattibhūtaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:612_0: 531. Buddhādayo ariyā paṭivijjhantīti ettha paṭividdhakāle pavattaṃ buddhādivohāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:612_1: “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”tiādīsu viya bhāvini bhūte viya upacāroti purimakālepi āropetvā
anya-e0104n0:612_2: “buddhādayo”ti vuttaṃ. Te hi buddhādayo catūhi maggehi paṭivijjhantīti. Tasmā ariyasaccānīti
anya-e0104n0:612_3: vuccantīti ettha ariyapaṭivijjhitabbāni saccāni ariyasaccānīti purimapade uttarapadalopo
anya-e0104n0:612_4: ariyasaccānīti vuccantīti attho. Tathāgatena hi sayaṃ adhigatattā, paveditattā, tato
anya-e0104n0:612_5: eva ca aññehi adhigamanīrattā tāni tassa hontīti. Ariyabhāvasiddhitopīti ettha ariyasādhakāni
anya-e0104n0:612_6: saccāni ariyasaccānīti pubbe viya uttarapadalopo daṭṭhabbo. Ariyāni saccānītipīti
anya-e0104n0:612_7: ettha avitathabhāvena araṇīyattā adhigantabbattā ariyāni, ariyasamaññā vā avisaṃvādake
anya-e0104n0:613_1: vā bādhanaṃ. Bhavādīsu jātiādivasena, cakkhurogādivasena ca anekadā dukkhassa pavattanameva
anya-e0104n0:613_2: puggalassa santāpanaṃ, tadassa kiccaṃ rasoti santāpanarasaṃ. Pavattinivattīsu saṃsāravimokkhesu
anya-e0104n0:613_3: pavatti hutvā gayhatīti pavattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Pabhavati etasmā dukkhaṃ nibbattati,
anya-e0104n0:613_4: purimabhavena pacchimabhavo ghaṭito saṃyutto hutvā pavattatīti pabhāvo. “Evampi taṇhānusaye
anya-e0104n0:613_5: anūhate, nibbattati dukkhamidaṃ punappuna”nti evaṃ punappunaṃ uppādanaṃ anupacchedakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:613_7: Accutirasanti accutisampattikaṃ acavanakiccaṃ vā. Kiccanti ca cavanābhāvaṃ kiccamiva
anya-e0104n0:613_8: katvā pariyāyena vuttaṃ, acavanañcassa sabhāvāpariccajanaṃ avikāritā daṭṭhabbā. Pañcakkhandhanimittasuññatāya
anya-e0104n0:613_9: aviggahaṃ hutvā gayhatīti animittapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Anusayasamucchindanena saṃsāracārakato
anya-e0104n0:613_11: Nimittato, pavattato ca cittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ hutvā gayhatīti vuṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:614_0: 533. Asuvaṇṇādi suvaṇṇādi viya dissamānaṃ māyāti vatthusabbhāvā tassā viparītatā
anya-e0104n0:614_1: vuttā. Udakaṃ viya dissamānā pana marīci upagatānaṃ tucchā. Vatthumattampi tassā
anya-e0104n0:614_2: na dissatīti visaṃvādikā vuttā. Marīcimāyāattavidhuro bhāvo tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:614_3: Ariyañāṇassāti ariyassa avitathaggāhakassa ñāṇassa, tena paṭivedhañāṇaṃ viya paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi
anya-e0104n0:614_4: gahitaṃ hoti. Tesaṃ gocarabhāvo paṭivijjitabbatā, ārammaṇabhāvo ca daṭṭhabbo. Aggilakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:614_5: uṇhattaṃ. Tañhi katthaci kaṭṭhādiupādānabhede visaṃvādakaṃ, viparītaṃ, abhūtaṃ vākadācipi
anya-e0104n0:614_6: na hoti. “Jātidhammā jarādhammā, atho maraṇadhammino”ti evaṃ vuttā jātiādikā lokapakati.
anya-e0104n0:614_7: Ekaccānaṃ tiracchānānaṃ tiriyaṃ dīghatā, manussādīnaṃ uddhaṃ dīghatā, vuddhiniṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:614_8: pattānaṃ puna avaḍḍhananti evamādikā ca lokapakatīti vadanti. Tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvesu
anya-e0104n0:614_9: pacchimo tathatā. Paṭhamo avitathatā, majjhimo anaññatatāti ayametesaṃ viseso,
anya-e0104n0:615_0: Dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhaka nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu taṇhāpi jāti viya dukkhanimittatāya
anya-e0104n0:615_1: bādhikāti? Na, bādhakappabhavabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā. Evamhi pavatti, pavattihetu
anya-e0104n0:615_2: ca asaṅkarato bodhitā honti. Atha vā jātiādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvo, dukkhadukkhatā
anya-e0104n0:615_3: ca bādhakatā, na dukkhappabhavatāti natthi taṇhāya pabhavabhāvena visuṃ gahitāya
anya-e0104n0:615_4: bādhakabhāvapasaṅgo. Tenāha “dukkhā aññaṃ na bādhaka”nti. Bādhakattaniyāmenāti dukkhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:615_5: bādhakameva, dukkhameva bādhakanti evaṃ dvidhāpi bādhakattāvadhāranenāti attho. Bādhakattaniyāmenāti
anya-e0104n0:615_6: hi bādhakassa, bādhakatte ca niyāmena. Yatā bādhakattassa dukkhe niyatatā, evaṃ dukkhassa
anya-e0104n0:616_1: dukkhahetubhāve na taṇhāya vinā tesaṃ dukkhahetubhāvo atthi, tehi pana vināpi taṇhāya
anya-e0104n0:616_2: dukkhahetubhāvo atthi kusalehi vinā akusalehi rūpāvacarādikusalehi vinā kāmāvacarādīhi
anya-e0104n0:616_3: ca taṇhāya dukkhanibbattakattā. Santabhāvassa, santabhāve vā niyāmo santabhāvaniyāmo,
anya-e0104n0:616_4: tena santabhāvaniyāmena. Tacchaniyyānabhāvattāti dvidhāpi niyāmena taccho niyyānabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:616_5: etassa, na micchāmaggassa viya viparītatāya, na lokiyamaggassa viya vā anekantikatāya
anya-e0104n0:616_6: atacchoti tacchaniyyānabhāvo, maggo, tassa bhāvo tacchaniyyānabhāvattaṃ, tasmā tacchaniyyānabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n0:616_7: Sabbattha dvidhāpi niyāmena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo vuttoti āha “iti tacchāvipallāsā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:617_0: 534. Saccasaddassa sambhavantānaṃ atthānaṃ uddharaṇaṃ, sambhavante vā atthe vatvā
anya-e0104n0:617_1: adhippetassa atthassa uddharaṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ atthudvāro. Viratisacceti musāvādaviratiyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:617_2: Na hi aññaviratīsu saccasaddo niruḷho. Ye pana “viratisaccaṃ samādānaviratī”ti vadanti,
anya-e0104n0:617_3: tesampi na samādānamattaṃ viratisaccaṃ, atha kho samādānāvisaṃvādanaṃ. Taṃ pana paṭiññāsaccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:617_4: musāvādaviratiyeva hoti. “Idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti pavattā diṭṭhi “sacca”nti
anya-e0104n0:617_6: nibbānaṃ, tadariyā saccato vidū”ti hi vuttaṃ, tassa pana taṃsampāpakassa ca maggassa
anya-e0104n0:617_7: pajānanā paṭivedho avivādakāraṇanti dvayampi “ekaṃ hi saccaṃ na dutiyamatthi, yasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:617_8: pajā no vivade pajāna”nti imissā gāthāya “sacca”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:618_0: 535. “Netaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti āgaccheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti etena jātiādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:618_1: dukkhaariyasaccabhāve aviparītataṃ dasseti ekanteneva bādhakabhāvato. “Aññaṃ dukkhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:618_2: ariyasaccanti āgaccheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti iminā dukkhaariyasaccabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:618_3: jātiādīsu niyatataṃ dasseti anaññatthabhāvato. Sacepi kathañci koci evaṃcitto āgaccheyya,
anya-e0104n0:618_4: paññāpane pana sahadhammena ñāpane attano vādassa patiṭṭhāpane samattho natthīti
anya-e0104n0:618_5: dassetuṃ “ahametaṃ…pe… paññapessāmīti āgaccheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:618_6: Jātiādīnaṃ anaññathatā aññassa ca tatābhūtassa abhāvoyevettha ṭhānābhāvo. Sacepi
anya-e0104n0:618_7: koci āgaccheyya āgacchatu, ṭhānaṃ pana natthīti ayamettha suttattho. Esa nayo dutiyasuttepi.
anya-e0104n0:618_8: Tattha pana attabhāvapaṭilābheneva sattānaṃ jātiādīnaṃ patti, sammukhībhāvo ca hotīti
anya-e0104n0:618_9: sampattattā, paccakkhatā ca paṭhamatā, yato taṃ bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ desitaṃ, tannimittatā
anya-e0104n0:618_10: dutiyatā, tadupasamatā tatiyatā, taṃsampāpakatā catutthatāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:619_1: Nibbutikāmena parijānanādīhi aññaṃ kiñci kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ natti, dhammañāṇakiccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:619_2: vā ito aññaṃ natthi, pariññeyyādīni ca etaparamānevāti cattāriyeva vuttāni. Taṇhāya
anya-e0104n0:619_3: ādīnavadassāvīnaṃ vasena taṇhāvatthuādīnaṃ etaparamatāyāti vuttaṃ. Tathā ālaye pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhāte,
anya-e0104n0:619_4: sakalavatthukāmasaṅkhāte, bhavattayasaṅkhāte vā dukkhe dosadassāvīnaṃ vasena ālayādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:620_1: vuttaṃ, na ariyena ñāṇena paṭivijjhitabbākāraṃ. Tanti dukkhaṃ. Akatanti anibbattitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:620_2: anipphāditakāraṇanti adhippāyo. Kāraṇe hi siddhe phalaṃ siddhameva hoti. “Neva akataṃ
anya-e0104n0:620_3: āgacchatī”ti ca iminā ahetuvādaṃ paṭikkhipati. “Na issaranimmānādito”ti etena pajāpatipurisapakatikālādivāde
anya-e0104n0:620_4: paṭikkhipati. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati. “Sahetukena dukkhenā”ti
anya-e0104n0:620_5: etena dukkhadassanena janitassa saṃvegassa saṃvaḍḍhanamāha. Dukkhassa hi sahetukabhāvasavasena
anya-e0104n0:620_6: balavasaṃvego jāyati yāvāyaṃ hetu, tāva idaṃ dukkhaṃ avicchedena pavattatīti. Assāsajananatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:620_7: nirodhanti saṃvegajātassa assāsaṃ janetuṃ nirodhasaccamāha. Nibbinnasaṃsāradukkhassa
anya-e0104n0:620_8: hi nirodhakathā vuccamānā ativiya ativiya assāsaṃ sañjaneti.
anya-e0104n0:621_0: 537. Ye te jātiādayo dhammā bhagavatā vuttāti sambandho. Kasmā panettha byādhi na
anya-e0104n0:621_1: gahitoti? Anekantabhāvato. Tathā hi so kadāci, kesañci ca natthi. Yathāha “tayo rogā
anya-e0104n0:621_2: pure āsuṃ, icchā anasanaṃ jarā”ti. Bākulatterādīnaṃ so nāhosiyeva, dukkhaggahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:621_3: vā byādhi ettha hitovāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paramatthato hi dhātukkhobhapaccayaṃ kāyikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:621_4: dukkhaṃ byādhīti. Upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā “dvādasa dhammā”ti
anya-e0104n0:621_5: vuttaṃ. Kāmataṇhābhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā “dukkhasamudayo ariyasacca”nti aññe
anya-e0104n0:621_6: antogadhabhede anāmasitvā ekarūpena gahitāpi taṇhā sassatadiṭṭhisahagatā, ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatā,
anya-e0104n0:621_7: diṭṭhivirahitā kevalaṃ kāmassādabhūtā cāti tidhāva bhinditvā vuttā. “Ayameva ariyo
anya-e0104n0:621_8: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti maggasaccabhāvena ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttāpi sabhāvato bhinnā eva
anya-e0104n0:625_0: Bhaveti ādānanikkhepaparicchinno dhammappabandho bhavo, tasmiṃ bhave. So hi jāyati
anya-e0104n0:625_1: ettha yonigatiādivibhāgoti jātīti vuccati, jāyanti ettha sattā samānanvayāti jāti,
anya-e0104n0:625_2: nikāyo. Saṅkhatalakkhaṇeti yattha katthaci uppāde. So hi jananaṭṭhena jāti. Paṭisandhiyanti
anya-e0104n0:625_3: paṭisandhicittakkhaṇe. Sampātijātoti ettha jātisaddena labbhamānaṃ mātukucchito nikkhamanasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:625_4: jāyanatthaṃ sandhāyāha “pasūtiya”nti, abhijātiyanti attho. Jāyati etāya khattiyādisamaññāti jāti, kulaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:626_0: 538. Sayanti etthāti seyyā, mātukucchisaṅkhāto gabbho seyyā etesanti gabbhaseyyakā,
anya-e0104n0:626_1: aṇḍajā, jalābujā ca. Itaresanti saṃsedajānaṃ, opapātikānañca. Ayampi cāti “paṭisandhikhandhesvevā”ti
anya-e0104n0:626_2: anantaraṃ vuttakathāpi, pageva “paṭisandhito paṭṭhāyā”ti vuttakathāyaṃ. Tenāha “tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:627: Ummujjanavasena gayhatīti ummujjanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Vakkhamānavibhāgaṃ dukkhavicittataṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti dukkhavicittatāpaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:628_0: 539. “Kasmā panā”ti vadato codakassāyamadhippāyo – ekantadukkhe niraye tāva jātidukkhā
anya-e0104n0:628_1: hotu, aññāsupi vā duggatīsu pāpakammasamuṭṭhānato sukhasaṃvattaniyakammasamuṭṭhānāsu
anya-e0104n0:628_2: pana sugatīsu kathanti. Itaro “nāyaṃ jāti sabhāvadukkhavasena dukkhāti vuttā, na
anya-e0104n0:628_3: hi kāci paṭisandhi dukkhavedanāsampayuttā atthi, atha kho dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato”ti
anya-e0104n0:628_5: dukkhanti vuccatīti dukkhasabhāvaṃ dukkhasaddena visesetvā vuttaṃ “dukkhadukkha”nti yathā rūparūpanti.
anya-e0104n0:629: Dukkhuppattihetutoti “ahu vata me, taṃ vata nāhosī”ti cetasikadukkhuppattihetuto.
anya-e0104n0:630_0: “Yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato tebhūmakā saṅkhārā saṅkhāradukkhaṃ, tattha kāraṇamāha
anya-e0104n0:630_1: “udayabbayappaṭipāḷitattā”ti. Yañhi abhiṇhaṃ paṭipīḷitaṃ, taṃ dukkhamanatāya dukkhanti,
anya-e0104n0:631: Dukkhadukkhanti dukkhadomassupāyāse vadati. “Jātipi dukkhā”tiādinā dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:632: Bhagavatāpīti anāvaraṇañāṇavatā accariyāparimeyyadesanākosallavatā bhagavatāpi. Upamāvasenati aṅgārakāsūpamādiupamāvasena.
anya-e0104n0:633_4: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Paramasambādheti ativiya sambādhe. Tibbandhakāreti bahalandhakāre.
anya-e0104n0:633_5: Pittasemhapubbaruhiragūthodariyādi nānākuṇapasambādhe. Mātā yadi vīsativassā, atha
anya-e0104n0:633_6: tiṃsa, cattālīsādivassā, tattakaṃ kālaṃ adhotavaccakūpasadisatāya adhimattajegucche.
anya-e0104n0:633_7: Pūtimacchā di sabbaṃ na sadisūpammaṃ tassa vātādivasena ekaccaduggandhāpagamasabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:633_8: Dasa māseti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ, yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ tato bhiyyopi ekaccānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:634_0: Abhimukhaṃ kaḍḍhanaṃ ākaḍḍhanaṃ. Parito samantato kaḍḍhanaṃ parikaḍḍhanaṃ. Heṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:634_1: dhunanaṃ odhūnanaṃ. Nidhāya nidhāya dhūnanaṃ niddhūnanaṃ. Ākaḍḍhanādisadisañcettha
anya-e0104n0:634_2: “ākaḍḍhanādī”ti vuttaṃ. Taruṇavaṇasadisaṃ ativiya sukhumālaṃ gabbhagataṃ sarīraṃ
anya-e0104n0:634_3: sītādiappakampi na sahatīti sītanarakūpapannatādi nidassitaṃ. Tañhi tassa ativiya
anya-e0104n0:634_4: sītaṃ, ativiya uṇhañca hutvā upatiṭṭhati. Sarīraṃ vāsiyādīhi tacchetvā khārāvasecanakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:634_5: khārāpaṭicchakaṃ. Dukkhuppattiṭṭhāneti gabbhāsayasaññitaṃ tatiyaṃ āvaṭṭaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0104n0:635_0: Parivattetvāti uddhaṃpādaadhosīsabhāvena parivattetvā. Idaṃ vijāyanamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:635_1: yena maraṇadukkhena ca aṭṭitā vedanāppattā sattā katipayamāsamattātikkantampi pavattiṃ
anya-e0104n0:635_2: vissaranti, mahandhakāraṃ mahāviduggaṃ pakkhandhā viya honti.
anya-e0104n0:636: Vadhentassāti socanaparidevanasīsapaṭihananādinā bādhentassa. Khuppipāsā hi ātapāvaṭṭhānādinā ca ātāpanaṃ. Pañcaggitāpanādinā paritāpanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:637_1: sakalassāpi. Vatthumeva hoti tadabhāve abhāvato. Tenevāha “jāyetha no ce”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:644_0: 543. Saṅkhatalakkhaṇanti saṅkhārānaṃ vayasaññitaṃ khaṇikamaraṇamāha. Yaṃ sandhāyāti
anya-e0104n0:644_1: yaṃ khaṇikamaraṇaṃ sandhāya, “jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti ettha “maraṇa”nti
anya-e0104n0:644_2: vuttanti attho. Tanti jīvitindriyupaccedasaññitaṃ pākaṭamaraṇaṃ. “Cavana”nti lakkhitabbatāya
anya-e0104n0:644_3: cutilakkhaṇaṃ. Viyogarasanti yathādhigatehi sattasaṅkhārehi viyojanarasaṃ. Yathūpapannāya
anya-e0104n0:645_0: Pāpassāti pāpayogena pāpassa, upacitapāpakammassāti attho. Pāpakammādinimittanti
anya-e0104n0:645_2: Tamhi passantasseva kassaci anubhavantassa viya mahādukkhaṃ hoti. Bhaddassāti bhaddakammassa,
anya-e0104n0:645_3: katakusalassāti attho. Tassa pana kāmaṃ iṭṭhameva ārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti, piyavippayogavatthukaṃ
anya-e0104n0:645_4: pana mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti, piyavippayogavatthukaṃ pana mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:645_5: uppajjatīti āha “asahantassa viyogaṃ piyavatthuka”nti. Avisesatoti pāpassa, bhaddassa
anya-e0104n0:645_6: ca sāmaññato. “Avisesato”ti vatvāpi “sabbesa”nti vacanaṃ taṃ idaṃ dukkhaṃ parimadditasaṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:645_7: ekaccānaṃ khīṇāsavānampi hotiyevāti dassanatthaṃ. Vitujjamānamammānanti sandhibandhanāvacchedakavāyunā
anya-e0104n0:648_0: 544. Soti soko. Atthato domanassameva hoti cetasikantarābhāvato. Domanassaviseso
anya-e0104n0:648_1: pana hoti visayavisese pavattiākāravisesasabbhāvatoti taṃ visesaṃ lakkhaṇādito dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:648_2: “evaṃ santepī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Anto nijjhānaṃ cittasantāpo. Parijjhāpanaṃ rāgadosapariḷāhavisiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:648_3: dahanaṃ. Katākatakusalākusalavisayaṃ vippaṭisārākārena pavattaṃ anusocanaṃ kukkuccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:648_4: ñātibyasanādivisayaṃ kevalaṃ cittasanthāpabhūtaṃ anusocanaṃ sokoti anusocanapaccupaṭṭhānattepi ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n0:649_0: Visapītaṃ sallaṃ visasallaṃ. Sokavasena atisārādi byādhipi hoti, sokabahulassa sarīraṃ
anya-e0104n0:649_1: na cirasseva jīrati, balavasokābhibhūto maraṇampi pāpuṇātīti āha “samāvahati ca byādhijarāmaraṇabhedana”nti.
anya-e0104n0:652: 545. Vacīpalāpoti vācāvippalāpo, so atthato saddo eva. Bhiyyoti sokadukkhato upari. Sokasamuṭṭhāno hi paridevo.
anya-e0104n0:655: 546. Jātiādīnampi yathārahaṃ dukkhavatthudukkhadukkhatāhi satipi dukkhabhāve kāyassa pīḷanavasena idaṃ savisesaṃ dukkhamanti āha “dukkhanti visesato vutta”nti.
anya-e0104n0:658_1: cetasikadukkhasamaṅgino. Āvaṭṭantīti āmukhaṃ vaṭṭanti, yaṃdisābhimukhaṃ patitā, taṃdisābhimukhā
anya-e0104n0:658_2: eva vaṭṭanti. Vivaṭṭantīti viparivattanavasena vaṭṭanti. Uddhaṃpādaṃ papatantīti
anya-e0104n0:658_3: uddhaṃmukhapādā hutvā patanti. Satthaṃ āharantīti attano sarīrassa vijjhanabhedanavasena satthaṃ upanenti.
anya-e0104n0:661_0: 548. Dosoyevāti kāyacittānaṃ āyāsanavasena dosasseva pavattiākāroti attho, yato bhuso
anya-e0104n0:661_1: āyāsoti upāyāsoti vuccati yathā bhusamādānaṃ upādānanti. Eko dhammoti cuddasahi akusalacetasikehi
anya-e0104n0:661_2: añño eko cetasikadhammo, yaṃ “visādo”ti ca vadanti. Nitthunanavasena sampajjanato
anya-e0104n0:661_3: nitthunanaraso, kāye vā nitthunanakaraṇakicco. “Saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato”ti vatvā so
anya-e0104n0:661_4: panettha sātisayoti dassento “cittaparidahanato, kāyavisādanato cā”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:662_0: Ete ca sokaparidevupāyāsā viññattiyā vinā, saha ca yathāpaccayaṃ domanassacittuppādassa
anya-e0104n0:662_1: pavattiākāravisesoti dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pāko viyāti rajanādino
anya-e0104n0:665: 549. Samodhānaṃ samāgamo. Kāyikadukkhacittavighātādianatthānaṃ atthibhāvassa paccupaṭṭhāno anatthabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0104n0:666: Tesaṃ appiyānaṃ kāyikavācasikapayogasaṅkhāto upakkamo tadupakkamo, tato sambhūto tadupakkamasambhūto.
anya-e0104n0:672_0: 551. Icchitālābho nāma yassa kassaci attanā icchitassa vatthuno alābho. “Yampicchaṃ
anya-e0104n0:672_1: na labhatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Matthakappattaṃ pana icchitālābhaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “jātidhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:672_2: sattāna”ntiādinā niddiṭṭhanti tameva dassetuṃ “aho vatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Icchāvāti ettha
anya-e0104n0:672_3: icchāsahito alābhovāti ca vadanti. Tappariyesanarasāti tesaṃ alabbhaneyyavatthūnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:675_0: 552. Yaṃ vuttamidhāti idha saccaniddese yaṃ sarūpato vuttaṃ. Avuttanti aññattha dukkhakkhandhabālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu
anya-e0104n0:675_1: vuttampi idha sarūpato avuttaṃ. Tañca sabbaṃ ime upādānakkhandhe vinā na labbhatīti
anya-e0104n0:675_2: tattha khandhasannissayameva dukkhaṃ khandhe vibādhatīti dassetuṃ “indanamiva pāvako”ti
anya-e0104n0:675_3: vuttaṃ. Yathā vā lakkhaṃ paharaṇapahārassa vatthu, evaṃ khandhā saṃsāradukkhassa.
anya-e0104n0:675_4: Yathā ca gorūpaṃ ḍaṃsamakasādivibādhāya, yathā ca khettaṃ nipphannasassalāyanassa,
anya-e0104n0:675_5: gāmo ca gāmaghātakavibādhāya, evaṃ khandhā jātiādidukkhassa vatthūti dassetuṃ “lakkhamivā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:675_6: vuttaṃ. Yebhuyyena loke vibādhakā vibādhetabbādhīnā na honti, ime pana vibādhetabbādhīnā
anya-e0104n0:675_7: evāti dassetuṃ “tiṇalatādīnī”ti vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ anādimati saṃsāre ādi nāma kassaci
anya-e0104n0:675_8: natthi, ekabhavaparicchinnassa pana khandhasantānassa vasena vuttaṃ “ādidukkhaṃ jātī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:675_9: Tenevāha “pariyosānadukkhaṃ maraṇa”nti. Na hettha samucchedamaraṇameva adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:675_10: Maraṇassa antike āsanne jātaṃ dukkhaṃ māraṇantikadukkhaṃ. Paridayhanaṃ cittasantāpo.
anya-e0104n0:675_11: Lālappanaṃ ativiya vippalāpo. Anutthunanaṃ anto nijjhāyanaṃ. Ekamekanti jātiādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:675_12: antarabhedabhinnānaṃ, jātiādīnameva vā upādānakkhandhapañcakānaṃ vā ekamekaṃ. Saṅkhipitvāti
anya-e0104n0:678_0: 553. Punabbhavakaraṇaṃ punabbhavo uttarapadalopena, yathā vā apūpabhakkhanasīlo āpūpiko,
anya-e0104n0:678_1: evaṃ punabbhavakaraṇasīlā, punabbhavaṃ vā phalaṃ arahati, so vā etissā payojananti
anya-e0104n0:678_2: ponobhavikā. Nandanato, rañjanato ca nandīrāgabhāvaṃ sabbāsu avatthāsu apaccakkhāya
anya-e0104n0:678_3: vuttiyā nandīrāgasahagatā. Tāya ca sattā tattha tattha bhavādike kimikīṭapaṭaṅgādiattabhāvepi
anya-e0104n0:678_4: nandanti, rūpābhinandanādibhūtāya rañjanti cāti tatratatrābhinandinī. Tenāha “nandīrāgena
anya-e0104n0:678_5: sahagatā”tiādi. Tabbhāvattho hi esa sahagatasaddo. Kāmabhavavibhavabhedavasena pavattiyā
anya-e0104n0:678_6: kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā ca veditabbā. Kāmataṇhādibhedaṃ anāmasitvā kevalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:678_7: taṇhābhāveneva ekabhāvaggahaṇena ekattaṃ upanetvā kassacipi sattassa kenaci sadisatābhāvato
anya-e0104n0:679_0: Kasmā panettha taṇhāva samudayasaccaṃ vuttāti? Visesahetubhāvato. Avijjā hi bhavesu
anya-e0104n0:679_1: ādīnavaṃ paṭicchādentī, diṭṭhiādiupādānañca tattha tattha abhinivisamānaṃ taṇhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:679_2: abhivaḍḍhentī dosādayopi kammassa kāraṇaṃ honti, taṇhā pana taṃtaṃbhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsasattanikāyakulabhogissariyādivicittataṃ
anya-e0104n0:679_3: abhipatthentī, kammavicittatāya upanissayataṃ kammassa ca sahāyabhāvaṃ upagacchantī
anya-e0104n0:679_4: bhavādivicittataṃ niyameti, tasmā dukkhassa visesahetubhāvato aññesupi avijjāupādānakammādīsu
anya-e0104n0:679_5: sutte abhidhamme ca avasesakilesākusalamūlādīsu vuttesu dukkhahetūsu vijjamānesu
anya-e0104n0:682_0: 554. Tassāyevāti yadaggena taṇhā samudayasaccanti vuttā, tadaggena tassāyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:682_1: Sati hi padhānahetunirodhe tadaññahetū niruddhāyeva hontīti byādhinimittavūpasamanena
anya-e0104n0:682_2: byādhivūpasamo viya hetunirodhena phalanirodhoti āha “samudayanirodhena dukkhanirodho”ti.
anya-e0104n0:682_3: Na aññathāti yathāvuttassa atthassa ekantikataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:683: Anupaddaveti pāṇakavijjhanasatthappahārādiupaddavarahite. Tato eva daḷhe thire. Sākhādichedanena chinnopi. Taṇhānusayeti kāmarāgabhavarāgānusaye. Anūhateti asamupaghāṭite.
anya-e0104n0:684_0: Yathā sīho yenattani saro khitto, tattheva attano balaṃ dasseti, na sare, tathā buddhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:684_1: kāraṇe paṭipatti, na phale. Yathā pana sārameyyā kenaci leḍḍuppahāre dinne bhussantā
anya-e0104n0:684_2: leḍḍuṃ khādanti, na pahāradāyake uṭṭhahanti, evaṃ aññatitthiyā dukkhaṃ nirodhetukāmā
anya-e0104n0:684_3: kāyacchedamanuyuñjanti, na kilesanirodhananti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sīhasamānavuttino”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:685_0: 555. Virajjati palujjati chijjati samudayo etenāti virāgo vuccati maggo. Virajjanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:685_1: palujjanaṃ samucchindanaṃ virāgoti pahānaṃ vuccati. Tasmāti yasmā pahānapariyāyo
anya-e0104n0:685_2: virāgasaddo, nirodhasaddo ca, tasmā. Anusayasamugghātato aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti
anya-e0104n0:685_3: sambandhanīyaṃ. Cāgādipadānipi gahetvā vadati sabbāneva etānīti. Yasmā nibbānaṃ vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:685_4: na dukkhassa nirujjhanamattaṃ, tasmā taṇhāya asesavirāganirodhādipadānipi nibbānavevacanānīti.
anya-e0104n0:685_5: Vuttamevatthaṃ samattheti “yasmā panā”tiādi. Yathā virāgādipadāni nibbāne yujjanti,
anya-e0104n0:685_6: taṃdassanaṃ. Tattha taṃ āgammāti taṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena patvā. Taṇhā virajjatīti
anya-e0104n0:685_7: ariyamaggena accantavirāgavasena taṇhā virajjīyati. Nirujjhatīti nirodhīyati, tena
anya-e0104n0:685_8: virāganirodhasaddānaṃ adhikaraṇasādhanatamāha. Tadevāti nibbānameva. Cāgādayo hontīti
anya-e0104n0:685_9: cāgādihetuṃ phalavohārena vadati. “Kāmaguṇālayesū”ti potthakesu likhanti, “kāmaguṇālayādīsū”ti pana pāṭho.
anya-e0104n0:686_0: 556. Tayidantiādi na porāṇapāṭho, saccatthadīpane pana vuttaniyāmena tato ānetvā
anya-e0104n0:686_1: pacchā ṭhapitaṃ. Tathā hi pubbe vuttānipi lakkhaṇādīni punapi vuttāni. Saṃsāradukkhato
anya-e0104n0:686_2: nibbinnamānasassa assāsaṃ karonto viya hotīti assāsakaraṇarasaṃ. Rāgādisabbapapañcavūpasamanimittatāya
anya-e0104n0:687_0: 557. Nattheva nibbānanti yadi sāmaññato paṭiññā, attanā adhippetanibbānassapi abhāvo
anya-e0104n0:687_1: āpajjati, tathā sati paṭiññāvirodho. Atha parābhimataṃ nibbānaṃ pati, evaṃ sati dhammiasiddhi,
anya-e0104n0:687_2: tato ca nissayāsiddho hetu. Anupalabbhanīyatoti kiṃ paccakkhato, udāhu anumānato?
anya-e0104n0:687_3: Purimasmiṃ pakkhe cakkhādīhi anekantikatā, dutiyasmiṃ paraṃ pati asiddho hetu. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:687_4: “na, upāyena upalabbhanīyato”tiādi. Tattha yathā cetopariyañāṇalābhino eva ariyā
anya-e0104n0:687_5: paresaṃ lokuttaracittaṃ jānanti, tatthāpi ca arahā eva sabbesaṃ, na sabbe, evaṃ nibbānampi
anya-e0104n0:687_7: cetaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na payogavacanaṃ. Taṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0104n0:688_0: 558. Natthīti na vattabbaṃ, ariyehi upalabbhanīyatoti adhippāyo. Saṃsārato saṃviggamānasā
anya-e0104n0:688_1: sammāpaṭipattiyā nibbānaṃ adhigacchantīti sabbasamayasiddhoyaṃ nayo. Tattha sāsanikameva
anya-e0104n0:688_2: nissāya vadati “paṭipattiyā vañcubhāvāpajjanato”ti. Tenāha “asati hī”tiādi. Sammādiṭṭhipurejavāyāti
anya-e0104n0:688_3: sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamāya. Pubbaṅgamatā cassā padhānabhāvato. Tathā hi sā paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:688_4: desanāruḷhā, na sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppajjanato. Na cāyaṃ sammāpaṭipatti vañjhā, nibbānapāpanato
anya-e0104n0:688_5: nibbānassa sampāpakato. Tava matena pana nibbānasseva abhāvato vañjhabhāvo āpajjatīti
anya-e0104n0:688_7: abhāvasampāpakabhāvato, na vañjhabhāvāpattīti ce vadeyyāsīti attho. Na iti paṭikkhepe.
anya-e0104n0:688_8: Yaṃ tayā “abhāvapāpakattā”ti vadantena khandhābhāvo nibbānanti paṭiññātaṃ, taṃ na.
anya-e0104n0:688_9: Kasmā? Atītānāgatābhāvepi nibbānappattiyā abhāvato. Atītānāgatā hi khandhā na santīti
anya-e0104n0:688_10: tasmiṃ abhāve nibbānaṃ adhigataṃ nāma siyā, so pana natthīti. Na kevalaṃ atītānāgatānameva,
anya-e0104n0:688_11: atha kho vattamānānampīti tiyaddhagatānaṃ sabbesaṃ khandhānaṃ abhāvo nibbānaṃ. Na
anya-e0104n0:688_12: hi taṃ ekadesābhāvo bhavituṃ yuttanti vattamānā ce, na na santi, na santi ce, na
anya-e0104n0:688_13: vattamānāti “vattamānā, na santi cā”ti vippaṭisiddhametanti āha “na, tesaṃ…pe… pajjanato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:689_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – yadi vattamānābhāvo nibbānaṃ, yadā ariyamaggo vattati, tadā tassa
anya-e0104n0:689_1: nissayabhūtā khandhā vattamānāti katvā tadā nibbānassa abhāvo siyā. Tathā ca sati
anya-e0104n0:689_2: maggakkhaṇepi nibbānasacchikiriyāya abhāvo āpajjatīti dassento “vattamāna…pe… dosato”ti
anya-e0104n0:689_3: āha. Na mayaṃ sabbesaṃyeva avattamānatāya nibbānaṃ vadāma. Kiñcarahīti, tadā maggakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:689_4: kilesānaṃ avattamānattā, tasmā na doso yathāvuttadosābhāvoti? Yadi kilesānaṃ avattamānatāsaṅkhāto
anya-e0104n0:689_5: abhāvo nibbānaṃ, evaṃ sati ariyamaggassa niratthakatā āpajjati maggakkhaṇato pubbepi
anya-e0104n0:689_6: tadabhāvasiddhito. Tenāha “ariyamaggassā”tiādi. Tasmā akāraṇametanti yasmā na nibbānassa
anya-e0104n0:689_7: anupalabbhanīyatā, abhāvamattatā, paṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvo, atītānāgatābhāve nibbānādhigamo
anya-e0104n0:689_8: ca āpajjati, vattamānānaṃ abhāvopi na sambhavati, pageva kilesānaṃ avattamānatā,
