anya-e0104n0:689_9: ariyamaggassa ca niratthakabhāvāpatti, tasmā nibbānassa abhāvasādhanatthaṃ yadidaṃ
anya-e0104n0:689_10: “anupalabbhanīyato, abhāvapāpakattā, tadā kilesānaṃ avattamānattā”ti ca kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:690_0: 559. Ādivacanatoti ādi-saddena avasiṭṭhaṃ jambukhādakasuttapadesaṃ, aññampi asaṅkhatāya
anya-e0104n0:690_1: dhātuyā niddesapāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā hi “nibbānaṃ nibbānanti, āvuso sāriputta,
anya-e0104n0:690_2: vuccati, katamaṃ nu kho, āvuso, nibbānanti? Yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo
anya-e0104n0:690_3: mohakkhayo, idaṃ vuccati nibbāna”nti jambukhādakasutte, “tattha katamā asaṅkhatā
anya-e0104n0:690_4: dhātu? Rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti āyatanavibhaṅge vuttaṃ. Tatrāyamattho
anya-e0104n0:690_5: – nibbānaṃ asaṅkhatā dhātu asaṅkhatasabhāvo dhammo. Yasmā taṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyanti,
anya-e0104n0:690_6: tasmā rāgakkhayo, dosakkhayo, mohakkhayoti ca vuccatīti. Āgammāti ca sabbasaṅkhārehi
anya-e0104n0:690_7: nibbinnassa visaṅkhāraninnassa gotrabhunā vivaṭṭitamānasassa maggena sacchikaraṇenāti
anya-e0104n0:690_8: attho. Sacchikiriyamānañhi taṃ adhigantvā ārammaṇapaccayabhūtañca paṭicca adhipatipaccayabhūte
anya-e0104n0:690_9: ca tasmiṃ paramassāsabhāvena vinimuttasaṅkhārassa paramagatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte
anya-e0104n0:690_10: patiṭṭhāya khayasaṅkhāto maggo rāgādayo khepetīti taṃsacchikaraṇābhāve rāgādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:690_11: anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvā taṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti vuccanti. Ekaṃsena cetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:690_12: evaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, itarathā yathārutavasena pāḷiyā atthe gayhamāne bahū dosā
anya-e0104n0:690_13: āpajjantīti te dassetuṃ “arahattassāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Arahattañhi aggaphalapamukhā
anya-e0104n0:690_14: cattāro khandhāti na tassa rāgādikhayamattatā yuttā. Tampi hi…pe… niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:690_15: yathā rāgādīnaṃ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṃ “rāgakkhayo”tiādinā niddiṭṭhanti suttassa
anya-e0104n0:690_16: neyyatthattā. Evaṃ nibbānaṃ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti nibbānaṃ “rāgakkhayo”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:690_17: niddiṭṭhanti imassāpi suttassa neyyatthatā veditabbā. Nibbānassa rāgādikkhayamattatāya
anya-e0104n0:691_0: Tattha ittarakālādippattidosatoti rāgādīnaṃ khayamattatāya parittakālatā, saṅkhatalakkhaṇatā,
anya-e0104n0:691_1: payogena vinā saraseneva adhigandhabbatā, rāgādīhi aparimuttatā, ādittatā, dukkhatā,
anya-e0104n0:691_2: anupasantatā, bahubhāvo, oḷārikatā, gotrabhumaggānaṃ anārammaṇatāti evamādidosāpajjanato.
anya-e0104n0:691_3: Rāgasseva khayo rāgakkhayo, na dosādīnaṃ. Tathā dosakkhayādayopīti añño rāgakkhayo,
anya-e0104n0:691_4: añño dosakkhayo, añño mohakkhayoti tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ khayabhūtāni tīṇi nibbānāni,
anya-e0104n0:691_5: catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ khaye cattāri, pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ khaye pañca, channaṃ taṇhākāyānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:691_6: khaye cha, sattannaṃ anusayānaṃ khaye satta, aṭṭhannaṃ micchattānaṃ khaye aṭṭha,
anya-e0104n0:691_7: navannaṃ taṇhāmūlakānaṃ khaye nava, dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khaye dasa, diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa
anya-e0104n0:691_8: khaye pāṭiyekkaṃ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti. Rāgādikkhayo nāma andhabālānampi
anya-e0104n0:691_9: pākaṭo, antamaso dīpimigamakkaṭādīnampi suviññeyyoti oḷārikaṃ nibbānaṃ hoti. Gotrabhukkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:691_10: kilesakkhayassa abhāvato, maggakkhaṇe ca akhīṇattā, ārammaṇakaraṇassa ca asambhavo
anya-e0104n0:691_11: eva. Tassa nibbānabhāvatoti sabbapariyosānassa rāgādikkhayassa nibbānabhāvato. Yato
anya-e0104n0:691_12: khayato paṭṭhāya rāgādīnaṃ pavatti na hoti, so “ayaṃ nāmā”ti niyametabbo maggaphalañāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:691_13: ārammaṇabhūto natthīti āha “na tādisassa khayassa abhāvato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:692_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – yo pacchimabhavato tatiyattabhāveyeva rāgādīsu ādīnavaṃ disvā jhānabhāvanāya
anya-e0104n0:692_1: te vikkhambhetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmalokaṃ upapanno, tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
anya-e0104n0:692_2: ṭhatvā idhāgatopi kāmesu vītarāgova hutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto, yo ca paṭhamavaye
anya-e0104n0:692_3: eva rāgādito nibbinno te ca jhānena vikkhambhetvā pacchimavaye arahattaṃ patto, tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:692_4: rāgādīnaṃ vikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya anuppajjanato nirodhasadisatāya anuppattiyeva nirodho.
anya-e0104n0:692_5: Te nibbānappattā nāma siyuṃ, na ca honti, tasmā na tādisassa khayassa nibbānabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:693_0: Yadi “khayo”ti vacanato yato khayato paṭṭhāya rāgādīnaṃ appavatti, taṃ khayamattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:693_1: nibbānaṃ maññasi, evaṃ sati “khaye ñāṇa”ntiādīsu “khayo”ti vuttattā taduppattito
anya-e0104n0:693_2: paṭṭhāya ca rāgādīnaṃ anuppattīti maggassāpi nibbānabhāvāpattīti dassento “ariyamaggassa cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:694_0: Yathā niruddhā na santi, evaṃ anuppannāpīti abhāvasāmaññato nirodhasadisatāya anuppatti
anya-e0104n0:694_1: eva nirodho anuppattinirodho. Ayañhi maggena khepetabbākāro, yadidaṃ uppajjanārahassa
anya-e0104n0:694_2: anuppattidhammatāpādananti “khayo”ti ca vuccatīti. Taṃ itarakhayato visesento “anuppattinirodhasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0104n0:694_3: pana khayassā”ti āha. Anipphannatā pana tassa khayassa pariyāyena upanissayattāti
anya-e0104n0:694_4: vuttaṃ. Anuppattinirodhakkhayakarassa hi maggassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ atthato
anya-e0104n0:694_5: tassa upanissayo viyāti vattabbataṃ labhati. Tadupacārenāti atthato phalabhūtakhayavohārena.
anya-e0104n0:694_6: Phalūpacārena hi kāraṇaṃ voharīyati yathā “āyu ghataṃ, semho guḷo”ti ca.
anya-e0104n0:695_0: Assāti nibbānassa. “Idampi kho ṭhānaṃ sududdasa”ntiādinā paccavekkhato bhagavato
anya-e0104n0:695_1: appossukkabhāvāvahanato. “Tañhi te, māgaṇḍiya, ariyaṃ cakkhuṃ natthi, yena tvaṃ ariyena
anya-e0104n0:695_2: cakkhunā ārogyaṃ jāneyyāsi, nibbānaṃ passeyyāsī”ti vacanato ariyena cakkhunā passitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:696_0: 560. Yadi nibbānaṃ nāma sabhāvadhammo atthi sattasantānapariyāpanno ca, atha kasmā
anya-e0104n0:696_1: catumahāpathe sabhā viya sabbasādhāraṇā na labbhatīti āha “maggasamaṅginā pattabbato
anya-e0104n0:696_2: asādhāraṇa”nti. “Asukassa sammāsambuddhassa kāle uppanna”nti evaṃ purimāya koṭiyā
anya-e0104n0:696_3: abhāvato appabhavaṃ. Maggabhāveti ariyamaggassa atthibhāve. Bhāvato vijjamānato laddhabbato.
anya-e0104n0:697_1: hi idhādhippetā. Hetuno abhāvāti upapattiyā sādhanahetuno abhāvā. Niccā te aṇuādayo.
anya-e0104n0:697_3: etena “niccā aṇuādayo”ti paṭiññāya dhammiasiddhi, tato ca nissayāsiddho hetūti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:698_1: Appabhavatā cassa apaccayatāya daṭṭhabbā, tāya tassa purimāya koṭiyā abhāvo. “Rūpasabhāvātikkamato”ti
anya-e0104n0:698_2: etena yathā rūpadhammānaṃ ruppanasabhāvo, paṭighātavantatāya kalāpaso vuttiyā padesasambandho
anya-e0104n0:698_3: ca sabhāvo, evaṃ nibbānassa katthaci paṭighāto, sappadesatā ca natthīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:698_4: Na hi nibbānaṃ “asukadisāya, asukadese”ti vā niddisīyati, yato taṃ appatiṭṭhamevāti.
anya-e0104n0:699_0: “Asithila …pe… gamanīyato”ti etena nibbānassa ariyānaṃ paccakkhasiddhataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:699_2: panassa hetuno asiddhataṃ dasseti. Paramatthena nāvijjamānaṃ vijjamānamevāti yathāraddhamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:700_0: Tattha ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatanti cattāripi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni. Atha
anya-e0104n0:700_1: vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti
anya-e0104n0:700_2: ajātaṃ. Kāraṇena vinā, sayameva ca na bhūtaṃ na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti abhūtaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:700_3: Evaṃ ajātattā, abhūtattā ca yena kenaci kāraṇena na katanti akataṃ. Jātabhūtakatabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:700_4: ca nāma rūpādīnaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hoti, na asaṅkhatabhāvassa nibbānassāti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:700_5: “asaṅkhata”nti vuttaṃ. Paṭilomato vā samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:700_6: tathā na saṅkhataṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇarahitanti ca asaṅkhatanti evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi
anya-e0104n0:700_7: nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe “pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya siyā nu kho ekeneva kāraṇena
anya-e0104n0:700_8: etaṃ kata”nti āsaṅkāyaṃ kenaci na katanti dassanatthaṃ “akata”nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ apaccayampi
anya-e0104n0:700_9: samānaṃ “sayameva nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti āsaṅkāyaṃ taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “abhūta”nti
anya-e0104n0:700_10: vuttaṃ. Ayañcetassa asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo sabbena sabbaṃ ajātidhammattāti dassetuṃ “ajāta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:701_0: Evamettha satthā paramatthato nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ pavedesi. Pavedento ca “ahaṃ
anya-e0104n0:701_1: dhammissaro dhammassāmī”ti na attano āṇāmattena pavedesi, apica kho pana padaparame
anya-e0104n0:702_0: “No cetaṃ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, nayidha jātassa
anya-e0104n0:702_1: bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyetha. Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi
anya-e0104n0:702_2: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:703_0: Tassattho – bhikkhave, yadi ajātādisabhāvā asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa na siyā,
anya-e0104n0:703_1: idha loke jātādisabhāvassa rūpādikkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:703_2: anavasesavūpasamo na paññāyeyya na upalabbheyya na sambhaveyya. Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:703_3: katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ariyamaggadhammā anavasesaṃ saṃkilese samucchindanti,
anya-e0104n0:703_4: tenettha sabbassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa apagamo nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati. Evaṃ byatirekavasena
anya-e0104n0:703_5: nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni anugamanavasenapi taṃ dassetvā nigametuṃ “yasmā
anya-e0104n0:703_6: ca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:704_0: Ettha ca yasmā “appaccayā dhammā asaṅkhatā dhammā. Atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:704_1: yattha neva pathavī. Idampi kho ṭhānaṃ sududdasaṃ, yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo.
anya-e0104n0:704_2: Asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādīhi
anya-e0104n0:704_3: anekehi suttapadehi “atthi, bhikkhave, ajāta”nti iminā ca suttapadena nibbānadhātuyā
anya-e0104n0:704_4: paramatthato sabbhāvo sabbalokaṃ anukampamānena sammāsambuddhena pakāsito, tasmā
anya-e0104n0:704_5: yadipi kattha apaccakkhakārīnampi sāsane abhippasannānaṃ viññūnaṃ saṃsayo natthiyeva.
anya-e0104n0:704_6: Ye pana paraneyyabuddhino puggalā, tesaṃ vimativinodanatthaṃ ayamettha adhippāyaniddhāraṇamukhena yuttivicāraṇā.
anya-e0104n0:705_0: Yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ kāmānaṃ, rūpānañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:705_1: nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati, evaṃ sabhāvānaṃ sabbesampi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena
anya-e0104n0:705_2: tabbidhurasabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ. Yañca taṃ nissaraṇaṃ, sā asaṅkhatā dhātu.
anya-e0104n0:705_3: Kiñca bhiyyo – saṅkhatadhammārammaṇavipassanāñāṇaṃ, apica anulomañāṇaṃ kilese tadaṅgavasena
anya-e0104n0:705_4: pajahati, na samucchedavasena pajahituṃ sakkoti. Tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu
anya-e0104n0:705_5: ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati, na samucchedavasena. Iti saṅkhatadhammārammaṇassa,
anya-e0104n0:705_6: sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:706_0: Tathā “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti evamādi nibbānassa paramatthato
anya-e0104n0:706_1: atthibhāvajotakavacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā. Yañhi bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:706_2: taṃ aviparītatthaṃ yathā taṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā, sabbe
anya-e0104n0:706_3: dhammā anattā”ti, tathā nibbānasaddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāravuttisabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:706_4: Seyyathāpi sīhasaddoti evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato
anya-e0104n0:707_0: Aparo nayo – yadi pana nibbānaṃ abhāvamattameva siyā, tassa “gambhīro duddaso duranubodho
anya-e0104n0:707_1: santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo”ti gambhīrāditā, “asaṅkhatañca vo,
anya-e0104n0:707_2: bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmī”tiādinā asaṅkhatāditā, “abyākatā dhammā apaccayādhammā”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:707_3: abyākatadhammāditā ca na vattabbā siyā. Na hi abhāvassa koci sabhāvo atthi, yena
anya-e0104n0:707_4: so gambhīrāsaṅkhatādiākārato viññāyeyya. Abhāvo hi abhāvo eva, kuto tassa gambhīrāsaṅkhātādibhāvasambandho.
anya-e0104n0:707_5: Kiñcāyamabhāvo sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbasattasantānagatānaṃ eko vā bhaveyya aneko
anya-e0104n0:707_6: vā. Yadi eko, ekeneva maggena sabbakilesābhāvo kato, sacchikato cāti aññassa, aññesañca
anya-e0104n0:707_7: maggānaṃ niratthakatāti na siyā maggabahutā, ekajjhañca sabbasattānaṃ nibbānādhigamo
anya-e0104n0:707_8: āpajjati. Siyā panevaṃ eko eva so nibbānasaññito kilesābhāvo, so pana na maggehi
anya-e0104n0:707_9: kātabbo, atha kho sacchikātabboti. Evaṃ sati visesato maggassa niratthakatā āpajjati,
anya-e0104n0:707_10: kilesānaṃ appahānatoti ekopi maggo na siyā. Asati ca kilesappahāne dukkhassa anupacchedanato
anya-e0104n0:707_11: kilesābhāvasacchikiriyā kimatthiyā siyā, atha pana maggānaṃ santānagatasaṃyojanattayappahānādipaṭiniyatakiccatāya
anya-e0104n0:707_12: catūsu maggesu pāṭiyekkaṃ kilesābhāvo. Evaṃ sati sabhāvapabhedena vinā na bahubhāvoti
anya-e0104n0:707_13: so kilesakkhayapariyāyena vutto sabhāvadhammo eva siyā.
anya-e0104n0:708_0: Yesaṃ abhāvo, tappabhedena abhāve bhedopacāroti ce? Yesaṃ abhāvo, tesaṃ sasabhāvatāya
anya-e0104n0:708_1: tassa sabhāvopacāropi siyā. Tathā ca te saṃkilesasaṅkhatatādito kilesasaṅkhatatādiupacārāpi
anya-e0104n0:708_2: siyuṃ. No ce te icchitā, tappabhedena bhedopacāropi na icchitabbo. Na ca pahoti upacarito
anya-e0104n0:708_3: bahubhāvo atthato bahubhāvāya. Na hi jalaṃ analanti upacaritaṃ dahati, pacati vā.
anya-e0104n0:708_4: Ekattapañhampi cāyamabhāvo asabhāvatāya na sahatīti na sakkā vattuṃ natthibhāvasāmaññato
anya-e0104n0:708_5: abhedavohāro yuttarūpoti. Ekatte ca pubbe vuttā eva dosā, bahubhāve pana sati vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n0:708_6: siddhā sabhāvadhammatā. Sabhāvadhammattepi ca bahubhāvo viya bhāvaṃ bhāvopi bahubhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:708_7: na byabhicareyyāti nibbānassa bahubhāvapasaṅgo siyāti ce? Na bahubhāvasseva abhāvappasaṅgato.
anya-e0104n0:708_8: Yadi hi yathā kakkhaḷatā bhāvaṃ, evaṃ bhāvopi kakkhaḷataṃ na byabhicareyya. Evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:708_9: sati sabbesaṃ bhāvānaṃ pathavībhāvāpattito kuto bhāvassa bahubhāvo, tasmā lokavohārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:708_10: vicittatāya yadipi bahutā bhāvāpekkhā, bhāvatā pana na bahutāpekkhāti na bhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:708_11: sato nibbānassa bahubhāvo “ekā niṭṭhā na puthu niṭṭhā”ti vacanato. Ekasmiṃyeva ca
anya-e0104n0:709_0: Parinibbutānaṃ paccekaṃ nibbānabhāve sattasantānaniyataṃ nāma nibbānaṃ siyā. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:709_1: ca sati saṅkhatatādidosānativattiyeva, kilesappahānaṃ vā maggakiccaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:709_2: Tassa ca ekatte na maggabahutā kiccantarassa kattabbassa abhāvato. Maggabahubhāvo
anya-e0104n0:709_3: ca maggehi sacchikātabbe ekasmiṃ dhamme indriyānaṃ apāṭavapāṭavapāṭavatarapāṭavatamabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:709_4: sacchikiriyāvisesena kilesānaṃ pahānabhedena hotīti nibbānassa sabhāvadhammatte eva
anya-e0104n0:709_5: siyā. Abhāvopi ca kilesānaṃ maggena sakiccakatāya kātabbo eva siyā, na sacchikātabbo.
anya-e0104n0:709_6: Ko hi sabhāvo abhāvassa? Yo sacchikātabbo siyā, so ce nibbānaṃ ekeneva maggena sabbakilesānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:709_7: abhāvo eko abhinno kātabbo āpanno. Aññathā maggavasena catubbidhabhāve nibbānassa
anya-e0104n0:709_8: catubbidhabhāvappasaṅgo, nibbānavisesappasaṅgo ca āpajjeyyāti maggakiccassa ekattena
anya-e0104n0:709_9: maggabahutā siyā. Bahubhāve pana tesaṃ so vuttanayena ekasmiṃ dhamme sacchikiriyāvisesatoti
anya-e0104n0:709_10: siddhā nibbānassa sabhāvadhammatā. Khayādhigantabbatāya panetaṃ “khayo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:709_11: “Khaye ñāṇa”nti hi vacanato ariyamaggo khayo nāma. Tena cetaṃ adhigantabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:712_0: 562. Aṭṭha dhammāti “katamaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca”nti ārabhitvā
anya-e0104n0:712_2: pāḷiṃ ānetvā uddesavasena idha ca vuttā sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha dhammā atthato pakāsitā,
anya-e0104n0:712_3: na maggasaccaniddesavasenāti adhippāyo. Yadi atthato pakāsitā, kimatthiyaṃ pana idha
anya-e0104n0:712_4: kathananti āha “idha panā”tiādi. Tattha “ekakkhaṇe pavattamānāna”nti idaṃ lokiyakusalacittuppādesu
anya-e0104n0:712_5: viratiyo nānākkhaṇikā eva hontīti katvā vuttaṃ. Sesamaggadhammā pana tatthāpi ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:712_7: avabodhanatthaṃ. Vitthārato maggakathā parato āvi bhavissatīti āha “saṅkhepato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:712_8: Catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassāti yathā catusaccābhisamayo hoti, evaṃ sabbaso pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā
anya-e0104n0:712_9: paripūraṇavasena paṭipannassa. Ariyamaggasaṅkhātassa yogassa sabbhāvato yogino. Kāmaṃ
anya-e0104n0:712_10: avijjānusayasamugghāte tadekaṭṭhakilesānaṃ lesopi nāvasissati, vijjāya pana avijjā
anya-e0104n0:712_14: pākaṭo hutvā upaṭṭhātīti avijjānusayasamugghātakataṃ sammādiṭṭhiyā vatvāpi avijjandhakāraviddhaṃsanapaccupaṭṭhānatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:713_0: Tathā sampannadiṭṭhinoti yathā avijjānusayasamugghāto hoti, tathā maggasammādiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0104n0:713_1: sampannadiṭṭhino. Evañhi catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yoginoti imamatthaṃ tathā-saddo
anya-e0104n0:713_2: upasaṃharati. Nibbānārammaṇatā pana taṃsampayuttavacaneneva bodhitā. Micchāsaṅkappanighātakanti
anya-e0104n0:714_0: Tathā passato vitakkayato cāti vuttappakārāya sammādiṭṭhiyā passato, nibbānārammaṇe
anya-e0104n0:714_1: ca sammāsaṅkappena cittaṃ abhiniropayato. Vacīduccaritasamugghātikāti catubbidhassapi
anya-e0104n0:714_2: vacīduccaritassa samucchedikā. Musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:714_4: āha “sā pariggahalakkhaṇā”ti. Kāyikakiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sayañca
anya-e0104n0:714_5: samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hotīti sammākammantasaṅkhātā viratipi samuṭṭhānasabhāvā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:714_6: Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhāpanaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.
anya-e0104n0:715_0: Assāti yogino. Tasmiṃ sati visujjhanato visuddhibhūtā. Jīvamānassa sattassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:715_1: vā suddhi vodānaṃ, ājīvasseva vā jīvitindriyavuttiyā. Ñāyājīvassa abuddhapaṭikuṭṭhāya
anya-e0104n0:715_2: sammājīvikāya pavattihetutāya ñāyājīvapavattiraso. Imassa hi pavattito paṭṭhāya micchājīvo na pavattatīti.
anya-e0104n0:716_1: vutto. Saṃkilesapakkhatopi tassa paggaṇhanaṃ paggaho. Kāyādīsu subhādiākārupadhāraṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:716_2: pavattā subhasaññādipubbaṅgamā akusalakkhandhā micchāsati, tassā viddhaṃsano micchāsativiniddhunano.
anya-e0104n0:717_0: 563. Saccañāṇassāti saccāni ārabbha pavattanakañāṇassa, na paṭivedhañāṇaṃ viya sakideva
anya-e0104n0:717_1: bujjhati, atha kho punappunaṃ uppajjanato anu anu bodho anubodho, anussavākāraparivitakkadiṭṭhinijjhānakkhantianugato
anya-e0104n0:717_2: vā bodho anubodho, tadeva ñāṇanti anubodhañāṇaṃ. Na hi taṃ paccakkhato bujjhati,
anya-e0104n0:717_3: anussavādivasena pana kappanamukhena bujjhati. Kiccatoti parijānanādito. Taṃkiccakaraṇeneva
anya-e0104n0:717_4: hi pariññeyyādīni viya tānipi tassa pākaṭāni honti. Vivaṭṭānupassanāya hi saṅkhārehi
anya-e0104n0:717_5: patilīyamānamānasassa uppajjamānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ visaṅkhāraṃ dukkhanissaraṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:717_6: katvā dukkhaṃ paricchindati, dukkhagatañca taṇhaṃ pajahati, nirodhañca sacchikaroti
anya-e0104n0:717_7: phusati. Ādicco viya pabhāya sammāsaṅkappādīhi saha samuppannaṃ taṃ maggaṃ bhāveti,
anya-e0104n0:717_8: na ca saṅkhāre amuñcitvā pavattamānena ñāṇena etaṃ sabbaṃ kātuṃ sakkā nimittapavattehi
anya-e0104n0:717_9: avuṭṭhitattā. Tasmā etāni kiccāni karontaṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ dukkhādīni vibhāveti tattha
anya-e0104n0:717_10: sammohanivattanenāti “cattāripi saccāni paṭivijjhatī”ti vuttaṃ, ekapaṭivedhenāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:718_0: Dukkhasamudayampi so passatīti kālantaradassanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ce? Na, “yo nu
anya-e0104n0:718_1: kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passatī”tiādinā ekadassino aññattayadassitāvicāraṇāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:718_2: taṃsādhanatthaṃ āyasmatā gavampatittherena imassa suttassa ānītattā, paccekañca saccesu
anya-e0104n0:718_3: dissamānesu aññattayadassanassa yojitattā. Aññathā anupubbābhisamaye purimadiṭṭhassa
anya-e0104n0:718_4: pacchā adassanato samudayādidassino dukkhādidassitā na yojetabbā siyā. Yojitā ca
anya-e0104n0:718_5: sā “yo dukkhasamudayaṃ passati, dukkhampi so passatī”tiādinā. Lokiyaṃ saccañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:718_6: Tattha lokiyañāṇe. Pariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhāto abhibhavo pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavo, tassa vasena.
anya-e0104n0:718_8: kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā, sā na hotī”ti vacanato
anya-e0104n0:718_10: ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ nivatteti. “Lokanirodhaṃ kho…pe… passato yā loke atthitā, sā na hotī”ti
anya-e0104n0:718_11: vacanato nirodhadassanaṃ hetunirodhā phalanirodhadassanato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0104n0:718_12: Attakārassa paccakkhadassanato maggadassanaṃ “natthi attakāre, natthi parakāre, natthi
anya-e0104n0:718_13: purisakāre”tiādikaṃ akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati. “Natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:718_14: saṃkilesāya, ahetū appaccayā sattā saṃkilissanti, natthi hetu…pe… visuddhiyā, ahetū
anya-e0104n0:718_15: appaccayā sattā visujjhantī”tiādikā ahetukadiṭṭhi ca idha akiriyādiṭṭhiggahaṇeneva
anya-e0104n0:718_16: gahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Sāpi hi visuddhimaggadassanena pahīyatīti. Dukkhe ñāṇaṃ samudayaphalassa
anya-e0104n0:718_17: dukkhassa addhuvādibhāvaṃ passatīti phale vippaṭipattiṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0104n0:719: Issaro lokaṃ pavatteti sajjeti nivatteti saṃharatīti issarakāraṇino vadanti. Padhānato loko āvi bhavati, tattheva ca patilīyatīti padhānakāraṇino.
anya-e0104n0:721: Kālo sutte jāgarati, kālo hi duratikkamo”ti. –
anya-e0104n0:722_0: Kālavādino. Kaṇṭakassa tikhiṇabhāvo viya, kapiṭṭhaphalādīnaṃ parimaṇḍalatā viya,
anya-e0104n0:722_1: migapakkhisarīsapādīnaṃ vicittatā viya ca sabhāveneva loko sambhoti, vibhoti cāti
anya-e0104n0:722_2: sabhāvavādino. Ādi-saddena aṇūhi loko pavattati, sabbaṃ pubbekatahetu, loko niyato
anya-e0104n0:722_3: acchejjasuttāvutābhejjamaṇisadiso, na ettha kassaci purisakāroti niyativādino.
anya-e0104n0:724: Yadicchāya sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ, tasmā yādicchakī pajā”ti. –
anya-e0104n0:725_0: Yadicchāvādino, ye adhiccasamuppattivādinoti ca vuccanti. Evamādiakāraṇavādasaṅgaho
anya-e0104n0:725_1: daṭṭhabbo. Rāmudakaāḷārādīnaṃ viya, arūpaloke nigaṇṭhānaṃ viya ca lokathūpikāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:725_2: apavaggo mokkhoti gahaṇaṃ apavaggagāho. Ādi-saddena padhānassa appavatti, guṇaviyuttassa
anya-e0104n0:725_3: attano sakattani avaṭṭhānaṃ, brahmunā salokatā, samīpatā, saṃyogo, diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti
anya-e0104n0:725_4: evamādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca padhānassa appavatti mahatādibhāvena apariṇāmo,
anya-e0104n0:725_5: anabhibyatti vā. “Ahamañño, pakati aññā”ti evaṃ pavattapakatipurisantarajānanena
anya-e0104n0:725_6: attasukhadukkhamohesu avibhāgaggahaṇe kira nivattite vuttanayena padhānaṃ nappavattati,
anya-e0104n0:725_8: navahi attaguṇehi viyuttassāti kaṇādamatānusārino. Salokatā brahmunā samānalokatā.
anya-e0104n0:725_9: Samīpatā tassa samīpappavattitā. Saṃyogo tena ekībhāvūpagamanaṃ. “Indriyatappanaputtamukhadassanādīhi
anya-e0104n0:725_10: vinā apavaggo natthī”ti gahetvā tathā pavattanaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogo. Anasanakesaluñcanāditapacariyāya
anya-e0104n0:725_11: naggasīlagosīlakukkurasīlādīhi ca attaparitāpanena mokkho hotīti attakilamatho.
anya-e0104n0:726: Svāyaṃ sabbo micchāgāho saccañāṇe sati patiṭṭhaṃ na labhatīti vuttamevatthaṃ saṅgaṇhanto “loke lokappabhave”ti gāthamāhāti.
anya-e0104n0:728_0: 564. Sesā sabbadhammāti sesā ekāsīti lokiyadhammā. Ajjhattikabāhiresu dvādasasu āyatanesu
anya-e0104n0:728_2: vā āgatanayena kālavibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā vuttāni. Tadāmasane hi aṭṭhasataṃ honti. Asammissanti
anya-e0104n0:728_3: ekakattā kenaci asammissaṃ, kuto tadantogadhappabhedoti adhippāyo. Vīmaṃsiddhipādādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:728_4: bodhipakkhiyānaṃ satipi kiccanānatte atthato ekattā sammādiṭṭhiyā saṅgahoti sammādiṭṭhimukhena
anya-e0104n0:729_1: maggakkhaṇe lobhabyāpādavihiṃsāsamucchedanavasena tayoti ekopi vutto. Esa nayo sammāvācādīsu.
anya-e0104n0:729_2: Appicchatāsantuṭṭhitānaṃ pana bhāve sammāājīvasambhavato tena tesaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:729_3: Bhavantarepi jīvitahetupi ariyehi avītikkamanīyattā ariyakantānaṃ sammāvācādisīlānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:729_4: gahaṇena yena saddhāhatthena tāni gahetabbāni, so saddhāhattho gahito eva hotīti
anya-e0104n0:729_5: tato anaññāni saddhindriyasaddhābalāni tattha antogadhāni vuttāni. Chando pana saddhānuguṇoti
anya-e0104n0:729_6: katvā chandiddhipādassāpi tadantogadhatā vuttā. Tesaṃ atthitāyāti saddhindriyasaddhābalachandiddhipādānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:729_7: atthitāya sīlassa atthibhāvato tividhenāpi sīlena te tayopi gahitāti tattha antogadhā.
anya-e0104n0:729_8: Cittasamādhīti cittiddhipādaṃ vadati. “Cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti hi cittamukhena
anya-e0104n0:729_9: samādhi vuttoti samādhimukhena cittampi vattabbataṃ arahati. Cittiddhipādabhāvanāya
anya-e0104n0:729_10: pana samādhipi adhimatto hotīti vīmaṃsiddhipādādivacanaṃ viya cittiddhipādoti avatvā
anya-e0104n0:729_11: idha “cittasamādhī”ti vuttaṃ. “Pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:729_12: vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato samādhiupakārā pītipassaddhiyo, tasmā
anya-e0104n0:729_13: samādhiggahaṇena gahitā. Upekkhā pana samādhiupakārakato, taṃsadisakiccato ca. Tasmā
anya-e0104n0:731_0: 565. Bhāro viya dukkhasaccaṃ vighātakattā, saṃharaṇīyavasena vihantabhāvatoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:731_1: Bhārādānamiva tattha tattha bhave uppajjanakavighātassa hetubhāvato. Bhāranikkhepanamiva
anya-e0104n0:731_2: pavattidukkhavūpasamabhāvato. Rogo viya, dubbhikkhamiva ca bādhakattā. Roganidānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:731_3: viya, dubbuṭṭhi viya ca pabhavalakkhaṇattā. Dubbuṭṭhīti ca avassanaṃ vā ativassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:731_4: vā. Rogavūpasamo viya, subhikkhamiva ca santilakkhaṇattā, sukhabhāvato. “Nibbānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:731_5: paramaṃ sukha”nti hi vuttaṃ. Bhesajjamiva, suvuṭṭhi viya ca dukkhassa hetupacchedato,
anya-e0104n0:731_6: tassa ca apagamūpāyabhāvato. Niyyānalakkhaṇañhi maggasaccaṃ. Aniṭṭhabhāvato, sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayato
anya-e0104n0:731_7: ca dukkhaṃ verivisarukkhabhayaorimatīrūpamaṃ. Veraṃ byāpādo, paccatthikabhāvo vā.
anya-e0104n0:733_0: 566. Esa nayo samudayādīsūti atthi cettha samudayo, na ariyasaccaṃ, atthi ariyasaccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:733_1: na samudayo, atthi samudayo ceva ariyasaccañca, atthi neva samudayo na ariyasaccanti.
anya-e0104n0:733_3: Itaraṃ pana ariyasaccadvayanti samudayamaggasaccadvayamāha. Siyā dukkhaṃ saṅkhāradukkhatāya.
anya-e0104n0:733_4: Tenāha “aniccato”ti. Tathattenāti tathasabhāvena, pariññeyyabhāvenāti attho. Etena
anya-e0104n0:733_5: taṃ ariyasaccadvayaṃ “siyā dukkhaṃ, na ariyasaccaṃ, siyā ariyasaccaṃ, na dukkha”nti
anya-e0104n0:733_6: imamatthaṃ dasseti. Ariyasaccasaddaparā hi dukkhādisaddā pariññeyyādibhāvaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:733_8: ādipadasaṅgaho vutto, ariyasaccasaddāpekkhaṃ pana sandhāya catutthapadasaṅgaho.
anya-e0104n0:734_0: Sabbākārenāti sabbappakārena. Yathā maggasampayuttadhammādayo ekaṅgavikalā, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:734_1: ahutvā sabbaṅgayogena dukkhatāya ceva ariyasaccatāya cāti attho. “Upādānakkhandhapañcaka”nti
anya-e0104n0:734_2: vutte taṇhāyapi saṅgaho siyāti taṃnivattanatthaṃ “aññatra taṇhāyā”ti vuttaṃ tassā
anya-e0104n0:734_3: visuṃ ariyasaccabhāvato. Samudayādīsu avasesakilesādayo pabhavaṭṭhena samudayo, na
anya-e0104n0:734_4: ariyasaccaṃ suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā ayanti katvā. Nirodho ariyasaccaṃ, na samudayo. Itaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:734_5: pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā samudayo attano phalassa paccayaṭṭhena, na pana yassa
anya-e0104n0:734_6: pahānāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena, sabbākārena pana taṇhāsamudayo
anya-e0104n0:734_7: ceva ariyasaccañca. Maggasampayuttadhammā, sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pahānāya bhagavati
anya-e0104n0:734_8: brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena neva samudayo, na ariyasaccaṃ. Saṅkhāranirodho,
anya-e0104n0:734_9: nirodhasamāpatti ca nirodho, na ariyasaccaṃ. Samudayo ariyasaccaṃ, na nirodho. Itaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:734_10: pana ariyasaccadvayaṃ siyā nirodho khaṇanirodhasabbhāvato, na pana yassa sacchikiriyāya
anya-e0104n0:734_11: bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena. Sabbākārena pana asaṅkhatā dhātu nirodho
anya-e0104n0:734_12: ceva ariyasaccañca. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Ariyamaggato aññāni maggāni maggo, na ariyasaccaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:734_13: Nirodho ariyasaccaṃ, na maggo. Itaraṃ pana saccadvayaṃ siyā maggo bhavagāminipaṭipadābhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:734_14: na pana yassa bhāvanāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati tathattena, sabbākārena pana
anya-e0104n0:734_15: nirodhagāminipaṭipadā maggo ceva ariyasaccañca. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n0:736_0: 567. Suññānīti vedakādīhi bāhirakaparikappitehīti adhippāyo. Dukkhañhi vedanīyampi
anya-e0104n0:736_1: santaṃ vedakarahitaṃ, kevalaṃ pana tasmiṃ attano paccayehi pavattamāne dukkhaṃ vedetīti
anya-e0104n0:737_0: “Dukkhamevā”ti avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “na koci dukkhito”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:737_1: Kiriyāva vijjatīti samudayasaccaṃ sandhāya vadati. Purimasaccadvayassa vipākavaṭṭakammavaṭṭasaṅgahato
anya-e0104n0:737_2: kārakassa vā dukkhasaccasabhāvamāha. Kātabbāpi hi kiriyā kārakarahitā kevalaṃ attano
anya-e0104n0:737_3: paccayehi tāya pavattamānāya dukkhasaññite dhammappabandhe kiriyaṃ karotīti vohāramattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:737_4: hoti. Nibbutagamakesupi eseva nayo. “Maggo atthī”ti vattabbe “maggamatthī”ti okārassa
anya-e0104n0:737_5: abhāvo katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gamakoti nibbutiṃ gantā.
anya-e0104n0:738_0: Kilesāsucipaggharaṇaṭṭhena sāsavatā asubhatāti katvā anāsavattā nirodhamaggā subhā
anya-e0104n0:738_1: eva. Dukkhādīnaṃ pariyāyena samudayādibhāvo ca atthi, na pana nirodhabhāvo, nirodhassa
anya-e0104n0:738_2: vā na dukkhādibhāvoti nirodhāvasesattayānaṃ na aññamaññasamaṅgitāti āha “nirodhasuññāni vā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:739_0: Samudaye dukkhassābhāvatoti ponobhavikāya taṇhāya punabbhavassa abhāvato. Yathā vā
anya-e0104n0:739_1: pakativādīnaṃ vikārā avikāribhāvato, pubbe patipalīnā ca pakatibhāveneva tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0104n0:739_2: na evaṃ samudayasampayuttampi dukkhaṃ samudayabhāvena tiṭṭhatīti āha “samudaye dukkhassābhāvato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:739_3: Magge ca nirodhassa abhāvatoti sambandho. Yathā avibhattehi vikārehi mahāhaṅkāratammattavisesindriyabhūtavisesehi
anya-e0104n0:739_4: pakatibhāveneva ṭhitehi pakati sagabbhā icchitā pakativādīhi, evaṃ na phalena sagabbho
anya-e0104n0:739_5: hetūti attho. “Dukkhasamudayānaṃ nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā”ti etaṃ vivaranto āha
anya-e0104n0:739_6: “na hetusamavetaṃ hetuphala”ntiādi. Tattha “idha tantūsu paṭo, kapālesu ghaṭo, bīraṇesu
anya-e0104n0:739_7: kaṭo dvīsu aṇūsu dviaṇuka”ntiādinā idha vuddhivohārajanako avisuṃ siddhānaṃ sambandho
anya-e0104n0:739_8: samavāyo, tena samavāyena kāraṇesu dvīsu aṇūsu dviaṇukaṃ phalaṃ samavetaṃ ekībhūtamiva
anya-e0104n0:739_10: phalaṃ attano kāraṇesu samavetanti samavāyavādino vadanti. Evaṃ pana vadantehi aparimāṇesu
anya-e0104n0:739_11: kāraṇesu mahāparimāṇaṃ ekaṃ phalaṃ samavetaṃ attano antogadhehi kāraṇehi sagabbhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:739_12: asuññanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evamidha samavāyābhāvā phale hetu natthīti hetusuññaṃ phalanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:743_1: Etena cattāro kabaḷīkārādiāhāravisese, ajjhoharaṇīyavatthu, saḷāyatana, avijjā, abhisaṅkhārasaṅkhāte
anya-e0104n0:743_2: tappaccayabhūtadhammavisese ca saṅgaṇhāti, ojaṭṭhamakarūpa, vedanā, paṭisandhiviññāṇa,
anya-e0104n0:744_1: rūpārammaṇādivasenāpīti vadanti. Rūpataṇhādīnaṃ paccekaṃ anekabhedattā cha taṇhākāyā, tesaṃ bhedato.
anya-e0104n0:745_0: Upādānehi upādīyatīti upādi, upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ. Tannissaraṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:745_1: tassa vūpasamo taṃsantīti katvā tassa yāva pacchimaṃ cittaṃ, tāva sesataṃ, tato paraṃ
anya-e0104n0:745_3: voharīyati. Yathā cāyaṃ bhedo vohārato, evamitarepīti te katipaye dassetuṃ “tividho”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:745_4: vuttaṃ. Aññathā ekassa sato nibbānassa kuto bhedoti.
anya-e0104n0:746_0: Samathavipassanābhedatoti ettha sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappā vipassanā, itare samathāti
anya-e0104n0:746_1: vadanti. Sīlampi hi samathassa upakārakattā samathaggahaṇena gayhatīti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:746_2: Atha vā yānadvayassa vasena laddho maggo samatho vipassanāti āgamanavasena vuttoti
anya-e0104n0:746_3: daṭṭhabbo. Ayanti ariyamaggo. Sappadesattāti sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ ekadesattāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:746_4: Ekadeso hi padissati avayavabhāvena apadisīyatīti padeso, attano samudāyaṃ pati saha
anya-e0104n0:746_5: padesenāti sappadesoti vuccati yathā “sanidassanā dhammā”ti, sīlakkhandhādayo ca
anya-e0104n0:746_6: sabbalokiyalokuttarasīlādisaṅgāhakā, ariyamaggo lokuttaro evāti tadekadeso hoti.
anya-e0104n0:747: Sajātitoti samānajātito, vacīduccaritaviratiādibhedesu samānāya sīlajātiyāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:748_0: Onatasahāyo viya vāyāmo paggahakiccasāmaññato. Aṃsakūṭaṃ datvā ṭhitasahāyo viya sati
anya-e0104n0:748_2: samānāya samādhijātiyāti attho. Kiriyatoti samādhianurūpakiriyato. Tato eva hi “cattāro
anya-e0104n0:748_3: satipaṭṭhānā samādhinimittā, cattāro sammappadhānā samādhiparikkhārā”ti sativāyāmānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:749_0: Ākoṭentena viyāti “aniccaṃ anicca”ntiādinā paññākiccasadisena kiccena samantato koṭentena
anya-e0104n0:749_1: viya, “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhenā”tiādinā parivattentena viya ca ādāya
anya-e0104n0:749_2: ūhitvā dinnameva paññā paṭivijjhati. Dvinnaṃ samānakālattepi paccayabhāvena sammāsaṅkappassa
anya-e0104n0:749_3: purimakālassa viya niddeso kato. Sajātitoti “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīsu samānāya paññājātiyā.
anya-e0104n0:749_4: Kiriyatoti ettha paññāsadisaṃ kiccaṃ “kiriyā”ti vuttaṃ, pubbe pana samādhiupakārakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:750: “Sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya”nti vacanato cattāripi abhimukhaṃ paccakkhato ñātabbāni, abhivisiṭṭhena vā ñāṇena ñātabbānīti abhiññeyyāni.
anya-e0104n0:752_1: duradhigamanti attho. Asananti kaṇḍaṃ. Atipāteyyāti khipeyya. Koṭiyāti kaṇḍassa koṭiyā
anya-e0104n0:752_2: vālaggena. Koṭinti vālasseva koṭiṃ. Paṭivijjheyyāti paṭimukhabhāvena vijjheyya.
anya-e0104n0:753_1: gambhīrattāti oḷārikā dukkhasamudayā. Tiracchānagatānampi hi dukkhaṃ, āhārādīsu ca
anya-e0104n0:753_2: abhilāso pākaṭo. Pīḷanādiāyūhanādivasena pana “idaṃ dukkhaṃ, idamassa kāraṇa”nti
anya-e0104n0:753_3: yāthāvato ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā gambhīrā. Saṇhasukhumadhammattā nirodhamaggā sabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:753_4: eva gambhīraṭṭhena duravagāhā. Teneva uppanne magge natthi nirodhamaggānaṃ anavagāhoti.
anya-e0104n0:753_5: Nibbānampi maggena adhigantabbattā tassa phalanti apadisīyatīti āha “phalāpadesato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:753_6: Vuttañhetaṃ “dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti. Maggopi nirodhassa sampāpakabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:754: Iti evaṃ pakārehīti iti vijaññāti sambandho. Tattha itisaddena vijānanakkamaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ pakārehīti evaṃ-saddena vijānanakāraṇabhūtena eva.
anya-e0104n0:760_0: 570. Imissā paññāyāti imissā yathādhigatāya vipassanāya. Bhūmibhūtesūti pavattiṭṭhānabhūtesu.
anya-e0104n0:760_4: Avasesā honti, saṃvaṇṇanāvasenāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “tesaṃ vaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto”ti.
anya-e0104n0:761_0: Avijjādayo dhammā paṭiccasamuppādo, na samuppattimattaṃ. Svāyamattho iminā suttapadena
anya-e0104n0:761_1: veditabboti dassento “vuttañheta”ntiādiṃ vatvā paṭiccasamuppanne pana dassetuṃ “jarāmaraṇādayo
anya-e0104n0:761_2: panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Kasmā panettha anulomato paṭiccasamuppādadhammā dassitā, paṭilomato
anya-e0104n0:761_3: paṭiccasamuppannā dhammāti? Yato te paccayato uppannā, tassa samanantaradassanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:762_0: Na niccaṃ na sassatanti aniccaṃ. Samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ. Paṭicca
anya-e0104n0:762_1: paccayārahaṃ paccayaṃ nissāya sahitameva uppannanti paṭiccasamuppannaṃ. Khayanasabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:762_2: khayadhammaṃ. Vayanasabhāvaṃ vayadhammaṃ. Virajjanasabhāvaṃ palujjanasabhāvaṃ virāgadhammaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:762_3: Nirujjhanasabhāvaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ. Sesaṃ yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0104n0:763: 571. Etthāti etesu yathāvuttesu suttapadesu. Saṅkhepoti atthasaṅkhepo.
anya-e0104n0:764_0: Jātipaccayāti jātisaṅkhātā paccayā. Hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ. Ṭhitāva sā dhātūti yāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:764_1: jarāmaraṇassa idappaccayatā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti, esā dhātu esa sabhāvo. Sā
anya-e0104n0:764_2: tathāgatānaṃ uppādato pubbe, uddhañca aviññāyamāno, majjhe ca viññāyamāno, na tathāgatehi
anya-e0104n0:764_3: uppādito, atha kho sambhavantassa jarāmaraṇassa sabbakālaṃ jātipaccayato sambhavoti
anya-e0104n0:764_4: ṭhitā eva. Kevalaṃ pana sayambhūñāṇena abhisambujjhanato, “ayaṃ dhammo tathāgatena
anya-e0104n0:764_5: adhigato”ti pavedanato ca tathāgato “dhammassāmī”ti vuccati na apubbassa uppādanato.
anya-e0104n0:764_6: Tena vuttaṃ “ṭhitāva sā dhātū”ti. Sā eva jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti ettha vipallāsābhāvato
anya-e0104n0:764_7: evaṃ avabujjhamānassa etassa sabhāvassa, hetuno vā tatheva bhāvato ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā.
anya-e0104n0:764_9: taduppādādibhāvenassā ṭhitatā “dhammaṭṭhitatā”ti phalaṃ patisāmatthiyato hetumeva vadati.
anya-e0104n0:765_0: Atha vā dhārīyati paccayehīti dhammo, tiṭṭhati tattha tadāyattavuttitāya phalanti
anya-e0104n0:765_1: ṭhiti, dhammassa ṭhiti dhammaṭṭhiti. Dhammoti vā kāraṇaṃ, paccayoti attho. Dhammassa
anya-e0104n0:765_2: ṭhitisabhāvo, dhammato ca añño sabhāvo natthīti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayo. Tenāha “paccayapariggahe
anya-e0104n0:765_3: paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti. Dhammaṭṭhiti eva dhammaṭṭhitatā. Sā eva dhātu “jātipaccayā
anya-e0104n0:765_4: jarāmaraṇa”nti imassa sabhāvassa, hetuno vā aññathattābhāvato “na jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti
anya-e0104n0:765_5: viññāyamānassa tabbhāvābhāvato niyāmatā vavatthitabhāvoti dhammaniyāmatā. Phalassa
anya-e0104n0:765_6: vā jarāmaraṇassa jātiyā sati sambhavo dhamme hetumhi ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā. Asati
anya-e0104n0:765_7: asambhavo dhamme niyatatāti dhammaniyāmatāti evaṃ phalena hetuṃ vibhāveti. Taṃ “ṭhitāva
anya-e0104n0:765_8: sā dhātū”tiādinā vuttaṃ idappaccayataṃ abhisambujjhati paccakkhakaraṇena abhimukhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:765_9: bujjhati yāthāvato paṭivijjhati. Abhisametīti tassa vevacanaṃ. Ādito kathento ācikkhati,
anya-e0104n0:765_10: uddisatīti attho. Tameva uddesaṃ pariyosāpento deseti. Yathāuddiṭṭhamatthaṃ niddisanavasena
anya-e0104n0:765_11: pakārehi ñāpentā paññapeti. Pakārehiyeva patiṭṭhapento paṭṭhapeti. Yathāniddiṭṭhamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:765_12: paṭiniddisanavasena vivarati vibhajati, vivaṭañhi vibhattañca atthaṃ hetudhāraṇadassanehi
anya-e0104n0:765_13: pākaṭaṃ karonto uttānīkaroti. Uttānīkaronto tathāpaccakkhabhūtaṃ katvā nigamanavasena passathāti cāha.
anya-e0104n0:766_0: 572. Paccayalakkhaṇoti paccayabhāvalakkhaṇo, paccayoti vā lakkhitabbo. Pavattidukkhassa
anya-e0104n0:767_0: So panāyaṃ paṭiccasamuppādo. Yāvattakehi paccayehi yaṃ phalaṃ uppajjanārahaṃ, avikaleheva
anya-e0104n0:767_1: tehi tassa uppatti, tadaññena ca tassa payojanaṃ natthīti āha “anūnādhikehevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:767_2: Yathā taṃ cakkhurūpālokamanasikārehi cakkhuviññāṇassa, etena taṃtaṃphalanipphādanena
anya-e0104n0:767_3: tassā paccayasāmaggiyā tapparatā tathatāti dasseti. Sāmagginti samodhānaṃ, samavāyanti
anya-e0104n0:767_4: attho. Asambhavābhāvatoti anuppajjanassa abhāvato. Paccayasāmaggiyañhi sati anuppajjane
anya-e0104n0:767_5: tassā vitathatā siyā. Aññadhammappaccayehīti aññassa phaladhammassa paccayehi. Aññadhammānuppattitoti
anya-e0104n0:767_6: tato aññassa phaladhammassa anuppajjanato. Na hi kadāci cakkhurūpālokamanasikārehi
anya-e0104n0:767_7: sotaviññāṇassa sambhavo atthi, yadi siyā, tassā sāmaggiyā aññathatā nāma siyā, na
anya-e0104n0:767_8: cetaṃ atthīti “anaññathatā”ti vuttaṃ. Paccayatoti paccayabhāvato. Paccayasamūhatoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:768_0: 573. Idappaccayā eva idappaccayatāti tā-saddena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ, na kiñci atthantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:768_1: yathā devo eva devatāti. Idappaccayānaṃ vā samūho idappaccayatāti samūhatthaṃ tā-saddamāha
anya-e0104n0:768_2: yathā “janānaṃ samūho janatā”ti. Nanu ca “atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena
anya-e0104n0:768_3: satā, ānanda, atthītissa vacanīyaṃ. Kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya, jātipaccayā
anya-e0104n0:768_6: na hettha “imassa paccayā idappaccayā”ti jarāmaraṇassa, aññassa vā paccayato jarāmaraṇasambhavapucchā
anya-e0104n0:768_7: sambhavati viditabhāvato, asambhavato ca, jarāmaraṇassa pana paccayapucchā sambhavati.
anya-e0104n0:768_8: Paccaya-saddena ca samānādhikaraṇatāya idaṃ-saddassa imasmā paccayāti paccayapucchā
anya-e0104n0:768_9: yujjati. Sā ca samānādhikaraṇatā bāhiratthasamāsepi labbhati. Tato ca aññapadatthavacanicchābhāve
anya-e0104n0:769_0: Sāmivacanasamāse pana samānādhikaraṇatā natthīti na kathañci kammadhārayasamāsasambhavoti?
anya-e0104n0:769_2: paṭiccasamuppādo”ti ettha. “Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ettha pana jarāmaraṇassa
anya-e0104n0:769_3: paccayamattaparipucchā, tasmā yathā idaṃ-saddassa paṭiccasamuppādavisesanatā, pucchitabbapaccayavisesanatā
anya-e0104n0:769_4: ca hoti, tathā samāsavikappo ettha, tattha ca kātabboti na samāsantaradassanaṃ sāmivacanasamāsabādhakaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:769_5: Kasmā panetthāpi kammadhārayasamāso na icchitoti? Hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti
anya-e0104n0:769_6: imassatthassa kammadhārayasamāse asambhavato, “imassa attano paccayānurūpassa anurūpo
anya-e0104n0:769_7: paccayo idappaccayo”ti imassa ca atthassa icchitattā. Yo panettha idaṃ-saddena gahito
anya-e0104n0:769_8: attho, so “atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ettha jarāmaraṇaggahaṇeneva gahitoti
anya-e0104n0:769_9: idaṃ-saddo paṭiccasamuppannato abhassitvā aññāsambhavato paccaye avatiṭṭhati, tasmā
anya-e0104n0:769_10: tattha kammadhārayasamāso. Ettha pana idaṃ-saddassa tato pariccajanakāraṇaṃ natthīti
anya-e0104n0:769_11: sāmivacanasamāso eva. Evampi na idappaccayo eva idappaccayabhāvo bhavituṃ yuttoti
anya-e0104n0:769_12: idappaccayatāya paṭiccasamuppādatānupapattīti? Nāyaṃ doso atthantarābhāvatoti vuttovāyamattho.
anya-e0104n0:770_0: Atha vā pana hotu idappaccayabhāvo idappaccayatāti. Bhāvoti cettha avinābhāviphalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:770_1: pati hetuno satvaṃ. Tathā hi idappaccaya-saddo jātiādīsu niruḷho. Tañca idappaccayasatvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:770_2: idappaccayato aññaṃ natthi. Yadi aññaṃ siyā, taṃ avijjamānaṃ siyā. Na hi satā aññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:770_3: vijjamānaṃ hoti. Atha satvaṃ saṃ nāma, yassa sato bhāvo, taṃ asaṃ nāma siyā. Na hi
anya-e0104n0:770_4: taṃ satvaṃ sabhāvaṃ satvato aññattā, tasmā sato bhāvo satvanti niddeso na yujjati.
anya-e0104n0:770_5: Na ca saṃ-sambandhena asaṃ saṃ nāma hoti, pageva saṃ-sambandhena. Asati ca saditiggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:770_6: viparītaggāhoti na gahaṇato saṃsiddhi. Sadisakappanāyañca māṇavakassa sīhabhāvo viya
anya-e0104n0:770_7: na asato saṃ-sabhāvatā. Yasmā pana idappaccayabhāvo yathāvuttaṃ satvaṃ, na asatvaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:770_8: Nāpi yassa taṃ satvaṃ, tadasaṃ, tasmā idappaccayabhāvo idappaccayasarūpaṃ sabhāvantarehi
anya-e0104n0:770_9: vinivattabhāvadassanatthaṃ imassāyanti visesetvā idappaccayatāti vuttanti na idappaccayatāya
anya-e0104n0:771_0: Paṭicca samuppajjati etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādoti tassāpi hetuatthabhāvato jātiādipadānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:771_1: evameva hetubhāvavācakatāya hetupadhānatā yojetabbā hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti
anya-e0104n0:771_2: katvā. Tathā hi “dasabalasamannāgato, bhikkhave, tathāgato catūhi vesārajjehi samannāgato
anya-e0104n0:771_3: āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti, imasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:771_4: sati idaṃ hoti yāva ‘evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”’ti anena
anya-e0104n0:771_5: sīhanādasuttena pakāsito evamattho. “Kiṃ vādī panāyasmato satthā kimakkhāyī”ti puṭṭhena
anya-e0104n0:772: “Ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āha;
anya-e0104n0:774: Vutto. Tena viññāyati hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu paṭiccasamuppādoti. Sesamettha vattabbaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
anya-e0104n0:775_0: 574. Paṭiccāti taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya. Sammāti aviparītaṃ aniccato aniccassa uppādoti
anya-e0104n0:775_1: katvā. Niccato hi kāraṇato phalassa uppādo viparīto. Tenāha “titthiya…pe… nirapekkho”ti.
anya-e0104n0:775_2: “Uppādo paññāyatī”ti evaṃ vuttasaṅkhatalakkhaṇato añño “paccayato khaṇato”ti ettha
anya-e0104n0:775_3: vuttapaccayalakkhaṇo eko ākāro uppādoti tesaṃ adhippāyo. Yaṃ sandhāya te “jātiādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:775_4: hetavo jātiādayo”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ, nibbattilakkhaṇavinimuttassa tādisassa
anya-e0104n0:775_5: kassaci abhāvato. Tenāha “taṃ na yujjatī”tiādi. Gambhīranayāsambhavatoti gambhīrānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:775_6: nayānañca asambhavato. Saddabhedatoti saddavināsato saddāyogato. Suttaṃ natthi “paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0104n0:775_7: vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”tiādisuttapadehi uppādamattassa appakāsitattā. Ayameva hi
anya-e0104n0:775_8: attho heṭṭhā dassito idānipi dassīyati. Taṃ uppādamattaṃ. Viharāmi tasmiṃ paṭhamābhisambuddhakāleti
anya-e0104n0:775_9: adhippāyo. Viharāmīti vā kālavipallāsena vuttaṃ, vihāsinti attho. Tatrāti tasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:775_10: padesavihāre. Paccayākāradassanenāti yenākārena paccayadhammo paccayuppannassa paccayo
anya-e0104n0:775_11: hoti, so paccayākāro paccayabhāvo, tassa dassanena. Idha pana vedanānaṃ paccayabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:775_12: adhippeto. Tenāha “micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayita”ntiādi. Vedanānaṃyeva hi paccayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:775_13: passantena vuttavihāro paṭiccasamuppādassa ekadesameva passato vihāroti katvā padesavihāro
anya-e0104n0:775_15: paccayākāradassananti eke. Padesavihārasuttavirodho āpajjati tassa vedanānaṃ paccayadhammamanasikāravibhāvanato.
anya-e0104n0:776_0: Loko samudeti etasmāti lokasamudayo, avijjādiko paccayagaṇo, na lokasamudayamattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:776_1: Tenāha “anulomapaṭiccasamuppādo”ti. Natthitāti sabbaso abhāvo, naranvayavināso ucchedoti
anya-e0104n0:776_2: attho. Natthitāsahacaraṇato pana ucchedadiṭṭhi natthitāti adhippetā. Paccayānuparamo
anya-e0104n0:776_3: paccayānaṃ avicchedo. Yathā hi atītahetupañcakasannissayena etarahiphalapañcakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:776_4: viya hetupañcakampi hoti, evaṃ etarahihetupañcakasannissayena āyatiṃphalapañcakampi
anya-e0104n0:777_0: Taṃ gambhīrattaṃ uppādamatte natthi asabhāvadhammattā. Ekattanayādayo nayā sabhāvadhammesu
anya-e0104n0:777_1: labbhamānato uppādamatte kathañcipi na labbheyyunti āha “nayacatukkaṃ uppādamatte natthī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:778_0: 575. Samāne kattarīti ekasmiṃyeva kattari uppajjanakiriyāya yo kattā, tasmiṃyeva
anya-e0104n0:778_1: paccayanakiriyāya ca kattubhūteti attho. Yathā “nhatvā bhuñjati, bhutvā sayatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:778_2: “Pubbakāle”ti idañca tvāsaddantānaṃ padānaṃ yebhuyyena purimakālakiriyāya dīpanato
anya-e0104n0:778_3: vuttaṃ, na idha paṭiccasaddassa purimakālatthattā. Evañhi “cakkhuṃ paṭiccā”ti nidassanavacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:778_4: nidassitabbena saṃsandeyya. Atha vā kāmañcettha ubhinnaṃ kiriyānaṃ samakālatā uppajjanakiriyāya
anya-e0104n0:778_5: pubbe paccayanakiriyāya asambhavato, tathāpi phalakiriyāya hetukiriyā purimakālo
anya-e0104n0:778_6: viya voharituṃ yuttā. Evamettha hetuphalavavatthānaṃ supākaṭaṃ hotīti upacārasiddhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:778_8: Paṭiccasamuppādoti hi ettha vākyatthāvabodho idha atthasiddhīti adhippeto. Payujjamāno
anya-e0104n0:778_9: paṭiccasaddo uppādasaddena vuccamānassa samānassa “kattu abhāvato”ti padaṃ ānetvā
anya-e0104n0:778_10: yojetabbaṃ. Ayañhettha attho “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādīsu
anya-e0104n0:778_11: paccayanakiriyāya, uppajjanakiriyāya ca viññāṇameva kattāti samānakattukatā labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:779_0: “Paṭiccasamuppādo”ti ettha pana uppādasaddassa bhāvasādhanatāya kiriyāva vuttāti
anya-e0104n0:779_1: samānakattulakkhaṇo saddappayogo na sambhavatīti. Tenāha “saddabhedaṃ gacchatī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:779_2: apasaddappayogo hotīti attho. Na cettha parāvarayogo (pāṇinī 3.4.20) “appatvā nadiṃ
anya-e0104n0:779_3: pabbato, atikkamma pabbataṃ nadī”tiādīsu viya, nāpi lakkhaṇahetuādipayogo “sīhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:779_4: disvā bhayaṃ hoti, ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ jāyate, ‘dha’nti katvā daṇḍo patito”tiādīsu
anya-e0104n0:779_5: viya. Nevettha saddabhedo. Na hi hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbaññeyyaṃ paccakkhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:779_6: katvā ṭhitānaṃ mahesīnaṃ vacane akkharacintakānaṃ vippalāpo avasaraṃ labhati. Labhatu,
anya-e0104n0:779_7: vākyatthena saddasiddhito “nhatvā gamanaṃ, bhutvā sayana”ntiādīsu viyāti. Evampi
anya-e0104n0:779_8: na ca kiñci atthaṃ sādheti. Yadipi paccekaṃ padattho labbhati, vākyattho pana na
anya-e0104n0:779_9: yujjati, tasmā dasadāḷimādivākyāni viya asambandhatthatāya niratthakaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:780_0: Nāmapade vutte appayuttānipi “atthi, hoti, vijjatī”ti evarūpāni kiriyāpadāni ānetvā
anya-e0104n0:780_1: sambandhitabbānīti ñāyaṃ sandhāyāha “hotisaddena saddhiṃ yojayissāmā”ti. Imesūti
anya-e0104n0:780_3: aññesupi “paṭiccasamuppādameva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi kāroti. Yadidaṃ idappaccayatā
anya-e0104n0:780_4: paṭiccasamuppādo. Gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda, paṭiccasamuppādo”ti evamādīsupi ekenapi
anya-e0104n0:780_5: saddhiṃ hoti-saddo sambandhaṃ na gacchati. Yogaṃ na gacchati tathā sambandhavasena
anya-e0104n0:780_6: avuttattā. “Na ca uppādo hotī”ti idaṃ asabhāvadhammattā uppādassa nibbattilakkhaṇāyogaṃ
anya-e0104n0:780_7: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yathā hi vināsassa vināso natthi, evaṃ uppādassa vināso viya uppādopi
anya-e0104n0:780_8: natthi. Yadi siyā, yena uppādena uppādo uppādavā, sopi uppādavāti anavaṭṭhānameva
anya-e0104n0:780_9: āpajjeyyāti vuttovāyamattho. Tenāha “sace heyyā”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ samudayo
anya-e0104n0:780_10: hotīti? Nāyaṃ doso nibbattiyā anadhippetattā. Evaṃ dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo pātubhāvo
anya-e0104n0:780_11: sambhavatīti ayañhettha attho, idha pana paṭiccasamuppādo hotīti tassa atthibhāvacodanāti
anya-e0104n0:780_12: katvā hoti, jāyatīti nibbatticodanā katā siyāti adhippāyena vuttaṃ “na uppādo hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:781_0: 576. Imesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayā idappaccayā, avijjādayo, tesaṃ bhāvo idappaccayatā.
anya-e0104n0:781_1: Ko pana so bhāvoti āha “bhāvo ca nāmā”tiādi. Tassattho – yenākārena avijjādayo saṅkhārādipātubhāvahetū
anya-e0104n0:781_2: honti, tasmiṃ avijjādīnaṃ pavattiākāravisese vikāre paṭiccasamuppādoti ayaṃ samaññāti.
anya-e0104n0:781_3: Tesaṃ vādīnaṃ taṃ maññanaṃ. Hetuvacanatoti hetubhāvavacanato.
anya-e0104n0:782_1: paṭiccasamuppādoti aviparītaṃ atthaṃ ajānantānaṃ aññattha samuppādasaddassa bhāvasādhanassa
anya-e0104n0:782_2: dassanato tathā idhāpi byañjanacchāyāya uppādoyevāyaṃ vutto, na hetūti yā saññā uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:782_3: sā imassa paṭiccasamuppādapadassa evaṃ idāni vuccamānākārena atthaṃ gahetvā vūpasametabbā vinodetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:783_0: Dvedhāti gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yasmā attano paccayavasena pavatto paccayuppannadhammasamūho
anya-e0104n0:783_1: paccetabbato paṭicco ca so saha uppajjanato samuppādo ca, paṭicca vā kāraṇasāmaggiṃ
anya-e0104n0:783_2: apaccakkhāya saha uppajjanato evāti ca evaṃ dvedhā “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:783_3: icchitabbaṃ, tasmā tassa paccayadhammopi phalūpacārena paṭiccasamuppādo icceva vuttoti.
anya-e0104n0:784_0: Paccayatāyāti paccayasamūhato. Pavattoti nibbatto. Dhammasamūhoti paccayuppannadhammapuñjo.
anya-e0104n0:784_1: Patīyamānoti ñāṇagatiyā abhimukhaṃ upeyamāno, abhisamiyamānoti attho. Hitāya sukhāya
anya-e0104n0:784_2: cāti lokuttarahitāya, lokuttarasukhāya ca. Saha uppajjati ekekassa kadācipi uppattiyā
anya-e0104n0:784_3: abhāvato. Sammā uppajjati ahetuto, visamahetuto ca anuppajjanato. Saha uppajjatīti
anya-e0104n0:784_4: ekajjhaṃ uppajjati antamaso aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ uppajjanato. Na paccakkhāyāti apaṭikkhipitvā,
anya-e0104n0:784_5: attano paccayabhūtadhammasamudāyena kenaci na vināti attho. Tassāti yvāyaṃ “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti
anya-e0104n0:784_6: vutto paccayuppannadhammasamūho, tassa ayaṃ avijjādiko hetusamūho. “Tappaccayattā”ti
anya-e0104n0:784_7: etena paṭiccasamuppādapaccaye paṭicca samuppādasamaññāti dasseti. Tenāha “yathā loke”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:784_8: Yathā hi loke “pittaṃ mathitaṃ, sūrā dadhi, tipusaṃ jaro, semho guḷo, āyu ghata”nti
anya-e0104n0:784_9: ca paccayo phalavohārena vuccati, evaṃ phalūpacārena paṭiccasamuppādo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:785_0: 578. Paṭicca-sadde paṭi-saddo abhimukhattho, icca-saddo gammatthoti dassento āha
anya-e0104n0:785_1: “paṭimukhamito”ti. Kassa pana paṭimukhaṃ, kena vā ito, ko vā itoti codanattaye pacchimaṃ
anya-e0104n0:785_2: vissajjento “hetusamūho”ti āha. Tasmiñhi vissaṭṭhe hetusamūho nāma paccayasāmaggīti
anya-e0104n0:785_3: tattha aññamaññassa paṭimukhaṃ, aññamaññeneva ca itoti vissaṭṭhovāyamattho hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:785_4: Sahiteti samudite avinibbhutte. Soti hetusamūho. Samuppādo iti vuttoti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:786_0: Pātubhāvāyāti uppādāya. Kāmaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti avijjāva paccayabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:786_1: vuttā, tathāpi na avijjā ekāva paccayo hoti, atha kho sahajātadhammavatthuārammaṇādayo,
anya-e0104n0:786_2: yonisomanasikārādayo, taṇhupādānādayo ca dhammā yathārahaṃ saṅkhāruppādane avijjāya
anya-e0104n0:786_3: sahakārīkāraṇaṃ hontiyeva. Evaṃ saṅkhārādayopi viññāṇādīnanti āha “avijjādiekekahetusīsena
anya-e0104n0:786_5: hetudhammānaṃ sādhāraṇassa phalassa nibbattakabhāvena. Avekallaṭṭhenāti anūnabhāvena.
anya-e0104n0:786_6: Tasmiñhi hetusamūhe ekaccāsādhāraṇañcetaṃ phalaṃ, ekacceheva ca nibbattetabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0104n0:786_7: sabbesaṃ tesaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ aññamaññāpekkhā natthīti paṭimukhagamanābhāvato paṭiccattho
anya-e0104n0:786_8: na paripūreyyāti. Sāmaggiaṅgānanti paccayasāmaggiyā aṅgabhūtānaṃ, samūhīnanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:786_9: Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Phaladhammānaṃ sahitatā nāma visuṃ abhāvo, na hetudhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:787_0: 579. Paccayatāti ayaṃ avijjādiko paccayasamūho. Aññoññanti aññamaññaṃ. Paṭiccāti
anya-e0104n0:787_1: nissāya sahakārīkāraṇaṃ laddhā. Samanti avisamaṃ avekallena. Sahāti ekajjhaṃ. Dhammeti
anya-e0104n0:787_2: attano paccayuppannadhamme. Yasmā uppādeti, tatopi tasmāpi. Evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādoti
anya-e0104n0:787_3: muninā bhagavatā bhāsitāti yojanā. Na apaṭicca paṭiccevāti avadhāraṇatthaṃ dassento
anya-e0104n0:788_0: Ekekadesanti phalasamudāyassa ekadesekadesaṃ, bhāgasoti attho. Pubbāparabhāvenāti
anya-e0104n0:788_1: paṭipāṭiyā. Sabbametaṃ rūpārūpakalāpuppādanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atthānusāravohārakusalenāti
anya-e0104n0:789_0: 580. Purimena padenāti yojanā. Sassatādīnanti sassatabhāvādīnaṃ, sassatavādādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:789_1: vā. Sassatasahacaritā hi vādāpi sassatādayoti vuccanti yathā “dukkhadesanā dukkha”nti.
anya-e0104n0:789_2: Ucchedādīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Vighāto vināso, pahānanti attho. Ñāyoti antadvayavirahitā majjhimā paṭipatti.
anya-e0104n0:790_1: attā ca loko cā”tiādinayappavatto sassatavādo. “Natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:790_2: saṃkilesāyā”tiādinayappavatto ahetuvādo. Pakati aṇukālādivasena loko pavattatīti
anya-e0104n0:790_3: evaṃ pavatto visamahetuvādo. Issarapurisapajāpativādā vasavattivādā. Ahetuvādaggahaṇeneva
anya-e0104n0:790_4: cettha sabhāvaniyati yadicchāvādānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Keci pana “cakkhu eva cakkhussa
anya-e0104n0:790_5: kāraṇa”nti evamādiko visamahetuvādo. Issarādivādo ahetuvādantogadho. Sabhāveneva
anya-e0104n0:790_6: dhammā pavattantīti vādo “vasavattivādo”ti vadanti. Kiṃ hi paccayasāmaggiyā payojananti
anya-e0104n0:790_7: adhippāyo. Samuppādapadena paridīpito hotīti yojanā. Paridīpanassa pana aviparītakāraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:790_8: dassetuṃ “paccayasāmaggiyaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattito”ti vuttaṃ. Vihatāti abbhāhatā. “Purimapurimapaccayavasenā”ti
anya-e0104n0:790_9: iminā avicchedavasena pavattamānaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhinivattakaṃ hetuphalapabandhaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:790_10: Tenāha “kuto ucchedo”ti. Ucchedābhāvakathaneneva cettha ucchedavādassāpi abhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:791_0: Tassā tassā paccayasāmaggiyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ hetupaccayasamavāye. Santatiṃ avicchinditvāti
anya-e0104n0:791_1: hetuphalapabandhasaṅkhātassa santānassa avicchindanena. Tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:791_2: sambhavato uppajjanato sassatucchedasaṅkhātaṃ antadvayaṃ anupaggamma yathāsakaṃ paccayehi
anya-e0104n0:791_3: anurūpaphaluppatti idha majjhimapaṭipadāti adhippetā. Kammavaṭṭassa, vipākavaṭṭassa
anya-e0104n0:791_4: ca bhinnasabhāvattā, bhinnakālattā ca so karoti so paṭisaṃvedetīti vādappahānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:791_6: Yasmiṃ santāne kammaṃ nibbattaṃ, tattheva tassa phalassa nibbattanato añño karoti
anya-e0104n0:791_7: añño paṭisaṃvedetīti vādappahānaṃ. Na hi katassa vināso, akatassa vā abbhāgamo atthi.
anya-e0104n0:791_8: “Itthī, purisā”ti vohārena janapadanirutti. Tattha yasmā paṇḍitāpi loke “pañcakkhandhe
anya-e0104n0:791_9: ānetu, nāmarūpaṃ āgacchatū”ti avatvā itthī, purisotveva voharanti, tasmā “itthī evāyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:791_10: puriso evāyanti apariññātavatthukānaṃ hoti abhiniveso. Viddasuno pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0104n0:791_11: jānantassa tathā tathā pavattamāne dhamme upādāya paññattimattato tattha paramatthato
anya-e0104n0:791_12: na abhinivesoti āha “janapadaniruttiyā anabhiniveso”ti. Samaññāyāti lokasamaññāya.
anya-e0104n0:791_13: Anatidhāvananti anatikkamanaṃ. “Satto”ti hi vutte “ko ettha satto, kiṃ rūpaṃ, udāhu
anya-e0104n0:791_14: vedanādayo”ti vibhāgaṃ akatvā lokasamaññāvaseneva lokiyehi viya lokiyo attho samaññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:792_0: Aparo nayo – paccetumarahatīti paṭicco. Yo hi naṃ pacceti abhisameti, tassa accantameva
anya-e0104n0:792_1: dukkhavūpasamāya saṃvattati. Sammā, saha ca uppādetīti samuppādo. Paccayadhammo hi
anya-e0104n0:792_2: attano phalaṃ uppādento sampuṇṇameva uppādeti, na vikalaṃ. Ye ca dhamme uppādeti,
anya-e0104n0:792_3: te sabbe saheva uppādeti, na ekekaṃ. Iti paṭicco ca so samuppādo cāti paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0104n0:792_4: Atha vā paṭicca paṭimukhaṃ itvā kāraṇasāmaggiṃ appaṭikkhipitvā sahite uppādetīti
anya-e0104n0:792_5: paṭiccasamuppādo. Paṭimukhagamanañca paccayassa kāraṇasāmaggiyā aṅgabhāvena phalassa
anya-e0104n0:792_6: uppādanameva. Appaṭikkhipitvāti ca na vinā tāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā, aṅgabhāvaṃ agantvā
anya-e0104n0:792_7: sayameva na uppādetīti attho. Etena kāraṇabahutā dassitā, “sahite”ti iminā paccayuppannadhammabahutā.
anya-e0104n0:792_8: Ubhayenāpi “ekaṃ na ekato”tiādinā parato vuccamāno sāsananayo dīpito hoti.
anya-e0104n0:793_0: Atha vā paṭicca paccetabbaṃ paccayaṃ paṭigantvā na vinā tena sambandhassa uppādo
anya-e0104n0:793_2: hetūti veditabbo. Tattha “paṭiccā”ti vutte kiṃ paṭiccāti vattabbanti āha “paccetabba”nti.
anya-e0104n0:793_3: So ca paccayadhammoti katvā vuttaṃ “paccaya”nti. Idāni paṭiccasaddassa atthamāha
anya-e0104n0:793_4: “paṭigantvā”ti. Kāraṇassa sabhāvena tappaṭilābhagatiyā patvā. Kathaṃ na vinā tena?
anya-e0104n0:793_5: Sati eva tasmiṃ, tassa ca phalassa uppādato eva, na aññathā. Asati, nirodhato cāti
anya-e0104n0:793_6: ayaṃ paccayaṭṭhiti paṭiccasaddassa attho. Tenāyaṃ paṭiccasaddo yathā “imasmiṃ sati
anya-e0104n0:793_7: imassuppādo”ti ete saddā bhummanissakkavacanajotanīyena idaṃ-saddavacanīyassa hetumato
anya-e0104n0:793_8: hetuāyattabhāvena bhāvuppāduttarakiriyāpekkhena yāyassa tadāyattatā, tāya samatthatāya
anya-e0104n0:793_9: hetuṃ vadanti, evaṃ gantvā-saddantaravacanīyena taṃviññeyyasseva paccayanakiriyākattuhetumato
anya-e0104n0:793_11: tāya samatthatāya hetumāha. Evañca katvā “avijjā paṭicca, saṅkhārā paṭiccasamuppannā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:793_12: saṅkhārapiṭake vuttaṃ. Samatthatā cettha nidānādibhāvo. So ca tadavinābhāviphalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:793_13: pati satvameva. Sambandhassāti ca saṃyojanānurūpatāvasena jātiādinā sambandhassa
anya-e0104n0:793_14: jarāmaraṇādipaccayuppannassa. Uppādoti uppajjanaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ paṭiccasaddappayogo,
anya-e0104n0:793_15: nanu samānakattukānaṃ pubbakāle īdiso saddappayogoti? “Bhutvā gacchati, kasitvā vapatī”tiādīsu
anya-e0104n0:793_16: saccametaṃ, taṃ pana yebhuyyavasena daṭṭhabbaṃ samānāparakāle, asamānakattuke ca
anya-e0104n0:796: Udāharaṇaṃ. Keci pana “mukhaṃ byādāya sayati, akkhīni parivattetvā passatī”ti udāharanti. Apare “nisajja adhīte, ṭhatvā kathetī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:797_1: atthi, sā ca bhedānupalakkhaṇā kehici na lakkhīyati. “Nisajja adhīte, ṭhatvā kathetī”ti
anya-e0104n0:797_2: ca samānakālatāyapi ajjhenakathanehi pubbepi nisajjaṭṭhānāni hontīti sakkā pubbuttarakālatā
anya-e0104n0:797_3: sambhāvetuṃ, tasmā purimāniyeva udāharaṇāni yuttāni. Udayasamakālameva hi tannivattaniyanivattananti.
anya-e0104n0:797_4: Aparakāle “dvāramāvaritvā pavisati, āvaritvā nikkhamatī”ti. Keci pana “ḍakkacca patito
anya-e0104n0:797_5: daṇḍo”ti udāharanti. Abhighātabhūtasahajātāya pana abhighātajasaddassa samānakālatā
anya-e0104n0:797_6: ettha labbhati, tasmā idhāpi purimāniyeva udāharaṇāni yuttāni. Purimatāvacanicchāvaseneva
anya-e0104n0:797_8: icceva “nihantvānā”ti saddasiddhi icchitā, evañca paccayanakiriyā samuppajjanakiriyāya
anya-e0104n0:797_9: purimikāvāti paṭicca-saddasiddhi. Tattha yuttaṃ paccakkhato kattudassanato. Idha
anya-e0104n0:797_10: pana tadabhāvato na yuttanti ce? Nāyaṃ doso. Idhāpi anumānato siddho. Jarāmaraṇādiko
anya-e0104n0:797_11: kattā attheva “ñatvā kiriyato vaya”nti evamādipayogadassanato avassaṃ anumiyamānena
anya-e0104n0:797_12: kattunā īdiso saddapayogo icchitabbo. Asamāne pana kattari “pisācaṃ disvā bhayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:797_13: hoti, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”ti evamādi veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca
anya-e0104n0:797_14: tattha pisācadassanādipurisabyāpāro, evamidhāpi paccayanaṃ paccayabyāpāro attano
anya-e0104n0:797_15: phaluppādanaṃ, tañca satvaṃ samuppādovāti “paccaye sati, paccayassa uppādā”ti paccayanassa
anya-e0104n0:797_16: samuppādahetutāya gamako samānassa kattu abhāvepi paṭicca-saddo siddhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:797_17: Yadi paṭiccasambandhassa uppādo paṭiccasamuppādo, kathaṃ paccayo paṭiccasamuppādoti?
anya-e0104n0:797_18: Heṭṭhā vicāritovāyamattho. Apica yoyaṃ samuppāda-saddavibhāvitānaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:797_19: paṭiccasaddavibhāvito sasattiko hetu adhippeto, tassa samuppādābhimukhatāya padhānavacanaviññeyyasabhāvattā tathā vuttoti.
anya-e0104n0:798_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ samuppādapadhānena vacanena samuppādassa hetu veditabbo, na pana
anya-e0104n0:798_1: sahetuko samuppādo evāti? Vuccate – diṭṭhassa dukkhassa yo paccayo paccayaniddesena
anya-e0104n0:799_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivīmaṃsamāno parivīmaṃsati ‘yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:799_1: nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṃ, idaṃ nu kho dukkhaṃ kiṃ nidānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:799_2: kiṃ samudayaṃ kiṃ jātikaṃ kiṃ pabhavaṃ, kismiṃ sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kismiṃ asati
anya-e0104n0:799_3: jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī’ti. So parivīmaṃsamāno evaṃ pajānāti ‘yaṃ kho idaṃ…pe… idaṃ kho
anya-e0104n0:800: Diṭṭhassa dukkhassa nidānaṃ parivīmaṃsasutte vuttaṃ. Taṃ pajānanañca nidānampi viññātabbanti. Yathā cāha –
anya-e0104n0:801_0: “Pubbe me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi
anya-e0104n0:801_1: ‘kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca,
anya-e0104n0:801_2: atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa. Kudāssu nāma imassa
anya-e0104n0:801_3: dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā’ti…pe… tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso
anya-e0104n0:801_4: manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo ‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”’nti –
anya-e0104n0:802_0: Ādinā diṭṭhassa dukkhassa paccayavīmaṃsābhisamayā vuttā. Paccayo hi ñātabbo. Tadabhisamayāyattañca
anya-e0104n0:802_1: dukkhanissaraṇapajānananti yo ca ñātabbo, so pavedetabboti paṭiccasamuppādasaddo
anya-e0104n0:802_2: yaṃ yadidaṃ samuppādasaddavibhāvitaṃ diṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ paccayaṃ paṭicceva, na
anya-e0104n0:802_3: aññathāti evaṃ paccayavibhāvanatthaṃ vuccati. Bhavati hi ñātuṃ, pavedetuñca icchitabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:802_4: padhānassāpi kenaci visesena ñātabbatāya appadhānabhāvena niddeso yathā “ko sotāpanno,
anya-e0104n0:802_5: yassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīnāni. Ko devadatto, yassa uccatarāni gehānī”ti, evamidhāpi
anya-e0104n0:802_6: paccayapaccayanapavedanaṭṭhena niddese sattivisesena attano phalena paccanīyatāya
anya-e0104n0:803_0: Yo cāyaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādiko niddeso, so ca sakalassa dukkhakkhandhassa
anya-e0104n0:803_1: mūlato paṭṭhāya paccayānaṃ pavedanāya niddiṭṭhoti pariyosānepi “evametassa kevalassa
anya-e0104n0:803_2: dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti evaṃ-saddena samugghātaṃ dukkhaṃ dassetvā tassa
anya-e0104n0:803_3: yathāvutte paccaye taṃsamudayābhimukhe katvā nigamitā paccayā. Paṭipadāsuttepi “avijjāpaccayā…pe…
anya-e0104n0:803_4: samudayo hotī”ti vatvā “ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, micchāpaṭipadā”ti vuttaṃ. Na ca
anya-e0104n0:803_5: paṭiccasamuppannabhāvena gahitaṃ dukkhaṃ micchāpaṭipadaṃ, atha kho dukkhasamudayabhūtā
anya-e0104n0:803_6: paccayāti. Yathā ca “pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi, pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhī”ti aṅgañāṇapaṭivedanatthattā
anya-e0104n0:803_7: desanāya sammāsamādhipadhānehi saddehi aṅgañāṇapaṭivedanaṃ kataṃ, evamidhāpi samuppādapadhānena
anya-e0104n0:804_0: 581. Yā panāyaṃ tantīti sambandho. Nikkhittāti ṭhapitā, desitāti attho. Yathādhippetassa
anya-e0104n0:804_1: atthassa tananato tanti, gantho. “Kiṃ vādī, bhante, sammāsambuddho”ti pucchitena
anya-e0104n0:804_3: vibhajjavādino. Te hi satthārā venayikādibhāvaṃ vibhajja vuttaṃ anuvadanti, somanassādīnaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:804_4: cīvarādīnañca sevitabbāsevitabbabhāvaṃ. Sassatucchedavāde vā vibhajja vadanti. “Sassato
anya-e0104n0:804_5: attā ca loko cā”tiādīnaṃ ṭhapanīyānaṃ ṭhapanato, rāgādikkhayassa sassatassa, rāgādikāyaduccaritādiucchedassa
anya-e0104n0:804_6: ca vacanato, na pana ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyādike tayo pañhe apanetvā vibhajjabyākaraṇīyameva
anya-e0104n0:804_7: vadanti. Vibhajjavādīnaṃ maṇḍalaṃ samūho vibhajjavādimaṇḍalaṃ. Vibhajjavādino vā
anya-e0104n0:804_8: bhagavato parisā vibhajjavādimaṇḍalantipi vadanti, vibhajja vā sassatucchede ubho
anya-e0104n0:804_9: ante anupagamma majjhimapaṭipadābhūtassa paṭiccasamuppādassa desanato bhagavā, tadanuvādato
anya-e0104n0:804_10: tassa sāvakā ca vibhajjavādinoti. Sesaṃ purimasadisaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:805_0: Otaritvāti ogāhetvā, vibhajjavādī hutvāti attho. Na hi sayaṃ avibhajjavādī samāno
anya-e0104n0:805_1: vibhajjavādīnaṃ antare ṭhānamattena vibhajjavādimaṇḍalaṃ otiṇṇo nāma hoti. Ācariyehi
anya-e0104n0:805_3: hetu paccayo hotīti vadanto, kathāvatthumhi paṭikkhitte puggalavādādike ca vadanto
anya-e0104n0:805_4: sakasamayaṃ vokkamati nāma, tathā avokkamantena. Parasamayaṃ dosāropanabyāpāravirahena
anya-e0104n0:805_5: anāyūhantena. “Idampi suttaṃ gahetabba”nti parasamayaṃ asampiṇḍentenāti keci vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:805_6: “Tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati
anya-e0104n0:805_7: saṃsarati anañña”ntiādīni vadanto suttaṃ paṭibāhati nāma, tathā apaṭibāhantena. “Tathāhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:805_8: bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
anya-e0104n0:805_9: te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāya, supinante kato vītikkamo āpattikaro hotī”ti ca evamādiṃ
anya-e0104n0:805_10: vadanto vinayaṃ paṭilometi nāma, tabbipariyāyena taṃ anulomentena. Paṭilomento hi
anya-e0104n0:805_11: kammantaraṃ bhindanto, dhammatañca vilomento kuto kilesavinayaṃ anulometi. Sutte
anya-e0104n0:805_13: olokentena. Tadolokanena hi sutte, vinaye ca santiṭṭhati nātidhāvati.
anya-e0104n0:806_0: Dhammanti paṭiccasamuppādapāḷiṃ. Atthanti tadatthaṃ. Hetu, hetuphalāni vā ayamettha
anya-e0104n0:806_1: hetu dhammo, idamettha hetuphalaṃ atthoti. Dhammanti vā dhammataṃ. Yathā eke “uppādā
anya-e0104n0:806_2: vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātū”ti suttapadassa atthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:806_3: micchā gāhentā “nicco paṭiccasamuppādo”ti paccayākāradhammaṃ micchā dīpenti, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:806_4: adīpetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attano phalaṃ pati kāraṇassa vavatthitasabhāvaṃ dīpentena.
anya-e0104n0:806_5: Yathā ca eke “anirodhaṃ anuppāda”ntiādinā paṭiccasamuppādassa atthaṃ micchā gāhenti,
anya-e0104n0:806_6: evaṃ gāhe akatvā vuttanayeneva aviparītaṃ atthaṃ saṅgāhentena. “Dukkhādīsu aññāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:806_7: avijjā”ti vuttamatthaṃ parivattetvā puna “pubbante aññāṇa”ntiādīhi aparehipi pariyāyehi
anya-e0104n0:806_8: niddisantena. “Saṅkhārā iminā pariyāyena bhavoti vuccanti, taṇhā iminā pariyāyena
anya-e0104n0:806_9: upādāna”ntiādinā niddisantenāti ca vadanti. Pakatiyāti yathāvuttavidhānaṃ anāmasitvā kevalameva.
anya-e0104n0:807_0: Saccanti catusaccaṃ. Sattoti sattasuññatāti vadanti, sattasuññesu pana saṅkhāresu
anya-e0104n0:807_1: sattavohāro, sattatthakiccasiddhi ca. Paccayākārameva cāti paccayākāro eva ca, ma-kāro
anya-e0104n0:807_2: padasandhikaro. Paccayadhammānaṃ attanoyeva phalassa paccayabhāvo paṭiccasamuppādoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:808_0: Tasmāti vuttanayena atthavaṇṇanāya kātabbattā, dukkarattā ca patiṭṭhaṃ nādhigacchāmīti
anya-e0104n0:808_1: yattha ṭhitassa vaṇṇanā sukarā hoti, tassā patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ taṃ nayaṃ attanoyeva ñāṇabalena
anya-e0104n0:808_2: nādhigacchāmīti attho. Nissayaṃ pana ācikkhanto “sāsanaṃ panida”ntiādimāha. Idha
anya-e0104n0:808_3: sāsananti pāḷidhammamāha, paṭiccasamuppādameva vā. So hi anulomapaṭilomādinānādesanānayapaṭimaṇḍito
anya-e0104n0:808_4: abbocchinno ajjāpi pavattatīti nissayo hoti. Tadaṭṭhakathāsaṅkhāto ca pubbācariyamaggo.
anya-e0104n0:808_5: “Taṃ suṇātha samāhitā”ti ādarajanane, ussāhane ca kiṃ payojananti ce, taṃ dassento
anya-e0104n0:808_6: āha “vuttañheta”ntiādi. Aṭṭhi katvāti atthaṃ katvā. Yathā vā na nassati, evaṃ aṭṭhigataṃ
anya-e0104n0:808_7: viya karonto aṭṭhiṃ katvā. Pubbakālato aparakāle bhavaṃ pubbāpariyaṃ. Visesanti paṭhamārambhato
anya-e0104n0:808_8: pabhuti khaṇe khaṇe ñāṇavisesaṃ, kilesakkhayavisesañca labhatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:809: 582. Desanābhedatoti desanāvisesato. Atthato, lakkhaṇādito, ekavidhādito ca atthalakkhaṇekavidhādito. Aṅgānañca vavatthānāti avijjādīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vavatthānadassanato.
anya-e0104n0:810_0: Kammavipākakilesavaṭṭānaṃ mūlakāraṇattā, ādito vuttattā ca avijjā paṭiccasamuppādassa
anya-e0104n0:810_1: mūlaṃ. Tattha valliyā mūle diṭṭhe tato pabhuti valliharaṇaṃ viya paṭiccasamuppādassa
anya-e0104n0:810_2: mūle diṭṭhe tato pabhuti paṭiccasamuppādadesanāti upamāsaṃsandanā na kātabbā. Na
anya-e0104n0:810_3: hi bhagavato idameva diṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ adiṭṭhanti vibhajanīyaṃ atthi sabbassa diṭṭhattā.
anya-e0104n0:810_4: Mūlato pabhuti pana valliharaṇaṃ viya mūlato pabhuti paṭiccasamuppādadesanā katāti
anya-e0104n0:810_5: idamettha sāmaññaṃ adhippetaṃ, bodhaneyyajjhāsayavasena vā bodhetabbabhāvena mūlādidassanasāmaññaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:812_0: “Sa kho so, bhikkhave, kumāro vuddhimanvāya indriyānaṃ paripākamanvāya pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
anya-e0104n0:812_1: samappito…pe… rajanīyehi. So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā piyarūpe rūpe sārajjati, appiyarūpe
anya-e0104n0:812_2: rūpe byāpajjati, anupaṭṭhitakāyasati ca viharati parittacetaso, tañca cetovimuttiṃ
anya-e0104n0:812_3: paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, yatthassa te pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā
anya-e0104n0:812_4: nirujjhanti. So evaṃ anurodhavirodhaṃ samāpanno yaṃ kiñci vedanaṃ vedeti sukhaṃ vā
anya-e0104n0:812_5: dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, so taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandati abhivadati, ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatī”ti –
anya-e0104n0:813_0: Evaṃ vuttassa. Evaṃ sotadvārādīsupi. Tassa abhinandatoti sappītikataṇhāya abhimukhabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:813_1: nandato. Abhivadatoti “aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”nti vacībhedakaraṇapavattāya balavataṇhāya
anya-e0104n0:813_2: “ahaṃ, mamā”ti abhivadato. Tato balavatiyā mocetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato.
anya-e0104n0:813_3: Tatopi balavatī pana upādānabhūtā taṇhā nandī. Ettha ca abhinandanādinā taṇhā vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:813_4: nandivacanena tappaccayaṃ upādānaṃ catubbidhampi nanditātadavippayogatāhi, taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanabhāvehi cāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:815_1: āhārā taṇhānidānā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vaṭṭūpathambhakā pana itarepi āhārā taṇhāpabhave
anya-e0104n0:815_2: tasmiṃ avijjamāne na vijjantīti “taṇhānidānā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭanti.
anya-e0104n0:816_0: 583. Tato tatoti catubbidhāsu desanāsu tato tato desanato. Ñāyappaṭivedhāya saṃvattatīti
anya-e0104n0:816_1: ñāyoti maggo, so eva vā paṭiccasamuppādo “ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hotī”ti
anya-e0104n0:816_2: vacanato. Sayameva hi so samantabhaddakattā tathā tathā paṭivijjhitabbattā tāya tāya
anya-e0104n0:816_3: desanāya attano paṭivedhāya saṃvattati. Catubbidhagambhīrabhāvappattiyāti dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhagambhīresu
anya-e0104n0:817_0: Samantabhaddakatā, desanāvilāsappatti ca catunnampi desanānaṃ samānaṃ kāraṇanti visesakāraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:817_1: vattukāmo āha “visesato”ti. Assāti assa bhagavato desanā, assa vā paṭiccasamuppādassa
anya-e0104n0:817_2: desanāti yojetabbaṃ. Pavattikāraṇavibhāgo avibhattasabhāvā avijjādayova, kāraṇanti
anya-e0104n0:817_3: vā gahitānaṃ pakatiādīnaṃ, avijjādīnañca akāraṇatā, kāraṇatā ca. Tattha sammūḷhā
anya-e0104n0:817_4: keci akāraṇaṃ kāraṇanti gaṇhanti, keci na kiñci kāraṇaṃ bujjhantīti tesaṃ yathāsakehi
anya-e0104n0:817_6: attho. Pavattiādīnavapaṭicchādikā avijjā ādi, tato saṅkhārā uppajjanti, tato viññāṇanti
anya-e0104n0:817_7: evaṃ pavattiyā uppattikkamasandassanatthaṃ, gabbhaseyyakādivasena vā tattha tattha
anya-e0104n0:817_8: bhave attabhāvassa uppajjanānupubbisandassanatthañca anulomadesanā pavattāti. Itarāsaṃ
anya-e0104n0:817_9: tadatthatāsambhavepi na tāsaṃ tadatthameva pavatti atthantarasabbhāvato. Ayaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:818_0: Anuvilokayato yo sambodhito pubbabhāge taṃtaṃpaccayuppannāvabodhasaṅkhāto pubbabhāgapaṭivedho
anya-e0104n0:818_1: pavatto, tadanusārena tadanugamena jarāmaraṇādikassa jātiādikāraṇaṃ yaṃ adhigataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:818_2: tassa sandassanatthaṃ ayaṃ paṭilomadesanā pavattā. Anuvilokayato paṭilomadesanā pavattāti
anya-e0104n0:818_3: vā sambandho. Desentopi hi bhagavā kicchāpannaṃ lokaṃ anuviloketvā pubbabhāga…pe…
anya-e0104n0:818_4: sandassanatthaṃ desesīti. Āhārataṇhādayo paccuppannaddhā, saṅkhārāvijjā atītaddhāti
anya-e0104n0:818_5: iminā adhippāyenāha “yāva atītaṃ addhānaṃ atiharitvā”ti. Āhārā vā taṇhāya pabhāvetabbā
anya-e0104n0:818_6: anāgato addhā, taṇhādayo paccuppanno, saṅkhārāvijjā atītoti. Paccakkhaṃ pana phalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:818_7: dassetvā tannidānadassanavasena phalakāraṇaparamparadassanaṃ yujjatīti āhārā purimataṇhāya
anya-e0104n0:818_8: uppāditā paccuppanno addhā, taṇhādayo atīto, saṅkhārāvijjā tatopi atītataro saṃsārassa
anya-e0104n0:818_9: anādibhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttoti. Yāva atītaddhānanti yāva atītataraṃ addhānanti attho
anya-e0104n0:818_10: yuttoti. Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiāhārakā vā cattāro āhārā “āhāretītāhaṃ na vadāmi…pe…
anya-e0104n0:818_11: evaṃ pana maṃ avadantaṃ yo evaṃ puccheyya ‘kissa nu kho, bhante, viññāṇāhāro’ti,
anya-e0104n0:818_12: esa kallo pañho, tatra kallaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ, viññāṇāhāro āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā”ti
anya-e0104n0:818_13: vacanato, taṃsampayuttattā phassacetanānaṃ, tappavattihetuttā ca kabaḷīkārāhārassa.
anya-e0104n0:818_14: Tena hi upatthambhitarūpakāyassa, tañca icchantassa kāmaviññāṇāyūhanaṃ hoti. Bhojanañhi
anya-e0104n0:818_15: saddhādīnaṃ, rāgādīnañca upanissayoti vuttaṃ. Tasmā te kammavaṭṭasaṅgahitā āhārā
anya-e0104n0:818_16: paccuppanno addhāti imasmiṃ pariyāye purimoyeva attho yutto.
anya-e0104n0:819_0: Atītaddhato pabhuti “iti kho, bhikkhave, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā atīte, tato
anya-e0104n0:819_1: parañca hetuphalapaṭipāṭiṃ paccakkhabhūtānaṃ āhārānaṃ nidānadassanavasena ārohitvā
anya-e0104n0:819_2: nivattanena vinā abujjhantānaṃ taṃsandassanatthaṃ sā ayaṃ desanā pavattāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:819_3: Anāgataddhahetusamuṭṭhānato pabhutīti anāgatassa bhavassa hetubhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:819_5: apassantānaṃ paccakkhaṃ paccuppannaṃ hetuṃ dassetvā hetuphalaparamparāya tassa sandassanatthanti
anya-e0104n0:819_6: attho. Ettha ca ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā, pariyosānato ca paṭṭhāya yāva ādi
anya-e0104n0:819_7: pavattā desanā dvādasaṅgā, tato eva tisandhi catusaṅkhepā. Majjhato paṭṭhāya yāva
anya-e0104n0:819_8: ādi pavattā desanā aṭṭhaṅgā dvisandhi tisaṅkhepā. Majjhato pana paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā
anya-e0104n0:819_9: pavattā desanā chaḷaṅgā dvisandhi tisaṅkhepā. “Saṃyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu
anya-e0104n0:819_10: assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati, taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”ntiādinā majjhato
anya-e0104n0:819_11: paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā pavattā desanā ekasandhi dvisaṅkhepā. Evaṃ ayaṃ anekaṅgā
anya-e0104n0:819_12: eva paṭiccasamuppādadesanā āgatā. Ekaṅgavasenāpi ca paṭiccasamuppādadesanā labbhateva. Yathāha –
anya-e0104n0:820_0: “Tatra, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaṃyeva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi
anya-e0104n0:820_1: karoti ‘iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati. Imasmiṃ asati idaṃ
anya-e0104n0:820_2: na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī’ti. Sukhavedaniyaṃ, bhikkhave, phassaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0104n0:821: Ādi. Ettha hi “phassapaccayā”ti ettako eva paṭiccasamuppādo vutto. Tenetaṃ viññāyati “ekaṅgapaṭiccasamuppādo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:822_0: Tattha imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye sati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:822_1: phalaṃ hoti. Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa uppādā
anya-e0104n0:822_2: idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ uppajjatīti attho. Imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā
anya-e0104n0:822_3: idaṃ nirujjhatīti avijjādīnaṃ abhāve saṅkhārādīnaṃ abhāvassa, avijjādīnaṃ nirodhā
anya-e0104n0:822_4: saṅkhārādīnaṃ nirodhassa ca vacanena purimasmiṃ paccayalakkhaṇe niyamo dassito hoti
anya-e0104n0:822_5: “imasmiṃ sati eva, na asati, imassa uppādā eva, na nirodhā”ti. Tenetaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:823_0: Nirodhoti ca avijjādīnaṃ virāgādhigamena āyatiṃ anuppādo appavatti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:823_1: “avijjāyatveva asesavirāganirodhā”tiādi. Nirodhavirodhī ca uppādo, yena so uppādavirodhibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:823_2: vutto “imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti, tenetaṃ dasseti “anirodho uppādo nāma,
anya-e0104n0:823_3: so cettha atthibhāvotipi vuccatī”ti. “Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti idameva hi lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:823_4: pariyāyantarena “imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti vadantena parena purimaṃ visesitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:823_5: hoti, tasmā na dharamānataṃyeva sandhāya “imasmiṃ satī”ti vuttaṃ, atha kho maggena
anya-e0104n0:823_6: aniruddhabhāvañcāti viññāyati. Yasmā ca “imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā
anya-e0104n0:823_7: idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti dvidhāpi uddiṭṭhalakkhaṇassa nirodhassa niddesaṃ vadantena “avijjāyatveva
anya-e0104n0:823_8: asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādinā nirodho eva vutto, tasmā natthibhāvopi
anya-e0104n0:823_9: nirodho evāti natthibhāvaviruddho atthibhāvo anirodhoti dassitaṃ hoti. Tena anirodhasaṅkhātena
anya-e0104n0:823_10: atthibhāvena uppādaṃ viseseti. Tato na idha attalābhamattaṃ uppādoti adhippeto, atha
anya-e0104n0:823_11: kho anirodhasaṅkhāto atthibhāvo cāti ayamattho vibhāvitoti evametaṃ lakkhaṇadvayavacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:824_0: Ko panāyaṃ anirodho nāma, yo atthibhāvo, uppādoti ca vuccatīti? Appahīnabhāvo, anibbattitaphalatāppahīnārahatāhi
anya-e0104n0:824_1: phaluppādanārahatā ca. Ye tehi pahātabbā akusalā dhammā, tesaṃ ariyamaggena asamugghātitabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:824_2: ye pana na pahātabbā kusalābyākatā dhammā, yāni tesu saṃyojanāni akhīṇāsavānaṃ, tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:824_3: aparikkhīṇatā ca. Asamugghātitānusayatāya hi sasaṃyojanākhandhappavatti paṭiccasamuppādo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
anya-e0104n0:825_0: “Yāya ca, bhikkhave, avijjāya nivutassa bālassa, yāya ca taṇhāya sampayuttassa ayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:825_1: kāyo samudāgato, sā ceva avijjā bālassa appahīnā, sā ca taṇhā aparikkhīṇā. Taṃ kissa
anya-e0104n0:825_2: hetu? Na, bhikkhave, bālo acari brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhakkhayāya, tasmā bālo kāyassa
anya-e0104n0:825_3: bhedā kāyūpago hoti, so kāyūpago samāno na parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇenā”ti –
anya-e0104n0:826: Ādi. Khīṇasaṃyojanānaṃ pana avijjāya abhāvato saṅkhārānaṃ, taṇhupādānānaṃ abhāvato upādānabhavānaṃ na sambhavoti vaṭṭassa upacchedo paññāyati. Tenevāha –
anya-e0104n0:827: “Channantveva, phagguna, phassāyatanānaṃ asesavirāganirodhā phassanirodho, phassanirodhā vedanānirodho”ti –
anya-e0104n0:828_0: Ādi. Na hi aggamaggādhigamato uddhaṃ yāva parinibbānā saḷāyatanādīnaṃ appavatti,
anya-e0104n0:828_1: atha kho natthitā, nirodhasaddavacanīyatā, khīṇasaṃyojanatāti nirodho vutto. Apica
anya-e0104n0:828_2: cirakatampi kammaṃ anibbattitaphalatāya, appahīnārahatāya ca phalārahaṃ santaṃ eva
anya-e0104n0:828_3: nāma hoti, na nibbattitaphalaṃ, nāpi pahīnārahanti phaluppattipaccayānaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:828_4: vuttanayena phalārahabhāvo anirodhoti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ aniruddhabhāveneva hi yena
anya-e0104n0:828_5: vinā phalaṃ na sambhavati, taṃ kāraṇaṃ atītādipi “imasmiṃ satī”ti iminā vacanena
anya-e0104n0:828_6: vuttaṃ. Tato eva ca avusitabrahmacariyassa appavattidhammataṃ anāpanno paccayuppādo
anya-e0104n0:828_7: kālabhedaṃ anāmasitvā anivattitāya eva “imassuppādā”ti vutto. Atha vā avasesapaccayasamavāye
anya-e0104n0:828_8: avijjamānassāpi vijjamānassa viya pageva vijjamānassa yā phaluppattiabhimukhatā,
anya-e0104n0:828_9: sā “imassuppādā”ti vuttā. Tadā hi tato phalaṃ uppajjatīti tadavatthaṃ kāraṇaṃ phalassa
anya-e0104n0:828_10: uppādanabhāvena upaṭṭhitaṃ uppatitaṃ nāma hoti, na vijjamānampi atadavatthanti tadavatthatā uppādoti veditabbā.
