anya-e0104n0:829_0: Tattha “satī”ti iminā vijjamānatāmattena paccayabhāvaṃ vadanto abyāpārataṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa
anya-e0104n0:829_2: dīpento aniccataṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa dasseti. “Sati, na asati, uppādā, na nirodhā”ti
anya-e0104n0:829_4: paṭiccasamuppādassa dasseti. Hetuatthatā cettha bhummavacane yassa bhāvena tadavinābhāviphalassa
anya-e0104n0:829_5: bhāvo lakkhīyati, tattha pavattiyā veditabbā, yathā adhanānaṃ dhane ananuppadīyamāne
anya-e0104n0:829_6: dāliddiyaṃ vepullamagamāsi, nipphanne sasse subhikkhaṃ jāyatīti ca. Nissakkavacanassāpi
anya-e0104n0:829_7: hetuatthatā phalassa pabhave pakatiyañca pavattiyā, yathā “kalalā hoti abbudaṃ, abbudā
anya-e0104n0:829_8: jāyate pesī”ti, “himavatā gaṅgā pabhavati, siṅgato saro jāyatī”ti ca. Avijjādibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:829_9: ca tadavinābhāvisaṅkhārādibhāvo lakkhīyati, avijjādīhi ca saṅkhārādayo pabhavanti,
anya-e0104n0:829_10: pakarīyanti cāti tesaṃ pabhavo, pakati ca, tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ “imasmiṃ sati
anya-e0104n0:830_0: Yasmā cettha “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti saṅkhepena uddiṭṭhassa
anya-e0104n0:830_1: paṭiccasamuppādassa “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādiko niddeso, tasmā yathāvutto atthibhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:830_2: uppādo ca tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvoti viññāyati. Na hi aniruddhatāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:830_4: na asati, uppādā eva, na nirodhā”ti antogadhaniyamehi vacanehi pakāsitaṃ muñcitvā
anya-e0104n0:830_5: añño paccayabhāvo nāma atthi, tasmā yathāvutto atthibhāvo, uppādo ca paccayabhāvoti
anya-e0104n0:830_6: veditabbo. Yepi hi paṭṭhāne āgatā hetuādayo catuvīsati paccayā, tepi etasseva paccayabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:830_9: ca pakāsito kāraṇattho, sopi ettheva antogadhoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:831_0: 584. Mūlakāraṇasaddaṃ apekkhitvā na akāraṇanti napuṃsakaniddeso, akāraṇāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:831_1: Akāraṇaṃ yadi siyā, suttaṃ paṭibāhitaṃ siyāti dassento “āsavasamudayā”ti suttaṃ āharati.
anya-e0104n0:831_2: Pariyāyo kāraṇaṃ. Vaṭṭakathāya sīsabhāvo vaṭṭahetuno kammassāpi hetubhāvo. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:831_3: bhavataṇhāyapi hetubhūtā avijjā, tāya paṭicchāditādīnave bhave taṇhāya uppajjanato
anya-e0104n0:832_0: Purimāya koṭiyā apaññāyamānāya uppādavirahato niccataṃ gaṇheyyāti āha “evaṃ cetaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:832_1: bhikkhave, vuccatī”tiādi. Tena ito pubbe uppannapubbatā natthīti apaññāyanato purimakoṭiapaññāyanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:833_1: Pūjitassa hi dvande pubbanipāto. Savarā kira maṃsassa aṭṭhinā alagganatthaṃ punappunaṃ
anya-e0104n0:833_2: tāpetvā koṭṭetvā uṇhodakaṃ pāyetvā virittaṃ sūnaṃ aṭṭhito muttamaṃsaṃ gāviṃ mārenti.
anya-e0104n0:833_3: Tenāha “aggisantāpā”tiādi. Tattha yathā vajjhagāvī ca avijjābhibhūtatāya yathāvuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:833_4: uṇhodakapānaṃ ārabhati, evaṃ puthujjano yathāvuttaṃ duggatigāmikammaṃ. Yathā pana
anya-e0104n0:833_5: sā uṇhodakapāne ādīnavaṃ disvā taṇhāvasena sītudakapānaṃ ārabhati, evaṃ puthujjano
anya-e0104n0:833_6: avijjāya nātibalavabhāvato duggatigāmikamme ādīnavaṃ disvā taṇhāvasena sugatigāmikammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:833_7: ārabhati. Dukkhe hi avijjaṃ taṇhā anuvattati, sukhe taṇhaṃ avijjāti.
anya-e0104n0:834_0: 586. Katthaci sutte. Ekadhammamūlikaṃ desananti avijjātaṇhāsu ekoyeva dhammo mūlaṃ
anya-e0104n0:834_1: etissāti ekadhammamūlikā, taṃ, tattha ekaṃ eva dhammaṃ mūlaṃ katvā paṭiccasamuppādadesanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:834_2: desetīti attho. Upanisīdati phalaṃ etthāti upanisā, kāraṇaṃ, avijjā upanisā etesanti
anya-e0104n0:834_3: avijjūpanisā. Assādānupassinoti upādāniyesu tebhūmakadhammesu visayabhūtesu assādetabbato
anya-e0104n0:834_5: bālassa. Evanti avijjānivutattā, taṇhāsaṃyuttattā ca. Ayaṃ kāyoti ayaṃ mamañceva
anya-e0104n0:834_7: vacanato phassakāraṇañcetaṃ vuccatīti āyatanacchakkaṃ vā. Samudāgatoti uppanno. Bahiddhā
anya-e0104n0:834_8: ca nāmarūpanti bahiddhā saviññāṇakakāyo khandhapañcakaṃ, saḷāyatanāni vā. Itthetanti
anya-e0104n0:834_9: itthaṃ etaṃ. Attano ca paresañca pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni dvārālambanabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:834_10: vavatthitāni dvayaṃ nāmāti attho. Dvayaṃ paṭicca phassoti aññattha cakkhurūpādīni
anya-e0104n0:834_11: dvayāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā, idha pana ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni,
anya-e0104n0:834_12: mahādvayaṃ nāma kiretanti vuttaṃ. Ayamettha adhippāyo – aññattha “cakkhuñca paṭicca
anya-e0104n0:834_13: rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”tiādinā cakkhu ceva rūpā
anya-e0104n0:834_14: ca…pe… mano ceva dhammā cāti vuttāni dvayāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā. Idha
anya-e0104n0:834_15: pana “ayañceva kāyo”ti cakkhādinissaye sesadhamme cakkhādinissite eva katvā vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:834_16: cakkhādikāyaṃ ekattena “ajjhattikāyatana”nti gahetvā, “bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:834_17: rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ekatteneva “bāhirāyatana”nti tāni ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni paṭicca
anya-e0104n0:835_0: Evañca katvā attano ca parassa ca pañcahi khandhehi, chahi āyatanehi cāti ayamattho
anya-e0104n0:835_1: dīpetabbovāti vuttaṃ. “Ayaṃ kāyo”ti hi vuttāni sanissayāni cakkhādīni attano pañcakkhandhā,
anya-e0104n0:835_2: “bahiddhā nāmarūpa”nti vuttāni rūpādīni paresaṃ. Tathā ayaṃ kāyo attano cha ajjhattikāni
anya-e0104n0:835_3: āyatanāni, bahiddhā nāmarūpaṃ paresaṃ bāhirānīti. Aññathā ajjhattikāyatanamatte eva
anya-e0104n0:835_4: “ayaṃ kāyo”ti vuttena ajjhattikāyatanāneva attano pañcakkhandhā hontīti attano ca
anya-e0104n0:835_5: paresañca pañcahi khandhehi dīpanā na sambhaveyyāti. Saḷevāyatanānīti saḷeva phassakāraṇāni,
anya-e0104n0:835_6: yehi kāraṇabhūtehi āyatanehi uppannena phassena phuṭṭho bālo sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
anya-e0104n0:835_7: Ādi-saddena “etesaṃ vā aññatarena. Avijjānīvaraṇassa, bhikkhave, paṇḍitassa taṇhāya
anya-e0104n0:835_8: sampayuttassā”tiādi yojetabbaṃ. Imasmiñhi sutte saṅkhāre avijjātaṇhānissite eva katvā
anya-e0104n0:835_9: kāyaggahaṇena viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanāni gahetvā tasmiṃ kāye saḷāyatanānaṃ phassaṃ
anya-e0104n0:835_10: taṃnissitameva katvā vedanāya visesapaccayabhāvaṃ dassentena bhagavatā bālapaṇḍitānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:835_11: atītaddhāvijjātaṇhāmūlako vedanānto paṭiccasamuppādo dassito. Puna ca bālapaṇḍitānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:836_0: “Yāya ca, bhikkhave, avijjāya nivutassa bālassa, yāya ca taṇhāya sampayuttassa ayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:836_1: kāyo samudāgato, sā ceva avijjā bālassa appahīnā, sā ca taṇhā aparikkhīṇā. Taṃ kissa
anya-e0104n0:836_2: hetu? Na, bhikkhave, bālo acari brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhakkhayāya. Tasmā bālo kāyassa
anya-e0104n0:836_3: bhedā kāyūpago hoti, so kāyūpago samāno na parimuccati jātiyā…pe… dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti –
anya-e0104n0:837_0: Vedanāpabhavaṃ sāvijjaṃ taṇhaṃ dassetvā, upādānabhave ca tannissite katvā “kāyūpago
anya-e0104n0:837_1: hotī”tiādinā jātiādike dassentena paccuppannahetusamuṭṭhānato pabhuti ubhayamūlavasena
anya-e0104n0:837_2: paṭiccasamuppādo vutto, tabbipariyāyena ca paṇḍitassa paccuppannahetuparikkhayato
anya-e0104n0:838_0: 587. Pūretunti vaḍḍhetuṃ, upacinitunti attho. Duggatigāmikammassa visesapaccayattā
anya-e0104n0:838_1: avijjā “avindiyaṃ vindatī”ti vuttā, tathā visesapaccayo vindiyassa na hotīti “vindiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:838_2: na vindatī”ti ca. Attanissitāni katvā cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ pavattanaṃ uppādanaṃ āyatanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:838_3: Sammohabhāveneva anabhisamayabhūtattā aviditaṃ aññātaṃ karoti. Antavirahite javāpetīti
anya-e0104n0:838_5: vasena a-kāra vi-kāra ja-kāre gahetvā aññesaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ lopaṃ, ja-kārassa ca dutiyassāgamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:838_6: katvā “avijjā”ti vuttaṃ. Byañjanatthaṃ vatvā sabhāvatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:838_7: Cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇāni “idaṃ vatthu, idaṃ ārammaṇa”nti avijjāya ñātuṃ
anya-e0104n0:838_8: na sakkāti avijjā tappaṭicchādikā vuttā. Vatthārammaṇasabhāvachādanato eva avijjādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:839: Apaccakkhitvāti paccakkhānaṃ akatvā apaṭikkhipitvā. Upakārakaṭṭho paccayaṭṭho yathā piṇḍapātādi sarīrassa.
anya-e0104n0:840_0: Saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti yathā saṅkhataṃ hoti, evaṃ abhisaṅkharonti. Saṅkhārasaddaggahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:840_1: āgatā saṅkhārā saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārā. Yadipi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāpi saṅkhārasaddena
anya-e0104n0:840_2: āgatā, te pana imissā desanāya padhānāti visuṃ vuttā, tasmā “duvidhā”ti ettha saṅkhārasaddena
anya-e0104n0:840_3: āgatasaṅkhāresu abhisaṅkharaṇakasaṅkhāraṃ vajjetvā tadaññe saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārā
anya-e0104n0:840_4: yojetabbā. Saṅkhārasaddena āgatasaṅkhārāti vā samudāyo vutto. Tadekadesā ca idha
anya-e0104n0:840_5: vaṇṇetabbabhāvena gahitā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, tasmā vaṇṇetabbasabbasaṅgāhakavasena
anya-e0104n0:840_7: vuttā, na avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāresu vuttā kāyasañcetanādayo.
anya-e0104n0:841_0: Saṅkhatasaṅkhārā nāma yathāsakaṃ paccayehi saṅkhatattā. Satipi paccayanibbattānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:841_1: sabbesampi saṅkhatabhāve “mametaṃ phala”nti tatthābhimukhena viya kammunā nibbattitattā
anya-e0104n0:841_2: tebhūmakavipākakaṭattārūpesu sātisayo saṅkhatabhāvoti adhippāyena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kammanibbattānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:841_3: abhisaṅkhatasaṅkhāratā vuttā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana tathā āgataṭṭhānassa abhāvato “tepi …pe…
anya-e0104n0:841_4: ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti vuttaṃ. Aniccā vata saṅkhārāti vuttā ubhuādisamuṭṭhānāpi
anya-e0104n0:841_5: sabbadhammā. Abhisaṅkharaṇakasaṅkhāroti vuccati attano phalassa abhisaṅkharaṇato.
anya-e0104n0:842_0: Vācaṃ saṅkharotīti vacīsaṅkhāro. Kāyena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāro. Cittena saṅkharīyati,
anya-e0104n0:842_1: cittaṃ vā saṅkharotīti cittasaṅkhāro. Saṅkhepato pana sabbepi yathārahaṃ saṅkharonti,
anya-e0104n0:842_2: saṅkharīyantīti ca saṅkhārāti veditabbā. Vuttanti saṅkhāraṭṭhapaccayaṭṭhādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:843_0: Namatīti ekantasārammaṇatāya ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namati. Paritassatīti pipāsati, taṇhāparitāpatāya
anya-e0104n0:843_1: vā vicalati. Upādiyatīti daḷhaṃ ādiyati. Bhavatīti upapattibhavaṃ sandhāyāha. Bhāvayatīti
anya-e0104n0:843_2: kammabhavaṃ. Cuti khandhānaṃ maraṇanti “maranti etenā”ti vuttaṃ. Dukkhā vedanā uppādadukkhā,
anya-e0104n0:843_3: ṭhitidukkhāti ca katvā “dvedhā khaṇatī”ti vuttaṃ. Āyāso parissamo visādo.
anya-e0104n0:844_1: ca hoti “kevalā sālayo”tiādīsu, niravasesavācako ca “kevalā aṅgamagadhā”tiādīsu,
anya-e0104n0:844_2: tasmā dvidhāpi atthaṃ vadati. Tattha asammissassāti sukharahitassa. Na hi ettha kiñci
anya-e0104n0:844_3: uppādavayarahitaṃ atthi. Sakalassāti sabbabhavādigatassa, sabbakālikassa ca.
anya-e0104n0:845_1: āha “lakkhaṇādito”ti. Sampayutte, taṃsamaṅgipuggale vā sammohayatīti sammohanarasā.
anya-e0104n0:845_3: avijjāsamudayo”ti vacanato āsavapadaṭṭhānā. Paṭisandhijananatthaṃ āyūhanti byāpāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:845_4: karontīti āyūhanarasā. Rāsikaraṇaṃ vā āyūhanaṃ. Cetanāsabhāvattā cetanā hutvā gayhatīti
anya-e0104n0:845_5: cetanāpaccupaṭṭhānā. Nāmarūpassa purecārikabhāvena pavattatīti pubbaṅgamarasaṃ. Purimabhavena
anya-e0104n0:845_6: saddhiṃ ghaṭanaṃ hutvā gayhatīti paṭisandhipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Viññāṇena saha, aññamaññañca
anya-e0104n0:845_7: sampayujjatīti sampayogarasaṃ. Samaṃ pakārehi yogo sampayogo. Visuṃ abhāvo avinibbhogo.
anya-e0104n0:845_8: Rūpaṃ sampayogābhāvato vikiratīti vikiraṇarasaṃ. Tato eva hi pisiyamānā taṇḍulādayo
anya-e0104n0:845_9: vikiranti, cuṇṇībhūtā viddhaṃsanti, nāmassa kadāci kusalādibhāvopi atthīti tato visesanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:845_10: “abyākatapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ. “Acetano abyākato”ti ettha viya anārammaṇatā vā
anya-e0104n0:845_11: abyākatatā daṭṭhabbā. Āyatanalakkhaṇanti ghaṭṭanalakkhaṇaṃ, āyānaṃ tananalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:845_12: vā. Dassanassa yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇassa karaṇato dassanarasaṃ. “Dassanādirasa”nti
anya-e0104n0:845_13: pana sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Vatthudvārabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ yathārahaṃ viññāṇamanoviññāṇadhātūnanti
anya-e0104n0:845_16: vuttaṃ. Dukkhasamudayattā hetulakkhaṇā taṇhā. “Tatratatrābhinandinī”ti vacanato abhinandanarasā.
anya-e0104n0:845_17: Cittassa, puggalassa vā rūpādīsu atittabhāvo hutvā gayhatīti atittabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:845_18: Amuñcanarasaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinivesavasena. Taṇhādaḷhattaṃ hutvā kāmupādānaṃ, sesāni
anya-e0104n0:846_0: 589. Mohādibhāvatoti ettha ādi-saddena ananubodhādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Dukkhādīsu aññāṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:846_2: vā appaṭipatti, diṭṭhisampayuttavasena micchāpaṭipatti. Dvārārammaṇatoti dvārato,
anya-e0104n0:846_3: ārammaṇato ca chasu dvāresu, chasu ārammaṇesu ca pavattanato. Ayaṃ pana vibhāgo na
anya-e0104n0:846_4: avijjāya eva, aññesupi paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu arūpadhammānaṃ labbhatīti āha “sabbesupī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:847: Vipākadhammadhammādibhāvatoti ettha ādi-saddena nevasekkhānāsekkhasaṃyojaniyādibhāve saṅgaṇhāti. Catuyonisaṃvattanatoti catuyonipariyāpannattabhāvanibbattanato.
anya-e0104n0:848: Lokiyavibhāgādibhāvatoti ettha ādi-saddena abyākatasappaccayasaṅkhatādibhāve saṅgaṇhāti. Sahetukāhetukāditoti ādi-saddena sasaṅkhārāsaṅkhārādibhede saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:849: Kāmaṃ nāmarūpaṃ paccuppannaddhavasena vuccati, tathāpi yathā paccuppannaṃ, evaṃ atītānāgatampīti addhadvayapariyāpannassāpi nayato gahetabbattā vuttaṃ “atītādito tividha”nti.
anya-e0104n0:850_2: bāhirāyatanassāpi saṅgahe sati ādi-saddena tassa saṅgahitatā daṭṭhabbā. Nobhayagocaranti
anya-e0104n0:850_3: manāyatanamāha. Na hi arūpadhammānaṃ desavasena āsannatā, dūratā vā atthi aviggahattā,
anya-e0104n0:850_4: tasmā manāyatanassa gocaro manāyatanaṃ sampatto, asampatto vāti na vuccati. Phassādīnampīti
anya-e0104n0:850_5: ettha phasso tāva phusanasabhāvato, lokiyasāsavādibhāvato ca ekavidho. Paṭighasamphassaadhivacanasamphassabhedato,
anya-e0104n0:850_6: sahetukādibhāvato ca duvidho. Bhavattayapariyāpannato, vedanāttayasampayogato, ahetukaduhetukatihetukato
anya-e0104n0:850_7: ca tividho. Yonigativasena catubbidho, pañcavidho ca.
anya-e0104n0:851_0: Vedanā anubhavanalakkhaṇato, lokiyasāsavādibhāvato ca ekavidhā. Pañcadvārikamanodvārikabhedato
anya-e0104n0:851_1: duvidhā. Sukhādibhedato tividhā. Yonigativasena catubbidhā, pañcavidhā ca. Chaḷārammaṇabhedato chabbidhā.
anya-e0104n0:852_0: Taṇhā lokassa samudayabhāvato ekavidhā. Duvidhā diṭṭhisampayuttavippayuttabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:852_1: Tividhā kāmabhavavibhavataṇhābhedato. Catubbidhā catumaggapaheyyato. Pañcavidhā rūpābhinandanādibhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:853: Upādānaṃ ekavidhaṃ daḷhaggāhabhāvato. Duvidhaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhibhedato. Tividhaṃ bhavattayūpanissayabhāvato. Catubbidhaṃ kāmupādānādibhedato. Pañcavidhaṃ pañcagatisaṃvattanato.
anya-e0104n0:854_0: Bhavo ekavidho lokiyasāsavādibhāvato. Duvidho kammupapattibhedato. Tividho kāmabhavādibhedato.
anya-e0104n0:854_1: Catubbidho caturupādānapaccayato. Pañcavidho pañcagatisaṃvattanato. Chabbidho kāmakammabhavādibhedato.
anya-e0104n0:855_0: Jāti ekavidhā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattibhāvato. Duvidhā rūpakkhandhasaṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahato.
anya-e0104n0:855_1: Tividhā bhavattayapariyāpannato. Yonigativasena catubbidhā, pañcavidhā ca. Iminā
anya-e0104n0:856_1: Na hi sokādayo aṅgabhāvena vuttā, phalena pana kāraṇaṃ avijjaṃ mūlaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:856_2: te vuttā. Jarāmaraṇabbhāhatassa hi bālassa te sambhavantīti sokādīnaṃ jarāmaraṇakāraṇatā
anya-e0104n0:856_3: vuttā, na pana “kāyikāya dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho”ti ca sutte jarāmaraṇanimittañca
anya-e0104n0:856_4: dukkhaṃ saṅgahitanti taṃ tannimittānaṃ jarāmaraṇabbhāhatassa sambhave sādhakabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:856_5: vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana jarāmaraṇeneva sokādīnaṃ ekasaṅkhepo kato, tasmā tesaṃ jātipaccayatā
anya-e0104n0:856_6: yujjati. Jarāmaraṇapaccayabhāve hi avijjāya ekasaṅkhepo kātabbo siyā. Jātipaccayā
anya-e0104n0:856_7: pana jarāmaraṇaṃ, sokādayo ca sambhavantīti tattha jarāmaraṇaṃ ekantikaṃ aṅgabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:856_8: gahitaṃ. Sokādayo pana rūpabhavādīsu abhāvato anekantikā kevalaṃ pākaṭena phalena
anya-e0104n0:856_9: avijjānidassanatthaṃ gahitā. Tena anāgate jātiyā sati tato parāya paṭisandhiyā hetuhetubhūtā
anya-e0104n0:856_10: avijjā dassitāti bhavacakkassa avicchedo dassito hotīti. Suttañca sokādīnaṃ avijjā
anya-e0104n0:856_11: kāraṇanti etasseva atthassa sādhakaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na sokādīnaṃ bālassa jarāmaraṇanimittatāmattassa.
anya-e0104n0:856_12: “Assutavā puthujjano”ti hi vacanena avijjā sokādīnaṃ kāraṇanti dassitā, na ca jarāmaraṇanimittameva dukkhaṃ dukkhanti.
anya-e0104n0:857_0: Aparo nayo jarāmaraṇampi paccayo, aññathā dvādasaṅgāni na paripūrenti. Kassa pana
anya-e0104n0:857_1: so paccayo? Sokādīnaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā “jarāmaraṇapaccayā sokādayo sambhavantī”ti
anya-e0104n0:857_2: avatvā “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ, sokādayo ca sambhavantī”ti vuttanti? Yasmā tadaññenapi
anya-e0104n0:857_3: dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa te sambhavanti, tasmā appahīnasaṃyojanassāpi tesaṃ tappaccayatā
anya-e0104n0:857_4: na ekaṃsikāti jātipaccayatāva vuttā. Atha vā jarāmaraṇaggahaṇena upapattibhavo saṅgahito.
anya-e0104n0:857_5: Upādinnakkhandhaparipāko hi āyuno saṃhāni, indriyānaṃ paripāko ca jarā, tesañca bhedo
anya-e0104n0:857_6: maraṇanti. Sati ca upapattibhave tattha katupacitaṃ, porāṇaṃ vā kammaṃ kammabhavo,
anya-e0104n0:857_7: kammādiupaṭṭhāne cutianantaraṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetīti upapattibhavo jātiyā paccayo,
anya-e0104n0:857_8: tasmā jarāmaraṇampi jātiyā paccayatāya paṭiccasamuppādo. Yasmā pana “bhavapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:857_9: jātī”ti ettheva upapattibhavassa jātiyā paccayatā saṅgahitā, tasmā vuttapariyāyasaṅgahato
anya-e0104n0:857_10: ca “jarāmaraṇapaccayā jātī”ti na vuttaṃ. Evaṃ jarāmaraṇassāpi paccayabhāvasiddhito
anya-e0104n0:859_0: 591. Ayaṃ panāti idāni vakkhamānaṃ. “Katamā ca, bhikkhave, avijjā dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā
anya-e0104n0:859_1: suttantesu catuṭṭhānikā avijjā vuttāti “suttantapariyāyenā”ti vuttaṃ. Nikkhepakaṇḍe
anya-e0104n0:859_2: pana suttantesu catūsu ṭhānesu kathitāya eva avijjāya aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kiccajātito
anya-e0104n0:859_5: “Aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇa”nti ānetvā taṃ sambandhitabbaṃ. Sesaṭṭhānesūti dukkhasamudayesu,
anya-e0104n0:859_6: pubbantādīsu ca. Ārammaṇavasenāti ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāpi. Idhāti imasmiṃ “dukkhe
anya-e0104n0:859_7: aññāṇa”ntiādike pāṭhe. Sāti avijjā. Uppannāti asamūhatuppannā, pageva paccuppannā.
anya-e0104n0:859_9: paṭivijjhituṃ na detī”ti vuttaṃ. Rasitabbo paṭivijjhitabbo sabhāvo raso, attano raso
anya-e0104n0:859_10: saraso, yāthāvo yathābhūto saraso yāthāvasaraso, yo “pīḷanaṭṭho”tiādinā vutto dukkhasaccappabhedā
anya-e0104n0:859_11: eva ca pubbantādayo, so eva lakkhitabbattā yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ. Taṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
anya-e0104n0:860_0: Tadubhayanti pubbantañceva aparantañca atītaṃ, anāgatañca khandhapañcakaṃ. Pubbantāparantabhāgavantatāya
anya-e0104n0:860_1: vā paccuppannaddhabhūto majjhanto pubbantāparanto. Ayaṃ avijjā ime saṅkhārāti idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannadhammesu
anya-e0104n0:860_2: paccakkhato jānanākāradassanaṃ. Etthāti etesu dukkhādīsu. Yadipi avijjā dukkhādīsu
anya-e0104n0:860_3: ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi pavattati, yathā pana nirodhamagge ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ asakkontī
anya-e0104n0:860_5: ca pavattamānā te yāthāvato paṭivijjhituṃ na deti, evaṃ dukkhādīsupīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:860_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “paṭicchādanavaseneva idhādhippetā”ti. Dukkhādivisayo andhatamakaro,
anya-e0104n0:861_0: 592. Puññādayoti puññābhisaṅkhārādayo. Tattha punāti attano santānaṃ apuññaphalato,
anya-e0104n0:861_1: dukkhasaṃkilesato ca sodhetīti puññaṃ. Hitasukhajjhāsayena puññaṃ karotīti tannipphādanena
anya-e0104n0:861_2: kārakassa ajjhāsayaṃ pūreti, pujjabhavaṃ nibbattetīti vā puññaṃ. Iti pūrako, pujjanibbattako
anya-e0104n0:861_3: ca niruttinayena puññanti veditabbo. Puññañca so attano phalassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena
anya-e0104n0:861_4: abhisaṅkhāro cāti puññābhisaṅkhāro. Puññapaṭipakkhato apuññanti vuttavipariyāyena
anya-e0104n0:861_5: apuññābhisaṅkhāro veditabbo. Samādhipaccanīkānaṃ atidūratāya na iñjati, aniñjañca
anya-e0104n0:861_6: bhavaṃ abhisaṅkharotīti āneñjābhisaṅkhāro. Kāyena pavattito, kāyato vā pavatto, kāyassa
anya-e0104n0:861_7: vā saṅkhāroti kāyasaṅkhāro. Vacīcittasaṅkhāresupi eseva nayo. Tattha paṭhamattiko
anya-e0104n0:861_8: parivīmaṃsanasuttādivasena gahito. Tattha hi “puññaṃ ce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti,
anya-e0104n0:861_9: puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa”ntiādinā āgataṃ. Dutiyattiko vibhaṅgasuttavasena. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:861_10: hi “tayome, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā. Katame tayo? Kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro cittasaṅkhāro”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:862_0: Vitthārato panātiādi puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ sarūpato, pabhedato ca vibhāvanaṃ. Bhāvanāvaseneva
anya-e0104n0:862_1: pavattā, na dānasīlavasenāti tattha labbhamānaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ dasseti. Evañca
anya-e0104n0:862_2: katvā arūpāvacaracetanāpi “bhāvanāvaseneva pavattā”ti vuttā. Ye pana “bhāvanāvasenevā”ti
anya-e0104n0:862_3: avadhāraṇena abhiññācetanaṃ nivattetīti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ tāsampi avijjāpaccayatāya
anya-e0104n0:862_4: viya puññābhisaṅkhārabhāvassa ca icchitattā. Aññathā abhiññācittuppādassa puññakiriyavatthūsu
anya-e0104n0:862_5: asaṅgaho eva siyā, na ca yuttaṃ “kusalañca puññakiriyavatthuñca na hotī”ti. Pāṇātipātādīti
anya-e0104n0:862_6: ādi-saddena na tadavasiṭṭhaakusalakammapathānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ, atha kho anavasesaakusalakammassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:863_0: Itaresu panāti kāyasaṅkhārādīsu. Puññābhisaṅkhārādayo pavattamānā imehi dvārehi pavattantīti
anya-e0104n0:863_1: dvārato pavattidassanatthaṃ. “Samavīsati cetanā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, yadi kāyavacīviññattiyo
anya-e0104n0:863_2: samuṭṭhāpentiyo kusalākusalacetanā kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāroti ca vuccanti, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:863_3: sante abhiññācetanāyapi kusalāya tathā pavattāya vacīsaṅkhārabhāvo vattabboti codanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:863_5: vā. Na gahitāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na gahitā “abhiññācetanā viññāṇassa paccayo na hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:863_6: Kasmā pana na hoti, nanu sāpi kusalā, vipākadhammā cāti? Saccametaṃ, anupacchinnataṇhāvijjamāne
anya-e0104n0:863_7: pana santāne sabyāpārappavattiyā tassā kusalatā, vipākadhammatā ca vuttā, na vipākuppādanena.
anya-e0104n0:863_8: Sā pana vipākaṃ uppādentī rūpāvacarameva uppādeyya. Na hi aññabhūmikaṃ kammaṃ aññabhūmikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:863_9: vipākaṃ uppādetīti. Attanā sadisārammaṇaṃ tiṭṭhānikameva ca uppādeyya cittuppādakaṇḍe
anya-e0104n0:863_10: rūpāvacaravipākassa kammasadisārammaṇasseva vuttattā. Na ca rūpāvacaravipāko parittādiārammaṇo
anya-e0104n0:863_11: atthi, abhiññācetanā ca parittādiārammaṇāva hoti. Tasmā vipākaṃ na uppādetīti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:863_12: Kasiṇesu ca uppāditassa catutthajjhānasamādhissa ānisaṃsabhūtā abhiññā. Yathāha “so
anya-e0104n0:863_13: evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādi. Tasmā samādhiphalasadisā sā, na ca phalaṃ deti. Dānasīlānisaṃsabhūto
anya-e0104n0:863_14: tasmiṃ bhave paccayalābho viyāti sāpi vipākaṃ na uppādetīti.
anya-e0104n0:864_0: “Yathā ca abhiññācetanā, evaṃ uddhaccacetanāpi na hotī”ti idaṃ uddhaccasahagatadhamme
anya-e0104n0:864_1: visuṃ uddharitvā “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti vuttattā vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:864_2: Sā pana vicāraṇā heṭṭhā khandhaniddesavaṇṇanāyaṃ akusalakathāyaṃ vicāritā evāti tattha
anya-e0104n0:864_3: vicāritanayeneva veditabbā. Apicettha yadeke vibhajja vadanti, dassanabhāvanānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:864_4: abhāvepi yesaṃ puthujjanānaṃ, sekkhānañca dassanabhāvanāhi bhavitabbaṃ, tesaṃ taduppattikāle
anya-e0104n0:864_5: tehi pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā akusalā dassanena pahātabbā, bhāvanāya pahātabbāti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0104n0:864_6: Puthujjanānaṃ pana bhāvanāya abhāvā bhāvanāya pahātabbacintā natthi. Tena tesaṃ pavattamānā
anya-e0104n0:864_7: dassanena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyāpi bhāvanāya pahātabbāti na vuccanti. Yadi vucceyyuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:864_9: paccayo bhaveyyuṃ? Na ca paṭṭhāne dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kenaci
anya-e0104n0:864_10: paccayena paccayoti vuttā. Sekkhānaṃ pana vijjamānā bhāvanāya pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyāti
anya-e0104n0:864_11: bhāvanāya pahātabbā. Teneva sekkhānaṃ dassanena pahātabbā, cattattā vantattā muttattā
anya-e0104n0:864_12: pahīnattā paṭinissaṭṭhattā ukkheṭitattā samukkheṭitattā assāditabbā, abhinanditabbā
anya-e0104n0:864_13: ca na honti. Pahīnatāya eva somanassahetubhūtā, avikkhepahetubhūtā ca na domanassaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:864_14: uddhaccañca uppādentīti na te tesaṃ ārammaṇaārammaṇādhipatibhāvaṃ, pakatūpanissayabhāvañca
anya-e0104n0:864_15: gacchanti. Na hi pahīne upanissāya ariyo rāgādikilese uppādeti.
anya-e0104n0:865_0: Vuttañhetaṃ “sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na
anya-e0104n0:865_1: paccāgacchati…pe… arahattamaggena…pe… paccāgacchatī”ti. Na ca puthujjanānaṃ dassanena
anya-e0104n0:865_2: pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā, itaresaṃ na kenaci paccayena paccayo hontīti na sakkā vattuṃ
anya-e0104n0:865_3: “diṭṭhiṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi, vicikicchā, uddhaccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:865_4: uppajjati. Vicikicchaṃ ārabbha vicikicchā, diṭṭhi, uddhaccaṃ uppajjatī”ti diṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:865_5: uddhaccārammaṇapaccayabhāvassa vuttattā. Ettha hi uddhaccanti uddhaccasahagatacittuppādaṃ
anya-e0104n0:865_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā adhipatipaccayaniddese “diṭṭhiṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti
anya-e0104n0:865_7: abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjatī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:865_8: na vuttaṃ “uddhaccaṃ uppajjatī”ti. Tasmā dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbānaṃ atītādibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:865_9: na vattabbattepi yādisānaṃ tāhi anuppattidhammatā āpādetabbā, tesu puthujjanesu vattamānā
anya-e0104n0:865_10: dassanaṃ apekkhitvā tena pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā dassanena pahātabbā, sekkhesu vattamānā
anya-e0104n0:865_11: bhāvanaṃ apekkhitvā tāya pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā bhāvanāya pahātabbā.
anya-e0104n0:866_0: Tesu bhāvanāya pahātabbā sahāyavirahā vipākaṃ na janayantīti bhāvanāya pahātabbacetanāya
anya-e0104n0:866_4: na sakkā paṭisedhitunti uddhaccasahagatadhammānaṃ vipāko vibhaṅge vutto. Yadi evaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:867_0: Evampi te imasmiṃ tike “navattabbā”ti vattabbā āpajjantīti? Nāpajjanti, cittuppādakaṇḍe
anya-e0104n0:867_1: dassitānaṃ dvādasaakusalacittuppādānaṃ dvīhi padehi saṅgahitattā. Yathā hi dhammavasena
anya-e0104n0:867_2: sabbe saṅkhatadhammā saṅgahitāti uppannattike kālavasena asaṅgahitāpi atītā “navattabbā”ti
anya-e0104n0:867_3: na vuttā cittuppādarūpabhāvena gahitesu navattabbassa abhāvā, evamidhāpi cittuppādabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:867_4: gahitesu navattabbassa asaṅgahitassa abhāvā navattabbatā navuttāti veditabbā. Yattha
anya-e0104n0:867_5: hi cittuppādo koci niyogato navattabbo atthi, tattha tesaṃ catuttho koṭṭhāso atthīti
anya-e0104n0:867_6: yathāvuttapadesu viya tatthāpi bhinditvā bhajāpetabbacittuppāde bhinditvā bhajāpeti
anya-e0104n0:867_7: “siyā navattabbā parittārammaṇā”tiādinā. Tadabhāvā uppannattike, idha ca tathā na vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:868_0: Atha vā yathā sappaṭighehi samānasabhāvattā rūpadhātuyaṃ tayo mahābhūtā sappaṭighāti
anya-e0104n0:868_1: vuttā. Yathāha “asaññasattānaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve
anya-e0104n0:868_2: mahābhūtā, dve mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṃ mahābhūta”nti, evaṃ puthujjanānaṃ pavattamānā
anya-e0104n0:868_3: bhāvanāya pahātabbasamānasabhāvā bhāvanāya pahātabbāti vucceyyunti? Natthi navattabbatāpasaṅgo.
anya-e0104n0:868_4: Evañca sati puthujjanānaṃ pavattamānāpi bhāvanāya pahātabbā sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādayo
anya-e0104n0:868_5: parabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnaṃ upanissayapaccayo, rāgo ca rāgadiṭṭhīnaṃ adhipatipaccayoti
anya-e0104n0:868_6: ayamattho laddho hoti. Yathā pana aphoṭṭhabbattā rūpadhātuyaṃ tayo mahābhūtā na paramatthato
anya-e0104n0:868_7: sappaṭighā, evaṃ apekkhitabbabhāvanārahitā puthujjanesu vattamānā sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādayo
anya-e0104n0:868_8: na paramatthato bhāvanāya pahātabbāti bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayatā
anya-e0104n0:868_9: na vuttā. Na ca dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayoti
anya-e0104n0:868_10: vuttā. Ye hi dassanena pahātabbapaccayā kilesā, na te dassanato uddhaṃ pavattanti.
anya-e0104n0:868_11: Dassanena pahātabbapaccayassapi pana uddhaccasahagatassa sahāyavekallamattameva dassanena
anya-e0104n0:868_12: kataṃ, na tassa koci bhāvo dassanena anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditoti tassa ekantabhāvanāyapahātabbatā
anya-e0104n0:868_13: vuttā. Tasmā tassa tādisasseva sati sahāye vipākuppādanavacanaṃ, asati ca vipākānuppādanavacanaṃ na virujjhatīti.
anya-e0104n0:869_0: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ ācariyānaṃ ahopurisikāmattanti apare. Kasmā? Uddhaccasahagatassa
anya-e0104n0:869_1: ekantena bhāvanāya pahātabbattā. Evañhi vuttaṃ bhagavatā “katame dhammā bhāvanāya
anya-e0104n0:869_2: pahātabbā? Uddhaccasahagato cittuppādo”ti. Yadi hi taṃ icchitaṃ siyā, yathā atītārammaṇattike
anya-e0104n0:869_3: “niyogā anāgatārammaṇā natthī”ti vatvā vibhajja vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi “niyogā bhāvanāya
anya-e0104n0:869_4: pahātabbā natthī”ti vatvā “uddhaccasahagato siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbo, siyā na vattabbo”ti
anya-e0104n0:869_5: vadeyya. Yā ca taṃ samatthentena “yadi vucceyyu”ntiādinā yutti vuttā, sāpi ayutti.
anya-e0104n0:869_6: Kasmā? Yasmā dassanena pahātabbārammaṇānaṃ rāgadiṭṭhivicikicchāuddhaccānaṃ dassanena
anya-e0104n0:869_7: pahātabbabhāvo eva icchitoti. Yaṃ pana uddhaccaggahaṇena pāḷiyaṃ uddhaccasahagato
anya-e0104n0:869_8: cittuppādo vuttoti vatvā taṃ sādhetuṃ adhipatipaccayaniddese uddhaccassa anuddharaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:869_9: nibandhanaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi anibandhanaṃ paṭṭhāne sāvasesapāṭhadassanato. Tathā hi
anya-e0104n0:869_10: “atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa, anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:869_11: paccayo”ti etesaṃ vibhaṅge cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ katvā “paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa
anya-e0104n0:869_12: dhammassā”ti etassa vibhaṅge labbhamānampi na uddhaṭaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:870_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbassa vipākadānaṃ pati dassanena pahātabbassa sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:870_1: vicāretabbaṃ. Kiṃ avijjādi viya dānasīlādīnaṃ uppattiyāyeva vipākadānasāmatthiyā
anya-e0104n0:870_2: ṭhānavasena dassanenapahātabbaṃ bhāvanāyapahātabbassa sahāyabhāvaṃ upagacchati, udāhu
anya-e0104n0:870_3: kilesā viya kammassa paṭisandhidānaṃ patīti? Kiñcettha – yadi tāva purimo pakkho
anya-e0104n0:870_5: āpajjati pahīnāvijjātaṇhāmāne santāne pavattadānādi viya. Atha dutiyo, tassāpi dassanenapahātabbatā
anya-e0104n0:870_6: āpajjati apāyagamanīyasabhāvānativattanato, tasmā heṭṭhā vicāritanayeneva uddhaccasahagatassa
anya-e0104n0:870_7: vipākadānaṃ pati pāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathāya ca avirujjhanavasenettha atthavinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:871_0: Sāpīti uddhaccacetanāpi. Viññāṇassa paccayabhāveti sampuṇṇassa vipākaviññāṇassa paccayabhāve.
anya-e0104n0:871_1: Yadi apanetabbā, kasmā “samavīsati cetanā”ti vuttanti tassa kāraṇaṃ dassento āha
anya-e0104n0:871_2: “avijjāpaccayā pana sabbāpetā hontī”ti. Abhiññācetanāyapi paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:871_3: Yadi evaṃ abhiññācetanāya saha ekavīsatīti vattabbaṃ, na, tathā avacanassa vuttakāraṇattā.
anya-e0104n0:871_4: Taṃ pana itarāvacanassāpi kāraṇanti samānarūpāya ekissā avacane yaṃ kāraṇaṃ apekkhitvā
anya-e0104n0:871_5: ekā na vuttā, tena kāraṇena vuttāyapi avattabbataṃ dasseti. Ayaṃ tikoti kāyasaṅkhārattiko.
anya-e0104n0:871_6: Purimattikanti puññābhisaṅkhārattikaṃ. Pavisatīti kathaṃ pavisati. Puññābhisaṅkhāro
anya-e0104n0:871_7: hi aṭṭhakāmāvacaracetanāpabhedo kāyaduccaritato viramantassa siyā kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīduccaritato
anya-e0104n0:871_8: viramantassa siyā vacīsaṅkhāro, manodvāre pana uppannā terasapi cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro
anya-e0104n0:871_9: ca hoti cittasaṅkhāro ca. Apuññābhisaṅkhāropi kāyaduccaritavasena pavattiyaṃ siyā
anya-e0104n0:871_10: kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīduccaritavasena pavattiyaṃ siyā vacīsaṅkhāro, dve dvārāni muñcitvā
anya-e0104n0:871_11: manodvāre pavattiyaṃ siyā cittasaṅkhāro, āneñjābhisaṅkhāro cāti evaṃ dutiyattiko
anya-e0104n0:871_12: purimattikameva pavisati. Tena vuttaṃ “atthato puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃyeva vasena avijjāya
anya-e0104n0:872_0: 593. Avijjābhāve bhāvatoti avijjāya atthibhāve saṅkhārānaṃ bhāvato. Na hi avijjāya
anya-e0104n0:872_1: asati kadāci saṅkhārā sambhavanti. Idāni taṃ avijjāya bhāvaṃ dassento “aññāṇaṃ appahīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:872_2: hotī”ti āha. Tena maggena anirodho idha avijjāya atthibhāvo, na dharamānatā evāti
anya-e0104n0:872_3: dasseti. Svāyamattho heṭṭhā vibhāvitoyeva. “Avijjāsaṅkhāta”nti ca iminā ñāṇābhāvādiṃ
anya-e0104n0:872_4: nivatteti. Ayañhi a-kāro “ahetukā dhammā abhikkhuko āvāso”tiādīsu taṃyoganivattiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:872_5: dissati. Abhāvo hettha dīpito. “Appaccayā dhammā”ti taṃsambandhitānivattiyaṃ. Paccayuppannañhi
anya-e0104n0:872_7: dhammā”ti taṃsabhāvanivattiyaṃ. Nidassanañhi daṭṭhabbatā. Atha cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nidassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:872_8: na passatīti taggahetabbatānivattiyaṃ. Tathā “anāsavā dhammā”ti. “Appaṭighā dhammā,
anya-e0104n0:872_9: anārammaṇā dhammā”ti taṃkiccanivattiyaṃ. “Arūpino dhammā, acetasikā dhammā”ti tabbhāvanivattiyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:872_10: Tadaññathā hi ettha pakāsīyati. “Amanusso”ti tabbhāvamattanivattiyaṃ. Manussattamattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:872_11: natthi, aññaṃ samānanti sadisatā hettha sūcīyati. “Assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño, aputto”ti
anya-e0104n0:872_12: tathā sambhāvanīyaguṇanivattiyaṃ. Garahā hi ettha ñāyati. “Kacci bhoto anāmayaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:872_15: kālavinimuttassa ca vijjamānattā uppannānukūlatā, pageva paccuppannānanti tabbidhurabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:872_17: pakāsīyati. Imesaṃ pana atthānaṃ asambhavato pārisesena yathā kusalapaṭipakkhā dhammā
anya-e0104n0:872_18: akusalā, evaṃ vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjāti katvā ñāṇapaṭipakkho dhammo aññāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:873_1: gahetabbaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ sukhanti saññāya abhinivisitvā, etena tattha taṇhāpavattiṃ
anya-e0104n0:873_2: dasseti. Ārabhatīti nibbatteti. Taṇhāparikkhāreti taṇhāya “sukhaṃ subha”ntiādinā
anya-e0104n0:873_3: saṅkhate parikkhate, alaṅkateti attho. Taṇhā hi dukkhassa samudayoti ajānanto bālo
anya-e0104n0:873_4: “aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya”ntiādinā
anya-e0104n0:873_5: paritassanto kāyasaṅkhāre parikkharoti. Taṇhāparikkhāreti vā taṇhāya parivārabhūte.
anya-e0104n0:873_6: Taṇhāvatthuṃ hi cakkhādiṃ, rūpādiñca abhisaṅkharitvā taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ dentā saṅkharā
anya-e0104n0:873_7: taṇhāya upanentā tassā parivārā viya hontīti. Gativisese brahmalokādike. Anekasatapasubaddhabhiṃsano
anya-e0104n0:873_8: vājapeyyādiko yañño. Amaraṇatthāti gahitā dukkarakiriyā amaratapo. Amaro vā devo
anya-e0104n0:873_9: vā bhaveyyaṃ, devaññataro vāti pavattitā vatacariyā amaratapo. Dukkhattā vā maro
anya-e0104n0:873_10: mārako tapo amaratapo. Diṭṭhe adiṭṭhasaddo viya mare amarasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:874_1: iminā anudahanaṭṭhena tiṇukkāsadisataṃ puññaphalassa dasseti. Appassādatañcāti ca-saddena
anya-e0104n0:874_3: vipariṇāmadukkhasabhāvassa sugatiphalassa paccayabhūtaṃ. Ramaṇīyabhāvena ca assādabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:874_4: ca gayhamānaṃ puññaphalaṃ dīpasikhāmadhulittasatthadhārāsadisaṃ. Tadattho ca puññābhisaṅkhāro
anya-e0104n0:874_5: taṃnipātalehanasadiso vutto. “Sukho imissā paribbājikāya taruṇāya mudukāya lomasāya
anya-e0104n0:874_6: bāhāya samphasso”tiādinā sukhasaññāya asubhabhāvassa asallakkhaṇeneva ekaccakāmaparibhogoti
anya-e0104n0:874_7: bālo viya gūthakīḷanaṃ, kilesābhibhūtatāya kodhāratiabhibhūto asavaso maritukāmo
anya-e0104n0:874_8: viya visakhādanaṃ sampati kiriyākhaṇe, āyatiṃ phalakkhaṇe ca jigucchanīyaṃ, dukkhañca
anya-e0104n0:874_9: apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ārabhati. Lobhasahagatassa vā gūthakīḷanasadisatā, dosasahagatassa
anya-e0104n0:874_10: visakhādanasadisatā yojetabbā. Sabhayassāpi pisācanagarassa kāmaguṇasamiddhiyā sukhavipallāsahetubhāvo
anya-e0104n0:874_13: tesaṃ pisācanagarasadisatā, tadabhimukhagamanasadisatā ca āneñjābhisaṅkhārassa yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:875_0: Avijjābhāvatova saṅkhārabhāvo, na abhāvatoti saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāpaccayabhāve saṅkhepena
anya-e0104n0:875_1: anvayato, byatirekato ca vuttamatthaṃ suttena samatthetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādinā
anya-e0104n0:875_2: suttapadaṃ ābhataṃ. Tattha avidvāti aviddasu. Avijjāgatoti avijjāya samannāgato,
anya-e0104n0:877_0: 594. Tāvāti vattabbantarāpekkho nipāto, tena “avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo”ti idaṃ
anya-e0104n0:877_1: tāva siddhaṃ, idaṃ pana aparaṃ vattabbanti dasseti. “Idaṃ pana vattabba”nti yamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:877_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ paccayadhammā nāma yesaṃ paccayā honti, yathā vā paccayā
anya-e0104n0:877_3: honti, tadubhayesaṃ bahubhāvato anekadhāva paccayā hontīti avijjāyapi taṃ āsaṅkanto
anya-e0104n0:877_4: pucchi “katamesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ kathaṃ paccayo hotī”ti, puññābhisaṅkhārādayo bahū saṅkhārā
anya-e0104n0:877_5: vuttā. Avijjā ca tesaṃ paccayo hoti, na sabbesaṃ ekadhāva hoti, tasmā imesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:877_6: evaṃ paccayo hotīti idaṃ vattabbanti attho. Tatrāti tasmiṃ paccayabhāve. Yadipi “katamesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:877_7: saṅkhārāna”ntiādinā asādhāraṇato pucchā āraddhā, ekadesena pana samudāyopalakkhaṇametanti
anya-e0104n0:877_8: dvādasannaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānaṃ yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ paccayabhāvo vattabboti
anya-e0104n0:877_9: taṃ dassetuṃ, avijjāya vā paccayabhāve pucchite tappasaṅgena sabbesampi paccayadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:877_10: paccayabhāvaṃ visajjetukāmo paccaye tāva pāḷinayeneva dassetuṃ “bhagavatā hī”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:877_11: āraddhaṃ. Tattha ca bhagavatā catuvīsati paccayā vuttāti sambandho. Tesaṃ vasena
anya-e0104n0:878_0: “Hetu ca so paccayo cā”ti iminā vacanena hetuno, adhipatipaccayādibhūtassa ca gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:878_1: siyāti taṃ nivārento āha “hetu hutvā paccayo”ti. Evampi so eva doso āpajjatīti puna
anya-e0104n0:878_2: āha “hetubhāvena paccayoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Tena na idha hetusaddena dhammaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:878_3: kataṃ, atha kho dhammassa sattiviseso gahitoti dasseti. Tassa hi paccayasaddassa
anya-e0104n0:878_4: ca samānādhikaraṇataṃ sandhāya “hetu ca so paccayo ca, hetu hutvā paccayo”ti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:878_5: Evañca katvā parato pāḷiyaṃ “hetū hetu…pe… hetupaccayena paccayo”tiādinā tena tena
anya-e0104n0:878_6: hetubhāvādiupakārena tassa tassa dhammassa upakārakattaṃ vuttaṃ. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:878_7: pana “yo hi dhammo yaṃ dhammaṃ appaccakkhāya tiṭṭhati vā uppajjati vā, so tassa paccayo”ti,
anya-e0104n0:878_8: “mūlaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo hetupaccayo”ti ca evamādinā dhammapaṭṭhānaniddesena
anya-e0104n0:878_9: dhammato aññā dhammasatti nāma natthīti dhammeheva dhammasattivibhāvanaṃ katanti
anya-e0104n0:878_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idhāpi vā “hetu ca so paccayo cā”ti dhammeneva dhammasattiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:878_11: Na hi “hetupaccayo”tiādiko uddeso kusalādiuddeso viya dhammappadhāno, atha kho dhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:879_0: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā tabbhāvena paccayabhāvaṃ ārammaṇādīsu atidisati “ārammaṇañca
anya-e0104n0:879_1: taṃ paccayo cāti ārammaṇapaccayo, ārammaṇaṃ hutvā paccayo, ārammaṇabhāvena paccayoti
anya-e0104n0:880_0: 595. Vacanāvayavoti sādhanāvayavaṃ sandhāyāha. Vacanasabhāvañhi sādhanaṃ paresaṃ
anya-e0104n0:880_1: aviditatthañāpanato loke sādhananti pākaṭaṃ paññātaṃ. Tathā hi naṃ avayavalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:880_2: vacanasabhāvañca sādhanaṃ, avayavapakkhādīni vacanāni sādhananti ca ñāyavādino vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:880_3: Paṭiññā, hetūtiādīsūti paṭiññā, hetu, udāharaṇa, upanaya, nigamanāni. Udāharaṇasādhammiyā
anya-e0104n0:880_4: sādhyasādhanaṃ hetu. Virūpo hetūti ca evamādīsu kāraṇaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:880_5: sampāpakalakkhaṇampi vā. Ādi-saddena tassāpi saṅgahetabbatāya, ñāpakalakkhaṇaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:880_6: vacanāvayavaggahaṇena gahitaṃ. Kāmaṃ mūlampi kāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ kāraṇameva, kāraṇanti
anya-e0104n0:880_7: panettha paccayahetu gahito. Mūlanti hetuhetūti kāraṇavisesavisayattā mūlassa visuṃ
anya-e0104n0:880_8: gahaṇaṃ. Etīti etassa atthavacanaṃ vattatīti, tañca uppattiṭṭhitīnaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:880_9: Tenevāha “tiṭṭhati vā uppajjati vā”ti. Ekacco hi paccayo ṭhitiyā eva upakārako hoti
anya-e0104n0:880_10: yathā pacchājātapaccayo, ekacco uppattiyā eva yathā anantarādiko, ekacco ubhayassa yathā hetuādayo.
anya-e0104n0:881_0: Upakārakalakkhaṇoti ca dhammena dhammasattiṃ upakāraṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Hinoti
anya-e0104n0:881_1: patiṭṭhāti etthāti hetu, anekatthattā dhātusaddānaṃ hi-saddo mūlasaddo viya patiṭṭhattho
anya-e0104n0:881_2: veditabbo. Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ atiharantena mūlena viya
anya-e0104n0:881_3: pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati pavattati vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ āpajjatīti hetu. Attano
anya-e0104n0:881_4: phalaṃ karotīti kāraṇaṃ. Nidadāti dassentaṃ viya hotīti nidānaṃ. Sambhavati taṃ etasmāti
anya-e0104n0:881_5: sambhavo. Pabhavati etasmāti pabhavoti paccayahetusaddehi itaresampi samānatthatā
anya-e0104n0:881_6: veditabbā. Evaṃ santepi kāraṇavisesavisayo hetusaddo, kāraṇasāmaññavisayo paccayasaddoti
anya-e0104n0:881_7: dassento “mūlaṭṭhenā”tiādimāha. Hetuattho, paccayaṭṭho ca heṭṭhā papañcavasena vuttoti
anya-e0104n0:882_0: Yathā sālivīhibījādīni taṃtaṃosadhīnaṃ sālivīhiādibhāvassa sādhakāni, maṇiādippabhāvatthūni
anya-e0104n0:882_1: ca nīlādivaṇṇāni nīlādippabhāsādhakāni, evaṃ hetupaccayo yathārahaṃ attanā sampayuttadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:882_2: kusalādibhāvassa sādhakoti imamatthaṃ dasseti “so sāliādīna”ntiādinā. Ācariyānanti
anya-e0104n0:882_3: ca revatācariyaṃ sandhāyāha. Evaṃ santeti hetupaccayo yadi kusalādibhāvasādhako,
anya-e0104n0:882_4: evaṃ sati. Na sampajjati na sijjhati. Yathā kusalākusalahetu taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa
anya-e0104n0:882_5: kusalākusalabhāvāya na pariyatto, evaṃ abyākatopi hetu taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa abyākatabhāvāya.
anya-e0104n0:882_6: Sabhāveneva hi taṃ abyākatanti āha “na hi so tesaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhetī”ti. Hetupaccayo
anya-e0104n0:882_7: ca tesaṃ hotiyevāti āha “na ca paccayo na hotī”ti. Idāni tamatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:882_8: “vuttañheta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Vinā etenāti etena hetunā abyākatabhāvasādhakena vinā
anya-e0104n0:883_0: “Yoniso, bhikkhave, manasi karoto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā
anya-e0104n0:883_1: ca kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”tiādi vacanehi kusalabhāvassa yonisomanasikārappaṭibaddhatā
anya-e0104n0:883_3: kusalabhāvo viya na hetupaṭibaddhāti dassitaṃ hoti. Yaṃ paneke maññeyyuṃ “ahetukahetussa
anya-e0104n0:883_4: akusalabhāvo viya sahetukahetūnampi sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo, aññesaṃ taṃsampayuttānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:883_5: hetupaṭibaddho”ti, tassa uttaraṃ vattuṃ “yadi cā”tiādimāha. Alobho kusalo vā siyā
anya-e0104n0:883_6: abyākato vāti yadi alobho sabhāvato kusalo, so kusalasabhāvattā abyākato na siyā.
anya-e0104n0:883_7: Atha abyākato taṃsabhāvattā kusalo na siyā alobhasabhāvassa adosattābhāvo viya. Yasmā
anya-e0104n0:883_8: pana ubhayathāpi hoti, tasmā yathā ubhayathā hontesu saddhādīsu sampayuttesu hetupaṭibaddhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:883_9: kusalādibhāvaṃ pariyesetha, na sabhāvato, evaṃ hetūsupi kusalāditā aññapaṭibaddhā
anya-e0104n0:883_10: pariyesitabbā, na sabhāvatoti yaṃ vuttaṃ “sampayuttahetūsu sabhāvatova kusalādibhāvo”ti,
anya-e0104n0:883_11: taṃ na yujjati. Sā pana pariyesiyamānā yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddhā hotīti hetūsu
anya-e0104n0:883_12: viya sampayuttesupi yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo, na hetupaṭibaddhoti
anya-e0104n0:884_0: Viruḷhamūlā viyāti etena mūlāni viya mūlānīti dasseti. Tenevāha “suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:884_1: Svāyaṃ “kusalo dhammo kusalassa, kusalo dhammo abyākatassa, kusalo dhammo kusalābyākatassa,
anya-e0104n0:884_2: akusalo dhammo akusalassa, akusalo dhammo abyākatassa, akusalo dhammo akusalābyākatassa,
anya-e0104n0:884_3: abyākato dhammo abyākatassā”ti evaṃ sattadhā pañhāvāre niddiṭṭho. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:884_4: hetukiccaṃ dassentena “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:884_5: hetupaccayena paccayo”ti, tattha paṭhamo hetusaddo paccattaniddiṭṭho paccayadhammaniddeso,
anya-e0104n0:884_6: tenassa hetubhāvena upakārakatā hetupaccayatāti dasseti. Dutiyo paccayuppannavisesanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:884_7: tena na yesaṃ kesañci sampayuttakānaṃ hetū hetupaccayena paccayo, atha kho hetunā
anya-e0104n0:884_8: sampayuttānamevāti dasseti. Nanu ca sampayuttasaddassa sāpekkhattā dutiye hetusadde
anya-e0104n0:884_9: avijjamānepi aññassa apekkhitabbassa aniddiṭṭhattā hetū attanāva sampayuttakānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:884_10: hetupaccayena paccayoti ayamattho viññāyatīti? Nāyamekanto. Hetusaddo hi paccattaniddiṭṭho
anya-e0104n0:884_11: “hetupaccayena paccayo”ti ettheva byāvaṭo yadā gayhati, na tadā sampayuttavisesanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:884_12: hotīti sampayuttaavisiṭṭhā ye keci gahitā bhaveyyunti. Nanu ca yathā “arūpino āhārā
anya-e0104n0:884_13: sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ, arūpino indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammāna”nti ca vutte
anya-e0104n0:884_14: dutiyena āhāraggahaṇena, indriyaggahaṇena ca vināpi āhārindriyasampayuttakāva gayhanti,
anya-e0104n0:884_15: evamidhāpi siyāti? Na, āhārindriyāsampayuttassa vajjetabbassa abhāvato. Vajjetabbābhāvato
anya-e0104n0:884_16: hi tattha dutiye āhārindriyaggahaṇe asatipi taṃsampayuttakāva gayhantīti taṃ na kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:884_17: idha pana vajjetabbaṃ atthīti kattabbaṃ dutiyaṃ hetuggahaṇaṃ. Evampi “hetū hetusampayuttakāna”nti
anya-e0104n0:884_18: ettha hetusampayuttakānaṃ so eva sampayuttakahetūti visesanassa akatattā yo koci
anya-e0104n0:884_19: hetu yassa kassaci hetusampayuttassa hetupaccayena paccayoti āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati,
anya-e0104n0:884_20: paccattaniddiṭṭhasseva hetuno puna sampayuttavisesanabhāvena vuttattā. Etadatthameva
anya-e0104n0:884_21: hi vināpi dutiyena hetusaddena hetusampayuttabhāve siddhepi tassa gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:885_0: Atha vā asati dutiye hetusadde hetusampayuttakānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo, na pana
anya-e0104n0:885_1: hetūnanti evampi gahaṇaṃ siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ so vutto. Tena hetusampayuttabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:885_2: ye labhanti, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ hetūnaṃ, aññesampi hetū hetupaccayena paccayoti dassitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:885_3: hoti. Yasmā pana hetujhānamaggā patiṭṭhāmattādibhāvena aññadhammanirapekkhā, na āhārindriyā
anya-e0104n0:885_4: viya sāpekkhā eva, tasmā etesveva dutiyaṃ hetādiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Āhārindriyā pana
anya-e0104n0:885_5: āharitabbaīsitabbāpekkhā eva, tasmā te vināpi dutiyena āhārindriyaggahaṇena attanā
anya-e0104n0:885_6: eva āharitabbe, īsitabbe ca āhārindriyabhūte, aññe ca sampayuttake paricchindantīti
anya-e0104n0:885_7: taṃ tattha na kataṃ. Idha ca dutiyena hetuggahaṇena paccayuppannānaṃ hetunā, paccayabhūteneva
anya-e0104n0:885_8: ca sampayuttānaṃ hetūnaṃ, aññesañca paricchinnattā puna visesena kiccaṃ natthīti
anya-e0104n0:885_9: pañhāvāre “kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhāna”ntiādīsu dutiyaṃ hetuggahaṇaṃ na katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:886_0: 596. Ārammaṇabhāvenāti visayabhāvena, ālambitabbabhāvenāti attho. Ārabhitvāpīti pi-saddena
anya-e0104n0:886_1: imamatthaṃ dasseti – rūpāyatanādimatte yasmiṃ kismiñci ekasmiṃ aṭṭhatvā “yaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:886_4: na koci dhammo ārammaṇapaccayo na hotīti. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo heṭṭhā vibhāvito
anya-e0104n0:886_5: eva. Ālambitvāti gahetvā. Ekantasārammaṇabhāvato anārabbha pavatti eva natthīti āha
anya-e0104n0:886_6: “ārabbhevā”ti. Svāyaṃ “kusalo dhammo kusalassa, kusalo dhammo akusalassa, kusalo
anya-e0104n0:886_7: dhammo abyākatassa, akusalo dhammo akusalassa, kusalassa, abyākatassa, abyākato dhammo
anya-e0104n0:886_8: abyākatassa, kusalassa, akusalassā”ti evaṃ navappakāro veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:887_0: 597. Jeṭṭhakaṭṭhenāti pamukhabhāvena. Attādhīnānañhi patibhūto dhammo adhipati. So
anya-e0104n0:887_1: tesaṃ pamukhabhāvena pavattati. “Chandavato kiṃ nāma na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:887_2: labhitvā uppajjamāne cittuppāde chandādayo dhurabhūtā jeṭṭhakabhūtā sampayuttadhamme
anya-e0104n0:887_3: sādhayamānā vase vattayamānā hutvā pavattanti, sampayuttadhammā ca tesaṃ vasena vattanti
anya-e0104n0:887_4: hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanato, tena te adhipatipaccayā honti. Garukātabbampi ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:887_6: viya paccayo hoti. Tasmā ayaṃ attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena upakārakattā adhipatipaccayoti
anya-e0104n0:887_7: daṭṭhabbo. Chandādhipatīti chandasaṅkhāto adhipati, chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:887_8: katvā cittuppattikāle uppannassa kattukamyatāchandassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:887_9: Kasmā pana yathā hetupaccayaniddese “hetū hetusampayuttakāna”nti vuttaṃ, evamidha
anya-e0104n0:887_11: nayena vuttanti? Ekakkhaṇe abhāvato. Hetavo hi dve tayopi ekakkhaṇe hetupaccayā honti,
anya-e0104n0:887_12: mūlaṭṭhena upakārakabhāvassa avijahanato. Adhipati pana jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena upakārako,
anya-e0104n0:887_13: na ca ekakkhaṇe bahū jeṭṭhakā honti. Tasmā ekato uppannānampi tesaṃ ekakkhaṇe adhipatipaccayabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:887_14: natthīti “adhipatī adhipatisampayuttakāna”nti avatvā “chandādhipati chandasampayuttakāna”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:888_0: Yaṃ yaṃ dhammanti yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇadhammaṃ. Garuṃ katvāti garukāracittīkāravasena
anya-e0104n0:888_1: vā assādanavasena vā garukārikaṃ laddhabbaṃ avijahitabbaṃ anavaññātaṃ katvā. Te te
anya-e0104n0:888_2: dhammāti te te garukātabbā dhammā. Tesaṃ tesanti taṃtaṃgarukārakadhammānaṃ. Adhipatipaccayenāti
anya-e0104n0:888_3: ārammaṇādhipatipaccayena. Svāyaṃ “kusalo dhammo kusalassa sahajātārammaṇehi, akusalassa
anya-e0104n0:888_4: ārammaṇeneva, abyākatassa sahajātārammaṇehi, kusalābyākatassa sahajātenevāti kusalamūlā
anya-e0104n0:888_5: cattāro, akusalo dhammo akusalassa sahajātārammaṇehi, abyākatassa sahajāteneva, tathā
anya-e0104n0:888_6: akusalābyākatassāti akusalamūlā tayo, abyākato dhammo abyākatassa sahajātārammaṇehi,
anya-e0104n0:888_7: kusalassa ārammaṇeneva, tathā akusalassāti abyākatamūlā tayo”ti saṅkhepato dasappakāro
anya-e0104n0:888_8: adhipatipaccayo. Ettha ca sattadhā sahajātādhipati, sattadhā ārammaṇādhipati veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:889_0: 598. Antarāyatīti antaraṃ, byavadhāyakanti attho. Nāssa antaraṃ vijjatīti anantaro,
anya-e0104n0:889_1: anantaro ca so paccayo cāti anantarapaccayo. “Atthānantaratā anantarapaccayo, kālānantaratā
anya-e0104n0:889_2: samanantarapaccayo”tiādinā bahudhā papañcayanti, asāraṃ ganthavitthāraṃ karonti.
anya-e0104n0:889_3: Yathā pavattiokāsadānavisesabhāvena natthivigatapaccayā vuttā, na evaṃ anantarasamanantarapaccayā,
anya-e0104n0:889_4: ete pana cittaniyamahetubhāvena vuttāti taṃ cittaniyamahetubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yo hi
anya-e0104n0:889_5: esā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha manoviññāṇadhātūtiādi cittaniyamoti ettha ādi-saddena
anya-e0104n0:889_6: santīraṇānantarā voṭṭhabbanaṃ, cutianantarā paṭisandhīti yassa yassa cittassa anantarā
anya-e0104n0:889_7: yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa tassa tadanantaruppādaniyamo taṃtaṃsahakāripaccayavisiṭṭhassa
anya-e0104n0:890_0: Atthānantaratāyāti atthena kenaci dhammena anantaratāya. Kālānantaratāyāti kālabhedena
anya-e0104n0:890_1: anantaratāya. Ācariyānanti idhāpi revatācariyameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:890_2: kālānantaratāya samanantarapaccayabhāve, tasmiṃ vā yathāvuttavirodhe. Bhāvanābalena
anya-e0104n0:890_3: pana vāritattāti ettha yathā rukkhassa vedhe dinne pupphituṃ samatthasseva pupphanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:890_4: na hoti, vedhe pana apanīte tāya eva samatthatāya pupphanaṃ hoti, evamidhāpi bhāvanābalena
anya-e0104n0:890_5: vāritattā samuṭṭhāpanasamatthasseva asamuṭṭhāpanaṃ, tasmiñca apagate tāya eva samatthatāya
anya-e0104n0:890_6: samuṭṭhāpanaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. Tampi vacanaṃ kālānantaratā natthi sattāhādinā kālena
anya-e0104n0:890_7: antaritabhāvato. Etadeva “kālantaritatā atthi” icceva vadāma. Nanu ca kālo nāma koci
anya-e0104n0:890_8: paramatthato natthīti vadeyyāti āsaṅkanto āha “kālānantara…pe… laddhī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:891_0: Byañjanamattatovettha nānākaraṇaṃ paccetabbaṃ, na atthatoti upacayasantatiadhivacananiruttipadānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:891_1: viya saddatthamattato nānākaraṇaṃ, na vacanīyatthatoti adhippāyo. Teneva saddatthavisesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:891_4: sahāvaṭṭhānābhāvato ca “idamito heṭṭhā, uddhaṃ, tiriya”nti vibhāgābhāvā attanā ekattamiva
anya-e0104n0:891_5: upanetvā suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena uppādanasamatthatā samanantarapaccayatā. Uppādanasamatthatāti
anya-e0104n0:891_6: ca abyāpārattā dhammānaṃ yasmiṃ yadākāre niruddhe, vattamāne vā sati taṃtaṃvisesavanto
anya-e0104n0:891_7: dhammā honti, tassa sova ākāro vuccatīti daṭṭhabbo. Dhammānaṃ pavattimattameva ca
anya-e0104n0:891_10: kālantaratā natthi. Na hi tesaṃ antarā arūpadhammappavatti atthi, yaṃ upādāya kālantaratā
anya-e0104n0:891_11: vucceyya, na ca rūpadhammappavatti arūpadhammappavattiyā antaraṃ karoti aññasantānattā.
anya-e0104n0:891_12: Rūpārūpasantatiyo hi dve aññamaññaṃ visadisasabhāvattā aññamaññūpakārabhāvena pavattamānāpi
anya-e0104n0:891_13: visuṃyeva honti. Ekasantatiyañca purimapacchimānaṃ majjhe pavattamānaṃ taṃsantatipariyāpannatāya
anya-e0104n0:891_14: antarakārakaṃ hoti. Tādisañca kiñci nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaphalasamāpattīnaṃ majjhe
anya-e0104n0:891_15: natthi, na ca abhāvo antarakārako hoti abhāvattā eva. Tasmā javanānantarassa javanassa
anya-e0104n0:891_16: viya, bhavaṅgānantarassa bhavaṅgassa viya ca nirantaratā suṭṭhu anantaratā hotīti
anya-e0104n0:891_17: tathā uppādanasamatthatā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacutīnampi daṭṭhabbā. Uppattiyā paccayabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:891_18: cettha anantarapaccayādīnaṃ pākaṭoti uppādanasamatthatāva vuttā. Paccuppannānaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:891_19: dhammānaṃ pubbantāparantaparicchedena gahitānaṃ uppajjatīti vacanaṃ alabhantānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:891_20: “atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā anantarādipaccayabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:891_21: vuttoti na so uppattiyā evāti viññāyati. Na hi kusalādiggahaṇaṃ viya paccuppannaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:891_22: aparicchedaṃ. Yato uppattimattasamaṅgino eva gahaṇaṃ siyā. Teneva ca atītattike paṭiccavārādayo
anya-e0104n0:891_23: na santīti. Tassa “kusalo dhammo kusalassa, kusalo dhammo abyākatassa, akusalo dhammo
anya-e0104n0:891_24: akusalassa, akusalo dhammo abyākatassa, abyākato dhammo abyākatassa, abyākato dhammo
anya-e0104n0:891_25: kusalassa, abyākato dhammo akusalassā”ti sattadhā bhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:892_0: 599. Uppajjamānova saha uppādanabhāvenāti etthāpi uppattiyā paccayabhāvena pākaṭena
anya-e0104n0:892_1: ṭhitiyāpi paccayabhāvaṃ nidassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, aññathā padīpanidassanaṃ na yujjeyya.
anya-e0104n0:892_2: Padīpo hi pabhāsassa ṭhitiyāpi paccayo, na uppattiyā eva. Paccayuppannānaṃ sahajātabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:892_3: upakārakatā sahajātapaccayatā. Okkantikkhaṇeti paṭisandhikkhaṇe. Tasmiṃ hi khaṇe
anya-e0104n0:892_4: nāmarūpaṃ okkantaṃ viya paralokato āgantvā idha mātukucchiādiṃ pavisantaṃ viya uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:892_5: tasmā so khaṇo okkantikkhaṇoti vuccati. Ettha ca rūpanti hadayavatthuyeva adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:892_6: Tañhi nāmassa, nāmañca tassa sahajātapaccayo hoti. Cittacetasikāti pavattiyaṃ cattāro
anya-e0104n0:892_7: khandhā paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ abhāvato. Rūpino dhammāti hadayavatthuṃ
anya-e0104n0:892_8: sandhāyāha. Tattha yadipi pubbe “okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṃ, tathāpi tena
anya-e0104n0:892_9: khaṇantare sahajātapaccayabhāvo rūpadhammānaṃ na nivāritoti tannivāraṇatthamidaṃ
anya-e0104n0:892_10: vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Kiñci kāleti keci kismiñci kāleti attho, tena rūpino dhammā
anya-e0104n0:892_11: keci vatthubhūtā kismiñci paṭisandhikāleti aññesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ, vatthuno ca pavattiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:892_12: arūpadhammānaṃ sahajātapaccayabhāvaṃ pubbe anivāritaṃ nivāreti. Evañca katvā “kiñci
anya-e0104n0:892_13: kāla”nti vā “kismiñci kāle”ti vā vattabbe tathā avatvā vibhattivipallāsaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:892_14: Tena kiñcīti upayogekavacanaṃ. “Rūpino dhammā”ti etena sambandhe paccattabahuvacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:892_15: jāyati. “Kāle”ti etena sambandhe bhummekavacananti dīpitanti veditabbaṃ. Purimena
anya-e0104n0:892_16: ca “eko khandho, vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhāna”nti ādivacanena nāmasahitaṃ eva vatthu
anya-e0104n0:892_17: nāmassa paccayoti vattabbe āpanne itarena kevalassa ca tathāvattabbataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:892_18: Svāyaṃ sahajātapaccayo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa, abyākatassa, kusalābyākatassa, akusalo
anya-e0104n0:892_19: dhammo akusalassa, abyākatassa, akusalābyākatassa, abyākato dhammo abyākatassa, kusalābyākato
anya-e0104n0:892_20: dhammo abyākatassa, akusalābyākato dhammo abyākatassā”ti navavidho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:893_0: 600. Attano upakārakassa upakārakatā aññamaññapaccayatā. Tathā hissa tidaṇḍaṃ nidassitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:893_1: Upakārakatā ca aññamaññatāvaseneva daṭṭhabbā, na sahajātatādivasena. Sahajātādipaccayo
anya-e0104n0:893_2: hontoyeva hi koci aññamaññapaccayo na hoti, na ca sahajātādipaccayadhammehi vinā
anya-e0104n0:893_3: imassa pavatti atthi. Tathā hi sahajātādipaccayo ca hontoyeva hi koci aññamaññapaccayo
anya-e0104n0:893_4: hoti. Yadi ca attano upakārakassa upakārakatāmattaṃ aññamaññapaccayo siyā, purejātapacchājātabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:893_5: upakārassa upakārakā vatthukhandhā aññamaññapaccayā siyuṃ, na ca taṃ icchitaṃ. Tena
anya-e0104n0:893_6: vuttaṃ “upakārakatā ca aññamaññavaseneva daṭṭhabbā”ti. Ayañca uppattiyā, ṭhitiyā
anya-e0104n0:893_7: ca upakārakoti veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana “kusalo dhammo kusalassa, akusalo dhammo akusalassa,
anya-e0104n0:894_0: 601. Taruādīnaṃ pathavī viya adhiṭṭhānākārena pathavīdhātu sesadhātūnaṃ, cakkhādayo
anya-e0104n0:894_1: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ upakārakā cittakammassa paṭādayo viya nissayākārena khandhādayo
anya-e0104n0:894_2: taṃtaṃnissayānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ. Pathavīdhātuyaṃ patiṭṭhāya eva hi sesadhātuyo upādārūpāni
anya-e0104n0:895_0: Adhiṭṭhānākārenāti ādhārākārena. Ādhārākāro cettha tesaṃ sātisayaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya
anya-e0104n0:895_1: veditabbo. Yato bhūtāni aniddisitabbaṭṭhānāni vuccanti, evañca katvā cakkhādīnampi
anya-e0104n0:895_2: adhiṭṭhānākārena upakārakatā suṭṭhu yujjati. Na hi yathāvuttaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāvisesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:895_3: muñcitvā añño cakkhādīsu adesakānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānākāro sambhavati. Yadipi
anya-e0104n0:895_4: yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ye ye dhammā uppajjanti, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ tadadhīnavuttibhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:895_5: Yena pana paccayabhāvavisesena cakkhādīnaṃ paṭumandabhāvesu cakkhuviññāṇādayo tadanuvidhānākāreneva
anya-e0104n0:895_6: pavattanti, svāyamidha tesaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāsiddho visesoti. Evañhi paccayabhāvasāmaññe
anya-e0104n0:895_7: satipi ārammaṇapaccayato nissayapaccayassa viseso vibhāvito hoti. Svāyaṃ nayo heṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:895_8: pakāsitova. Chaṭṭho panāti ettha “rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kismiñci kāle”ti
anya-e0104n0:895_9: idaṃ na labbhati. Yaṃ panettha labbhati “rūpino dhammā kecī”ti, tattha te eva dhamme
anya-e0104n0:895_10: dassetuṃ “cakkhāyatana”ntiādi niddiṭṭhaṃ. Yaṃ rūpanti hadayavatthuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:895_11: Ayaṃ pana nissayapaccayo terasavidho. Kathaṃ? Sahajātato kusalamūlā tayo, tathā akusalamūlā,
anya-e0104n0:895_12: abyākatamūlesu pana purejātaṃ labbhati. Abyākatañhi abyākatassa sahajātampi paccayo
anya-e0104n0:895_13: hoti, purejātampi kusalassa purejātameva, tathā akusalassa, kusalābyākataṃ sahajātapurejātato
anya-e0104n0:895_14: kusalassa, sahajātato eva abyākatassa, tathā akusalābyākata”nti evaṃ terasa.
anya-e0104n0:896_0: 602. Tadadhīnavuttitāya attano phalena nissitoti yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ nissayoti vatvā
anya-e0104n0:896_1: tattha yo bhuso nissayo, taṃ upanissayoti niddhāreti. Balavakāraṇabhāvena upakārakoti
anya-e0104n0:897_0: Tattha dānaṃ datvāti deyyadhammaṃ cajitvā. Yāya vā cetanāya so diyyati, sā cetanā
anya-e0104n0:897_1: dānaṃ. Datvāti taṃ cetanaṃ pariyodapetvā visuddhaṃ katvā. Sīlaṃ samādiyitvāti pañcaṅgadasaṅgādivasena
anya-e0104n0:897_2: niccasīlaṃ gaṇhitvā. Iminā samādānaviratiyeva dassitā, sampattaviratisamucchedaviratiyo
anya-e0104n0:897_3: pana loke “sīla”nti apākaṭattā na vuttā. Kiñcāpi na vuttā, ārammaṇapaccayo pana hontiyeva.
anya-e0104n0:897_4: Tattha samucchedavirati sekkhānaṃyeva kusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, na itaresaṃ. Uposathakammanti
anya-e0104n0:897_5: “pāṇaṃ na hane, na cādinnamādiye”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ uposathasīlaṃ. Taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhatīti
anya-e0104n0:897_6: taṃ yathāvuttaṃ kusalaṃ sekkhopi puthujjanopi paccavekkhati, arahāpi taṃ paccavekkhateva.
anya-e0104n0:897_7: Arahatopi hi pubbe kataṃ kusalaṃ kusalameva. Yena pana cittena paccavekkhati, taṃ
anya-e0104n0:897_8: kiriyacittaṃ nāma hoti. Tasmā “kusalo kusalassā”ti imasmiṃ adhikāre na labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:897_9: Pubbe suciṇṇānīti “datvā katvā”ti hi āsannakatāni vuttāni, iminā na āsannakatānīti
anya-e0104n0:897_10: veditabbāni, dānādīhi vā sesāni kāmāvacarakusalāni dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ. Jhānā vuṭṭhahitvāti
anya-e0104n0:897_11: jhānaṃ samāpanno jhānato vuṭṭhahitvā. “Jhānaṃ vuṭṭhahitvā”tipi pāḷi. Sekkhā gotrabhunti
anya-e0104n0:897_12: sotāpannaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. So hi gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhati. “Vodāna”nti idaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:897_13: sakadāgāmianāgāmino sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tesañhi taṃ cittaṃ vodānaṃ nāma hoti. Sekkhāti
anya-e0104n0:897_15: attanā paṭiladdhamaggā vuṭṭhahitvā, suddhamaggatoyeva pana vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:897_16: nāma natthi. Ādi-saddena “kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantī”ti evamādiṃ
anya-e0104n0:897_17: saṅgaṇhāti. Yadipi nānattaṃ akatvāva vibhatto, tathāpi idampi ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:898_1: Yasmā purimo abyākatadhammavasena pavatto, itaro kusalādivasenapīti sopi nikkhepaviseso
anya-e0104n0:898_2: atthato ekībhāvameva gacchati sabbesupi cittuppādesu tadubhayassa icchitabbattā.
anya-e0104n0:898_3: Evaṃ santepītiādi anantaraanantarūpanissayānaṃ visesadassanaṃ. Yathā hītiādi anantarūpanissayassa sambhavadassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:899_0: Pakatoti ettha pa-kāro upasaggo, so attano phalassa uppādanasamatthabhāvena suṭṭhukatataṃ
anya-e0104n0:899_1: dīpeti. Tathā ca kataṃ attano santāne kataṃ hotīti āha “attano santāne”tiādi. Karaṇañca
anya-e0104n0:899_2: duvidhaṃ nipphādanaṃ, upasevanañcāti taṃ dassetuṃ “nipphādito vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:899_3: nipphādanaṃ hetupaccayasamodhānena phalassa nibbattanaṃ. Upasevanaṃ pana kāye allīyāpanavasena
anya-e0104n0:899_4: upayogūpasevanaṃ, vijānanasañjānanādīnaṃ vasena ārammaṇūpasevanañca. Teneva anāgatānampi
anya-e0104n0:899_5: utusampadādīnaṃ ārammaṇūpasevanena upasevitānaṃ pakatūpanissayatā vuttā hoti, pageva
anya-e0104n0:899_6: atītapaccuppannānaṃ. Paccuppannassāpi hi “paccuppannaṃ utubhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ upanissāya
anya-e0104n0:899_7: jhānaṃ uppādetī”tiādivacanato pakatūpanissayabhāvo labbhatīti. Pakatiyā evāti paccayantarasaṅkararahitena
anya-e0104n0:899_8: attano sabhāveneva. Upanissayoti balavakāraṇaṃ katvā. Anekappakārato pabhedo veditabbo
anya-e0104n0:900_0: “Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:900_1: paccayo, purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:900_2: kesañci, kusalā abyākatānaṃ, akusalā akusalānaṃ, kusalānaṃ kesañci, akusalā abyākatānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:900_3: abyākatā abyākatānaṃ, abyākatā kusalānaṃ, abyākatā akusalānaṃ, puggalopi, senāsanampi
anya-e0104n0:901_0: Tattha ye purimā yesaṃ pacchimānaṃ anantarūpanissayo honti, te tesaṃ sabbesampi ekanteneva
anya-e0104n0:901_1: honti, na kesañci kadāci. Tasmā yesu padesu anantarūpanissayo labbhati, tesu “kesañcī”ti
anya-e0104n0:901_2: na sakkā vattunti na vuttaṃ. Ye pana purimā yesaṃ pacchimānaṃ ārammaṇūpanissayo vā
anya-e0104n0:901_3: pakatūpanissayo vā honti, te tesaṃ, na sabbesaṃ ekantena honti. Yesaṃ uppattivibandhakā
anya-e0104n0:901_4: paccayā balavanto honti, tesaṃ na bhavanti, itaresaṃ bhavanti. Tasmā yesu padesu
anya-e0104n0:901_5: anantarapaccayo na labbhati, tesu “kesañcī”ti vuttaṃ. Siddhānaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:901_6: yehi paccayuppannehi bhavitabbaṃ, tesaṃ “kesañcī”ti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0104n0:902_0: Kasiṇapaññattiyā ārammaṇūpanissayatābhāvato ekaccāya paññattiyā saddhiṃ sabbo dhammo
anya-e0104n0:902_2: pañcavidho pakatūpanissayoti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana paṭṭhānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:903_0: 603. Paṭhamataranti paccayuppannato puretaraṃ. Ayañhi purejātapaccayo rūpadhammavaseneva
anya-e0104n0:903_1: labbhati. Paccayuppanno ca arūpadhammāyeva. Tenāha “vattamānabhāvena upakārako”ti.
anya-e0104n0:903_2: Nissayārammaṇākārādīhi visiṭṭhā purejātabhāvena vinā upakārakabhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:903_3: vatthārammaṇānaṃ purejātākārena upakārakatā purejātapaccayatā. Evaṃ vatthārammaṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:904_0: Yaṃ rūpanti hadayavatthuṃ sandhāyāha. Tattha “kiñci kāle”ti pavattikālavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:904_1: “Kiñci kālena” iti paṭisandhikālavasena. Yāni ārammaṇapurejātena vinā na vattanti,
anya-e0104n0:904_2: tesaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇapurejātadassanena manodvārepi yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇapurejātena
anya-e0104n0:904_3: vattati, tassa tassa ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ sabbaṃ rūparūpaṃ ārammaṇapurejātanti dassitameva
anya-e0104n0:904_4: hoti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ pañhāvāre “ārammaṇapurejātaṃ sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ
anya-e0104n0:904_5: aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantī”tiādi. “Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa
anya-e0104n0:904_6: purejātapaccayena paccayo, abyākato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:904_7: paccayo, abyākato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo”ti abyākatamūlakā
anya-e0104n0:904_8: tayova vārā. Te ca paccekaṃ vatthupurejātaṃ, ārammaṇapurejātanti dvidhā vibhattā.
anya-e0104n0:905_0: 604. Paccayuppannadhammassa puretaraṃ siddhabhāve sati paccayadhammassa pacchājātatāti
anya-e0104n0:905_1: vuttaṃ “purejātāna”nti. Ayañca nayo rūpadhammesu eva labbhati, na arūpadhammesūti
anya-e0104n0:905_2: vuttaṃ “rūpadhammāna”nti. Yadi paccayuppannadhammā puretarameva jātā, kathaṃ paccayabhāvoti
anya-e0104n0:905_3: āha “upathambhakattenā”ti. Pacchājātena hi vinā santānāvicchedahetubhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:905_4: dhammānaṃ ye pacchājātākārena upakārakā, tesaṃ sā vippayuttākārādīhi visiṭṭhā upakārakatā
anya-e0104n0:905_5: pacchājātapaccayatā. Evaṃ sabbapaccayānaṃ paccayantarākāravisiṭṭhā upakārakatā yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:905_7: arūpadhammehi rūpakāyassa upatthambhitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Teneva “āhārāsā viyā”ti avatvā
anya-e0104n0:905_9: Saṅkhepato ṭhapetvā rūpadhamme avisiṭṭho arūpakkhandho pacchājātapaccayo. So jātivasena
anya-e0104n0:905_10: kusalo, akusalo, vipāko, kiriyāti catubbidhoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:906_0: 605. Kusalādibhāvena attanā sadisassa payogena karaṇīyassa punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ pavattanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:906_1: āsevanaṭṭho, attasadisasabhāvatāpādanaṃ vāsanaṃ vā. Purimapurimābhiyogo viyāti uggahaṇasavanadhāraṇādipurimāpurimāsevanā
anya-e0104n0:906_2: viya. Tīsu pana etesu purimā purimāti samanantarātītā daṭṭhabbā. Kasmā panettha anantarapaccaye
anya-e0104n0:906_3: viya “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ abyākatāna”ntiādinā bhinnajātiyehi
anya-e0104n0:906_4: saddhiṃ niddeso na katoti? Attano gatiṃ gāhetuṃ asamatthattā. Bhinnajātikā hi bhinnajātikānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:906_5: āsevanaguṇena paguṇabalavabhāvaṃ sampādentā attanova kusalādibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ gatiṃ
anya-e0104n0:906_6: gāhetuṃ na sakkuṇanti. Tasmā tehi saddhiṃ niddesaṃ akatvā ye yesaṃ vāsanāsaṅkhātena
anya-e0104n0:906_7: āsevanaguṇena paguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ attano kusalādibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ gatiṃ gāhetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:906_8: samatthā, tesaṃ tehi samānajātikeheva saddhiṃ niddeso katoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:907_0: Atha vipākābyākataṃ kasmā na gahitaṃ? Āsevanābhāvato. Vipākābyākatañhi kammavasena
anya-e0104n0:907_1: vipākabhāvappattaṃ kammapariṇāmitaṃ hutvā pavattamānaṃ nirussāhaṃ dubbalaṃ santaṃ
anya-e0104n0:907_2: āsevanaguṇena attano sabhāvaṃ gāhetvā paribhāvetvā neva aññaṃ vipākaṃ pavatteti,
anya-e0104n0:907_3: na ca purimavipākānubhāvaṃ gahetvā uppajjati, atha kho kammavegakkhittaṃ patitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:907_4: viya hutvā uppajjati. Tasmā sabbathāpi vipāke āsevanā natthīti na gahitaṃ. Kusalākusalakiriyānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:907_5: uppajjamānampi sakammapaṭibaddhavuttitāya āsevanaguṇaṃ na gaṇhātīti kusalādayopi
anya-e0104n0:907_6: tassa āsevanapaccayo na honti. Nānājātikattāpi cete tassa āsevanādhānaṃ na karonteva.
anya-e0104n0:907_7: Bhūmito, pana ārammaṇato vā nānājātikatā nāma natthīti parittakusalakiriyā mahaggatakusalakiriyānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:907_8: saṅkhārārammaṇañca kusalaṃ nibbānārammaṇassa āsevanapaccayo hotiyeva. Svāyaṃ “kusalo
anya-e0104n0:907_9: dhammo kusalassa, akusalo dhammo akusalassa, abyākato dhammo abyākatassa āsevanapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:907_10: paccayo”ti tidhāva vutto. Abyākataggahaṇena āvajjanavajjitā kiriyadhammā gahitā.
anya-e0104n0:908_0: 606. Cittapayogo cittakiriyā, āyūhananti attho. Yathā hi kāyavacīpayogo viññatti,
anya-e0104n0:908_1: evaṃ cittapayogo cetanā. Tena hi sā uppannakiriyatāvisiṭṭhe santāne sesapaccayasamāgame
anya-e0104n0:908_2: pavattamānānaṃ vipākakaṭattārūpānampi teneva santānavisesena kiriyābhāvena upakārikā
anya-e0104n0:908_3: hoti. Tassa hi kiriyābhāvassa pavattattā tesaṃ pavatti, na aññathā. Sahajātānaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:908_4: āyūhanakiriyābhāvena pavattamānā upakārikāti kiṃ vattabbaṃ. Kammanti ca cetanākammameva
anya-e0104n0:908_5: adhippetaṃ. Na hi cetanāsampayuttaṃ kammaṃ abhijjhādi kammapaccayo hoti. Satipi vipākadhammabhāve
anya-e0104n0:908_6: cetanāvajjānaṃ ataṃsabhāvattā vipākāpi cetanā sahajātakammapaccayo hotiyeva, svāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:909_1: sārammaṇādibhāvena sadisānampi asadisaṃ vipākabhāvaṃ dasseti. So hi vipākānaṃ payogena
anya-e0104n0:909_2: asādhetabbatāya payogena, aññathā vā sesapaccayesu siddhesu kammassa kaṭattā eva
anya-e0104n0:909_3: sijjhanato nirussāho santabhāvo hoti, na kilesavūpasantabhāvo. Tathāsantabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:909_4: eva hi bhavaṅgādayo duviññeyyā. Pañcadvārepi hi javanappavattiyā rūpādīnaṃ gahitatā
anya-e0104n0:909_5: viññāyati, abhinipātasampaṭicchanasantīraṇamattā pana vipākā duviññeyyā eva. Nirussāhasantabhāvāyāti
anya-e0104n0:909_6: nirussāhasantabhāvatthāya. Etena tappaccayavantānaṃ avipākānampi rūpadhammānaṃ vipākānukūlaṃ
anya-e0104n0:909_7: pavattiṃ dasseti. Pavattetiādi pañhāvāranayaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Paṭiccavāre pana “vipākā
anya-e0104n0:909_8: cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo”tiādinā āgatā. Ettha ca
anya-e0104n0:909_9: yesaṃ ekantena vipāko vipākapaccayo hoti, tesaṃ vasena nayadassanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:909_10: Na hi āruppe kāmarūpabhūmīsu viya vipāko rūpassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:910_0: 608. Satipi janakabhāve upatthambhakattaṃ āhārānaṃ padhānakiccanti āha “rūpārūpānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:910_1: upatthambhakattenā”ti. Upatthambhakattañhi satipi janakatte arūpīnaṃ āhārānaṃ, āhārajarūpasamuṭṭhāpakarūpāhārassa
anya-e0104n0:910_2: ca hoti. Asatipi catusamuṭṭhānikarūpūpatthambhakarūpāhārassa, asati pana upatthambhakatte
anya-e0104n0:910_3: āhārānaṃ janakattaṃ natthīti upatthambhakattaṃ padhānaṃ. Atha vā janayamānopi āhāro
anya-e0104n0:910_4: avicchedavasena upatthambhento janetīti upatthambhanabhāvo eva āhārabhāvoti “upatthambhakattenā”ti
anya-e0104n0:910_5: vuttaṃ. Keci pana “rūpāhāro attanā janitassa āhārapaccayo na hoti, aññena janitassa
anya-e0104n0:910_6: hoti, tasmā ‘upatthambhakattenā’ti vutta”nti vadanti. Taṃ “āhāro rūpassa paccayo
anya-e0104n0:910_7: honto āhārapaccayo na hotīti viruddhameta”nti apare nānujānanti. Rūpāhāro cettha
anya-e0104n0:910_8: rūpadhammānaṃ eva āhārapaccayo hoti. Arūpāhārā pana rūpadhammānampi āhārapaccayo
anya-e0104n0:910_9: honti. Tañca kho na kevalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānameva, atha kho kadāci kaṭattārūpānampīti
anya-e0104n0:911_0: 609. Adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti ettha na adhipatipaccayadhammānaṃ viya pavattinivārake abhibhavitvā
anya-e0104n0:911_1: pavattanena garubhāvo adhipatiyaṭṭho, atha kho dassanādikiccesu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi,
anya-e0104n0:911_2: jīvane kammajarūpehi arūpadhammehi ca jīvantehi, manane sampayuttadhammehi, sukhitādibhāve
anya-e0104n0:911_4: ājānane, aññātāvibhāve ca saddhādisahajātehīti evaṃ taṃtaṃkiccesu cakkhādipaccayehi
anya-e0104n0:911_5: dhammehi cakkhādīnaṃ anuvattanīyatā. Tesu hi kiccesu cakkhādīnaṃ issariyaṃ, tappaccayānañca
anya-e0104n0:911_6: tadanuvattanena tattha pavatti. Kasmā panettha itthipurisindriyadvayaṃ na gahitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:911_7: nanu cetampi liṅgādīhi anuvattīyatīti? Saccaṃ anuvattīyati, na pana paccayabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:911_8: Yathā hi jīvitāhārā yesaṃ paccayā honti, tesaṃ anupālakaupatthambhakā, atthiavigatapaccayabhūtā
anya-e0104n0:911_9: ca honti, na evaṃ itthipurisabhāvā liṅgādīnaṃ kenaci pakārena upakārakā honti. Yato
anya-e0104n0:911_10: paccayā siyuṃ, kevalaṃ pana yathāsakehi eva paccayehi pavattamānānaṃ liṅgādīnaṃ yathā
anya-e0104n0:911_11: itthiādiggahaṇassa paccayabhāvo hoti, tato aññenākārena taṃsahitasantāne appavattito
anya-e0104n0:911_12: liṅgādīhi anuvattanīyatā, indriyatā ca tesaṃ vuccati. Tasmā na tesaṃ indriyapaccayabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:911_13: vutto. Cakkhādayo arūpadhammānaṃyevāti ettha sukhindriyadukkhindriyānipi cakkhādiggahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:912_1: nijjhānaṃ pekkhanaṃ, cintanaṃ vā vitakkādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko byāpāro upanijjhāyanaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:912_3: vacanena ajhānaṅgānaṃ upekkhācittekaggatānaṃ nivattanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi
anya-e0104n0:912_4: evaṃ “satta jhānaṅgānī”ti eteneva siddhe “ṭhapetvā sukhadukkhavedanādvaya”nti kasmā
anya-e0104n0:912_5: vuttaṃ? Vedanābhedesu pañcasu sukhadukkhadvayassa ekantena ajhānaṅgabhāvadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:912_6: jhānaṅgaṭṭhāne niddiṭṭhattā, satipi vā jhānaṅgavohāre vedanābhedadvayassa ekantena
anya-e0104n0:912_8: atthi, najhānapaccayabhāvo pana natthīti sabbānipi satta jhānaṅgānīti ettha gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:912_9: kataṃ. Tattha “sabbānipī”ti vacanaṃ sabbakusalādibhedasaṅgaṇhanatthaṃ, na pana sabbacittuppādagatasaṅgaṇhanatthanti
anya-e0104n0:912_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yesaṃ pana “ṭhapetvā dvipañcaviññāṇe vedanāttaya”nti pāṭho, tesaṃ yathāvutto
anya-e0104n0:913_0: 611. Yato tato vāti sammā vā micchā vāti attho. Pañhāvāre panātiādi yadipi paccayaniddese
anya-e0104n0:913_1: taṃsamuṭṭhānaggahaṇena so attho ñāpito eva, pañhāvāre pana sarūpeneva gahitoti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:913_2: vuttaṃ. Ete pana dvepi…pe… na labbhanti “yathāsaṅkhya”nti vacanaseso veditabbo. Paṭṭhānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:913_3: pana “dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā ahetukacittesu na labbhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenassa kathamavirodhoti?
anya-e0104n0:913_4: Adhippāyavasena. Ayañhi tattha adhippāyo – ahetukacittesu eva jhānamaggapaccayā na
anya-e0104n0:913_5: labbhanti, na sahetukacittesūti sahetukacittesu alābhābhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na
anya-e0104n0:913_6: ahetukacittesu lābhābhāvadassanatthanti. Evañhi atthe gayhamāne ahetukacittesu katthaci
anya-e0104n0:913_7: kassaci lābho na nivāritoti viññāyati. Tena savitakkāhetukacittesu jhānapaccayassa
anya-e0104n0:913_8: sambhavo anuññāto hoti. Tattha hi yena alābhena dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ manodhātuādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:913_9: saṅgahasuññatavāresu jhānaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ, taṃ alābhaṃ sandhāya jhānapaccayassapi ahetukacittesu
anya-e0104n0:913_10: alābho vutto. Yathā hi sahetukacittuppādesu vitakkādīnaṃ sahajāte saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekattagatabhāvakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:913_11: upanijjhāyanabyāpāro balavā, na tathā ahetukacittuppādesūti. Idha pana dubbalampi
anya-e0104n0:913_12: upanijjhāyanaṃ yadi kiñcimattampi atthi, na tena upakārakatā na hotīti savitakkāhetukacittesupi
anya-e0104n0:913_13: jhānapaccayaṃ anujānantena “ete pana dvepi jhānamaggapaccayā dvipañcaviññāṇāhetukacittesu
anya-e0104n0:913_14: na labbhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Paccayakathā nāma samantapaṭṭhānanissitā, na dhammasaṅgaṇīnissitāti.
anya-e0104n0:914_0: 612. Samaṃ avisamaṃ, sammā, saha vā pakārehi yuttatāya ekībhāvūpagamena viya upakārakatā
anya-e0104n0:914_1: sampayuttapaccayatā. Kā pana sā pakārehi yuttatāti āha “ekavatthukaekārammaṇaekuppādekanirodhasaṅkhātenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:914_2: Tattha ye ekavatthukā, te sampayuttāti ettake vuccamāne avinibbhogarūpesu ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:914_3: sesamahābhūtupādārūpānaṃ nissayapaccayo hoti, tena tāni ekavatthukāni, cakkhādinissayabhūtāni
anya-e0104n0:914_4: vā bhūtāni ekaṃ vatthu etesu nissitanti ekavatthukānīti kappentassa tesaṃ sampayuttatāpatti
anya-e0104n0:914_5: siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ ekārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ. Ye ekavatthukā, ekārammaṇā ca, te sampayuttāti
anya-e0104n0:914_6: evampi cutiāsannānaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇādīnaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekuppādaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:914_7: Ye ekavatthukekārammaṇekuppādā, te sampayuttāti kiṃ pana nānānirodhāpi evaṃtividhalakkhaṇā
anya-e0104n0:914_8: honti, udāhu ekanirodhā evāti vicāraṇāyaṃ ekanirodhā eva evaṃlakkhaṇā hontīti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:915_0: Paṭilomato vā ekanirodhā sampayuttāti vuccamāne ekasmiṃ khaṇe nirujjhamānānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:915_1: sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti “ekuppādā”ti vuttaṃ. Evampi avinibbhogarūpānaṃ atthi ekuppādekanirodhatāti
anya-e0104n0:915_2: tesampi sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ ekārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ. Ye ekārammaṇā
anya-e0104n0:915_3: hutvā ekuppādekanirodhā, te sampayuttāti ayañca nayo ekavatthukesu eva labbhati,
anya-e0104n0:915_4: na nānāvatthukesūti dassanatthaṃ ekavatthukaggahaṇaṃ. Ye ekavatthukekārammaṇekuppādekanirodhā,
anya-e0104n0:915_5: te sampayuttāti pañcavokārabhavāpekkhāya cetaṃ ekavatthukaggahaṇaṃ. Āruppe pana vatthuyeva
anya-e0104n0:916_0: 613. Aññamaññaṃ sambandhatāya yuttānampi samānānaṃ vippayuttabhāvena visaṃsaṭṭhatāya
anya-e0104n0:916_1: nānattūpagamena upakārakatā vippayuttapaccayatā. Ayañca vippayuttatā na sampayuttapaccayatāya
anya-e0104n0:916_2: viya aññamaññaṃ paccayapaccayuppannadhammavasena gahetabbā, atha kho visuṃyeva. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:916_3: hi arūpadhammānaṃ samānajātiyatāya samadhuraṃ, idha rūpārūpadhammānaṃ vijātiyatāya
anya-e0104n0:916_4: vidhuraṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “yuttānampi…pe… vippayuttapaccayatā”ti. Na hi vatthusahajātapacchājātavasena
anya-e0104n0:916_5: ayuttānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇādibhāvena upakārakānaṃ vippayuttānampi vippayuttapaccayatā
anya-e0104n0:916_6: atthi. Yathā hi “vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, sahajātā kusalā khandhā
anya-e0104n0:916_7: cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ, pacchājātā kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
anya-e0104n0:916_8: vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato vatthunā, sahajātapacchājātavasena ca yuttānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:916_9: atthi vippayuttapaccayabhāvo, na evaṃ ayuttānaṃ atthīti. Yadi evaṃ rūpānaṃ rūpehi
anya-e0104n0:916_10: kasmā vippayuttapaccayo na vuttoti? Rūpānaṃ rūpehi satipi avinibbhoge sampayogo viya
anya-e0104n0:916_11: vippayogo natthīti na tesaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā. Vuttañhi “catūhi sampayogo, catūhi
anya-e0104n0:916_12: vippayogo”ti. Sampayujjamānānañhi arūpānaṃ rūpehi, rūpānañca tehi siyā sampayogāsaṅkāti
anya-e0104n0:916_13: tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ vippayuttapaccayatā vuttā. Rūpānaṃ pana rūpehi sampayogo natthīti
anya-e0104n0:917_0: Rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ, arūpinopi rūpīnanti ettha arūpaggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:917_1: khandhānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ. Arūpadhammesu hi cattāro eva khandhā sahajātapurejātānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:917_2: rūpadhammānaṃ vippayuttapaccayā honti. Nibbānaṃ pana yathā arūpadhammānaṃ sampayuttapaccayo
anya-e0104n0:917_3: na hoti, evaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ vippayuttapaccayo na hoti. “Catūhi sampayogo, catūhi
anya-e0104n0:917_4: vippayogo”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā arūpadhammesu catunnaṃ khandhānameva vippayuttapaccayatā.
anya-e0104n0:917_5: Vuttañca pañhāvāre “sahajātā kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:917_6: paccayo”tiādi. Rūpino dhammāti cetaṃ hadayavatthuno ceva cakkhādīnañca vasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:917_7: Rūpadhammesu hi cha vatthūniyeva arūpakkhandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayo. Rūpāyatanādayo
anya-e0104n0:917_8: pana ārammaṇadhammā kiñcāpi vippayuttadhammā, vippayuttapaccayo pana na honti. Kiṃ
anya-e0104n0:917_9: kāraṇā? Sampayogāsaṅkābhāvato. Arūpakkhandhā hi cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ abbhantarato
anya-e0104n0:917_10: nikkhamantā viya uppajjantīti siyā tattha āsaṅkā “kiṃ nu kho ime imehi sampayuttā,
anya-e0104n0:917_11: udāhu vippayuttā”ti? Ārammaṇadhammā pana vatthusannissayena uppajjamānānaṃ ārammaṇamattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:917_12: hontīti natthi tesu sampayogāsaṅkāti na te vippayuttā. Sampayogāsaṅkāsabbhāvato vatthūniyeva
anya-e0104n0:917_13: vippayuttapaccayā honti. Vuttampi cetaṃ pañhāvāre “vatthu kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
anya-e0104n0:917_14: paccayo, vatthu akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ, cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:917_15: Svāyaṃ vippayuttapaccayo “sahajātapacchājātato kusalena abyākataṃ, tathā akusalena
anya-e0104n0:917_16: abyākataṃ, sahajātapurejātapacchājātato abyākatena abyākataṃ, vatthupurejātato abyākatena
anya-e0104n0:917_17: kusalaṃ, tathā akusalanti kusalamūlamekaṃ, akusalamūlamekaṃ, abyākatamūlāni tīṇī”ti
anya-e0104n0:918_0: 614. Paccuppannalakkhaṇenāti paccuppannasabhāvena. Tena “atthi me pāpakammaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:918_1: atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti ca evamādīsu vuttaṃ nibbattitūpalabbhamānatālakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:918_2: atthibhāvaṃ nivāreti. Satipi janakatte upatthambhakattappadhānā atthibhāvena upakārakatāti
anya-e0104n0:918_4: atthibhāvena upakārakattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Sattadhā mātikā nikkhittā”ti vuttamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:918_5: pāḷiyā eva dassetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “cattāro khandhā arūpino”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:918_7: nissāyā”tiādinā sahajātapurejātavasena. Evamayaṃ pāṭho sahajātapurejātaatthipaccayavaseneva āgato.
anya-e0104n0:919_0: Aññattha pana tato aññathāpi āgatoti dassetuṃ “pañhāvāre panā”tiādimāha. Taṃ tena
anya-e0104n0:919_1: pacchājātāhārindriyavasenāpi atthipaccayattaṃ vibhāveti. Purimapāṭhe pana sāvasesā
