anya-e0104n0:919_2: desanā katāti veditabbaṃ. Sati ca yesaṃ paccayā honti, tehi ekato, puretaraṃ, pacchā
anya-e0104n0:919_3: ca uppannabhāve sahajātādipaccayattābhāvato āhāro, indriyañca sahajātādibhedaṃ na
anya-e0104n0:919_4: labhanti, tadabhāvo ca tesaṃ dhammasabhāvavasena daṭṭhabbo. Svāyaṃ atthipaccayo “sahajātato
anya-e0104n0:919_5: kusalena kusalaṃ, sahajātapacchājātato kusalena abyākataṃ, sahajātato eva kusalena
anya-e0104n0:919_6: kusalābyākatanti kusalamūlā tayo, tathā akusalamūlā. Sahajātapurejātapacchājātāhārindriyato
anya-e0104n0:919_7: pana abyākatena abyākataṃ, vatthārammaṇapurejātato abyākatena kusalaṃ, tathā akusalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:919_9: kusalañca abyākatañca abyākatassa, sahajātapurejātato akusalañca abyākatañca akusalassa,
anya-e0104n0:919_12: na nibbānaṃ. Yo hi atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārako atthibhāvaṃ labhitvā upakārako hoti,
anya-e0104n0:919_13: so atthipaccayo hoti. Nibbānañca nibbānārammaṇānaṃ na attano atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:919_14: hutvā atthibhāvalābhena upakārakaṃ hotīti, uppādādiyuttānaṃ vā natthibhāvopakārakatāviruddho
anya-e0104n0:919_15: upakārakabhāvo atthipaccayatāti, na nibbānaṃ atthipaccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:920_0: 615. Ārammaṇe phusanādivasena pavattamānānaṃ phassādīnaṃ anekesaṃ sahabhāvo natthīti
anya-e0104n0:920_1: ekasmiṃ phassādisamudāye sati dutiyo na hoti, asati pana hotīti tena natthibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:920_2: upakārakatā natthipaccayatā. Satipi purimataracittānaṃ natthibhāve na tena tāni natthibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:920_3: upakārakāni, anantarameva pana attano atthibhāvena pavattiokāsaṃ alabhamānaṃ natthibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:920_4: okāsaṃ dadamānaṃ viya upakārakaṃ hotīti “pavattiokāsadānena upakārakā”ti āha. Paṭuppannānanti paccuppannānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:921_0: “Te evā”ti etena natthivigatapaccayānaṃ dhammato visesābhāvamāha. Evaṃ santepi abhāvamattena
anya-e0104n0:921_1: upakārakatā okāsadānaṃ natthipaccayatā, sabhāvāvigamena appavattamānānaṃ sabhāvavigamena
anya-e0104n0:921_2: upakārakatā vigatapaccayatā. Natthitā ca nirodhānantarā suññatā, vigatatā nirodhappattatāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
anya-e0104n0:922_0: Atthipaccayadhammā eva cāti ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena na kevalaṃ natthivigatapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:922_1: eva dhammato avisiṭṭhā, atha kho atthiavigatapaccayāpīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Yadipime
anya-e0104n0:922_2: paccayā dhammato avisiṭṭhā, tathāpi atthitāya sasabhāvatāya upakārakatā atthipaccayatā,
anya-e0104n0:922_3: sabhāvāvigamena nirodhassa appattiyā upakārakatā avigatapaccayatāti paccayabhāvaviseso
anya-e0104n0:922_4: dhammāvisesepi veditabbo. Dhammānañhi samatthatāvisesaṃ sabbaṃ yāthāvato abhisambujjhitvā
anya-e0104n0:922_5: bhagavatā catuvīsatipaccayavisesā vuttāti dhammassāmimhi saddhāya “evaṃ visesā ete
anya-e0104n0:922_6: dhammā”ti sutamayañāṇaṃ uppādetvā cintābhāvanāmayehi tadabhisamayāya yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0104n0:923: Ettha ca ārammaṇaanantarasamanantaraupanissayapurejātaāsevanasampayuttanatthivigatapaccayā arūpadhammānaṃyeva, pacchājātapaccayo rūpadhammānaṃyeva, itare cuddasa rūpārūpadhammānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:924_1: arūpadhammā eva, purejātapaccayo rūpameva, ubhayaṃ ārammaṇūpanissaye ṭhapetvā sesā,
anya-e0104n0:925_1: tikālikā, kālavinimuttā ca. Kammapaccayo atītapaccuppannavasena dvikāliko. Sesā pañcadasa paccuppannāva.
anya-e0104n0:926_1: natthivigatapaccayā cāti ime paccayā janakā eva, na upatthambhakā. Pacchājātapaccayo
anya-e0104n0:926_2: upatthambhako eva, na janako. Sesā janakā ca upatthambhakā cāti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:928: 616. Paccayesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Duvidhā dvippakārena. Anekadhāti sattarasadhā ārammaṇapaccayādivasena.
anya-e0104n0:929_1: Samohacittajānanakāleti paresaṃ, attano ca samohassa cittassa jānanakāle. Avijjāpubbaṅgamā
anya-e0104n0:929_2: akusalappavattiyo yā kāci vipattiyo, sabbā tā mohamūlikāti ca avijjāya ādīnavadassanena
anya-e0104n0:929_3: avijjāsamatikkamatthāya vivaṭṭābhipatthanāyāti attho. Dvinnampi tesaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:929_4: Avijjāsammūḷhattāti bhavādīnavappaṭicchādikāya avijjāya sammūḷhattā. Tāneva puññānīti
anya-e0104n0:929_5: tāneva yathāvuttāni kāmāvacararūpāvacarapuññāni. Upanissayapaccayena paccayo hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:930_1: rāgādiassādanakālesu avijjaṃ ārabbha uppatti veditabbā. Garuṃ katvā assādanaṃ rāgadiṭṭhisampayuttāya
anya-e0104n0:930_2: eva avijjāya yojetabbaṃ. Assādanañca rāgo, tadaviyuttā ca diṭṭhīti assādanavacaneneva
anya-e0104n0:930_3: yathāvuttaṃ avijjaṃ garuṃ karontī diṭṭhi ca vuttāti veditabbā. Rāgādīhi ca pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:930_4: sarūpato vuttehi taṃsampayuttasaṅkhārassa avijjārammaṇāditaṃ dasseti. Anādīnavadassāvinoti
anya-e0104n0:930_5: pāṇātipātādīsu na ādīnavadassino. Avijjāya anārammaṇassa, paṭhamajavanassa ca ārammaṇādhipatianantarādipaccayavacanesu
anya-e0104n0:930_6: avuttassa, vuttassa ca sabbassa saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ “yaṃ kiñcī”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:932_0: 617. Kiṃ panāyantiādinā codakassa ayamadhippāyo – “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantī”ti
anya-e0104n0:932_1: ettha sambhavanti evāti avadhāraṇaṃ na yujjati, avasesapaccayasamavāyābhāve saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:932_2: sambhavābhāvato. Tathā saṅkhārā evāti avadhāraṇampi na yujjati. Kasmā? Aññesañca
anya-e0104n0:932_3: paccayuppannadhammānaṃ sambhavassa tato icchitabbattā. Vākyassa avadhāraṇaphalattā
anya-e0104n0:932_4: avijjāpaccayā eva saṅkhārā sambhavantīti avadhāraṇe gayhamānepi ayaṃ doso. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n0:932_6: Tattha ekāti asahāyā, kāraṇantaranirapekkhāti attho. Aññepi paccayā sahakārikāraṇabhūtā.
anya-e0104n0:932_7: Dosamettha vattukāmo codako pucchatīti ñatvā ācariyo āha “kiṃ panetthā”ti. Ettha
anya-e0104n0:932_8: avijjāya paccayantarena rahitabhāve ca sahitabhāve ca kiṃ pana vattabbaṃ, asamattā
anya-e0104n0:932_9: te codanā, avasiṭṭhañca tāva kathehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ekakāraṇavādo āpajjatīti dosappasaṅgo
anya-e0104n0:932_10: vutto. Aniṭṭho hi ekakāraṇavādo sabbattha sabbakālaṃ sambhavāpattito, ekasadisāsabhāvāpattito ca.
anya-e0104n0:933_0: Yasmā ekaṃ na ekatotiādīsu tīsu pakāresu avijjamānesu pārisesena anekato anekamevāti
anya-e0104n0:933_1: etasmiṃ catutthe eva pakāre vijjamāne ekahetuphaladīpane attho atthi, tasmā na nupapajjati
anya-e0104n0:933_2: upapajjatiyeva. Ekaṃ phalaṃ ekato natthi, anekampi ekato natthi. Anekatopi ekaṃ phalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:934: Ekekahetuphaladīpananti “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ekahetudīpanaṃ, “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ekaphaladīpananti evaṃ tattha tattha ekekahetuphaladīpanaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:935_0: Veneyyānaṃ anurūpatoti veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayassa anurūpato. Ekasseva hetuno, phalassa
anya-e0104n0:935_1: ca dīpanā satthu desanāvilāsato vā veneyyapuggalānaṃ ajjhāsayato vā. Tadubhayassa
anya-e0104n0:935_2: panettha kāraṇaṃ tattha tattha desetabbassa atthassa padhānatā, pākaṭatā, asādhāraṇatā
anya-e0104n0:935_3: ca. Desanāvilāsappattā ca buddhā bhagavanto te desetabbe atthe bahūsupi pariyāyesu
anya-e0104n0:935_4: labbhamānesu yathārucitaṃ gahetvā dhammaṃ desenti, sā desanāvilāsānurūpatā. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:935_5: pana yena pariyāyena ye veneyyā bujjhanti, teneva tesaṃ bodhanaṃ, sā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpatā.
anya-e0104n0:936_0: Yathāphassaṃ vedanāvavatthānatoti “sukhavedanīyaṃ, bhikkhave, phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati
anya-e0104n0:936_1: sukhā vedanā”tiādinā, “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:936_7: sukhādīnaṃ aviparīto paccayabhāvo eva yathāvedanaṃ phassavavatthānaṃ. Kāraṇaphalavisesena
anya-e0104n0:936_8: vā phalakāraṇavisesanicchayo hotīti ubhayatthāpi nicchayo pavatthānanti vutto.
anya-e0104n0:937_0: Kammādayoti kammaāhārautuādayo apākaṭā semhapaṭikārena rogavūpasamanato. Semhassa
anya-e0104n0:937_1: mandabhāvādinā ca semhaṃyeva pākaṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Ayamidha avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ hetubhāvena
anya-e0104n0:937_2: dīpitāti sambandho. Assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhatīti vacanatoti “saṃyojaniyesu,
anya-e0104n0:937_3: bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino taṇhā pavaḍḍhati, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:937_4: bhavo”ti iminā suttena taṇhāya saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvassa vuttattāti attho. Puna tassāpi
anya-e0104n0:937_5: avijjāya kāraṇanti dassanatthaṃ “avijjāsamudayā āsavasamudayoti ca vacanato”ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:937_6: Taṇhā vā caturupādānabhūtā kāmāsavadiṭṭhāsavā ca saṅkhārassa kāraṇanti pākaṭā avijjāhetukāti
anya-e0104n0:937_7: suttadvayenāpi avijjāya pākaṭaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ kāraṇabhāvameva dasseti. “Assādānupassino”ti
anya-e0104n0:937_8: hi vacanena bhavādīnavappaṭicchādanakiccā avijjā taṇhāya kāraṇanti dassitā hoti.
anya-e0104n0:937_9: Yasmā avidvā, tasmā puññābhisaṅkhārādike abhisaṅkharotīti avijjāya saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:937_10: pākaṭattā aviddasubhāvova saṅkhārakāraṇabhāvena vutto. Khīṇāsavassa saṅkhārābhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:937_11: asādhāraṇattā ca puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ sādhāraṇakāraṇāni vatthārammaṇādīnīti puññabhavādīnavappaṭicchādikā
anya-e0104n0:937_12: avijjā puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇanti vā attho daṭṭhabbo. Eteneva “avijjāpaccayā
anya-e0104n0:937_13: saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ettha pana padhānattā, pākaṭattā, asādhāraṇattāti
anya-e0104n0:937_15: taṇhā”tiādīsu bodhaneyyajjhāsayavasena dhammassa bodhanasaṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:938_1: avijjāya joteti. Puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārā hi iṭṭhavipākatāya, anavajjasabhāvatāya ca
anya-e0104n0:938_2: tassā viruddhā, vijātiyā cāti. Kathaṃ na yujjissatītiādi samādhānaṃ, tena yvāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:938_3: ekantāniṭṭhaphalatādihetupadeso, tassa anekantikataṃ dasseti. Ayaṃ hettha adhippāyo
anya-e0104n0:938_4: – yāyaṃ tayā codanā “evaṃ santepī”tiādinā katā, sā yuttā vipākaṃ pati. Na hi aniṭṭhavepakkaṃ
anya-e0104n0:938_5: kāraṇaṃ iṭṭhaṃ phalati, iṭṭhavepakkaṃ vā aniṭṭhaṃ. Yasmā panettha paccayuppannadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:938_6: paccayabhāvalakkhaṇadhammānaṃ dhammatā adhippetā, tatra cāyaṃ niyamo natthi vicittarūpattā
anya-e0104n0:939_0: Tattha dhammānanti sabhāvadhammānaṃ. Ṭhānanti avaṭṭhānaṃ. Tasmā ṭhānaviruddhoti atthitāviruddho.
anya-e0104n0:939_1: Keci pana “paṭisandhiādīniṭhānānī”ti vadanti. Evaṃ sati “purimacittaṃ pacchimacittassa
anya-e0104n0:939_2: ṭhānaviruddho paccayo”ti nayidaṃ ekantikaṃ siyā. Bhavaṅgampi hi bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayo,
anya-e0104n0:939_3: javanaṃ javanassa, na ca sippādīnaṃ paṭisandhiādiṭṭhānaṃ atthi, tasmā na taṃ idha
anya-e0104n0:939_4: adhippetaṃ. Kammaṃ rūpassa namanaruppanavirodhā, sārammaṇānārammaṇādivirodhā ca sabhāvaviruddho
anya-e0104n0:939_5: paccayo. Khīrādīni dadhiādīnaṃ madhurambilarasādisabhāvavirodhā. Avijānanakicco āloko
anya-e0104n0:939_6: vijānanakiccassa viññāṇassa. Amadanakiccā ca guḷādayo madanakiccassa āsavassa.
anya-e0104n0:940_0: Golomāvilomādītiādīsu golomāvilomāni dubbāya, avīti ca rattā eḷakā veditabbā. Visāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:940_1: sarassa. Dadhitilapiṭṭhaguḷāni bhūtiṇakassa. Sevālaṃ taṇḍuleyyakassa, kharavaḷavā
anya-e0104n0:940_2: assatarassāti evamādi ādi-saddena saṅgahito. Yasmā vipākā eva na, tasmā dukkhavipākāyapi
anya-e0104n0:940_3: avijjāya adukkhavipākānaṃ puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ paccayattaṃ na na yujjatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:941_1: paccayo, na itaresanti etassa pasaṅgassa nivāraṇatthaṃ “viruddho cāviruddho ca, sadisāsadiso
anya-e0104n0:941_2: tathā. Dhammānaṃ paccayo siddho”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto “iti ayaṃ avijjā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:942_0: 619. Sabbattha khandhānaṃ bhedo maraṇanti cutiṃ aggaṇhantoti idha cuti nāma tattha
anya-e0104n0:942_1: tattha bhavādīsu rūpādīnaṃ khandhānaṃ maraṇasaññito carimo bhedoti yāthāvato ajānanto.
anya-e0104n0:942_2: Sattassa sato vijjamānasseva. Dehantarasaṅkamanaṃ aññena kāyena samāgamo.
anya-e0104n0:943_0: Sabbattha khandhānaṃ pātubhāvoti tattha tattha bhavādīsu khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbatti.
anya-e0104n0:943_1: Navasarīrapātubhāvoti idha jiṇṇassa sarīrassa nikkhepe paralokapariyāpannassa navakāyassa
anya-e0104n0:948_0: Ayaṃ sattoti ayamattā, yo sāmī, nivāsī, kārako, vedako cāti adhippeto. Satto marati,
anya-e0104n0:948_1: satto upapajjatīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tīsupi ṭhānesu ādi-saddena issarakuttabrahmakuttādivikappanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:949: Sabhāvalakkhaṇanti’ruppanānubhavanādiṃ, kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāvameva vā. Sāmaññalakkhaṇanti aniccatādiṃ. Saṅkhāre attato attaniyatoti rūpādīsu ekaccaṃ attato, tadaññaṃ attaniyato.
anya-e0104n0:950_0: Attā jānāti vāti vikappeti kāpilādayo viya. Na jānāti vāti kāṇādājīvikādayo viya.
anya-e0104n0:950_1: Kāṇādopi hi attā sabhāvena na jānāti. Yadā buddhiguṇena saṃyujjati, tadā jānātīti
anya-e0104n0:950_2: icchati. So eva karoti ca kāreti cāti yo parattha sukhadukkhaṃ anubhavati, so eva
anya-e0104n0:950_3: puññāpuññaṃ sayaṃ karoti, aññañca kāreti, na aññoti adhippāyo. Saṇṭhapentāti dviaṇukādiuppādanavasena,
anya-e0104n0:950_4: icchāvasena ca sampādentā. Soti attasaññito satto. Indriyasampannoti cakkhādīhi indriyehi
anya-e0104n0:950_5: samannāgato, tena saḷāyatanappavattiṃ dasseti. Sabbañhetaṃ yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:950_6: avijjādīnaṃ kiccaṃ attano byāpāraṃ katvā diṭṭhigatiko vimuyhatīti dassanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:950_7: Acchejjasuttāvutābhejjamaṇīnaṃ viya pubbāpariyavavatthānaṃ niyati, niyatiyā, niyati
anya-e0104n0:950_8: eva vā saṅgati samāgamo niyatisaṅgati, tāya bhāvesu pariṇatā manussadevavihaṅgādibhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:950_9: pattā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā. Niyatiyā, saṅgatiyā, bhāvasaṅkhātena sabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:950_10: ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatāti ca atthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:951_0: Etehi ca vikappanehi avijjā akusalaṃ cittaṃ katvā satte puññādīsu saṅkhāresu yattha
anya-e0104n0:951_1: katthaci pavattetīti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “so avijjāya andhīkato”tiādi. Paṭipajjatīti upasaṅkamati.
anya-e0104n0:952_1: vā ñāṇaṃ samavisamaṃ dassetvā satte nibbānaṃ nayatīti pariṇāyakaṃ, tena rahito apariṇāyako.
anya-e0104n0:952_2: Dhammaṃ ñatvāti sappurisūpassayena catusaccappakāsakaṃ suttādidhammaṃ ñatvā, maggañāṇeneva
anya-e0104n0:952_3: vā sabbadhammapavaraṃ nibbānadhammaṃ ñatvā. Taṃjānanāyattaṃ pana sesasaccattayābhisamayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:952_4: samānakālampi taṃ purimakālaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ. Upasanto carissatīti aggamaggādhigamena
anya-e0104n0:952_5: sabbaso avijjūpasamā upasanto saupādisesanibbānadhātuyaṃ ṭhito yāva anupādisesanibbānadhātupatti,
anya-e0104n0:952_6: tāva sattānaṃ hitacariyāya attabhāvaṃ pavattento carissati, diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārehi
anya-e0104n0:954_0: 620. Yathāvuttasaṅkhārapaccayā uppajjamānaṃ taṃ kammanibbattameva bhavituṃ arahatīti
anya-e0104n0:954_1: “bāttiṃsa lokiyavipākaviññāṇāni saṅgahitānī”ti āha. Dhātukathāyaṃ pana vippayuttena
anya-e0104n0:954_3: phassena ye dhammā, phassapaccayā vedanāya ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi
anya-e0104n0:954_4: khandhehi…pe… saṅgahitā? Te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena,
anya-e0104n0:954_5: ekādasahi āyatanehi, ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā. Katihi asaṅgahitā? Catūhi khandhehi,
anya-e0104n0:954_6: ekenāyatanena, sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti vacanato sabbaviññāṇaphassavedanāpariggaho
anya-e0104n0:954_7: kato. Yadi hi ettha viññāṇaphassavedanā sappadesā siyuṃ, “vipākā dhammā”ti imassa
anya-e0104n0:954_8: viya visajjanaṃ siyā. Tasmā tattha abhidhammabhājanīyavasena saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇādayo
anya-e0104n0:954_9: gahitāti adhippāyo veditabbo. Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro ca abhidhammabhājanīye catubhūmakakusalasaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n0:954_10: akusalasaṅkhāro ca vuttoti eso eva dhātukathāyaṃ gahitoti daṭṭhabbo. Bhavo pana dhātukathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:954_11: kammūpapattibhavavisesadassanatthaṃ na abhidhammabhājanīyavasena gahito, evañca katvā
anya-e0104n0:954_12: tattha “upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti anuddharitvā “kammabhavo”tiādinā nayena bhavo uddhaṭo.
anya-e0104n0:955_1: yathāadhikatehi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi chahi viññāṇehi. Kasmā panettha lokiyavipākaviññāṇasseva
anya-e0104n0:955_2: gahaṇaṃ katanti āha “lokuttarāni pana vaṭṭakathāya na yujjantī”ti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā
anya-e0104n0:955_3: dhātukathāyaṃ “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇena ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādīsu lokuttaravipākānampi
anya-e0104n0:955_4: gahaṇaṃ katanti? Taṃ yathādhammasāsanattā abhidhammadesanāya vipākattike viya anavasesavipākadhammasaṅgaṇhanavasena
anya-e0104n0:955_5: vuttaṃ. Suttantadesanā pana yathānulomadesanāti tattha pavattinivattiyo asaṅkarato
anya-e0104n0:955_6: dassetabbā. Tasmā tadatthasaṃvaṇṇanāti katvā pavattikathāyaṃ lokiyavipākaviññāṇāniyeva
anya-e0104n0:955_7: gahitāni. Tenevāha “vaṭṭakathāya na yujjantīti na gahitānī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:956_0: Yathā kataṃ kammaṃ phaladāne samatthaṃ hoti, tathā kataṃ “upacita”nti vuccatīti vipākadānayogyameva
anya-e0104n0:956_1: saṅkhāraṃ gaṇhanto “upacitakammābhāve”ti āha. Hetu nāma byatirekappadhānanti abhāva-ggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:956_2: tena kamme sati bhāvato, asati abhāvatoti ayamettha adhippāyo. Yathā panassa viññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:956_3: saṅkhārapaccayatā na siddhā, na evaṃ vipākabhāvo. So pana siddhoti katvā āha “vipākaṃheta”nti.
anya-e0104n0:956_4: Tena viññāṇassa vipākabhāvena saṅkhārapaccayattaṃ sādheti. Tassa pana sādhanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:956_6: Yadi uppajjeyyāti yadi kammanirapekkho vipāko uppajjeyya. Sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ brahmattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:956_7: upagatānaṃ ghānādiviññāṇāni mahāvipākaviññāṇānīti tassa tassa vipākassa anokāse ṭhitānampi.
anya-e0104n0:957_0: Saṅkhārā bahū ekūnatiṃsacetanābhedato, viññāṇāni ca bahūni bāttiṃsavidhattā, na ca
anya-e0104n0:957_2: ca idaṃ viññāṇasāmaññaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ khandhaniddesepi imāni viññāṇāni niddiṭṭhāni,
anya-e0104n0:957_3: taṃ pana atisaṃkhittaṃ, na ca tattha nesaṃ saṅkhārapaccayatā vibhāvitāti taṃ pavattiyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:957_5: āraddhaṃ. Manoviññāṇeti niddhāraṇe bhūmmaṃ. Mahāvipākānīti viññāṇāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso.
anya-e0104n0:957_6: Mahāvipākāti pana pāṭhe manoviññāṇadhātuyoti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:958_0: 621. Yaṃsaṅkhārapaccayāti yassa yassa saṅkhārassa paccayabhāvena. Yaṃ viññāṇanti
anya-e0104n0:958_1: “yaṃ yaṃ viññāṇa”nti evaṃ ubhayattha āmeḍitalopo daṭṭhabbo. “Hotī”ti iminā kāraṇabhāve
anya-e0104n0:958_2: viññāṇassa sabbhāvamattaṃ paveditaṃ, na pavattivisesoti taṃ dassento “evaṃ pavatti
anya-e0104n0:958_4: kadāci uppajjantīti “imāni terasa…pe… pavattantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:958_5: vokāro vitthāro etthāti pañcavokāro, so eva bhavo, etasmiṃ pañcavokārabhave. Hoti
anya-e0104n0:958_6: hi bhinnādhikaraṇānampi aññapadatthasamāso yathā “urasilomo”ti. Atha vā yathāpaccayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:958_7: pavattamānehi pañcahi khandhehi vokarīyatīti pañcavokāro, so eva bhavoti sabbaṃ pubbe viya.
anya-e0104n0:960_1: somanassasahagatassa anuppajjanatoti keci, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. “Cakkhuṃ assādeti abhinandati,
anya-e0104n0:960_2: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati…pe… vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:960_3: uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vacanato. Iṭṭhaṃ ce
anya-e0104n0:960_4: ārammaṇaṃ, somanassatadārammaṇaṃ na na uppajjatīti. Javanena tadārammaṇaniyame somanassasahagatānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:960_5: somanassasahagatāneva sandhāya vuttanti apare, taṃ vicāretabbaṃ upekkhāsahagatakusalākusalajavanānantarampi
anya-e0104n0:961_0: Yasmā pana tihetukajavanāvasāne ca kadāci ahetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā “yebhuyyenā”ti
anya-e0104n0:961_1: vuttaṃ. Yasmā ekacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ javanārammaṇaṃ hoti, tadā tattha ekameva tadārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:961_2: hotīti katvā “sakiṃ vā”ti vuttanti keci. Apare pana tadārammaṇaṃ nāma javanārammaṇānubhavanakiccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:961_3: taṃ ekacittakkhaṇike tathā āsannabhede ārammaṇe nuppajjati. Tasmā “sakiṃ vā”ti idaṃ
anya-e0104n0:961_4: dirattatirattādi viya vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ, dvikkhattumeva
anya-e0104n0:961_5: pana uppajjatīti. “Dirattatiratta”nti ettha hi vā-saddassa abhāvā vacanasiliṭṭhatāmattena
anya-e0104n0:961_6: dirattaggahaṇaṃ katanti yujjati. “Nirantaraṃ tirattadassanatthaṃ vā”ti idha pana
anya-e0104n0:961_7: vā-saddo vikappattho vuttoti sakiṃ eva ca kadāci pavattiṃ sandhāya “sakiṃ vā”ti vuttanti
anya-e0104n0:961_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva hi sammohavinodaniyaṃ sakiṃ tadārammaṇappavattiyā vicāretabbataṃ
anya-e0104n0:961_9: dassentena “cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ pana sabbadvāresu tadārammaṇe dve eva cittavārā āgatā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:962_0: Tattha cittappavattigaṇanāyanti vipākakathāyaṃ balavarūpādiārammaṇe vuttaṃ cittappavattigaṇanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:962_1: sandhāyāha. Tattha hi dveva tadārammaṇuppattivārā vuttā. Tadeva hi sandhāya idhāpi
anya-e0104n0:962_2: vuttaṃ “abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tadārammaṇe dve cittavārā āgatā”ti. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:962_3: aniyatārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattantīti dvāraṃ anāmasitvā eva vuttaṃ, taṃ anantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:962_6: bhavaṅgasaṅkhātena, aññena ca dvārena anuppattito niyataṃ, aniyataṃ vā dvāraṃ etesanti na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0104n0:963_0: Ahetukadvayassa pana santīraṇatadārammaṇabhūtassa dvāraṃ labbhati, tañca aniyatanti
anya-e0104n0:963_1: tampi gaṇhanto “aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattantī”ti āha. Teneva cettha
anya-e0104n0:963_2: mahāvipākānampi tadārammaṇabhūtānaṃ dvāraṃ labbhatīti tatthāpi dvāraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:964_0: Ekassa sattassa pavatto rūpāvacaravipāko pathavīkasiṇādīsu yasmiṃ ārammaṇe pavatto,
anya-e0104n0:964_1: tato aññasmiṃ tassa pavatti natthīti rūpāvacarānaṃ niyatārammaṇatā vuttā. Itarāni
anya-e0104n0:964_3: ārammaṇesu pavattanato niyatārammaṇāni. Tatrāti pavattiyaṃ. Assāti bāttiṃsavidhassa
anya-e0104n0:964_4: vipākaviññāṇassa. Te te saṅkhārāti yathāvuttā puññābhisaṅkhārādisaṅkhārā. Kammapaccayenāti
anya-e0104n0:965_0: 622. Evaṃ pavattiyaṃ viññāṇappavattiṃ dassetvā paṭisandhiyaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ pana vutta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:965_1: Tattha anurūpāya paṭisandhiyāti anurūpena paṭisandhikiccena. Taṃ pana anurūpataṃ
anya-e0104n0:965_2: sayameva vakkhati. Bhavantarena bhavantarassa sandhānaṃ idha paṭisandhīti taṃ acittakampi
anya-e0104n0:965_3: atthevāti katvā “kati paṭisandhiyo”ti pucchaṃ katvāpi “kati paṭisandhicittānī”ti
anya-e0104n0:965_4: pucchā katā. “Kena katthā”ti kena cittena kasmiṃ bhave.
anya-e0104n0:966_0: Tatthāti tesu ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhicittesu. Kusalavipākāya ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyāti
anya-e0104n0:966_1: sambandho. Natthi devesu ahetukā paṭisandhīti “manussaloke”ti visesanaṃ. Napuṃsakādīnanti
anya-e0104n0:966_2: ādisaddena mammādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Keci pana ekacce ahetukapaṭisandhikā avikalindriyā
anya-e0104n0:966_3: hutvā thokaṃ vicāraṇapakatikāpi hontiyeva, tasmā tādisānampi idha ādisaddena saṅgahoti
anya-e0104n0:966_4: vadanti. Saṅkhepatoti samāsato, asukāya paṭisandhiyā asukaṃ ārammaṇanti vibhāgaṃ akatvāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:967_0: Sesānanti rūpāvacarā pañca, paṭhamatatiyāruppā dveti imāsaṃ vuttāvasesānaṃ sattannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:967_1: paṭisandhīnaṃ. Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cuticittaṃ nāma natthi paṭisandhiārammaṇe eva
anya-e0104n0:967_2: pavattanato. Dvīsu ārammaṇesūti atītanavattabbavasena dvīsu ārammaṇesu.
anya-e0104n0:968_0: 623. Tānīti pubbe katāni kammāni. Assāti āsannamaraṇassa puggalassa. Olambantīti
anya-e0104n0:968_1: sāyanhe mahantānaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ chāyā viya bhūmiyaṃ tassa citte avalambanti upatiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0104n0:968_2: Tasmiṃ niruddheti tasmiṃ cuticitte niruddhamatte tassa nirodhasamanantarameva. Tadevāti
anya-e0104n0:968_3: taṃyeva yathāvuttajavanavīthiyā ārammaṇabhūtaṃ. Avijjātaṇhādīsu kilesesu anupacchinnesveva
anya-e0104n0:968_4: kammādino upaṭṭhānaṃ, tañca ārabbha cittasantānassa bhavantaraninnapoṇapabbhāratā
anya-e0104n0:968_5: hotīti āha “anupacchinnakilesabalavināmita”nti. Santāne hi vināmite tadekadesabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:968_6: paṭisandhicittañca vināmitameva hoti, na ca ekadesavināmitabhāvena vinā santānassa
anya-e0104n0:968_7: vināmitatā atthīti. Sabbattha pana duggatipaṭisandhininnāya cutiyā purimajavanāni
anya-e0104n0:968_8: akusalāni, itarāya ca kusalānīti nicchinanti. “Nimittassādagadhitaṃ vā, bhikkhave,
anya-e0104n0:968_9: viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tiṭṭhati, anubyañjanassādagadhitaṃ vā, tasmiṃ ce samaye kālaṃ
anya-e0104n0:968_10: karoti, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati, yaṃ dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ upapajjeyya nirayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:968_11: vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā”ti hi vuttaṃ, tasmā akusalaṃ duggatiyaṃ, kusalañca sugatiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:968_12: paṭisandhiyā upanissayo hotīti. Arahato pana sabbaso kilesānaṃ upacchinnattā paṭippassaddhasabbabhavussukkatāya
anya-e0104n0:968_13: kammādinimittaṃ na upaṭṭhahati, tato vijjamānampi kammaṃ aladdhasahāyattā paṭisandhiṃ na janeti.
anya-e0104n0:969_1: aggijālavaṇṇādika”nti idaṃ taṃsadisatāvasena vuttaṃ. Na hi so eva nirayaggivaṇṇādi
anya-e0104n0:969_2: tadā tassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati. Tattha aggijālavaṇṇādikanti ādi-saddena vettaraṇīsimbaliasipattavanādivaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:969_3: saṅgaṇhāti. Narakādīsūti pana ādi-saddena petatiracchānānaṃ nibaddhasañcaraṇaṭṭhānapariyāpannavaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:969_4: Manodvāre āpāthamāgacchatīti kammabalena upaṭṭhāpitavaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassa
anya-e0104n0:969_5: viya, dibbacakkhussa viya ca manodvāre eva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati. Ekaṃ āvajjanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:969_6: pañca javanāni, dve tadārammaṇānīti tīṇi vīthicittāni.
anya-e0104n0:970_0: Rāgādihetubhūtaṃ hīnamārammaṇanti akusalavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ aniṭṭhamārammaṇamāha.
anya-e0104n0:970_1: Tampi hi saṅkappanavasena rāgassāpi hetu hotīti. Akusalavipākajanakakammasahajātānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:970_2: vā taṃsadisāsannacutijavanacetanāsahajātānañca rāgādīnaṃ hetubhāvo eva hīnatā. Tañhi
anya-e0104n0:970_4: bhaveyya. Aññathā ca iṭṭhārammaṇe pavattassa akusalakammassa vipāko akusalakammanimittārammaṇo
anya-e0104n0:970_5: na bhaveyya. Na hi akusalavipāko iṭṭhārammaṇo bhavituṃ arahatīti.
anya-e0104n0:971_0: Pañcadvāre ca āpāthaṃ āgacchantaṃ paccuppannaṃ kammanimittaṃ āsannakatakammārammaṇasantatiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:971_1: uppannaṃ, taṃsadisañca daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññathā tadeva paṭisandhiārammaṇūpaṭṭhāpakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:971_2: tadeva ca paṭisandhijanakaṃ bhaveyya. Na ca paṭisandhiyā upacārabhūtāni viya, etasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:971_3: tayā pavattitabbanti paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ anuppādentāni viya ca pavattāni cutiāsannāni
anya-e0104n0:971_4: javanāni paṭisandhijanakāni bhaveyyuṃ. “Katattā upacitattā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tadā ca
anya-e0104n0:971_5: taṃsamānavīthiyaṃ viya pavattamānāni kathaṃ katūpacitāni siyuṃ? Tadā na assāditāni.
anya-e0104n0:971_6: Na ca lokiyāni lokuttarāni viya samānavīthiphalāni honti. “Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ
anya-e0104n0:971_7: hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ, pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:971_8: maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi samattā hoti samādinnā. Tena so kāyassa bhedā
anya-e0104n0:971_9: paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”tiādinā sutte maraṇakāle
anya-e0104n0:971_10: samattāya samādinnāya micchādiṭṭhiyā, sammādiṭṭhiyā ca sahajātacetanāya paṭisandhidānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:971_11: vuttaṃ, na ca dubbalehi pañcadvārikajavanehi micchādiṭṭhi, sammādiṭṭhi vā samattā
anya-e0104n0:971_12: hoti samādinnā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “sabbampi hetaṃ kusalākusaladhammapaṭivijānanādicavanapariyosānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:971_13: kiccaṃ manodvārikacitteneva hoti, na pañcadvārikenāti sabbassapetassa kiccassa karaṇe
anya-e0104n0:972_0: Tattha hi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātīti “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ekampi
anya-e0104n0:972_1: kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na paṭivijānātīti ca vuttaṃ. Yesaṃ paṭivibhāvanappavattiyā
anya-e0104n0:972_2: sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā anveti, tesaṃ sā pavatti pañcadvāre paṭikkhittā. Kusalākusalakammasamādānañca
anya-e0104n0:972_3: tādisamevāti. Tadārammaṇānantaraṃ pana cavanaṃ, tadanantarā ca upapatti manodvārikā
anya-e0104n0:972_4: eva hoti, na sahajavanakavīthicittapariyāpannāti iminā adhippāyena idha pañcadvārikatadārammaṇānantarā
anya-e0104n0:972_5: cuti, tadanantarā paṭisandhi ca vuttāti daṭṭhabbā. Tattha avasesapañcacittakkhaṇāyuke
anya-e0104n0:972_6: rūpādimhi uppannaṃ paṭisandhiṃ sandhāya “paccuppannārammaṇaṃ upapatticittaṃ paccuppannārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:972_7: bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti, avasesaekacittakkhaṇāyuke ca uppannaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
anya-e0104n0:973_0: 624. Kaṇhapakkhe sukkapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvāti ettha yathā pubbe “pāpakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:973_1: vā”ti vutte kaṇhapakkhe “anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā”ti sukkapakkho vutto,
anya-e0104n0:973_4: devaloke vā uyyānavimānakapparukkhādivaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ sugatinimitta”nti evaṃ sukkapakkhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:973_5: ṭhapetvā sesaṃ sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Atītapaccuppannārammaṇāyāti kammakammanimittavasena
anya-e0104n0:974_0: 625. Tañca khoti yadetaṃ “anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā”ti aniyamanaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:974_1: tañca kho. Kammanimittameva āpāthamāgacchati ekantato attano kammārammaṇatāya mahaggatavipākassa.
anya-e0104n0:974_3: attho, sā pana javanavīthi mahaggatavipākassa upacāro viya daṭṭhabbā. Keci pana tañca
anya-e0104n0:974_4: vīthiṃ mahaggatāvasānaṃ vadanti. “Navattabbārammaṇā vā”ti idaṃ rūpāvacarapaṭisandhiṃ,
anya-e0104n0:974_5: āruppesu ca paṭhamaṃ, tatiyañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dutiyacatutthā pana atītārammaṇavacaneneva gahitā.
anya-e0104n0:975_0: Mātukucchivaṇṇasaṅkhātantiādinā vaṇṇo eva gatinimittabhāvena āgato. Tattha saddo
anya-e0104n0:975_1: tāva anupādinnabhāvena sugatipariyāpannatāya gatinimittabhāvena aṭṭhakathāsu nāgatoti
anya-e0104n0:975_2: yuttametaṃ, gandhādīnaṃ pana anāgamane kāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:976: Ayaṃ tāta tavatthāya buddhapūjā karīyatītiādīsu pubbacetanāvasena puññaṃ hoti. Sabbantimajavane vattamānassāpīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:977_0: 626. “Etenānusārena āruppacutiyāpi anantarā paṭisandhi veditabbā”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:977_2: eva naye ayampi paṭisandhi avaruddhāti? Na, tattha rūpāvacaracutianantarāya eva paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0104n0:977_3: vuttattā. Tattha hi “pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ vā nimittaṃ mahaggatacittaṃ vā manodvāre
anya-e0104n0:977_4: āpāthaṃ āgacchati, cakkhusotānaṃ vā”tiādinā tena vacanena rūpāvacaracutiyā eva anantarā
anya-e0104n0:977_5: paṭisandhi vuttāti viññāyati. Athāpi yathāsambhavayojanāya ayampi paṭisandhi tattheva
anya-e0104n0:977_6: avaruddhā, arūpāvacaracutianantarā pana rūpāvacarapaṭisandhi natthi. Arūpāvacare
anya-e0104n0:977_7: ca uparūpari cutiyā anantarā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā paṭisandhi natthīti catutthāruppacutiyā
anya-e0104n0:977_8: navattabbārammaṇapaṭisandhi natthi. Tena tato tattheva atītārammaṇā, kāmāvacare ca
anya-e0104n0:977_9: atītapaccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi. Itarāhi ca yathāsambhavaṃ atītanavattabbārammaṇā
anya-e0104n0:977_10: āruppapaṭisandhi, atītapaccuppannārammaṇā ca kāmāvacarapaṭisandhi yojetabbāti imassa
anya-e0104n0:978_0: 627. Evaṃ ārammaṇavasena ekavidhāya kāmāvacarasugaticutiyā duvidhā duggatipaṭisandhi,
anya-e0104n0:978_2: kāmarūpārūpānaṃ vasena pañcavidhā sugatipaṭisandhi, rūpāvacaracutiyā tatheva pañcavidhā,
anya-e0104n0:978_3: duvidhāya āruppacutiyā paccekaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ kāmāruppānaṃ vasena aṭṭhavidhā ca
anya-e0104n0:978_4: paṭisandhi dassitā. Duggaticutiyā pana ekavidhāya duggatipaṭisandhi duvidhā na dassitā,
anya-e0104n0:978_5: taṃ dassetuṃ “duggatiyaṃ ṭhitassa panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yathā vuttā pana –
anya-e0104n0:979: Dve dve pañcātha pañcaṭṭha, dve bhavālambabhedato;
anya-e0104n0:981: 628. “Kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā”tiādinā nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo heṭṭhā dassitappakāroti upanissayabhāvameva dassento “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:982_0: Nissayapaccayabhūtena rūpena sahapavattiyevettha viññāṇassa tena missitā, tadabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:982_1: amissitā. Yavanti ettha sattā ekajātisamanvayena aññamaññamissitā hontīti yoniyo.
anya-e0104n0:982_2: Sucaritaduccaritavasena gantabbā pāpuṇitabbāti gatiyo. Tiṭṭhati etthāti ṭhiti, viññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:982_3: ṭhiti viññāṇaṭṭhiti. Nānattakāyanānattasaññītiādiāvāso eva sattehi āvasitabbato sattāvāso.
anya-e0104n0:982_4: Asaññasattāvāsassa idha asambhavato “sattāvāsavasena aṭṭhavidhaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:983: 629. Aññatra jātipaṇḍakapaṭisandhiyāti ettha paṭhamakappikapaṭisandhiyāpīti vattabbaṃ. Sāpi hi bhāvena vināva uppajjatīti.
anya-e0104n0:984_0: Omatoti avamato, avakaṃsatoti attho. Ādināti “missaṃ amissa”nti etasmiṃ duke ādimhi
anya-e0104n0:984_1: vuttena missaviññāṇena. Omato dve vā tayo vā dasakā uppajjantīti gabbhaseyyakānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:984_2: vasena vuttaṃ. Aññattha pana aneke kalāpā saha uppajjanti. Brahmattabhāvepi hi anekagāvutappamāṇena
anya-e0104n0:984_3: aneke kalāpā saha uppajjantīti tiṃsato adhikāneva rūpāni honti. Tadahujātaeḷakassa
anya-e0104n0:984_4: lomaṃ jātiuṇṇāti keci. Himavantappadese jātimantaeḷakalomaṃ jātiuṇṇāti apare. Gabbhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:984_5: phāletvā gahitaeḷakalomaṃ jātiuṇṇāti aññe. Imāsu gatīsu imā yoniyo sambhavanti, imāsu
anya-e0104n0:984_6: na sambhavantīti evaṃ yonīnaṃ gativasena sambhavabhedo.
anya-e0104n0:985_0: 630. Bhummavajjesūti bhummadevānaṃ vajjanaṃ yonivibhāgaṃ pati tesaṃ manussasadisattā.
anya-e0104n0:985_1: Yoniyo tisso purimikā na hontīti yonittayapaṭikkhepena pacchimā yoni anuññātāti atthato
anya-e0104n0:985_2: āpannameva hoti. Gatittayeti manussapetatiracchānasaññite gatittaye. Tañhi ettha pubbe anāmaṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:986_0: Ca-saddo avuttasamuccayatthoti dassetuṃ “ca-saddenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kasmā pana nijjhāmataṇhikapetesu
anya-e0104n0:986_1: purimikā tisso yoniyo na santīti? Asambhavato. Tāsañhi niccāturabhāvato kāmasevā
anya-e0104n0:986_2: natthīti na tā aṇḍajādayo honti. Kucchiyaṃ tāsaṃ gabbho nāvatiṭṭhati jālasabbhāvatoti
anya-e0104n0:986_3: keci. Aggijālāya santappamānasarīrā etā nibbattantīti allaṭṭhānesu, pupphādīsu ca
anya-e0104n0:986_4: sambhavābhāvato saṃsedajatāpi tāsaṃ natthevāti vadanti. Tenāha “opapātikā eva hi te hontī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:987_0: Rūpībrahmesu tāva opapātikayonikesūti opapātikayonikehi rūpībrahme niddhāreti. Rūpībrahmesūti
anya-e0104n0:987_1: hi adhikaraṇe bhummaṃ, opapātikesūti niddhāraṇe. Tena “opapātikayonikesū”ti sāmaññato
anya-e0104n0:987_3: jīvitanavakassa cāti ettha keci “cakkhusotavatthusattakānaṃ, jīvitachakkassa cāti
anya-e0104n0:987_4: catunnaṃ kalāpānaṃ vasena rūpabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha sattavīsati rūpāni uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:987_5: tattha gandharasāhārānaṃ paṭikkhittattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā taṃ samatthentā “pāḷiyañhi
anya-e0104n0:987_6: ‘rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe ṭhapetvā aññasattānaṃ devānaṃ pañcāyatanāni pātubhavanti,
anya-e0104n0:987_7: pañca dhātuyo pātubhavantī’ti vuttaṃ, tathā ‘rūpadhātuyā cha āyatanāni, nava dhātuyo’ti
anya-e0104n0:987_8: sabbasaṅgahakavasena tattha vijjamānāyatanadhātuyo dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Kathāvatthumhi
anya-e0104n0:987_9: ca ghānāyatanādīnaṃ viya gandhāyatanādīnañca tattha bhāvo paṭikkhitto ‘atthi tattha
anya-e0104n0:987_10: ghānāyatananti? Āmantā. Atthi tattha gandhāyatananti? Na hevaṃ vattabbe’tiādinā.
anya-e0104n0:987_11: Na ca aphoṭṭhabbāyatanānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ viya agandharasāyatanānaṃ gandharasānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:987_12: tattha bhāvo sakkā vattuṃ, phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāvinimuttassa pathavīādisabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:987_13: viya gandharasāyatanabhāvavinimuttassa gandharasasabhāvassa abhāvā. Yadi ca ghānasamphassādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:987_14: kāraṇabhāvo natthīti ‘āyatanānī’ti te na vucceyyuṃ, dhātusaddo pana nissattanijjīvavācakoti
anya-e0104n0:987_15: ‘gandhadhātu rasadhātū’ti avacane kāraṇaṃ natthi, dhammabhāvo ca tesaṃ ekantena icchitabbo
anya-e0104n0:987_16: sabhāvadhāraṇādilakkhaṇato aññassa abhāvā. Dhammānañca āyatanabhāvo ekantiko yamake
anya-e0104n0:987_17: vutto ‘dhammo āyatananti? Āmantā’ti. Tasmā tesaṃ gandharasāyatanabhāvābhāvepi koci
anya-e0104n0:987_18: āyatanabhāvo vattabbo. Yadi ca phoṭṭhabbabhāvato añño pathavīādibhāvo viya gandharasabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:987_19: añño tesaṃ koci sabhāvo siyā, tesaṃ dhammāyatanasaṅgaho. Gandharasabhāve pana āyatanabhāve
anya-e0104n0:987_20: ca sati ‘gandho ca so āyatanañca gandhāyatanaṃ, raso ca so āyatanañca rasāyatana’nti
anya-e0104n0:987_21: idamāpannamevāti gandharasāyatanabhāvo ca na sakkā nivāretuṃ. ‘Tayo āhārā’ti ca vacanato
anya-e0104n0:987_22: kabaḷīkārāhārassa tattha abhāvo viññāyati. Tasmā yathā pāḷiyā avirodho hoti, tathā
anya-e0104n0:987_23: rūpagaṇanā kātabbā. Evañhi dhammatā na vilomitā hotī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:988_0: Ettha vuccate – rūpāvacarasattānaṃ ghānajivhāyatanābhāvato vijjamānāpi gandharasā
anya-e0104n0:988_1: āyatanakiccaṃ na karontīti te anāmasitvā pāḷiyaṃ “pañcāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:988_2: “cha āyatanānī”ti ca ādi vuttaṃ, “tayo āhārā”ti ca ajjhoharitabbassa āhārassa abhāvena
anya-e0104n0:988_3: ojaṭṭhamakarūpasamuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa āhārakiccassa akaraṇato, na sabbena sabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:988_4: gandharasānaṃ, ojāya ca abhāvato. Iti visayino, kiccassa ca abhāvena visayo, kiccavā
anya-e0104n0:988_5: ca dhammo na vutto. Yasmiñhi bhave visayī natthi, tasmiṃ taṃhetuko nippariyāyena
anya-e0104n0:988_6: visayassa āyatanabhāvo natthīti vijjamānassāpi avacanaṃ yathā tattheva rūpabhave
anya-e0104n0:988_7: pathavītejovāyodhātūnaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanabhāvena. Yassa pana yattha vacanaṃ, tassa
anya-e0104n0:988_8: tattha visayīsabbhāvahetuko nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo vutto yathā tattheva rūpāyatanassa.
anya-e0104n0:989_0: Yadi visayīsabbhāvahetuko visayassa nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo, kathamasaññasattānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:989_1: dve āyatanāni pātubhavantīti, asaññasattānañhi cakkhāyatanaṃ natthi, acakkhāyatanabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:989_2: ca nesaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ aññesaṃ avisayoti? Nāyaṃ virodho. Yena adhippāyena rūpadhātuyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:989_3: saññīnaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ avacanaṃ, tena rūpāyatanassāpi avacananti asaññīnaṃ ekaṃ
anya-e0104n0:989_4: āyatanaṃ vattabbaṃ. Yathāsakañhi indriyagocarabhāvāpekkhāya yesaṃ nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:989_5: atthi, tesu niddisiyamānesu tadabhāvato rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhādike visuṃ āyatanabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:989_6: avatvā dhammasabhāvānativattanato, manoviññāṇassa ca visayabhāvūpagamanato dhammāyatanantogadhe
anya-e0104n0:989_8: nāmakaraṇaṃ, piṭṭhivaṭṭakāni vā tāni katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:990_0: Yena ca pana adhippāyena asaññīnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ, tena saññīnampi gandhādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:990_1: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kātabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ “asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve
anya-e0104n0:990_2: āyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vuttaṃ. Asatipi hi tattha attano indriye rūpassa vaṇṇāyatanasabhāvātikkamo
anya-e0104n0:990_3: natthevāti taṃ rūpāyatanantveva vuccati. Iminā ca nayadassanena gandhādīni tīṇi pakkhipitvā
anya-e0104n0:990_4: saññīnaṃ aṭṭha āyatanāni, asaññīnaṃ pañcāti ayamattho dassito hoti. Evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:990_5: aññathā rūpaloke phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pathavīādīnaṃ brahmānaṃ vacīghoso eva na
anya-e0104n0:990_6: siyā. Na hi paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsamantarena saddappavatti atthi, na ca phusanasabhāvānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:990_7: katthaci aphusanabhāvatā sakkā viññātuṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanasaṅkhātassa ca bhūtattayassa
anya-e0104n0:990_8: abhāve rūpabhave rūpāyatanādīnampi sambhavo eva na siyā. Tasmā phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāyapi
anya-e0104n0:990_9: pathavīādīnaṃ tattha kāyindriyābhāvena tesaṃ phoṭṭhabbabhāvo na vutto. Evañca katvā
anya-e0104n0:990_10: rūpadhātuyaṃ tesaṃ sappaṭighavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti. Vuttañhi “asaññasattānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:990_11: anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:991_0: Paṭigho ca nāma bhūtattayassa kāyappasādaṃ pati tannissayabhūtaghaṭṭanādvārena abhimukhabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:991_1: idha pana taṃsabhāvatā. So ca phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyasabhāvassa ghaṭṭanāya abhāvato
anya-e0104n0:991_2: natthi. Yadi tattha asatipi visayini rūpāyatanaṃ gahetvā “dve āyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:991_3: atha kasmā gandhāyatanādīni gahetvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti na vuttanti? Nayadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:991_4: desanā pavattāti vuttovāyamattho. Atha vā tattha rūpāyatanasseva vacanaṃ kadāci aññabhūmikānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:991_5: pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya, na pana itaresaṃ abhāvato, nāpi pariyāyenapi āyatanabhāvābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:991_6: Asaññīnañhi rūpāyatanaṃ samānatalavāsīnaṃ vehapphalānaṃ, uparibhūmikānañca suddhāvāsānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:991_7: pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ gacchati, na pana gandharasāti tesaṃyeva tattha avacanaṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:991_8: Kathāvatthumhi ca nippariyāyena gandhāyatanādīnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ paṭijānantaṃ sandhāya paṭisedho kato.
anya-e0104n0:992_0: Yadipi cetaṃ vacanaṃ tattha gandhāyatanādīnaṃ abhāvavibhāvanaṃ na hoti, atthibhāvadīpanampi
anya-e0104n0:992_1: pana aññavacanaṃ natthevāti? Nayidamevaṃ, aṭṭhakathāsu tattha nesaṃ atthibhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:992_2: niddhāretvā vuttattā. Yañhi aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ pāḷiyā na virujjhati, taṃ pāḷi viya
anya-e0104n0:992_3: pamāṇabhūtaṃ agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā āgatattā. Tattha siyā – yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:992_4: pāḷiyā na virujjhati aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, taṃ pamāṇaṃ, idaṃ pana virujjhatīti? Nayidamevaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:992_5: yathā na virujjhati, tathā paṭipāditattā. Cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanānaṃ, tannissayānañca
anya-e0104n0:992_6: viññāṇānaṃ sattasuññatāsandassanatthaṃ bhagavato dhātudesanāti āyatanabhāvena vuttānaṃyeva
anya-e0104n0:992_7: dhātubhāvadīpanato dhātubhāvassāpi tesaṃ avacanaṃ yujjati eva. Tasmā yathā pāḷiyā
anya-e0104n0:992_8: avirodho hoti, tathā cakkhudasakādivasena idha rūpagaṇanā katāti na ettha dhammatāvilomanāsaṅkāya okāsoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:993_0: Aññesu saṃsedajaopapātikayonikesūti rūpībrahme pana ṭhapetvā aññesu opapātikesu,
anya-e0104n0:993_1: saṃsedajesu cāti evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Opapātikavisesanañhettha aññaggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:993_2: na saṃsedajavisesanaṃ asambhavato. Sati hi sambhave, byabhicāre ca visesanavisesitabbatā
anya-e0104n0:993_3: hoti. Kāmāvacaradevesu sabbakālaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu yathāvuttāya santatiyā rūpānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:993_4: labbhanato vuttaṃ “tāni ca niccaṃ devesū”ti. Na hi te kadācipi vikalindriyā, abhāvakā
anya-e0104n0:993_5: ca hontīti. Cakkhu nesaṃ dasannaṃ pūraṇoti katvā cakkhudasako nāma, asādhāraṇena
anya-e0104n0:993_6: vā cakkhunā lakkhito dasako cakkhudasako. Evaṃ sesāti yathā cakkhudasako vutto, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:993_7: sesāpi dasakā yojetvā veditabbā. “Saṃsedajūpapātayonīsu, avakaṃsato tiṃsā”ti saṅkhepena
anya-e0104n0:993_8: vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “avakaṃsato panā”tiādimāha, taṃ panetaṃ pāḷiyā na sameti.
anya-e0104n0:993_9: Na hi pāḷiyaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapatti vuttā. Dhammahadayavibhaṅge
anya-e0104n0:993_10: hi “kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavanti, kassaci dasāyatanāni,
anya-e0104n0:993_11: kassaci aparāni dasāyatanāni, kassaci navāyatanāni, kassaci sattāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti
anya-e0104n0:993_12: vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti. Yadi hi aghānakassāpi upapatti
anya-e0104n0:993_13: siyā, tikkhattuṃ “dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, tikkhattuñca “navāyatanāni
anya-e0104n0:994_0: Tattha upapattikkhaṇeti paṭisandhikkhaṇe. Ekādasāti paripuṇṇāyatanassa saddāyatanavajjāni
anya-e0104n0:994_1: ekādasa āyatanāni. Kassaci dasāyatanānīti andhassa cakkhāyatanavajjāni. Aparāni dasāyatanānīti
anya-e0104n0:994_4: vuttaṃ. Yadi cakkhusotaghānavikalopi uppajjeyya, tassa aṭṭhevāyatanāni siyuṃ, na
anya-e0104n0:994_5: ca vuttaṃ “aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti. Tasmā nattheva cakkhusotaghānavikalo. Sati
anya-e0104n0:994_6: ca aghānakūpapattiyaṃ punapi “kassaci aparānipi dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:994_7: siyā. Tathā ca sati yathā andhabadhirassa vasena “kassaci navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti
anya-e0104n0:994_8: ekavāraṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ andhāghānakassa, badhirāghānakassa ca vasena “kassaci aparāni
anya-e0104n0:994_9: navāyatanāni, kassaci aparānipi navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:994_10: Evaṃ dhātupātubhāvādipañhānipi vattabbānīti vadanti. Ettha ca yathā “sattati ukkaṃsatotha
anya-e0104n0:994_11: rūpānī”ti padaṃ “saṃsedajūpapātayonīsū”ti ettha yonidvayavasena yojīyati, na evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:994_12: “avakaṃsato tiṃsā”ti idaṃ. Idaṃ pana saṃsedajayonivaseneva yojetabbaṃ. Ekayoganiddiṭṭhassāpi
anya-e0104n0:994_13: ekadeso sambandhaṃ labhatīti saṃsedajassa jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:994_14: vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjantīti vuttaṃ, na opapātikassāti ayamettha aṭṭhakathāyamadhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:995_1: vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjantīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:995_2: So hi pamādapāṭho. Evañca katvā āyatanayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ “kāmadhātuyaṃ pana aghānako
anya-e0104n0:995_3: opapātiko natthi. Yadi bhaveyya, ‘kassaci aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī’ti vadeyyā”ti
anya-e0104n0:995_4: vuttaṃ. Apare panāhu “kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantīti yāva ‘kassaci navāyatanānī’ti
anya-e0104n0:995_5: pāḷi opapātike sandhāya vuttā. Tasmā pubbenāparaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avirodho siddho.
anya-e0104n0:995_6: Tathā ca yathāvuttapāḷiyā ayamatthavaṇṇanā aññadatthu saṃsandati sametiyevā”ti. Yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:995_7: paneke vadanti “opapātikaggahaṇena saṃsedajāpi saṅgayhanti. Tathā hi dhammahadayavibhaṅge
anya-e0104n0:995_10: taṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃyeva saṃsedajānaṃ opapātikesu saṅgahaṇavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:995_12: opapātikasaṅgahaṃ katvā vuttā”ti, padhānāya vā yoniyā sabbaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanayoniṃ
anya-e0104n0:995_13: dassetuṃ “opapātikānanti vutta”nti ca, idha pana yonidvayaṃ sarūpeneva pakāsetuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:995_14: saṃsedajayonivaseneva ca avakaṃsato rūpapavattiṃ dassetuṃ opapātikayoniyā itaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:995_15: asaṅgahetvā “saṃsedajūpapātayonīsū”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:996_0: Ukkaṃsāvakaṃsānaṃ pana antareti “sattati, tiṃsā”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ rūpassa ukkaṃsāvakaṃsaparicchedānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:996_1: majjhe. Anurūpato vikappo veditabboti apāyesu andhassa cha cakkhudasakābhāvato, tathā
anya-e0104n0:996_2: badhirassa sotadasakābhāvato, andhabadhirassa pana pañca cakkhusotadasakābhāvatoti
anya-e0104n0:996_3: evamādinā nayena veditabbo. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttamevāti.
anya-e0104n0:997: 631. Cutipaṭisandhīnaṃ khandhādīhi aññamaññasamānatā abhedo. Asamānatā bhedo.
anya-e0104n0:998_0: Ārammaṇatopi abhinnāti catūsu āruppesu tato tato cavitvā tattha tattheva upapajjantassa
anya-e0104n0:998_1: vasena vuttaṃ. Tatheva pana heṭṭhā, rūpabhave vā upapatti natthi. Arūpabhūmito cavitvā
anya-e0104n0:998_2: heṭṭhā upapatti nāma kāmabhave eva, tatthāpi tihetukapaṭisandhi eva. Rūpabhavato
anya-e0104n0:998_3: pana cuto duhetukopi hotīti vadanti. Amahaggatabahiddhārammaṇāya cutiyā anantarā
anya-e0104n0:998_5: vuttaṃ, avuttañca sabbaṃ saṅgahetvā āha “ayaṃ tāva arūpabhūmīsuyeva nayo”ti. Rūpārūpāvacarānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:998_6: upacārassa balavatāya tato cavitvā duggatiyaṃ upapatti natthīti “ekaccasugaticutiyā”ti
anya-e0104n0:998_7: āha. Ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhīti ettha ekaccaggahaṇassa payojanaṃ maggitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:998_8: panettha adhippāyo siyā – nānattakāyanānattasaññīsu vuttā ekacce ca vinipātikā tihetukādipaṭisandhikā,
anya-e0104n0:998_10: ca sā paṭisandhi hoti, na ekaccasugaticutiyā evāti tannivattanatthaṃ ekaccaduggatiggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:998_11: kataṃ. Apāyapaṭisandhi eva hi ekaccasugaticutiyā hoti, na sabbasugaticutiyāti. Atha
anya-e0104n0:998_12: vā duggatipaṭisandhi duvidhā ekaccasugaticutiyā anantarā, duggaticutiyā cāti. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:998_13: pacchimaṃ vajjetvā purimaṃyeva gahetuṃ vuttaṃ “ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhī”ti. Ahetukacutiyā
anya-e0104n0:998_14: sahetukapaṭisandhīti duhetukā ca tihetukā ca yojetabbā. Maṇḍūkadevaputtādīnaṃ viya
anya-e0104n0:999_0: Tassa tassa viparītato ca yathāyogaṃ yojetabbanti “ekaccasugaticutiyā ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhī”tiādīsu
anya-e0104n0:999_2: taṃ taṃ yojetabbanti attho. Yujjamānamattāpekkhanavasena napuṃsakaniddeso kato. Yojetabbanti
anya-e0104n0:999_4: pana viparītayojanā na kātabbā. Na hi mahaggataajjhattārammaṇāya cutiyā arūpabhūmīsu
anya-e0104n0:999_6: pañcakkhandhā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhī”ti etassa vipariyāyo sayameva yojito. “Atītārammaṇāya
anya-e0104n0:999_7: cutiyā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhī”ti etassa ca vipariyāyo natthi eva. Bhedaviseso
anya-e0104n0:999_8: eva ca evaṃ vitthārena dassito, abhedaviseso pana ekekasmiṃ bhede tattha tattheva
anya-e0104n0:999_10: kāmāvacarā…pe… avitakkaavicārāya avitakkāvicārā”ti. Catukkhandhāya pana catukkhandhā
anya-e0104n0:999_11: sayameva yojitā. Eteneva nayena sakkā viññātunti pañcakkhandhādīsu abhedaviseso na dassitoti.
anya-e0104n0:1000_0: 632. Itīti evaṃ vuttappakārena. Etaṃ viññāṇaṃ avijjādisahakārikāraṇasahitassa saṅkhārassa
anya-e0104n0:1000_1: vasena laddhappaccayaṃ. Bāhirakakappitassa adhipatiṭṭhanakassa abhāvato rūpārūpadhammamattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1000_2: Tenāha “na satto na jīvo”ti. Upetīti vuccati tathāvohāramattaṃ, atthato pana paccayasāmaggiyā
anya-e0104n0:1000_3: bhavantarabhāvena uppajjanamattanti adhippāyo. Tenāha “tassa cā”tiādi. Tato hetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1000_4: vināti tattha hetuṃ vinā. Manussacutipaṭisandhikkamenāti manussacutito manussapaṭisandhikkamena.
anya-e0104n0:1000_5: Evañhi pākaṭaggahaṇaṃ ubhayavisesanaṃ hoti. Pākaṭatā cettha tadāsannakkhandhavasena
anya-e0104n0:1000_7: manussacutito yassa kassaci paṭisandhikkamena. Tathā hi vakkhati “nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1001_0: Sarasenāti sabhāvena, parikkhīṇāyusaṅkhāratāyāti attho. Upakkamenāti attanā, parena
anya-e0104n0:1001_1: vā katena sīsacchedanādiupakkamena. Sabbesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgasandhīnaṃ bandhanāni sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasandhibandhanāni,
anya-e0104n0:1001_2: tesaṃ chedakānaṃ. Sannipātanti patanaṃ pavatti. Hadayappadesopi anukkamena sussitvā
anya-e0104n0:1001_3: appāvaseso hoti, pageva kāyoti āha “kamena upasussamāne sarīre”ti. Tenevāha “taṅkhaṇāvasesahadayavatthusannissita”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1001_4: “Niruddhesu cakkhādīsū”ti idaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ āyatanānaṃ anupubbuppatti viya nirodhopi
anya-e0104n0:1001_5: anupubbato hotīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ, atimandabhāvūpagamanataṃ vā sandhāya “niruddhesū”ti
anya-e0104n0:1001_6: vuttaṃ, na anavasesanirodhaṃ. Pañcadvārikaviññāṇānantarampi hi pubbe cuti dassitā.
anya-e0104n0:1001_7: Yamake ca “yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhati, tassa manāyatanaṃ nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
anya-e0104n0:1001_8: Yassa vā pana manāyatanaṃ nirujjhati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhatīti? Sacittakānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1001_9: acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanaṃ nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhati.
anya-e0104n0:1001_10: Sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanañca nirujjhati, cakkhāyatanañca nirujjhatī”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1002_0: Hadayavatthumatteti hadayavatthupadesamatte. Na hi hadayavatthuṃ nissāya kāyindriyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1002_1: pavattati. Hadayavatthupi tadā ātape pakkhittaharitatālapaṇṇaṃ viya appāvasesaṃ hotīti
anya-e0104n0:1002_3: kevalaṃ hadayavatthusannissitameva, tadā viññāṇaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “taṅkhaṇāvasesahadayavatthusannissita”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1002_4: Mātughātādi, mahaggatamaññaṃ vā tādisaṃ garukaṃ nāma. Samāsevitaṃ abhiṇhaso kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1002_5: Āsannaṃ maraṇakāle kataṃ, yadā tadā vā katampi paribyattaṃ hutvā anussaritaṃ. Pubbakataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1002_6: aparāpariyāyavedanīyaṃ. Laddho avaseso avijjādiko viññāṇassa paccayo etenāti laddhāvasesapaccayo,
anya-e0104n0:1002_7: saṅkhāro. Etena vipaccituṃ katokāsaṃ yathūpacitaṃ kusalākusalacetanamāha. Kammanimittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1002_8: nāma yaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā āyūhanakāle kammaṃ āyūhati, taṃ. Atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthakepi
anya-e0104n0:1002_9: hi kamme kate vipaccanakāle āgantvā kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā upatiṭṭhati. Gatinimittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1002_10: nāma nibbattanakaokāse eko vaṇṇo. So ca niraye nibbattanārahassa “aggijālavaṇṇādiko”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1002_11: heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Avijjāpaṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ kammādivisaye paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1003_0: Taṇhāya appahīnattā eva, purimuppannāya ca santatiyā tathāpariṇatattā paṭisandhiṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1003_1: viññāṇaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāraṃ hutvā pavattatīti āha “taṇhā nāmetī”ti. Sahajātasaṅkhārāti
anya-e0104n0:1003_2: cutiāsannajavanaviññāṇasahajātā cetanā, sabbepi vā phassādayo. Tasmiṃ paṭisandhiṭṭhāne
anya-e0104n0:1003_3: kammādivisaye viññāṇaṃ khipanti. Khipantā viya tasmiṃ visaye paṭisandhivasena viññāṇapatiṭṭhānassa
anya-e0104n0:1003_4: hetubhāvena pavattantīti attho. Tanti taṃ viññāṇaṃ. Cutipaṭisandhitadāsannaviññāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1003_5: santativasena viññāṇanti upanītekattaṃ. Taṇhāya nāmiyamānaṃ…pe… pavattatīti namanakhipanapurimanissayajahanaaparanissayassādananissayarahitapavattanāni
anya-e0104n0:1003_6: santativasena tassevekassa viññāṇassa honti, na aññassāti dasseti. Santativasenāti
anya-e0104n0:1003_7: ca vadanto “tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”nti imañca micchāgāhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1003_8: paṭikkhipati. Sati hi nānattanaye santativasena ekattanayo hotīti. Ettha ca orimatīrarukkhavinibaddharajju
anya-e0104n0:1003_9: viya purimabhavattabhāvavinibaddhaṃ kammādiārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, puriso viya viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1003_10: tassa mātikātikkamanicchā viya taṇhā, atikkamanapayogo viya khipanakasaṅkhārā, yathā
anya-e0104n0:1003_11: ca so puriso paratīre patiṭṭhahamāno paratīrarukkhavinibaddhaṃ kiñci assādayamāno
anya-e0104n0:1003_12: vā anassādayamāno vā kevalaṃ pathaviyaṃ sakabalapayogeheva patiṭṭhāti, evamidampi
anya-e0104n0:1003_14: catuvokārabhave anassādayamānaṃ vā kevalaṃ ārammaṇasampayuttakammeheva pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:1004_2: viññāṇaṃ nāpi idhāgataṃ imasmiṃyeva bhave uppannattā. Kammanti paṭisandhijanakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1004_3: kammaṃ. Saṅkhārāti cutiāsannajavanaviññāṇasahagatā khipanakasaṅkhārā. Natīti namanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1005_0: 633. Saddapaṭighosādīnaṃ satipi paccayapaccayuppannabhāve santānabandho na pākaṭoti
anya-e0104n0:1005_2: cā”tiādimāha. Saddādihetukāti ettha paṭighoso saddahetuko. Padīpo padīpantarādihetuko.
anya-e0104n0:1005_3: Muddā lañchanahetukā. Chāyā ādāsādiabhimukhamukhādihetukā. Honti aññatra agantvāti
anya-e0104n0:1005_4: saddādipaccayadesaṃ anupagantvā saddādihetukā honti tato pubbe abhāvā. Evaṃ idampi
anya-e0104n0:1005_5: paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ na hetudesaṃ gantvā taṃhetukaṃ hoti tato pubbe abhāvā. Tasmā na
anya-e0104n0:1005_6: idaṃ hetudesato purimabhavato idhāgataṃ paṭighosādayo viya saddādidesato, nāpi tattha
anya-e0104n0:1005_7: hetunā vinā uppannaṃ saddādīhi vinā paṭighosādayo viyāti attho. Atha vā honti aññatra
anya-e0104n0:1005_8: agantvāti pubbe paccayadese sannihitā hutvā tato aññatra gantvā tappaccayā na honti
anya-e0104n0:1005_9: uppattito pubbe abhāvā, nāpi saddādipaccayā na honti, evaṃ idampīti vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1006_0: Natthi ekatā ekasantānekattepi aññasseva viññāṇassa pātubhavanato. Nāpi nānatā santānabandhato
anya-e0104n0:1006_1: padīpo viya. Khaṇikāya hi padīpajālāya santānekattaṃ upādāya so evāti vuccati, atthakiccañca
anya-e0104n0:1006_2: sādheti, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Yadi hī”tiādinā santānabandhe ekantaṃ ekatāya, nānatāya
anya-e0104n0:1006_3: ca aggahetabbataṃ, gahaṇe ca dosaṃ dasseti. Esa nayoti atidesena bījaṅkurādīsu sabbahetuhetusamuppannesu
anya-e0104n0:1006_4: yathāsambhavaṃ yojanā kātabbāti dasseti. Idhāpi hi hetuhetusamuppannaviññāṇānaṃ ekantamekatte
anya-e0104n0:1006_5: sati na manussagatito devagati sambhūtā siyā. Ekantanānatte na kammavato phalaṃ siyā,
anya-e0104n0:1006_6: tato “rattassa bījaṃ rattassa phala”ntiādikassa viya “bhūtapubbāhaṃ, bhante, rohitasso
anya-e0104n0:1006_7: nāma isi ahosi”ntiādikassa vohārassa lopo siyā, tasmā ettha santānabandhesu hetuhetusamuppannesu
anya-e0104n0:1006_8: na ekantamekatā vā nānatā vā upagantabbā na gahetabbā. Ettha ca ekantaekatāpaṭisedhena
anya-e0104n0:1006_9: “sayaṃkataṃ sukhaṃ dukkha”nti imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nivāreti, ekantanānatāpaṭisedhena “paraṃkataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1006_10: sukhaṃ dukkha”nti, hetuhetusamuppannatāvacanena “adhiccasamuppanna”nti imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nivāreti.
anya-e0104n0:1007_0: 634. Tatthāti phaluppattiṭṭhāne. Aññassāti yena taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, tato aññassa. Aññatoti
anya-e0104n0:1007_1: yaṃ taṃ kammaṃ nibbattitaṃ, tato aññato. “Dhammamattaṃ bhavantaramupetī”ti vuttattā
anya-e0104n0:1007_2: phalassa upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyāti anuyuñjeti. Tatrāti tasmiṃ yathāvutte anuyoge.
anya-e0104n0:1008_0: Tatthāti ekasantāne. Yasmiṃ dhammapuñje kammaṃ nibbattaṃ, tasseva santāneti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1008_1: Etassa atthassāti hetuphalānaṃ atthato aññattepi teneva hetuphalabhāvena sambandhattā
anya-e0104n0:1008_2: taṃ phalaṃ “aññassa, aññato”ti vā na vattabbanti etassa atthassa. Catumadhuraalattakarasādibhāvanā
anya-e0104n0:1008_3: ambamātuluṅgādibījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro. Ettha ca abhisaṅkhataṃ bījaṃ viya kammavā satto,
anya-e0104n0:1008_4: abhisaṅkhāro viya kammaṃ, bījassa aṅkurādippabandho viya sattassa paṭisandhiviññāṇādippabandho.
anya-e0104n0:1008_5: Tatthuppannassa madhurassa rattakesarassa vā phalassa vā tasseva bījassa, tato eva
anya-e0104n0:1008_6: ca abhisaṅkhārato bhāvo viya kammakārakasseva sattassa, taṃkammato eva ca phalassa
anya-e0104n0:1008_7: bhāvo veditabbo. Bālasarīre kataṃ vijjāpariyāpuṇanaṃ, sippasikkhanaṃ, osadhappayogo
anya-e0104n0:1008_8: ca na vuḍḍhasarīraṃ gacchanti. Atha ca tannimittaṃ vijjāpāṭavaṃ sippajānanaṃ, anāmayatā
anya-e0104n0:1008_9: ca vuḍḍhasarīre honti, na ca tāni aññassa honti taṃsantatipariyāpanne eva vuḍḍhasarīre
anya-e0104n0:1008_10: uppajjanato, na ca yathāpayuttena vijjāpariyāpuṇanādinā vinā tāni aññato honti tadabhāve
anya-e0104n0:1008_11: abhāvato, evaṃ idhāpi santāne yaṃ phalaṃ, etaṃ nāññassa. Na ca aññatoti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1008_12: Etena ca saṅkhārābhāve phalābhāvameva dasseti, na aññapaccayanivāraṇaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n0:1009: Yampi vuttaṃ, tattha vadāmāti vacanaseso. Tattha vā upabhuñjake asati siddhā bhuñjakasammutīti sambandho. Phalatīti sammuti phalatisammuti.
anya-e0104n0:1010_1: Tasmāti yasmā yathā khandhasantāne kusalākusalacetanuppattiyaṃ “puññaṃ karoti, pāpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1010_2: karotī”ti kattuvohāro, evaṃ tassa phaluppattiyaṃ “sukhaṃ anubhavati, dukkhaṃ anubhavatī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1010_3: upabhuñjakavohāro, tasmā na ettha khandhavinimuttena aññena upabhuñjakena nāma koci attho atthīti.
anya-e0104n0:1011_0: 635. Evaṃ santepīti asaṅkantipātubhāve tattha ca yathāvuttadosapariharaṇe sati, siddheti
anya-e0104n0:1011_1: attho. Pavattikkhaṇeyevāti saṅkhārānaṃ pavattamānakkhaṇe eva. Pavattito pubbeti kammāyūhanakkhaṇato
anya-e0104n0:1011_2: pubbe, avijjamānatāya samānattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Pacchā cāti vipaccanappapattito pacchā ca.
anya-e0104n0:1012: Avipakkavipākā katattā ce paccayā, vipakkavipākānampi katattaṃ samānanti tesampi phalāvahatā siyāti āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ āha “na ca niccaṃ phalāvahā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1013_0: “Na vijjamānattā avijjamānattā vā”ti etena vijjamānattaṃ, avijjamānattañca nissāya
anya-e0104n0:1013_1: vuttadose pariharati. Tassā pāṭibhogakiriyāya, bhaṇḍakīṇanakiriyāya, iṇaggahaṇakiriyāya
anya-e0104n0:1013_2: vā karaṇamattaṃ taṃkiriyākaraṇamattaṃ, tadeva tadatthaniyyātane paṭibhaṇḍadāne, iṇadāne
anya-e0104n0:1014: 636. Sammohavighātatthanti bāttiṃsāya viññāṇesu yathāvuttasaṅkhārānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavattiyañca paccayabhāve vibhajja avibhāvite pavattanakasammohassa apanayanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1015_1: bhedaṃ akatvā sāmaññato, piṇḍavasenāti attho. Sabbattha upanissayapaccayo balavakammassa
anya-e0104n0:1015_2: vasena yojetabbo. “Dubbalañhi kammaṃ upanissayapaccayo na hotī”ti paṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanāya
anya-e0104n0:1015_4: vattabbaṃ, na vā vattabbaṃ vipākassa paccayabhāvakathāya avipākārahassa pasaṅgābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1015_5: Abhiññācetanāya hi avipākatā heṭṭhā vibhāvitā eva. Avisesena panāti etthāpi eseva
anya-e0104n0:1016_1: etesaṃ pañcannaṃ. Tathevāti dvedhā eva. Kathaṃ pana iṭṭhārammaṇeyeva pavattanakāni
anya-e0104n0:1016_3: Thero hi tattha iddhiyā vassaṃ nimminitvā katipayaṃ velaṃ nirayaggiṃ vūpasametvā
anya-e0104n0:1017: Sveva kāmāvacaro puññābhisaṅkhāro. Avisesena pana puññābhisaṅkhāroti kāmāvacaraṃ, rūpāvacarañcāti duvidhampi puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ekajjhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1018_0: Dvādasākusalacetanābhedoti ettha uddhaccasahagatacetanāya gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ na dissati,
anya-e0104n0:1018_1: vicāretabbametaṃ. Ekassa viññāṇassa tatheva paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ, no pavatteti ekasseva
anya-e0104n0:1018_2: paccayabhāvaniyamo paṭisandhiyaṃ, no pavatte. Pavatte hi sattannampi paccayoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1019_1: Tāni pana ekantato aniṭṭhārammaṇāni, rūpabhave ca kathaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogoti
anya-e0104n0:1019_2: āha “so ca kho”tiādi. “Tathā kāmāvacaradevalokepi aniṭṭharūpādayo natthī”ti idaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1019_3: yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. Bahulañhi tesaṃ iṭṭhā eva rūpādayo upaṭṭhahanti, kadāci aniṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1020_0: 637. Yattha vitthārappakāsanaṃ kataṃ, tato bhavato paṭṭhāya mukhamattappakāsanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1020_1: kātukāmo āha “ādito paṭṭhāyā”ti. Teneva “dvīsu bhavesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Manussāpi keci
anya-e0104n0:1020_2: aṇḍajā, saṃsedajā ca hontīti tadapekkhāya “catūsu yonīsū”ti vuttaṃ. Ekattakāyaekattasaññitāsāmaññena
anya-e0104n0:1020_3: catutthajhānabhūmikāpi asaññāruppavajjā catutthiṃyeva viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ bhajanti. Esa
anya-e0104n0:1020_6: cuddasannaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte ca, sattannaṃ pavatte evāti ayaṃ yathāsambhavo.
anya-e0104n0:1022_0: Catunnaṃ viññāṇānanti bhavādayo apekkhitvā vuttaṃ. Catūsu antogadhānaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1022_1: viññāṇānaṃ tīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu paccayabhāvo yojetabbo. Aviññāṇake sattāvāse saṅkhārapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1022_2: viññāṇe alabbhamānepi tassa saṅkhārahetukattaṃ labbhateva. Tathā hi tattha puññābhisaṅkhāro
anya-e0104n0:1022_3: kaṭattārūpānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo hoti. Etasmiñca mukhamattappakāsane
anya-e0104n0:1022_5: bhavesu vuttanayeneva viññāyatīti na vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1024: 638. Vibhāgā nāmarūpānanti nāmassa, rūpassa ca pabhedato.
anya-e0104n0:1025_0: Tattha nāmassa tāva pabhedaṃ dassentena kāmaṃ viññāṇampi nāmameva, paccayapaccayuppanne
anya-e0104n0:1025_1: pana asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato vedanādayo tayo khandhā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1025_2: Nibbānassa panettha pavattikathāyaṃ appaccayattā, namanaṭṭhābhāvato ca pasaṅgo eva
anya-e0104n0:1025_3: natthi. Nāmanaṭṭhena hi taṃ nāmaṃ, na namanaṭṭhena. Tesaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ sukhādivasena,
anya-e0104n0:1026: Ekaṃ sattāvāsanti asaññasattāvāsaṃ. Purimesu catūsu, asaññasattāvāse cāti pañcasu.
anya-e0104n0:1027_0: Gabbhaseyyaggahaṇena jalābujā gahitāti “aṇḍajānañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Aṇḍajānañca abhāvakānanti
anya-e0104n0:1027_1: yojetabbaṃ. Santatisīsānīti kalāpasantānamūlāni. Yadipi vikārarūpāni paṭisandhikkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:1027_2: na santi, lakkhaṇaparicchedarūpāni pana santīti tāni paramatthato aparinipphannānīti
anya-e0104n0:1027_3: vajjento āha “rūparūpato”ti. Phassādike saṅkhārakkhandhabhāvena ekattaṃ netvā “tevīsati
anya-e0104n0:1027_4: dhammā”ti vuttaṃ. Apanetvāti kalāpantaragate pathavīādike samānalakkhaṇatāya aggahetvā.
anya-e0104n0:1028: Tesanti brahmakāyikādīnaṃ. Vitthārenāti catūsupi santatisīsesu rūpānaṃ asaṅkhipanena.
anya-e0104n0:1029_0: Kāmabhave pana yasmā sesaopapātikānanti ettha kiñcāpi kāmabhave opapātikā vuttā na
anya-e0104n0:1029_1: santi, yena sesaggahaṇaṃ sātthakaṃ bhaveyya, aṇḍajagabbhaseyyakehi pana opapātikasaṃsedajā
anya-e0104n0:1029_2: sesā hontīti sesaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā brahmakāyikādikehi opapātikehi
anya-e0104n0:1029_3: vuttehi sese sandhāya “sesaopapātikāna”nti āha. Te pana arūpinopi santīti “kāmabhave”ti
anya-e0104n0:1029_4: vuttaṃ. Aparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ pana nāmarūpaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ rūpamissakaviññāṇaniddese
anya-e0104n0:1029_5: vuttanayena sakkā dhammagaṇanato viññātunti na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1030_0: Paṭisandhicittena saha pavattaututoti paṭisandhicittena saha uppannarūpesu tejodhātuto.
anya-e0104n0:1030_1: Hadayavatthuno taṅkhaṇuppannattā paṭisandhicittassa vatthudubbalatā. Tesaṃ ajjhoharitāhārena
anya-e0104n0:1030_2: anugate sarīre āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ suṭṭhaddhakanti sambandho. Naroti teneva mātukucchigatabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1030_3: tirokkho. Avakaṃsato dve aṭṭhakāneva utucittasamuṭṭhānāni hontīti sasaddakālaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0104n0:1030_4: “ukkaṃsato dvinnaṃ navakāna”nti vuttaṃ. Pubbeti yaṃ pubbe santatidvayādikaṃ sattakapariyosānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1030_5: rūpaṃ idha vuttaṃ, taṃ ekekassa cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu uppajjamānameva vuttanti
anya-e0104n0:1030_6: katvā āha “pubbe…pe… sattatividha”nti. Duvidhampi tanti utusamuṭṭhānaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānañcāti
anya-e0104n0:1031_0: Saṇṭhātunti addhaniyabhāvena ṭhātuṃ, attano pana khaṇamattaṃ tiṭṭhateva. Catuddisā
anya-e0104n0:1031_1: vavatthāpitāti aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhasīsā mūlena catūsu disāsu vavatthāpitā. Aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1032_1: sahajātaviññāṇapaccayañca sandhāyāha. Tadā hi tato nāmameva hotīti. Kammaviññāṇapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1032_2: pana tadāpi ubhayaṃ hotīti sakkā vattuṃ, pacchājātaviññāṇapaccayā ca rūpaṃ upatthaddhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1032_3: hotīti. Asaññesūtiādi kammaviññāṇapaccayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pañcavokārabhave ca pavattiyanti
anya-e0104n0:1032_5: aññakālañca sandhāya vuttanti yuttaṃ. Bhavaṅgādiuppattikāle hi taṃjanakena kammunā
anya-e0104n0:1032_6: uppajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ, so ca vipāko kammaviññāṇapaccayo hotīti sakkā vattuṃ. Sahajātaviññāṇapaccayānapekkhampi
anya-e0104n0:1032_7: hi pavattiyaṃ kammena pavattamānaṃ rūpaṃ, nāmañca na kammaviññāṇānapekkhaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:1032_8: Sabbatthāti paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte ca. Sahajātaviññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, kammaviññāṇapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1032_9: nāmarūpañca yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañcāti ettha nāmarūpasaddo
anya-e0104n0:1032_10: attano ekadesena nāmasaddena nāmasaddassa sarūpo, rūpasaddena ca rūpasaddassa, tasmā
anya-e0104n0:1032_11: sarūpānaṃ ekasesoti ekadesasarūpekaseso, nāmarūpasaddassa ṭhānaṃ itaresañca nāmarūpasaddānaṃ adassananti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1033: Vipākato aññaṃ avipākaṃ. Yato dvidhā mataṃ, tato yuttameva idanti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1034_1: vipākājanakakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ. Vipākacittakkhaṇe pana abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1034_2: pubbe vuttanayena ubhayañca labbhatīti tādisavipākacittakkhaṇavajjanatthaṃ “kusalādicittakkhaṇe”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1035_0: 640. Suttantikapariyāyatoti paṭṭhāne rūpānaṃ upanissayapaccayassa avuttattā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1035_1: Suttante pana yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti, asati ca na hoti, so tassa upanissayo nidānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1035_2: hetu pabhavoti katvā “viññāṇūpanisaṃ nāmarūpa”nti rūpassa ca viññāṇūpanissayatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1035_4: tato ca cīvarādīnaṃ jīvitaparikkhārānaṃ kasirena, appakasirena ca samudāgamanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1035_5: na ca vanapatthādayo ārammaṇūpanissayādibhāvaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ, cīvarādisamudāgamanassa
anya-e0104n0:1035_6: ca bhajanti. Tasmā vinā abhāvo eva suttantikapariyāyato upanissayabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1035_8: vattabbameva natthīti rūpasseva suttantikapariyāyato ekadhāva paccayabhāvo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1035_9: Sasaṃsayassa hi rūpassetaṃ paccayo hotīti vutte nāmassa hotīti vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0104n0:1036: Pavattassa pākaṭattā apākaṭaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā pucchati “kathaṃ paneta”ntiādinā. Suttato nāmaṃ, yuttito rūpaṃ viññāṇapaccayā hotīti jānitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1037_0: Yuttito sādhetvā suttena taṃ daḷhaṃ karonto “kammasamuṭṭhānassāpi hī”tiādimāha. Cittasamuṭṭhānassevāti
anya-e0104n0:1037_1: cittasamuṭṭhānassa viya. Ettha ca “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti bhāsamānena bhagavatā
anya-e0104n0:1037_2: yasmā upaparikkhamānānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ paramatthato nāmarūpamattameva pavattamānaṃ dissati,
anya-e0104n0:1037_3: na satto, na jīvo, tasmā kenaci appaṭivattiyaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1037_4: hoti. Suññatappakāsanañhi dhammacakkappavattananti. Atha vā nāmarūpamattatāvacanena
anya-e0104n0:1037_5: pavattiyā dukkhasaccamattatā vuttā. Dukkhasaccappakāsanena ca tassa samudayo, tassa
anya-e0104n0:1037_6: ca nirodho, nirodhagāminipaṭipadā ca pakāsitā eva hoti. Ahetukassa dukkhassa, hetunirodhā
anya-e0104n0:1037_7: anirujjhanakassa ca abhāvā, nirodhassa ca upāyena vinā anadhigantabbattāti catusaccappakāsanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1039: 641. Tanti nāmarūpaṃ. Tassāti saḷāyatanassa. Tādisassevāti katekasesasseva.
anya-e0104n0:1040_0: Idhāpi nāmanti khandhattayasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttanayameva. Niyamatoti idañca
anya-e0104n0:1040_1: catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ, channaṃ vatthūnaṃ, jīvitassa ca yathāsambhavaṃ sahajātanissayapurejātaindriyādinā
anya-e0104n0:1040_2: saḷāyatanassa pavattamānassa ekantena paccayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Rūpāyatanādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1040_3: pana sahajātanissayānupālanabhāvo natthīti aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ārammaṇārammaṇapurejātādibhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1040_4: ca tesaṃ na sasantatipariyāpannānameva, na ca cakkhādīnaṃ viya ekappahārenevāti aniyamato
anya-e0104n0:1040_5: paccayabhāvo. Niyamato…pe… jīvitindriyanti evanti ettha evaṃ-saddena vā rūpāyatanādīnampi
anya-e0104n0:1040_6: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti ettha yadipi chaṭṭhāyatanasaḷāyatanasaddānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1040_7: saddato sarūpatā natthi, atthato pana saḷāyatanekadesova chaṭṭhāyatananti ekadesasarūpatā
anya-e0104n0:1040_8: atthīti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti veditabbo. Atthatopi hi sarūpānaṃ ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1040_9: icchanti “vaṅko ca kuṭilo ca kuṭilā”ti. Tasmā atthato ekadesasarūpānañca ekasesena bhavitabbanti.
anya-e0104n0:1041_0: Atha vā chaṭṭhāyatanañca manāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatananti vā manāyatananti vā chaṭṭhāyatanañca
anya-e0104n0:1041_1: chaṭṭhāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatananti vā manāyatanañca manāyatanañca manāyatananti vā
anya-e0104n0:1041_2: ekasesaṃ katvā cakkhādīhi saddhiṃ “saḷāyatana”nti vuttanti tameva ekasesaṃ nāmamattapaccayassa,
anya-e0104n0:1041_3: nāmarūpapaccayassa ca manāyatanassa vasena kataṃ atthato dassento āha “chaṭṭhāyatanañca
anya-e0104n0:1041_4: saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti evaṃ katekasesassā”ti. Yathāvuttopi hi ekaseso atthato
anya-e0104n0:1041_5: chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañcāti evaṃ kato nāma hotīti. Sabbattha ca ekasese kate
anya-e0104n0:1042: “Na aññathā”ti etena tassa tassa nāmassa, rūpassa ca abhāve taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ na hotīti byatirekaṃ vibhāveti.
anya-e0104n0:1043: Yanti yaṃ yaṃ nāmaṃ, rūpañca. Yassāti yassa yassa āyatanassa. Yathāti sahajātādinā yena yena pakārena. Neyyanti ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1044_0: Tassa vasenāti tassa hetuādipaccayassa vasena. Ukkaṃsāvakaṃsoti ettha sattadhā paccayabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1044_1: ukkaṃso aṭṭhadhā paccayabhāvo, tato navadhā, tato dasadhāti ayaṃ ukkaṃso. Avakaṃso
anya-e0104n0:1044_2: pana dasadhā paccayabhāvato navadhā paccayabhāvo, tato aṭṭhadhā, tato sattadhāti
anya-e0104n0:1044_3: evaṃ veditabbo, na pana sattadhā paccayabhāvato eva dvepi ukkaṃsāvakaṃsā yojetabbā,
anya-e0104n0:1045: Vipākaṃ nāmanti sambandho. Vuttanayenevāti sahajātādivasena, sattadhā, hetuādivasena ca. Itaranti avipākaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1046_0: “Hadayavatthuno sahāyaṃ hutvā”ti etena arūpe viya asahāyaṃ nāmaṃ na hoti, hadayavatthu
anya-e0104n0:1046_1: ca nāmena saha chaṭṭhāyatanassa paccayo hotīti ettakameva dasseti, na pana yathā
anya-e0104n0:1046_2: hadayavatthu paccayo hoti, tathā nāmampīti ayamattho adhippeto. Vatthu hi nāmassa
anya-e0104n0:1046_3: vippayuttapaccayo hoti, na nāmaṃ. Nāmañca vipākahetādipaccayo hoti, na vatthūti.
anya-e0104n0:1046_4: Pavatte arūpadhammā kammajarūpassa ṭhitippattasseva paccayā honti, na uppajjamānassāti
anya-e0104n0:1046_5: vippayuttaatthiavigatā ca pacchājātavippayuttādayo eva cakkhādīnaṃ yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1047_0: “Tatthevā”ti iminā “pavatte”ti idaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti āha “tattheva hi pavatte”ti. “Pañcavokārabhave”ti
anya-e0104n0:1047_1: pana idaṃ “pañcanna”nti iminā dīpitamevāti. Pavattiyaṃ cakkhāyatanādikassa nāmaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1047_2: vipākapaccayo na hoti, attanā janitarūpasseva hoti. Paṭisandhiyaṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1048: Rūpatoti rūpesu. Yaṃ yaṃ āyatanaṃ uppajjatīti paṭisandhiyaṃ aṇḍajajalābujānaṃ pañcasu āyatanesu kāyāyatanameva uppajjati. Itaresaṃ yathārahaṃ itarānipi.
anya-e0104n0:1049_0: Avasesamanāyatanassāti ettha “pañcakkhandhabhave panā”ti etassa anuvattamānattā pañcavokārabhave
anya-e0104n0:1049_1: eva pavattamānaṃ pañcaviññāṇehi avasesaṃ manāyatanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nāmarūpassa
anya-e0104n0:1049_3: yojetabbo. “Rūpapaccayā pañcāyatanānī”ti ayampi nayo labbhati nirodhasamāpannānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1049_4: vasena, so pana apacurabhāvato yebhuyyena ca paṭisandhiyaṃ paccayabhūtasseva nāmarūpassa
anya-e0104n0:1049_5: pavattiyaṃ paccayabhāvo vibhāvitoti na dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1051: 642. Bāvīsatiyā lokiyavipākaviññāṇehi sampayuttā bāvīsatilokiyaviññāṇasampayuttā. Tato eva bāvīsati.
anya-e0104n0:1052_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ saḷāyatane, tesu chasu āyatanesūti attho. Ajjhattanti sasantatipariyāpannameva
anya-e0104n0:1052_1: gaṇhāti. Tañhi sasantatipariyāpannakammanibbattaṃ tādisassa phassassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1052_2: Rūpādīni, pana bahiddhā anupādinnāni ca phassassa ārammaṇaṃ honti, na tāni cakkhādīni
anya-e0104n0:1052_4: paṭhamācariyavāde na gahitāni, dutiyācariyavāde pana yathā tathā vā paccayabhāve
anya-e0104n0:1053_0: Tatthāti saḷāyatanapaccayā phassapade. Ye tāva ācariyā mahāvihāravāsinova yathā viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1053_1: evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ, phassaṃ, vedanañca paccayaṃ, paccayuppannañca sasantatipariyāpannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1053_3: āruppaṃ sandhāya vuttāti “chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phassoti pāḷianusārato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1054_0: Sabbe phassā na sambhontīti yojanā. Yadi sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhaveyya, “saḷāyatanapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1054_1: phasso”ti ekassa vacanaṃ yujjeyya, athāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā sambhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1054_2: tathāpi sabbāyatanehi sabbaphassasambhavato āyatanabhedena phassabhedo natthīti tadabhedavasena
anya-e0104n0:1054_3: ekassa vacanaṃ yujjeyya, tathā pana asambhavato na yuttanti codeti “na sabbāyatanehī”tiādinā.
anya-e0104n0:1054_4: Aññassāpi vā asambhavantassa vidhānassa bodhanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ “nāpi ekamhā āyatanā
anya-e0104n0:1054_5: sabbe phassā”ti. “Na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhotī”ti idameva pana ekaphassavacanassāyuttattadīpakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1054_6: kāraṇanti veditabbaṃ. Nidassanavasena vā etaṃ vuttaṃ. Nāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā
anya-e0104n0:1054_7: sambhonti, evaṃ na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhoti. Tasmā ekassa vacanaṃ ayuttanti.
anya-e0104n0:1054_8: Parihāraṃ pana anekāyatanehi ekaphassassa sambhavatoti dassento “tatridaṃ vissajjana”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1056: Chadhā paccayatte pañca vibhāvaye, ekaṃ navadhā paccayatte, bāhirāni cha āyatanāni ārammaṇādinā yathāsambhavaṃ paccayatte vibhāvayeti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1057_1: vipākaphassassa. Tāni cāti rūpāyatanādīni. “Mano ca nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1057_2: hi vuttaṃ. Tathā cāti paccuppannāni rūpādīni paccuppannañca dhammāyatanapariyāpannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1057_3: rūparūpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇapaccayamattenāti taṃ sabbaṃ apaccuppannaṃ, aññañca
anya-e0104n0:1059: 643. Dvārato saḷevāti pabhavasāmaññato ekavidhāpi uppattidvārato cha eva hontīti chaḷeva vedanā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1060_0: Cittabhedena ekūnanavutividhāpi idhādhippetā eva dassetuṃ “vedanāsu panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1060_1: “Sesāna”nti ettha sampaṭicchanasampayuttāya cakkhusamphassādayo pañca yadipi anantarādīhi
anya-e0104n0:1060_2: paccayā honti, anantarādīnaṃ pana upanissaye antogadhattā santīraṇatadārammaṇānañca
anya-e0104n0:1060_3: sādhāraṇassa tassa vasena “ekadhā”ti vuttaṃ. Ekekasmiṃ dvāre hi cakkhudvārādīsu uppannacakkhuviññāṇādīhi
anya-e0104n0:1060_4: sahajātā phassā sakasakavīthīsu sampaṭicchanādīhi sampayuttavedanānaṃ, manodvāre
anya-e0104n0:1060_6: so phasso aṭṭhadhā paccayo hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1061_2: paccayo hoti. Paccayaṃ anupādinnampi keci icchantīti “yā panā”tiādinā manodvārāvajjanasampayuttaphassassa
anya-e0104n0:1061_3: paccayabhāvo vutto. Tañca mukhamattadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etena nayena sabbassa anantarassa,
anya-e0104n0:1061_4: anānantarassa ca phassassa tassā tassā vipākavedanāya upanissayatā yojetabbāti.
anya-e0104n0:1063: 644. Idhāti imasmiṃ loke, imasmiṃ vā sāsane cha taṇhā dīpitā. Idhāti vā imasmiṃ vedanāpaccayā taṇhāpade. Tatthāti tāsu chasu taṇhāsu.
anya-e0104n0:1064_0: Ekekāya sassatadiṭṭhisahagatāya, ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatāya ca taṇhāya tadabhinandanānuguṇo
anya-e0104n0:1064_1: rūpādīsu pavattiākāro, kevalaṃ kāmassādavasena pavattiyā visiṭṭhākārattā vuttappavattiākārato taṇhāya tividhatā.
anya-e0104n0:1065_0: Mamattenāti sampiyāyanena, assādanataṇhāya icceva vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha putto viya
anya-e0104n0:1065_1: vedanā daṭṭhabbā, khīrādayo viya vedanāya paccayabhūtā rūpādayo, khīrādidāyikā dhāti
anya-e0104n0:1065_2: viya rūpādichaḷārammaṇadāyakā cittakārādayo cha. Tattha sukhasamphassavatthadāyako
anya-e0104n0:1065_3: tantavāyo, vejjo rasāyatanojāvasena, tadupatthambhitajīvitavasena ca dhammārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1066_0: Ārammaṇapaccayo uppajjamānāya ārammaṇamattameva hoti, na upanissayo viya uppādakoti
anya-e0104n0:1066_1: uppādakassa upanissayasseva vasena “ekadhāvā”ti vuttaṃ. Upanissayena vā ārammaṇūpanissayo
anya-e0104n0:1066_2: saṅgahito. Tena ca ārammaṇabhāvena taṃsabhāgo aññopi ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo dīpito
anya-e0104n0:1067_0: “Yasmā vā”tiādinā na kevalaṃ vipākasukhavedanā eva, tissopi pana vedanā vipākā visesena
anya-e0104n0:1067_1: taṇhāya upanissayapaccayo, avisesena itarā cāti dasseti. Upekkhā pana santattā, sukhamicceva
anya-e0104n0:1067_2: bhāsitāti tasmā sāpi bhiyyo icchanavasena taṇhāya upanissayoti adhippāyo. Upekkhā
anya-e0104n0:1067_3: pana akusalavipākabhūtā aniṭṭhattā dukkhe avarodhetabbā, itarā iṭṭhattā sukheti sā
anya-e0104n0:1067_4: dukkhaṃ viya, sukhaṃ viya ca upanissayapaccayo hotīti sakkā vattuṃ. “Vedanāpaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1067_5: taṇhā”ti vacanena sabbassa vedanāvato paccayassa atthitāya taṇhuppattippasaṅge tannivāraṇatthamāha
anya-e0104n0:1068_0: Nanu “anusayasahāyā vedanā taṇhāya paccayo”ti vacanassa abhāvā atippasaṅganivattiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1068_1: na sakkā kātunti? Na, vaṭṭakathāya pavattattā. Vaṭṭassa ca anusayavirahe abhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1068_2: anusayasahitāva paccayoti atthato vuttamevetaṃ hotīti. Atha vā “avijjāpaccayā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1068_3: anuvattamānattā anusayasahitāva paccayoti viññāyati. Vedanāpaccayā taṇhāti cettha
anya-e0104n0:1068_4: vedanāpaccayā eva taṇhā, na vedanāya vināti ayaṃ niyamo icchito, na vedanāpaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1068_5: taṇhā hotiyevāti, tasmā atippasaṅgo ettha natthi evāti.
anya-e0104n0:1069_0: Vusīmatoti vusitavato, vusitabrahmacariyavāsassāti attho. Vussatīti vā vusīti maggo
anya-e0104n0:1069_1: vuccati, so etassa vuttho atthīti vusīmā, ukkaṭṭhaniddesena arahā. Aggaphalaṃ vā
anya-e0104n0:1069_2: pariniṭṭhitavāsattā “vusī”ti vuccati, taṃ etassa atthīti vusīmā.
anya-e0104n0:1071_0: 645. Atthavibhāgo atthassa vibhajanā. Vatthusaṅkhātaṃ kāmanti kāmaguṇasaññitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇamāha.
anya-e0104n0:1071_1: Upādiyatīti kāmavasena gaṇhāti, daḷhaṃ assādetīti attho. Kāmaṃ upādiyatīti ettha
anya-e0104n0:1071_2: kammasādhano kāmasaddo, kāmo ca soti ettha kattusādhano kilesakāmassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0104n0:1071_3: Upādānasaddo pana ubhayatthāpi kattusādhanova. Daḷhattho bhusattho. Yathā bhuso āyāso
anya-e0104n0:1071_4: upāyāso, bhusaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ upakuṭṭhaṃ, evaṃ idhāpīti āha “upāyāsaupakuṭṭhādīsu viyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1071_5: Purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyatīti purimadiṭṭhiṃ sassatabhāvena gaṇhantī upādiyati,
anya-e0104n0:1071_6: purimadiṭṭhiākārena vā uttaradiṭṭhi uppajjamānā teneva purimadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ karontī
anya-e0104n0:1071_7: taṃ upādiyatīti vuttā. Atha vā purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyatīti “sassato attā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1071_8: idaṃ purimadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyamānaṃ uttaradiṭṭhiṃ nidassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā hi esā daḷhīkaraṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:1071_9: purimaṃ uttarā upādiyati, evaṃ “natthi dinna”ntiādikāpīti. Attaggahaṇaṃ pana attavādupādānanti
anya-e0104n0:1071_10: na idaṃ diṭṭhupādānadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Loko cāti vā attaggahaṇavinimuttaṃ gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1072_0: Sīlabbataṃ upādiyatīti ettha asuddhimaggagosīlādisamādānavasena sīlaṃ, avītikkamanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1072_1: vataṃ. Ubhayathāpi vā sīlaṃ, tapokammabhāvena gahitatāya vataṃ, gavādipakatibhāvanā.
anya-e0104n0:1072_2: Attano vā gavādibhāvādhiṭṭhānaṃ sīlaṃ, “gacchanto bhakkheti, tiṭṭhanto muttetī”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1072_3: gavādikiriyākaraṇaṃ vataṃ. Taṃtaṃakiccasammatato vā nivatti sīlaṃ, taṃsamādānavatovesa
anya-e0104n0:1072_5: parāmasanto tathā abhinivisanto upādiyati, taṃ gāhaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti attho. Sīlabbatasahacaritaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1072_6: parāmāsaṃ sīlabbatanti gahetvā āha “sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcā”ti. Gosīlagovatādīnīti
anya-e0104n0:1072_7: ca tathābhūtaṃ diṭṭhiṃ vadati. Tenevāha “sayameva upādānānī”ti. Abhinivesatoti abhinivesabhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:1072_8: abhinivisanato vā. Attavādupādānanti “attā”ti vādassa paññāpanassa, gahaṇassa ca
anya-e0104n0:1072_9: kāraṇabhūtā diṭṭhīti attho. Attavādamattamevāti attassa abhāvā “attā”ti idaṃ vacanamattameva.
anya-e0104n0:1072_10: Upādiyantīti daḷhaṃ gaṇhanti. Kathaṃ? “Attā”ti. “Attā”ti hi abhinivisantā vacanamattameva
anya-e0104n0:1072_11: daḷhaṃ katvā gaṇhantīti atthoti. Evaṃ “attavādamattameva upādiyantī”ti vuttaṃ. Attavādamattanti
anya-e0104n0:1072_12: vā vācāvatthumattamevāha. Vācāvatthumattameva hi “attā”ti upādiyanti attassa abhāvāti.
