anya-e0104n0:1073_1: diṭṭhimattameva, vitthārato panā”ti evaṃ dhammasaṅkhepavitthārasamudāyato tadavayavabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1073_2: saṅkhepaṃ, vitthārañca niddhāretīti. Dhammasaṅkhepavitthāreti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1073_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāmesūti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu. Kāmacchandoti kāmasaṅkhāto chando, na kattukamyatāchando,
anya-e0104n0:1073_4: na ca dhammacchando. Kāmanavasena, rañjanavasena ca kāmoyeva rāgo kāmarāgo, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1073_5: sabbattha kāmatthaṃ viditvā kāmo eva nandanaṭṭhena kāmanandī, taṇhāyanaṭṭhena kāmoyeva
anya-e0104n0:1073_6: kāmataṇhā, sinehanaṭṭhena kāmo eva kāmasneho, paridayhanaṭṭhena kāmapariḷāho, mucchanaṭṭhena
anya-e0104n0:1073_7: kāmamucchā, gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena kāmajjhosānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Appattavisayapatthanā
anya-e0104n0:1073_8: taṇhā ārammaṇe paritassanabhāvato, sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ upādānaṃ ārammaṇe daḷhaggāhabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1073_9: Appicchatāpaṭipakkhā taṇhā visayābhimukhabhāvato, santuṭṭhipaṭipakkhā upādānaṃ taṇhādaḷhattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1074_0: Natthi dinnantiādīsu dinnanti dānamāha, taṃ aphalattā rūpaṃ viya dānaṃ nāma na hotīti
anya-e0104n0:1074_1: paṭikkhipati. Yiṭṭhaṃ vuccati mahāvijitayaññasadiso mahāyāgo. Hutanti āhunapāhunamaṅgalakiriyā.
anya-e0104n0:1074_2: Tattha āmantetvā havanaṃ dānaṃ āhunaṃ, pāhunānaṃ atithīnaṃ atithikiriyā pāhunaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1074_3: āvāhādīsu maṅgalatthaṃ dānaṃ maṅgalakiriyā, dasa kusalakammapathā sukatakammāni nāma,
anya-e0104n0:1074_4: dasa akusalakammapathā dukkaṭakammāni nāma, phalaṃ vipākoti nissandādiphalañceva
anya-e0104n0:1074_5: nippariyāyavipāko ca natthīti yojanā. Yathā cettha, evaṃ “natthi dinna”ntiādīsupi
anya-e0104n0:1074_6: phalavipākapaṭikkhepova daṭṭhabbo. Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ “natthī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1074_7: gaṇhāti. Imaṃ hi lokaṃ avekkhitvā paraloko, parañca lokaṃ avekkhitvā ayaṃ loko hoti
anya-e0104n0:1074_8: gantabbato, āgantabbato cāti paralokato idhāgamanassa abhāvā tattheva ucchijjanato
anya-e0104n0:1074_9: cittena paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ “natthī”ti gaṇhātīti attho. Na hi ayaṃ diṭṭhi paraloke
anya-e0104n0:1074_10: ṭhitasseva hotīti. Natthi paralokoti idhaloke ṭhito paralokaṃ “natthī”ti gaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1074_11: Idhāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ vā ettha attho – saṃsaraṇappadeso idhaloko,
anya-e0104n0:1074_12: paraloko ca nāma koci natthi saṃsaraṇassa abhāvā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti.
anya-e0104n0:1075_0: Purimabhavato pacchimabhave upapatanaṃ upapāto, so yesaṃ sīlaṃ, te opapātikā. Te
anya-e0104n0:1075_1: pana cavanakaupapajjanakasattā natthīti dassento āha “natthi sattā opapātikā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1075_2: Natthi loke samaṇa…pe… pavedentīti anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā
anya-e0104n0:1075_3: dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā lokasmiṃ natthi, ye imañca lokaṃ, parañca lokaṃ attanā eva
anya-e0104n0:1075_4: abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena paccakkhato ñatvā pavedanasamatthā sabbaññubuddhā nāma natthīti
anya-e0104n0:1075_5: dasseti. Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatītiādīsu vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0104n0:1076_0: Pakatiaṇuādīnaṃ sassataggāhapubbaṅgamo, sarīrassa ucchedaggāhapubbaṅgamo ca tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1076_1: gāhānaṃ sāmibhūto koci sassato, ucchijjamāno vā attā atthīti attaggāho kadāci hotīti
anya-e0104n0:1076_2: “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttaṃ. Svāyaṃ attaggāho atthato khandhārammaṇo eva daṭṭhabbo. Yebhuyyena
anya-e0104n0:1076_3: paṭhamaṃ attavādupādānantiādināva sambandho. Yadipi bhavarāgajavanavīthi paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1076_4: pavattati gahitapaṭisandhikassa bhavanikantiyā pavattitabbattā, so pana bhavarāgo
anya-e0104n0:1076_5: taṇhādaḷhattaṃ na hotīti maññamāno na kāmupādānassa paṭhamuppattimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1077: Taṇhā kāmupādānanti pana vibhāgassa akaraṇe sabbāpi taṇhā kāmupādānaṃ, karaṇepi vā kāmarāgato aññāpi taṇhā daḷhabhāvaṃ pattā kāmupādānanti tassa arahattamaggavajjhatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1078_0: Uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā cittuppādā visayo. Pañcupādānakkhandhā ālayo. Tattha ramatīti
anya-e0104n0:1078_1: ālayarāmā, pajā. Teneva sā ālayarāmatā sasantāne, parasantāne ca pākaṭā hoti. Kāmānanti
anya-e0104n0:1078_2: vatthukāmānaṃ. “Sukhadukkhaṃ kammunā hotī”ti aggahetvā kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1078_3: Sā kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulatā. Assa kāmupādānavato. Tanti diṭṭhupādānaṃ, anattani
anya-e0104n0:1078_5: Upanissayavacanena ārammaṇānantarapakatūpanissayā vuttāti anantarapaccayādīnampi saṅgaho kato hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1080_0: 646. Atthatoti vacanatthato. Dhammatoti sabhāvadhammato. Sātthatoti sātthakato, pubbe
anya-e0104n0:1080_1: vuttassapi puna vacanassa sappayojanato. Bhedasaṅgahāti bhedato saṅgahato, vibhāgato
anya-e0104n0:1080_2: ceva vibhattassa saṅkhipanato cāti attho. Yaṃ yassa paccayoti yaṃ yaṃ upādānaṃ yassa
anya-e0104n0:1080_3: yassa bhavassa paccayo hoti, tato cāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1081_0: Bhavatīti bhavoti phalavohārena kammabhavo vutto. Upapattibhavanibbacanameva hi dvayassapi
anya-e0104n0:1081_1: sādhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, bhavati etasmā upapattibhavoti vā. Dutiyo pana kammabhavo
anya-e0104n0:1081_2: sattassa punabbhavabhāvena savisesaṃ bhavatīti bhavo. Tato eva na sabbassa bhavantarassa,
anya-e0104n0:1081_3: taṃhetuno vā bhavabhāvappasaṅgo. Duvidhenāti dvīhi ākārehi pavattitoti attho. Duvidhenāti
anya-e0104n0:1081_4: vā paccattatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, duvidhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Atthīti saṃvijjati.
anya-e0104n0:1082_0: 647. Attano paccayehi karīyatīti kammaṃ, attano phalaṃ karotīti kammanti keci, “kamma”nti
anya-e0104n0:1082_1: evaṃ vattabbā kammasaṅkhātā. Parittabhūmakoti kāmabhūmako. Mahābhūmakoti mahaggatabhūmako.
anya-e0104n0:1082_2: Sabbanti anavasesaṃ. Bhavaṃ gacchati, gameti cāti bhavagāmi. Gacchatīti ca nipphādanasamatthatāvasena,
anya-e0104n0:1082_3: attano pavattikāle bhavābhimukhaṃ hutvā pavattatīti attho, nibbattanameva vā gamanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1082_4: adhippetaṃ. “Bhavagāmī”ti ca etena kammakkhayakaraṃ kammaṃ nivatteti. Ayañhi vaṭṭakathā,
anya-e0104n0:1082_5: tañca vivaṭṭanissitanti. Apuññābhisaṅkhāroti dvādasa cetanāti uddhaccasahagatacetanāyapi
anya-e0104n0:1082_6: gahaṇaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettha viya veditabbaṃ. “Bhavapaccayā jātī”ti ettha
anya-e0104n0:1082_7: pana “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti ettha viya sāpi apanetabbā. Mandabahuvipākatāti appamahāvipākatā.
anya-e0104n0:1083_0: “Sabbampi bhavagāmikammanti iminā cetanāsampayuttā abhijjhādayo vuttā”ti etena ācayagāmitāya
anya-e0104n0:1083_1: tesaṃ kammasaṅkhātatā vuttāti kammabhavapariyāpannataṃ pariyāyena vadati, nippariyāyena
anya-e0104n0:1083_2: pana cetanāva kammabhavo. Vuttañhi “kammabhavo tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya
anya-e0104n0:1083_3: dhātuyā sampayutto, ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1083_4: Upapattibhavo tīhipi tikehi vutto upādinnakkhandhova. Yathāha “upapattibhavo… kāmabhavo…
anya-e0104n0:1083_5: saññābhavo… pañcavokārabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi
anya-e0104n0:1083_6: saṅgahito”tiādi. Yadi hi anupādinnakānampi gahaṇaṃ siyā, “dvādasahi āyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi
anya-e0104n0:1083_7: dhātūhī”ti vattabbaṃ siyāti. Kāmataṇhāya kāmetabbato kāmanissayatāya bhogā viya,
anya-e0104n0:1083_8: kāmasahacaritatāya “kuntā pacarantī”ti viya, kāmārammaṇatāya “sukhaṃ rūpa”nti viya,
anya-e0104n0:1083_10: upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti. Rūpāvirāgato yaṃ nissitā, tadupacārena “mañcā ghosantī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1083_11: viya, “phandanadevatā”ti viya ca “rūpa”nti vuccanti brahmakāyikākaniṭṭhaparicchinnā upādinnakkhandhā.
anya-e0104n0:1084_0: Rūpameva bhavo rūpabhavo, tathā arūpanti ākāsānañcāyatanabhavaggaparicchinnā cattāro
anya-e0104n0:1084_1: upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti. Arūpameva bhavo arūpabhavo. Kāmo eva bhavoti kāmabhavo,
anya-e0104n0:1084_2: so pana yasmā yathāvuttenatthena “kāmo”ti vattabbo hoti, tasmā “kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo”ti
anya-e0104n0:1084_3: vuttaṃ. Kāmāvacarasaññito vā bhavo “kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo”ti vutto. Tathā rūpārūpabhavoti
anya-e0104n0:1084_4: āha “esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesū”ti. Saññāvataṃ bhavoti ettha vantu-saddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1084_5: Tassa vā atthe akāraṃ katvā “saññabhavo”tipi pāṭho. Tenāha “saññāvā”tiādi. Vokiṇṇoti
anya-e0104n0:1084_6: etena vokārasaddassa kammasādhanatamāha. Vokirīyati pasārīyati vitthārīyatīti vokāro,
anya-e0104n0:1084_7: vokiraṇaṃ vā vokāro, so ekasseva khandhassa vasena pavattattā “eko vokāro”ti vutto,
anya-e0104n0:1085_0: 648. Kiñcāpi bhavaniddese “sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo”ti iminā cetanāsampayuttadhammāpi
anya-e0104n0:1085_1: vuttā. Puññābhisaṅkhārādayovāti pana avadhāraṇaṃ paccayadhammavisesepi atthappabhedena
anya-e0104n0:1085_2: saṅkhārabhavaggahaṇesu attheva visesoti dassanatthaṃ kataṃ. Tenāha “evaṃ santepī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1085_3: Saṅkhārabhavānaṃ dhammabhedato na saṅkhārā eva puna vuttāti “sātthakamevidaṃ punavacana”nti
anya-e0104n0:1085_4: etaṃ ayuttanti ce? Na, bhavekadesabhāvena saṅkhārānaṃ bhavoti puna vuttattā. Parena
anya-e0104n0:1085_5: vā dhammavisesaṃ aggahetvā punavacanaṃ coditanti codakābhilāsavasena “sātthakamevidaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1086_1: vutto. Sahajātaviññāṇassapi paccayabhūtaṃ avijjāhetukaṃ saṅkhāraggahaṇena yaṃ kiñci
anya-e0104n0:1086_2: kammaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ, idha pana “sabbampi bhavagāmikamma”nti vacanato bhavassa nibbattakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1086_3: upādānahetukaṃ vipaccanāya katokāsameva bhavoti adhippeto. Yaṃ kāmupādānapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1086_4: rūpabhavanibbattakaṃ, arūpabhavanibbattakañca kammaṃ karīyati, so kammabhavo, tadabhinibbattā
anya-e0104n0:1086_5: khandhā upapattibhavoti imamatthaṃ “esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesū”ti atidisati. Dve kāmabhavāti
anya-e0104n0:1086_6: kāmakammabhavo, kāmūpapattibhavoti dve kāmabhavā. Evaṃ “dve rūpabhavā, dve arūpabhavā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1086_7: etthāpi. Antogadhe hi visuṃ aggahetvā abbhantaragate eva katvā kāmabhavādike kammūpapattibhavavasena
anya-e0104n0:1087: Avisesenāti upādānavasena bhedaṃ akatvā. Upādānabhedākaraṇeneva ca dvādasappabhedassa saṅgahavasena saṅgahato “cha bhavā”ti vuttaṃ. Anupagammāti anissāya, anāmasitvāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1088_0: 650. Gosīlena, kukkurasīlena ca samattena samādinnena gunnaṃ, kukkurānañca sahabyatā
anya-e0104n0:1088_1: vuttāti “sīlabbatupādānavato jhānabhāvanā na ijjhatī”ti maññamānā tena rūpārūpabhavā
anya-e0104n0:1088_2: na hontīti keci vadanti. Vakkhamānena pana pakārena paccayabhāvato “taṃ na gahetabba”nti
anya-e0104n0:1088_3: āha. Asuddhimagge ca suddhimaggaparāmasanaṃ sīlabbatupādānanti suddhimaggaparāmasanena
anya-e0104n0:1089_1: ime manussaloke kāmā samiddhā, evaṃ devaloke ito samiddhatarāti diṭṭhānusārena vā.
anya-e0104n0:1089_3: asappurisūpanissayaṃ pubbe ca akatapuññataṃ, attamicchāpaṇidhiñca saṅgaṇhāti. Kāyaduccaritādīnipīti
anya-e0104n0:1089_4: attano adhippetānaṃ kāmānaṃ anupāyabhūtānipi kāyaduccaritādīni karoti, cirasaggādiatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1089_5: yuddhādivasenāti adhippāyo. Sandiṭṭhike vā pana rajjasenāpatiṭṭhānādisaṅgahe kāme.
anya-e0104n0:1089_6: Tadantogadhā evāti tasmiṃ duccaritanibbatte, sucaritanibbatte ca kāmabhave antogadhā
anya-e0104n0:1089_7: evāti attho. Antogadhāti ca saññābhavapañcavokārabhavānaṃ ekadesena antogadhattā
anya-e0104n0:1089_8: vuttaṃ. Na hi te niravasesā kāmabhave antogadhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1091_1: arūpabhave sesaucchedavādavasena ayamattā suucchinno hotīti tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karotīti
anya-e0104n0:1091_2: āha “ayaṃ attā nāmā”tiādi. Tattha suucchinnoti sakalavaṭṭadukkhasamucchedena suṭṭhu
anya-e0104n0:1092_2: upari cattāro diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā āgatā, diṭṭhigatiko pana yaṃ kiñci gahetvā
anya-e0104n0:1092_3: yathā tathā abhinivisatīti arūpabhavaggahaṇaṃ, arūpajjhānānampi vā catutthajhānasaṅgahato
anya-e0104n0:1092_4: arūpabhavaggahaṇaṃ, santasukhatāya vā taṃsamaṅgino sukhitabhāvasāmaññato. Vigatapariḷāhoti
anya-e0104n0:1092_5: yathābhilāsitavisayūpahārena, pahānena ca vūpasantakāmarāgapariḷāho, diṭṭheva dhamme
anya-e0104n0:1093_0: Suddhimaggaparāmasanavasena pavattitaṃ yaṃ kiñci lokiyaṃ sīlaṃ, jhānañca sīlabbatamicceva
anya-e0104n0:1093_1: idhādhippetanti āha “idaṃ sīlabbataṃ nāmā”tiādi. Kamena avatvā sīlabbatupādānassa
anya-e0104n0:1093_2: ante bhavapaccayatāvacanaṃ attavādupādānaṃ viya abhiṇhaṃ asamudācārato, attavādupādānanimittattā ca.
anya-e0104n0:1094_0: Kammabhaveti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Hetupaccayappabhedehīti ettha maggapaccayo ca vattabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1094_1: Diṭṭhupādānādīni hi sahajātakammabhavassa maggapaccayā hontīti, tasmā tāni sahajātādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1094_2: hetupaccayaṃ apanīya maggapaccayaṃ pakkhipitvā sattadhā paccayā hontīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0104n0:1094_4: honti. Nānantarassa upanissayapaccayena paccayā honti. Kadāci ārammaṇapaccayādināpi,
anya-e0104n0:1094_5: taṃ pana upanissayapaccayeneva saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ “vippayuttassa pana upanissayapaccayenevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1096_2: jātīti āha “na upapattibhavo”ti. Jāyamānassa pana jāti jātīti upapattibhavopi asati
anya-e0104n0:1096_3: abhāvā jātiyā paccayoti sakkā vattuṃ. Jāyamānarūpapadaṭṭhānatāpi hi rūpajātiyā vuttā
anya-e0104n0:1097_0: Jātānaṃ khandhānaṃ uññātatā, abhimatatā ca hīnapaṇītatā. Aniṭṭhañhi hīnaṃ, iṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1097_1: paṇītaṃ. Ādi-saddena suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇahīnuttamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Yamakānampi satanti
anya-e0104n0:1097_2: yamakabhāvena nibbattānampi samānānaṃ. So ca sattānaṃ viseso. Bhinnasantānikassa
anya-e0104n0:1097_3: visesakāraṇassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato “ajjhattasantāne”ti vuttaṃ. Aññassa kāraṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1097_4: abhāvatoti attasantānagatato aññassa visesakāraṇassa anupalabbhamānattā, sati ca
anya-e0104n0:1097_5: tasmiṃ sabbadā sabbesaṃ abhāvatoti pasaṅgassa dunnivāraṇato kāraṇe avisiṭṭhe phalavisesassa
anya-e0104n0:1098_0: Tena tenāti ñātibyasanādinā jarāmaraṇato aññena dukkhadhammena. Jarāmaraṇanimittañhi
anya-e0104n0:1098_1: uppannā sokādayo jarāmaraṇābhisambandhā, tadaññe anabhisambandhā. Upanissayakoṭiyāti
anya-e0104n0:1098_2: upanissayaṃsena, upanissayalesenāti attho. Yo hi paṭṭhāne anāgato sati bhāvā, asati
anya-e0104n0:1098_3: ca abhāvā suttantapariyāyena upanissayo, so “upanissayakoṭī”ti vuccati. Paccayamahāpadeso
anya-e0104n0:1100_0: 652. Na kevalaṃ sokādīnaṃyeva jāti paccayo hoti, sokādīnaṃ pana paccayattā avijjāyapi
anya-e0104n0:1100_1: paccayo evāti dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Etthāti paṭiccasamuppādadesanāyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1100_2: Aviditādi midanti ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Satatanti sabbakālaṃ yāva aggamaggādhigamā.
anya-e0104n0:1101: Tesūti sokādīsu. Siddhesūti labbhamānesu. Siddhā hoti avijjā avinābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1102_0: Kāmayānassāti kāmayamānassa, kāmo vā yānaṃ etassāti kāmayāno, tassa kāmavasena yāyamānassāti
anya-e0104n0:1102_1: attho. Chandajātassāti jātataṇhāchandassa. Parihāyantīti vigacchanti. Ruppatīti sokādinā kuppati.
anya-e0104n0:1103_1: Tattha pariyuṭṭhātīti pariyuṭṭhaṃ, diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānaṃ, tena tiṭṭhatīti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1104_0: Pañca pubbanimittānīti “mālā milāyanti, vatthāni kilissanti, kacchehi sedā muccanti,
anya-e0104n0:1104_1: kāye vevaṇṇiyaṃ okkamati, devo devāsane nābhiramatī”ti vuttāni pañca maraṇapubbanimittānīti
anya-e0104n0:1104_2: attho. Tāni hi disvā kammanibbattakkhandhasaṅkhāte upapattibhave bhavacchandabalena
anya-e0104n0:1105: Bāloti avidvā. Tena avijjāya kāraṇabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tividhaṃ dukkhanti tassāruppakathāsavana, kammakāraṇādassana, maraṇakālakammopaṭṭhānanidānaṃ sokādidukkhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1106: Āsave sādhentīti āsave gamenti bodhentīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1107_0: Evaṃ satīti evaṃ bhavacakkassa aviditāditāya anādibhāve sati. Ādimattakathananti
anya-e0104n0:1107_1: avijjāvasena ādisabbhāvakathanaṃ. Ādi etassa atthīti hi ādimaṃ, bhavacakkaṃ. Tassa
anya-e0104n0:1107_2: bhāvo ādimattaṃ, tassa kathanaṃ ādimattakathanaṃ. Visesanivattiattho vā mattasaddo,
anya-e0104n0:1107_3: sati anādibhāve avijjā ādimhi, majjhe, pariyosāne ca sabbattha siyāti ādimattāya
anya-e0104n0:1107_4: avijjāya kathanaṃ virujjhatīti attho. “Avijjā padhānā”ti vatvā tassā padhānabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1107_5: dassetuṃ “avijjāggahaṇenā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha avijjāggahaṇenāti avijjāya uppādanena,
anya-e0104n0:1107_6: appahānena vā, attano santāne sannihitabhāvakaraṇenāti attho. Kammādīnīti kammavipākavaṭṭāni.
anya-e0104n0:1107_7: Palibodhentīti nānādukkhaparibyūḷhe saṃsāracārake nirodhenti. Tehīti kilesakammavipākavaṭṭehi.
anya-e0104n0:1108_0: Tato avijjādito. Brahmādināti ādi-saddena pajāpatissarapurisādike saṅgaṇhāti. Vadatīti
anya-e0104n0:1108_1: vado, taṃ taṃ hitāhitaṃ pavattāti attho. Vedeti, vediyatīti vā vedeyyo, sukhādiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1108_2: anubhavati, sabbavisaye vā jānāti, “sukhito dukkhito”tiādinā attanā, parehi ca jānāti,
anya-e0104n0:1108_3: ñāyati cāti attho. Brahmādinā vā attanā vāti vā-saddo ca-saddattho. Tenāha “kārakavedakarahita”nti
anya-e0104n0:1109_0: Dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññanti avijjādīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ suññasabhāvānaṃ suññatāya suññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1109_1: dvādasavidhasuññatāsuññaṃ, dhuvabhāvādisuññatāya vā catubbidhampi suññataṃ ekaṃ katvā
anya-e0104n0:1109_2: dvādasaṅgagatattā dvādasavidhāti tāya dvādasasuññatāya suññanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1110_1: Vedanāvasānaṃ paricchinnaṃ ekaṃ bhavacakkaṃ hoti. Bhavacakkekadesopi hi bhavacakkanti
anya-e0104n0:1110_2: vuccati. Vedanā vā taṇhāsahāyāya avijjāya paccayo hotīti vedanāto avijjā, avijjāto
anya-e0104n0:1110_3: saṅkhārāti sambajjhanato vedanāvasānaṃ bhavacakkaṃ paripuṇṇamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avijjāggahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:1110_4: vā taṇhupādānāni tadavinābhāvato. Saṅkhāraggahaṇena bhavo, viññāṇādiggahaṇena jātijarāmaraṇāni,
anya-e0104n0:1110_5: sokādayo ca gahitāti evampi vedanāvasānaṃ bhavacakkanti yuttamevetaṃ. Evaṃ taṇhāmūlake
anya-e0104n0:1110_6: ca yojetabbaṃ. Dvinnampi hi aññamaññānuppaveso hotīti. Avijjā dhammasabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā
anya-e0104n0:1110_7: viparītābhinivesaṃ kārentī diṭṭhicarite saṃsāre nayati, tesaṃ vā saṃsāraṃ saṅkhārādipavattiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1110_8: nayati pavattetīti saṃsāranāyikā vuttā. Taṇhāya taṇhācaritānaṃ saṃsāranāyikābhāve
anya-e0104n0:1111_0: Paṭhamaṃ bhavacakkaṃ. Phaluppattiyāti kattuatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, karaṇatthe eva vā.
anya-e0104n0:1111_1: Viññāṇādipaccuppannaphaluppatti hi idha diṭṭhā, adiṭṭhānaṃ purimabhave attano hetūnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1111_2: avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ phalaṃ anuppādetvā anupacchijjanaṃ pakāseti, pakāsanassa vā karaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1111_3: hotīti. Atha vā purimabhavacakkaṃ dutiyena sambandhaṃ vuttanti vedanāsaṅkhātassa
anya-e0104n0:1111_4: phalassa uppattiyā taṇhādīnaṃ hetūnaṃ anupacchedaṃ pakāseti, tasmā phaluppattiyā
anya-e0104n0:1111_5: kāraṇabhūtāya paṭhamassa bhavacakkassa hetūnaṃ anupacchedappakāsanatoti attho. Saṅkhārādīnameva
anya-e0104n0:1111_6: vā phalānaṃ uppattiyā avijjādīnaṃ hetūnaṃ phalaṃ ajanetvā anupacchedameva, viññāṇādihetūnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1111_7: vā saṅkhārādīnaṃ anuppabandhameva pakāseti paṭhamaṃ bhavacakkaṃ, na dutiyaṃ viya
anya-e0104n0:1111_10: pavattiyā dīpanato. “Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti hi ettha aparipuṇṇāyatanaṃ kalalarūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1111_11: vatvā tato uddhaṃ “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti saḷāyatanappavatti vuttā. Sahuppattidīpanatoti
anya-e0104n0:1111_12: “upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jātī”ti vā upapattikkhandhānaṃ ekajjhaṃ uppattiyā
anya-e0104n0:1111_13: dīpanato. Na hi ettha paṭhame viya bhavacakke āyatanānaṃ kamena uppatti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1112_0: 654. Hetuādipubbakā tayo sandhī etassāti hetuphalahetupubbakatisandhi, bhavacakkaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1112_1: Hetuphalahetuphalavasena catuppabhedo aṅgānaṃ saṅgaho etassāti catubhedasaṅgahaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1112_2: Sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti
anya-e0104n0:1112_3: ākārā. Atītahetuādīnaṃ vā pakārā ākārā. Kilesakammavipākā vipākakilesakammehi sambandhā
anya-e0104n0:1112_4: hutvā punappunaṃ parivattantīti tesu vaṭṭanāmaṃ āropetvā “tivaṭṭa”nti vuttaṃ, vaṭṭekadesattā
anya-e0104n0:1114: Paritassatīti taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ pariggahakaraṇavasena tassati, taṇhāyatīti attho. Upādiyatīti daḷhagāhaṃ gaṇhāti. Purimakammabhavasminti purimakammabhave sati.
anya-e0104n0:1115_0: Tassa ca sabbhāvo kariyamānatā evāti āha “kammabhave kariyamāneti attho”ti. Dukkhādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1115_1: mohoti dukkhādīnaṃ ādīnavapaṭicchādako appahīno moho. Āyūhanāti sampiṇḍanakā dānādikiriyāya
anya-e0104n0:1115_2: pavattanakā. Ekaṃ āvajjanaṃ etesanti ekāvajjanā, tesu ekāvajjanesu. Sattame cetanā
anya-e0104n0:1115_3: bhavo. “Yā kāci vā pana cetanā bhavo, sampayuttā āyūhanā saṅkhārā”ti idaṃ yathādassitāya
anya-e0104n0:1115_4: dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇabhājanīye vuttāya paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā vasena vuttaṃ. Tattha hi “cetanā
anya-e0104n0:1115_5: bhavo”ti āgatā. Bhavaniddese pana “sātthato”ti ettha “cetanāva saṅkhārā, bhavo pana
anya-e0104n0:1115_7: Kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā”tiādinā hi saṅkhārānaṃ cetanābhāvo vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1115_11: kammabhāvato ca upapattibhavaṃ bhāventīti “bhavo”ti vuttā. Upapattibhavabhāvanākiccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1115_12: pana cetanāya sātisayanti paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā cetanā “bhavo”ti vuttā. Bhavābhisaṅkharaṇakiccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1115_13: cetanāya sātisayanti vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ “kusalā cetanā”tiādinā cetanā “saṅkhārā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1115_14: Tasmā tena tena pariyāyena ubhayaṃ ubhayattha vattuṃ yuttanti natthettha virodho.
anya-e0104n0:1115_15: Tassa phale upapattibhave nikāmanāti “tassa sutaṃ hoti ‘cātumahārājikā devā dīghāyukā
anya-e0104n0:1115_16: vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā’ti”ādisutānusārena bhāvini upapattibhave abhikaṅkhanā. Gahaṇanti
anya-e0104n0:1115_17: kāmupādānaṃ kiccenāha. Parāmasananti itarāni. Āyūhanāvasāneti tīsupi atthavikappesu
anya-e0104n0:1116_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave. Bhavantarassa atītabhavassa iminā paccuppannabhavena
anya-e0104n0:1116_1: paṭisandhānaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānaṃ, bhavantarabhāvena vā paṭisandhānaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1116_2: tassa vasena. Yaṃ paṭisandhīti vuccati, taṃ viññāṇanti sambandho. Tathā hi viññāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1117_0: Dvīsu atthavikappesu vutte āyūhanasaṅkhāre “tassa pubbabhāgā”ti āha, tatiye atthavikappe
anya-e0104n0:1117_1: vutte “taṃsampayuttā”ti. Taṃsampayuttā avijjā gahitāva hotīti sambandho. Daharassa
anya-e0104n0:1117_2: cittappavatti bhavaṅgabahulā yebhuyyena bhavantarajanakakammāyūhanasamatthā na hotīti
anya-e0104n0:1117_3: “idha paṭipakkattā āyatanāna”nti vuttaṃ. “Kammakaraṇakāle sammoho dassito”ti etena
anya-e0104n0:1117_4: kammassa paccayabhūtaṃ sammohaṃ dasseti, na kammasampayuttameva.
anya-e0104n0:1118_0: “Tattha purimabhavasmiṃ pañca kammasambhārā, etarahi pañca vipākadhammā, etarahi
anya-e0104n0:1118_1: pañca kammasambhārā, anāgate pañca vipākadhammāti dasa dhammā kammaṃ, dasa dhammā
anya-e0104n0:1118_2: vipāko, iti dvīsu ṭhānesu kammaṃ, kammavaṭṭaṃ, dvīsu ṭhānesu vipāko, vipākavaṭṭanti
anya-e0104n0:1118_3: kammasaṅkhepo ca vipākasaṅkhepo ca, kammabhavo ca vipākabhavo ca kammavaṭṭañca vipākavaṭṭañca,
anya-e0104n0:1118_4: kammapavattañca vipākapavattañca, kammasantati ca vipākasantati ca, kiriyā ceva kiriyāphalañcāti –
anya-e0104n0:1127: Satte ca nupalabbhante, nevucchedo na sassata”nti. ;
anya-e0104n0:1128_0: Tattha kammāneva vipākaṃ sambharanti vaḍḍhentīti kammasambhārā, kammaṃ vā saṅkhārabhavā,
anya-e0104n0:1128_1: tadupakārakāni avijjātaṇhupādānāni kammasambhārā. Paṭisandhidāyako vā bhavo kammaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1128_2: tadūpakārakā yathāvuttā āyūhanasaṅkhārā, avijjādayo ca kammasambhārāti kammañca kammasambhārā
anya-e0104n0:1128_3: ca kammasambhārāti ekasesavasena kammasambhāraggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Dasa dhammā kammanti
anya-e0104n0:1128_4: avijjādayopi kammasahāyatāya kammasarikkhakā, tadūpakārā cāti “kamma”nti vuttā. Saṅkhippanti
anya-e0104n0:1128_5: ettha avijjādayo, viññāṇādayo cāti saṅkhepo, kammaṃ, vipāko ca. “Kammaṃ vipāko”ti
anya-e0104n0:1128_6: evaṃ saṅkhipīyatīti vā saṅkhepo, avijjādayo, viññāṇādayo ca. Saṅkhepabhāvasāmaññena
anya-e0104n0:1128_7: pana ekavacanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, saṅkhepasaddo vā bhāgādhivacananti kammabhāgo kammasaṅkhepo.
anya-e0104n0:1129_0: Evaṃ samuppannanti kammatopi vipāko. Tatthāpi “avijjāto saṅkhārā”ti evaṃ samuppannaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1129_1: tisandhiādivasena vā samuppannaṃ idaṃ bhavacakkanti attho. Ittaranti gamanadhammaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1129_2: vinassadhammanti attho. Tena uppādavayavantatādīpakena aniccasaddena, vikārāpattidīpakena
anya-e0104n0:1129_3: calasaddena ca adīpitaṃ kālantaraṭṭhāyitābhāvaṃ vibhāveti. Addhuvanti etena thirabhāvābhāvanissārataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1129_4: Hetu eva sambhārā hetusambhārā. “Ṭhānaso hetuso”ti ettha evaṃ vuttaṃ vā ṭhānaṃ, aññampi
anya-e0104n0:1129_5: tassa tassa sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ sambhāro, asādhāraṇaṃ hetu. Evanti evaṃ hetuto dhammamattasambhave,
anya-e0104n0:1129_6: hetunirodhā ca vaṭṭacchede dhamme ca taṃnirodhāya desite satīti attho. Brahmacariyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1129_7: idha brahmacariyidha satte cāti ettha ca-saddo “evaṃ brahmacariyañca vijjati, sassatucchedā
anya-e0104n0:1129_8: ca na hontī”ti samuccayattho. Evañhi hetuāyatte dhammamattasambhave satto nupalabbhati,
anya-e0104n0:1129_9: tasmiñca upalabbhante sassato, ucchedo vā siyāti nupalabbhante tasmiṃ neva ucchedo
anya-e0104n0:1130: 655. Saccappabhavatoti saccato, saccānaṃ vā pabhavato ca.
anya-e0104n0:1131_0: Kusalākusalaṃ kammanti vaṭṭakathāya vattamānattā sāsavanti viññāyati. Avisesenāti
anya-e0104n0:1131_1: “cetanā cetanāsampayuttakā”ti visesaṃ akatvā, sabbampi taṃ kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ samudayasaccanti
anya-e0104n0:1131_2: vuttanti attho. “Taṇhā ca…pe… avasesā ca sāsavā kusalā dhammā”ti hi cetanācetanāsampayuttavisesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1131_3: akatvā vuttanti, ariyasaccavisesaṃ vā akatvā samudayasaccanti vuttanti attho. Saccavibhaṅge
anya-e0104n0:1131_4: hi sabbepi kilesā sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ “samudayasacca”nti vuttaṃ. Dutiyasaccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1131_5: pabhavo etassāti dutiyasaccapabhavaṃ. Upādānapaccayā bhavoti upapattibhavassa, kammabhavassa
anya-e0104n0:1132_0: 656. Vatthūsūti ārammaṇesu, dukkhādīsu vā paṭicchādetabbesu vatthūsu. Sammohetīti
anya-e0104n0:1132_1: dhammasabhāvaṃ jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ adentī tassa paṭicchādanavasena sammoheti. Vatthunti
anya-e0104n0:1132_2: idha ārammaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Aññamaññañca upatthambheti aññamaññasannissayena vinā
anya-e0104n0:1132_3: ṭhātuṃ asakkontā dve naḷakalāpā viya. Savisayeti yathāsakaṃ visaye rūpāyatanādike.
anya-e0104n0:1132_4: Jāyamānānaṃ khandhānaṃ vikārabhāvena labbhamānā jāti te janentī viya hotīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1132_5: “khandhe ca janetī”ti. Tenāha “tesaṃ abhinibbattibhāvena pavattattā”ti. Pākabhedabhāvañca
anya-e0104n0:1132_6: adhitiṭṭhatīti etthāpi “khandhe janetī”ti ettha vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo. Pākabhedavasena
anya-e0104n0:1132_7: vattaticceva attho. Paccatīti pāko, bhijjatīti bhedo, pāko ca bhedo ca pākabhedaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1132_8: tassa bhāvaṃ paccanaṃ, bhijjanañcāti attho. Sokādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānattāti tesaṃ kāraṇattā,
anya-e0104n0:1132_9: tehi siddhāya avijjāya sahitehi saṅkhārehi paccayo ca hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāyāti
anya-e0104n0:1132_10: adhippāyo. Cuticittaṃ vā paṭisandhiviññāṇassa anantarapaccayo hotīti “paccayo ca
anya-e0104n0:1132_11: hoti bhavantarapātubhāvāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana cuticittaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārarahitaṃ bhavantarassa
anya-e0104n0:1132_12: paccayo na hotīti sasahāyattadassanatthamāha “sokādīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānattā”ti. Dvedhāti
anya-e0104n0:1132_13: attano attano sarasena, dhammantarapaccayabhāvena cāti dvedhā dvedhā. Byāpanicchālopena hi niddeso.
anya-e0104n0:1133_1: kho abhisaṅkharotīti esa no kallo pañho”ti dasseti, tenetaṃ kārakadassananivāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1133_2: Attā bhavato bhavantaraṃ saṅkamatīti dassanaṃ attasaṅkantidassanaṃ, taṃ saṅkhārapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1133_3: viññāṇuppattivacanena nivāritaṃ hoti. Pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ abhedato eko attāti gahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1133_4: ghanasaññā, taṃ yamakatālakandaṃ bhindantena viya “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpamattameta”nti
anya-e0104n0:1133_5: vacanena nivāritaṃ hoti. “Evamādidassananivāraṇa”nti etena “socati paridevati dukkhito”tiādidassananivāraṇamāha.
anya-e0104n0:1133_6: Sokādayopi hi paccayāyattā avasavattinoti “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ soka…pe… sambhavantī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1134_1: adassanamāha tadubhayavinimuttassa dhammesu paramatthato passitabbabhāvassa abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1134_2: Upakkhalanaṃ viya dukkhuppattihetuto. Patanaṃ viya bhavantarapapātato. Gaṇḍapātubhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1134_3: viya dukkhatāsūlayogato, kilesāsucipaggharaṇato ca. Gaṇḍabhedapīḷakā viyāti bhedanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1134_4: paccamāne gaṇḍe tassa upari jāyamānā khuddakapīḷakā viya, gaṇḍassa vā anekadhābhede
anya-e0104n0:1134_5: pīḷakā viya. Ghaṭṭanaṃ viya saṅghaṭṭanarasatāya phasso. Ghaṭṭanadukkhaṃ viyāti ghaṭṭanato
anya-e0104n0:1134_6: jātaṃ dukkhaṃ viya tividhadukkhatāvasena tissannampi vedanānaṃ dukkhabhāvato. Paṭikārābhilāso
anya-e0104n0:1134_7: viyāti samudāyassa ekadesanidassanabhāvenāha. Asappāyaggahaṇaṃ viya bahuvidhānatthuppattinimittato.
anya-e0104n0:1134_8: Asappāyalepanaṃ viya dukkhahetuno sasantāne sannidhāpanato. Gaṇḍavikārapātubhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1134_10: Sūnatāsarāgapubbaggahaṇādayo hi gaṇḍavikārā. Sarasato gaṇḍassa bhijjanaṃ pākena vinā
anya-e0104n0:1134_11: na hotīti bhedaggahaṇenevassa pākopi gahitoti katvā āha “gaṇḍabhedo viya jarāmaraṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1134_12: Gaṇḍassa vā visadisāpatti, bhijjanañca gaṇḍabhedo, tattha visadisāpatti pākoti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1135_0: Upamāhi bhavacakkaṃ viññāpentena ekādhiṭṭhānehi upamāvisesehi taṃ viññāpetvā idāni
anya-e0104n0:1135_1: nānādhiṭṭhānehi viññāpetuṃ “yasmā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭalābhibhūtacakkhuko
anya-e0104n0:1135_2: rūpāni na passati, kiñci passantopi viparītaṃ passati, evaṃ avijjābhibhūto dukkhādīni
anya-e0104n0:1135_3: na paṭipajjati na passati, micchā vā paṭipajjatīti paṭalaṃ viya avijjā. Kosakārakimi
anya-e0104n0:1135_4: viya attanāva katattā, vaṭṭassa attano eva paribbhamanakāraṇattā ca kosappadesā viya
anya-e0104n0:1135_5: saṅkhārā. Saṅkhārapariggahaṃ vinā patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ pariṇāyakapariggahaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1135_6: vinā patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamāno rājakumāro viyāti pariggahena vinā patiṭṭhālābho ettha
anya-e0104n0:1135_9: māyā viya nāmarūpaṃ. Patiṭṭhāvisesena vuddhivisesāpattito vanappagumbo viya saḷāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1135_10: Āyatanānaṃ visayivisayabhūtānaṃ aññamaññābhimukhabhāvo āyatanaghaṭṭanaṃ. Tato āyatanaghaṭṭanato
anya-e0104n0:1135_11: dvayasaṅghaṭṭanuppattito, vedanādukkhahetuto ca aggi viya phasso. Sapariḷāhato dāho
anya-e0104n0:1135_12: viya vedanā. Uparūpari taṇhāpavaḍḍhanato loṇūdakapānaṃ viya visayānubhavanaṃ. Ārammaṇe
anya-e0104n0:1135_13: pātukamyatābhāvato pipāsā viya taṇhā. Tadassupādānanti taṃ abhilāsakaraṇaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1135_14: assa taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa, tadassa vā bhaveyya upādānaṃ. Byasanāvahatāya ajānanato
anya-e0104n0:1135_15: bhavupādānaṃ macchassa baḷisupādānaṃ viya. Ettha ca saṅkhārādīnaṃ kosappadesapariṇāyakādīhi
anya-e0104n0:1135_16: dvīhi dvīhi sadisatāya dve dve upamā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1136_0: 659. Koci agambhīro eva gambhīro viya khāyati purāṇatiṇapaṇṇādibharito pabbatasaṅkhepe
anya-e0104n0:1136_1: jalāsayo viya, na evamayaṃ. Ayaṃ pana gambhīrova hutvā obhāsati pakāsati dissatīti
anya-e0104n0:1137_0: Jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na na hoti, hoti evāti avadhāraṇe siddhe “siyā nu kho jarāmaraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1137_1: jātito, aññatopī”ti āsaṅkāyaṃ tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1137_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha aññaggahaṇaṃ jātiyā paṭiyogīvisayaṃ, na aññamattavisayaṃ “jātiṃ vinā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1137_3: vacanato. Tenassa nāññaṃ jātiyā sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ nivattitaṃ hoti. Esa nayo ito
anya-e0104n0:1137_4: paresupi. Itthanti idaṃ pakāraṃ, iminā pakārenāti attho. Jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭhoti
anya-e0104n0:1137_5: jātipaccayasambhūtaṃ hutvā sahitassa attano paccayānurūpassa uddhaṃ uddhaṃ āgatabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:1137_6: anuppavattaṭṭhoti attho. Atha vā sambhūtaṭṭho ca samudāgataṭṭho ca sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:1137_7: “Na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotī”ti hi jātipaccayasambhūtaṭṭho
anya-e0104n0:1137_8: vutto. Itthañca jātito samudāgacchatīti jātipaccayasamudāgataṭṭho, yā yā jāti yathā
anya-e0104n0:1138_0: Tattha “na jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī”ti iminā jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayatāya avitathataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1138_1: dasseti, “na jātiṃ vinā aññato jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī”ti iminā anaññathattaṃ, “itthañca
anya-e0104n0:1138_2: jātito samudāgacchatī”ti iminā tathataṃ. Tena ca yathā paccayadhammā attano paccayuppannānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1138_3: paccayabhāve, tathā avitathā anaññathā, evaṃ paccayuppannadhammāpi tabbhāveti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1138_4: Esa nayo sesesupi. “Hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena atthassa
anya-e0104n0:1138_5: hetuphalabhāvo kathaṃ ñātabboti? “Atthapaṭisambhidā”ti etassa samāsapadassa avayavapadatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1138_7: ettha hi “atthe”ti etassa atthaṃ dassentena “hetuphale”ti vuttaṃ, “paṭisambhidā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1138_8: etassa atthaṃ dassentena “ñāṇa”nti, tasmā hetuphalaatthasaddā ekatthā, ñāṇapaṭisambhidā
anya-e0104n0:1138_9: cāti imamatthaṃ vadantena sādhito atthassa hetuphalabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:1139_0: Yenākārenāti yena pavattiākārena. Sabhāvadhammā hi paccayavisesasiddhena pavattiākārena
anya-e0104n0:1139_1: visiṭṭhākārā honti. Tenāha “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe
anya-e0104n0:1139_2: āpāthamāgacchantī”ti. Yadavatthāti yāya avatthāya avatthitā. Avatthāvisesavanto hi
anya-e0104n0:1139_3: dhammā tena tena avatthāvisesena taṃ taṃ atthakiccaṃ sādhetuṃ samatthā honti. Svāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1139_4: pavattiākāro, avatthāviseso ca avijjāyapi anupacitakusalasambhārehi duravabodhato
anya-e0104n0:1139_5: eva ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho cāti āha “tassa…pe… gambhīro”ti. Tassa ākārassa,
anya-e0104n0:1139_6: avatthāya ca. Hetumhi ñāṇanti ettha hetuno dhammapariyāyatā vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1140_0: Assāti paṭiccasamuppādassa. Tena tena kāraṇenāti tena tena veneyyānaṃ bujjhanānuguṇatāsaṅkhātena
anya-e0104n0:1140_1: kāraṇena. Tatthāti tasmiṃ desanappakāre. Anulomapaṭilomatoti nayidha paccayuppādā
anya-e0104n0:1140_3: paṭilomamāha. Ādito pana antagamanamanulomaṃ, antato ca ādigamanaṃ paṭilomamāha.
anya-e0104n0:1140_4: Ādito paṭṭhāya anulomadesanāya, antato paṭṭhāya paṭilomadesanāya ca tisandhicatusaṅkhepaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1140_5: “Ime cattāro āhārā kiṃnidānā”tiādikāya vemajjhato paṭṭhāya paṭilomadesanāya, “cakkhuñca
anya-e0104n0:1140_6: paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā”tiādikāya
anya-e0104n0:1140_7: anulomadesanāya ca dvisandhitisaṅkhepaṃ. “Saṃyojanīyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino
anya-e0104n0:1140_8: viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati, taṇhāpaccayā upādāna”ntiādīsu ekasandhidvisaṅkhepaṃ. Katthaci
anya-e0104n0:1140_9: ekaṅgopi ca paṭiccasamuppādo desito, so “tatra, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako”tiādinā dassito eva.
anya-e0104n0:1141_0: Avijjādīnaṃ sabhāvo paṭivijjhīyatīti paṭivedho. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1141_1: tesaṃ vā tattha tattha vuttadhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1141_2: paṭivedho”ti. Jānanalakkhaṇassa ñāṇassa paṭipakkhabhūto avijjāya aññāṇaṭṭho. Ārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1141_3: paccakkhakaraṇena dassanabhūtassa paṭipakkhabhūto adassanaṭṭho. Yena panesā dukkhādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1141_4: yāthāvasarasaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na deti, chādetvā pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati, so tassā
anya-e0104n0:1141_5: saccāsampaṭivedhaṭṭho. Apuññābhisaṅkhārekadeso sarāgo, añño virāgo. Rāgassa vā apaṭipakkhabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1141_6: rāgapavaḍḍhako apuññābhisaṅkhāro sabbopi sarāgo, itaro tappaṭipakkhabhāvato virāgo.
anya-e0104n0:1141_7: “Dīgharattaṃ hetaṃ, bhikkhave, assutavato puthujjanassa ajjhositaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1141_8: ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti attaparāmāsassa viññāṇaṃ visesato vatthu vuttanti
anya-e0104n0:1141_9: viññāṇassa suññataṭṭho gambhīro. Attā vijānāti saṃsaratīti sabyāpāratāsaṅkanti abhinivesabalavatāya
anya-e0104n0:1141_11: ekuppādo, pavattiyaṃ visuṃ visuṃ yathārahaṃ ekuppādo, nāmassa rūpena, rūpassa ca
anya-e0104n0:1141_12: nāmena asampayogato vinibbhogo, nāmassa nāmena, rūpassa ca rūpena, ekaccassa ekaccena
anya-e0104n0:1141_13: avinibbhogo yojetabbo. Ekuppādekanirodhe hi avinibbhoge adhippete so rūpassa ca ekakalāpavuttino
anya-e0104n0:1141_14: labbhati. Atha vā ekacatuvokārabhavesu nāmarūpānaṃ asahavattanato aññamaññavinibbhogo,
anya-e0104n0:1142_0: Adhipatiyaṭṭho nāma idha indriyapaccayabhāvo. “Lokopeso dvārāpesā khettampeta”nti
anya-e0104n0:1142_1: vuttā lokādiatthā cakkhādīsu pañcasu yojetabbā. Manāyatanassāpi lujjanato, manosamphassādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1142_2: dvārakhettabhāvato ca ete atthā sambhavanti eva. Āpāthagatānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ pakāsanayogyatālakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1142_3: obhāsanaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visayibhāvo, manāyatanassa vijānanaṃ. Saṅghaṭṭanaṭṭho visesato
anya-e0104n0:1142_4: cakkhusamphassādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ, itare channampi yojetabbā. Phusanañca phassassa sabhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:1142_5: saṅghaṭṭanaṃ raso, itare upaṭṭhānākārā. Ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṭṭho rasavasena vutto,
anya-e0104n0:1142_6: vedayitaṭṭho lakkhaṇavasena. Sukhadukkhamajjhattabhāvā yathākkamaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1142_7: sabhāvavasena vuttā. Attā vedayatīti abhinivesassa balavatāya nijjīvaṭṭho vedanāya
anya-e0104n0:1142_8: gambhīro. Nijjīvāya vā vedanāya vedayitaṃ nijjīvavedayitaṃ, nijjīvavedayitameva attho
anya-e0104n0:1142_10: pariniṭṭhāpanaṃ ajjhosānaṭṭho. Itaro sādhāraṇavasena veditabbo. Ādānaggahaṇābhinivesaṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:1142_11: catunnampi upādānānaṃ samānā, parāmāsaṭṭho vutto diṭṭhupādānādīnameva, tathā duratikkamaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:1142_12: “Diṭṭhikantāro”ti hi vacanato diṭṭhīnaṃ duratikkamatā, daḷhaggahaṇattā vā catunnampi
anya-e0104n0:1142_13: duratikkamaṭṭho yojetabbo. Duratikkamatāyapi hi taṇhāya samuddaṭṭho vutto. Yonigatiṭhitinivāsesukhipananti
anya-e0104n0:1142_14: samāse bhummavacanassa alopo daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi tena āyūhanābhisaṅkharaṇapadānaṃ samāso
anya-e0104n0:1142_15: hoti. Jarāmaraṇaṅgaṃ maraṇappadhānanti maraṇaṭṭhā eva khayādayo gambhīrāti dassitā.
anya-e0104n0:1142_16: Navanavānañhi khayena khaṇḍiccādiparipakkappavatti jarāti, khayaṭṭho vā jarāya vuttoti
anya-e0104n0:1142_17: daṭṭhabbo. Navabhāvāpagamo hi khayoti vattuṃ yuttoti. Vipariṇāmaṭṭho dvinnampi. Santativasena
anya-e0104n0:1142_18: vā jarāya khayavayabhāvo, sammutikhaṇikavasena maraṇassa bhedavipariṇāmatā yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1143_0: 660. Atthanayāti atthānaṃ nayā, avijjādiatthehi ekattādī sakena bhāvena nayanti gamentīti
anya-e0104n0:1143_1: ekattādayo, tesaṃ nayāti vuttā. Nīyantīti hi nayāti. Atthā eva vā ekattādibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1143_2: nīyamānā ñāyamānā atthanayāti vuttā. Nīyanti etehīti vā nayā, ekattādīhi ca atthā
anya-e0104n0:1143_3: “eka”ntiādinā nīyanti, tasmā ekattādayo atthānaṃ nayāti atthanayā.
anya-e0104n0:1144_1: ekajjhaṃ gahetvā santānānupacchedena bījaṃ rukkhabhāvaṃ pattaṃ rukkhabhāvena pavattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1144_2: tañca ekattena vuccatīti santānānupacchedo yathā ekattaṃ, evaṃ idhāpi avijjāsaṅkhārādihetuhetusamuppannānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1144_4: etena santānānupacchedaṃ vibhāveti. Satipi hi hetuphalānaṃ paramatthato bhede hetubhāvena,
anya-e0104n0:1144_5: phalabhāvena ca tesaṃ sambandhabhāvoyevettha santānānupacchedo, yato yasmiṃ santāne
anya-e0104n0:1144_6: kammaṃ nibbattaṃ, tattheva phaluppattīti katassa vināso, akatassa abbhāgamo ca natthīti.
anya-e0104n0:1144_7: Ekattaggahaṇatoti hetuphalānaṃ bhedaṃ anupadhāretvā hetuṃ, phalañca abhinnaṃ katvā
anya-e0104n0:1144_8: ubhinnaṃ ekabhāvassa abhedassa gahaṇena. “Tadeva viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratī”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1145_0: Lakkhaṇavavatthānanti sabhāvavavatthānaṃ hetuno, phalassa ca bhinnasabhāvatāvabodho.
anya-e0104n0:1145_1: Bhinnasantānassevāti sambandharahitassa nānattassa gahaṇato añño mato, añño jāto,
anya-e0104n0:1145_2: tasmā “sattantaro ucchinno, sattantaro uppanno”ti gaṇhanto ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyati.
anya-e0104n0:1146_0: Amhehi uppādetabbanti ānetvā sambandho. Byāpārābhāvo anabhisandhitāya abyāvaṭatā.
anya-e0104n0:1146_1: Sammā passantoti “nirīhā nijjīvā dhammamattā”ti passanto. Sabhāvo eva niyamo sabhāvaniyamo
anya-e0104n0:1146_2: “sasambhāraggino uddhamukhatā, sasambhāravāyuno tiriyagamana”nti evamādi viya. Tena
anya-e0104n0:1146_3: siddho yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannassa hetubhāvo. “Kassaci kattuno abhāvā na kāci kiriyā
anya-e0104n0:1147_0: “Khīrato dadhi, na udakato, tilato telaṃ, na vālikato”ti sabbato sabbasambhavābhāvadassanena
anya-e0104n0:1147_1: ahetukadiṭṭhiṃ hetuanurūpameva phalaṃ passanto akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati. Yato kutocīti
anya-e0104n0:1147_2: yadi aññasmā aññassa uppatti siyā, vālikato telassa, ucchuto khīrassa kasmā uppatti
anya-e0104n0:1147_3: na siyā, tasmā na koci kassaci hetu atthīti ahetukadiṭṭhiṃ, avijjamānepi hetumhi
anya-e0104n0:1148_0: 661. Kasmā? Yasmā idañhi bhavacakkaṃ apadāletvā saṃsārabhayamatīto na koci supinantarepi
anya-e0104n0:1148_1: atthīti sambandho. Agādhaṃ appatiṭṭhaṃ duratiyānaṃ duratikkamaṃ. Asanivicakkamivāti
anya-e0104n0:1148_2: asanimaṇḍalamiva. Tañhi nimmathanameva, nānimmathanaṃ pavattati, evaṃ bhavacakkampi
anya-e0104n0:1149_0: Ñāṇāsinā apadāletvā saṃsārabhayamatīto natthīti etassa sādhakasuttaṃ dassento “vuttampi
anya-e0104n0:1149_1: ceta”ntiādimāha. Tantūnaṃ ākulakaṃ tantākulakaṃ, tantākulakamiva jātā tantākulakajātā,
anya-e0104n0:1149_2: kilesakammavipākehi ativiya jaṭitāti attho. Kuliyā sakuṇiyā nīḍaṃ kulikaṃ, taṃ viya
anya-e0104n0:1149_3: jātā kulikuṇḍikajātā. Muñcā viya, pabbajā viya ca bhūtā jātā muñjapabbajabhūtā. Tadubhayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1149_4: kira tiṇaṃ ākulaṃ jaṭitaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhati. Vaḍḍhiyā abhāvato apāyaṃ, dukkhagatibhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1149_5: duggatiṃ, sukhasamussayato vinipatitattā vinipātañca, catubbidhaṃ apāyaṃ “khandhānañca
anya-e0104n0:1149_6: paṭipāṭī”tiādinā vuttaṃ saṃsārañca nātivattati. Saṃsāro eva vā sabbo idha vaḍḍhiapagamādiatthehi
anya-e0104n0:1154_0: 662. Yā visuddhiyo sampādetabbāti sambandho. Imesu yathāvicāritesu khandhādīsu vipassanāya
anya-e0104n0:1154_1: bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu. Ganthassa uggaṇhanaṃ vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho, parito sabbathāpi
anya-e0104n0:1154_2: atthassa ñātumicchā paripucchā, savanupaparikkhādivasena tadatthassa manasikāravidhi,
anya-e0104n0:1154_3: tadubhayavasena yasmā tatthapi ñāṇaṃ svāsevitaṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “uggahaparipucchāvasena
anya-e0104n0:1154_4: ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā”ti, khandhādīsu sutamayaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppādetvāti attho. Vitthāritameva,
anya-e0104n0:1154_5: tasmā tattha vitthāritanayānusārena sīlavisuddhi sampādetabbāti adhippāyo. Upacārasamādhipi
anya-e0104n0:1154_6: appanāsamādhi viya vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato cittavisuddhiyevāti āha “saupacārā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1154_7: Veditabbāti attano santāne nibbattanavaseneva veditabbā. Evañhi tā paccakkhato viditā
anya-e0104n0:1154_8: nāma honti, tasmā veditabbā sampādetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti. Veditabbāti vā samāpattisukhādhigamavasena
anya-e0104n0:1154_9: anubhavitabbāti attho. Na hi kevalena jānanamattena cittavisuddhiyaṃ patiṭṭhito nāma
anya-e0104n0:1154_10: hoti, na ca tattha apatiṭṭhāya uparivisuddhiṃ sampādetuṃ sakkāti.
anya-e0104n0:1155_0: Nāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvadassananti nāmassa, rūpassa ca vibhajja yathābhūtasabhāvadassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1155_1: Nāmaggahaṇena cettha vedanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ tebhūmakānaṃ khandhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ, na “viññāṇapaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1155_2: nāmarūpa”nti ettha viya viññāṇaṃ vinā, nāpi “nāmañca rūpañcā”ti ettha viya sanibbānehi
anya-e0104n0:1156_0: 663. Yāti pajjati etenāti yānaṃ, samathova yānaṃ samathayānaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti
anya-e0104n0:1156_1: samathayāniko. Jhāne, jhānūpacāre vā patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassetaṃ nāmaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1156_3: ādikammikassa duppariggahatāya vuttaṃ. Lakkhaṇarasādivasena pariggahetabbā ñāṇena
anya-e0104n0:1156_4: paricchijja gahetabbā, pariggahavidhi pana khandhaniddese vuttā evāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1156_5: Ārammaṇābhimukhanamanaṃ ārammaṇena vinā appavatti, tena namanaṭṭhena, nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena
anya-e0104n0:1156_6: vā. Vedanādayo hi arūpadhammā sabbadāpi ca phassādināmakattā pathavīādayo viya kesakumbhādināmantarānāpajjanato
anya-e0104n0:1156_7: attanāva katanāmatāya nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena “nāma”nti vuccanti. Atha vā adhivacanasamphasso
anya-e0104n0:1156_8: viya adhivacanaṃ nāmaṃ antarena anupacitasambhārānaṃ gahaṇaṃ na gacchantīti nāmāyattaggahaṇatāya
anya-e0104n0:1156_9: vedanādayo “nāma”nti vuccanti, rūpaṃ pana vināpi nāmasavanaṃ attano ruppanasabhāveneva
anya-e0104n0:1156_10: gahaṇaṃ gacchati. Vavatthāpetabbanti asaṅkarato ṭhapetabbaṃ, aññamaññaṃ, rūpena ca
anya-e0104n0:1157_0: Nāmarūpapariggaho ca nāma yāvadeva tassa paṭinissajjanatthanti tadanurūpameva nidassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1157_2: visadisuppattī”tiādinā khandhaniddesavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoyeva. Evaṃ visuṃ nāmapariggahaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1157_3: rūpapariggahañca dassetvā idāni ekajjhaṃ nāmarūpapariggahaṃ dassetuṃ “tato namanalakkhaṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1158_0: 664. Iti arūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ dassetvā idāni rūpamukhena taṃ dassento
anya-e0104n0:1158_2: vipassanāyānikassa pana samathaṃ anissāyāti āha “suddhavipassanāyāniko”ti, samathabhāvanāya
anya-e0104n0:1158_3: amissitavipassanāyānavāti attho. Ayameva vā samathayānikoti yathāvutto samathayāniko
anya-e0104n0:1158_4: eva vā. Tena samathayānikassāpi rūpamukhena vipassanābhiniveso labbhati, na arūpamukhenevāti
anya-e0104n0:1158_5: dasseti. Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānanti “yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ, ayaṃ pathavīdhātū”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1158_7: nāma keso cammabbhantaragato. Tatthevāti tasmiṃyeva kammasamuṭṭhāne kese. Kāyappasādassa
anya-e0104n0:1158_8: viya bhāvassāpi sakalasarīrabyāpitāya “bhāvassa atthitāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Puna tatthevāti
anya-e0104n0:1158_9: tasmiṃyeva kesasaññite rūpasamudāye. Aparānipīti pubbe vuttāni kammasamuṭṭhānāni
anya-e0104n0:1158_10: vīsati, imāni āhārasamuṭṭhānādīni catuvīsati rūpānīti sabbānipi catucattālīsa, tañca
anya-e0104n0:1158_11: kho tattha labbhamānasantatisīsasāmaññena veditabbaṃ. “Catucattālīsā”ti ca idaṃ saddassa
anya-e0104n0:1158_12: aniyatattā vuttaṃ. Na hi sabbakālaṃ utucittato rūpaṃ uppajjantaṃ sasaddameva uppajjatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1158_13: Evanti yathā kese, evaṃ lomādīsu catusamuṭṭhānikesu. Catuvīsatikoṭṭhāsesūti dvattiṃsāya
anya-e0104n0:1158_14: koṭṭhāsesu vakkhamāne aṭṭha koṭṭhāse apanetvā catuvīsatikoṭṭhāsesu. Sedādīnaṃ ātapūpatāpādinā,
anya-e0104n0:1158_15: cittavikārena ca uppajjanato te utucittasamuṭṭhānā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1159_0: Dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsagatesu rūpesu pākaṭesu jātesu tadaññānipi pākaṭāni hontīti tānipi
anya-e0104n0:1159_1: dassetuṃ “apare”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha apare dasa ākārāti tejovāyokoṭṭhāsavasena apare
anya-e0104n0:1159_2: dasa ākārā. Kammajeti bhūtakathanaṃ, na visesanaṃ asitādiparipācakassa tejassa akammajassa
anya-e0104n0:1159_3: abhāvato. Tathā cittajeti ca ekantacittasamuṭṭhānattā assāsapassāsānanti keci, taṃ
anya-e0104n0:1159_4: na, acittajasantāne pavattānaṃ utujabhāvato. Abbhantaraṭṭhā eva hi te cittajā, na
anya-e0104n0:1159_5: bahiddhā, tasmā tattha “cittaje”ti idaṃ visesanameva, ayañca attho heṭṭhā ānāpānakathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1159_6: vuttoyeva. Sesesūti santappanādivasena ceva uddhaṅgamādivasena ca pavattesu tejovāyokoṭṭhāsesu.
anya-e0104n0:1160_0: Cakkhudasakādīsu padhānarūpaṃ cakkhādayoti tesu labbhamānaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ avayavakiccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1160_1: samudāye āropetvā vuttaṃ “vatthudvāravasena pañca cakkhudasakādayo”ti. Vatthuvasena
anya-e0104n0:1160_2: hadayavatthudasakañcāti yojetabbaṃ, ekayoganiddiṭṭhānampi ekadeso anuvattatīti. Sabbānipīti
anya-e0104n0:1160_4: pana tadavayavakalāpānañca bhede gayhamāne ativiya tato bahutaro rūpabhedo hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1160_5: so pana bhedo idha ādikammikassa duppariggahoti na gahetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1161_0: Kāmaṃ vatthuvasenāpi arūpadhammā pākaṭā honti, dvāravasena pana pariggaho anākuloti
anya-e0104n0:1161_1: katvā vuttaṃ “dvāravasena arūpadhammā pākaṭā hontī”ti. Sabbasaṅgāhikavasena “ekāsīti
anya-e0104n0:1161_2: lokiyacittānī”ti vuttaṃ, lābhino eva pana mahaggatacittāni supākaṭāni honti. Avisesenāti
anya-e0104n0:1161_3: sādhāraṇato. Phassādayo hi satta cetasikā cakkhuviññāṇādīhipi uppajjanato sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇā.
anya-e0104n0:1161_4: Sabbepi teti ekāsīti lokiyacittāni, taṃsampayuttaphassādayoti sabbepi te arūpadhamme.
anya-e0104n0:1161_5: Ārammaṇādivibhāgena pana cittuppādabhede gayhamāne tato bahutaro eva hoti, so pana idha nādhippeto.
anya-e0104n0:1162_0: 665. Assa cakkhupasādassa nissayabhūtā pana catasso dhātuyoti sambandho. Sahajātarūpāni
anya-e0104n0:1162_1: tassa cakkhupasādassa icceva sambandho. Tatthevāti tasmiṃyeva sasambhāracakkhupadese.
anya-e0104n0:1162_2: Anupādinnarūpānīti pubbe vuttarūpānaṃ upādinnarūpattā vuttaṃ, akammajarūpānīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1162_3: Sesānīti paṭhamaṃ cakkhuno vuttattā tato sesāni, tena pana saddhiṃ catupaññāsa rūpāni
anya-e0104n0:1162_4: honti. Cakkhudasakādīsu ekassapi aggahetabbato “avasesāni tecattālīsa rūpānī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1162_5: Saddassa aniyatattā taṃ aggahetvā “tecattālīsa rūpānī”ti vatvā puna utucittasamuṭṭhāne
anya-e0104n0:1163_0: Avasesarūpānīti “dasa dhātuyo”ti vutte dvādasa rūpadhamme ṭhapetvā avasesāni cha
anya-e0104n0:1163_1: nipphannarūpāni. Rūparūpāneva hi idha pariggayhanti, na rūpaparicchedavikāralakkhaṇāni.
anya-e0104n0:1163_3: duvidhampi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cittantveva vuttaṃ. Evanti iminā “cakkhuṃ nissāyā”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1163_4: vuttaṃ, avuttañca “sotaṃ nissāyā”tiādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Manoviññāṇadhātūti etthapi
anya-e0104n0:1163_5: “ekā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ “ekā manoviññāṇadhātū”ti. Aḍḍhena ekādasa aḍḍhekādasa,
anya-e0104n0:1163_6: aḍḍhaṃ vā ekādasamaṃ etāsanti aḍḍhekādasa. Aḍḍhaṭṭhamāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:1165_0: 667. Idha bhikkhu imasmiṃ sarīreti ajjhattaṃ vipassanābhinivesadassanavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1165_1: Teneva hi ekasseva bhāvassa gahitattā “sattarasa rūpāni sammasanupagānī”ti āha. Sammasituṃ
anya-e0104n0:1165_2: sakkuṇeyyāni sammasanaṃ upagacchantīti sammasanupagāni, sammasanīyānīti attho. Ākāra-ggahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:1165_3: viññattidvayaṃ vuttaṃ, vikāra-ggahaṇena lahutādittayaṃ, itarena ākāsadhātūti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:1165_4: Ākāra-ggahaṇena pana viññattidvayena saddhiṃ lakkhaṇarūpamāha. Tampi hi rūpānaṃ uppajjanādiākāramattanti.
anya-e0104n0:1165_5: Antaraparicchedoti taṃtaṃkalāpānaṃ asaṅkarakāraṇatāya antarabhūto paricchedo. Yadi
anya-e0104n0:1165_6: na sammasanupagāni, ākārādimattāni ca, kathaṃ rūpānīti āha “apica kho”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1166_0: 668. Evaṃ dvācattālīsāya koṭṭhāsānaṃ vasena vitthārato rūpapariggahaṃ tadanusārena
anya-e0104n0:1166_3: dassetvā atisaṃkhittanayenāpi dassetuṃ “yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1167_0: Yathā ca dhātuādivasena, evaṃ indriyasaccapaṭiccasamuppādavasenapi rūpārūpapariggaho
anya-e0104n0:1167_1: veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Indriyavasena tāva cakkhādīni pañca, itthipurisindriyāni cāti
anya-e0104n0:1167_2: satta indriyāni rūpaṃ, manindriyaṃ, pañca vedanindriyāni, saddhādīni pañca cāti ekādasa
anya-e0104n0:1167_3: nāmaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ nāmañca rūpañca, pacchimāni tīṇi idha anadhippetāni lokuttarattā.
anya-e0104n0:1167_4: Dukkhasaccaṃ nāmañca rūpañca, samudayasaccaṃ nāmaṃ, itarāni idha nādhippetāni lokuttarattā.
anya-e0104n0:1167_5: Paccayākāre ādito tīṇi aṅgāni nāmaṃ, catutthapañcamāni nāmañca rūpañca, chaṭṭhasattamaaṭṭhamanavamāni
anya-e0104n0:1167_6: nāmaṃ, dasamaṃ nāmañceva nāmarūpañca, pacchimāni dve paccekaṃ nāmañca rūpañcāti evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1167_8: kātabbo. Evaṃ pana nāmarūpapariggahassa vibhāgena kathane payojanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0104n0:1168_0: 669. Kāmaṃ vedanādīsu arūpadhammesu na uttaruttarā viya purimapurimā sukhumā, tathāpi
anya-e0104n0:1168_1: saṅghaṭṭanena vikāraāpajjanake rūpadhamme upādāya sabbepi te sukhumā evāti āha “sukhumattā
anya-e0104n0:1168_2: arūpaṃ na upaṭṭhātī”ti. Sammasitabbanti sammadeva lakkhaṇādito vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Manasikātabbanti
anya-e0104n0:1168_3: tathā citte ṭhapetabbaṃ. Pariggahetabbanti paricchedakārikāya paññāya paricchijja
anya-e0104n0:1168_4: gahetabbaṃ. Vavatthapetabbanti aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato vinicchitabbaṃ. Assāti yogino.
anya-e0104n0:1168_5: Suvikkhālitanti suvisodhitaṃ. Ādikammikassa hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggaṇhantassa yāva
anya-e0104n0:1168_6: dhammā suparibyattaṃ na upatiṭṭhanti, tāva te tappaṭicchādakasammohabalena abhibhūtā
anya-e0104n0:1168_7: avisuddhā nāma honti, asaṅkarato upaṭṭhānābhāvato aññamaññañca jaṭitā. Yadā pana
anya-e0104n0:1168_8: sammasanādividhinā taṃ vibhūtaṃ hoti, tadā te suvikkhālitā, nijjaṭā ca nāma honti.
anya-e0104n0:1168_9: Tenāha “yathā yathā hī”tiādi. Ādikammikassa arūpadhammā yebhuyyena rūpadhamme ārabbha
anya-e0104n0:1168_10: pavattanākārena gahaṇaṃ gacchantīti katvā vuttaṃ “tadārammaṇā arūpadhammā”ti. Teneva
anya-e0104n0:1168_11: hi heṭṭhā “tassevaṃ pariggahitarūpassa dvāravasena arūpadhammā pākaṭā hontī”ti vuttaṃ, na vatthuvasenāti.
anya-e0104n0:1169_0: Idāni rūpapariggaho arūpapariggahassa upāyo, upatthambho cāti yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāhi
anya-e0104n0:1169_1: pakāsetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Mukhanimittanti mukhassa paṭibimbaṃ. Tatridaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1169_2: – cakkhumā puriso viya yogāvacaro, tassa cakkhu viya yogino kammaṭṭhānapariggāhakañāṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1169_3: ādāsaṃ viya rūpapariggaho, mukhanimittaṃ viya arūpapariggaho, ādāsassa aparisuddhakālo
anya-e0104n0:1169_4: viya rūpapariggahassa avikkhālitakālo, tadā mukhanimittassa apaññāyanaṃ viya rūpapariggahassa
anya-e0104n0:1169_5: avisuddhatāya arūpadhammānaṃ anupaṭṭhānaṃ, ādāsassa punappunaṃ parimajjanaṃ viya
anya-e0104n0:1169_6: rūpapariggahassa punappunaṃ visodhanaṃ, suparimajjite ādāse subyattaṃ mukhanimittassa
anya-e0104n0:1169_7: paññāyanaṃ viya suvikkhālite nijjaṭe rūpapariggahe arūpadhammānaṃ suṭṭhu upaṭṭhānanti.
anya-e0104n0:1169_8: Iminā nayena telatthikopamādīsupi yathārahaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tilapiṭṭhanti
anya-e0104n0:1170_1: sammohādikilesā. Ucchuādiupamāsu idaṃ mukhamattassa dassanaṃ – yathā ucchurasaṃ gahetukāmo
anya-e0104n0:1170_2: ucchūni ucchuyante pakkhipitvā ekavāraṃ dvivāraṃ yantakkamanamattena ucchurase anikkhamante
anya-e0104n0:1170_3: na ucchūni chaḍḍetvā gacchati, yathā vā core gahetvā tehi katakammaṃ jānitukāmo dvattippahāramattena
anya-e0104n0:1170_4: tesu tamatthaṃ akathentesu na te muñcati, yathā vā pana godammako goṇaṃ dametukāmo
anya-e0104n0:1170_5: dhure taṃ yojetvā ekavāraṃ dvivāraṃ tasmiṃ pathena agacchante na vissajjeti, yathā
anya-e0104n0:1170_6: ca dadhiṃ manthetvā navanītaṃ gahetukāmo dadhikalasiyaṃ manthaṃ pakkhipitvā sakiṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1170_7: dvikkhattuṃ vā manthassa bhamanamattena navanīte anuppajjante na dadhiṃ chaḍḍeti,
anya-e0104n0:1170_8: yathā vā pana macche pacitvā khāditukāmo ekavāraṃ dvivāraṃ aggidānamattena macchesu
anya-e0104n0:1170_9: apaccantesu na te chaḍḍeti. “Atha kho naṃ punappunaṃ parimajjatī”ti ettha vuttanayānusārena
anya-e0104n0:1170_10: “atha kho naṃ ucchuyante punappunaṃ uppīḷetī”tiādinā sabbattha upamattho yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1172_0: 670. Ākirīyanti abhimukhā honti etehīti ākārā, arūpadhammānaṃ upaṭṭhānassa mukhabhūtā
anya-e0104n0:1172_2: Ārammaṇe pavattamānesu cittacetasikesu asatipi pubbāpariye phusanalakkhaṇo phasso,
anya-e0104n0:1172_3: tattha sabbapaṭhamaṃ abhinipatanto viya hotīti vuttaṃ “paṭhamābhinipāto phasso”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1172_4: Tenassa phusanākārena supākaṭabhāvena upaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti. Phasse pana upaṭṭhite yasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1172_5: ārammaṇe so phasso, tassa anubhavanalakkhaṇā vedanā, sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā, āyūhanalakkhaṇā
anya-e0104n0:1172_6: cetanā, paṭivijānanalakkhaṇaṃ viññāṇanti imepi pākaṭā hontīti āha “taṃsampayuttā
anya-e0104n0:1172_7: vedanā”tiādi. Evaṃ salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato catudhātuvavatthānavasena phassamukhena arūpapariggahaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1172_8: dassetvā idāni vitthārato catudhātuvavatthānavasena taṃ dassetuṃ “tathā kese”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1172_9: vuttaṃ. Tattha kese pathavīdhātūti kesasaṅkhāte pathavīkoṭṭhāse pathavīdhātu. Lakkhaṇavibhattito
anya-e0104n0:1173_0: Punapi dvinnaṃ dhātuvavatthānānaṃ vasena vedanāmukhena arūpapariggahaṃ dassetuṃ “ekassā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1173_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha tassa rasānubhavanakavedanāti thaddhabhāvasaṅkhātassa phoṭṭhabbasabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:1174_0: Aparassāti etthāpi vuttanayeneva sambandho veditabbo. Tattha ārammaṇapaṭivijānananti
anya-e0104n0:1175_0: Eteneva upāyenāti yvāyaṃ salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato, salakkhaṇavibhattito ca dhātuvavatthānavasena
anya-e0104n0:1175_1: rūpapariggahaṃ dassetvā tattha ṭhitassa phassādimukhena arūpapariggaṇhanupāyo dassito,
anya-e0104n0:1175_2: eteneva upāyena. Kammasamuṭṭhānakeseti catusamuṭṭhānakesato niddhārite kammasamuṭṭhānakese.
anya-e0104n0:1175_3: Kakkhaḷalakkhaṇātiādinā nayenāti ādi-saddena na kevalaṃ “paggharaṇalakkhaṇā āpodhātū”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1175_4: lakkhaṇavisesena saddhiṃ dhātvantarāniyeva, atha kho ekasamuṭṭhānādibhedāni koṭṭhāsantarānipīti
anya-e0104n0:1175_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha “dvācattālīsāya dhātukoṭṭhāsesū”ti. Sabbaṃ nayabhedaṃ anugantvāti
anya-e0104n0:1175_6: yvāyaṃ dvācattālīsāya dhātukoṭṭhāsesu pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādito vavatthāpanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1175_7: nānāvidho rūpapariggahanayo vutto, taṃ sabbaṃ nayabhedaṃ nayavisesaṃ anugantvā, cakkhudhātuādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1175_8: rūpapariggahamukhesu arūpapariggahadassanavasena yojanā kātabbāti adhippāyo. Tatridaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1175_11: “paṭhamābhinipāto phasso, taṃsampayuttā vedanā”ti sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tathā “yathāvuttalakkhaṇāya
anya-e0104n0:1176_0: 671. Yathā nāma heṭṭhimajhānaṃ subhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitameva uparijhānassa pādakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1176_1: padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, na paṭiladdhamattaṃ, evaṃ rūpapariggaho suvisuddho nijjaṭo niggumbo
anya-e0104n0:1176_2: eva arūpapariggahassa pādakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, na avisuddho, tasmā rūpārūpassa ekadesepi
anya-e0104n0:1176_3: anupaṭṭhite so avisuddho eva nāma hoti, pageva bahūsu anupaṭṭhitesūti dassento āha
anya-e0104n0:1176_4: “sace hī”tiādi. Pabbateyyā gāvī viya bālā abyattā akhettaññū.
anya-e0104n0:1177_0: Khaggenāti khaggaggena. Samugganti mañjūsāsadisaṃ mahāsamuggaṃ. Apariggahitakammaṭṭhānassa
anya-e0104n0:1177_1: avibhattaṃ viya upaṭṭhahantampi nāmarūpaṃ vibhattasabhāvameva, tassa ca vibhāgo kammaṭṭhānapariggahesu
anya-e0104n0:1177_2: pākaṭo hotīti ca dassanatthaṃ samuggavivaraṇaṃ, yamakatālakandaphālanañca nidassanabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1177_3: vuttaṃ. Yamakatālakandañhi bhinnasantānampi abhinnaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti, evaṃ rūpārūpadhammāti.
anya-e0104n0:1177_4: Sabbepi tebhūmake dhamme nāmañca rūpañcāti dvedhā vavatthapetīti ettha kiñcāpi sabba-saddo
anya-e0104n0:1177_5: anavasesapariyādāyako, nāmarūpabhāvo pana aññamaññavidhuroti na tadubhayaṃ samudāyavasena
anya-e0104n0:1177_6: parisamāpayetabbaṃ, tasmā “yadettha namanalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ nāmaṃ. Yaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1177_7: taṃ rūpa”nti evaṃ dvedhā vavatthapetīti attho. Evaṃ vavatthapentoyeva ca tadubhayavinimuttassa
anya-e0104n0:1177_8: tebhūmakadhammesu kassaci dhammassa abhāvato “sabbepi tebhūmakadhamme nāmañca rūpañcāti
anya-e0104n0:1177_9: dvedhā vavatthapetī”ti vuccati. “Nāmañca rūpañcā”ti eteneva tassa duvidhabhāve siddhe
anya-e0104n0:1177_10: “dvedhā vavatthapetī”ti idaṃ nāmarūpavinimuttassa aññassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tenevāha
anya-e0104n0:1177_12: sammasamanupagassa dhammassa anavasesetabbatāya vuttaṃ. Tañhi anavasesato pariññeyyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1177_13: ekaṃsato virajjitabbaṃ, tato ca cittaṃ virājayaṃ pamocetabbaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0104n0:1178_0: “Sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo
anya-e0104n0:1178_1: dukkhakkhayāya. Sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ virājayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1179_0: Yadi tebhūmakaṃ dhammajātaṃ anavasesato gahitaṃ “nāmarūpa”nti, yaṃ ito bāhirakehi
anya-e0104n0:1179_1: padatthabhāvena parikappitaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – pakatiādi drabyādi jīvādi kāyādi. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:1179_2: kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? Ummattakavipallāsasadise asammāsambuddhapavedite kā tattha
anya-e0104n0:1179_3: aññā paṭipatti aññatra ajjhupekkhanato. Atha vā tepi nāmarūpantogadhabhāvābhāvavasena
anya-e0104n0:1179_4: nicchitā evāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Pakati, mahā, ahaṃkāro, tammattāni, indriyāni,
anya-e0104n0:1179_5: bhūtāni, purisoti ete pakatiādayo. Tattha samabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ sattarajatamasaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1179_6: sukhadukkhamohānaṃ samudāyo pakati, padhānanti ca vuccati. Sattamattasampavedanīyo
anya-e0104n0:1179_7: mahā, buddhīti keci. Sattarajādīsu abhimāno ahaṃkāro, asmimattāti keci. Saddaphassarūparasagandhā
anya-e0104n0:1179_8: tammattāni aññamaññavisiṭṭhānaṃ pathavīādīnaṃ ekuttaratādassanato ekuttarāni tammattānīti
anya-e0104n0:1179_9: vijjhavāsiekalakkhaṇehi tammattehi ekalakkhaṇā visesā sajiyanti, sukhumabhāvena pana
anya-e0104n0:1179_10: nesaṃ sampavesanato ekuttaratāti keci. Sotādīni pañca savanādivuttikāni buddhindriyāni,
anya-e0104n0:1179_11: vacanādānavicaraṇussaggānandakiccāni vācādīni pañca kammindriyāni. Mano antokaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1179_12: itaraṃ bāhirakaraṇaṃ. Gandhādīhi āraddhāni pathavīudakaaggivāyuākāsāni bhūtāni, cetanāsabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1180_0: Tattha hi pakati tāva sukhadukkhamohamattatāya nāmaṃ, samavisamabhāvāpattito aniccā,
anya-e0104n0:1180_1: dukkhā, saṅkhatā ca āpannā. Mahāpi “tasmā aliṅgato liṅgavisesāmatto mahā uppajjatī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1180_2: vacanato, buddhibhāvānujānanato ca nāmaṃ, aniccaṃ, saṅkhatameva ca āpannaṃ. “Tasmā
anya-e0104n0:1180_3: mahato cha visesā sajiyantī”ti sakkate vacanato “asmī”ti gahaṇanimittabhāvānujānanena
anya-e0104n0:1180_4: ahaṃkāro abhimānoti katvā nāmaṃ, tato eva aniccasaṅkhatabhāvāpatti cassa siddhā.
anya-e0104n0:1180_6: pana kāpilānaṃ micchābhinivesamattaṃ. Te hi soḷasa visesā pañca bhūtāni, ekādasindriyāni
anya-e0104n0:1180_8: bhūtāni icchitāni. “Tabbisesā ca nānājātikā ahaṃkārato ca indriyānī”ti vacanato sotakāyacakkhujivhāghānavācāpāṇipādapāyūpatthāni
anya-e0104n0:1181_0: Tattha mano nāmaṃ, itarāni sabbāni rūpaṃ. Vācāti cettha atthāvajotakassa akkharasamudāyassa
anya-e0104n0:1181_1: gahaṇaṃ. Imesaṃ pana dhammino dhammassa anaññatthassa icchitattā siddhāva aniccatā
anya-e0104n0:1181_2: pariṇāmapakkhe, abhibyattipakkhepi yadi tabbisayañāṇuppādena abhibyañjanaṃ siddhāva
anya-e0104n0:1181_3: aniccatā, atha tato pubbepi ñāṇaṃ attheva. Akkhabyattivādo pana siyāti idamettha
anya-e0104n0:1181_4: disāmattaṃ. Drabyaguṇakammasāmaññavisesasamavāyā drabyādikā. Tattha pathavī āpo tejo
anya-e0104n0:1181_5: vāyu ākāso kālo disā attā manoti nava drabyāni. Sadda rūpa rasa gandha phassa saṅkhā
anya-e0104n0:1181_6: parimāṇāni puthūtva saṃyoga viyoga paratvā paratva buddhi sukha dukkha icchā dosa
anya-e0104n0:1181_7: payatta gurutva dravatva sneha vegā saṅkhārā diṭṭhā ceti evamete tevīsati guṇā. Ukkhepanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1181_8: avakkhepanamākucanaṃ pasāraṇaṃ gamanamiti pañca kammāni. Aññamaññavisiṭṭhesu avisiṭṭhamabhidhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1181_9: paccayo hoti. Saṃ-iti yato drabyaguṇakammesu sā atthi evāti etaṃ mahāsāmaññaṃ. Pathavīādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1181_10: anuvattibyāvuttibuddhinimittaṃ drabyatvādi, taṃ yathā drabyatva guṇatva kammatva
anya-e0104n0:1181_11: ghaṭatvādi, eso sāmaññaviseso. Iha tantesu paṭo, kapālesu ghaṭoti iheti yato hetuhetuphalānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1181_12: sambandho samavāyoti vutto, samavāyoti evamete drabyādikā.
anya-e0104n0:1182_0: Tattha pathavī āpa teja vāyū bhūtarūpaṃ, ākāsaṃ tesaṃ abhāvamattaṃ, paricchedo vā,
anya-e0104n0:1182_1: candasūriyādiparivattanaṃ, dhammappavattiñca upādāya paññattimattaṃ kālo. Tathā disā,
anya-e0104n0:1182_2: attā ca. Mano nāmaṃ. Saddarūparasagandhā rūpameva. Tathā phasso bhūtattayasabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1182_3: Saṅkhā ekādikā taṃ taṃ upādāya paññattimattaṃ. Tathā avayavasamudāye guṇavisesavasena,
anya-e0104n0:1182_4: saṇṭhānavisesavasena vā mahantaṃ dīghaṃ, tabbipariyāyato aṇu rassanti bhinnalakkhaṇadesesu
anya-e0104n0:1182_5: puthutvanti. Bhinnadesajānaṃ sahabhāve saṃyogoti. Tadapāye viyogoti. Samānadisādesagatānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1182_6: rūpānaṃ mahadabbantarānaṃ vasena paramaparanti paññattimattaṃ. Buddhisukhadukkhaicchādosapayattā
anya-e0104n0:1182_7: nāmameva. Gurutva dravatva snehavegā rūpadhammānaṃ pavattivisesato gahetabbākārā.
anya-e0104n0:1182_8: Itaro saṅkhāro ñāṇassa pavattiviseso. Adiṭṭhopi dhammādhammabhāvato nāmameva. Ukkhepanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1182_9: avakkhepanaṃ ākucanaṃ pasāraṇaṃ gamananti rūpadhammānaṃ pavattimattaṃ. Sadisāsadisatāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1182_10: sāmaññavisesasaññā, ayuttasambandhe samavāyasamaññāti drabyādīnampi nāmarūpantogadhatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1183_0: Jīvājīvabandha puñña pāpāsava saṃvaranijjaravimokkhā jīvādikā. Tattha jīvoti attā.
anya-e0104n0:1183_2: puggalalakkhaṇanti puggalo rūpaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ pavattiākāramattato. Dhammādhammā
anya-e0104n0:1183_3: jīvapuggalānaṃ gatiṭṭhitimattatāya tadavisiṭṭhā. Ākāsakālā paññattimattaṃ. Bandho
anya-e0104n0:1183_4: “kammapuggalantarasaṃyogo”ti vacanato tehi anañño. Puññapāpāni nāmanti pākaṭameva.
anya-e0104n0:1183_6: āsavo. “Āsavanirodho saṃvaro”ti vacanato paṭipakkhena puññāpuññanirodho saṃvaro.
anya-e0104n0:1183_9: kammapuggalānaṃ saddādilakkhaṇatāya rūpamattatā puññāpuññamattatāya arūpatā. Jīvo
anya-e0104n0:1183_10: ca arūpamattamevāti ayaṃ drabyamokkho. Bhāvamokkho pana jīvassa rāgādibhāvāpariṇāmo
anya-e0104n0:1184_1: kāyasamaññā. Tadavisiṭṭhā pavattigatijātibandhāpavaggā, “bhāvoti attho, kāyoti anatthantara”nti
anya-e0104n0:1184_2: vacanato kāyato aññaṃ kiñci natthi. “Pavattisaññā kiriyāsaṃyogavibhāgesū”ti vacanato
anya-e0104n0:1184_3: gatiādippakārena pavattā pathavīādayo eva pavatti upacāro. “Tasmiṃ anatthantara”nti
anya-e0104n0:1184_4: vacanato kāyato anaññā suramanujapetatiracchānanarakūpapattiyo gatiyo. Tāsu purimāpurimāvisiṭṭho
anya-e0104n0:1184_5: gatīsu jātassa nicchayopi pavattimattanti tato anaññā kaṇhanīlarattapītasukkaatisukkasaṅkhātā
anya-e0104n0:1184_7: antā accantavimuttā avagāhitatvā cāti sukkajāti. “Dosesu bandhasamaññā”ti vacanato
anya-e0104n0:1184_8: aññāṇādilakkhaṇassa bandhassa jīvato anaññatā. Aññāṇādidosābhāvato apavaggasiddhīti
anya-e0104n0:1185_0: Yopi tattha tattha “puriso attā jīvo”tiādipariyāyehi vutto attapadattho, sopi yathārahaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1185_1: nāmarūpamattaṃ upādāya paññatto, nāmarūpamattameva vā. Tena vuttaṃ “tepi nāmarūpantogadhabhāvābhāvavasena nicchitā evā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1187_0: 672. Soti so vipassanākammiko yogāvacaro. Evanti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Yāthāvasarasatoti
anya-e0104n0:1187_1: yathābhūtasabhāvato. Nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā etamatthaṃ saṃsandetvā vavatthapetīti
anya-e0104n0:1187_2: sambandho. Lokasamaññāyapi pahānatthāya, pageva “satto jīvo”ti pavattanakamicchābhinivesassāti
anya-e0104n0:1187_3: adhippāyo. Nāmarūpamattatāya avinicchatattā, santānādighanabhedassa ca akatattā abhinivesena
anya-e0104n0:1187_4: vinā samūhekattaggahaṇavasena “satto”ti pavatto sammoho sattasammoho. Tassa vikkhambhanā
anya-e0104n0:1187_6: “rūpañca hidaṃ, mahāli, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti evamādinā
anya-e0104n0:1188: Aṅgasambhārāti aṅgasambhārahetu. Tannimittaṃ taṃ amuñcitvā sati eva tasmiṃ “satto”ti vohāro.
anya-e0104n0:1189_0: Agārantvevāti yathā kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca upādāya tesaṃ nāmaṃ vissajjetvā agāramicceva
anya-e0104n0:1189_1: saṅkhaṃ samaññaṃ gacchati, evaṃ aṭṭhiādīni paṭicca upādāya tesaṃ nāmaṃ vissajjetvā
anya-e0104n0:1190_0: Dukkhameva sambhotīti dukkhadukkhatādibhedaṃ tividhaṃ dukkhameva sambhavati, yathāpaccayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1190_1: uppajjati, tadeva dukkhaṃ khaṇaṭṭhitipabandhaṭṭhitivasena tiṭṭhati ceva khaṇanirodhaāyukkhayanirodhādivasena
anya-e0104n0:1190_2: nirujjhati cāti attho. Idāni dukkhamevāti evakārena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “nāññatrā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1190_3: vuttaṃ. Tassattho – yathāvuttaṃ dukkhaṃ ṭhapetvā tato aññaṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ na
anya-e0104n0:1190_4: sambhavati, yo “satto”ti vā “jīvo”ti vā vucceyya, sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvā kuto tassa nirodhoti.
anya-e0104n0:1192_0: 673. Ekenākārena saṇṭhitesūti yena pakārena akkhādīsu sanniviṭṭhesu rathasamaññā,
anya-e0104n0:1192_1: tena ekena ākārena samavaṭṭhitesu ekajjhaṃ rāsikatesu. Evamevanti sannivesavisiṭṭhe
anya-e0104n0:1192_2: avayavasamudāye santānavasena pavattamāne yathā “ratho gehaṃ muṭṭhi vīṇā senā nagaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1192_3: rukkho”ti vohāramattaṃ, paramatthato pana rathādi nāma kiñci natthi, evamevaṃ. Upādānakkhandhesūti
anya-e0104n0:1192_5: “satto jīvo”ti vohāramattaṃ, paramatthato pana satto vā jīvo vā natthīti yāthāvato
anya-e0104n0:1193_0: 674. Tassāti sattoti gahitassa attano. Vināsanti niruddhassa vināsaṃ. Avināsanti
anya-e0104n0:1193_1: avinassanaṃ, niccatanti attho. Dvayavaseneva hi attavādino ṭhitā, sassato attā, ucchijjatīti
anya-e0104n0:1193_2: vā, ekaccasassatavādopi ettheva samavaruddhoti. Avināsaṃ anujānantoti buddhiādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1193_3: dhammānaṃ vināsaṃ icchantopi “dhammī nicco kūṭaṭṭho”ti attano vināsābhāvaṃ anujānanto.
anya-e0104n0:1193_5: Khīranvayassāti khīrassa anvayabhūtassa, phalabhūtassāti attho. Tadanvayassāti tassa
anya-e0104n0:1193_6: attano anvayabhūtassa aññassa kassaci abhāvato. Olīyati nāmāti “sassato attā”ti abhinivesena
anya-e0104n0:1193_7: bhavābhirato hutvā bhavanirodhato saṅkocanaṃ āpajjanto bhaveyeva nilīyati nāma. Atidhāvati
anya-e0104n0:1193_8: nāmāti tattha tattheva hi bhave attā ucchijjatīti ucchedavādī “ucchijjati attā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1193_9: gaṇhanto paraṃ maraṇā santaṃ bhavaṃ “natthī”ti atikkamanto atidhāvati nāmāti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:1193_10: Kilesanirodhe pana kammassa avipaccanato bhavanirodhe icchitabbe tathā aggahetvā
anya-e0104n0:1193_11: “taṃ taṃ bhavavisesaṃ āgamma attā ucchijjatīti evaṃ bhavanirodho hotī”ti gaṇhanto
anya-e0104n0:1194: Pariyuṭṭhitāti abhibhūtā. Cakkhumantoti yathābhūtadassanasaṅkhātena ñāṇacakkhunā cakkhumanto.
anya-e0104n0:1195_0: Kāmabhavādibhedo bhavo āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etesanti bhavārāmā. Tasmiṃ bhave ratā
anya-e0104n0:1195_1: abhiratāti bhavaratā. Bhave sammodaṃ āpannāti bhavasammuditā. Tīhipi padehi bhavassādagadhitatāva
anya-e0104n0:1195_2: vuttā. Cittaṃ na pakkhandatīti bhavassādagadhitattā eva bhavanirodhāvahe dhamme cittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1195_3: na anuppavisati. Nappasīdatīti na okappati. Na santiṭṭhatīti na patiṭṭhahati. Nādhimuccatīti na adhimuccati.
anya-e0104n0:1196: Aṭṭīyamānāti dukkhāpiyamānā. Harāyamānāti lajjamānā. Jigucchamānāti hīḷentā. Vibhavanti ucchedaṃ. Abhinandantīti vuttaabhinandanākāradassanaṃ “yato kira bho”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1197: Bhūtanti khandhapañcakaṃ. Tañhi yathāsakaṃ paccayehi jātattā, paramatthato vijjamānattā ca bhūtanti vuccati. Bhūtatoti yathābhūtasabhāvato, salakkhaṇato, sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca.
anya-e0104n0:1198_0: 675. Evaṃ sattagāhato avalīyanātidhāvanadose, yathābhūtadassanato nibbidādiguṇe ca
anya-e0104n0:1198_1: suttavaseneva dassetvā idāni nāmarūpamattepi gamanādiattakiccasiddhiṃ dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1198_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha tasmāti yasmā “asmī”ti vā “aha”nti vā gāhassa vatthubhūto satto nāma
anya-e0104n0:1198_3: natthi, paramatthato nāmarūpamattameva, tasmā. Sace koci attā nāma natthi, kathamidha
anya-e0104n0:1198_5: etena yathā nijjīve dārumayayante abbhantare vattamānassa jīvassa vasena saīhassa
anya-e0104n0:1198_6: sabyāpārassa viya upaṭṭhānamattaṃ paccayavisesato, evaṃ nijjīve nāmarūpamatte paccayavisesato
anya-e0104n0:1198_7: gamanādiattakiccasiddhīti saīhassa sabyāpārassa viya upaṭṭhānanti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1199_0: Saccatoti bhūtato, paramatthatoti attho. Suññaṃ jīvena yantamiva abhisaṅkhataṃ paccayavasena
anya-e0104n0:1199_1: pavattīti adhippāyo. Dukkhassa puñjo niccāturatāya tiṇakaṭṭhasadiso attasuññatāyāti
anya-e0104n0:1200_0: Yamakanti yugaḷakaṃ. So ca kho yamakabhāvo aññamaññasannissitabhāvenāti āha “ubho
anya-e0104n0:1200_1: aññoññanissitā”ti. Tato eva ca ekasmiṃ bhijjamānasmiṃ ubho bhijjanti. Na hi kadāci
anya-e0104n0:1200_2: pañcavokārabhave rūpe nirujjhante arūpaṃ anirujjhantaṃ, arūpe vā nirujjhante rūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1200_3: anirujjhantaṃ atthi. Svāyaṃ bhaṅgo paccayā paccayanirodheneva, nāmarūpanirodhoti
anya-e0104n0:1200_4: attho. Paccayāti vā paccayabhūtā, aññamaññassa paccayā hontāpi ubho bhijjantiyevāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1201_0: 676. Daṇḍābhihatanti visesanena daṇḍaṃ, daṇḍābhighātassa paccayaṃ purisavāyāmañca
anya-e0104n0:1201_1: dasseti, bheriyā pana visesitabbatā saddassa asādhāraṇakāraṇatāya. Teneva hi “aññā
anya-e0104n0:1201_2: bherī”ti bherīyeva gahitā, na daṇḍādayo. Adissamānarūpatāya saddaṃ nāmaṭṭhāniyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1202_0: Na cakkhuto jāyareti na cakkhāyatanato niggacchanavasena jāyanti. Na hi cakkhāyatanassa
anya-e0104n0:1202_1: paccayabhāvūpagamanato pubbe phassapañcamakā labbhanti, na ca padesavanto, yena te
anya-e0104n0:1202_2: tato niggaccheyyuṃ. Tenevāha “puñjo natthi anāgate”ti. Na rūpatoti etthāpi eseva
anya-e0104n0:1202_3: nayo. “No ca ubhinnamantarā”ti idaṃ pana tesaṃ arūpadhammattā appadesatāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1202_4: Kevalaṃ pana yasmiṃ khaṇe paccayasamavāyo, tadā uppajjanamattamevāti āha “hetuṃ paṭicca
anya-e0104n0:1202_5: pabhavanti saṅkhatā”ti, cakkhurūpālokamanasikārādibhedaṃ dhammajātaṃ nissāya paccayabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1202_6: kāraṇaṃ labhitvā tehi samecca sambhūya katattā saṅkhatā phassādayo dhammā uppajjantīti
anya-e0104n0:1202_7: attho. Tassā pana dhammānaṃ uppattiyā pākaṭaṃ rūpadhammapavattiṃ dassento “yathāpi
anya-e0104n0:1202_8: saddo pahaṭāya bheriyā”ti āha. Phassapañcamaggahaṇañcettha pākaṭaarūpadhammānaṃ dassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1203: Vatthurūpāti hadayavatthuto. Tannissayānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ bahubhedattā sāmaññavohārena te dassetuṃ “saṅkhatā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1204_0: 677. Nittejanti tejahīnaṃ ānubhāvarahitaṃ. Yathā pana taṃ nittejaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1204_1: “na khādatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na hi aññathā saddahanussahanādīsu nāmaṃ “nitteja”nti sakkā
anya-e0104n0:1204_2: vattuṃ, nāpi rūpaṃ sandhāraṇābandhanādīsu. Teneva hi “rūpaṃ nitteja”nti vatvā “na
anya-e0104n0:1204_3: hi tassa khāditukāmatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Atha kho”tiādinā byatirekavasenāpi nāmarūpānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1204_4: nittejataṃyeva vibhāveti. Aññamaññasannissayena hi nāmarūpassa attakiccasiddhipi
anya-e0104n0:1204_5: paccekaṃ asamatthatāvibhāvanameva. Tathā hi nāmarūpassa attasuññatā, nirīhatā, byāpāravirahatā
anya-e0104n0:1205_0: Kathaṃ pana paccekaṃ asamatthānaṃ samuditabhāve samatthatā hoti? Asāmaggiyaṃ ahetūnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1205_1: sāmaggiyampi ahetubhāvāpattito. Na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontānaṃ andhānaṃ satampi
anya-e0104n0:1205_2: sahassampi samuditaṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “imassa panatthassā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1205_3: Imaṃ upamaṃ udāharanti aṭṭhakathācariyā upamāyapi asiddhassa atthassa sādhetabbato.
anya-e0104n0:1205_4: Tenevāha “upamaṃ te karissāmi, upamāyapidhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānantī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1205_5: Tuṭṭhahaṭṭhoti yadipāhaṃ cakkhukaraṇīyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkomi, pādakaraṇīyaṃ pana kātuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1205_6: sakkomi, tvañca cakkhukaraṇīyaṃ, tasmā amhākaṃ ubhinnaṃ sahitānañca vasena icchitadesasampatti
anya-e0104n0:1205_7: sijjhatīti tuṭṭhahaṭṭho jaccandho. Tattha jaccandhotiādi upamopameyyasaṃsandanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1205_8: Dhammānaṃ attalābho parapaṭibaddhoti vattabbameva natthi tato pubbe avijjamānattā,
anya-e0104n0:1205_9: paṭiladdhattalābhassāpi parapaṭibaddhameva atthakiccanti dassetuṃ “na sakena tejena
anya-e0104n0:1205_10: uppajjati, na tāsu tāsu kiriyāsu pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1205_11: nissāya uppatti vā pavatti vā na ca na hotīti jaccandhapīṭhasappiupamāya sādhitamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1206_0: Paradhammavasānuvattinoti paresaṃ attato aññesaṃ hetupaccayasaṅkhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1206_1: vasena anuvattanasīlā. Attadubbalāti attanā dubbalā asamatthā. Parapaccayatoti paresaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1206_2: dhammānaṃ paccayabhāvato. Etena janakapaccayaṃ vadati. Tenevāha “jāyare”ti. Paraārammaṇatoti
anya-e0104n0:1206_3: paresaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvato. Etena upatthambhakapaccayaṃ vadati. Paccayaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1206_4: vā rūpāpekkhaṃ, ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ nāmāpekkhaṃ. “Paradhammehī”ti idaṃ ārammaṇapaccayānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1206_5: visesanaṃ. Purimatthena hi vuttamevatthaṃ pacchimatthena pākaṭaṃ karoti. Pabhāvitāti uppāditā.
anya-e0104n0:1207_0: Nāvāyantikūpamāyapi nāmarūpānaṃ avasavattitaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yathāpī”tiādinā tisso gāthā
anya-e0104n0:1207_1: vuttā. Nissāyāti patiṭṭhāya. Yantīti gacchanti. Manusse nissāyāti netubhūte niyāmakakammakārakādimanusse
anya-e0104n0:1207_2: apassāya. Na hi tesaṃ araṇaggahaṇalaṅkārasaṇṭhāpanaudakussiñcanādikiriyāya vinā nāvā
anya-e0104n0:1207_3: icchitadesaṃ pāpuṇāti. Ubhoti aññamaññaṃ nāvaṃ nissāya manussā, manusse nissāya nāvāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1208_0: Evanti vuttappakārena. Nānānayehīti paṭhamādīnaṃ sattannaṃ jhānānaṃ, tesaṃ upacārānañca
anya-e0104n0:1208_1: vasena cuddasa arūpapariggahamukhāni, catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānaṃ terasannaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1208_3: vasena samavīsati rūpapariggahamukhāni, tāni paccekaṃ “phasso vedanā citta”nti imesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1208_4: sammukhabhāvena upaṭṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ vasena tiguṇitāni samasaṭṭhi,
anya-e0104n0:1208_5: cuddasa arūpapariggahamukhāni, tāni cāti catusattatiyā nāmarūpapariggahanayehi ceva
anya-e0104n0:1208_7: ca nāmarūpapamattatāvavatthāpananayehi ca. Sattasaññaṃ abhibhavitvāti anādikālabhāvitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1208_8: khandhapañcake attagāhaṃ vikkhambhetvā. Nāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvadassananti “idaṃ nāmaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1208_9: ettakaṃ nāmaṃ, na ito bhiyyo. Idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti ca tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1213_1: na tadaññato visesanatthaṃ tadaññasseva abhāvato. Ajjhattaṃ vā hi vipassanābhiniveso
anya-e0104n0:1213_2: hotu bahiddhā vā, ajjhattasiddhiyaṃ pana lakkhaṇato sabbampi nāmarūpaṃ anavasesato
anya-e0104n0:1213_3: pariggahitameva hotīti. Paccayapariggahenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ. Paccayapariggahahetu
anya-e0104n0:1213_4: hissa addhattayakaṅkhāvitaraṇaṃ hotīti, karaṇe vā etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ paccayapariggahassa
anya-e0104n0:1213_5: sādhakatamabhāvato kaṅkhāvitaraṇakiriyāya. Yadā hissa suparisuddho nijjaṭo niggumbo
anya-e0104n0:1213_6: paccayapariggaho sijjhati, tadānena kaṅkhā vitarīyatīti. Vitaritvāti atikkamitvā,
anya-e0104n0:1213_7: vikkhambhetvāti attho. Taṃ pana ñāṇaṃ tathādhigataṃ vasībhāvappattaṃ jhānaṃ viya
anya-e0104n0:1213_8: yogino santāne pabandhavasena pavattatīti katvā vuttaṃ “ṭhitaṃ ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1214_0: Tanti kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiṃ. Taṃ sampādetukāmo āpajjatīti sambandho. Yāthāvato
anya-e0104n0:1214_1: diṭṭhaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tividhadukkhatāyogato rogo viya. Paccayā cassa rogasamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1214_2: viya upaṭṭhahantīti imamatthaṃ dassento “yathā nāma…pe… pariyesatī”ti āha. Saṃsāradukkhanimuggassa
anya-e0104n0:1214_3: santānassa tato vimocetukāmatāvasena anukampitabbatā labbhatīti tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1214_4: “yathā vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evameva ṭhite yadeke vadanti “anukampetabbakumārakadassanena
anya-e0104n0:1214_5: tassa mātāpituāvajjanaṃ idha anudāharaṇaṃ nirodhetabbatāya nāmarūpassa anukampitabbatābhāvato”ti,
anya-e0104n0:1214_6: tadapāhataṃ hoti. Avassañcetaṃ evaṃ icchitabbaṃ, aññathā veneyyapuggalasantāne satthu
anya-e0104n0:1214_7: mahākaruṇāpavatti eva vicāretabbā siyā. Mandabuddhitāya mandaṃ. Vuḍḍhataropi koci
anya-e0104n0:1214_8: mandabuddhi hotīti tato visesanatthaṃ “kumāra”nti vuttaṃ. Yo koci paṭhamavaye vattamāno
anya-e0104n0:1214_9: “kumāro”ti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “dahara”nti vuttaṃ. Evampi yo ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā
anya-e0104n0:1214_10: vicāraṇako taruṇadārako, sopi “daharo”ti vuccatīti tato nivattanatthaṃ “uttānaseyyaka”nti
anya-e0104n0:1214_11: vuttaṃ. Catūhipi padehi karuṇāyitabbataṃyeva dasseti. Āpajjatīti karoti.
anya-e0104n0:1215_0: Yathā panassa hetupaccayapariyesanāpatti hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “so”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:1215_1: byatirekamukhena attho sādhito sammadeva sādhito hotīti ahetukabhāvaṃ tāva paṭikkhipanto
anya-e0104n0:1215_2: “na tāvidaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ahetuka”nti vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha “sabbatthā”tiādinā. Hetumantarena
anya-e0104n0:1215_3: sati sambhave sabbadhammānaṃ hetuabhāvo samānoti sabbasamānatā siyā, tathā ca sati
anya-e0104n0:1215_4: sotapadesādīsu, bahiddhā ca cakkhuviññāṇādihetuabhāvoti sabbattha, cakkhādīnaṃ uppattito
anya-e0104n0:1215_5: pubbe, paribhedato uddhañca hetuabhāvoti sabbadā ca andhādīnaṃ arūpīnaṃ, asaññīnañca
anya-e0104n0:1215_6: hetuabhāvoti sabbesañca cakkhuviññāṇādīhi bhavitabbaṃ, hetuabhāvā visesato tañca
anya-e0104n0:1215_7: natthīti āha “sabbattha sabbadā sabbesañca ekasadisabhāvāpattito”ti. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1215_8: yadidaṃ “cakkhuviññāṇādīsu hī”ti. Yattakā loke visesā, tehi sabbesaṃ, sabbakālañca
anya-e0104n0:1215_9: bhavitabbanti adhippāyo. Ādi-saddena vā tesampi gahaṇaṃ katamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tasmā
anya-e0104n0:1215_10: ahetukabhāve visiṭṭhatāya asambhavo evāti sabbattha ekasadisabhāvāpattito, sabbadā
anya-e0104n0:1215_11: ekasadisabhāvāpattito, sabbesaṃ ekasadisabhāvāpattitoti paccekaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1215_12: Evaṃ ahetubhāve paṭisiddhe visamahetuvādī vadeyya “na idaṃ ahetukaṃ kiñcarahi sahetukaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1216_0: Ādi-saddena pakatipurisapajāpatikālādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, taṃ paṭikkhipanto āha
anya-e0104n0:1216_1: “na issarādihetuka”ntiādi. Na nāmarūpaṃ issarādihetukaṃ nāmarūpato aññassa anupalabbhamānattā
