anya-e0104n0:1216_2: issarapakatiādinameva abhāvato. Yadi pana asato issarādito nāmarūpassa uppatti, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1216_3: sati sā eva sabbattha sabbadā sabbesaṃ ekasadisatā āpajjati. Atha nāmarūpamattameva
anya-e0104n0:1216_4: issarādihetukaṃ, nāmarūpañca ahutvā sambhavantaṃ, hutvā ca vinassantaṃ dissatīti
anya-e0104n0:1216_5: issarādīhipi tādisehi bhavitabbaṃ. Tathā ca tadapi sappaccayaṃ saṅkhatamevāti tassāpi
anya-e0104n0:1216_6: paccayapariggaho kātabbo. Atha taṃ nuppajjati, ahetukatā tassa āpannā. Tenāha “ahetukabhāvāpattito”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1217_0: Apica na issarādihetukaṃ nāmarūpaṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Kamena uppattito. Yadi hi evaṃ niccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1217_2: ekajjhaṃ uppatti siyā, yattakehi tato uppajjitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Kāraṇassa sannihitabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1217_3: Yadi pana tassa icchāvasena tassa uppattiṃ parikappeyyuṃ, tāsañca icchānaṃ ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1217_4: uppattiyaṃ ko vibandho. Atha aññampi kiñci kammakilesindriyārammaṇādiapekkhitabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1217_5: atthīti ce? Tadeva hetu kāraṇaṃ, kimaññena adiṭṭhasāmatthiyena parikappitena payojanaṃ?
anya-e0104n0:1217_6: Diṭṭhañhi kammādīnaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ tadaññapaccayasannidhānepi tadabhāve abhāvato. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:1217_7: hi rūpālokamanasikārasannidhānepi cakkhuno abhāve cakkhuviññāṇassa abhāvaṃ, bhāve
anya-e0104n0:1217_8: ca bhāvaṃ disvā cakkhuno cakkhuviññāṇuppādanasamatthatā atthīti viññāyati. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:1217_10: sattānaṃ hīnapaṇītatādiviseso dissati, so ca sasantāne tādisassa aññassa hetuno abhāvā
anya-e0104n0:1217_11: kammakilesahetukoti tassa tattha samatthatā atthīti viññāyati, na evamissarādikassa.
anya-e0104n0:1217_12: Kāraṇassa hi bhāvābhāve phalassa bhāvābhāvehi kāraṇassa samatthatā viññāyeyya. Na
anya-e0104n0:1217_13: ca sannihite tadakāraṇassa nāmarūpassa issarādivekallena katthaci anuppatti diṭṭhā,
anya-e0104n0:1218_0: Athāpi saggo evaṃ issarādihetuko vucceyya, sopi saggappakāro sabbakālaṃ tato nibbatteyya.
anya-e0104n0:1218_1: Na hi sannihitakāraṇassa phalassa anuppatti yuttā. Nicce ca sati aññanirapekkhakāraṇe
anya-e0104n0:1218_2: saggassa ādiyeva na yutto, yāva issarādikaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tāva sabbassa atthibhāvappasaṅgato.
anya-e0104n0:1218_3: Athāpi vadeyya “aññepi yathārahaṃ paccayā hontiyeva, issarādikampi tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1218_4: hotī”ti. Yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Yadi paro vadeyya “idha buddhipubbo
anya-e0104n0:1218_5: bhāvānaṃ racanāviseso diṭṭho, yathā taṃ ghaṭagehādīnaṃ. Atthi ca ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1218_6: sarīrapadumādīnaṃ racanāviseso, tasmā tenāpi buddhipubbena bhavitabbaṃ. Yassa ca
anya-e0104n0:1218_7: so buddhipubbo, so issarādiko, tasmā tena nāmarūpasaññitassa lokassa kāraṇena bhavitabba”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1218_8: Tayidaṃ asiddhaṃ, racitā sarīrapadumādayoti tattheva uppannattā. Uppannassa hi sannivesavasena
anya-e0104n0:1218_9: tathā tathā paṭṭhapanaṃ “racanā”ti vuccati. Anekantiko cāyaṃ abuddhipubbassāpi diṭṭhattā.
anya-e0104n0:1218_10: Diṭṭho hi nhāruādīnaṃ aggisaṃyogena racanāviseso, tathā visussantānaṃ pubbacammādīnaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1218_11: Yadi panāyamissarādiko gavassajagadrabhādīnaṃ karīsāvatte paṭimahutaṃ raceyya, ummatto
anya-e0104n0:1218_12: viya vikkhitto siyā. Kiñcāyaṃ lokaṃ sajjento attatthaṃ vā sajjeyya lokatthaṃ vā.
anya-e0104n0:1219_0: Tattha ca yadi purimo makkho katakicco na siyā lokena sādhetabbassa atthibhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1219_1: Atha dutiyo, kasmā lokassa ahitadukkhāvahaṃ pāpaṃ nirayādiṃ, jarāmaraṇādiñca sajati?
anya-e0104n0:1219_2: Atha tadubhayaṃ anāmasitvā kīḷatthaṃ sajati. Kīḷā ca nāma ratiatthā hoti. Vinā kīḷāya
anya-e0104n0:1219_3: ratiṃ ajānantānaṃ ratiatthañca kīḷamārabhanto ratiyaṃ issaro anissaro siyā. Atha
anya-e0104n0:1219_4: payojananirapekkho, sabbakālaṃ sajeyya, tassa cāyaṃ sajanasamatthatā ahetukā vā siyā
anya-e0104n0:1219_5: sahetukā vā. Ahetukā ce, sabbesaṃ siyā sahetukā vā. Ahetukā ce, sabbesampi siyā.
anya-e0104n0:1219_6: Atha sahetukā, so cassa hetu parato vā sambhūto siyā attato vā. Tattha parato ce
anya-e0104n0:1219_7: sambhūto, yadassa so laddho, tassāyaṃ veyyāvaccakarasadiso siyā. Atha attato taduppattito
anya-e0104n0:1219_8: pubbe ayaṃ kīdiso loko cāti sabbamidaṃ ālunavisiṇaṃ ākulabyākulaṃ goyūthena gatamaggasadisapheṇapiṇḍasamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1219_9: avimaddakkhamaṃ asāraṃ. Tiṭṭhatu pasaṅgo, yathādhikatameva vaṇṇayissāma. Tasmāti
anya-e0104n0:1219_10: yasmā idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na ahetukaṃ, nāpi issarādivisamahetukaṃ, tasmā. Teti hetupaccayā.
anya-e0104n0:1220_0: 679. Oḷārikattā, supākaṭattā ca rūpassa paccayapariggaho sukaroti “imassa tāva rūpakāyassā”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1220_1: paṭhamaṃ tassa paccayapariggahavidhiṃ ārabhati. Tattha yathā nāmarūpassa paccayapariggaho
anya-e0104n0:1220_2: ahetuvisamahetuvādanivattiyā hoti, evaṃ nibbidāvirāgāvahabhāvena tattha abhiratinivattiyāpi
anya-e0104n0:1220_3: icchitabboti taṃ gabbhaseyyakavasena dassento nibbattaṭṭhānassa sucibhāvapaṭisedhanamukhena
anya-e0104n0:1220_4: asucibhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “ayaṃ kāyo”tiādimāha. Tattha uppalādīni asuciṭṭhāne nibbattānipi
anya-e0104n0:1220_5: sayaṃ sucisammatānevāti taṃdassanatthaṃ abbhantaraggahaṇaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0104n0:1223_1: gahetvā vuttaṃ, na paṭhamābhinibbattimattaṃ. Evañca katvā āhārassa upatthambhakapaccayatāvacanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1223_3: hoti. Evamavaṭṭhite yadekaccehi piṭṭhito, purato ca karaṇaṃ kiṃ siyā paṭisandhikāletiādi
anya-e0104n0:1223_4: vuttaṃ, taṃ apāhataṃ hoti. “Nibbattakattā”ti iminā bījaṃ viya aṅkurassa avijjādayo
anya-e0104n0:1223_5: rūpakāyassa asādhāraṇakāraṇatāya hetūti dasseti. “Upatthambhakattā”ti iminā pana
anya-e0104n0:1223_6: aṅkurassa pathavīsalilapārisiādayo viya āhāro sādhāraṇakāraṇatāya paccayoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1224_0: Pañca dhammā hetupaccayāti avijjādayo pañca dhammā yathārahaṃ hetu ca paccayo cāti
anya-e0104n0:1224_3: apassayabhūtā cāti “mātā viya dārakassa upanissayā”ti vuttā. Yathā pitu janitasukke
anya-e0104n0:1224_4: puttassa uppattīti pitā janako, evaṃ kammaṃ sattassa uppādakattā janakaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1224_5: Yathā dhāti jātassa dārakassa posanavasena sandhārikā, evaṃ āhāro uppannassa kāyassāti sandhārako vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1225_0: Kāmañcettha avijjādayo nāmakāyassāpi paccayo, pakārantarena pana tassa pākaṭaṃ paccayapariggahavidhiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1225_1: dassetuṃ “cakkhuñca paṭiccā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha cakkhuñcāti ca-saddo samuccayattho.
anya-e0104n0:1225_2: Tena cakkhuviññāṇassa āvajjanādiajjhattaṃ sabbaṃ paccayajātaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Rūpe cāti
anya-e0104n0:1225_3: pana ca-saddena yathā bahulaṃ bāhirarūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayo, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1225_4: aññampi bāhiraṃ paccayajātaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Paṭiccāti paccayabhūtaṃ laddhāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1225_6: itaresañca saṅgahitānaṃ anantarādisahajātādivasena paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti. Vacanabhede
anya-e0104n0:1225_7: pana kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Ādi-saddena ca phassādīnaṃ viya sahapaccayehi sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1225_8: saṅgaho veditabbo “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”tiādipāṭhassa viya “sotañca paṭiccā”tiādipāṭhassa
anya-e0104n0:1225_9: saṅgahitattā. Evaṃ sammasanupagaṃ sabbaṃ nāmaṃ sahapaccayena saṅgahitaṃ hoti. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:1226_0: Pavattiṃ disvāti etarahi pavattiṃ disvā. Evanti iminā na kevalaṃ sappaccayatāmattameva
anya-e0104n0:1226_1: paccāmaṭṭhaṃ, atha kho yādisehi paccayehi etarahi pavattati, tādisehi avijjādipaccayeheva
anya-e0104n0:1227_0: 680. Pubbantanti atītaṃ khandhappabandhakoṭṭhāsaṃ. Ārabbhāti uddissa. Ahosiṃ nu kho,
anya-e0104n0:1227_1: na nu kho ahosinti sassatākāraṃ, adhiccasamuppattiākārañca nissāya atīte attano vijjamānataṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1227_2: avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgūpapattiyo nissāya “khattiyo
anya-e0104n0:1227_3: nu kho ahosiṃ, brāhmaṇādīsu gahaṭṭhādīsu devādīsu aññataro nu kho”ti kaṅkhati. Kathaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1227_4: nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ, rassaodātakāḷapamāṇikaappamāṇikādīnampi
anya-e0104n0:1227_5: aññataro”ti kaṅkhati. Issaranimmānādiṃ nissāya “kena nu kho pakārena ahosi”nti nibbattākārato
anya-e0104n0:1227_6: kaṅkhatīti ca vadanti. Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti jātiādiṃ nissāya “khattiyo hutvā nu
anya-e0104n0:1227_7: kho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe… devo hutvā nu kho manusso ahosi”nti attano aparāparuppattiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1227_8: kaṅkhati. Sabbattheva ca addhānanti kālādhivacanaṃ. Bhavissāmi nu khoti sassatākāraṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1227_9: ucchedākārañca nissāya anāgate attano vijjamānataṃ, avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Sesamettha
anya-e0104n0:1227_10: vuttanayameva. Etarahi vā pana paccuppannaṃ addhānanti idāni vā paṭisandhimādiṃ katvā
anya-e0104n0:1227_11: cutipariyantaṃ sabbampi vattamānakālaṃ. Ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hotīti attano khandhesu
anya-e0104n0:1227_12: vicikicchā hoti. Ahaṃ nu khosmīti attano atthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Ayuttaṃ panetanti.
anya-e0104n0:1227_13: Yuttaṃ ayuttanti kā ettha cintā. Ummattako viya hi bālaputhujjano. No nu khosmīti
anya-e0104n0:1227_14: attano natthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyova samāno attano khattiyabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1227_15: kaṅkhati. Esa nayo sesesu. Kathaṃ nu khosminti vuttanayameva. Kevalañhettha “abbhantare
anya-e0104n0:1227_16: jīvo nāma atthī”ti gahetvā tassa dīghādibhāvaṃ kaṅkhanto “kathaṃ nu khosmi”nti kaṅkhatīti
anya-e0104n0:1227_17: veditabbo. Paccuppannaṃ pana attano sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi. Kuto āgato,
anya-e0104n0:1227_18: so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhati. Sā sabbāpi pahīyatīti
anya-e0104n0:1227_19: sā yathāvuttā soḷasavidhāpi vicikicchā vikkhambhanavasena pahīyati.
anya-e0104n0:1228_0: 681. Kusalādibhedato sabbappakārassāpi nāmassa sādhāraṇo paccayoti, tato pavattito
anya-e0104n0:1228_1: manasikārādiko kusalādibhedato sabbappakārassāpi nāmassa asādhāraṇo paccayoti ca
anya-e0104n0:1228_3: sabbappakārassāpi. Yaṃ ekantato chadvārikaṃ, tampi chadvāraggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ yathā
anya-e0104n0:1228_6: dvāracchakkayonisomanasikārādivasena nāmasseva sādhāraṇo, asādhāraṇo ca paccayo vutto,
anya-e0104n0:1228_7: taṃ pana avisesavasena vuttaṃ. Visesato pana kammaṃ vipākanāmassa, kammasamuṭṭhānarūpānañca
anya-e0104n0:1228_8: cittaṃ cetasikanāmassa, cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānañca sādhāraṇo paccayo, yathāvuttasseva
anya-e0104n0:1228_9: ca nāmassa, rūpassa ca tadaññanāmarūpāpekkhāya asādhāraṇo paccayo. Tathā sabhāgo,
anya-e0104n0:1228_10: utusabhāgo ca āhāro taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ sādhāraṇo paccayo, tadaññāpekkhāya asādhāraṇoti
anya-e0104n0:1228_11: rūpassāpi sādhāraṇo, asādhāraṇo ca paccayo yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbo. Paccayapariggaho
anya-e0104n0:1228_13: kusalassevā”ti vuttaṃ. Ādi-saddena sappurisūpanissayassa, catunnampi vā sampatticakkānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1228_14: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Viparīto akusalassāti vacanato yathā yonisomanasikārādiviparīto
anya-e0104n0:1228_15: akusalasseva paccayo, tathā yonisomanasikārādi kusalasseva paccayo hotīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1228_16: Yassa vā kusalaṃ sambhavati, akusalaṃ sambhavati, kusalākusalāni vā, tassāti atthasiddhametaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1228_17: Kammādikoti ādi-saddena avijjādayo viya gatikālādayopi saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Bhavaṅgādikoti
anya-e0104n0:1228_19: santīraṇaṃ voṭṭhabbanassa, parittakiriyā yathārahaṃ parittamahaggatakiriyānaṃ, arahattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1229_0: Kammanti cetanāva adhippetā, sā ca kho kusalākusalā. Vuttañhetaṃ “kusalākusalacetanā
anya-e0104n0:1229_1: vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ, kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti. Na cittaṃ viya
anya-e0104n0:1229_2: sasampayuttā. Cittañhettha sasampayuttaṃ adhippetaṃ “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1229_3: taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato. Tatthāti tesu kammādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1229_4: rūpajanakapaccayesu. Atītato eva kammato phalaṃ uppajjati, na vattamānatoti vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1229_5: “kammaṃ atītameva kammasamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa paccayo”ti. Yadi hi paccuppannato kammato
anya-e0104n0:1229_6: phalaṃ uppajjeyya, āyūhanakkhaṇe eva phalena uppajjitabbaṃ bhaveyya, na ca taṃ diṭṭhamicchitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1229_7: vā. Na hi loke kudācanaṃ kariyamānameva kammaṃ phalaṃ dentaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, tathārūpo vā
anya-e0104n0:1229_8: āgamo atthīti. Nanu ca idamapi na diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ vinaṭṭhato hetuto phalaṃ uppajjamānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1229_9: mato vā kukkuṭo vassantoti? Saccamadiṭṭhaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ pabandhavicchede, idaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:1229_10: arūpaṃ pabandhopi atthīti upamā na saṃsandati. Kammato hi atītato eva kammassa katattā,
anya-e0104n0:1229_11: upacitattā ca phalaṃ uppajjati. Vuttañhetaṃ “kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā
anya-e0104n0:1229_12: upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādi. Yasmā anantarādipaccayalābhato
anya-e0104n0:1229_13: uppādakkhaṇe eva cittassa balavatā, tasmā taṃ uppajjamānameva rūpaṃ janetīti āha
anya-e0104n0:1229_14: “cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānassa uppajjamāna”nti. Rūpassa paccayo hotīti sambandho. Yasmā
anya-e0104n0:1229_15: pana rūpassa ṭhitikkhaṇe balavatā pacchājātādipaccayalābhato, tasmā vuttaṃ “utuāhārā…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1229_16: hontī”ti, bāhiraṃ utuṃ, āhārañca paccayaṃ labhitvā attano ṭhitikkhaṇe utuāhārā rūpaṃ janentīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1231_0: 682. Saṅkhārānanti saṅkhatasaṅkhārānaṃ. Bhaṅganti maraṇaṃ. Jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma jātiyā
anya-e0104n0:1231_1: satītiādi phaladassanānupubbiyā hetudassanakkamena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggaho sukaroti
anya-e0104n0:1231_2: katvā dassito. Tattha bhave satīti kammabhave sati.
anya-e0104n0:1232_2: “Asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇa”ntiādinā hi paṭilomavasena dassite paccayākāre “yassa
anya-e0104n0:1232_3: abhāvā yassa abhāvo, so tassa paccayo”ti byatirekato, anvayato ca nāmarūpassa paccayapariggaho sukaroti.
anya-e0104n0:1233: 684. Purimakammabhavasmiṃ mohotiādi vuttatthameva. Kammasahāyattā kilesavaṭṭaṃ kammavaṭṭe pakkhitvā vuttaṃ “kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1234_0: 685. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto paccuppanno attabhāvo, tattha veditabbaphalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1234_1: kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ. Paccuppannabhavato anantaraṃ veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1234_3: attabhāvaparivatte. Ahosikammanti ahosi eva kammaṃ, na tassa vipāko ahosi, “atthi,
anya-e0104n0:1234_4: bhavissati vā”ti evaṃ vattabbakammaṃ. Paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāya, paccayavisesena
anya-e0104n0:1234_5: paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvaṃ pattā tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā
anya-e0104n0:1234_6: hutvā pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā
anya-e0104n0:1234_7: nāma. Sā hi vuttākārena balavati javanasantāne guṇavisesayuttesu upakārāpakāravasappavattiyā,
anya-e0104n0:1234_8: āsevanālābhena appavipākatāya ca paṭhamajavanacetanā itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1234_9: okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1234_10: phalaṃ deti. Tathā asakkontanti kammassa vipākadānaṃ nāma upadhipayogādipaccayantarasamavāyeneva
anya-e0104n0:1234_11: hotīti tadabhāvato tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontaṃ. Atthasādhikāti
anya-e0104n0:1234_12: dānādipāṇātipātādiatthassa nipphādikā. Kā pana sāti āha “sattamajavanacetanā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1234_13: Sā hi sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttanayena paṭiladdhavisesā, purimajavanacetanāhi laddhāsevanā
anya-e0104n0:1234_14: ca samānā anantarattabhāve vipākadāyinī upapajjavedanīyakammaṃ nāma. “Sati saṃsārappavattiyā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1234_15: iminā asati saṃsārappavattiyaṃ ahosikammapakkhe tiṭṭhati vipaccanokāsassa abhāvatoti dīpeti.
anya-e0104n0:1235_0: 686. Yaṃ garukanti yaṃ akusalaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ, kusalaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ kammaṃ. Yaṃ bahulanti
anya-e0104n0:1235_1: yaṃ bahulaṃ abhiṇhaso kataṃ samāsevitaṃ. Maraṇakāle anussaritanti paribyattabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1235_2: maraṇassa āsannakāle anussaritaṃ. Āsannakāle kate vattabbameva natthīti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1235_3: “Punappunaṃ laddhāsevana”nti iminā “yaṃ bahula”nti vuttakammato viseseti. Tathā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1235_4: nivatteti paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanānujānanato. Paṭisandhijanakavasena hi garukādikammacatukkaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1236_0: Tattha garukaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Tathā hi taṃ garukanti vuttaṃ. Garuke asati
anya-e0104n0:1236_1: bahulīkataṃ, tasmiṃ asati āsannaṃ, tasmimpi asati “kaṭattā vā panā”ti vuttaṃ purimajātīsu
anya-e0104n0:1236_2: katakammaṃ vipaccati. Bahulāsannapubbakatesu ca balābalaṃ vā jānitabbaṃ, pāpato pāpantaraṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1236_3: kalyāṇañca, kalyāṇato ca kalyāṇantaraṃ, pāpañca, bahulīkatato ca mahato ca pubbakatādi,
anya-e0104n0:1236_4: appañca. Bahulānussaraṇena vippaṭisārādijananato paṭipakkhassa aparipuṇṇatāya āraddhavipākassa
anya-e0104n0:1236_5: kammassa, kammasesassa vā aparāpariyāye vedanīyassa aparikkhīṇatāya santatiyā pariṇāmavisesatoti
anya-e0104n0:1236_6: tehi tehi kāraṇehi āhitabalaṃ paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. Mahānāradakassapajātake videharañño
anya-e0104n0:1236_7: senāpati alāto, bījako dāso, rājakaññā rucā ca ettha nidassanaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0104n0:1237_0: “Tatrānanda, yvāyaṃ puggalo idha pāṇātipātī…pe… micchādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1237_1: maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati. Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1237_2: dukkhavedanīyaṃ, pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ, maraṇakāle
anya-e0104n0:1237_3: vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1237_4: duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati. Yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātī hoti…pe… micchādiṭṭhi
anya-e0104n0:1237_5: hoti, tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
anya-e0104n0:1238_0: “Tatrānanda, yvāyaṃ puggalo idha pāṇātipātī…pe… micchādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1238_1: maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1238_2: sukhavedanīyaṃ, pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ, maraṇakāle
anya-e0104n0:1238_3: vāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1238_4: saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. Yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātī hoti…pe… micchādiṭṭhi hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1238_5: tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
anya-e0104n0:1239_0: “Tatrānanda, yvāyaṃ puggalo idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato…pe… sammādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā
anya-e0104n0:1239_1: paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1239_2: sukhavedanīyaṃ, pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ, maraṇakāle
anya-e0104n0:1239_3: vāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1239_4: saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. Yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato…pe… sammādiṭṭhi
anya-e0104n0:1239_5: hoti, tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.
anya-e0104n0:1240_0: “Tatrānanda, yvāyaṃ puggalo idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato…pe… sammādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā
anya-e0104n0:1240_1: paraṃ…pe… nirayaṃ upapajjati. Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1240_2: pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ, maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi
anya-e0104n0:1240_3: samattā samādinnā, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ …pe… nirayaṃ upapajjati.
anya-e0104n0:1240_4: Yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti…pe… sammādiṭṭhi hoti, tassa diṭṭhe vā
anya-e0104n0:1240_5: dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1241: Kiṃ bahunā yaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ, tassevāyaṃ visayo, yadidaṃ tassa tassa kammassa tena tena kāraṇena pubbāparavipākatā sāmatthiyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1242_0: 687. Paṭisandhidānādivasena vipākasantānassa nibbattakaṃ janakaṃ. Tenāha “taṃ paṭisandhiyampi
anya-e0104n0:1242_3: addhānaṃ pavattetī”ti. Upapīḷakaṃ sukhadukkhappabandhe pavattamāne saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1242_4: taṃ hāpeti. Tenāha “sukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādhati, addhānaṃ pavattituṃ na detī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1242_5: Ghātetvāti upacchinditvā. Kammassa upacchindanaṃ nāma tassa vipākapaṭibāhanamevāti
anya-e0104n0:1242_6: āha “tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā”ti. Tañca attano vipākuppattiyā okāsakaraṇanti vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1242_7: “attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotī”ti. Vipaccanāya katokāsaṃ kammaṃ vipakkameva nāma
anya-e0104n0:1242_8: hotīti āha “evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccatī”ti. Upapīḷakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1242_9: aññassa vipākaṃ upacchindati, na sayaṃ attano vipākaṃ deti. Upaghātakaṃ pana dubbalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1242_10: kammaṃ upacchinditvā attano vipākaṃ uppādetīti ayametesaṃ viseso. Bavhābādhatādipaccayūpanipātena
anya-e0104n0:1242_11: vipākassa vibādhakaṃ upapīḷakaṃ, tathā vipākasseva upacchedakaṃ upaghātakaṃ. Kammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1242_12: upaghātetvā attano vipākassa okāsakaraṇena vipaccane sati janakameva siyā, janakādibhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1242_13: nāma vipākaṃ pati icchitabbo, na kammaṃ patīti vipākasseva upaghātakatā yuttā viya
anya-e0104n0:1243_0: Kammantaranti kammaviseso kammānaṃ balābalabhedo. Vipākantaranti vipākaviseso, tassa
anya-e0104n0:1243_1: hīnapaṇītatādibhedo. Aparo nayo – yasmiṃ kamme kate paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte ca vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1243_2: uppatti hoti, taṃ janakaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa
anya-e0104n0:1243_3: vā phalassa vibādhakavicchedakapaccayānuppattiyā, upabrūhanapaccayuppattiyā ca janakānubhāvānurūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1243_4: pariposaciratarappabandhā honti, taṃ upatthambhakaṃ. Janakena nibbattitaṃ kusalaphalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1243_5: vā akusalaphalaṃ vā yena paccanīkabhūtena rogadhātusamatādinimittatāya bādhīyati,
anya-e0104n0:1243_6: taṃ upapīḷakaṃ. Yena pana kammunā janakasāmatthiyavasena ciratarappabandhārahampi
anya-e0104n0:1243_7: samānaṃ phalaṃ vicchedakapaccayuppattiyā upahaññati vicchijjati, taṃ upaghātakaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1243_8: Tattha keci dutiyassa kusalabhāvaṃ itthannāmagatassa appābādhadīghāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena,
anya-e0104n0:1243_10: Devadattādīnaṃ, pana nāgādīnaṃ, ito anupadinnena yāpanakapetānañca narakādīsu akusalavipākupatthambhanupapīḷanupaghātakāni
anya-e0104n0:1243_11: na na santīti catunnampi akusalākusalabhāvo na virujjhati. Buddhāveṇikatāya asādhāraṇasseva
anya-e0104n0:1243_12: ñāṇassa gocarabhāvato kammantarādi “asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehī”ti vuttaṃ. Ekadesato jānitabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1243_13: anavasesato jānituṃ na sakkā avisayattā. Sabbena sabbaṃ ajānane paccayapariggaho na paripūratīti.
anya-e0104n0:1244_1: “dvādasavidhaṃ kammaṃ kammavaṭṭe pakkhipitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Kilesavaṭṭampi kammasahāyatāya
anya-e0104n0:1244_3: paccuppanne addhāne nāmarūpassa pavatti, tādisato eva itarasmimpi addhadvayeti yathā
anya-e0104n0:1244_4: atītānāgate nayaṃ neti, taṃ dassento “ida”ntiādimāha. Tattha anāgatepi kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasenevāti
anya-e0104n0:1244_5: ettha vuttaṃ eva-saddaṃ “etarahi atītepī”ti etthāpi ānetvā vattabbaṃ addhattayepi
anya-e0104n0:1244_7: nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. Aparāparaṃ vaṭṭanaṭṭhena vaṭṭaṃ. Tathā pavattanaṃ pavattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1244_8: Hetuphalabhāvena sambandhatīti santati, pabandho. Karaṇaṭṭhena, paccayehi karīyatīti vā kiriyā.
anya-e0104n0:1245: Kammāti kammato. Sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo, kammaṃ sambhavo etassāti kammasambhavo, vipāko.
anya-e0104n0:1246_0: Kāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ dānādīhi sādhitakiriyāya vattamānāya kāraṇamatte kattuvohāroti āha
anya-e0104n0:1246_1: “neva kāraṇato uddhaṃ kārakaṃ passatī”ti. Karotīti hi kārakaṃ. Vipākapaṭisaṃvedakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1246_2: na passatīti sambandho. Kāmaṃ bālāpi “kārako paṭisaṃvedako”ti vadantā atthato paññattimattameva
anya-e0104n0:1246_3: vadanti, te pana viparītābhinivesavasenāpi vadantīti taṃ appamāṇanti āha “samaññāmattena
anya-e0104n0:1247_0: 689. Evetanti evaṃvidhaṃ etaṃ dassanaṃ, sammadassanaṃ, aviparītadassananti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1247_1: Bījarukkhādikānaṃvāti yathā bījato rukkho, rukkhato puna bījanti anādikālikattā bījarukkhasantānassa
anya-e0104n0:1247_2: pubbakoṭi natthi, evaṃ kammapaccayā vipāko, vipākapaccayā kammanti anādikālikattā
anya-e0104n0:1247_3: kammavipākasantānassa pubbakoṭi na paññāyati. Ādi-saddena “kukkuṭiyā aṇḍaṃ, aṇḍato
anya-e0104n0:1247_4: kukkuṭī, punapi kukkuṭiyā aṇḍa”nti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Anāgatepi saṃsāreti yathā
anya-e0104n0:1247_5: atīte, evaṃ anāgatepi addhāne “khandhānañca paṭipāṭī”tiādinā vutte saṃsāre sati kammavipākānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1247_6: appavattaṃ na dissati, kammavipākānaṃ appavatti na dissati, pavattati evāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1248_0: Etamatthanti “kammassa kārako natthī”tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ. Asayaṃvasīti na sayaṃvasino,
anya-e0104n0:1249_0: Gambhīrañāṇagocaratāya gambhīraṃ. Tathā nipuṇaṃ. Sattasuññatāya, aññamaññasabhāvasuññatāya
anya-e0104n0:1249_1: ca suññaṃ. Paccayanti nāmarūpassa paccayaṃ, tappaccayapaṭivedheneva ca sabbaṃ paṭividdhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1249_2: hotīti. Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhītiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0104n0:1250: Paccayasuññaṃ phalanti yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā na sūriye”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tesanti sūriyādīnaṃ. Soti aggi. Sambhārehīti ātapādīhi kāraṇehi.
anya-e0104n0:1251_0: Yadi ca hetu ca phalañca aññamaññarahitaṃ, kathaṃ hetuto phalaṃ nibbattatīti āha
anya-e0104n0:1251_1: “kammañca kho upādāyā”ti. Na kevalaṃ kammaphalameva suññaṃ katturahitaṃ, sabbampi
anya-e0104n0:1251_2: dhammajātaṃ kārakarahitanti dassetuṃ “na hettha devo”ti gāthā vuttā. Hetusambhārapaccayāti
anya-e0104n0:1252_1: katattā cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā hontīti vadanti. Vuttanayena pana sappaccayanāmarūpassa
anya-e0104n0:1252_2: dassanena tīsu addhāsu pahīnavicikicchassa addhattayapariyāpannā dhammā atītapaccuppannānāgatabhavesu
anya-e0104n0:1252_3: ca cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā honti, na anupadadhammavasena tathāpariggahassa akatattā.
anya-e0104n0:1252_4: Sāssa hoti ñātapariññāti yāya nāmarūpapariggahaṃ, tassa ca paccayapariggahaṃ karoti,
anya-e0104n0:1252_5: sā assa yogino “idaṃ nāmaṃ, ettakaṃ nāma”ntiādinā, “tassa ayaṃ paccayo, ettako paccayo”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1252_6: ca paricchedavasena ñātavatī paññāti katvā ñātapariññā.
anya-e0104n0:1253_0: Idāni yena kāraṇena addhattayapariyāpannā dhammā cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā honti,
anya-e0104n0:1253_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “so evaṃ pajānātī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena dhammānaṃ bhavantarasaṅkamo nāma
anya-e0104n0:1253_2: na kadācipi atthi, tattha tattheva nirujjhanatoti dasseti. Sajjhāya mantodakapāna
anya-e0104n0:1253_3: mukhamaṇḍana padīpasīkhūpamāhi tameva dhammānaṃ saṅkamābhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “apica kho”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1254_0: Manodhātuanantaranti kiriyamanodhātuyā anantaraṃ labbhamānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Na ceva
anya-e0104n0:1254_1: āgatanti kiriyamanodhātuto na ceva āgataṃ kiriyamanodhātuyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1254_2: Nāpi na nibbattaṃ anantaranti kiriyamanodhātuto anāgacchantampi paccayasāmaggilābhena
anya-e0104n0:1254_3: tato anantaraṃ nāpi na nibbattaṃ, nibbattameva hoti. Yathāyaṃ pavattiyaṃ cittappavatti,
anya-e0104n0:1254_4: tatheva paṭisandhimhi vattate cittasantati, cuticittato anāgacchantampi paṭisandhicittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1254_5: tato anantaraṃ nāpi na nibbattati, paccayasāmaggivasena nibbattatevāti attho. Santatigahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:1254_6: cettha kutoci āgamābhāvameva vibhāveti. Hetuphalabhāvena hi sambandhatāti dhammappavatti
anya-e0104n0:1254_7: santatīti. Tenāha “purimaṃ bhijjate citta”ntiādi. Purimanti cuticittaṃ. Bhijjateti
anya-e0104n0:1254_8: nirujjhati. Pacchimanti paṭisandhicittaṃ. Tatoti cuticittato anantarameva jāyati.
anya-e0104n0:1254_9: Yattha hi cuticittato dūrepi kālantarepi uppajjamānaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ anantarameva
anya-e0104n0:1254_10: jāyatīti vuccati. Tasmā tesaṃ antarikā natthi tesaṃ cutipaṭisandhicittānaṃ byavadhāyakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1254_11: kiñci natthi. Vīci tesaṃ na vijjatīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Itoti cuticittato anantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1254_12: na ca gacchati kiñci cittaṃ. Tañhi sasampayuttadhammaṃ tatheva nirujjhati. Paṭisandhi
anya-e0104n0:1254_13: cāti paṭisandhiviññāṇañca aññameva yathāpaccayaṃ jāyati nibbattatīti punapi saṅkamābhāvameva
anya-e0104n0:1255_0: 691. Nāmarūpaggahaṇena, tassa ca paccayadhammaggahaṇena aggahitassa tebhūmakadhammassa
anya-e0104n0:1255_1: abhāvato “viditasabbadhammassā”ti vuttaṃ. Na cettha lokuttaradhammā adhigatā. Thāmagataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1255_2: hoti anekākāravokārapaccayapariggahavidhino anuṭṭhitattā. Suṭṭhutaraṃ pahīyati tiyaddhagatadhammappavattiyā
anya-e0104n0:1255_3: vigatasammohattā. Sā evāti soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā eva. Yasmā ettha “buddho, dhammo, saṅgho,
anya-e0104n0:1255_4: sikkhā”ti ca kaṅkhāya gocarabhūtā lokiyā dhammā adhippetā. Na hi lokuttaradhamme
anya-e0104n0:1255_5: ārabbha kilesā pavattituṃ sakkonti. Pubbantoti atītā khandhāyatanadhātuyo. Aparantoti
anya-e0104n0:1255_6: anāgatā. Pubbantāparantoti tadubhayaṃ, addhāpaccuppannaṃ vā tadubhayabhāgayuttattā.
anya-e0104n0:1255_7: Evaṃ buddhādiggahaṇena, paṭiccasamuppannadhammaggahaṇena ca gahito aṭṭhamo kaṅkhāvisayo
anya-e0104n0:1255_8: nāmarūpamattaṃ, idappaccayatāggahaṇena pana tassa paccayo gahito, tasmā soḷasavatthukāya
anya-e0104n0:1255_9: kaṅkhāya pahīnāya aṭṭhavatthukā kaṅkhā appatiṭṭhāva hotīti āha “na kevalañca…pe… pahīyatiyevā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1256_0: Diṭṭhekaṭṭhattā vicikicchāya yathā diṭṭhi samucchijjamānā vicikicchāya saddhiṃyeva
anya-e0104n0:1256_1: samucchijjati, evaṃ vicikicchā vikkhambhiyamānā diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃyeva vikkhambhīyatīti
anya-e0104n0:1256_2: āha “dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni vikkhambhantī”ti. Attābhinivesūpanissayā hi “ahosiṃ nu
anya-e0104n0:1256_3: kho aha”ntiādi nayappavattā soḷasavatthukā kaṅkhā, sā eva ca pubbantādivatthukabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1256_4: vuttā. Attābhinivesavatthukāni ca dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni, buddhādivatthukā ca kaṅkhā
anya-e0104n0:1256_5: tadekaṭṭhāti. Dharīyanti attano paccayehīti dhammā, tiṭṭhati ettha tadāyattavuttitāya
anya-e0104n0:1256_6: phalanti ṭhiti, dhammānaṃ ṭhiti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayadhammo. Atha vā dhammoti kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1256_7: “dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viya, dhammassa ṭhiti sabhāvo, dhammato ca añño sabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1256_8: natthīti paccayadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvo dhammaṭṭhiti, dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1256_9: Saṅkhārānaṃ yaṃ yaṃ bhūtaṃ aniccatādi yathābhūtaṃ, tattha ñāṇanti yathābhūtañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1257_0: Avijjā paccayoti avijjā hetuādivasena saṅkhārānaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayo. Tato eva saṅkhārā
anya-e0104n0:1257_1: paccayasamuppannā. Ubhopeteti yasmā avijjāpi āsavādivasena paccayasambhūtāva, tasmā
anya-e0104n0:1257_2: avijjā saṅkhārāti ubhayepi ete dhammā paccayasamuppannā. Itīti evaṃ. Paccayapariggahe
anya-e0104n0:1257_3: paññāti paccayānaṃ paricchijja gahaṇavasena pavattā paññā. Vuttanayena dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1258_0: Nimittanti saṅkhāranimittaṃ, atthato pañcakkhandhā. Te hi ghanasaññāpavattiyā vatthubhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1258_1: nimittaṃ, saviggahabhāvena upaṭṭhānato vā. Yasmā aniccatā nāma saṅkhārānaṃ aviparītākāro.
anya-e0104n0:1258_2: Tattha niccatāya lesassāpi abhāvato aniccato passanto yathābhūtaṃ jānāti. Tañca ñāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1258_3: aviparītaggahaṇatāya sammādassanaṃ. Taṃsamaṅginā ca paccuppannesu viya atītānāgatesupi
anya-e0104n0:1259_0: Aniccatā ca nāma uppattimato, uppādo ca paccayavasenāti aniccatā sijjhamānā saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1259_1: sappaccayataṃ sādhentī yathāvuttakaṅkhappahānāya saṃvattatīti imamatthaṃ dassento
anya-e0104n0:1259_2: “aniccato…pe… pahīyatī”ti āha. Tattha tadanvayenāti paccakkhato diṭṭhassa anugamanena.
anya-e0104n0:1259_3: Etthāti yathādiṭṭhesu dhammesu. Dukkhato manasi karontotiādīsupi eseva nayo. Pavattanti
anya-e0104n0:1259_4: upādinnakkhandhappavattaṃ. Tañhi kilesābhisaṅkhārehi pavattitattā sātisayaṃ dukkhabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1259_5: upaṭṭhāti. Pavattanti ṭhānanisajjādivasena dukkhadukkhatādivasena ca saṅkhārappavattanti
anya-e0104n0:1259_6: apare. “Nimittaṃ, pavatta”nti ca vutte ajjhattabahiddhāsantānasaññite sabbasmiṃ sappaccaye
anya-e0104n0:1259_7: nāmarūpe yāthāvato pavattā ekāva paññā pariyāyavasena “yathābhūtañāṇa”ntipi “sammādassana”ntipi
anya-e0104n0:1259_8: tattha kaṅkhāvikkhambhanena “kaṅkhāvitaraṇā”tipi vuccati. Yathā “rukkho pādapo tarū”ti
anya-e0104n0:1260_0: Paramatthato sāsane assāso nāma ariyaphalaṃ, patiṭṭhā nāma ariyamaggo, ayaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:1260_1: anadhigatamaggaphalopi tadadhigamupāyapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitattā laddhassāso viya, laddhapatiṭṭho
anya-e0104n0:1260_2: viya ca hotīti vuttaṃ “laddhassāso laddhapatiṭṭho”ti. Aparihīnakaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiko
anya-e0104n0:1260_3: vipassako lokiyāhi sīlasamādhipaññāsampadāhi samannāgatattā uttari appaṭivijjhanto
anya-e0104n0:1260_4: sugatiparāyaṇo ca hotīti vuttaṃ “niyatagatiko”ti. Tato eva cūḷasotāpanno nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1261_0: Atha vā laddhassāso diṭṭhivisuddhisamadhigamena. Nāmarūpaparicchedena hi khandhādike
anya-e0104n0:1261_4: dhammamattaṃ jānitvā sāsane patiṭṭhitasaddho laddhapatiṭṭho nāma hoti. Nāmarūpavavatthānena
anya-e0104n0:1261_5: dukkhasaccaṃ, dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena samudayasaccaṃ, tasseva aparabhāgena aniccato manasikārādividhinā
anya-e0104n0:1261_6: maggasaccañca abhiññāya pavattiyā dukkhabhāvaṃ disvā appavatte nirodhe ekaṃseneva
anya-e0104n0:1261_7: ninnajjhāsayatāya lokiyeneva ñāṇena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ adhigatattā apāyesu abhabbuppattiko,
anya-e0104n0:1261_8: sotāpannabhūmiyaṃ bhabbuppattiko ca hotīti vuttaṃ “niyatagatiko”ti. Tenāha “cūḷasotāpanno nāma hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1262: Tasmāti yasmā evaṃ mahānisaṃsametaṃ yathābhūtañāṇaṃ, tasmā. Sadāti sabbakālaṃ rattiñceva divā ca. Sabbasoti nibbattakahetuādipariggaṇhanavasena sabbappakārena.
anya-e0104n0:1267_0: 692. Evaṃ maggañca amaggañca ñatvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇanti ayaṃ upakkilesavinimuttā vīthipaṭipannā
anya-e0104n0:1267_1: vipassanāpaññā ariyamaggassa pubbabhāgamaggo, ayaṃ obhāsādibhedo dasavidho upakkileso
anya-e0104n0:1267_2: na maggoti evaṃ maggañca amaggañca yāthāvato vavatthapetvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1268_0: Atītādivasena anekabhedabhinne dhamme kalāpato saṅkhipitvā sammasanaṃ kalāpasammasanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1268_1: ayaṃ kira jambudīpavāsīnaṃ abhilāpo. “Yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādinā nayena hi dhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1268_2: vipassanā nayavipassanā, ayaṃ kira tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnaṃ abhilāpo. Tenevāha “kalāpasammasanasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0104n0:1268_3: nayavipassanāyā”ti. Tāva-saddo kamattho, tena sammasanappakārānaṃ bahubhedataṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0104n0:1268_4: Bahubhāvato hi tesaṃ paṭhamaṃ nayavipassanāya yogārambhaṃ anusāsati “nayavipassanāya
anya-e0104n0:1268_5: tāva yogo karaṇīyo”ti. Kasmāti codakavacanaṃ. Tassāyaṃ adhippāyo – yadi maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi
anya-e0104n0:1268_6: sampādetabbā, atha kasmā “nayavipassanāya ādito yogo kātabbo”ti vuttanti. Itaro tassāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1268_8: sati udayabbayañāṇuppādo, udayabbayañāṇe sati obhāsādiupakkilesasambhavo, tato maggāmaggavavatthānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1268_9: tasmā tassa āditova ārambhassa sambhavo natthīti vipassanā paṭhamaṃ āraddhabbā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1268_10: Evampi paṭhamaṃ nayavipassanāva kasmā āraddhabbāti āha “vipassanāya ca kalāpasammasanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1268_11: ādī”ti. Tañhi atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthānavasena pavattanato
anya-e0104n0:1269_0: Tasmāti ādibhūtattā. Atha vā tasmāti yasmā āraddhavipassakassa…pe… kalāpasammasanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1269_1: ādi, tasmā. Etanti kalāpasammasanaṃ. Apicātiādi kalāpasammasanasseva vipassanāya
anya-e0104n0:1269_2: ādibhāve upacayahetudassanaṃ. Udayabbayañāṇapariyosānā tīraṇapariññā, asampatte eva
anya-e0104n0:1269_3: ca udayabbayañāṇe maggāmaggavavatthānaṃ hotīti āha “tīraṇapariññāya vattamānāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1269_4: Kalāpasammasane tāva yogo kātabboti etthāpi tasseva paṭhamārambhe kāraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n0:1269_5: veditabbaṃ. Yasmā kalāpasammasanaṃ nāma ekavisuddhiyampi na antogadhaṃ, ekacce ca
anya-e0104n0:1269_6: taṃ anāmasitvāva vipassanācāraṃ vaṇṇenti. Evaṃ santepi taṃ suttantesu ekadesena,
anya-e0104n0:1269_7: anavasesato ca dassitaṃ. Paṭisambhidāyaṃ ādikammikānaṃ manasikārasukaratāya vipassanāya
anya-e0104n0:1269_8: ādibhāvena ṭhapitaṃ. Vipassantassa ca obhāsādīsu uppannesu maggāmaggañāṇasambhavo,
anya-e0104n0:1269_9: tasmā “taṃ sampādetukāmenā”tiādinā ayaṃ vicāro katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1270_0: 693. Tatrāti tasmiṃ tīraṇapariññāya ñātapariññānantarabhāve, tāsu vā pariññāsu. Vinicchayoti
anya-e0104n0:1270_1: sarūpato, kiccato, bhūmito ca sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Lokuttarāpi purimasmiṃ saccadvaye maggasampayuttā
anya-e0104n0:1270_2: tividhāpi pariññā kiccavasena labbhatīti “lokiyapariññā”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. Sabhāvadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1270_3: lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇato ñeyyaabhimukhā paññā abhiññāpaññā. Ñātaṭṭheti ñātabhāvanimittaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1270_4: Abhiññeyyassa jānanahetu “ñāṇa”nti vuccati. Pariññāpaññāti aniccādilakkhaṇāni paricchijja
anya-e0104n0:1270_5: jānanapaññā. Tīraṇaṭṭheti sammasanabhāvahetu. Pahānapaññāti pahātabbassa pajahanapaññā.
anya-e0104n0:1270_8: tīsupi khaṇesu sallakkhitabbāni paṭiniyatarūpatāya sabhāvasiddhāneva hutvā gayhanti,
anya-e0104n0:1270_10: gahetabbato samāropitarūpāni viya gayhantīti vuttaṃ “sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1271_0: Saṅkhārapaṭicchedatoti nāmarūpavavatthānato, yā “diṭṭhivisuddhī”ti vuttā. Keci pana
anya-e0104n0:1271_3: tīraṇapahānāsamatthataṃ dasseti. Tāsampi pana “namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ, ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1271_4: rūpa”nti arūparūpānaṃ sādhāraṇākārasallakkhaṇavasena pavattiyā ekenākārena tīraṇapariyāyo,
anya-e0104n0:1271_5: diṭṭhikaṅkhāvikkhambhanena pahānapariyāyo labbhatīti siyā tīraṇapahānesupi ādhipaccanti
anya-e0104n0:1271_6: vadanti. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena pana yathā diṭṭhivisuddhiyāva saṅkhāraparicchedatā, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1271_7: lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya eva tīraṇapahānakiccatā veditabbā. Evaṃ hi tissopi pariññā
anya-e0104n0:1271_8: vavatthitā honti, aññathā saṅkāro siyā. Tīraṇapariññāya bhūmi tattha paññāya aniccatādilakkhaṇasantīraṇato.
anya-e0104n0:1271_9: Tenāha “etasmiṃ…pe… ādhipacca”nti. Kāmaṃ udayabbayañāṇampi kañci micchābhinivesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1271_10: pajahati, tassa pana athāmagatattā na sātisayaṃ pahānanti vuttaṃ “bhaṅgānupassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1271_11: ādiṃ katvā upari pahānapariññāya bhūmī”ti. Aniccato anupassantoti aniccākārato saṅkhāre
anya-e0104n0:1271_12: anupassanto sammasanto. Niccasaññanti “te niccā sassatā”ti pavattaṃ micchāsaññaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1271_13: Saññāsīsena diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Eseva nayo ito paresupi. Nibbindantoti
anya-e0104n0:1271_15: Nandinti sappītikataṇhaṃ. Virajjantoti virāgānupassanāya virajjanavasena yathā saṅkhāresu
anya-e0104n0:1271_16: rāgo nuppajjati, evaṃ anupassanto. Tathābhūto hi rāgaṃ pajahatīti vuccati. Nirodhentoti
anya-e0104n0:1271_17: nirodhānupassanāya yathā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, na āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:1271_18: evaṃ anupassanto. Tathābhūto hi saṅkhārānaṃ samudayaṃ pajahati nāma anuppattidhammatāpādanato.
anya-e0104n0:1271_19: Paṭinissajjantoti paṭinissaggānupassanāya yathā saṅkhārā na puna ādiyanti, evaṃ vossajjanto.
anya-e0104n0:1271_20: Tenāha “ādānaṃ pajahatī”ti, niccādivasena vā gahaṇaṃ vissajjetīti attho. Sādhitattāti
anya-e0104n0:1271_21: sampāditattā. Itarāti tīraṇapahānapariññā. Evaṃ pariññā niddisitvā pariññākkamavasenapi
anya-e0104n0:1271_22: kaṅkhāvitaraṇānantaraṃ “kalāpasammasane yogo kātabbo”ti yvāyamattho vutto, taṃ nigamavasena
anya-e0104n0:1272_0: 694. Tatrāti tasmiṃ kalāpasammasane vibhāvetabbe, tassa vā kalāpasammasanassa ādibhāve.
anya-e0104n0:1272_1: Ayaṃ pāḷīti dassiyamānaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷimāha. Tattha saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne
anya-e0104n0:1272_2: paññāti atītādibhedabhinne dhamme ekato saṅgahetvā aniccādivasena vinicchaye sādhetabbe
anya-e0104n0:1272_3: taṃsādhanīyā paññā. Sammasane aniccatādivasena tīraṇe ñāṇanti pavuccati, sā kathaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1272_4: hotīti attho. Vavatthāne sammasaneti ca nipphādetabbe bhummavacanaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci rūpantiādīni
anya-e0104n0:1272_5: padāni heṭṭhā vuttatthāneva. Sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato vavatthapetītiādīni pana yasmā
anya-e0104n0:1272_6: parato vaṇṇiyissanti, tasmā tattheva nesaṃ atthaṃ vibhāvayissāma.
anya-e0104n0:1273_0: Pāḷivavatthānaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ – ettha hi ādikammikānaṃ vipassanāmanasikārasukhatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1273_1: “yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādinā paṭhamaṃ tāva pañcakkhandhā atītādivibhāgamukhena gahitā,
anya-e0104n0:1273_2: te pana khandhā yasmā dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammavasena vibhāgaṃ labbhanti,
anya-e0104n0:1273_3: tasmā tadanantaraṃ dvārachakkādivasena dasa chakkā gahitā. Yasmā pana lakkhaṇesu
anya-e0104n0:1273_4: anattalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhavibhāgaṃ, tasmā tassa vibhāvanāya cha dhātuyo gahitā. Tato
anya-e0104n0:1273_5: yesu kasiṇesu ito bāhirakānaṃ attābhiniveso, tāni imesaṃ jhānānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1273_6: upaṭṭhānākāramattānīti dassanatthaṃ dasa kasiṇāni gahitāni. Tato dukkhānupassanāya
anya-e0104n0:1273_7: parivārabhāvena paṭikkūlākāravasena dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā gahitā. Pubbe khandhavasena
anya-e0104n0:1273_8: saṅkhepato gahitā dhammā nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena, vitthāranayena ca manasi kātabbāti
anya-e0104n0:1273_9: dassanatthaṃ dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo ca gahitā. Tesu ime dhammā satipi
anya-e0104n0:1273_11: indriyāni gahitāni. Evaṃ anekabhedabhinnāpime dhammā bhūmittayapariyāpannatāya tividhāva
anya-e0104n0:1274_0: Ettāvatā nimittaṃ dassetvā pavattaṃ dassetuṃ kāmabhavādayo nava bhavā gahitā. Ettake
anya-e0104n0:1274_2: manasikāro pavattetabboti dassanatthaṃ jhānappamaññāruppāni gahitāni. Tattha jhānāni
anya-e0104n0:1274_3: nāma vuttāvasesārammaṇāni rūpāvacarajjhānāni. Paccayapaccayuppannavibhāgato ime dhammā
anya-e0104n0:1274_4: bhinditvā manasi kātabbāti dassanatthaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni gahitāni. Paccayākāramanasikāro
anya-e0104n0:1274_5: hi lakkhaṇattayaṃ sukhena, suṭṭhutarañca vibhāveti, tasmā pacchato gahito. Evamete
anya-e0104n0:1274_6: sammasanīyabhāvena gahitā khandhādivasena koṭṭhāsato pañcavīsatividhā. Pabhedato
anya-e0104n0:1274_7: pana atītādibhedaṃ anāmasitvāva gayhamānā dvīhi ūnāni dvesatāni honti.
anya-e0104n0:1275_0: Tattha aniccato vavatthapetītiādiko paṭhamo lakkhaṇavavatthāpanavāro. Aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādiko
anya-e0104n0:1275_1: dutiyo hetuvāro lakkhaṇānaṃ hetukittanato. Aniccaṃ saṅkhatantiādiko pana hetupatiṭṭhāpanavāro
anya-e0104n0:1275_2: pākaṭabhāvasallakkhaṇato. Khayaṭṭhenāti hi khayasabhāvato yasmā rūpaṃ khayasabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1275_3: uppajjitvā khayaṃ vayaṃ bhedaṃ gacchati, tasmā aniccanti attho. Bhayaṭṭhenāti bhāyitabbabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1275_4: yasmā rūpaṃ pabhaṅguratāya bhayānakaṃ, tasmā dukkhanti. Tenāha bhagavā “yadaniccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1275_5: taṃ dukkha”nti. Asārakaṭṭhenāti asārakabhāvato, attasāravirahatoti attho. Tatiyavāre
anya-e0104n0:1275_6: pana “rūpaṃ anicca”nti vatvā tassa hetuṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “saṅkhata”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmā
anya-e0104n0:1275_7: samecca sambhūya paccayehi kataṃ, anurūpe ca paccaye paṭicca, na vinā tehi samaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1275_8: sammā ca uppannaṃ, tasmā khayavayavirāganirodhadhammanti. Na hi paccayanibbattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1275_9: anirujjhanakaṃ nāma atthi. Tenāha bhagavā “yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1275_10: taṃ vata mā palujjīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti. Etena aniccā pathavīdhātu paccayanibbattattā
anya-e0104n0:1275_11: tadaññaṃ paccayanibbattaṃ viyāti dasseti. Esa nayo sesadhammesupi.
anya-e0104n0:1276_0: Idāni anvayato, byatirekato ca saṅkhatadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “jātipaccayā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1276_1: vuttaṃ. Aniccalakkhaṇasseva cettha patiṭṭhāpanaṃ tasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpite sesalakkhaṇadvayassapi
anya-e0104n0:1277_0: Iminā peyyālena ime dhammarāsayo saṃkhittāti sambandho. “Dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattā
anya-e0104n0:1277_1: dhammā, pañcakkhandhā”ti idaṃ abhiññeyyaniddese “cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya”ntiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1277_2: dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavatte dhamme dassetvā tesaṃ pañcahi khandhehi saṅgahitataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1277_3: dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ abhiññeyya”nti āgatattā vuttaṃ. Paṭisambhidāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1277_4: pana “yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādinā paṭhamaṃ pañcakkhandhe dassetvā “cakkhu”ntiādinā dvārārammaṇehi
anya-e0104n0:1277_5: saddhiṃ dvārappavattā dhammā dassitā. Tathādassane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0104n0:1278_0: Kasmā panettha ime dhammarāsayo saṃkhittāti pāḷiyaṃ vitthārato āgatattāti dassento
anya-e0104n0:1278_1: “vuttaṃ heta”ntiādimāha. Tenevāha “taṃ tattha…pe… saṃkhitta”nti. Tattha tanti abhiññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1278_2: Etthāti abhiññeyyaniddese. “Viññāṇaṃ mano dhammā”tiādinā tattha tattha koṭṭhāse ye
anya-e0104n0:1278_3: lokuttaradhammā āgatā. Keci pana “etthāti paṭisambhidāya”nti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1278_4: Sammasanupagā eva hi dhammā paṭisambhidāyaṃ gahitā sammasanavārassa adhippetattā,
anya-e0104n0:1278_5: na abhiññeyyaniddese viya sabbeva abhiññeyyā dhammā. Ye rūpārūpadhammā. Yassāti yogino.
anya-e0104n0:1278_6: Tesu tena sammasanaṃ ārabhitabbaṃ yathāpākaṭaṃ vipassanābhinivesoti katvā. Pacchā
anya-e0104n0:1278_7: pana anupaṭṭhahantepi upāyena upaṭṭhahāpetvā anavasesatova sammasitabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1279_0: 695. “Atītaṃ rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā aniccato sammasanassa atītādivibhāgā pavattiṭṭhānabhūtāti
anya-e0104n0:1279_1: āha “ekādasahi okāsehī”ti. Vavatthāpanaṃ nāma sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Aniccato sanniṭṭhānañcettha
anya-e0104n0:1280_0: Kathanti sammasanākāro pucchitoti taṃ parato idheva pāḷiyaṃ dutiyavāre vuttanayenevāti
anya-e0104n0:1280_1: saṅkhepeneva vissajjeti. Idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1280_2: Tattha hī-ti hetuatthe nipāto. Yasmā “rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1280_3: evaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā iminā vuttanayena aniccanti sammasatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1281_0: Evampi saṅkhepoyevāti vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “esā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atīteti atīte bhave.
anya-e0104n0:1281_1: Ādikammikassa hi idaṃ sammasanavidhānaṃ, tasmā bhavavasena addhābhedo adhippeto.
anya-e0104n0:1281_2: Tenāha “nayimaṃ bhavaṃ sampattantī”ti. Ettha iti-saddo hetuattho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
anya-e0104n0:1281_3: – yaṃ atītabhave pariyāpannaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ atīteyeva bhave khīṇaṃ, tato na imaṃ bhavaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1281_4: sampattaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena khayasabhāvattāti sammasatīti. Esa nayo yaṃ anāgatantiādīsupi.
anya-e0104n0:1282: Yaṃ bahiddhā, tampi bahiddhā eva khīyati, na ajjhattabhāvaṃ gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti, yaṃ oḷārikaṃ, tampi tattheva khīyatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1283: Idaṃ sabbampīti idaṃ atītādibhedassa rūpassa sammasanato sabbaṃ ekādasavidhampi sammasanaṃ ekaṃ sammasanaṃ aniccato sammasananti katvā.
anya-e0104n0:1284_0: Tanti taṃ ekādasavidhampi rūpaṃ. Sappaṭibhayatāyāti bhayānakatāya. Bhayāvahaṃ hotīti
anya-e0104n0:1284_1: appahīnavipallāsassa “ahaṃ vinassāmi, mama santakaṃ vinassatī”ti cintentassa bhayajanakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1284_2: hoti. Sīhopamasutte devānaṃ viyāti sīhopamasutte desiyamāne devānaṃ viya. Tattha hi –
anya-e0104n0:1285_0: “Yadā tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho…pe… so dhammaṃ deseti ‘iti rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1285_1: iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo. Iti vedanā… iti saññā… iti saṅkhārā…
anya-e0104n0:1285_2: iti viññāṇaṃ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti. Yepi te, bhikkhave,
anya-e0104n0:1285_3: devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā, tepi tathāgatassa
anya-e0104n0:1285_4: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjanti ‘aniccāva kira
anya-e0104n0:1285_5: bho mayaṃ samānā niccamhāti amaññimha, addhuvāva…pe… asassatāva kira bho mayaṃ samānā
anya-e0104n0:1285_6: sassatamhāti amaññimha, mayampi kira bho aniccā addhuvā asassatā sakkāyapariyāpannā”’ti –
anya-e0104n0:1287_0: Khandhapañcakaṃ, tadekadeso vā attavādīhi “attā”ti parikappīyati, tañca ekantato
anya-e0104n0:1287_1: aniccaṃ, dukkhañcāti āha “yañhi aniccaṃ, taṃ dukkha”ntiādi. Tīsu dukkhatāsu saṅkhāradukkhatāva
anya-e0104n0:1287_2: byāpinī, “yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkha”nti ca adhippetāti vuttaṃ “aniccataṃ vā udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1287_3: vā”ti. Attā abhavissāti “kārako vedako sayaṃvasī”ti evaṃbhūto attā abhavissāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1287_4: Evañhi sati rūpassa ābādhāya saṃvattanaṃ ayujjamānakaṃ siyā. Yathā rūpakkhandhe abhedato
anya-e0104n0:1287_5: tividhaṃ sammasanaṃ, bhedato tettiṃsavidhaṃ, evaṃ vedanākkhandhādīsupīti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1287_6: “esa nayo”ti atidisati. Tena khandhavasena tāva bhedato pañcasaṭṭhiadhikā sataṃ sammasanavārā
anya-e0104n0:1287_7: dassitā honti. Iminā nayena dvārachakkādīsupi yathārahaṃ sammasanabhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1288_0: 696. Niyamato saṅkhatādibhedaṃ hotīti ekaṃsena saṅkhatatādivisesavantaṃ hoti asaṅkhatādisabhāve
anya-e0104n0:1288_1: aniccatāya asambhavato. Assāti aniccassa. Pariyāyadassanatthanti vevacanadassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1288_2: taṃ pana “khayadhamma”ntiādīnaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ, na purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ. Na hi tadeva
anya-e0104n0:1288_3: tassa pariyāyo hoti, nāpi saṅkhatapaṭiccasamuppannapadāni hutvā abhāvadīpanato pākabhāvadīpanato.
anya-e0104n0:1288_4: Pākabhāvadīpanena pana aniccatāya sādhanapakkhe tiṭṭhanti. Teneva hi sabbesaṃ padānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1290_0: 697. Soti yogāvacaro. Tassāti yathāvuttabhedassa aniccatādisammasanassa. Thirabhāvatthāyāti
anya-e0104n0:1290_1: daḷhabhāvatthāya aniccādiākārassa punappunaṃ manasikāro viya bahulīkārabhāvato. Yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1290_2: taṃ bhagavatā etassa vibhaṅge aniccādisammasanaṃ vuttanti sambandho. Anulomikanti
anya-e0104n0:1290_3: ariyamaggādhigamassa anukūlaṃ. Khantinti ñāṇakhantiṃ. Ñāṇañhi visayasabhāvaṃ ogāhetvā
anya-e0104n0:1290_4: vavatthāne khamati sahatīti khantīti vuccati. Sammattaniyāmanti ariyamaggaṃ. So hi
anya-e0104n0:1290_5: sammādiṭṭhiādisammattañceva anivattidhammatāya niyāmo cāti vuccati. “Ādinā nayenā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1290_6: iminā “pañcakkhandhe dukkhato passanto anulomikaṃ khantiṃ paṭilabhati, khandhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1290_7: nirodho sukhaṃ nibbānanti passanto sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatī”ti evamādiko pāṭhaseso
anya-e0104n0:1290_10: nayenā”ti ettha nayaggahaṇena dīpitoti. Avaseso sabbo pāṭho pakāsito eva hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:1291_0: Kāmañcetaṃ cattārīsāya ākārehi sammasanaṃ anulomañāṇe bhāvetabbavidhānaṃ. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:1291_1: “anulomañāṇaṃ vibhajantena…pe… vutta”nti, ito paṭṭhāya pana kataparicayasseva kiccāvahaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1291_2: hotīti idhāpi vuttantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tassāpīti na kevalaṃ kalāpasammasanasseva, atha
anya-e0104n0:1291_3: kho yathādassitassa cattālīsappabhedassa aniccādisammasanassapi. Tañhi anulomikakhantipaṭilābhāya,
anya-e0104n0:1291_4: sammattaniyāmokkamanāya ca saṃvattanato ekaṃsato icchitabbaṃ. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0104n0:1292_0: “So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato samanupassanto anulomikāya khantiyā
anya-e0104n0:1292_1: samannāgato bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, anulomikāya khantiyā asamannāgato
anya-e0104n0:1292_2: sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, sammattaniyāmaṃ anokkamamāno
anya-e0104n0:1292_3: sotāpattiphalaṃ vā…pe… arahattaṃ vā sacchikarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. So vata,
anya-e0104n0:1293: Ādi sukkapakkho vitthāretabbo. Tathā “so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato, dukkhato, kañci dhammaṃ attato, anattato”ti vitthāretabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1294_0: 698. Ekekaṃ khandhaṃ aniccādisammasanassa vasena sammasatīti sambandho. Tassa pana
anya-e0104n0:1294_1: sammasanassa pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ sādhāraṇatāya “ekekaṃ khandha”nti vuttaṃ. Anaccantikatāyāti
anya-e0104n0:1294_2: accantikatābhāvato, asassatatāyāti attho. Sassatañhi accantikaṃ parāya koṭiyā abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1294_3: Ādiantavantatāyāti pubbāparakoṭivantatāya, udayabbayadhammatoti attho. Aniccato sammasatīti
anya-e0104n0:1295_0: Aniccatoti ca addhuvato. Etañhi na niccaṃ, khaṇikatāya asadābhāvitāya vā na iccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1295_1: na upagantabbanti aniccaṃ. Uppādavayapaṭipīḷanatāyāti uppādena, vayena ca pati pati
anya-e0104n0:1295_2: khaṇe khaṇe taṃsamaṅgino vibādhanasabhāvattā, tehi vā sayameva vibādhetabbattā. Udayabbayavanto
anya-e0104n0:1295_3: hi dhammā abhiṇhaṃ tehi paṭipīḷitā eva honti, yā pīḷanā “saṅkhāradukkhatā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:1295_4: Dukkhavatthutāyāti tividhassāpi dukkhassa, saṃsāradukkhassa ca adhiṭṭhānabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1295_5: Paccayayāpanīyatāyāti yathārahaṃ paccayehi yāpetabbatāya. Rogamūlatāyāti mūlabyādhi
anya-e0104n0:1295_6: viya anubandhabyādhīnaṃ mūlabhāvato, padadvayenāpi yāpyarogasadisatoti dasseti. Yāpyabyādhi
anya-e0104n0:1295_7: hi rogo itaro ābādhoti. Dukkhatāsūlayogitāyāti tividhadukkhatāsaṅkhātena rujjanena
anya-e0104n0:1295_9: ca rāgādikilesāsucivissandanato. Ahutvā sambhavato uppattiyā uddhumātatā.
anya-e0104n0:1296_0: Antotudanatāyāti abbhantare tudanato. Dukkhavedanādayo viya hi ime saṅkhārā attabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:1296_1: abbhantaragatā eva udayabbayavasena tudanti. Ariyamaggasaṇḍāsena vinā nīharituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
anya-e0104n0:1296_2: dunnīharaṇīyatā taṇhādiṭṭhābhinivesadaḷhabhāvato. Aghanti pāpaṃ viya ariyajanehi
anya-e0104n0:1296_3: vigarahitabbaṃ. Sattānaṃ anatthajananato avaḍḍhiāvahaṃ, pāpassa ca vatthubhūtaṃ khandhapañcakanti
anya-e0104n0:1296_4: āha “vigaraha…pe… aghato”ti. Aseribhāvajanakatāyāti paravasatājananato. Yathā gilāno
anya-e0104n0:1296_5: aññehi saṃvesanavuṭṭhāpanādinā parapaṭibaddhasarīravuttiko aserī, evametepi aseribhāvajanakā.
anya-e0104n0:1296_6: Avasatāyāti avasavattanato. Yathā parosatanto puriso parassa vasaṃ na gacchati, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1296_7: subhasukhādibhāvena vase vattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyato. Avidheyyatāyāti “mā jīratha, mā
anya-e0104n0:1296_8: mīyathā”tiādinā vidhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyato. Palujjanatāyāti byādhiādīhi pakārehi chijjanato
anya-e0104n0:1296_9: vinassanato. Tehi eva vā ābyasanato. Byasanattho hi lokasaddo, pasaddo bhusattho
anya-e0104n0:1296_10: daṭṭhabbo. Byādhiādīhi ca khandhānaṃ byasananti. Byasanāvahabhāvena etīti īti, āgantukānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1296_11: akusalapakkhiyānaṃ byasanahetūnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Khandhā ca edisāti āha “anekabyasanāvahatāya ītito”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1297_0: Upaddavatīti upaddavo, anatthaṃ janento abhibhavati ajjhottharatīti attho, rājadaṇḍādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1297_1: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Khandhā ca edisāti vuttaṃ “aviditānaṃ…pe… upaddavato”ti. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikabhayāvahato,
anya-e0104n0:1297_2: abhayapaṭipakkhato ca khandhā bhayanti āha “sabbabhayānaṃ…pe… bhayato”ti. Bahiddhā
anya-e0104n0:1297_3: ñātibyasanādīhi, ajjhattaṃ rāgādīhi anatthehi upasajjanaṭṭhena, upasaggasadisatāya
anya-e0104n0:1297_4: ca upasaggo. Upasaggoti ca devatūpasaṃhāravasena pavatto byādhiādianattho. So atthakāmena
anya-e0104n0:1297_5: muhuttampi na ajjhupekkhitabbo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “anekehi…pe… upasaggato”ti. Dosūpasaṭṭhatāyāti
anya-e0104n0:1297_6: ārammaṇato, sampayogato ca rāgādidosehi upetatāya. Lokadhammā lābhādihetukā anunayapaṭighā,
anya-e0104n0:1298_0: Upakkamenāti attano, parassa vā payogena. Sarasenāti sabhāvena. Pabhaṅgupagamanasīlatā
anya-e0104n0:1298_1: bhiduratā. Sabbāvatthanipātitāyāti rukkhaphalaṃ viya atitaruṇakālato paṭṭhāya sabbāsu
anya-e0104n0:1298_2: avatthāsu nipatanasīlatāya. Anipatassapi sabbena sabbaṃ asāratāya thirabhāvassa abhāvatāya.
anya-e0104n0:1298_3: Thirañhi dhuvaṃ nāma hoti. Tāyituṃ rakkhituṃ asamatthatāya na tāyanoti atāyano, tabbhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1298_4: atāyanatā. Tāṇāsīsāya upagatassa alabbhaneyyakhematā. Dukkhabhītiyā upalīyanādhippāyena
anya-e0104n0:1298_5: allīyituṃ. Dukkhanivattanaṃ leṇakiccaṃ. Jātiādibhayānaṃ hiṃsanaṃ vidhamanaṃ bhayasārakattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1298_6: Yathāparikappitehīti paramatthato avijjamānehi bālehi parikappitappakārehi. Rittatāyāti
anya-e0104n0:1298_7: vivittatāya, virahitatāyāti attho. Antosārābhāvo rittatā. Sā eva ca tucchatāti āha
anya-e0104n0:1298_8: “rittatāyeva tucchato”ti. Appakattāti parittattā, lāmakattā vā. Dhuvasārābhāvādīhi
anya-e0104n0:1298_9: saddhiṃ attasārābhāvaṃ rittapadena vatvā nibbattitamattasārābhāvameva suññapadena
anya-e0104n0:1298_10: dassetuṃ “sāmi…pe… suññato”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā kenaci sāmiādilakkhaṇena attanā suññā
anya-e0104n0:1298_11: ete, evaṃ sayampi ataṃsabhāvoti āha “sayañca…pe… anattato”ti. Na attāti hi anattāti.
anya-e0104n0:1299_0: Pavattidukkhatāyāti bhavapavattidukkhabhāvato. Bhavapavatti ca pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1299_1: aniccādiākārena pavattanameva, so ca ādīnavo. Yathāha “yaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhā
anya-e0104n0:1299_2: aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ādīnavo”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1299_3: Tenāha “dukkhassa ca ādīnavatāyā”ti. Ādīnanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso yathā “ekamanta”nti,
anya-e0104n0:1299_4: ativiya kapaṇanti attho. Bhusattho hi ayaṃ ā-kāro. Yathā “dvidhā chiddakaṃ vicchiddaka”nti
anya-e0104n0:1299_5: ettha dvi-saddassa atthe vi-saddo, evamidhāpīti āha “dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāya vipariṇāmadhammato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1299_6: Vipariṇāmo ca viparītasabhāvāpatti. Dubbalatāyāti sarasabhiduratāya balābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1299_7: Dubbalampi kiñci mudukammaññābhāvena duppadhaṃsiyā. Ime pana supadhaṃsiyā evāti āha
anya-e0104n0:1299_8: “pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyatāya cā”ti. Aghassa pāpassa hetutā aghahetutā. Khandhapaṭibaddhameva
anya-e0104n0:1299_9: hi sabbaṃ kibbisanti. Ime rūpādayo sukhahetu, na dukkhahetūti janitavissāsānaṃ hananasīlatāya,
anya-e0104n0:1299_10: khandhesu hi “etaṃ mamā”ti gāhavasena sattā byasanaṃ pāpuṇanti, vissāsaṃ vā hanantīti
anya-e0104n0:1300_0: Vigatabhavatāyāti apagatavaḍḍhitāya. Vibhavataṇhā, vibhavadiṭṭhi ca vibhavo uttarapadalopena,
anya-e0104n0:1300_1: tato vibhavato, pitusadisassa vā sabhāvahetuno vibhavato vināsato sambhūtatāya. Āsavānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1300_2: ārammaṇādinā paccayabhāvo āsavapadaṭṭhānatā. Bījādiko asādhāraṇo hetu, bhūtasalilādiko
anya-e0104n0:1300_3: sādhāraṇo paccayo. Esa nayo ajjhattepi. Tehi samecca sambhūya kato saṅkhato. Maccumārassa
anya-e0104n0:1300_4: adhiṭṭhānabhāvena, kilesamārassa paccayabhāvena saṃvaḍḍhanato āmisabhūtatā, khandhāpi
anya-e0104n0:1300_5: khandhānaṃ āmisabhūtā paccayabhāvena saṃvaḍḍhanato, tadantogadhā abhisaṅkhārā. Devaputtamārassa
anya-e0104n0:1300_6: pana “mameta”nti adhimānavasena āmisabhāvoti khandhādimārānampi imesaṃ yathārahaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1300_9: Saṃkilesattayaggahaṇena tadekaṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ kilesavatthūnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1300_10: Tadārammaṇāpi hi dhammā tadanativattanato saṃkilesikā eva. Tathā khuddā, taṇhā, jaṭādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1301_0: Cattārīsāpi sammasanāni tīsu anupassanāsu antogadhānevāti tadantogadhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1301_1: “ettha hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aniccānupassanāni sarūpato, pariyāyato ca aniccabhāvavibhāvanato.
anya-e0104n0:1302: Ettāvatā kalāpato dhamme saṅgahetvā nayato sammasanamattaṃ dassitaṃ, na tāva anupadadhammavipassanā vihitāti “sammasanārambhavidhāna”nti. Vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1304_1: uppajjati, itarassa nuppajjati. Taṃ sandhāya “yassa pana…pe… na sampajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1304_2: Udayabbayañāṇuppatti hi idha nayavipassanāya sampajjananti adhippetaṃ. Tena “navahākārehi
anya-e0104n0:1304_3: indriyāni tikkhāni bhavanti…pe… antarā ca abbosānenā”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ navannaṃ ākārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1304_4: vasena indriyāni tikkhāni katvā sappāyāni sevamānena sammasitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1305_0: Tenāti yoginā. Navahākārehīti vakkhamānehi navahi ākārehi. Indriyānīti saddhādīni
anya-e0104n0:1305_1: indriyāni. Tikkhānīti tikhiṇāni visadāni sūrāni. Uppannuppannānanti khaṇe khaṇe uppannānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1305_2: uppannānaṃ. Saṅkhārānanti vipassiyamānānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ. Khayamevāti paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1305_3: uppādaṃ disvā taṃ muñcitvā khayameva bhaṅgameva passati. Tassa tathākhayadassanapasutassa
anya-e0104n0:1305_4: vipassanāpaññā tikkhā sūrā vahati, itarāni ca indriyāni. Tatthāti khayadassane. Sakkaccakiriyāyāti
anya-e0104n0:1305_5: ādarakāritāya, yathā khayadassanaparameneva vipassanāñāṇaṃ pavattati, evaṃ taṃ ādarajāto
anya-e0104n0:1305_6: sampādeti. Sātaccakiriyāyāti avicchedakiriyāya, yathā vipassanāñāṇaṃ khayadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1305_7: nirantarameva pavattati, evaṃ yuttappayutto naṃ sampādeti. Sappāyakiriyāyāti anurūpakiriyāya
anya-e0104n0:1305_9: uppanno, tassa ākārassa sallakkhaṇavasena samathanimittaggahaṇena sampādetīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1305_10: Anupavattanatāyāti anurūpato pavattanena bhāvanācittassa līnabhāve pītivīriyadhammavicayasambojjhaṅgānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1305_11: uddhatabhāve passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgānaṃ brūhanenāti attho. Kāye ca jīvite
anya-e0104n0:1305_12: ca anapekkhatanti attano kāye asucibhāvena bāhirakaaviññāṇakakuṇape viya jīvite ahitāvahapaccatthike
anya-e0104n0:1305_13: viya nirapekkhacittaṃ upaṭṭhapeti. Tattha ca abhibhuyya nekkhammenāti tasmiṃ kāyacitte
anya-e0104n0:1305_14: anapekkhabhāvena indriyānaṃ tikkhabhāvāpādanena uppannaṃ uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ vīriyena
anya-e0104n0:1305_15: abhibhavitvā bhāvanaṃ sampādeti. Antarāti yathādhippetāya bhāvanāsiddhiyā antarāva.
anya-e0104n0:1306_0: Evaṃ vuttānanti evaṃ “navahākārehi indriyāni tikkhāni bhavantī”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1306_1: vuttānaṃ. Ettha ca yathā nāma sukhumānaṃ muttāpavāḷādīnaṃ vijjhane sukhumatarena
anya-e0104n0:1306_2: vedhanena bhavitabbaṃ, evameva saṇhasukhumānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ, paccayassa ca pariggaṇhane
anya-e0104n0:1306_3: tikkhena ñāṇena bhavitabbaṃ. Tesaṃ pana khayavayadassane tikkhatarena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1306_4: Tikkhataratā cassa nisānasilāyaṃ saṇhamaṭṭhatāya karaṇena viya pharasudhārāya nisitabhāvāpādanena
anya-e0104n0:1306_5: indriyānaṃ tikkhabhāvāpādanena sādhetabbā. Tañca yehi navahi ākārehi hoti, tesu khaṇikānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1306_6: saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanākāradassanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ “uppannuppannānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1306_7: khayameva passatī”ti. Asati ñāṇassa tikkhatarabhāve tadabhāvato sesindriyatikkhatā
anya-e0104n0:1306_8: tassa sambhārabhāvato vuttā, avinābhāvato vā. Sakkaccakiriyādiggahaṇaṃ pana tassa
anya-e0104n0:1306_9: upāyadassanaṃ. Asappāyāni bhojanādīni anupayujjanādivasena vajjetvā sappāyāni mattaso
anya-e0104n0:1306_10: sevamānena. Rūpārūpadhammānaṃ accantavidhuratāya ekajjhaṃ asammasitabbattā, tathā
anya-e0104n0:1306_11: sammasanassa ca idha anadhippetattā “kālena rūpaṃ sammasitabbaṃ, kālena arūpa”nti
anya-e0104n0:1306_12: vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi ca rūpassa oḷārikatāya suviññeyyattā paṭhamaṃ sammasitabbatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1306_13: Nibbatti passitabbāti paṭhamaṃ tāva āgamānusārato anumānavasena daṭṭhabbā. Tato paraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1308_0: 700. Sabbesanti kāmāvacarādiaṇḍajādibhedabhinnānaṃ sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ kammato
anya-e0104n0:1308_1: nibbattati taṃmūlakattā utujādirūpānaṃ. Parato pavattanakakāyadasakādivasena labbhamānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1309_0: Dandhaṃ mandaṃ cirena nirodho etassāti dandhanirodhaṃ sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukattā.
anya-e0104n0:1309_1: Tenāha “garuparivattī”ti. Tenāti tasmā, yasmā “tato sīghataraṃ kho, bhikkhave, āyusaṅkhārā
anya-e0104n0:1309_2: khīyantī”ti vacanato rūpadhammāpi ittarakālā eva, arūpadhammā pana tehi sātisayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1309_3: ittarakālā, tasmā āha bhagavāti attho. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vicāritameva.
anya-e0104n0:1309_4: Tehi sadisāti cittassa uppādabhaṅgakkhaṇehi sadisā. Sabbesampi hi saṅkhārānaṃ uppādabhaṅgakkhaṇesu
anya-e0104n0:1309_5: visadisatā natthi, samānakālāva te. Ṭhānappattanti ṭhitikkhaṇappattaṃ. Tenāti dutiyabhavaṅgacittena.
anya-e0104n0:1309_6: Vatthurūpaṃ ekassa cittassa nissayo hutvā aññassa na hoti ṭhapetvā maraṇāsannaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1310_0: Evaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva cuticittassa uppatti, taṃ dassetvā idāni nirodhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1310_2: ṭhitikkhaṇe. Yāva pavatti nāma atthīti yāva saṃsārappavatti nāma atthi, yāva vā cittassa
anya-e0104n0:1310_3: pavatti nāma atthi. Asaññūpapattiyañhi natthi cittappavattīti. Rūpūpapattiyaṃ saṃsedajā
anya-e0104n0:1310_4: opapātikasadisāti opapātikānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ. Opapātikānampīti pi-saddena vā saṃsedaje
anya-e0104n0:1310_5: sampiṇḍeti. Sattasantativasenāti cakkhudasakādīnaṃ sattannaṃ santatisīsānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0104n0:1311_0: 701. Tatthāti kammato rūpapavattiyaṃ. Nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhūtaṃyeva idha kammanti
anya-e0104n0:1311_1: adhippetanti āha “kammaṃ nāma kusalākusalacetanā”ti. Jīvitanavakaṃ cakkhudasakādiantogadhameva
anya-e0104n0:1311_2: katvā “samasattatirūpa”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ vā cakkhudasakādi viya sukhapariggahaṃ na
anya-e0104n0:1311_3: hotīti. Tadevāti yathāvuttaṃ vipākakkhandhakaṭattārūpamāha. Kammañhi kammajassa janakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1311_4: paripācakampi hoti jīvitindriyassa, kammajaggino ca vasena anurakkhaṇasabbhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:1311_6: hotī”ti. Upatthambhakapaccayatā cassa upanissayapaccayavaseneva veditabbā. Kammaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1311_7: paccayo etassāti kammapaccayaṃ, tadeva cittaṃ, taṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ etassāti kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1311_8: Vipākacetasikānampi kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānatā vattabbā, na vā vattabbā kammasamuṭṭhānakammapaccayaggahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:1311_9: gahitattā. Ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti āhārānugate sarīreti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1312_0: Tatrāpīti kammasamuṭṭhānāhārasamuṭṭhānepi ojaṭṭhamake. Catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo
anya-e0104n0:1312_1: ghaṭetīti sadisasantativasena catasso vā pañca vā rūpakalāpappavattiyo santāneti.
anya-e0104n0:1312_2: Bāhirapaccayavisesena pana visadisā bahūpi pavattiyo ghaṭetīti vadanti. Yathā kammapaccayāhārasamuṭṭhāne
anya-e0104n0:1312_4: nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca yathā tattha tattha koṭṭhāse paramparappavattiṃ dassentena
anya-e0104n0:1312_5: akammajā dutiyādipavattiyo asambhedena dassitā, evaṃ kammajāhārasamuṭṭhānautuvasena,
anya-e0104n0:1312_7: ca sambhedavasenāpi rūpappavatti dassetabbāti vadanti. Tattha kammajato pavattaāhārā
anya-e0104n0:1312_8: visesapaccayalābhe sati yathāvuttaparimāṇāhi pavattīhi uddhampi pavattiyo na ghaṭentīti
anya-e0104n0:1312_9: na sakkā vattuṃ. Tathā hi “dasa dvādasa vāre pavattiṃ ghaṭetī”ti, “evaṃ dīghampi
anya-e0104n0:1312_10: addhānaṃ anupādinnapakkhe ṭhatvāpi utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pavattati evā”ti ca vakkhati.
anya-e0104n0:1313_0: 702. Janakājanakā matāti purimakā tikoṭṭhāsasaṅgahitā janakā, pacchimakoṭṭhāsikā
anya-e0104n0:1313_1: “soḷasā”ti vuttā ajanakāti matā ñātā. Kusalakiriyatoti kusalato ca kiriyato ca. Iriyāya
anya-e0104n0:1313_2: kāyikakiriyāya pavattiṭṭhānatāya pathabhāvato iriyāpatho, gamanādi, atthato tadavatthā
anya-e0104n0:1313_3: rūpappavatti. Kāmañcettha rūpavinimutto iriyāpatho, viññatti ca natthi, tathāpi na
anya-e0104n0:1313_5: Yaṃ pana cittaṃ viññattijanakaṃ, taṃ ekaṃsato itarassa janakaṃ avinābhāvato, tathā
anya-e0104n0:1313_6: iriyāpathūpatthambhakaṃ rūpassa. Etassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ “rūpaṃ, iriyāpathaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1313_7: viññattiñcā”ti samuccayo kato. Vipākavajjānīti ettha vipākābhiññādvayavajjānīti vattabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1313_8: tadaññesaṃyeva sesaggahaṇena gahetabbattā. Na vā vattabbaṃ sesaggahaṇeneva abhiññācittānampi
anya-e0104n0:1313_9: nivattetabbato. Na viññattiṃ janayanti mahaggatakusalādīnaṃ santabhāvena avipphārikabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1313_11: pana honti satipi santabhāve jhānavegena saussāhattā, yato tesaṃ javanakiccatā. Pañca
anya-e0104n0:1313_12: bhavaṅgacittānīti sambandho. Rūpameva janayanti, na iriyāpathaṃ nirussāhasantabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1313_14: niccalabhāvenāvaṭṭhānaṃ. Tathā hi abbokiṇṇe bhavaṅge pavattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti
anya-e0104n0:1313_15: paviṭṭhāni viya honti. “Dvattiṃsā”ti pana ādinā vuttesu jāgaraṇacittesu vattamānesu
anya-e0104n0:1313_17: sabbadubbalatāya rūpaṃ na janenti. Paṭisandhicittaṃ vatthudubbalatāya. Khīṇāsavānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1314_0: “Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1314_1: pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ, ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1314_2: arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhissati,
anya-e0104n0:1315_0: Pana vacanato aññesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti viññāyati. Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittassa
anya-e0104n0:1315_1: gabbhagatatādivibandhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpane kāraṇaṃ atthi, na ca yuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1315_2: cuto ca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañcassa pavattati, nāpi “cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1315_3: pāḷi atthi, “khīṇāsavāna”nti, pana visesanaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodhena nirujjhantassa
anya-e0104n0:1315_4: tesaṃ cuticittassa rūpasamuṭṭhāpanaṃ pākaṭanti katvā katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Soḷasa cittānīti
anya-e0104n0:1315_5: paricchijja gahaṇaṃ tesaṃ rūpajanane ekaṃsato niyametabbattā, aññāni pana bahūni
anya-e0104n0:1315_6: arūpe uppannāni anokāsagatattā rūpaṃ na janentiyeva. Na ṭhitikkhaṇe, bhaṅgakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:1315_7: vā rūpaṃ janentīti sambandho. Uppādakkhaṇe pana balavaṃ anantarādipaccayalābhato.
anya-e0104n0:1316_0: Yathā pathavīādayo rūpadhammā cittahetukā cittasamuṭṭhānā, evaṃ vedanādayopīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1316_1: “cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma tayo arūpino khandhā, saddanavaka”ntiādi. Tenevāha – “katame
anya-e0104n0:1316_2: dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānā? Vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho kāyaviññatti
anya-e0104n0:1316_3: vacīviññattī”ti. Tattha kāyaviññattiādīnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānatā pariyāyato vuttāti veditabbā
anya-e0104n0:1316_4: tesaṃ anipphannattā. “Evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpa”nti iminā ataṃsamuṭṭhānasseva
anya-e0104n0:1316_5: cittajarūpassa cittapaccayatā dassitā. Yathā pana kammapaccayaṃ dassitaṃ, evaṃ cittapaccaye
anya-e0104n0:1316_6: gayhamāne taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa, sahajātavedanādīnañca cittapaccayatā siyā. Cittasamuṭṭhānacittapaccaye
anya-e0104n0:1316_7: pana asaṅkarato dassetuṃ pacchājātapaccayavaseneva cittapaccayaṃ uddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1316_8: Cittasamuṭṭhānautuāhārehi kammasamuṭṭhānautuāhārā balavanto hontīti tesaṃ vasena
anya-e0104n0:1316_9: catupañcapavattighaṭanaṃ vuttaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ pana vasena dvattippavattighaṭanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1316_10: taṃpākatikacittavasena, mahaggatānuttaracittavasena pana bahutarāpi pavattiyo icchitabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1317_0: 703. “Upādinnaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā”ti etena bahiddhā anupādinnaojā rūpāharaṇakiccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1317_1: na karotīti dasseti. Paccayalābho cassa kammajabhūtasannissayatāvasenāti āha “tattha
anya-e0104n0:1317_4: āhāro na kevalaṃ upatthambhakova, atha kho janakopīti dassetuṃ “catusamuṭṭhānarūpa”nti
anya-e0104n0:1317_5: vuttaṃ. “Dasa dvādasa vāre”ti vatvā kathaṃ imasseva dasa dvādasa vāre pavattighaṭanāti
anya-e0104n0:1317_6: anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “ekadivasaṃ paribhuttāhāro”tiādi. Dārakassa sarīraṃ pharitvāti
anya-e0104n0:1317_7: nābhimūlānugatāhi rasaharaṇīhi pharitvā, aññathā jalābuantarike kāye makkhanāvasena
anya-e0104n0:1318_0: Upādinnako anupādinnakoti duvidhe āhāre pubbe anupādinnako āhārapaccayaāhāro dassitoti
anya-e0104n0:1318_1: itaraṃ dassetuṃ “kammajāhāro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ kammapaccayāhārasamuṭṭhāne vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n0:1318_2: Tenāha “catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭetī”ti. Āhārapaccayautunopi utupaccayāhārassa
anya-e0104n0:1318_3: viya dasa dvādasa vāre pavattighaṭanā veditabbā. Vuttanayattā na uddhatanti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:1318_4: Sesānanti kammacittautusamuṭṭhānānaṃ tisantatirūpānaṃ. Kabaḷīkārāhāro hi aññāhārasamuṭṭhitassa,
anya-e0104n0:1318_5: tisantatirūpānañca upatthambhakavasena attanā uppāditassa janako hutvā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1318_6: Evaṃ āhārapaccayo hontoyeva atthiavigatavasenāpi paccayo hoti, nissayabhāvo pana
anya-e0104n0:1318_7: paṭṭhānanayena natthi. Āhārapaccayā pavattamānāni rūpāni āhāranissayāni nāma hontīti
anya-e0104n0:1318_8: suttantanayena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. Parato utuno nissayajotanāyapi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:1319_1: “utu nāma catusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātū”ti vuttaṃ. Esa duvidho hotīti esa utu tejodhātubhāvāvisesepi
anya-e0104n0:1319_2: tikkhamandatāvisesena uṇho, sītoti duvidho hoti. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:1319_3: vicāritameva. Yadipi utu upādinnakena vināpi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, indriyabaddhe pana
anya-e0104n0:1319_4: tena vinā tassa rūpuppādanaṃ natthīti āha “upādinnakaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā”ti. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:1319_5: “catusamuṭṭhāno utū”ti. Utusamuṭṭhānoyeva hi utu upādinnakena vinā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0104n0:1319_6: Utupaccayaṃ nāma catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ rūpaṃ. Yañhi utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pannarasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1319_7: yañca tadaññatisantatirūpaṃ, tassa sabbassapi sabhāgo utuupatthambhakapaccayo hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:1319_8: Yasmā visabhāgo utu himādi viya padumādīnaṃ visadisarūpuppattihetubhūtaṃ purimarūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1319_9: vināsentaṃ viya hoti, tasmā sabhāgaṃ, visabhāgañca ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ “utu catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1319_10: pavattiyā ca vināsassa ca paccayo hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1320_0: Dīghampi addhānanti “dasa dvādasa vāre”ti aññassa vuttaparicchedato dīghampi kālaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1320_1: Utu hi sabhāgasantativasena laddhapaccayaṃ ciratarampi kālaṃ sadisākāraṃ rūpappavattiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1320_2: santāneti upādinnakasannissayena vinā, pageva itarathā. Tenāha “anupādinnapakkhe
anya-e0104n0:1320_4: matakaḷevarādivasenāti adhippāyo. Rūpassa nibbattiyā diṭṭhāya tassa bhaṅgopi diṭṭhoyeva
anya-e0104n0:1320_5: hoti ittarakālattā dhammappavattiyāti āha “nibbattiṃ passanto kālena rūpaṃ sammasati
anya-e0104n0:1320_6: nāmā”ti. Na hi nibbattimattadassanaṃ sammasanaṃ nāma hoti, udayabbayadassanañca adhikatanti.
anya-e0104n0:1323_0: Nibbattati taṃtaṃbhavavasena. Tadeva ekūnavīsatippabhedaṃ cittaṃ bhavaṅgavasena nibbattatīti
anya-e0104n0:1323_1: sambandho. Tathā cutivasena tadārammaṇavasenāti etthāpi. Tatthāti tesu ekūnavīsaticittuppādesu.
anya-e0104n0:1324_0: So pana paṭisandhicittānaṃyeva pavattiyaṃ pavattanākāroti suddhappavatticittānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1324_2: cakkhussā”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “cakkhupasādassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1324_3: “Ṭhitippattamevā”ti iminā yathā nirujjhamānaṃ rūpaṃ kassaci paccayo na hoti, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1324_4: uppajjamānampīti dasseti. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjatīti sambandho. Evaṃ sesesupi. Kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyacittesu
anya-e0104n0:1324_5: ekaṃ vā pañca, satta vā javanāni hutvā uppajjatīti sambandho. Upekkhāsahagatāhetukaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1324_6: cittaṃ vāti vā-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Voṭṭhabbanañhi sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1324_7: taṃ pana dutiyamoghavāravasena veditabbaṃ. Pañca javanāni suttamucchitādikāle, satta
anya-e0104n0:1324_8: pākatikakāle veditabbāni. Javanārammaṇānurūpanti “tihetukaṃ ce javanaṃ, tihetukaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1324_9: dvihetukaṃ vā”tiādinā, “iṭṭhaṃ ce ārammaṇaṃ, somanassasahagata”ntiādinā ca javanassa,
anya-e0104n0:1325: Anukkamenāti udayabbayañāṇādhigamānukkamena paññābhāvanaṃ sampādeti arahattaṃ adhigacchati.
anya-e0104n0:1327_0: 706. Rūpesu manasikārasattakaṃ rūpasattakaṃ, rūpadhammesu sattahākārehi manasi kārotīti
anya-e0104n0:1327_1: attho. Evaṃ arūpasattakampi veditabbaṃ. Imehi ākārehīti imehi ādānanikkhepanamanasikārādippakārehi,
anya-e0104n0:1327_2: imehi vā yathāvuttakoṭṭhāsehi. Āropetvāti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā.
anya-e0104n0:1328_0: Ādānanikkhepanatoti bhavassa gahaṇavissajjanato, jātito, maraṇato cāti attho. Vayovuḍḍhatthagāmitoti
anya-e0104n0:1328_1: vayasā vuḍḍhassa atthagāmibhāvato, atthaṅgamato icceva attho. Āhāratoti āhārahetu,
anya-e0104n0:1328_3: kammānapekkhaṃ sabhāvasiddhaṃ rūpaṃ dhammatārūpaṃ. Sattāti sattadhā sattahākārehi.
anya-e0104n0:1328_4: Vipassatīti taṃ taṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassati sammasati.
anya-e0104n0:1329_0: “Bhārādānaṃ dukhaṃ loke”ti vacanato khandhabhārassa ādito gahaṇanti katvā “ādānanti
anya-e0104n0:1329_1: paṭisandhī”ti āha. “Sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke samussaya”nti pana vacanato
anya-e0104n0:1329_2: khandhabhāranikkhepoti katvā “nikkhepananti cutī”ti vuttaṃ. “Yo ciraṃ jīvati, so
anya-e0104n0:1329_3: vassasata”nti vacanato tato ūnādhikabhāvo appamāṇanti vuttaṃ “ekaṃ vassasataṃ paricchinditvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1329_4: Etthantare sabbe saṅkhārāti etasmiṃ ādānanikkhepantare pavattā sabbe bhūtupādāyarūpappabhedā
anya-e0104n0:1329_5: saṅkhārā. Rūpadhammesu hi idaṃ sammasanavidhānanti. “Aniccā”ti gahitamattaṃ yuttito
anya-e0104n0:1329_6: hadaye patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ “kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha uppādavayavattitoti uppajjanavasena,
anya-e0104n0:1329_7: nirujjhanavasena ca pavattanato, ahutvā sambhavato hutvā vayūpagamanatoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1329_8: Vipariṇāmatoti santānassa purimuttaravisadisabhāvatoti vadanti. Taṃ vassasataparicchinne
anya-e0104n0:1329_9: rūpe idaṃ sammasananti adhippāyeneva vuttaṃ siyā, jarāmaraṇena vipariṇāmetabbatoti
anya-e0104n0:1329_10: attho. Asatipi dhammabhede avatthābhedo icchitabbo. Na hi uppādāvatthā eva bhaṅgāvatthāti
anya-e0104n0:1329_11: yuttā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “jarāya ceva maraṇena cāti dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāyā”ti. Sabhāvavigamo
anya-e0104n0:1329_12: eva vā ettha vipariṇāmo. Khaṇikatā tāvakālikatā. Niccasabhāvābhāvo eva niccapaṭikkhepo.
anya-e0104n0:1329_13: Aniccadhammā hi teneva attano sabhāvena jānantānaṃ niccataṃ paṭikkhipanti nāma. Yato
anya-e0104n0:1329_14: na niccanti aniccaṃ, uppādakkhaṇe yadavatthā saṅkhārā, na tadavatthā ṭhitikkhaṇeti
anya-e0104n0:1329_15: avatthantarappattiyā ñāyati tesaṃ kilamanākāroti āha “ṭhitiyaṃ jarāya kilamantī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:1329_16: svāyamattho pākaṭajarāya veditabbo. Ye pana saṅkhārānaṃ ṭhitiṃ na sampaṭicchanti,
anya-e0104n0:1329_17: tattha vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Dhammānaṃ sabhāvo nāma duratikkamo jarānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1329_18: bhaṅgoti āha “jaraṃ patvā avassaṃ bhijjantī”ti. Tasmāti yasmā uppādajarābhaṅgavasena
anya-e0104n0:1329_19: saṅkhārānaṃ nirantarabādhatā, tato ca nesaṃ dussahatāya dukkhamatā, tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1329_20: saṃsāradukkhassa ca adhiṭṭhānatāya dukkhavatthutā, tasmā. Abhiṇha…pe… dukkhāti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1330_0: “Sukhapaṭikkhepato”ti idaṃ vuttanayameva. Ṭhitiṃ mā pāpuṇantu, uppajjamānākāreneva
anya-e0104n0:1330_1: pavattantūti adhippāyo. “Uppannā”ti iminā uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitā vuttā. Ṭhānappattā
anya-e0104n0:1330_2: mā jīrantūti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu atthato ṭhiti eva jarāti? Saccametaṃ, jarāvasena
anya-e0104n0:1330_3: pana yo kilamatho, so idha jarāggahaṇena gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mā bhijjantūti niccataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1330_4: āsīsati. Kassaci dhammissarassāpi bhagavato vasavattibhāvo natthi. Na hi lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1330_5: kenaci kātuṃ sakkā. Bhāvaññathattameva hi iddhivisayo. Suññā saṅkhārā tena tīsu ṭhānesu
anya-e0104n0:1330_7: tato suññato, na nissabhāvatoti ekaccaparikappitasabhāvasuññato. Assāmikatoti sāmibhūtassa
anya-e0104n0:1330_8: kassaci abhāvato. Etena anattaniyataṃ dasseti. Avasavattitoti yathāvuttavasavattibhāvābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1330_10: dhammānaṃ bāhirakaparikappitaattaviraho vutto, iminā pana ataṃsabhāvato attā na hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:1331_1: catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhā, “suññato”tiādinā catūhi kāraṇehi anattāti rūpadhamme niruḷhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1331_2: lakkhaṇattayaṃ pubbe attanā asallakkhitaṃ sallakkhetvā sammasanto taṃ tattha āropetīti
anya-e0104n0:1331_3: vuccati. Tathā panānena ādānanikkhepanavasena sammasitattā āha “rūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1332_0: Tattha ca yasmā aniccalakkhaṇaggahaṇapubbakaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ, dukkhalakkhaṇaggahaṇapubbakaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1332_1: vā anattalakkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ. Aniccalakkhaṇañcettha rūpabhedena dassiyamānaṃ yathoḷārikato
anya-e0104n0:1332_2: dīpetabbanti taṃ vassasataparicchedena paṭhamaṃ dassentena vassasataṃ ṭhitassa “dasa
anya-e0104n0:1332_3: vā vīsati vā”tiādinā vibhajitvā anukkamena yāvauddharaṇādikoṭṭhāsavasena rūpassa
anya-e0104n0:1332_4: bhaṅgaṃ disvā tato “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato
anya-e0104n0:1332_5: sammasananti dassetuṃ “tameva vassasata”ntiādinā vayavasena rūpassa sammasanavidhi
anya-e0104n0:1332_6: āraddho. Tattha yasmā oḷārikavasenevāyaṃ ādito rūpabhedo gayhati, tasmā na vassasataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1332_7: samakoṭṭhāsavasena vibhattaṃ, majjhimāvatthāya vā tathārūpattā majjhimavaye ekaṃ vassaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1333: 708. Mandatābāhullena pavattaṃ vassānaṃ dasakaṃ mandadasakaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0104n0:1334_0: Tadāti paṭhame vassadasake. Soti puggalo. Capaloti anavaṭṭhitakiriyatāya taralo.
anya-e0104n0:1334_1: Tena momūhabhāvato viseseti. Na hesa navamadasake viya momūhabhāvena mando, atha
anya-e0104n0:1334_2: kho capalatāyāti. Tenāha “kumārako”ti. Tatiye dasake maṃsapāripūriyā yathārahaṃ chavivaṇṇo
anya-e0104n0:1334_3: vippasīdatīti āha “vaṇṇāyatanaṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti. Catutthe dasake aṭṭhīnaṃ, nhārūnañca
anya-e0104n0:1334_4: thirabhāvappattiyā balañca thāmo ca vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti. Pañcame dasake yobbanamadassa
anya-e0104n0:1334_5: dūrībhāvena yebhuyyena kilesatanutāya paññā yathārahaṃ suvisadā hoti. Khiḍḍāya rati
anya-e0104n0:1334_6: khiḍḍārati. Kapallikādinissayavisesena padīpassa suddhatādi viya nissayavisesena
anya-e0104n0:1334_7: pañcamachaṭṭhadasakesu paññāya buddhihāniyo veditabbā. Purato pabbhāro hoti kaṭisandhigīvāsandhīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1334_8: vasena rassassāpi, pageva dīghassa. Pabbhāroti ca garubhāvena palambako. Momūho hoti
anya-e0104n0:1334_9: satipaññāvippavāsato. Sayanabahulova hoti ṭhānādivasena sarīrabhāraṃ vahituṃ asakkonto.
anya-e0104n0:1335: 709. Tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassānanti yebhuyyatāya vuttaṃ. Catuvassikopi hi eko koṭṭhāso hotīti. Dvisataṃ koṭṭhāse katvā ekekaayanavasenātipi veditabbaṃ.
