anya-e0104n0:1337_0: Taṃ pana vassānaṃ dvidhā samattaṃ, na pubbe viya catumāsanti āha “dvemāsa”nti. Accantasaṃyoge
anya-e0104n0:1337_1: cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. So pana vassāno utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā
anya-e0104n0:1337_2: sarado, migasiraphussamāsā hemanto, māghaphaggunamāsā sisiro, cittavesākhamāsā vasanto,
anya-e0104n0:1337_3: jeṭṭhāsaḷhamāsā gimho utūti veditabbo. Cha koṭṭhāse katvāti dasadasanāṭikāvasena cha koṭṭhāse katvā.
anya-e0104n0:1338_0: 710. Abhimukhaṃ purato kamanaṃ abhikkamo. Paṭinivattanavasena kamanaṃ paṭikkamo.
anya-e0104n0:1338_1: Āmukhaṃ lokanaṃ ālokanaṃ. Vividhaṃ ito cito ca lokanaṃ vilokanaṃ. Hatthapādānaṃ saṅkucanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1339_0: Pāduddharaṇakāleti dutiyapāduddharaṇakāle. Pādassāti uddhaṭapādassa. Omattāti sattito
anya-e0104n0:1339_1: hīnappamāṇā. Tenāha “mandā”ti. Itarāti tejovāyodhātuyo. Yathā pādassa uddharaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1339_2: sijjhati, tathā pavattacittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu ekaṃsato tejovāyodhātūnaṃ adhimattatā
anya-e0104n0:1339_3: icchitabbā sallahukasabhāvatāya tāsaṃ. Tato eva ca itarāsaṃ omattatā garusabhāvattā.
anya-e0104n0:1339_4: Taṃsambandhattā pana sesaṃ tisamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ taggatikameva hoti. Kāyavacīviññattipavattiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1339_5: vāyopathavīadhimattatā imassa atthassa nidassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purato haraṇe, pacchato
anya-e0104n0:1339_6: haraṇe ca uddharaṇe viya sallahukasabhāvarūpappavattīti tāsaṃyeva dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1339_7: adhimattatā icchitabbāti āha “tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū”ti. Yathā uddharaṇādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1339_8: sallahukasabhāvattā pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ kiccaṃ adhikaṃ hoti, itarāsaṃ hīnaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1339_9: evaṃ vossajjanādīsu tīsu garusabhāvattā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kiccaṃ adhikaṃ hoti, itarāsaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1340_0: Tadupādāyarūpānīti tā dhātuyo nissāya pavattaupādārūpāni. Etthevāti uddharaṇeyeva.
anya-e0104n0:1340_1: Tenāha “atiharaṇaṃ appatvā”ti. Itīti evaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse.
anya-e0104n0:1340_2: Pabbaṃ pabbantiādi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ koṭṭhāsantarasaṅkarābhāvadassanaṃ. Taṭataṭāyantāti
anya-e0104n0:1340_3: taṭataṭāyanti viya, tena nesaṃ pavattikkhaṇassa ittarataṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1341_0: 711. Assāti sammasanassa. Dārutiṇukkādīsūti dāruukkātiṇukkādīsu. “Kiṃ andhabāla ekaghanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1341_1: satataṃ sabbadābhāviṃ ekanti maññasī”ti adhippāyenāha “kimettha manāpa”nti. Idampīti
anya-e0104n0:1341_2: yadidaṃ telavaṭṭikkhayena padīpassa apaññāyanaṃ vuttaṃ, idampi. Aṅgulaṅgulantareti
anya-e0104n0:1341_3: aṅguliyā mitaṃ aṅgulanti aṅgulappamāṇe padeseti attho. Tantuno avayavalesabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1342_0: Tatthātiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Tattha kāmaṃ upameyye viya upamāyaṃ pākaṭo kālabhedo
anya-e0104n0:1342_1: natthi, ekakoṭṭhāsagataṃ pana koṭṭhāsantaraṃ na pāpuṇātīti ettāvatā upamābhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1342_2: Upamāyampi vā tāva yāvāti kālassa bhedamattā labbhatevāti tassā gahaṇe kālabhedavasenāpi upamā yojetabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1343_0: 712. Pubbe ādānanikkhepādivasena catusantatirūpaṃ saṅgharitvā dassitaṃ, idāni āhārasamuṭṭhānādivasena
anya-e0104n0:1343_1: bhinditvā dassento “tadeva rūpaṃ visaṅkharitvā”tiādimāha. Tattha visaṅkharitvā vibhajitvā.
anya-e0104n0:1343_2: “Visaṅgharitvā”ti vā pāṭho, ayamevattho. Āhāramayanti āhārena nibbattaṃ. Jhattanti
anya-e0104n0:1343_3: milātaṃ. Kilantanti khinnaṃ. Dhātanti tittaṃ. Pīṇitanti maṃsūpacayasampattiyā pīṇitaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1343_4: Tato eva mudu. Siniddhanti siniddhacchavitāya saṇhaṃ. Tato eva phassavantaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1344: 713. Uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpanti uṇhasantāpena santattaṃ rūpaṃ sandhāyāha. Sītautunāti sappāyena sītautunā.
anya-e0104n0:1345_1: Kāyadvāreti pasādakāyadvāre. Manodvāraṃ nāma sāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ. Tassa nissayabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1345_2: hadayavatthuṃ sandhāya nissitavohārena “manodvāre”ti vuttaṃ, yattha manodvāruppatti.
anya-e0104n0:1347: Ayamatthoti ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno saṅkhārānaṃ atiittarakhaṇatāsaṅkhāto attho.
anya-e0104n0:1348_0: Jīvitanti jīvitindriyaṃ. Sukhadukkhāti sukhadukkhavedanā. Upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsu
anya-e0104n0:1348_1: eva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato. Attabhāvoti jīvitavedanāviññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhadhammā
anya-e0104n0:1348_2: vuttā. Saññāti keci. Kevalāti attanā niccabhāvena vā avomissā. Ekacittasamāyuttāti
anya-e0104n0:1348_3: ekekena cittena sahitā. Lahuso vattate khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko
anya-e0104n0:1349_0: Cullāsītisahassāni kappanti caturāsītisahassaparimāṇaṃ kappaṃ, accantasaṃyoge etaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1349_1: upayogavacanaṃ. Kappanti ca sāmaññavasena ekavacanaṃ. Marūti devā. Dvīhi cittehi
anya-e0104n0:1349_2: samohitāti evaṃ cirajīvinopi te dvīhi cittehi sahitā hutvā na tiṭṭhanti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1349_3: hoti – tesampi santāne jīvitādīni dvīhi cittehi saha na tiṭṭhanti, ekena cittena
anya-e0104n0:1349_4: saha uppannāni teneva saha nirujjhanato yāva dutiyā na tiṭṭhantīti.
anya-e0104n0:1350_0: Ye niruddhā marantassāti cavantassa sattassa cuticittena saddhiṃ niruddhāti vattabbā
anya-e0104n0:1350_1: ye khandhā. Tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhāti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa
anya-e0104n0:1350_2: bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhakkhandhā. Sabbepi sadisā te sabbepi ekasadisā atthaṅgatā appaṭisandhikā
anya-e0104n0:1350_3: puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā. Yathā hi cutikkhandhā na nibbattanti, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1350_4: tato pubbepi khandhā. Tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1351_0: Anantarā ca ye bhaggāti ye saṅkhārā anantarameva bhaggā niruddhā. Ye ca bhaggā anāgateti
anya-e0104n0:1351_1: ye ca saṅkhārā anāgate bhaggā bhañjanasīlā bhijjissanti. Tadantarā niruddhānanti
anya-e0104n0:1351_2: tesaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ antarā vemajjhe paccuppannataṃ patvā niruddhānaṃ bhaggānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1351_3: Vesamaṃ natthi lakkhaṇeti tesaṃ tividhānampi bhaṅgalakkhaṇanimittaṃ visamatā visadisatā natthi.
anya-e0104n0:1352_0: Anibbattena na jātoti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti, ajāto nāma hoti. Paccuppannena
anya-e0104n0:1352_1: vattamānena cittena jīvati jīvamāno nāma hoti. Cittabhaṅgā mato lokoti cuticittassa
anya-e0104n0:1352_2: viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato mato nāma
anya-e0104n0:1352_3: hoti niruddhassa appaṭisandhikattā. Evaṃ santepi paññatti paramatthiyā yāyaṃ taṃ
anya-e0104n0:1352_4: taṃ santaṃ sanissayaṃ cittaṃ upādāya “tisso jīvati, phusso jīvatī”ti evaṃ vacanappavattiyā
anya-e0104n0:1352_5: visayabhūtā santānapaññatti, sā ettha paramatthiyā paramatthabhūtā. Tathā hi vadanti
anya-e0104n0:1353_0: Anidhānagatā bhaggāti ye bhaggā, na te katthaci nidhānaṃ gatā, atha kho abhāvameva
anya-e0104n0:1353_1: gatā. Puñjo natthi anāgate yato āgaccheyyuṃ vattamānabhāvaṃ. Nibbattā yepīti ye paṭiladdhattabhāvā
anya-e0104n0:1353_2: paccuppannā, tepi āragge sāsapūpamā tiṭṭhanti. Yathā nāma sūciyaṃ ṭhitāyaṃ sāsapo
anya-e0104n0:1353_3: khitto tassā sikhaṃ phuṭṭhamatto vigacchati na tiṭṭhati, evaṃ saṅkhārā uppajjitvā
anya-e0104n0:1354: Bhaṅgo nesaṃ purakkhatoti tesaṃ nibbattadhammānaṃ bhaṅgo nāma purato eva kato, ekaṃsabhāvī na apasakkatīti attho. Purāṇehīti purimakehi atītehi.
anya-e0104n0:1355_0: Adassanatoti apassitabbato. Āyantīti āgacchanti. “Uppajjantī”ti imināpi kutoci rāsito
anya-e0104n0:1355_1: āgamanābhāvamevāha. Bhaggā gacchantudassananti bhaggāpi katthaci upagamanābhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1355_2: sabbena sabbaṃ adassanaṃ abhāvameva gacchanti. Tattha nidassanamāha “vijjuppādo…pe… vayanti cā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1356_1: “dhammatārūpa”nti anvatthanāmataṃ dasseti. Ayalohādīsu ayo nāma kāḷalohaṃ. Lohaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1356_2: nāma jātilohaṃ vijātilohaṃ kittimalohaṃ pisācalohanti catubbidhaṃ. Tattha ayo rajataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1356_3: suvaṇṇaṃ tipu sīsaṃ tambalohaṃ vekantakalohanti imāni satta jātilohāni. Nāganāsikalohaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1356_4: vijātilohaṃ. Kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ hārakūṭanti tīṇi kittimalohāni. Morakkhakādi pisācalohaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1356_5: Tattha tambalohaṃ vekantakanti imehi dvīhi jātilohehi saddhiṃ sesaṃ sabbampi idha
anya-e0104n0:1356_6: “loha”nti gahitanti. Tipūti setatipu. Sīsanti kāḷatipu. Suvaṇṇaṃ ākaruppannarasaviddhādibhedaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1356_7: Muttā sāmuddikamuttādi. Maṇīti veḷuriyalohitaṅgamasāragallāni ṭhapetvā avaseso sabbo
anya-e0104n0:1356_8: maṇiviseso. Veḷuriyo vaṃsavaṇṇamaṇi. Saṅkho sāmuddikasaṅkho. Silāti kāḷasilāpaṇḍusilādibhedā
anya-e0104n0:1356_9: sabbāpi ratanasammatasilā. Pavāḷaṃ nāma vaṭṭumaṃ viddhamaṃ. Lohitaṅgaṃ rattamaṇi.
anya-e0104n0:1356_10: Masāragallaṃ kabaramaṇi. Bhūmiādayo pākaṭāva. Tadassāti taṃ dhammatārūpaṃ assa yogino.
anya-e0104n0:1358_0: Soti yogī. Tanti asokarukkhapaṇṇaṃ. Pariggahetvāti ñāṇena paricchijja gahetvā. Iminā
anya-e0104n0:1358_1: nayenāti iminā asokapaṇṇe vuttena nayena. Sabbampi ayalohādibhedaṃ dhammatārūpaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1358_2: Tampi hi sītakāle sītalaṃ, uṇhakāle sūriyasantāpena uṇhataraṃ hoti. Tattha sītabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1358_3: pavattaṃ rūpaṃ uṇhaṃ uṇhabhāvena pavattaṃ rūpaṃ sītaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Tattha tattheva
anya-e0104n0:1361_0: Yasmā tattha phassapañcamakā dhammā sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇā supākaṭā, suviññeyyā
anya-e0104n0:1361_1: ca, tasmā tesaṃ vasena dassento “kalāpatoti phassapañcamakā dhammā”ti āha. Ye ime
anya-e0104n0:1361_2: sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā, sabbe te vinaṭṭhāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1362_0: Pavattaṃ cittanti sattasu ṭhānesu sammasanavasena pavattaṃ cittaṃ. Sammasantoti ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1362_1: gahetvā sammasanto. Taṃ yuttataranti taṃ ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ yuttataraṃ āsannabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1362_2: vibhūtataraṃ rūpasattake sammasanaṃ saha gahetvā sammasanassa vuttattā. Apica rūpasattake
anya-e0104n0:1362_3: sammasanassa rūpadhammesu sātisayaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā pavattattā tabbisayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1362_4: arūpasammasanaṃ sātisayaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇappaṭivedhāya sampavattatīti taṃ yuttataraṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1362_5: na pana apubbakesādisammasanaṃ katvā tabbisayaṃ pavattitaṃ. Tathā sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1362_6: navaṃ navaṃ eva siyā, pubbe gahitaṃ sammasanavisayaṃ chaḍḍetvā aññassa sammasanavisayassa
anya-e0104n0:1362_7: gaṇhanato. Sesānipīti yamakato sammasanādīnipi. Tenevāti ariyavaṃsakathānayeneva.
anya-e0104n0:1363_0: 718. Tampi cittanti ādānanikkhepato sammasanavasena pavattacittuppādampi. Cittasīsena
anya-e0104n0:1363_1: hi niddeso. Esa nayo sabbattha. Yamakato sammasati nāma nāmarūpadhamme ārabbha yugaḷavasena
anya-e0104n0:1363_2: sammasanassa pavattanato. Ayañhi pubbe rūpasattakavasena sammasitvā ṭhitopi idāni
anya-e0104n0:1363_3: ādānanikkhepādivasena sammasitvāva taṃ sammasati. Khaṇikato sammasanādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:1364_1: rūpaṃ sammasitacittaṃ, yaṃ rūpapariggāhakacittanti adhippetaṃ. Sammasitasammasitacittasammasanena
anya-e0104n0:1364_2: tesaṃ khaṇikabhāvassa vibhāvanato idaṃ sammasanaṃ “khaṇikato sammasana”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1365_1: sammasana”nti vuttaṃ. Vaṭṭeyyāti sambhaveyya. Tathā sati paṭipāṭisammasanapasutā
anya-e0104n0:1365_2: eva bhāvanā siyā, na mūlakammaṭṭhānupakārī, na cāyaṃ samāpatticāro. Yasmā ca tattakena
anya-e0104n0:1365_3: rūpadhammesu, arūpadhammesu ca aniccādilakkhaṇāni suṭṭhu vibhūtāni honti, tasmā vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1365_4: “yāva dasamacittasammasanā…pe… ṭhapetabba”nti. Ṭhapetabbanti ca na ekādasamaṃ dvādasamena
anya-e0104n0:1365_5: sammasitabbanti paṭipāṭito sammasanassa paricchedadassanaparaṃ, na tato sammasanato
anya-e0104n0:1365_6: oramanadassanaparaṃ, tasmā punapi rūpaṃ pariggahetvā yāva dasamacittasammasanā bhāvanamanuyuñjateva.
anya-e0104n0:1366_0: 721. Visuṃ sammasananayo nāma natthīti aniccādimanasikāravinimutto añño vipassanāmanasikāro
anya-e0104n0:1366_1: natthi. Vipassanāya ca diṭṭhiādivikkhambhanā idha diṭṭhiugghāṭanādayoti adhippetā.
anya-e0104n0:1366_2: Vipassanāya eva hi pavattivisesena diṭṭhiugghāṭanādayo ijjhantīti dassento “yaṃ paneta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1366_3: Tattha sattasaññāti sattā atthīti uppajjanakasaññā. Dubbalāya attadiṭṭhiyā sahagatasaññātipi
anya-e0104n0:1366_4: vadanti. Sattasaññaṃ ugghāṭitacittenāti sattasaññāya vikkhambhanavasena pavattacittena
anya-e0104n0:1366_6: hontīti. Māno nāma yo diṭṭhūpanissayo apāyagamanīyo, so diṭṭhiyā vikkhambhitāya vikkhambhito
anya-e0104n0:1366_7: eva hoti, diṭṭhiyā samucchinnāya samucchijjanatoti āha “diṭṭhiugghāṭita…pe… māno
anya-e0104n0:1366_8: nuppajjatī”ti. Māno vikkhambhiyamāno taṇhāya pavattiṃ nivāreti, abhimatavisayesu
anya-e0104n0:1366_9: eva taṇhāya pavattanatoti vuttaṃ “mānasamugghāṭita…pe… taṇhā nuppajjatī”ti. Taṇhāti
anya-e0104n0:1366_10: idha sukhumā nikanti adhippetāti āha “taṇhāya…pe… pariyādinnā nāma hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1368_0: Mama vipassanāti imassāpi attaniyasaññitāya vipassanāya sāmibhūto attā parāmasīyatīti
anya-e0104n0:1368_1: diṭṭhigāhatāti tathā “gaṇhato hi diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Kāmañcāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1368_3: asamugghāṭitattā anoḷārikāya ca diṭṭhiyā vasenevaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1369: Suṭṭhūti sammā. Manāpanti ca kiriyāvisesanaṃ, manavaḍḍhanākārenāti attho. Ubhayenāpi vipassanāvisayaṃ adhimānamāha. Tena vuttaṃ “mānasamugghāṭo nāma na hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1370_0: Vipassituṃ sakkomīti tattha samatthatāpadesena guṇavisesayogato vipassanāya assādetabbatā
anya-e0104n0:1370_1: dassīyati, cittaṃ vipassituṃ sakkomi. Tasmā vipassanto eva kālaṃ vītināmessāmīti
anya-e0104n0:1371_0: Yasmā diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāmettha visesato anattānupassanāya hoti, tasmā taṃ dassentena
anya-e0104n0:1371_1: “sace saṅkhārā”tiādinā anattānupassanāvidhiṃ vatvā yasmā pana anattato anupassantena
anya-e0104n0:1371_2: saṅkhārā aniccatopi dukkhatopi anupassitabbā eva tadupabrūhanato, tasmā “hutvā abhāvaṭṭhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1372: Yasmā mānasamugghāṭanaṃ nāma aniccānupassanāya hoti. Khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanake saṅkhāre passantassa kuto mānassa avasaro. Aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā asmimānasamugghāṭāyāti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1373_0: Yasmā nikantipariyādānaṃ nāma dukkhānupassanāya hoti. Na hi sabhāvato, dukkhavatthuto
anya-e0104n0:1373_1: ca dukkhabhūte saṅkhāre passantassa tattha īsakampi abhirato hoti. Assādānupassino
anya-e0104n0:1373_2: hi tattha taṇhā uppajjeyya. Sesaṃ anattalakkhaṇe vuttanayameva. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho
anya-e0104n0:1373_3: – vuttanayena paṭipāṭito sammasanaṃ pasutassa yogino yadā anattānupassanā tikkhā
anya-e0104n0:1373_4: sūrā visadā pavattati, itarā dvepi tadanugatikā, tadānena diṭṭhiugghāṭanaṃ kataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1373_5: hoti. Attadiṭṭhimūlikā hi sabbā diṭṭhiyo. Anattānupassanā ca attadiṭṭhiyā ujupaṭipakkhā.
anya-e0104n0:1374_0: Yadā pana aniccānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati, itarā dvepi tadanugatikā,
anya-e0104n0:1374_1: tadānena mānasamugghāṭanaṃ kataṃ hoti. Sati hi niccagāhe mānajappanā “idaṃ niccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1374_2: idaṃ dhuva”ntiādinā bakabrahmuno viya. Aniccānupassanā ca niccagāhassa ujupaṭipakkhā.
anya-e0104n0:1375_0: Yadā pana dukkhānupassanā tikkhā sūrā visadā pavattati, itarā dvepi tadanugatikā,
anya-e0104n0:1375_1: tadānena nikantipariyādānaṃ kataṃ hoti. Sati hi sukhasaññāya taṇhāgāhova, dukkhānupassanā
anya-e0104n0:1375_2: ca nikantiyā ujupaṭipakkhā. Evaṃ tissannaṃ anupassanānaṃ kiccavisesavasena diṭṭhiugghāṭanādīni
anya-e0104n0:1375_3: honti. Tena vuttaṃ “iti ayaṃ vipassanā attano attano ṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatī”ti. Anupassanānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1375_4: yathārahaṃ sakakiccakaraṇañhi sakaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhānaṃ, tasmā visuṃ sammasananayo natthīti
anya-e0104n0:1376_0: 722. Sabbākāratoti idha viya ekadesena avatvā sabbākārato sarūpato, kiccato ca anavasesato
anya-e0104n0:1376_1: vattabbā. Idhevāti tīraṇapariññāyameva. Ekaccānaṃyevettha anupassanānaṃ paṭilābhoti
anya-e0104n0:1376_2: āha “ekadesaṃ paṭivijjhanto”ti, tā pana sayameva sarūpato dassessati. Tappaṭipakkhe
anya-e0104n0:1376_3: dhammeti yā anupassanā idha sambhavanti, tāsaṃ paṭipakkhe dhamme niccasaññādike pajahati vikkhambheti.
anya-e0104n0:1377_0: Khayānupassananti saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgānupassanaṃ. Bhāventoti vaḍḍhento. Ghanasaññanti
anya-e0104n0:1377_1: santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ vasena ekattaggahaṇaṃ. Khayānupassananti hutvā abhāvānupassananti
anya-e0104n0:1377_2: vadanti. Yāya paññāya ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti passati, sā
anya-e0104n0:1377_3: khayānupassanā. Bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya tassā pāripūrīti ghanasaññāya pahānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1377_4: hoti, tato pubbe aparipuṇṇatāya taṃ na hoti. Evamaññatthāpīti paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇatā
anya-e0104n0:1377_5: pahānatīraṇapariññāsu vipassanāpaññāya daṭṭhabbā. Paccakkhato, anvayato ca saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1377_6: bhaṅgaṃ disvā tattheva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe adhimuttatā vayānupassanā, tāya āyūhanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1377_7: pajahati. Yadatthaṃ, yāya ca āyūhati, tasmiṃ pavatte taṇhāya cassa cittaṃ na namatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1377_8: Tena vuttaṃ “vayānupassanaṃ bhāvento āyūhanaṃ pajahatī”ti. Jātassa jarāmaraṇehi dvidhā
anya-e0104n0:1377_9: pariṇāmadassanaṃ, rūpasattakādivasena vā pariggahitassa taṃtaṃparicchedato paraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1377_10: aññabhāvadassanaṃ vipariṇāmānupassanā, tāya dhuvasaññaṃ thirabhāvagahaṇaṃ pajahati.
anya-e0104n0:1378_0: Animittānupassanādayo aniccānupassanādayo eva. Nimittanti santatiyaṃ, samūhe ca ekattasaññāya
anya-e0104n0:1378_1: gayhamānaṃ kālantarāvaṭṭhāyibhāvena, niccabhāvena ca saṅkhārānaṃ sakiccaparicchedatāya
anya-e0104n0:1378_2: saviggahaṃ viya upaṭṭhānamattaṃ. Paṇidhinti sukhapatthanaṃ, rāgādipaṇidhiṃ vā, atthato
anya-e0104n0:1378_3: taṇhāvasena saṅkhāresu ninnataṃ. Abhinivesanti attābhinivesaṃ. Etesañhi nimittādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1378_5: pahātabbā niccasaññādayo viya nimittaggāhādayova paṭipakkhāti daṭṭhabbā. Rūpādiārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1378_6: ñatvā tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā saṅkhārā eva bhijjanti, saṅkhārānaṃ maraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1378_7: na añño koci atthīti bhaṅgavasena suññataṃ gahetvā pavattā vipassanā adhipaññā ca
anya-e0104n0:1378_8: sā dhammesu ca vipassanāti adhipaññādhammavipassanā, tāya niccasārādiādānavasena
anya-e0104n0:1378_9: pavattaṃ abhinivesaṃ sataṇhaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahati. Yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ nāma sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1378_10: Tena “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti evamādikaṃ, “issarato loko sambhavatī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1378_11: evamādikañca sammohābhinivesaṃ pajahati. Bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena uppannaṃ sabbabhavādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1378_12: ādīnavadassanañāṇaṃ ādīnavānupassanā, tāya kassacipi ālayanissayaadassanato ālayābhinivesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1378_13: tathāpavattaṃ taṇhaṃ pajahati. Saṅkhārānaṃ muñcanassa upāyabhūtaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1378_14: paṭisaṅkhānupassanā, tāya aniccādīsu appaṭisaṅkhātattā paṭisaṅkhānassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1378_15: avijjaṃ pajahati. Saṅkhārupekkhā, anulomañāṇañca vivaṭṭānupassanā. Tassā hi vasena
anya-e0104n0:1378_16: tassa padumapalāse udakabindu viya sabbasaṅkhārehi cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati,
anya-e0104n0:1378_17: tasmā tāya saṃyogābhinivesaṃ kāmasaṃyogādikilesappavattiṃ pajahati. Aniccānupassanādayo
anya-e0104n0:1378_18: satta anupassanā heṭṭhā atthato vibhattāti, parato ca saṃvaṇṇīyantīti idha na vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1379_0: Tāsūti aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu. Imināti yoginā. Tasmāti aniccādilakkhaṇattayavasena
anya-e0104n0:1379_1: saṅkhārānaṃ diṭṭhattā. Taṃdassanañhi aniccādianupassanāti. Paṭividdhāti paṭiladdhā.
anya-e0104n0:1379_2: Yadaggena hi ñāṇena savisayo paṭividdho, tadaggena taṃ paṭiladdhaṃ nāma hoti. Byañjanameva
anya-e0104n0:1379_3: nānaṃ yathā “rukkho pādapo tarū”ti. Tāpi animittāpaṇihitasuññatānupassanā.
anya-e0104n0:1380_0: Sabbāpi vipassanā, tasmā ekadesena paṭividdhā hontīti adhippāyo. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyā
anya-e0104n0:1380_1: eva saṅgahitaṃ, tasmā taṃ pageva siddhanti attho. Tenāha “idampi dvayaṃ paṭividdhameva
anya-e0104n0:1380_2: hotī”ti. Sesesu nibbidānupassanādīsu dasasu. “Kiñci paṭividdhaṃ kiñci appaṭividdha”nti
anya-e0104n0:1380_3: iminā tesaṃ ekadesapaṭivedhamāha. Aniccānupassanāya hi siddhāya nirodhānupassanā,
anya-e0104n0:1380_4: khayānupassanā, vayānupassanā, vipariṇāmānupassanā ca ekadesena siddhā nāma honti,
anya-e0104n0:1380_5: dukkhānupassanāya siddhāya nibbidānupassanā, ādīnavānupassanā ca, anattānupassanāya siddhāya itarāti.
anya-e0104n0:1382_0: 723. Parato paṭipadāñāṇadassanakathāyaṃ abbhādivigamena ākāsassa viya, paṅkamalavigamena
anya-e0104n0:1382_1: udakassa viya, kāḷakāpagamena suvaṇṇassa viya saṃkilesavigamena ñāṇassa parisuddhīti
anya-e0104n0:1382_3: katattā vuttaṃ “sammasanañāṇassa pāraṃ gantvā”ti. Tattha sammasanañāṇassāti nayavipassanāsaṅkhātassa
anya-e0104n0:1382_4: kalāpasammasanañāṇassa. Tasseva hi thirabhāvāya itare sammasanavisesāti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:1382_6: sadisā hi sā. Tāya hi diṭṭhiugghāṭanādi sambhavatīti. Vitthārato bhāvanāvidhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1382_7: parato vattukāmo “saṅkhepato tāva ārabhatī”ti āha. Saṅkhepato hi ārambho ādikammikassa
anya-e0104n0:1383_1: vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ ñātabbanti ceti attho. Santatipaccuppanne, khaṇapaccuppanne vā
anya-e0104n0:1383_2: dhamme udayabbayadassanābhiniveso kātabbo, na atītānāgateti vuttaṃ “paccuppannānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1383_3: dhammāna”nti. Udayadassanañcettha yāvadeva vayadassanatthanti vayadassanassa padhānataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1383_4: dassetuṃ “vipariṇāmānupassane paññā”ti vatvā taṃ pana vayadassanaṃ udayadassanapubbakanti
anya-e0104n0:1384: Jātanti nibbattaṃ paṭiladdhattabhāvaṃ. Ayaṃ hi jātasaddo khaṇattayasamaṅgitaṃ sandhāya vutto “ye dhammā jātā bhūtā”tiādīsu viya, na atītaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1385: “Ye te jātā na te santi, ye na jātā tattheva te;
anya-e0104n0:1386: Laddhattabhāvā no bhaggā, teva santi sabhāvato”ti. –
anya-e0104n0:1387_0: Ādīsu viya, nāpi jātatāmattaṃ “yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhata”ntiādīsu viya. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:1387_1: “jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppanna”nti, paccuppannarūpaṃ nāma jātaṃ khaṇattayapariyāpannanti
anya-e0104n0:1387_2: attho. Taṃ pana ādito duppariggahanti santatipaccuppannavasena vipassanābhiniveso
anya-e0104n0:1387_3: kātabbo. Tassāti rūpassa. Paccayalakkhaṇapapañcaṃ anāmasitvā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayoti
anya-e0104n0:1387_4: nibbattanasaññitaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ udayo uppādo. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayoti vipariṇāmasaññitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1387_5: saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ vayo vināso. Anupassanāñāṇanti yā udayassa, vayassa ca anupekkhanā,
anya-e0104n0:1387_6: taṃ ñāṇaṃ. Kiñcāpi kalāpasammasanādīsu jātijarāmaraṇasīsena jātijarāmaraṇavanto dhammā
anya-e0104n0:1387_7: vuttā, idha pana udayabbayañāṇaniddese “jāti paccuppannā, tassā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1387_8: udayo, vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ vayo”tiādinā vuccamāne jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ jātijarāmaraṇavantatā,
anya-e0104n0:1387_9: nipphannatā ca anuññātā viya hotīti taṃ pariharituṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu bhavapariyosānāva desanā katā.
anya-e0104n0:1388_0: Soti yogī. Iminā pāḷinayenāti imāya “jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppanna”ntiādinā dassitāya pāḷigatiyā.
anya-e0104n0:1388_1: Jātinti na pasūtiṃ, na ca paṭhamābhinibbattimattaṃ, atha kho uppādaṃ nibbattivikāraṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1388_2: Svāyaṃ vikāro yasmā saṅkhārānaṃ abhinavāvaṭṭhānajarā viya navabhāvāpagamoti āha “abhinavākāra”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1388_3: Samanupassatīti sambandho. Anuppannassa rāsi vā nicayo vā natthi yato āgaccheyya
anya-e0104n0:1388_4: uppajjamānaṃ aladdhattabhāvassa sabbena sabbaṃ avijjamānattā. Tenāha “uppajjamāna…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1388_5: natthī”ti. Yathā anāgate addhani ime dhammā sabbena sabbaṃ natthi, evaṃ atītepi addhanīti
anya-e0104n0:1388_7: uppādo, uppajjitvā ca sabbaso abhāvūpagamoti imamatthaṃ samudāyagataṃ tadekadesabhūtāya
anya-e0104n0:1388_8: upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha rāsitoti rāsibhāvena samussito
anya-e0104n0:1388_9: puñjo rāsi. Yathā tathā piṇḍibhūto nicayo. Bhūmiyaṃ nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃ nidhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1389_0: 724. Evaṃ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāravidhiṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1389_1: “puna yānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha avijjāsamudayāti avijjāya uppādā, atthibhāvāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1389_2: Nirodhavirodhīhi uppādo atthibhāvavācakopi hotīti vuttovāyamattho. Tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya
anya-e0104n0:1389_3: avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho. Paccayasamudayaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0104n0:1389_4: paccayassa uppannabhāvena, atthibhāvatoti attho. Avijjādīhi ca tīhi atītakālikāni
anya-e0104n0:1390_0: Pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito “āhārasamudayā”ti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1390_1: pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena utucittānipi gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa
anya-e0104n0:1390_3: kammunā rūpakāyassa nibbatti. Asati ca avijjupanissayāya bhavanikantiyā jātiyā asambhavo
anya-e0104n0:1390_4: evāti. Yathā ca rūpassa avijjātaṇhupanissayatā, evaṃ vedanādīnampi daṭṭhabbā. Āhāro
anya-e0104n0:1390_5: pana uppannassa rūpassa posako, kabaḷīkārāhārassa adhippetattā, kāmadhātādhiṭṭhānattā
anya-e0104n0:1390_6: ca desanāya. Ukkaṃsaniddesena vā āhāraggahaṇaṃ. “Nibbattilakkhaṇa”ntiādinā kālavasena
anya-e0104n0:1390_7: udayadassanamāha. Tattha addhānavasena pageva udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena
anya-e0104n0:1390_8: disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. Pañca lakkhaṇānīti avijjā taṇhā kammaṃ āhāroti
anya-e0104n0:1390_9: imesaṃ paccayānaṃ atthitāsaṅkhātalakkhaṇāni ceva rūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇañcāti imāni
anya-e0104n0:1390_10: pañca lakkhaṇāni. Tesaṃ atthitā hi rūpassa udayo lakkhīyati etehīti lakkhaṇānīti
anya-e0104n0:1391_0: Avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa
anya-e0104n0:1391_1: rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato. Paccayanirodhaṭṭhenāti avijjāsaṅkhātassa
anya-e0104n0:1391_2: anāgate uppajjanakarūpapaccayassa niruddhabhāvena. Taṇhānirodhā kammanirodhāti etthāpi
anya-e0104n0:1391_3: eseva nayo. Āhāranirodhāti pavattipaccayassa kabaḷīkārāhārassa abhāve. Rūpanirodhoti
anya-e0104n0:1391_4: taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa abhāvo hoti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0104n0:1391_5: bhaṅgakālavasena tesaṃ vayadassanaṃ. Tasmā taṃ addhāvasena pageva passitvā ṭhito
anya-e0104n0:1391_6: idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. Pañca lakkhaṇānīti idha
anya-e0104n0:1391_7: avijjādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho, rūpassa khaṇanirodho cāti imāni
anya-e0104n0:1391_8: pañca lakkhaṇāni. Tesañhi anuppādanirodho, rūpassa accantanirodho lakkhīyati etehīti
anya-e0104n0:1392_0: Vipariṇāmo saṅkhatalakkhaṇameva. Esa nayo vedanākkhandhādīsu. Ayaṃ pana viseso –
anya-e0104n0:1392_1: “phuṭṭho vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī”ti, “phassapaccayā vedanā, cakkhusamphassajā
anya-e0104n0:1392_2: vedanā, saññā, cetanā”ti, ca vacanato phasso vedanā saññā saṅkhārakkhandhānaṃ pavattipaccayo,
anya-e0104n0:1392_3: taṃnirodhā ca tesaṃ nirodho, mahāpadāna mahānidānasuttesu, abhidhamme ca aññamaññapaccayavāre
anya-e0104n0:1392_4: “nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa pavattipaccayo, taṃnirodhā
anya-e0104n0:1393_0: Ettha ca keci tāva āhu “arūpakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ addhāsantativaseneva,
anya-e0104n0:1393_1: na khaṇavasenā”ti. Tesaṃ matena khaṇato udayabbayadassanameva na siyā. Apare panāhu
anya-e0104n0:1393_3: vedanāsambhavaṃ labbhamānataṃ passati, na uppādaṃ. Avijjādiabhāve ca tassā asambhavaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1393_4: alabbhamānataṃ passati, na bhaṅgaṃ. Khaṇato udayabbayadassane paccuppannānaṃ uppādaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1393_5: bhaṅgañca passatī”ti, taṃ yuttaṃ. Santativasena hi rūpārūpadhamme udayato, vayato
anya-e0104n0:1393_6: ca manasi karontassa anukkamena bhāvanāya balappattakāle ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā
anya-e0104n0:1393_7: khaṇato udayabbayā upaṭṭhahantīti. Ayañhi paṭhamaṃ paccayato udayabbayaṃ manasi karonto
anya-e0104n0:1393_8: avijjādike paccayadhamme vissajjetvā udayabbayavante khandhe gahetvā tesaṃ paccayato
anya-e0104n0:1394_0: Tassa yadā ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattati, tadā rūpārūpadhammā khaṇe khaṇe
anya-e0104n0:1394_1: uppajjantā, bhijjantā ca hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Tena vuttaṃ “evampi rūpassa udayo”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1394_2: Tattha evampi rūpassa udayoti evaṃ vuttanayena avijjāsamudayāpi. Taṇhā…pe… kamma…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1394_3: āhārasamudayāpi rūpassa sambhavo. Evampi rūpassa vayoti evaṃ vuttanayeneva avijjānirodhāpi
anya-e0104n0:1394_4: taṇhā…pe… āhāranirodhāpi rūpassa vayo anuppādoti paccayato vitthārena manasikāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1394_5: karoti. Evampi rūpaṃ udetīti evaṃ vuttanayena nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi
anya-e0104n0:1394_6: āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi udeti uppajjati nippajjatīti. Evaṃ vuttanayeneva vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1395_0: 725. Evaṃ manasi karoto na yāva udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppajjati, tāva udayabbayā suṭṭhu
anya-e0104n0:1395_1: pākaṭā na hontīti katvā vuttaṃ “iti kirime dhammā…pe… paṭiventī”ti, nayadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1395_2: vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Paṭhamañhi paccuppannadhammānaṃ udayabbayaṃ disvā atha atītānāgate
anya-e0104n0:1395_5: cettha paṭiccasamuppannadhammānampi gahaṇaṃ, tesampi attano phalaṃ pati paṭicca samuppādabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1396_0: 726. Yanti karaṇe paccattavacanaṃ, yena ñāṇenāti atthaṃ vadanti. Yanti vā kiriyāparāmasanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1396_1: Khandhānaṃ samudayaṃ passati, khandhānaṃ nirodhaṃ passatīti ettha yadetaṃ dassananti
anya-e0104n0:1396_2: attho. Yaṃ panāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Ettha ca yathā avijjādisamudayanirodhato khandhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1396_4: evaṃ nibbattivipariṇāmalakkhaṇehi khandhānaṃ udayabbayassa bhedo atthi abhinnādhikaraṇattāti
anya-e0104n0:1396_6: vacanabhedaṃ akatvā vuttaṃ. Uppattikkhaṇeyeva hīti hi-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā uppādakkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0104n0:1396_7: nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ, bhaṅgakkhaṇeyeva ca vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ, tasmā tāni passanto khaṇato
anya-e0104n0:1396_8: khandhānaṃ udayabbaye passati nāmāti “yaṃ panā”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n0:1397_0: 727. Iccassevanti ettha iti-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā “avijjā samudayā”tiādi paccayato
anya-e0104n0:1397_1: khandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ, “nibbattilakkhaṇa”ntiādi khaṇato, tasmāti attho. Assāti
anya-e0104n0:1397_2: yogino. Evanti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Ye pana “iccassa paccayato”ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1397_3: itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Janakāvabodhatoti khandhānaṃ janakassa avijjādipaccayassa
anya-e0104n0:1397_4: avabujjhanato. Jātidukkhāvabodhatoti jātisaṅkhātassa dukkhassa avabujjhanato. Dukkhasaccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1397_5: pākaṭaṃ hoti ekadesadassanena pabbatasamuddādidassanakānaṃ viya. Maraṇadukkhāvabodhatoti
anya-e0104n0:1397_6: etthāpi eseva nayo. “Paccayānuppādenā”ti etena paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodho idha paccayanirodhoti
anya-e0104n0:1397_7: dasseti. Paccayavatanti paccayato uppajjanakānaṃ. Yañcassa udayabbayadassananti yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1397_8: assa yogino paccayato, khaṇato ca udayabbayānaṃ dassanaṃ. Tattha asammoho, tappadhāno
anya-e0104n0:1397_9: vā vitakkādidhammapuñjo maggo vāyaṃ lokikoti niyyānānulomato lokiko maggo evāyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1397_10: Iti tasmā maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti sabhāvāvabodhato. Tenāha “tatra sammohavighātato”ti,
anya-e0104n0:1397_11: tadaṅgavasenāti attho. Atha vā yathāvutto sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhāto maggo ariyamaggassa
anya-e0104n0:1397_12: upāyabhūto asammohasabhāvo attānampi pakāseti padīpo viyāti maggasaccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1398_1: avijjādīsu santesūti ayamattho vuttoti āha “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti avabodhato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1398_3: Te ca saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā “jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”ntiādivacanato.
anya-e0104n0:1398_4: Paṭiccasamuppannassa ca pākaṭatā paccayākārapākaṭatāya eva “imassetaṃ phala”nti avabodhato.
anya-e0104n0:1399_0: 729. Purimapurimānaṃ nirodho uttaruttarānaṃ uppādānubandhoti ayamattho paccayato
anya-e0104n0:1399_1: udayadassanena sijjhamāno ekattanayādhigamāya hoti. Yato “añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatī”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1399_3: khaṇe khaṇe uppajjantīti ayamattho khaṇato udayadassanena sijjhamāno nānattanayādhigamāya
anya-e0104n0:1399_4: hoti. Yato paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ sabhāvabhedāvabodhato “so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedayatī”tiādinayappavattāya
anya-e0104n0:1399_5: sassatadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatā. Tenāha “khaṇato udayadassanenā”tiādi. Paccayato udayabbayadassanena
anya-e0104n0:1399_6: paccaye sati phalassa bhāvo, asati abhāvoti imassa atthassa siddhiyā atthitāmatteneva
anya-e0104n0:1399_7: te dhammā kāraṇanti abyāpāranayo pākaṭo hoti. Yato attadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatā vasavattitāya
anya-e0104n0:1399_8: alabbhaneyyato. Tena vuttaṃ “dhammāna”ntiādi. Avasavattibhāvo parāyattatā, sā ca
anya-e0104n0:1399_9: sappaccayatāya veditabbā. Paccayato udayadassanena tehi tehi paccayehi ime dhammā
anya-e0104n0:1399_10: uppajjanti, uppajjamānā ca paccayānurūpameva uppajjantīti hetuphalassa hetuanurūpato
anya-e0104n0:1399_11: siddhiyā akiriyadiṭṭhiyā anokāsatāvāti āha “paccayato panā”tiādi. Sati kāraṇe kuto
anya-e0104n0:1400_0: 730. Paccayato udayaṃ passato paccaye sati sabhāve sati phalassa sambhavoti atthitāmattena
anya-e0104n0:1400_1: upakārakatāti saṅkhatānaṃ nirīhatā, asati ca abhāvoti paccayādhīnavuttitā ca viññāyamānā
anya-e0104n0:1400_2: attasuññataṃ vibhāvetīti āha “paccayato cassa…pe… tāvabodhato”ti. Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1400_3: pākaṭaṃ hoti khaṇato udayabbayadassanena saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayato paricchinnatāya
anya-e0104n0:1400_4: viññāyamānattā. Tenāha “hutvā abhāvāvabodhato”ti. Uppajjitvā nirujjhanañhi hutvā
anya-e0104n0:1400_5: abhāvo. Pubbantāparantaviveko atītānāgatabhāvasuññatā. Na hi saṅkhārā khaṇattayato
anya-e0104n0:1400_6: pubbe, pacchā ca vijjanti, tasmā pubbantāparantavivekāvabodhatoti ādiantavantatāpaṭivedhatoti
anya-e0104n0:1400_7: attho. Dukkhalakkhaṇampi pākaṭaṃ hoti udayabbayadassanenāti sambandho. Uppajjitvā
anya-e0104n0:1400_8: bhijjantā saṅkhārā uppādato uddhaṃ jarābhaṅgāvatthantaruppattiyā nirantaraṃ vibādhīyanteva.
anya-e0104n0:1400_9: Sā ca nesaṃ vibādhiyamānatā sammā udayabbayadassanena vibhūtā hotīti āha “dukkha…pe… bodhato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1401_0: Sabhāvalakkhaṇampīti udayabbayadassanena na kevalaṃ aniccadukkhalakkhaṇameva, atha
anya-e0104n0:1401_1: kho pathavīphassādīnaṃ kakkhaḷaphusanādisaññitaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ lakkhaṇampi pākabhāvaviddhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1401_3: sabhāvasaññite lakkhaṇe, taṃtaṃdhammānaṃ salakkhaṇe. Saṅkhatalakkhaṇassa tāvakālikattampīti
anya-e0104n0:1401_6: imassa ñāṇassa pavattanato, na ṭhitikkhaṇassa abhāvā.
anya-e0104n0:1402_0: 731. Na kevalañca niccanavā, atha kho parittakālaṭṭhāyino. Kathanti āha “sūriyuggamane”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1402_1: Tattha udake daṇḍena katalekhā udake daṇḍarāji. Ussāvabinduādayo pañca kiccāpi uttaruttari
anya-e0104n0:1402_2: atiparittaṭṭhāyibhāvadassanatthaṃ nidassitā, tathāpi te dandhanirodhā eva nidassitā,
anya-e0104n0:1402_3: tatopi lahutaranirodhattā saṅkhārānaṃ. Tathā hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyāyena
anya-e0104n0:1402_4: paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi pāde ca bandhakhuradhārā sannipātatopi sīghataro rūpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1402_5: nirodho vutto, pageva arūpadhammānaṃ. Na kevalaṃ niccanavā, nāpi parittakālaṭṭhāyinova,
anya-e0104n0:1402_6: atha kho asārā. Kathanti āha “māyā”tiādi. Māyādayo hi maṇiādivasena dissamānā ataṃsabhāvatāya
anya-e0104n0:1402_7: asārā. Tattha mantosadhabhāvitā indajālādikā māyā. Migataṇhikā marīci. Supinameva
anya-e0104n0:1402_8: supinantaṃ. Maṇḍalākārena āvijjhiyamānaṃ alātameva alātacakkaṃ. Gandhabbadevaputtānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1402_9: kīḷanicchāvasena nagaraṃ viya ākāse upaṭṭhānamattaṃ gandhabbanagaraṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1403_0: Ettāvatāti yvāyaṃ “jātaṃ rūpaṃ paccuppanna”ntiādipāḷinayānusārena, “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1403_2: āraddho, ettāvatā. Kalāpasammasanādikopi hi sabbo bhāvanāvidhi udayabbayañāṇuppādanasseva,
anya-e0104n0:1403_3: na parisaparisarīrakarabandhoti. Vayadhammamevāti bhijjanasabhāvameva. Vayaṃ upeti
anya-e0104n0:1403_4: attano dhammatāya. Yañhi upakkamena vinassatīti vuccati, tampi attano dhammatāya
anya-e0104n0:1403_5: eva vinassati ahetukattā vināsassa. Upakkamahetu pana visadisuppādo hoti. Iminā ākārenāti
anya-e0104n0:1403_6: “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti hi vuttaṃ, tasmā vayaṃ anālambitvāpi
anya-e0104n0:1403_7: “vayadhammameva uppajjatī”ti udayassa, “uppannañca idaṃ vayaṃ upetī”ti vayassa ca
anya-e0104n0:1403_8: iminā yathāvuttena paccakkhakaraṇākārena. Adhunā uppannaṃ, na tāva balappattanti
anya-e0104n0:1403_9: āha “taruṇavipassanāñāṇa”nti. Kalāpasammasanādivasena pavattaṃ sammasanaṃ na nippariyāyena
anya-e0104n0:1403_10: vipassanāsamaññaṃ labhati, udayabbayānupassanādivasena pavattameva labhatīti āha
anya-e0104n0:1405_0: 732. Imāya udayabbayānupassanāsaṅkhātāya taruṇavipassanāya vasena, na āraddhavipassanānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1405_2: balavavipassanāya vasenāti attho. Na hi tadā vipassanupakkilesā uppajjantīti. Āraddhavipassakassāti
anya-e0104n0:1405_3: ca āraddhavipassakassevāti eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭho. Tenāha “vipassanupakkilesā hī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1405_5: idaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena vuttaṃ balavavipassanāpattassāpi anuppajjanato. Vippaṭipannakassāti
anya-e0104n0:1405_6: sīlavipattiādivasena yathā tathā vippaṭipannakassa. Tassa pana paṭipattiyā garahitabbataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1405_7: dassento “vippaṭipannakassā”ti āha. Ca-saddo uparipadadvayepi yojetabbo. Nikkhittakammaṭṭhānassāti
anya-e0104n0:1405_8: vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā antarā vosānaṃ āpannassa. Kusītapuggalassāti sīlasampannasseva
anya-e0104n0:1405_9: kosajjena bhāvanaṃ ananuyuñjantassa. Atha vā vippaṭipannakassāti vipassanābhāvanāsaṅkhātāya
anya-e0104n0:1405_10: sammāpaṭipattiyā abhāvena vigarahitapaṭipattikassa. Vipassanāpaṭipattiyeva hi sasambhārā
anya-e0104n0:1405_11: pubbabhāge sammāpaṭipatti, tadaññā vippaṭipatti, sā ca tattha nikkhittadhurassa hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1405_13: Yuttappayuttassāti yogena ñāṇena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa. Sā pana yuttappayuttatā
anya-e0104n0:1405_14: samathavasenāpi hotīti āha “āraddhavipassakassā”ti. Uppajjantiyeva na nuppajjanti
anya-e0104n0:1406_0: Obhāsādīsu “ariyadhammo”ti pavattaṃ uddhaccaṃ vikkhepo dhammuddhaccaṃ, tena dhammuddhaccena
anya-e0104n0:1406_1: vipassanāvīthito ukkamanena virūpaṃ gahitaṃ pavattitaṃ mānasaṃ dhammuddhaccaviggahitamānasaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1406_2: Obhāso dhammoti kāraṇūpacārenāha, īdisaṃ obhāsaṃ vissajjento mama ariyamaggoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1406_3: Obhāsaṃ āvajjati “nibbāna”nti vā “maggo”ti vā “phala”nti vā. Nibbānanti gaṇhanto
anya-e0104n0:1406_4: tattha pavattadhamme maggaphalabhāvena gaṇhāti, ñāṇādike pana maggaphalabhāveneva
anya-e0104n0:1406_5: gaṇhāti. Tato vikkhepo uddhaccanti tato obhāsahetu yo vikkhepo, taṃ uddhaccanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1407: Tattha anicca…pe… nappajānāti “maggaṃ pattosmī”ti saññāya aniccatādivasena manasikārasseva abhāvato. Ayañca attho –
anya-e0104n0:1408_0: “Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṃ byākaroti,
anya-e0104n0:1408_1: sabbo so catūhi maggehi, etesaṃ vā aññatarena. Katamehi catūhi? Idhāvuso, bhikkhu
anya-e0104n0:1408_2: samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāveti, tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato
anya-e0104n0:1408_3: maggo sañjāyati, so taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti. Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1409: “Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāveti…pe… samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti…pe….
anya-e0104n0:1410_0: “Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhuno dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṃ mānasaṃ hoti, hoti so, āvuso,
anya-e0104n0:1410_1: samayo yaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati,
anya-e0104n0:1411_0: Iminā suttapadeneva veditabbo. Ettha hi catutthamaggavissajjane yathāvuttamaggaphalanibbānadhammā
anya-e0104n0:1411_1: dhammo. Tattha uddhaccaṃ “adhigatamaggādikohamasmī”ti amaggādīsu vikkhepo dhammuddhaccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1411_2: tena upaddutaṃ viggahitamānasaṃ hoti. Nikanti obhāsādīsu apekkhā sukhumarūpā taṇhā,
anya-e0104n0:1411_3: sā vipassanābhiratiākārena upaṭṭhahantī adhimānikena “dhammo”ti gayhatīti āha “nikanti
anya-e0104n0:1412_1: bhāsuraṃ rūpaṃ. Tattha vipassanācittasamuṭṭhitaṃ yogino sarīraṭṭhameva pabhassaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1412_2: hutvā tiṭṭhati, itaraṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā ñāṇānubhāvānurūpaṃ samantato pattharati,
anya-e0104n0:1412_3: taṃ tasseva paññāyati, tena phuṭṭhokāse rūpagatampi passati, passanto ca cakkhuviññāṇena
anya-e0104n0:1412_4: passati, udāhu manoviññāṇenāti vīmaṃsitabbanti vadanti. Dibbacakkhulābhino viya taṃ
anya-e0104n0:1412_5: manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti vuttaṃ viya dissatīti. Vipassanāvīthi nāma paṭipāṭiyā pavattamānā
anya-e0104n0:1412_6: vipassanāva. Ukkantā nāma hoti yoginā “maggappattomhī”ti adhimānena vissaṭṭhattā,
anya-e0104n0:1412_7: tassa vā yogino vipassanā tato eva vīthi ukkantā nāma hoti. Mūlakammaṭṭhānanti vipassanamevāha.
anya-e0104n0:1413_0: Vemattatāyāti appavipulatāvasena visadisatāya. Assāti obhāsassa. Dvīhi kuṭṭehi paricchinnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1413_1: gehaṃ dvikuṭṭagehaṃ. Tassa kira abbhantarepi ekā bhitti hoti bahipi, ubhinnaṃ antare
anya-e0104n0:1413_2: anupariyāyapathaṃ hoti, sāyanhe tattha santharitāni pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni, visadañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1413_3: obhāsena pharitaṭṭhāne rūpagatañca dibbacakkhuno viya paññāyanti. Tena vuttaṃ “bhante mayha”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1414_0: Evaṃ obhāsassa vemattatāya vatthuṃ dassetvā cirakālavippalambane vatthuṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1414_1: “ayaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ayaṃ pana vipassanupakkilesoti vakkhamānappakāraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1414_2: sandhāyāha, na sabbaṃ. Soti so samathavipassanālābhī adhimāniko.
anya-e0104n0:1415: Divāsaneti divāṭṭhāne nisīditabbaāsane. Paṭhamaṃ “pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintitattā vuttaṃ “pañhaṃ, bhante, pucchituṃ āgatomhī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1416_0: Pacchā upāyena puthujjanabhāvaṃ viññāpetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojessāmīti cintitattā vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1416_1: “avassayo bhavissāmiccevāhaṃ āgato”ti, tassa ca padhānattā sāvadhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1416_2: Ayaṃ dhammoti ayaṃ ariyamaggānugato paṭisambhidādhammoti therassa ajjhāsayavasena
anya-e0104n0:1416_3: vadati. Samādhinti abhiññāsamādhiṃ. Añcitakaṇṇoti niccalaṭṭhapitakaṇṇapuṭo. Palāyituṃ
anya-e0104n0:1416_4: āraddho bhayena. Tenāha “thero kira dosacarito”ti. Dosacaritassa hi sūrassāpi sahasā
anya-e0104n0:1416_5: bhayaṃ uppajjati. Tenassa khīṇāsavatthero ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā “iminā upāyena puthujjanabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1416_6: jānāpessāmī”ti hatthinimmāpanādimakāsi. Dosacaritattā hi thero khippaṃ paṭivijjhi.
anya-e0104n0:1417_0: 734. Tassāti udayabbayañāṇaṃ matthakaṃ pāpentassa yogino. “Evampi rūpaṃ udeti, evampi
anya-e0104n0:1417_1: rūpaṃ vetī”tiādinā udayabbayānupassanamevettha tulanaṃ, tīraṇañca veditabbaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:1417_2: devānamindena khittaṃ vajiraṃ amoghaṃ, appaṭihatañca hoti, evamidampi ñāṇaṃ nipuṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1417_4: Sūranti tejavantaṃ. Ativisadanti nisitabhāvena ativiya paṭutaraṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:1418_0: Vipassanāpītīti vipassanācittasampayuttā pīti. Khuddakādayo pītiyo heṭṭhā vaṇṇitā
anya-e0104n0:1418_1: eva. Yasmā udayabbayānupassanāya vīthipaṭipannāya anukkamena pañca pītiyo uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:1418_2: tasmā vuttaṃ “ayaṃ pañca…pe… uppajjatī”ti. Matthakappattena pana udayabbayañāṇena
anya-e0104n0:1418_3: saddhiṃ pharaṇāpītiyeva hoti. Upacārappanākkhaṇato aññadāpi hi pharaṇāpīti hotiyeva.
anya-e0104n0:1419_0: Passaddhiādīni cha yugaḷakāni aññamaññāviyoginīti passaddhiyā uppannāya itarāpi uppannā
anya-e0104n0:1419_1: eva hontīti kiccadassanamukhena tā sabbāpi dassento “kāyacittānaṃ neva daratho, na
anya-e0104n0:1419_2: gārava”ntiādimāha. Tattha kāyaggahaṇena rūpakāyassapi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, na vedanādikkhandhattayasseva.
anya-e0104n0:1419_3: Kāyappassaddhiādayo hi rūpakāyassāpi darathādinimmaddikāti. Kāyacittāni passaddhāni…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1419_5: vidhamanavasena tadā vipassanācittuppādassa pavattanato. Tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ udayabbayañāṇuppattisamaye.
anya-e0104n0:1419_6: Manussānaṃ ayanti mānusī, manussayoggā kāmasukharati, tādisehi manussavisesehi anubhavitabbatānativattanato
anya-e0104n0:1419_7: dibbā ratipi saṅgahitā, mānusīsadisatāya kāmasukhabhāvena dibbā ratipi vā, tassā
anya-e0104n0:1420_0: Suññāgāranti yaṃ kiñci vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ, vipassanaṃ eva vā. Sāpi hi niccabhāvādisuññatāya,
anya-e0104n0:1420_1: yogino sukhasannissayatāya ca “suññāgāra”nti vattabbataṃ labhati. Cittassa anupassanakarānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1420_2: kilesānaṃ vigamena santacittassa. Saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanena bhikkhuno. Sammā ñāyena
anya-e0104n0:1420_4: manussānaṃ avisayatāya amānusī. Vipassanāpītisukhasaññitā rati hotīti ayamettha gāthāya
anya-e0104n0:1420_5: saṅkhepattho. Dutiyagāthā pana udayabbayañāṇameva sandhāya vuttā. Tattha yato yatoti
anya-e0104n0:1421_1: atipaṇītarūpehi sabbo kāyo pariphuṭo, paribrūhito ca hoti. Tasmā vuttaṃ “sakalasarīraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1422_0: Adhimokkhoti saddhā, na yevāpanakādhimokkhoti adhippāyo. Sā cettha na kammaphalaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1422_1: ratanattayaṃ vā saddahanavasena pavattā, atha kho kilesakālussiyāpagamena sampayuttānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1423: Purimuppannabhāvanābalasaṃsiddhaṃ samappavattaṃ vīriyaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ saṃkilesapakkhato kosajjato paggaṇhanato paggaho. Tenāha “paggahoti vīriya”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1424_0: Supaṭṭhitāti sabhāvasallakkhaṇena ārammaṇe suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā. Supatiṭṭhitāti paṭipakkhavigamena
anya-e0104n0:1424_1: tena acalanīyatāya suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā. Tato eva nikhātā viya acalā. Acalabhāveneva
anya-e0104n0:1424_2: pabbatarājasadisāti tīhipi padehi supatiṭṭhitameva dasseti. Soti yogāvacaro. Yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1424_3: yaṃ ṭhānanti yaṃ yaṃ attano upatiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ vā arūpaṃ vā. Okkhanditvāti
anya-e0104n0:1424_4: anupavisitvā. Pakkhinditvāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍabhūtassa
anya-e0104n0:1424_6: paraloko viyā”ti na dibbacakkhuno paralokavisayattā. Vaṇṇāyatanavisayañhi tanti.
anya-e0104n0:1424_7: Assa sati upaṭṭhāti khāyati, upatiṭṭhatīti vā attho. Yadaggena hi sati ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1424_8: okkhanditvā upatiṭṭhati, tadaggena ārammaṇampissa okkhanditvā upatiṭṭhatīti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:1425_0: Vicinitavisayattā saṅkhārānaṃ vicinane majjhattabhāvena ṭhitā vipassanupekkhā. Sā
anya-e0104n0:1425_2: cetanā āvajjane ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattiyā “āvajjanupekkhā”ti vuttā. Udayabbayānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1425_3: suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhānato tadanupassanāyaṃ majjhattabhūtā idha vipassanupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1425_4: Te pana udayabbayā sabbasaṅkhārānanti āha “sabbasaṅkhāresu majjhattabhūtā”ti. Āvajjanāya
anya-e0104n0:1425_5: indavajiratattanārācasadisatā, sūratikkhabhāvo ca sabbaññutaññāṇapurecarā viya tadanucarañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1426_0: Vipassanānikantīti vipassanāya nikāmanā apekkhā. Obhāsādayo vipassanāya vijambhanabhūtā
anya-e0104n0:1426_1: tassā alaṅkāro viya hontīti āha “obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāyā”ti. Ālayanti apekkhaṃ. Sukhumā,
anya-e0104n0:1426_2: santākārāti sukhumākārā, santākārā ca, sā cassā sukhumasantākāratā bhāvanāya sātisayappavattiyā,
anya-e0104n0:1426_3: yato kilesabhāvopissā duviññeyyo hoti. Tenāha “yā nikanti kilesoti…pe… hotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1427_0: Etesupīti yathādassitesu ñāṇādīsupi. “Aññatarasmiṃ uppanne”ti idaṃ uppanne aññatarasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1427_2: Na vāpi hi upakkilesā ekakkhaṇepi uppajjanti, paccavekkhaṇā pana visuṃ visuṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1427_3: “Na vata me ito pubbe evarūpā nikanti uppannapubbā”ti idaṃ dhammasabhāvadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1427_4: vuttaṃ, na pana tadā yogino tathācittappavattivasena. Na hi so tadā taṃ “nikantī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1427_5: jānāti, tathā sati tabbisayassa “maggappattomhī”tiādiggahaṇassa asambhavo eva. Tasmā
anya-e0104n0:1427_6: evamassa siyā “na vata me evarūpā bhāvanābhirati uppannapubbā, addhā maggappattomhī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1428_0: 735. Upakkilesavatthutāyāti nippariyāyato diṭṭhimānataṇhā idha upakkilesā tesaṃ vatthutāya
anya-e0104n0:1428_1: uppattiṭṭhānatāya. Na sabhāvatoti āha “na akusalattā”ti. Yathā pana obhāsādayo, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1428_2: nikantipi diṭṭhigāhādīnaṃ ṭhānaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “upakkilesavatthu cā”ti. Vatthuvasenevāti
anya-e0104n0:1428_3: gāhe anāmasitvā gāhānaṃ vatthutāvaseneva. Attavādī hi “ahaṃbuddhinibandhano”ti parikappito
anya-e0104n0:1428_4: attā obhāsassa sāmibhūto “mamā”ti sāmivacanassa visayabhāvena gahitoti āha “mama
anya-e0104n0:1428_5: obhāso uppannoti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhigāho”ti. Obhāsassa manāpaggahaṇamukhena tena attānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1428_6: seyyādito dahatīti vuttaṃ “manāpo vata obhāso uppannoti gaṇhato mānagāho”ti. Assādayatoti
anya-e0104n0:1428_7: sampiyāyato. Tesanti diṭṭhigāhādisaññitānaṃ upakkilesānaṃ vasena. Obhāsādīsūti obhāsādinimittaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1428_8: Kampanaṃ yathāraddhavipassanāya aṭṭhatvā vikkhepāpatti, sā ca obhāsādīsu taṇhādigāhoti
anya-e0104n0:1429_0: Obhāsanimittaṃ cittaṃ vikampatīti sambandho. Obhāse vā visayabhūte upakkilesehi cittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1429_1: vikampatīti yojanā. Tenāha “yehi cittaṃ pavedhatī”ti. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Upaṭṭhāneti
anya-e0104n0:1431_0: 736. Kusalo panātiādīsu kammaṭṭhānakosallayogena kusalo. Paripakkañāṇatāya paṇḍito.
anya-e0104n0:1431_2: Ayaṃ kho soti yo so ācariyena kammaṭṭhānadānakāle udayabbayañāṇuppattisamaye uppajjatīti
anya-e0104n0:1431_3: vutto, ayaṃ kho so obhāso uppannoti upakkilesavatthubhāvavavatthānaṃ dassetvā idānissa
anya-e0104n0:1431_4: vipassanāya visayabhāvūpanayanavidhiṃ dassento “so kho panā”tiādimāha. Tattha paṭhamanaye
anya-e0104n0:1431_5: aniccalakkhaṇavibhāvanameva dassitaṃ, tasmiṃ siddhe itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ siddhameva
anya-e0104n0:1431_6: hoti. Dutiyanaye pana obhāsādike nissāya uppajjanakadiṭṭhigāhādīnaṃ ugghāṭanasamugghāṭanapariyādānavasena
anya-e0104n0:1431_7: manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “sace obhāso attā bhaveyyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Arūpasattake “sace
anya-e0104n0:1431_8: saṅkhārā attā bhaveyyu”ntiādi sabbasaṅkhārasaṅgaṇhanavasena sāmaññato vuttaṃ, idha
anya-e0104n0:1431_9: obhāsādivasena saṅkhāre vibhajja vuttaṃ. Seso manasikāravidhi tattha vuttanayovāti
anya-e0104n0:1432_0: Obhāsaṃ “netaṃ mamā”ti samanupassanto taṇhāgāhato cittaṃ visodheti, “nesohamasmī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1432_1: samanupassanto mānagāhato, “na meso attā”ti samanupassanto diṭṭhigāhato. Tenāha “obhāsaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1433_0: Imāni dasa ṭhānānīti imāni yathāvuttāni obhāsādīni dasa upakkilesakāraṇāni. Paññā
anya-e0104n0:1433_1: yassa pariccitāti yassa yogino paññā obhāsādīsu aniccatādiggahaṇavasena paricitavatī
anya-e0104n0:1433_2: pariggahetvā upaparikkhitvā ṭhitā. Dhammuddhaccassa samaggabhāvajānanena dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1435_0: Diṭṭhivisuddhiyanti diṭṭhivisuddhiyaṃ adhigatāyaṃ, diṭṭhivisuddhiñāṇena vā diṭṭhiyā
anya-e0104n0:1435_1: visodhane dukkhasaccassa vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti dukkhasaccapariyāpannassa nāmarūpassa
anya-e0104n0:1435_2: vavatthānato. Nāmarūpassa paccayā nāmarūpasamudayapakkhiyāti āha “kaṅkhā…pe… samudayasaccassa
anya-e0104n0:1435_3: vavatthānaṃ kata”nti. Abhidhammanayena hi sabbakilesā, kammañca samudayasaccaṃ. Imissanti
anya-e0104n0:1435_4: imāyaṃ. Sammāti aviparītaṃ. Maggassāti ariyamaggassa upāyabhūtamaggassa.
anya-e0104n0:1440_1: Sikhāppatti panassa udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ attaṭṭhamānaṃvasena jātāti āha “aṭṭhannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1440_2: pana ñāṇānaṃ vasena sikhāppattā vipassanā”ti. Oḷārikoḷārikassa saccapaṭicchādakamohatamassa
anya-e0104n0:1440_4: pana ñāṇāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “aṭṭhannanti cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha udayabbayadassanena
anya-e0104n0:1440_5: saṅkhārānaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, tadanusārena itaralakkhaṇāni ca vibhāventīyeva udayabbayānupassanā
anya-e0104n0:1440_7: keci. Tayidaṃ tassa sabbaso tīraṇapariññābhāvameva maññamānehi vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi hi
anya-e0104n0:1440_8: udayabbayañāṇaṃ tīraṇapariññantogadhameva, udayabbayādīnaṃ pana jānanaṭṭhena, paccakkhato
anya-e0104n0:1440_9: dassanaṭṭhena ca ñāṇadassanāni, udayabbayañāṇādīni. Tāniyeva paṭipakkhato visuddhattā
anya-e0104n0:1440_10: ñāṇadassanavisuddhi, sā eva ariyamaggo paṭipajjati etāyāti paṭipadā cāti paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti
anya-e0104n0:1440_11: vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana uppannamattaṃ appaguṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paguṇañhi niccasaññādipahānasiddhiyā
anya-e0104n0:1440_12: pahānapariññāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Yato tadavigamena aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu ekaccā
anya-e0104n0:1440_13: adhigatā eva honti. Na hi udayabbayānaṃ paccakkhato paṭivedhena vinā sāmaññākārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1440_14: tīraṇamattena sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhapahānaṃ sambhavati. Asati ca paṭipakkhapahāne kuto
anya-e0104n0:1440_15: ñāṇādīnaṃ vajiramiva avihatavegatā, tikhiṇavisadāditā vā. Tasmā paguṇabhāvappattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1440_17: anupassanā bhaṅgānupassanā, tadeva ñāṇaṃ bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ. Yathābhūtadassāvī
anya-e0104n0:1440_18: bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ, tebhūmakadhammā, tesu bhayato upaṭṭhitesu bhāyitabbākāragāhiñāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1440_19: bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ. Muñcituṃ icchatīti muñcitukamyaṃ, cittaṃ, puggalo vā, tassa
anya-e0104n0:1440_20: bhāvo muñcitukamyatā, tadeva ñāṇaṃ muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ. Puna paṭisaṅkhānākārena pavattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1440_21: ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ. Nirapekkhatāya saṅkhārānaṃ upekkhanavasena pavattañāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1441_1: udayabbayañāṇe yogo kimatthiyo”ti pucchati. Tattha kimatthiyoti kiṃ payojano niratthako,
anya-e0104n0:1441_2: pageva nibbattitattā pakkassa pacanaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. Atha vā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇādihetupaṭipāṭiggahaṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:1441_3: tamatthaṃ ñāpetukāmo ācariyova kathetukamyatāvasena “kimatthiyo”ti pucchati. Lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthoti
anya-e0104n0:1441_4: aniccādilakkhaṇānaṃ sammadeva upadhāraṇattho. Tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “udayabbayañāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1441_5: hī”tiādimāha. Nanu ca udayabbayañāṇaṃ nāma saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayameva passati, na
anya-e0104n0:1441_6: aniccādilakkhaṇattayaṃ, tena kathaṃ aniccatādilakkhaṇattayasallakkhaṇaṃ hotīti? Na
anya-e0104n0:1441_7: kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “udayabbayañāṇaṃ lakkhaṇattayavisayaṃ hotī”ti. Udayabbaye
anya-e0104n0:1441_8: pana paṭividdhe aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Tato “yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1441_9: Yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattā”ti itaralakkhaṇampi. Atha vā udayabbayaggahaṇena hutvā abhāvākāro,
anya-e0104n0:1441_10: abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanākāro, avasavattanākāro ca vibhūtataro hotīti kāraṇabhāvena udayabbayañāṇe
anya-e0104n0:1441_11: yogassa lakkhaṇattayasallakkhaṇatthatā veditabbā, na sammukheneva. Heṭṭhāti maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhito
anya-e0104n0:1441_12: heṭṭhā. Tañhi obhāsādiuppattihetutāya tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattampi diṭṭhiādīhi
anya-e0104n0:1441_13: upakkiliṭṭhattā kuṇṭhaṃ avisadameva jātaṃ. Tenāha “dasahi…pe… nāsakkhī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1442_0: 739. Amanasikārāti hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ. “Kissa amanasikārā”ti hi idaṃ “kena paṭicchannattā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1442_1: pucchitassa paṭicchādakassa hetupucchā. Santatiyā hissa paṭicchannattā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1442_2: na upaṭṭhāti, sā ca santati udayabbayāmanasikārena paṭicchādikā jātā. Iriyāpathehi
anya-e0104n0:1442_3: paṭicchannattā dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, te ca iriyāpathā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanāmanasikārena
anya-e0104n0:1442_4: paṭicchādakā jātā. Ghanena paṭicchannattā anattalakkhaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, te ca ghanā
anya-e0104n0:1442_5: nānādhātuvinibbhogāmanasikārena paṭicchādakā jātāti. Udayabbayaṃ passato na udayāvatthā
anya-e0104n0:1442_6: vayāvatthaṃ pāpuṇāti, vayāvatthā vā udayāvatthaṃ. Aññova udayakkhaṇo, aññova vayakkhaṇoti
anya-e0104n0:1442_7: ekopi dhammo khaṇavasena bhedato upaṭṭhāti, pageva atītādikoti āha “udayabbayaṃ pana…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1442_8: upaṭṭhātī”ti. Tattha santatiyā vikopitāyāti pubbāpariyena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1442_9: aññoññabhāvasallakkhaṇena santatiyā ugghāṭitāya. Na hi sammadeva udayabbayaṃ sallakkhentassa
anya-e0104n0:1442_10: dhammā sambandhabhāvena upaṭṭhahanti, atha kho ayosalākā viya asambandhabhāvenāti
anya-e0104n0:1443_1: nirantaraṃ paṭipīḷiyamānataṃ vibādhiyamānataṃ manasi karitvā. Iriyāpathe ugghāṭiteti
anya-e0104n0:1443_2: iriyāpathe labbhamānadukkhapaṭicchādakabhāve ugghāṭite. Ekasmiñhi iriyāpathe uppannassa
anya-e0104n0:1443_3: dukkhassa vinodakaṃ iriyāpathantaraṃ tassa paṭicchādakaṃ viya hoti, evaṃ sesāpīti
anya-e0104n0:1443_4: iriyāpathānaṃ taṃtaṃdukkhapaṭicchādakabhāve yāthāvato ñāte tesaṃ dukkhapaṭicchādakabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1443_5: ugghāṭito nāma hoti saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ dukkhābhitunnatāya pākaṭabhāvato. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:1443_7: nānāvidhe sabhāvadhamme. Vinibbhujitvāti “aññā pathavīdhātu, aññā āpodhātū”tiādinā,
anya-e0104n0:1443_8: “añño phasso, aññā vedanā”tiādinā ca visuṃ visuṃ katvā. Ghanavinibbhoge kateti samūhaghane,
anya-e0104n0:1443_9: kiccārammaṇaghane ca pabhedite. Yā hesā aññamaññūpatthaddhesu samuditesu rūpārūpadhammesu
anya-e0104n0:1443_10: ekattābhinivesavasena aparimadditasaṅkhārehi gayhamānā samūhaghanatā, tathā tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1443_11: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ kiccabhedassa satipi paṭiniyatabhāve ekato gayhamānā kiccaghanatā,
anya-e0104n0:1443_12: tathā sārammaṇadhammānaṃ satipi ārammaṇakaraṇabhede ekato gayhamānā ārammaṇaghanatā
anya-e0104n0:1443_13: ca, tā dhātūsu ñāṇena vinibbhujitvā dissamānā hatthena parimajjiyamāno pheṇapiṇḍo
anya-e0104n0:1443_14: viya vilayaṃ gacchanti, “yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānā suññā ete dhammā dhammamattā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1443_15: anattalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭataraṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “nānādhātuyo…pe… upaṭṭhātī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1444_0: 740. Dhuvabhāvapaṭikkhepato na niccanti aniccaṃ, khandhapañcakaṃ. Yathāha “rūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1444_1: kho, rādha, aniccaṃ, vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ anicca”nti. Tattha kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1444_2: vadanto “uppādavayaññathattabhāvā”ti āha. Uppādo nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ, vayo vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1444_3: aññathattaṃ jarā, tesaṃ sabbhāvatoti attho. Hutvā abhāvatoti uppajjitvā vinassanato.
anya-e0104n0:1444_4: Ettha ca purimena jātijarāmaraṇasabbhāvato aniccanti dasseti, dutiyena pākabhāvaviddhaṃsābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1444_5: Yassa bhāvena khandhapañcakaṃ “anicca”nti vuccati, taṃ aniccalakkhaṇanti dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1444_6: “uppādavayaññathatta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tena hi taṃ “anicca”nti lakkhīyati. Ākāravikāroti
anya-e0104n0:1444_7: ākāravikati. Abhāvākāro hi vikatirūpena labbhati, virūpattā na uppādākāro. Ākāravikāroti
anya-e0104n0:1444_8: vā ākāraviseso. Hutvā abhāvo hi pākabhāvato bhinno viddhaṃsābhāvattā tattha ca aniccalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1444_9: niruḷhaṃ. Aniccākāro hi dukkhānattākārehi viya uppādākārato ca visiṭṭho. Tathā hi
anya-e0104n0:1445_0: Saṅkhatabhāvo ca atthato uppādavantatā. Uppādo ca pākabhāvasādhitā dharamānāvatthā.
anya-e0104n0:1445_1: Iminā nayena dukkhānattālakkhaṇāni veditabbāni. Apica yathā niccapaṭikkhepato aniccanti
anya-e0104n0:1445_2: niccākārapaṭikkhepato yathāvutto abhāvākārasaṅkhāto aniccākāro aniccalakkhaṇaṃ, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1445_4: dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ, tathā attapaṭikkhepato anattāti attākārapaṭikkhepato avasavattanākārasaṅkhāto
anya-e0104n0:1445_5: anattākāro anattalakkhaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Te yime tayopi ākārā asabhāvadhammattā khandhapariyāpannā
anya-e0104n0:1445_6: na honti. Khandhehi vinā anupalabbhanīyato khandhavinimuttāpi na honti. Khandhe pana
anya-e0104n0:1445_7: upādāya vohāravasena labbhamānā tadādīnavavibhāvanāya visesakāraṇabhūtā tajjāpaññattivisesāti veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1446_1: yāthāvasarasato sallakkhetī”ti idaṃ tadatthe tabbohāravasena vuttaṃ. Udayabbayañāṇatthañhi
anya-e0104n0:1446_2: lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanā “udayabbayañāṇa”nti kathitā. Na hi udayabbayañāṇaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇādivisayaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1446_3: Tabbisayatte vā udayabbayañāṇameva na siyā, udayabbayañāṇaṃ pana tikkhaṃ, visadañca
anya-e0104n0:1446_4: kātukāmena lakkhaṇattayatīraṇameva kātabbaṃ. Parikammasadisañhetaṃ tassa. Esa nayo sesañāṇesupīti.
anya-e0104n0:1449_0: 741. Vahatīti pavattati. Ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo bhāvanāya paguṇabhāvena. Paguṇā ca bhāvanā
anya-e0104n0:1449_1: vikkhepābhāvato ārammaṇe appitā viya pavattatīti ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvena saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1449_2: lahuupaṭṭhānatā dassitā. Saṅkhāresu pana udayabbayavasena lahuṃ lahuṃ upaṭṭhahantesu
anya-e0104n0:1449_3: udayadassanañca “uppādavato vināso”ti yāvadeva vayadassanatthaṃ tassa nibbidāvahattāti
anya-e0104n0:1449_4: vaye evassa ābhogasamannāhāro manasikāro pavattati, tena uppādādiṃ muñcitvā vayamevārabbha
anya-e0104n0:1449_5: ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. Tena vuttaṃ “uppādaṃ vā”tiādi. Tattha uppādanti nibbattivikāraṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1449_6: Ṭhitinti ṭhitippattaṃ, jaranti attho. Pavattanti upādinnakappavattaṃ. Nimittanti
anya-e0104n0:1449_7: saṅkhāranimittaṃ. Yaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ samudayādighanavasena, sakiccaparicchedatāya ca
anya-e0104n0:1449_8: saviggahānaṃ viya upaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ. Keci pana “pavattaṃ nāma saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1449_9: avicchedena pavattanaṃ uppādova, nimittaṃ nāma uppannānaṃ vijjamānatā ṭhānaparamparā,
anya-e0104n0:1449_10: tasmā uppādameva gaṇhāti ce, pavattaṃ gaṇhāti nāma. Ṭhitiṃyeva gaṇhāti ce, nimittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1449_11: gaṇhāti nāmā”ti vadanti, taṃ “uppādaṃ vā”tiādivacanena virujjhati. Na hi asati bhede
anya-e0104n0:1449_12: vikappo yutto. Na sampāpuṇāti aggahaṇato. Kiṃ pana sampāpuṇātīti āha “khaya…pe… santiṭṭhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1449_13: Tattha nirodhasaddo anuppādepi dissatīti bhedasaddena visesitaṃ, bhedasaddo visesavācakopi
anya-e0104n0:1449_14: hotīti vayasaddena visesitaṃ, sopi anirodhavācakopi atthīti khayasaddena visesitaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1449_15: khayavayabhedasaṅkhāte khaṇikanirodheti attho. Sati santiṭṭhatīti satisīsena ñāṇamāha.
anya-e0104n0:1449_16: Etasmiṃ ṭhāneti upakkilesavinimuttassa udayabbayañāṇassa tikkhabhāvāpattiyaṃ vuttanayena
anya-e0104n0:1450_1: hi niddeso “sayaṃ abhiññā”tiādīsu viya. Yathāvuttassa vā ārammaṇassa khayavayabhedavasena
anya-e0104n0:1450_2: paṭisaṅkhā ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā. Bhaṅgānupassaneti yo tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgo,
anya-e0104n0:1450_3: tassa anupassane. Paññāti pakārato jānanā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ idāneva saṃvaṇṇīyati.
anya-e0104n0:1451_0: 742. Yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇanti rūpaṃ yāva jarāmaraṇanti vipassitabbabhāvena gahitaṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1451_1: saṅkhāragatamāha. Paṭisaṅkhānaṃ nāma jānanaṃ, tañca bhaṅgānupassanāya adhippetattā
anya-e0104n0:1451_2: bhaṅgato dassanamevāti āha “jānitvā khayato vayato disvāti attho”ti. Tassa ñāṇassāti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1452_0: Rūpārammaṇameva rūpārammaṇatā yathā “devo eva devatā”ti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1452_1: citta”nti vuttaṃ. Rūpārammaṇatāti vā bhummatthe paccattavacananti dassento “atha
anya-e0104n0:1452_2: vā rūpārammaṇabhāve”ti āha. Aparena cittena bhaṅgaṃ anupassatīti vipassanāvisayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1452_3: bhaṅgānupassanamāha. Evañhi bhaṅgānupassanā paguṇā hoti, ārammaṇañcassa vibhūtataraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1452_4: hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Ñātanti ārammaṇamāha anupassanāvasena ñātattā. Ñāṇanti anupassanāñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1452_5: Ubhopi vipassatīti tadubhayampi khayato vayato vipassatīti. Ayaṃ hettha saṅkhepattho
anya-e0104n0:1452_6: – rūpassa yāva jarāmaraṇassa khayato vayato dassanaṃ ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhātaṃ, dassanakañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1452_7: khayato vayato dassanaṃ ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāya bhaṅgassa anupassananti ubhayattha paññā.
anya-e0104n0:1452_8: Purimaṃ vā tadabhāve abhāvato pacchimāyaṃ pakkhipitvā pacchimā eva paññā vipassane ñāṇanti.
anya-e0104n0:1453: Etthāti “tassa cittassa…pe… bhaṅgaṃ anupassatī”ti ettha. Anekehi ākārehīti aniccato anupassanādīhi anekehi ākārehi. Anu-saddo “bhiyyo”ti etasmiṃ attheti āha “punappunaṃ passatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1454_0: Idha saṅkhatadhammo nāma jātijarāmaraṇapakatiko, tassa jāti ādikoṭi, jarā majjhimakoṭi,
anya-e0104n0:1454_1: maraṇaṃ osānakoṭi. Tattha kiñcāpi uppādāditividhampi saṅkhatalakkhaṇatāya aniccalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1454_2: tathāpi jātijarāsu diṭṭhāsu na tathā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti yathā
anya-e0104n0:1454_3: vayakkhaṇeti āha “bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭī”ti, uttamā koṭi pariyosānakoṭīti
anya-e0104n0:1454_4: attho. Yathā hi jarādhammaṃ, maraṇadhammameva ca jāyatīti jāti aniccatāya ādi koṭi,
anya-e0104n0:1454_5: tathā jātidhammaṃ, maraṇadhammameva ca jīratīti jarā majjhimā koṭi, jātidhammaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1454_6: jarādhammameva ca bhijjatīti bhaṅgo paramā koṭīti. Aniccato anupassatīti na kalāpato
anya-e0104n0:1454_7: sammasanto viya “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”ti anumānavasena, nāpi āraddhavipassako viya
anya-e0104n0:1454_9: upaṭṭhitesu udayavayesu vuttanayena udayaṃ muñcitvā bhaṅgadassanavaseneva aniccato
anya-e0104n0:1454_10: anupassati, evaṃ anupassato panassa niccagāhassa lesopi natthīti āha “no niccato”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1454_11: Tathā hesa niccasaññaṃ pajahatīti vuccati. Ettha ca “aniccato eva anupassatī”ti eva-kāro
anya-e0104n0:1454_12: luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “no niccato”ti vuttaṃ. Na cettha
anya-e0104n0:1454_14: upari desanāruḷhattā ca tāsaṃ. Dukkhato anupassatītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:1455_0: Aniccato tāva anupassanā bhaṅgānupassakassa yuttā “bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā
anya-e0104n0:1455_1: koṭī”ti, dukkhādito pana kathanti āha “aniccassa dukkhattā”tiādi. Etena yaṃ aniccaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1455_2: taṃ ekantato dukkhaṃ anattā, tato ca na abhinandaniyādirūpaṃ. Tasmā upari nibbattetabbato
anya-e0104n0:1455_3: ñāṇaparikammatthañca itarāsampi channaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena anupassatīti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1455_4: Keci panettha “aniccato anupassati, no niccatotiādinā visuṃ dassanakiccaṃ natthi,
anya-e0104n0:1455_5: bhaṅgadassaneneva sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ hotī”ti vadanti, taṃ bhaṅgānupassanāya matthakappattiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1455_6: yuttaṃ, tato pana pubbabhāge anekākāravokārā anupassanā icchitabbāva. Aññathā “aniccato
anya-e0104n0:1455_7: anupassatī”tiādikā pāḷi, “anekehi ākārehi punappunaṃ passatī”ti āgatā tassā aṭṭhakathā
anya-e0104n0:1455_8: ca virodhitā siyā. Tadeva aniccato diṭṭhameva sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1456_0: Na taṃ abhinanditabbanti taṃ saṅkhāragataṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanavasena “etaṃ mama,
anya-e0104n0:1456_1: eso me attā”ti na abhinanditabbaṃ. Na tattha rañjitabbanti tattha saṅkhāragate rañjanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1456_2: na pavattitabbaṃ, kāmarāgo, bhavarāgo vā na pavattetabboti attho. Rāgaṃ nirodhetīti
anya-e0104n0:1456_3: rāgaṃ vikkhambhananirodhaṃ pāpeti, vikkhambhetīti attho. Tenāha “lokikeneva tāva
anya-e0104n0:1456_4: ñāṇenā”ti. Sati ca vikkhambhane kathaṃ samudayoti āha “no samudeti, samudayaṃ na karotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1457_0: Evaṃ virattoti evaṃ bhaṅgānupassanānusārena viratto. Yathā diṭṭhaṃ sampati upaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1457_1: saṅkhāragataṃ nirodheti nirodhaṃ manasi karoti, adiṭṭhampi atītānāgataṃ anvayañāṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:1457_2: yathā idaṃ etarahi, evaṃ itarepīti anuminanto nirodheti manasikatassāpi nirodhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1457_3: karoti. No samudetīti etthāpi eseva nayo, no samudayaṃ manasi karotīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1458_0: Evaṃ paṭipannoti evaṃ vuttappakārena aniccānupassanādivasena paṭipanno. Saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi
anya-e0104n0:1458_1: kilesānaṃ pariccajanatoti khandhehi, abhisaṅkhārehi ca saha kilesānaṃ pajahanato.
anya-e0104n0:1458_2: Kilese hi pajahanto tannimittakakammaṃ, tato nibbattanake khandhe ca pajahati nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1458_5: pakkhandanattho cāti paṭinissaggassa duvidhatā vuttā. Tattha pakkhandanaṃ adhimuccanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1458_7: uppādanavasena. Nibbattento hi kilese ādiyatīti te anibbattento kilese na ādiyati
anya-e0104n0:1458_8: nāma. Adosadassitāvasenāti dosānaṃ adassāvibhāvena. Saṅkhatārammaṇaṃ ādiyatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1458_9: Anādīnavadassitāya hi saṅkhāre ādiyatīti ādīnavadassitāya te na ādiyati na gaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:1459_0: 743. Assāti yogino. Tehi ñāṇehīti aniccānupassanādiñāṇehi. Tanti pahānaṃ. Niccasaññanti
anya-e0104n0:1459_1: niccagāhaṃ, saññāsīsena niddeso. Sukhasaññaṃ attasaññanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sappītikaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1460_2: ekattanayena vuttaṃ, aññathā aññadeva rūpabhaṅgavisayaṃ ñāṇaṃ, aññadeva tadārammaṇacittabhaṅgavisayanti
anya-e0104n0:1460_3: kuto saṅkamanā. Paññāvivaṭṭanāyapi eseva nayo. Paññāyāti udayabbayadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1460_4: pavattamānāya vipassanāpaññāya. Vayasseva gahaṇavasena udayato vinivaṭṭanā. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:1460_5: “udayaṃ pahāya vaye santiṭṭhanā”ti. “Anantarameva āvajjanasamatthatā”ti iminā bhaṅgānupassanāya
anya-e0104n0:1461: 745. Ubhoti diṭṭhādiṭṭhabhāvena dvepi ārammaṇāni. Ekavavatthanāti khaṇabhaṅguratāya samānāti vavatthāpanā.
anya-e0104n0:1462_0: Saṃvijjamānamhīti paccakkhato upalabbhamāne paccuppanne. Visuddhadassanoti bhaṅgadassanassa
anya-e0104n0:1462_1: paribandhavidhamanena visuddhañāṇo, suvisuddhabhaṅgadassanoti attho. Tadanvayaṃ netīti
anya-e0104n0:1462_2: tassa paccuppannasaṅkhārabhaṅgadassino ñāṇassa anvayaṃ anugatabhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavatteti.
anya-e0104n0:1462_3: Kattha pana pavattetīti āha “atītanāgate”ti, atīte, anāgate ca saṅkhāragate. Sabbepītiādi
anya-e0104n0:1463_0: Bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe, na nibbānasaṅkhāteti adhippāyo. Esāti yā ārammaṇanvayena
anya-e0104n0:1463_1: ubho diṭṭhādiṭṭhe khaṇabhaṅguratāya ekabhāvena vavatthāpanā, esā vayalakkhaṇe vipariṇāmalakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:1464_1: daḷhīkaraṇaṃ. Tayidaṃ bhaṅgadassanaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ avasavattanāvabodhanena anattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhāyāti
anya-e0104n0:1464_2: taṃ dassento “suññato ca upaṭṭhāna”nti āha. Ārammaṇassa hi bhaṅgārammaṇacittassa
anya-e0104n0:1464_3: ca bhaṅgamanupassato visesato saṅkhārā suññā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Tenāha “tasseva”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1465_0: Na catthi aññoti ettha imasmiṃ loke añño khandhavinimutto attā nāma koci natthi.
anya-e0104n0:1465_1: Tesaṃ khayaṃ passatīti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe upaṭṭhahantaṃ bhaṅgaṃ passati.
anya-e0104n0:1465_2: Yathāvuttāya appamādapaṭipattiyā appamatto. Yathā kiṃ? Maṇiṃva vijjhaṃ vajirena yoniso
anya-e0104n0:1465_3: yathā nāma kusalo puriso upāyena maṇiṃ vijjhanto maṇissa chiddameva passati manasi
anya-e0104n0:1465_4: karoti, na maṇissa vaṇṇādiṃ, evameva saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ bhaṅgameva yoniso manasi
anya-e0104n0:1465_5: karoti, na saṅkhāreti adhippāyo. Yathā vā vajirena maṇiṃ vijjhantassa viddhaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1465_6: na puna ruhati, evaṃ vajirasadisena bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇena bhaṅge diṭṭhe na puna niccagāho
anya-e0104n0:1466_0: Yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāti “rūpārammaṇatā cittaṃ uppajjitvā bhijjati, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1466_1: paṭisaṅkhā”ti evamāgatā yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā, “tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassatī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1466_2: evaṃ vuttā yā ca bhaṅgānupassanā, “saṅkhārāva bhijjanti, tesaṃ bhedo maraṇaṃ, na
anya-e0104n0:1466_3: añño koci atthī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ yañca suññato upaṭṭhānaṃ, ayaṃ evaṃ tidhā vuttāpi
anya-e0104n0:1467_1: Tayo upaṭṭhāneti aniccādivasena tividhe upaṭṭhāne. Khayato vayato upaṭṭhānañhi aniccato
anya-e0104n0:1467_2: upaṭṭhānaṃ, bhayato upaṭṭhānaṃ dukkhato, suññato upaṭṭhānaṃ anattatoti. Diṭṭhīsūti
anya-e0104n0:1467_3: diṭṭhinimittaṃ na vedhati. Tā hi asaṃhīratāya na calati.
anya-e0104n0:1468_0: 748. Dubbalabhājanassa viyāti tintaāmamattikābhājanassa viya bhedameva passatīti
anya-e0104n0:1468_1: sambandho. Ettha ca dubbalabhājanūpamā sarasabhiduratādassanatthaṃ, vippakiriyamānasukhumarajūpamā
anya-e0104n0:1468_2: aññamaññaṃ asambandhatādassanatthaṃ, bhijjiyamānatilūpamā khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanakabhāvadassanatthanti
anya-e0104n0:1468_3: daṭṭhabbā. Bhedamevāti vināsameva passati uppādādīnaṃ aggahaṇato. Evamevāti yathā
anya-e0104n0:1468_4: udakabubbuḷakāni udakatalādipaccayaṃ paṭicca uppannāni na ciraṭṭhitikāni sīghaṃ sīghaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1468_5: bhijjanti, evameva sabbe rūpārūpadhammā kammādipaccayaṃ paṭicca uppannā khaṇaṭṭhitikā
anya-e0104n0:1468_6: sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bhijjantīti bhedameva passati. Turitaturitañhi nesaṃ bhedadassanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1469_0: Marīcipi ittarakālikāva, nissayapabandhavasena pana ciratarupaṭṭhānanti “yathā passe
anya-e0104n0:1469_1: marīcika”nti vuttaṃ, na ayāthāvupaṭṭhānatova. Lokanti khandhalokaṃ. Maccurājā na
anya-e0104n0:1470_0: 749. Bhavadiṭṭhippahānanti sassatadiṭṭhiyā vikkhambhanaṃ. Na hi nirantaraṃ bhaṅgameva
anya-e0104n0:1470_1: passato sassatadiṭṭhiyā avasaro atthi. Tato eva jīvite nirālayattā jīvitanikantipariccāgo.
anya-e0104n0:1470_2: Sadāti sabbakālaṃ rattindivaṃ. Bhāvanāya yuttappayuttatā. Icchācārānaṃ dūrībhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1470_3: visuddhājīvitā. Ussukkappahānaṃ kiccākiccesu abyāvaṭatā tibbasaṃvegattā. Vigatabhayatā
anya-e0104n0:1470_4: kutocipi nibbhayatā attasinehābhāvato. Khantisoraccapaṭilābho aniccatāya sudiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0104n0:1470_5: Pantasenāsanesu adhikusalesu ca aratiyā, kāmaguṇesu ratiyā ca sahanato abhibhavanato aratiratisahanatā.
anya-e0104n0:1471: Imāni aṭṭhagguṇamuttamānīti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ. Ma-kāro ca padasandhikaro, bhavadiṭṭhippahānādike ime aṭṭha uttamānisaṃseti attho. Tahinti tattha bhaṅgānupassanāyanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1474_0: 750. Sabbasaṅkhārānanti tebhūmakānaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ. Adhikāravasena hi padesasabbavisayo
anya-e0104n0:1474_1: idha sabbasaddo. Āsevantassāti ādaravasena sevantassa pavattentassa. Bhāventassāti
anya-e0104n0:1474_2: vaḍḍhentassa brūhentassa. Bahulīkarontassāti punappunaṃ karontassa yuñjantassa. Pabhedakāti
anya-e0104n0:1474_3: khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanavasena pabhedakā. Ājīvikā byādhiādinimittaṃ maritukāmassa, amaritukāmassāpi
anya-e0104n0:1474_4: sūrassa bhāyitabbampi na bhayato upaṭṭhātīti “sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1474_5: vuttaṃ. Yathā bhīrukajātikassa sīhādayo santāsanimittaṃ bhayānakabhāvato, tathā yogino
anya-e0104n0:1474_6: bhaṅgato dissamānā saṅkhārāti āha “sīha…pe… upaṭṭhahantī”ti. Paccuppannāti addhāpaccuppannā
anya-e0104n0:1474_7: oḷārikā dīghatarapabandhā, khaṇapaccuppannā sukhumatarā ittarakālā, santatipaccuppannā
anya-e0104n0:1474_8: majjhimā idha ādito pariggahetabbā. Bhayato bhāyitabbato upatiṭṭhanakesu ñāṇaṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1475_0: Yathā itthiyā puttānaṃ sīsassa chinnatā chijjamānatā gayhamānā bhayāvahā, evaṃ yogino
anya-e0104n0:1475_1: tiyaddhagatānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā gayhamānāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ekissā kira
anya-e0104n0:1476_0: Yathā pūtibhūtaṃ odanādi na sabhāvena tiṭṭhati vinassati, evaṃ yassā itthiyā vijātavijātā
anya-e0104n0:1476_1: puttā na jīvanti maranti eva, sā “pūtipajā”ti vuttā. Pūtipajāggahaṇañcettha visesato
anya-e0104n0:1476_3: Atītapaccuppannasaṅkhāranirodho hissa supākaṭo evāti na so upamāya sādhetabbo. Antimabhavikassa
anya-e0104n0:1476_4: ca yogino sattakkhattuṃ paramādibhāvino atīte dukkhabahutāya, anāgatadukkhaparittatāya
anya-e0104n0:1477_0: Tattha yathā tassā nava puttā matā, evaṃ ajjhattādippabhedā atītā saṅkhārā, vusitapubbā
anya-e0104n0:1477_1: vā nava sattāvāsā daṭṭhabbā, mīyamānaputto viya paccuppannā saṅkhārā, pavattamāno
anya-e0104n0:1477_2: vā sattāvāso daṭṭhabbo. Ajātaputto viya anāgatā saṅkhārā, bhāvī vā sattāvāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1477_3: Evamavaṭṭhite yadeke dasaputtamātaraṃ aggahetvā navaputtamātuggahaṇaṃ sātthakanti
anya-e0104n0:1477_4: vadanti, tadapāhataṃ hoti. Dārakānaṃ maraṇassa cirakālikattā maraṇānussaraṇanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1477_5: Gabbhagato appaccakkhatāya bhāvīpakkheyeva tiṭṭhatīti adhippāyena kucchigato anāgatasaṅkhāraṭṭhāniyo
anya-e0104n0:1477_6: vutto. Etasmiṃ khaṇeti bhaṅgadassanamukhena saṅkhārānaṃ bhayānakabhāvena upaṭṭhānakkhaṇe.
anya-e0104n0:1478_0: 751. Na bhāyati ñāṇassa bhāyanākārena appavattanato. Paṭighacittuppādavasena hi bhāyanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1478_1: ñāṇaṃ pana bhāyitabbavatthuṃ bhāyitabbanti yāthāvato jānāti. Tenāha “atītā…pe… tīraṇamattamevā”ti,
anya-e0104n0:1478_2: tisso aṅgārakāsuyo atitāpena tikkhamajjhamudubhedāti adhippāyo. Kāmabhavādīnañhi
anya-e0104n0:1478_3: tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ nidassanabhāvena tāsaṃ gahaṇaṃ, tathā khadirādisūlattayassa appaṇītādibhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1478_4: Tenāha “kevalaṃ hī”tiādi. Assāti ñāṇassa. Byasanāpannāti nānāvidhavipulānatthapatitā.
anya-e0104n0:1479_1: viya upaṭṭhāna”nti vuttovāyamattho. Saṅkhārānaṃ pana tathā upaṭṭhānaṃ saṅkhāravinimuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1479_2: na hotīti āha “atītā…pe… adhivacana”nti. Maraṇamevāti bhaṅgameva. Tenāti bhaṅgadassanena.
anya-e0104n0:1479_3: Khaṇe khaṇe bhaṅgameva passato hi nimittasaññitaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccatāya vuttanayena
anya-e0104n0:1479_4: sappaṭibhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Pavattaṃ nāma kāmaṃ sabbā bhavapavatti, matthakappattāya
anya-e0104n0:1479_5: pana bhaṅgānupassanāya sabbabhavesu abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhānato
anya-e0104n0:1479_6: santasukhābhimatāpi bhavā dukkhasabhāvatāya bhayato upaṭṭhahantīti dassanatthaṃ “pavattanti
anya-e0104n0:1479_7: rūpārūpabhavapavattī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ubhayanti nimittaṃ, pavattañca. Dvayampi hi taṃ
anya-e0104n0:1482_0: 752. Tāṇanti saṅkhārahetukā anattato rakkhaṇaṃ. Neva paññāyati sabbabhavādīnaṃ sādīnavatāya
anya-e0104n0:1482_1: ekasadisattā. Leṇanti tassa pariharaṇatāṇāya upalīyanaṃ. Gatīti tadatthaṃ gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1482_2: Paṭisaraṇanti tasseva paṭisaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Patthanāti āsīsanā na hoti. Etena “netaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1482_3: mamā”ti taṇhāgāhābhāvamāha. Parāmāsoti diṭṭhiparāmāso. Tena “eso me attā”ti diṭṭhigāhābhāvamāha.
anya-e0104n0:1482_4: Taṇhāgāhābhāveneva cettha “esohamasmī”ti mānagāhābhāvopi vuttoyeva hoti, vā-saddaggahaṇena vā.
anya-e0104n0:1483_0: Idāni patthanādīnamabhāve kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tayo bhavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tayo
anya-e0104n0:1483_1: bhavā aṅgārakāsuyo viya jātiādidukkhādhiṭṭhānabhāvena mahābhitāpatāya. Cattāro mahābhūtā
anya-e0104n0:1483_3: visesato, avisesato pana āsayato, visavikārato, anatthadānato, durupacārato, durāsadato,
anya-e0104n0:1483_4: akataññuto, avisesakārito, anekādīnavūpaddavato ca. “Cattāro āsīvisā uggatejā ghoravisāti
anya-e0104n0:1483_5: kho, bhikkhave, catunnetaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ adhivacana”nti hi vuttaṃ. Pañcakkhandhā ekakkhandhabhede
anya-e0104n0:1483_7: viya. Vuttampi cetaṃ “ukkhittāsiko vadhakoti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1483_8: adhivacana”nti. Cha ajjhattikāyatanāni attattaniyabhāvena gahitānipi tato rittabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1483_9: suññagāmo viya bhojanādigayhupagamettha atthīti paviṭṭhasuññagāmo viya. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
anya-e0104n0:1484_0: “Suññagāmoti kho, bhikkhave, channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Cakkhuto
anya-e0104n0:1484_1: cepi naṃ, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto medhāvī upaparikkheyya, rittakaññeva khāyati,
anya-e0104n0:1485_0: Ādi. Cha bāhirāyatanāni gāmaghātakacorā viya sabbathāpi ghātakabhāvato. Tenevāha
anya-e0104n0:1485_1: “corā gāmaghātakāti kho, bhikkhave, channetaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Cakkhu,
anya-e0104n0:1485_2: bhikkhave, haññati manāpāmanāpesu rūpesū”tiādi. Rāgaggiādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0104n0:1486: “Cakkhu, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ. Kena ādittaṃ? Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehī”ti –
anya-e0104n0:1487_0: Ādi. Saṅkhārānaṃ gaṇḍādisadisatā heṭṭhā vuttāyeva. Nirassādāti assādetabbarahitā
anya-e0104n0:1487_1: dukkhasabhāvattā. Nirasāti sampattirahitā vipattipariyosānattā. Sabbattha yathā heṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:1487_2: nirassādā nirasā mahāādīnavarāsibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti sambandho, evaṃ uparipi
anya-e0104n0:1488_0: Sasaddūlāti sabyagghā. Gāhā kumbhilādayo. Rakkhaso dakarakkhaso. “Nirasaṃ nirassāda”nti
anya-e0104n0:1488_1: iminā ādīnavassa abbokiṇṇataṃ dasseti. Tathā hissa yogino sabbesu bhavādīsu sabbepi
anya-e0104n0:1488_2: saṅkhārā nissaggato nirantaraṃ sappaṭibhayāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Yañca sappaṭibhayaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1489: Yanti ādīnavañāṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuttanti idaṃ dasavatthukaṃ dvādasavārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ anvayabyatirekavasena tasseva padabhājanaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1490_0: Uppādo bhayanti saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo akhemaṭṭhena bhayavatthutāya bhayaṃ. Uppādamūlakañhi
anya-e0104n0:1490_1: sabbaṃ taṃ sabbavatthukanti sabyasanaṃ. Pavattaṃ bhayantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Natthi
anya-e0104n0:1490_2: etassa uppādo, na vā etasmiṃ adhigate saṅkhārānaṃ āyatiṃ uppādoti anuppādo, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1490_3: Tañca sabbaso bhayābhāvato paramassāsabhūtattā nibbhayaṭṭhena khemanti. Santipadeti
anya-e0104n0:1490_5: nibbānameva vadati. Pavattiyaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā tadanantarameva nivattiyaṃ ānisaṃsadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1490_6: sīghaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpentānaṃ vasena “uppādo bhayaṃ, anuppādo khema”nti tatiyavāro
anya-e0104n0:1490_7: vutto. Eseva nayo chaṭṭhavārādīsupi. Ettha ca uppādo viseso, bhayaṃ visesitabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1490_8: sāmaññabhāvatoti satipi dvinnaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāve liṅgabhedo gahito. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:1491: Uppādo saṅkhārāti ettha pana sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṃ sāmaññena gahetvā saṅkhārā bhedato vihitā sabbatthakameva tesaṃ vibhāgato vipassiyamānattāti vacanabhedo kato.
anya-e0104n0:1492_0: Āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ “dukkha”nti passatīti sambandho. Ñāṇaṃ ādīnave idanti ādīnave
anya-e0104n0:1492_1: visayabhūte idaṃ pañcavatthukaṃ ñāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ñāṇaṃ santipadeti santipade ninnādibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1493_0: 753. Kammapaccayā paccuppannabhave uppajjamānānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo pākaṭataro hutvā
anya-e0104n0:1493_1: upaṭṭhātīti āha “purimakammapaccayā idha uppattī”ti. Pavattaṃ nāma idha pavattiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1493_2: dhammappavattīti āha “uppannassa pavattī”ti. Sabbampīti tiyaddhagataṃ rūpārūpaṃ ajjhattabahiddhādivibhāgaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1493_3: sabbampi. Kammanti etarahi pavattaṃ kammaṃ. Ettha ca uppādapavattaāyūhanaggahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:1493_5: upādittā. Uppādaggahaṇena ca atītaddhapariyāpannā kammasaṅkhārā ulliṅgattā. Nimittaggahaṇena
anya-e0104n0:1493_6: pana sabbepi gahitā. Yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti sā nirayādibhedā gati sucaritaduccaritavasena
anya-e0104n0:1493_7: gantabbattā, sā panatthato taṃtaṃkammaniyamitā bhavasamaññārahā vipākakkhandhā, kaṭattā
anya-e0104n0:1493_8: ca rūpanti veditabbā. Khandhānaṃ nibbattananti sabbesampi khandhānaṃ nibbattanaṃ.
