anya-e0104n0:1493_9: Pākaṭā eva saccavibhaṅge lakkhaṇādivasena niddiṭṭhattā. Vatthuvasenāti ārammaṇasaṅkhātapavattiṭṭhānavasena.
anya-e0104n0:1493_10: Yadi te pañceva vatthubhāvena icchitā, atha kasmā sesā vuttāti āha “sesā tesaṃ vevacanavasenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1493_11: Tena vipassakānaṃ ñāṇavipphārassa visayasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ desanā vaḍḍhitāti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1494_0: Anvayato dassitassa ādīnavañāṇassa byatirekato dassanatthaṃ paṭipakkhañāṇadassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1494_1: “yattha uppādo natthi, tattha sabbena sabbaṃ bhayampi natthī”ti. “Bhayatupaṭṭhānena
anya-e0104n0:1494_2: vā”tiādinā pavattiṃ dassetvā nivattidassanaṃ buddhānaṃ, anubuddhānañca āciṇṇametaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1494_3: yathā purimaṃ saccadvayaṃ dassetvā nirodhasaccadesanāti dasseti. Yathā loke kassaci
anya-e0104n0:1494_4: ādīnavadassanaṃ niratthakampi hoti, na tathā idaṃ, idaṃ pana sātthakamevāti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1494_5: dassetuṃ “yasmā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tappaṭipakkhaninnaṃ cittaṃ hoti dāhābhibhūtassa
anya-e0104n0:1494_6: sītaninnatā viya suṭṭhu diṭṭhādīnavato ekaṃsena muñcitukamyatābhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1495_0: Bhayanti bhāyitabbaṃ. “Niyamato dukkha”nti etenassa dukkhabhāvena bhāyitabbatāti
anya-e0104n0:1495_1: bhāyitabbatā dukkhabhāvaṃ na byabhicaratīti dasseti. Vaṭṭāmisaṃ upādinnakkhandhāti
anya-e0104n0:1495_2: vadanti. Tividhampi vaṭṭaṃ, vaṭṭasannissitañca vaṭṭāmisaṃ. Kilesehi āmasitabbato
anya-e0104n0:1495_3: lokāmisaṃ, pañca kāmaguṇā. Kilesā eva kilesāmisaṃ. Saṅkhāramattamevāti ettha eva-saddena
anya-e0104n0:1495_4: visaṅkhāraṃ nivatteti. Na hi tattha sāmisatālesopi atthīti. Matta-saddena pana aparipuṇṇataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1495_5: vibhāveti. Na hi sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ sāmisanti. Tasmāti “bhaya”nti vuttassa dukkhādibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1495_6: niyatattā. Yadi yaṃ bhayaṃ, taṃ dukkhādisabhāvameva, tathā sati bhayādīsu ekeneva
anya-e0104n0:1495_7: atthasiddhi. Kasmā sabbāni gahitānīti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “evaṃ santepī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1495_8: Yathā tesu eva saṅkhāresu aniccato dukkhato anattato pavattivasena ākāranānattato
anya-e0104n0:1495_9: anupassanānānattaṃ, evaṃ bhayākārādiākāranānattato pavattivasenevettha ñāṇassa nānattaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1495_10: Tattha bhayākārena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ, itarākāravasena pavattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1496_0: Yasmā ādīnavañāṇassa visayabhāvena vuttā pannarasāpi atthā uppādādīsu pañcasveva
anya-e0104n0:1496_1: antogadhā, tattha ca ñāṇaṃ anvayabyatirekavasena pavattanato dasavidhaṃ hoti. Tasmā
anya-e0104n0:1496_2: āha “dasa ñāṇe pajānātī”ti. Pajānanañca sātisayaṃ visayagatasammohavigamena asammūḷhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1496_3: attanipi asammūḷhamevāti attānampi pajānantaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Tenāha “paṭivijjhati
anya-e0104n0:1496_4: sacchikarotī”ti. Dvinnanti dvīsu kusalasaddayogena hi bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ yathā
anya-e0104n0:1496_5: “kusalā naccagītassā”ti. Kusalatāti karaṇe paccattavacananti āha “dvinnaṃ kusalatāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1496_6: Dvinnanti vā dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vasenāti attho. Pavattiyā yāthāvato diṭṭhatāya tappaṭipakkhato
anya-e0104n0:1496_7: santipadaṃ suvinicchitameva hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Tenassa cittaṃ paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānādimicchāgāhavasena
anya-e0104n0:1496_8: na vicalati. Tattha suparidiṭṭhādīnavattāti āha “nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī”tiādi. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
anya-e0104n0:1499_0: 754. Saṅkhāragateti sabbasmiṃ tebhūmake saṅkhāre. Nibbindatīti ñāṇanibbidena nibbedaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1499_1: āpajjati. Tathābhūto ca tattha ukkaṇṭhanto, anabhiramanto ca nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “ukkaṇṭhati nābhiramatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1500_0: Tattha anabhiramaṇassa upamaṃ dassetuṃ “seyyathāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Anotattadahaṃ parikkhipitvā
anya-e0104n0:1500_2: pañcasu himavato mahāsikharesu pacchimo cittakūṭapabbato nāma. Sīhapapātādīsu sattasu mahāsaresu.
anya-e0104n0:1501: Suvaṇṇapañjareti suvaṇṇamaye sīhapañjare. Pakkhittoti niruddho. Tividhe sugatibhaveti kāmasugatiādike tividhe sampattibhave.
anya-e0104n0:1502_0: Hatthapādavālavatthikosehi bhūmiphusanehi sattahi patiṭṭhitoti sattapatiṭṭho. Nagaramajjhe
anya-e0104n0:1504_1: Yasmā bhayato dissamānā eva saṅkhārā mahādīnavā, nibbinditabbā ca hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0104n0:1504_2: tasmā ekampi taṃ ñāṇaṃ tathābhāvanābalappattiyā avatthāvisesayuttaṃ tividhakiccasāmatthiyavantaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1505: Tayidaṃ tāsaṃ anupassanānaṃ matthakappattivasena vuttaṃ, ādimhi pana bhinnasabhāvā eva pavattanti. Uppādesīti pātvākāsi, vibhāvesīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1507_0: 756. Na sajjati bahvādīnavatāya diṭṭhattā. Muñcitukāmaṃ nissaritukāmaṃ hoti anādikālikassa
anya-e0104n0:1507_1: khandhassa pariññāyamānattā. Muñcitukāmatā tato attānaṃ nibbedhetukāmatā nissaritukāmatā
anya-e0104n0:1507_2: apagantukāmatā. Pañjarapakkhittoti pañjarena samoruddho. Evamādayoti ādi-saddena
anya-e0104n0:1510_0: 757. “Sabbabhava …pe… muñcitukāmo”ti vatvā puna sabbasmā saṅkhāragatāti sabbaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1510_1: sātisayamuttidassanatthaṃ adhikavacanaṃ aññamatthaṃ bodhetīti. Yañhi saṅkhārehi ananubandhassa
anya-e0104n0:1510_2: muñcanaṃ, taṃ sātisayaṃ muñcanaṃ. Taṃ pana vuccamānāya paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya hotīti
anya-e0104n0:1510_3: taṃ dassetuṃ “puna te evaṃ saṅkhāre”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhārapariggaṇhanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1510_4: pubbepi katanti punaggahaṇaṃ. Bhavādigatassa saṅkhārassa aparitulitassa abhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1510_5: “te”ti vuttaṃ. Anupassanākārassa apubbassapi atthitāya “eva”nti vuttaṃ. Idāni vuccamānākārenāti
anya-e0104n0:1510_6: hi attho. Saṅkhārānaṃ pariggaṇhanaṃ nāma paripuṇṇalakkhaṇavaseneva hotīti “tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1511: Anaccantikatotiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Paṭhamena ādi-saddena “ādiantavantato niccapaṭikkhepato”ti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
anya-e0104n0:1513_0: Ajaññatoti amanuññato, asobhanato vā. Jegucchatoti “dhī”ti jigucchitabbato. Paṭikkūlatoti
anya-e0104n0:1513_1: abhiruciyā paṭilomanena paṭikkūlabhāvato. Na maṇḍanena hatā amaṇḍanahatā, amaṇḍanena
anya-e0104n0:1513_2: sakkā etesaṃ subhabhāvaṃ hantunti attho. Amaṇḍanena vā tesaṃ asubhatā pākaṭā hotīti
anya-e0104n0:1513_3: amaṇḍanahatā. Maṇḍanena vā na hantabbasabhāvā “asūriyapassā”ti viya amaṇḍanahatā.
anya-e0104n0:1513_4: Tato amaṇḍanahatabhāvatoti rūpasaṅkhāre sandhāya vadati. Virūpatoti asundarato. Paṭighasaṃyojanavatthutāya
anya-e0104n0:1513_5: passante attani bandhatīti bībhacchaṃ ativiya virūpaṃ. Yaṃ diṭṭhamattameva domanassuppattinimittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1513_6: hoti. Ajaññajigucchanīyatā hi gūthaṃ viya pariccajitabbaṃ vā bībhacchaṃ. Idha ādi-saddena
anya-e0104n0:1515: 758. Ayanti yogāvacaro. Muñcanassāti puna ananubandhanatthaṃ sumuttamuñcanassa. Upāyasampādanatthanti aniccādivasena suṭṭhu pariggaṇhanaṃ parimaddanā upāyo, tassa sādhanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1516_0: Macchagahaṇatthaṃ udake tattha tattha khipanti etanti khippaṃ, macchānaṃ gahaṇakūṭapaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1516_1: Oḍḍāpesīti osāresi, khipīti attho. Sappanti kaṇhasappaṃ. Gahaṇeti yathāgahitaṃ sappaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1516_2: achaḍḍetvā gahaṇe. Hatthaṃ nibbeṭhetvāti sappena attano bhogena veṭhitaṃ hatthapadesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1516_3: nibbeṭhetvā mocetvā. Āvijjhitvā āveṭhikappahāpanena bhametvā. Nissajjitvāti chaḍḍetvā.
anya-e0104n0:1517_0: Tatthātiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Tattha āditovāti viññutaṃ pattakāle. Ghanavinibbhogaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1517_1: katvāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā samūhādighanaggahaṇaṃ bhinditvā. Sumuttanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso
anya-e0104n0:1517_2: “visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu viya. Saṅkhārānaṃ niccādiākārena upaṭṭhātuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1517_3: asamatthatā aniccasaññādibhedāya vipassanāya sātisayaṃ balavabhāvappattiyā, sā ca
anya-e0104n0:1517_5: pāpetvā”ti. Yathā hi nibbuddhakaraṇe balavatarena paṭimallena tattha tattha muṭṭhippahārādinā
anya-e0104n0:1517_6: vimathito itaro tena yujjhituṃ asamatthataṃ pāpito hoti. Na kevalaṃ asamatthataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1517_7: pāpitova hoti, atha kho maraṇamattaṃ dukkhaṃ vā maraṇaṃ vā pāpuṇāti, evametepi saṅkhārā
anya-e0104n0:1517_8: evaṃ dubbalabhāvaṃ pāpitā upariñāṇānubhāvena nibbisevanataṃ, sabbaso bhaṅgañca pāpuṇantīti.
anya-e0104n0:1518: 759. Ettāvatāti evaṃ “anaccantikato”tiādinā parocattālīsāya ākārehi saṅkhārānaṃ aniccādibhāvasallakkhaṇavasappavattena paṭisaṅkhānena.
anya-e0104n0:1519: Aniccato manasikarototiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānakathāyaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0104n0:1520_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – “paṭisaṅkhā”ti padassa “jānitvā”ti atthaṃ vatvā paṭisaṅkhānuppajjanakiriyānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1520_1: samānakhaṇattā asatipi pubbāparakālatte saddavohāramattena evaṃ vuttanti dassento
anya-e0104n0:1520_2: “kāma”ntiādimāha. Tena “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0104n0:1520_3: nihantvā timiraṃ sabbaṃ, uggatoyaṃ divākaro”ti ca evamādīsu viya samānakālavasenāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1520_4: saddapayogoti. Tathā manañca dhamme ca paṭhamaṃ paṭicca pacchā na manoviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1520_5: uppatti, evamidhāpīti dassetuṃ “manañca paṭiccā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ediso saddapayogo yebhuyyena
anya-e0104n0:1520_6: loke pubbakālavaseneva dissatīti pubbakālavaseneva idhāpi taṃ dassetuṃ “ekattanayena
anya-e0104n0:1520_7: vā…pe… veditabba”nti āha. Tassattho – aparāparaṃ uppannesu ñāṇesu purimassa vasena
anya-e0104n0:1520_8: paṭisaṅkhānakiriyā, tadaññassa vasena uppajjanakiriyā ca yojetabbā, na ca tāni bhedato
anya-e0104n0:1520_9: apekkhitabbāni ekasantānapatitatāya ekattanayavasena gahitattāti. Itarasmiṃ padadvayeti
anya-e0104n0:1520_10: “pavattaṃ paṭisaṅkhā, nimittañca pavattañca paṭisaṅkhā”ti imasmiṃ padadvaye.
anya-e0104n0:1523_1: visesato anattākārapariggaṇhanapadhānanti vuttaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā suññāti pariggahetvā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1523_2: Tasmiñhi sati saccasampaṭivedho ijjhati, na asati. Tadabhāvato hi aniccadukkhalakkhaṇapaññāpakampi
anya-e0104n0:1523_3: sarabhaṅgasatthārādīnaṃ sāsanaṃ aniyyānikameva jātaṃ. Atha vā tesaṃ niccasārādīhi
anya-e0104n0:1523_4: rittakaṃ sandhāya “sabbe saṅkhārā suññāti pariggahetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Yañhi yato rittakaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1523_5: taṃ tena suññanti. Saṅkhārānaṃ attasuññatāya duviññeyyabhāvato anekavāraṃ paṭividdhāyapi
anya-e0104n0:1523_7: yadaggena saṅkhārā anattatā, tadaggena anattaniyā. Sati hi attani attaniyena bhavitabbanti
anya-e0104n0:1523_8: vuttaṃ “suññamidaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā”ti. Dvikoṭikanti dviaṃsikaṃ, attānaṃ neva
anya-e0104n0:1523_9: disvā ñāṇacakkhunā paccakkhato, anumānato ca tassa anupalabbhanīyatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1523_10: Paraṃ aññaṃ sattaṃ, saṅkhāraṃ vā parikkhārabhāve attano sukhadukkhasādhanabhāve ṭhitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1523_11: na disvāti yojanā. Puna pariggaṇhātīti sambandho. Etthāti etasmiṃ suññatānupassanādhikāre.
anya-e0104n0:1524_0: Kvacīti katthaci ṭhāne, kāle, dhamme vā. Atha vā kvacīti ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā vā.
anya-e0104n0:1524_1: Attano attānanti sakattānaṃ. “Ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ brahmā mahābrahmā…pe… seṭṭho sajitā
anya-e0104n0:1524_2: vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna”ntiādinā parehi parikappitaṃ attānañca kassaci kiñcanabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1524_3: na passatīti dassento “kassacī”tiādimāha. Tattha parassāti “parajāti, paro puriso”ti
anya-e0104n0:1524_4: ca evaṃ gahitassa. Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-saddo aṭṭhāne payuttoti āha “mama-saddaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1524_5: tāva ṭhapetvā”ti. Parassa cāti attato aññassa. “Paro puriso”ti evaṃbhūto attho mamatthāya
anya-e0104n0:1524_6: ṭhito, tassa vasena mayhaṃ sabbaṃ sijjhatīti evaṃ ekaccadiṭṭhigatikaparikappitavasena
anya-e0104n0:1524_7: paraṃ attānaṃ tañca attano kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento “na ca kvacanī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1524_8: Ettha ca nāhaṃ kvacanīti sakaattano abhāvaṃ passati. Na kassaci kiñcanatasminti sakaattano
anya-e0104n0:1524_9: eva kassaci anattaniyataṃ passati. Na ca mamāti etaṃ dvayaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1524_10: Atthīti paccekaṃ. Na ca kvacani parassa attā atthīti parassa attano abhāvaṃ passati.
anya-e0104n0:1524_11: Tassa parassa attano mama kiñcanatā na catthīti parassa attano anattaniyataṃ passati.
anya-e0104n0:1524_12: Evaṃ ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā ca khandhānaṃ attattaniyasuññatā suddhasaṅkhārapuñjatā catukoṭikasuññatāpariggaṇhanena
anya-e0104n0:1525_0: 761. “Chahākārehī”tiādinā niddesādīsu tattha tattha āgate pakāre suññatānupassanāya
anya-e0104n0:1525_1: paribrūhanaṃ saṅgahetvā dasseti. Tattha chahākārehīti chahi gahaṇākārehi, gahetabbākārehi
anya-e0104n0:1525_2: vā. Niccenāti “nicco”ti parikappitena attanā vā aññena vā kenaci. Niccenāti vā niccabhāvena.
anya-e0104n0:1525_3: Dhuvādayo “nicco”ti gahitasseva gahetabbākārā. Tabbibhāgena hi imassa chakkatā. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:1525_4: niccatā nāma kūṭaṭṭhatā. Dhuvabhāvo thiratā. Sadā bhāvitā sassatatā. Nibbikāratā
anya-e0104n0:1525_5: avipariṇāmadhammatā. Yāva jarāmaraṇāti peyyālaṃ akatvā pariyosānapadameva dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1526_0: 762. Na sāranti asāraṃ, natthi etassa sāranti nissāraṃ. Sārato apagataṃ, sāraṃ vā
anya-e0104n0:1526_1: tato apagatanti sārāpagataṃ. Keci panettha “niccasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā
anya-e0104n0:1526_2: attasārasārena vā”ti pāḷīti adhippāyena “asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagata”nti padattayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1526_3: eko suññatāpariggahākāro, aññathā satteva ākārā siyuṃ, na aṭṭhāti vadanti. Apare
anya-e0104n0:1526_4: pana “subhasārasārenātipi pāḷiyaṃ atthīti ‘asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagata’nti idaṃ padattayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1527_0: 763. Niccasārādīnaṃ abhāvato rittato passati. Parittato, lāmakattā vā tucchato. Attasārābhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1527_1: suññato. Sayaṃ anattatāya anattato. Issariyassa abhāvato, kenaci issariyaṃ kāretuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1527_2: asakkuṇeyyatāya ca anissariyato. Pheṇapiṇḍena bhājanādiṃ kātukāmassa viya rūpassa
anya-e0104n0:1527_3: niccatādiṃ kātukāmassa taṃ na sijjhati, sakaicchāvasena vā kāci kiriyā natthīti akāmakāriyato.
anya-e0104n0:1527_4: “Evaṃ rūpaṃ hotu, mā eva”nti alabbhanīyato. Sayaṃ aññassa vase na vattati, nāpi aññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1527_5: attano vase vattetīti avasavattakato. Yasmiṃ santāne sayaṃ tassa paro viya avidheyyatāya
anya-e0104n0:1527_6: parato. Kārakādi viya kāraṇehi, phalena ca vivittato. Na hi kāraṇena phalaṃ, phalena
anya-e0104n0:1527_7: vā kāraṇaṃ sagabbhaṃ tiṭṭhati. Esa nayo vedanādīsupi.
anya-e0104n0:1528_0: 764. Rūpaṃ na sattotiādīsu yo lokavohārena satto, rūpaṃ so na hotīti ayamattho idha
anya-e0104n0:1528_1: nādhippeto tassāvuttasiddhattā. Na hi loko rūpamattaṃ “satto”ti voharati, bāhirakaparikappito
anya-e0104n0:1528_2: pana attā “satto”ti adhippeto. So hi tehi rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya paresaṃ sañjāpanaṭṭhena
anya-e0104n0:1528_3: “satto”ti vuccati, rūpaṃ so na hotīti attho. Suññatāpariggaṇhanañhetanti. Esa nayo
anya-e0104n0:1528_4: na jīvotiādīsupi. Tattha jīvanaṭṭhena jīvo. Naranaṭṭhena netubhāvena naro. “Ahamasmī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1528_5: mānuppattiṭṭhānatāya māno ettha vāti pavattatīti mānavo. Thiyati ettha gabbhoti itthī.
anya-e0104n0:1528_6: Padhānabhāvena puri setīti puriso. Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā. Paccattaṃ tassa tassa
anya-e0104n0:1528_7: ahaṃkāravatthutāya “aha”nti ca diṭṭhigatikehi attā vuccati, rūpaṃ pana tādisaṃ na
anya-e0104n0:1528_8: hotīti suññatāpariggaṇhanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ na satto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tasmā aṭṭhahipi
anya-e0104n0:1528_9: padehi rūpassa attasuññatāva dassitā. Itarehi catūhi tassa kiñcanatābhāvo. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:1528_10: na mamāti mayhaṃ attano santakaṃ na hoti, tathā aññassa attano santakaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1528_11: kassacipi attano santakaṃ na hoti attanoyeva abhāvato. “Na attaniya”nti padena pakāsito
anya-e0104n0:1528_12: evattho pariyāyantarehi tīhipi padehi pakāsito. Esa nayo vedanādīsupi.
anya-e0104n0:1529_3: idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ natthi. Sati ca tecattālīsa ākārā siyuṃ. Rūpappavattiyaṃ sabbādīnavūpaladdhiyā
anya-e0104n0:1529_4: ādīnavato. “Samudayato atthaṅgamato”ti idaṃ dvayaṃ yathā aniccato dassanaṃ panāḷikāya,
anya-e0104n0:1529_5: niccasāravirahadīpanena vā suññatāvibhāvanaṃ hoti, evaṃ suññatāvibhāvananti katvā
anya-e0104n0:1529_6: vuttaṃ. Tathā “yaṃ kho rūpaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa assādo”ti
anya-e0104n0:1529_8: dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa ādīnavo”ti ca dassanaṃ niccatādisuññatābhāvanato.
anya-e0104n0:1529_9: Tathā “yo rūpe chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ rūpassa nissaraṇa”nti evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1529_11: Yaṃ pana ādīnavato dassanaṃ, pubbe vatvāpi puna vacanaṃ assādapaṭikkhepato dassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1529_12: sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. Vedanādīsupi dvācattālīsa
anya-e0104n0:1529_13: ākārā netabbāti āha “vedanaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ aniccato…pe… nissaraṇato passatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1530: Vuttampi ca niddese etaṃ suññatāpariggaṇhanakathāsandassanaṃ “asukāya pāḷiyā ayaṃ niddeso”ti dassanatthaṃ, tassa phalasandassanatthañca.
anya-e0104n0:1531_0: 766. Evaṃ tīraṇapariññāvasena paccekaṃ khandhesu dvācattālīsāya ākārehi suññataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1531_2: dassento “evaṃ suññato”tiādimāha. Tattha pariggaṇhantoti sammasanto. Bhayañca nandiñca
anya-e0104n0:1531_3: vippahāyāti ajjhupekkhakatāya saṅkhārānaṃ vipattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakabhayañceva
anya-e0104n0:1531_4: tesaṃ sampattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakapītiñca pajahitvā. Atha vā bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena
anya-e0104n0:1531_6: Na hi sabbaso suññatāya diṭṭhāya bhayanandīnaṃ avasaro atthi, atha kho upekkhāva
anya-e0104n0:1531_7: saṇṭhāti. Tenāha “saṅkhāresu udāsīno hotī”ti. Tattha yena micchāgāhena anudāsīnatā
anya-e0104n0:1531_8: siyā, tadabhāvaṃ dassento “ahanti vā mamanti vā na gaṇhātī”ti āha. Idānissa udāsīnatāya
anya-e0104n0:1532_0: Tattha anudāsīnatāpubbikā udāsīnatā vuccamānā idha opammatthaṃ pharatīti dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1532_1: “iṭṭhā kantā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ativiya naṃ mamāyeyya itthīnaṃ sāṭheyyakūṭeyyavaṅkeyyādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1532_2: ajānanato. Muñcitukāmo hutvāti muñcitukāmova hutvā, taṃ vissajjeyya nirapekkhatāya
anya-e0104n0:1532_3: vasenevāti adhippāyo. Ayaṃ yogāvacaro. Muñcitukāmatāya uddhaṃ yāva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1532_4: na uppajjati, tāva pavattā vipassanā paṭisaṅkhānupassanā evāti āha “paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya
anya-e0104n0:1533: Patilīyatīti ekapassena nilīyati nilīnaṃ viya hoti. Patikuṭatīti saṅkucati. Paṭivaṭṭatīti vivaṭṭati. Na sampasāriyatīti na visarati, abhirativasena na pakkhandatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1535_0: 767. Tikkhavisadasūrabhāvena saṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhane sijjhamāne taṃ panetaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1535_1: anekavāraṃ pavattamānaṃ paripākagamanena anulomañāṇassa paccayabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1535_2: nibbānaṃ santato passati nāma. Tathābhūtañca sabbaṃ saṅkhārappavattaṃ vissajjetvā
anya-e0104n0:1535_3: nibbānameva pakkhandati nāma. Tayidaṃ idha ñāṇaṃ anulomagotrabhuñāṇehi saddhiṃ ekattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1535_4: netvā vuttaṃ ekattanayavasena. No ce nibbānaṃ santato passatīti tāva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1535_5: aparipakkatamevāha. Samuddaṃ tarantīti sāmuddikā, saṃyattikā. Disājānanako kāko disākāko,
anya-e0104n0:1535_6: lakkhaṇamattañcetaṃ yo koci tādiso sakunto veditabbo. Videsanti adesaṃ samudde aparicitaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1536_0: Tayidaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Piṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭayamānaṃ viyāti thūlathūlato vivecanavasena nipphoṭiyamānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1536_1: saṇhaṃ saṇhaṃ piṭṭhacuṇṇaṃ viya. Nibbaṭṭitakappāsanti nibbaṭṭitabījaṃ kappāsaṃ. Vihanamānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1536_2: viyāti dhanukena vihaññamānaṃ viya. Upamādvayenapi punappunaṃ sammasanena vipassanāñāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1536_3: sukhumatarabhāvāpattimāha. Yathā yathā hi vipassanābhāvanābalena tikkhā, visadā,
anya-e0104n0:1536_4: sūrā ca hoti, tathā tathā sukhumatarāpi hotīti. Saṅkhāravicinaneti pavicayassa sikhāppattatāya
anya-e0104n0:1536_5: saṅkhāresu viya tesaṃ vicinanepi udāsīnaṃ hutvā tividhānupassanāvasena tiṭṭhati pakārantarassa
anya-e0104n0:1536_6: abhāvato. “Sattadhā aṭṭhārasadhā”tiādinā vibhattāpi hi anupassanāpakārā aniccānupassanādīsveva
anya-e0104n0:1536_7: tīsu antogadhāti matthakappattā vipassanā tāsaṃ eva vasena tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n0:1537_3: hi saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, dukkhānupassanābahulassa samādhindriyaṃ, anattānupassanābahulassa
anya-e0104n0:1537_4: paññindriyanti tissannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena balavatarabhāvaṃ pattāni imāni tīṇi
anya-e0104n0:1537_5: indriyāni vimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpādentīti āha “tividhānupassanā…pe… āpajjati nāmā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1537_6: Tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvanti ettha ke pana tayo vimokkhā, kāni vā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti
anya-e0104n0:1537_7: antolīne anuyoge vimokkhamukhādhīnattā vimokkhādhigamassa vimokkhamukhāni tāva dassento
anya-e0104n0:1537_8: “tisso hi…pe… vuccantī”ti vatvā ayañca attho pāḷito eva viññāyatīti dassento “yathāhā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1538_0: Lokaniyyānāyāti lokato nikkhamanāya, sattalokassa vā vaṭṭadukkhato nikkhamanāya.
anya-e0104n0:1538_1: Paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca. Samanupassanatāyāti
anya-e0104n0:1538_2: sammadeva anu anu passanāya saṃvattantīti sambandho. Aniccānupassanā hi saṅkhāre
anya-e0104n0:1538_3: ādito udayena, antato vayena paricchinne passati. Ādiantavantatāya hi te aniccāti.
anya-e0104n0:1538_4: Animittāya ca dhātuyāti sabbasaṅkhāranimittavirahato “animittā”ti laddhanāmāya asaṅkhatāya
anya-e0104n0:1539_0: Gatinti nibbattiṃ. Saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanena saṃvejiyamānaṃ cittaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1539_1: samuttejitaṃ nāma hotīti āha “manosamuttejanatāyāti cittasaṃvejanatāyā”ti. Mamaṃkārena
anya-e0104n0:1539_2: attaniyasaññitassa vatthuno sāmibhūto attā paṭhamaṃ parāmasīyati, tato attaniyanti
anya-e0104n0:1539_3: āha “nāhaṃ, na mamāti evaṃ anattato samanupassanatāyā”ti. Tīṇi padānīti paricchedaparivaṭuma,
anya-e0104n0:1539_5: vākyāni tīṇi padānīti veditabbāni. Tenevāti aniccānupassanādīnaṃ vasena tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1539_6: padānaṃ vuttattā eva. Pañhavissajjaneti “aniccato manasi karoto kathaṃ saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahantī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1540_0: 769. Evaṃ vimokkhamukhāni dassetvā idāni vimokkhe dassetuṃ “katame panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1540_1: Aniccato manasi karontoti aniccānupassanaṃ anuyuñjanto. Adhimokkhabahuloti saddhindriyabahulo.
anya-e0104n0:1540_2: Yassa visesato aniccānupassanā tikkhā sūrā hoti, tassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1540_3: “Aniccā saṅkhārā”ti hi ādito saddhāmattakena paṭipajjitvā vipassanāya ukkaṃsagatāya
anya-e0104n0:1540_4: tarupallavādīsu viya maṇikanakādīsupi tesaṃ aniccataṃ sātisayaṃ paccakkhato passato
anya-e0104n0:1540_5: “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti satthari saddhā balavatī pavattatīti so adhimokkhabahulo,
anya-e0104n0:1540_6: adhimattasaddho ca hoti. Tassa aniccānupassanābahulatāya aniccākārato vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti
anya-e0104n0:1540_7: so “animittaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Passaddhibahuloti dukkhānupassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1540_8: anuyuñjanto “dukkhā saṅkhārā, tappaṭipakkhato sukho nirodho”ti ca manasikāravasena
anya-e0104n0:1540_9: nibbānassa santapaṇītasukhabhāvaṃ adhimuccanto abhiṇhaṃ pītipāmojjasamāyogato passaddhibahulo
anya-e0104n0:1540_10: hoti. Tato ca adhimattasamādhindriyapaṭilābhena rāgapaṇidhiyā dūrībhāvato appaṇihitavimokkhasamadhigamo
anya-e0104n0:1540_11: hotīti vuttaṃ “dukkhato…pe… paṭilabhatī”ti. Vedabahuloti anattānupassanaṃ anuyuñjanto
anya-e0104n0:1540_12: attasuññatāya nipuṇañāṇavisayattā ñāṇabahulo hoti. Tato ca adhimattapaññindriyapaṭilābhena
anya-e0104n0:1540_13: mohassa dūrībhāvato suññatavimokkhasamadhigamo hotīti āha “anattato…pe… paṭilabhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1541_0: Yo aniccānupassanāya nimittavasena saṅkhāre pariggahetvā vipassanaṃ anuyuñjanto yattha
anya-e0104n0:1541_1: idaṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ sabbaso natthi, taṃ “animittaṃ nibbāna”nti animittākārena adhimuccanto
anya-e0104n0:1541_2: vuṭṭhānagāminimaggena ghaṭeti. Tassa maggo animittato nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti vuccatīti
anya-e0104n0:1541_3: āha “animittākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo”ti. Svāyaṃ nibbānassa
anya-e0104n0:1541_4: animittākāro neva maggena kato, na vipassanāya, atha kho sabhāvasiddho. Tadārammaṇatāya
anya-e0104n0:1541_5: ca maggo animittoti vuccatīti dassento āha “animittāya dhātuyā uppannattā animitto”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1541_6: Yo dukkhānupassanāvasena paṇidhiyā dūrībhāvakaraṇena appaṇihitaṃ adhimuccanto, yo
anya-e0104n0:1541_7: anattānupassanāvasena attūpaladdhiyā dūrībhāvakaraṇena suññataṃ adhimuccantoti ca
anya-e0104n0:1542_0: 770. Yadi ariyamaggo tividhampi vimokkhanāmaṃ labhati, atha kasmā abhidhamme vimokkhadvayameva
anya-e0104n0:1542_1: āgatanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yaṃ panā”tiādi. Tattha tanti abhidhamme vimokkhadvayavacanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1542_2: Nippariyāyato vipassanāgamanaṃ sandhāyāti ujukameva vipassanato maggassa nāmāgamanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1542_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kasmā? Animittavipassanā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa
anya-e0104n0:1542_4: nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti. Kāmaṃ sutte “animittañca bhāvehi, mānānusayamujjahā”ti animittavipassanā
anya-e0104n0:1542_5: kathitā, sā pana niccanimittadhuvanimittaattanimittāni ugghāṭentīpi sayaṃ nimittadhammesu
anya-e0104n0:1542_6: eva caratīti sanimittāva hotīti. Apica abhidhammo nāma paramatthadesanā, animittamaggassa
anya-e0104n0:1542_7: ca paramatthato hetuvekallameva. Aniccānupassanāvasena hi animittavimokkho kathito.
anya-e0104n0:1542_8: Tattha ca saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, taṃ ariyamagge ekaṅgampi na hoti, amaggaṅgattā
anya-e0104n0:1542_9: attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti. Itaresu dukkhānupassanāya vasena appaṇihitavimokkho,
anya-e0104n0:1543_0: Tesu appaṇihitavimokkhena samādhindriyaṃ, suññatavimokkhena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1543_1: hotīti tāni ariyamaggassa aṅgattā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ sakkonti, na animittamaggo
anya-e0104n0:1543_2: tadabhāvatoti keci. Ye pana vadanti “animittamaggo āgamanato nāmaṃ alabhantopi saguṇato
anya-e0104n0:1543_3: ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ labhatī”ti, tesaṃ matena appaṇihitasuññatamaggāpi saguṇato
anya-e0104n0:1543_4: eva, ārammaṇato eva ca nāmaṃ labheyyunti? Taṃ ayuttaṃ. Kasmā? Maggo hi dvīhi kāraṇehi
anya-e0104n0:1543_5: nāmaṃ labhati sarasato ca paccanīkato cāti, sabhāvato ca paṭipakkhato cāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1543_6: Appaṇihitamaggo hi rāgapaṇidhiādīhi vimutto, suññatamaggo rāgādīhi suñño evāti te
anya-e0104n0:1543_7: sarasato nāmaṃ labhanti. Tathā appaṇihitamaggo paṇidhissa paṭipakkho, suññatamaggo
anya-e0104n0:1543_8: attābhinivesassa evāti te paccanīkato nāmaṃ labhanti, animittamaggo pana rāgādinimittānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1543_9: niccanimittādīnaṃ vā abhāvena sarasato eva nāmaṃ labhati, no paccanīkato. Na hi so
anya-e0104n0:1543_10: saṅkhāranimittārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkho, sā panassa anulomabhāve ṭhitāti
anya-e0104n0:1543_11: sabbathāpi abhidhammapariyāyena animittamaggo na labbhati. Tena vuttaṃ “taṃ nippariyāyato
anya-e0104n0:1544_0: Yasmā suttantapariyāyena animittamaggo labbhati. Vuṭṭhānagāminī hi vipassanā yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1544_1: yaṃ sammasantī vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchati, tassa tassa vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano
anya-e0104n0:1544_2: maggassa nāmaṃ deti, tattha aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animitto hoti, dukkhato
anya-e0104n0:1544_3: vuṭṭhahantassa appaṇihito, anattato vuṭṭhahantassa suññato, tasmā suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā
anya-e0104n0:1544_4: esāti katvā idha tayopi vimokkhā uddhaṭā. Yaṃ pana paṭisambhidāmagge abhinivesanimittapaṇidhimuñcanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1544_5: upādāya tissannampi anupassanānaṃ tadāgamanavasena tadanvayassa maggassa ca suññatavimokkhādibhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1544_6: niddiṭṭho, tassa pariyāyabhāve vattabbameva natthīti dassetuṃ “vipassanāñāṇaṃ hī”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1544_7: vuttaṃ. Vipassanāñāṇaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge “appaṇihito, vimokkho”ti ca kiñcāpi vuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1545_2: tadanvayaṃ pana maggañāṇaṃ samucchedavasena muñcati. Itīti tasmā. Aniccābhinivesato
anya-e0104n0:1545_3: rittatāya, vimuttatāya ca suññato vimokkho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0104n0:1546_0: Tanti tividhaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Tattha yassa pariyāyato, yassa ca nippariyāyato nāmalābho,
anya-e0104n0:1546_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkhāranimittassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na nippariyāyena, atha kho pariyāyenāti
anya-e0104n0:1546_2: attho. Tasmāti nippariyāyakathābhāvato. Vimokkhadvayameva vuttaṃ abhidhammeti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1546_3: Etthāti etasmiṃ vipassanādhikāre. “Tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā”ti etasmiṃ vā uddesavacane.
anya-e0104n0:1547: 771. Tesaṃ vibhāgāyāti tesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ sattannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ saddhānusāriādibhāvena vibhattasabhāvatāya.
anya-e0104n0:1548_1: paṭilabhati. Adhimokkhabahulatāya, saddhindriyādhimattatāya ca kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0104n0:1548_2: Apica ayamettha saṅkhepattho – aniccākārasallakkhaṇassa saddhābhibuddhiyā upanissayabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1548_3: tadanvaye magge saddhā tikkhatarā hoti, tena aṭṭhamako saddhānusārī nāma hoti. Sesesu
anya-e0104n0:1548_4: sattasu ṭhānesūti paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā sattasu ṭhānesu. “Sattasu
anya-e0104n0:1548_5: ṭhānesū”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu sesesu chasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto, aggaphale pana
anya-e0104n0:1548_6: sacāyaṃ arūpajjhānalābhī, ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti, no ce arūpajjhānalābhī, paññāvimutto,
anya-e0104n0:1549_0: “Katamo ca puggalo saddhāvimutto? Idhekacco puggalo ‘idaṃ dukkha’nti yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1549_2: paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya diṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:1549_3: honti, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti, no ca kho yathādiṭṭhippattassa.
anya-e0104n0:1550_0: Ekaccāsavaparikkhayavacanato saddhāvimuttassa sekkhabhāvo viññāyati, na asekkhabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:1550_1: Aṭṭhakathāyañca “dve dhurāni, dve abhinivesā, dve sīsānī”ti vacanato natthi arahato
anya-e0104n0:1550_2: saddhāvimuttatāti? Saccametaṃ nippariyāyato. Nippariyāyakathā hi abhidhammo, idha
anya-e0104n0:1550_3: pana pariyāyena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Yadi pariyāyato arahato saddhāvimuttatā, ko pana so
anya-e0104n0:1550_4: pariyāyo? Saddhāvimuttanvayatā. Yo hi aggamaggakkhaṇe saddhāvimutto hoti, so aggaphalakkhaṇepi
anya-e0104n0:1550_5: tadanvayatāya saddhāvimuttoti paṭisambhidāmagge pariyāyena vuttoti idhāpi tatheva
anya-e0104n0:1550_6: vuttaṃ. Atha vā saddhāvimuttasadisatāya arahā saddhāvimutto. Kā panettha sadisatā?
anya-e0104n0:1550_7: Yathā saddhāvimuttassa sekkhassa kilesakkhayo kuṇṭhena asinā kadalicchedasadiso “no
anya-e0104n0:1550_8: ca kho yathādiṭṭhippattassā”ti vacanato, evaṃ tadanvayassāpi arahatoti ayamettha
anya-e0104n0:1550_9: sadisatā. Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesapahāne nānattaṃ atthīti? Natthi. Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto
anya-e0104n0:1550_10: diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti? Āgamanīyanānattena. Diṭṭhippatto hi āgamanamhi kilese
anya-e0104n0:1550_11: vikkhambhento appakasirena akilamanto vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti, saddhāvimutto kicchena
anya-e0104n0:1550_12: kasirena vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti. Apica paññāyapi nesaṃ vemattatā. Sā ca yāvatikā labbhatevāti
anya-e0104n0:1550_13: vadanti. Evañca katvā paṭhamamaggādīsu satipi indriyasamatte saddhādīnaṃ tikkhatāvacanampi samatthitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1551_0: 773. Soti dukkhato vuṭṭhito. Sabbatthāti aṭṭhasupi ṭhānesu. Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1551_1: “dve dhurānī”ti niyamitattā paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī vā siyā, dhammānusārī
anya-e0104n0:1551_2: vā? Idha na saddhānusārī yutto, kāyasakkhitāpi arahato natthi. Abhidhamme hi –
anya-e0104n0:1552: “Katamo ca puggalo kāyasakkhī? Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo kāyasakkhī”ti –
anya-e0104n0:1553_0: Ekaccāsavaparikkhayavacanato kāyasakkhino sekkhabhāvova viññāyatīti? Saccametaṃ nippariyāyato,
anya-e0104n0:1553_1: idha pana pariyāyena vuttaṃ. Ko pana so pariyāyoti? Kāyasakkhisadisatā. Upacārarūpajjhānasamādhito
anya-e0104n0:1553_2: hi sātisayaṃ arūpasamādhisamphassaṃ laddhā nibbattīti ekaccāsavaparikkhayaṃ upādāya
anya-e0104n0:1553_4: apekkhitvā kāyasakkhī viya kāyasakkhīti arahā paṭisambhidāmagge vuttoti idhāpi tameva
anya-e0104n0:1553_5: nayaṃ gahetvā arahatopi kāyasakkhitā vuttā. Suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā hesāti. Nippariyāyena
anya-e0104n0:1553_6: pana paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma hoti, so ca kho aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī,
anya-e0104n0:1553_7: na vipassanāyāniko sukkhavipassako, upacāramattalābhī, rūpajjhānamattalābhī vā. Passaddhibahuloti
anya-e0104n0:1553_8: ca passaddhisīsena samādhi vuttoti sātisayasamādhilābhī samathayānikova adhippeto,
anya-e0104n0:1553_9: samathayānikasseva ca kāyasakkhibhāvo heṭṭhā vutto. Arūpajjhānanti catubbidhaṃ arūpajjhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1553_10: Tattha pana ekampi laddhā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto eva hotīti imamatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1553_11: dassetuṃ “arūpajjhāna”micceva vuttaṃ, na “cattāri arūpajjhānānī”ti. Tenāyaṃ catunnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1553_12: arūpasamāpattīnaṃ, nirodhasamāpattiyā ca vasena pañcavidho hoti. Esa nayo kāyasakkhimhipi.
anya-e0104n0:1553_13: Dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto.
anya-e0104n0:1554_0: 774. Paññavato nipuṇatarā, gambhīrā ca atthā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti anattato
anya-e0104n0:1554_1: manasi karoto vedabahulatā, paññindriyapaṭilābho ca vutto. Dhammānusārī hoti paññindriyassa
anya-e0104n0:1554_2: adhimattattā. Paññā hi idha “dhammo”ti adhippetā “saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0104n0:1555: 775. Yassā pāḷiyā vasena idha ariyapuggalassa saddhāvimuttādibhāvo vutto, taṃ pāḷiṃ dassetuṃ “vuttaṃ heta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
anya-e0104n0:1556_1: vuttaṃ. “Saddahanto vimutto”ti etena sabbathā avimuttassa saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvadassanena
anya-e0104n0:1556_2: saddhāvimuttassa sekkhabhāvameva vibhāveti. Saddhāvimuttoti vā saddhāya adhimuttoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1557_0: Phuṭṭhantaṃ sacchikatoti phuṭṭhānaṃ anantaraṃ phuṭṭhanto, phuṭṭhānaṃ arūpajjhānānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1557_1: anantaro kāloti adhippāyo, accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, phuṭṭhānantarakālameva
anya-e0104n0:1557_2: sacchikaraṇūpāyena sacchikātabbaṃ sacchākāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ vā etaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1557_3: yathā “ekamanta”nti. Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato, nāmakāyekadesato ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena
anya-e0104n0:1557_4: vimutto, tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti, na pana kāyena
anya-e0104n0:1557_5: sacchikato, nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikatova
anya-e0104n0:1557_6: hoti. Tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchākāsīti kāyasakkhīti
anya-e0104n0:1557_7: vuccati, na tu vimutto ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā. Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0104n0:1557_8: sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva
anya-e0104n0:1557_9: aggamaggā diṭṭhippattoti. “Diṭṭhiyā patto”ti vā pāṭho, catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0104n0:1557_10: diṭṭhiyā nirodhaṃ pattoti attho. Ime ca saddhāvimuttādayo tayo paramatthato apariyositañāṇakiccāti
anya-e0104n0:1557_11: taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ “saddahanto vimuccatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Jhānaphassanti sātisayaṃ jhānaphassaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1558_0: “Dukkhā saṅkhārāti ñātaṃ hotī”ti iminā dukkhasaccapaṭivedhamāha, “sukho nirodhoti
anya-e0104n0:1558_1: ñātaṃ hotī”ti iminā nirodhasaccapaṭivedhaṃ. Tadubhayena ca samudayamaggasaccapaṭivedhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1558_2: nānantariyakabhāvato. “Ñātaṃ hotī”ti iminā dutiyamaggakiccaṃ, “diṭṭhaṃ hotī”ti iminā
anya-e0104n0:1559_0: 777. Itaresūti saddhānusāriādipadesu. Saddhaṃ anusaratīti āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1559_1: saddhaṃ anugacchati. Yathā sā tikkhā sūrā ahosi, maggakkhaṇepi tadanurūpameva pavattetīti
anya-e0104n0:1559_2: attho. Saddhāya vā anusaratīti saddhāya kāraṇabhūtāya saccapaṭivedhassa anurūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1559_3: sarati gacchati, paṭipajjatīti attho. Dvīhipi atthavikappehi saddhāya adhimattataṃyeva
anya-e0104n0:1559_4: vibhāveti. Dhammānusārīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Ubhatobhāgavimuttoti dvīhi bhāgehi
anya-e0104n0:1559_5: dve vāre vimutto, rūpakāyato ca nāmakāyato ca vikkhambhanavasena, samucchedavasena
anya-e0104n0:1559_6: ca vimuttoti attho. Arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato ca nāmakāyekadesato ca vimutto, ariyamaggena
anya-e0104n0:1559_7: nāmakāyato vimuttoti ubhohi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto. Pajānanto
anya-e0104n0:1559_8: vimuttoti paṭhamajjhānaphassena vinā parijānanādippakārehi cattāri ariyasaccāni jānanto
anya-e0104n0:1559_9: paṭivijjhanto tesaṃ kiccānaṃ matthakappattiyā niṭṭhitakiccatāya visesena muttoti vimutto.
anya-e0104n0:1560_0: Ayaṃ panettha nippariyāyato saṅkhepakathā – yassa aniccākārato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, so
anya-e0104n0:1560_1: adhimokkhabahulo saddhindriyassa tikkhabhāvena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī nāma
anya-e0104n0:1560_2: hoti, majjhe chasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto. Aggaphalakkhaṇe paññāvimutto nāma hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1560_3: Tathā yassa dukkhākārato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tassa passaddhibahulatāya samādhindriyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1560_4: adhimattaṃ hoti dukkhupanisāya saddhāyapi tibbatarattā, dhuraniyamato ca. Sopi paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe
anya-e0104n0:1560_5: saddhānusārī eva hoti, majjhe chasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto, ante paññāvimutto ca hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1560_6: Yassa pana anattākārato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, so vedabahulo paññindriyassa tikkhabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1560_7: paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārī eva hoti, majjhe chasu ṭhānesu diṭṭhippatto, ante
anya-e0104n0:1560_8: paññāvimutto eva hoti. Ime pana na aṭṭhavimokkhalābhino, aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī pana
anya-e0104n0:1560_9: paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī vā dhammānusārī vā siyā. Majjhe chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī,
anya-e0104n0:1562_0: 778. Yaṃ taṃ vimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā sattaariyapuggalavibhāgāya ca paccayo
anya-e0104n0:1562_1: hotīti vuttaṃ, taṃ panetaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ. Purimena ñāṇadvayenāti muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇadvayena
anya-e0104n0:1562_2: atthato ekaṃ, pavattiākārabhedato nānanti adhippāyo. Yathāvuttamatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāya,
anya-e0104n0:1562_4: saṅkhāresu udāsīnabhāveneva pavattanato saṅkhārupekkhāsamaññāneva hontīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1562_5: “idaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ ekameva tīṇi nāmāni labhatī”ti. Tena saṅkhārupekkhāvohāro
anya-e0104n0:1563_0: 780. Uppādādīnīti uppādapavattādiapadesena vutte saṅkhāre. Pariccajitukāmatāti tappaṭibandhachandarāgappahānena
anya-e0104n0:1563_1: vissajjitukāmatā. Paṭisaṅkhānanti punappunaṃ tīraṇaṃ. Muñcitvāti nirālayabhāvāpattiyā
anya-e0104n0:1563_2: apekkhāvissajjanavasena vissajjitvā. Avasāneti tathākaraṇassa uttarakālaṃ. Yāva nibbānasampakkhandanā
anya-e0104n0:1563_3: na ijjhati, tāva vicinanepi udāsīnatāya ñāṇassa santānavasena pavattiṃ sandhāyāha
anya-e0104n0:1564: 781. Ime dhammāti ime ñāṇasaṅkhātā dhammā, ñāṇapariyāyo vā idha dhamma-saddo, tasmā imāni ñāṇānīti attho. Ekattāti ekasabhāvā.
anya-e0104n0:1565_1: ñāṇattayassa. Kiccavasena pavattiṭṭhānavasenapi lokiyañāṇānaṃ upari ṭhitattā vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1565_4: abhiniviṭṭhavatthunti pavuccati. Taṃ panetaṃ sasantatipariyāpannampi parato diṭṭhitāya
anya-e0104n0:1565_5: “bahiddhā”ti vuttaṃ. Tadeva hi “bahiddhā sabbanimittānī”ti tattha tattha vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:1565_7: ca. Tañhi sasantatiyaṃ kilesappavattabhāvato, tannimittaṃ asati maggabhāvanāya uppajjanakaupādinnakkhandhapavattabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1565_8: ca tathā vuttaṃ. Vuṭṭhahanañca nesaṃ ārammaṇākaraṇaṃ, āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanañca.
anya-e0104n0:1566_2: sasantatipariyāpannesu khandhesu vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā. “Ajjhattā vuṭṭhātī”ti idaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1566_3: vuṭṭhānagāminiyā ajjhattadhammārammaṇattā pariyāyato vuttaṃ, nippariyāyato pana maggo
anya-e0104n0:1566_4: sabbatopi vuṭṭhāti. Bahiddhā vuṭṭhātītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ekappahārenāti ekajjhaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1566_5: taṃ pana ajjhattādivibhāgaṃ akatvā “yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti
anya-e0104n0:1566_6: avibhāgena vuṭṭhānagāminiyā pavattivasena veditabbaṃ, tayidaṃ satthu sammukhā desanānusārena
anya-e0104n0:1567: 784. Suddhaajjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ na hoti mamaṃkāravatthunopi pariññeyyattā maggasaṅkhātaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ, maggena vā vuṭṭhānaṃ maggavuṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1568_0: 785. Rāsiṃ katvāti bhūtupādāyavasena duvidhaṃ antarabhedavasena anekabhedampi “ruppanaṭṭhena
anya-e0104n0:1568_1: rūpa”nti piṇḍato gahetvā. Yathā rūpe vipassanābhiniveso yebhuyyena vipassanāyānikassa,
anya-e0104n0:1568_2: evaṃ arūpe vipassanābhiniveso yebhuyyena samathayānikassa hoti. Abhinivesoti ca vipassanāya
anya-e0104n0:1568_3: pubbabhāge kattabbanāmarūpaparicchedo veditabbo. Tasmā paṭhamaṃ rūpapariggaṇhanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1569_0: 786. Yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti kāmaṃ udayabbayapariggaṇhanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1569_1: abhinivesoti dassitaṃ, yathāupaṭṭhite pana rūpārūpadhamme, tesañca paccaye pariggahetvā
anya-e0104n0:1569_2: saṅkhepeneva vipassanāñāṇaṃ cārento ñāṇuttaro yathānisinnova ñāṇapaṭipāṭiyā khippameva
anya-e0104n0:1569_3: saccāni paṭivijjhanto ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāma. Aññathā ekeneva
anya-e0104n0:1569_4: lokiyacittena pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ pariggahaparijānanādīnaṃ asambhavato. Na hi sanidassanasappaṭighādiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1569_5: ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkā. Yassa pana ekavāraṃ ñāṇena phassitaṃ, puna taṃ phassitabbameva,
anya-e0104n0:1570_0: 788. Ettha ca abhiniveso akāraṇaṃ vuṭṭhānameva pamāṇaṃ, tasmā heṭṭhā vuttavimokkhaariyapuggalavibhāgāpi
anya-e0104n0:1570_1: vuṭṭhānavasena sambhavantīti dassetuṃ “ettha ca yopī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha tayopi
anya-e0104n0:1570_2: janāti vuṭṭhānavasena bhede asatipi abhinivesavaseneva laddhaṃ bhedaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1571: 789. Saddhiṃ purimapacchimañāṇehīti bhayatupaṭṭhānādipurimañāṇehi ceva gotrabhuādipacchimañāṇehi ca saha. Uddānanti uddeso.
anya-e0104n0:1572_0: Yattha katthaci…pe… vaṭṭeyyuṃ taṃtaṃñāṇaṭṭhāniyassa upamāvatthuno labbhanato. Imasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1572_1: pana ṭhāneti imasmiṃ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāpadese. Sabbanti sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ, sabbaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1572_2: vā ñāṇakiccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti vemajjhe ṭhatvā vibhāviyamānattā. Vuttā visuddhikathāyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1574_0: Gayhupagaṃ adisvāti gahaṇayoggaṃ niccasārādiṃ adisvā. Cittassa vaṅkabhāvakarānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1574_1: māyādīnaṃ suṭṭhu vikkhambhanena anulomassa ujukasākhāsadisatā. Nibbānālocanato gotrabhuñāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1574_2: uddhaṃ ullokanasadisatā. Appatiṭṭhe nibbāne patiṭṭhitattā maggañāṇassa ākāse uppatanasadisatā.
anya-e0104n0:1575_0: 791. Sappavissajjanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ vissajjitvā nibbānassa
anya-e0104n0:1575_1: ālambanato. Āgatamaggaṃ olokentassa ṭhānaṃ viya maggañāṇaṃ asammohapaṭivedhavasena
anya-e0104n0:1575_2: attanopi dassanato. Abhayaṭṭhāne ṭhānanti abhayaṭṭhānaṃ sampattamāha, na tassa pāpuṇapaṭipattiṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1576_1: Muñcitukamyatāggahaṇeneva paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanāpi gahitā. Tissannampi tāsaṃ saṃsārato
anya-e0104n0:1576_3: viya anulome siddhe maggo siddho evāti anulomassa maggadassanasadisatā. Saṅkhāranimittato
anya-e0104n0:1576_4: nikkhantattā ādittagharato nikkhamanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ. Vegena gamanaṃ viya maggañāṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1577: 793. Parato na mamāyitabbato ca passitabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ “ahaṃ, mamā”ti gahaṇassa rājagoṇānaṃ sakagahaṇasadisatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1578_0: 794. Sabhaye abhayadassanahetutāya khandhānaṃ “ahaṃ, mamā”ti gahaṇassa yakkhiniyā
anya-e0104n0:1578_1: saṃvāsasadisatā. Susānavijahanaṃ viya saṅkhārasusānaṃ vijahitvā nibbānārammaṇavasena pavattaṃ gotrabhu.
anya-e0104n0:1579: 795. Puttagiddhinīti puttavacchalā. Ottappamānāti sārajjayamānā. Oḷārikaoḷārikalobhakkhandhādivikkhambhanena saṅkhārapariccajanato anulomassa tattheva dārakoropanasadisatā.
anya-e0104n0:1580_0: 796. Vuṭṭhānagāminiyā…pe… dassanatthaṃ vuttā, na purimāsu viya bhayatupaṭṭhānādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1580_3: Kāyagatāsati eva bhojanaṃ kāyagatāsatibhojanaṃ. Sā panettha maggasampayuttā sammāsati
anya-e0104n0:1580_5: vuttā. Tenāha bhagavā “amataṃ te, bhikkhave, paribhuñjanti, ye kāyagatāsatiṃ paribhuñjantī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1582: Kapaṇāseribhāvādikaraṇena taṇhāsinehassa sītasadisatā. Maggatejanti ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ indaggiṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1583: Rāgaggiādayo ekādasaggī vūpasamanti etthāti ekādasaggivūpasamaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1584: Andhakāraparetoti caturaṅgasamannāgatena andhakārena kiñci attatthaṃ vā paratthaṃ vā kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena abhibhūto. Ñāṇamayo āloko etissāti ñāṇālokā, maggabhāvanā.
anya-e0104n0:1585: Amatabhūtaṃ, amatabhāvasādhakaṃ vā osadhaṃ amatosadhaṃ, nibbānaṃ. Heṭṭhā attanā vuttameva saṅkhārupekkhābyāpāraṃ nigamanavasena dassento “tena vutta”ntiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1586_0: 797. Nirālayatāya taṇhāvasena bhavādīsu avisaṭajjhāsayo hutvā tato saṅkucitacitto
anya-e0104n0:1586_1: patilīnabhāvena carati pavattatīti patilīnacaro, tassa patilīnacarassa. Saṃsāre bhayassa
anya-e0104n0:1586_2: ikkhanatāya bhikkhuno kāyacittavivekasiddhiyā vivittamāsanaṃ bhajamānassa. Sāmaggiyanti
anya-e0104n0:1586_3: yuttaṃ, patirūpanti attho. Bhavaneti kāmabhavādike tividhepi bhave. So hi idha bhavanaṭṭhena
anya-e0104n0:1586_4: bhavanti vutto. Na dassayeti anuppajjanavasena na dasseyya. Tassa taṃ adassanaṃ sāmaggiyanti
anya-e0104n0:1587_0: Niyametvāti niyataṃ ekaṃsikaṃ katvā. Bojjhaṅgavisesaṃ, maggaṅgavisesaṃ, jhānaṅgavisesaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1587_1: paṭipadāvisesaṃ, vimokkhavisesanti visesasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Visesanti chasattabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1587_2: sattaṭṭhabhāvo pañcādibhāvoti imaṃ yathākkamaṃ bojjhaṅgādīnaṃ ariyamagge labbhamānabhedaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1587_3: Pādakajjhānanti maggassa āsannavuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ jhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1587_4: Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtāti maggāsannāya eva vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya gocarabhūtā
anya-e0104n0:1587_5: vipassitā. Puggalajjhāsayoti ubhinnaṃ bhede sati vipassakassa ajjhāsayo. Ettha ca
anya-e0104n0:1587_6: paṭhamaṃ kecīti vutto tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero. Dutiyaṃ kecīti vutto moravāpīvāsimahādattatthero.
anya-e0104n0:1588_0: Tesampi vādesu ayaṃ pubbabhāgavuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā niyametiyevāti veditabbā. Kasmā?
anya-e0104n0:1588_2: honti, itare ca dutiyajjhānikādimaggā pādakajjhānavipassanāniyamehi taṃtaṃjhānikāva
anya-e0104n0:1588_3: tato tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato uppannassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1588_4: aṅgānaṃ asamāpajjitukāmatāvirāgabhāvanābhāvato, itarassa ca atabbhāvato. Yathā hi
anya-e0104n0:1588_5: maggāsannāya vipassanāya somanassasahagatatte maggassa paṭhamādijhānikatā ca upekkhāsahagatatte
anya-e0104n0:1588_6: pañcamajjhānikatā eva ca hoti, tato ca bojjhaṅgādīnaṃ visesoti tesaṃ niyamane āsannakāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1588_7: padhānakāraṇañca vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā, na evaṃ pādakajjhānādayo. Yasmā pana pādakajjhānena
anya-e0104n0:1588_8: vinā vipassanāva imaṃ yathāvuttavisesaṃ niyametuṃ na sakkoti, vuttanayena pana padhānakāraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1588_10: niyametiyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sesavādesupi vipassanāniyamo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1588_11: Yathā hi pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ asamāpajjitukāmatāvirāgabhāvanābhūtā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā
anya-e0104n0:1588_12: adhiṭṭhānabhūtena pādakajjhānena āhitavisesā maggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaniyāmikā hoti,
anya-e0104n0:1588_14: sammasitajjhānena āhitavisesā, ubhayasabbhāve ajjhāsayavasena tato aññatarena āhitavisesā
anya-e0104n0:1589_1: sukkhavipassako. So hi jhānasinehena vipassanāya asiniddhabhāvato sukkhā lūkhā vipassanā
anya-e0104n0:1589_2: etassāti sukkhavipassakoti vuccati. Pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāreti pādakajjhānato aññe saṅkhāre.
anya-e0104n0:1589_3: Tena pādakajjhānasaṅkhāresu sammasitesu vattabbameva natthīti dasseti. “Paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1589_4: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca sukkhavipassakādiggahaṇaṃ vipassanāniyamassa
anya-e0104n0:1589_5: ekantikabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Na hi vuṭṭhānagāminiṃ vinā kevalaṃ pādakajjhānādayo niyamahetū
anya-e0104n0:1589_6: diṭṭhā, vuṭṭhānagāminī pana pādakajjhānādīnaṃ abhāvepi sukkhavipassakādīnaṃ maggassa
anya-e0104n0:1589_7: paṭhamajjhānikabhāvahetu, tasmā sā bojjhaṅgādivisesaniyamane ekantikahetūti. Idāni
anya-e0104n0:1589_8: yathāvuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “tesaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ visesoti ayaṃ jhānādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1589_9: caturaṅgikādiviseso, na pubbe viya vipassanāniyameneva, atha kho pādakajjhānaniyamena
anya-e0104n0:1589_10: ceva vipassanāniyamena ca. Tesampīti pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni
anya-e0104n0:1589_11: katvā uppāditamaggānampi. “Āsannapadese”ti iminā vipassakena antarantarā paviṭṭhasamāpattiyā
anya-e0104n0:1590_1: hoti. Tatrāpi hi vipassanā taṃtaṃvirāgāvirāgabhāvanābhāvena somanassasahagatā, upekkhāsahagatā
anya-e0104n0:1590_2: ca hutvā jhānaṅgādiniyamaṃ maggassa karotīti evaṃ vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1591_1: vinā ajjhāsayamattena asijjhanaṃ upanissayena vinā saṅkappamattena sakadāgāmiphalādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1591_2: asijjhanadīpakena nandakovādena dīpetabbo. Tattha hi yathā sotāpannāyapi paripuṇṇasaṅkappataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1591_3: vadantena bhagavatā “yassa yassa upanissayo atthi, tassa tasseva ajjhāsayo niyāmako,
anya-e0104n0:1591_4: nāññassā”ti tena tena paripuṇṇasaṅkappatā hoti, na tato paraṃ, saṅkappasabbhāve satipi
anya-e0104n0:1591_5: asijjhanatoti ayamattho dīpito, evamidhāpi yassa yassa dutiyādijhānikassa maggassa
anya-e0104n0:1591_6: yathāvutto upanissayo atthi, tassa tasseva ajjhāsayo niyāmako, nāññassa satipi tasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1591_7: asijjhanato. Imasmiṃ pana vāde pādakasammasitajjhānupanissayasabbhāve ajjhāsayo ekantena
anya-e0104n0:1591_9: niyametī”ti vuttaṃ. Etthāpīti tatiyattheravādepi. Vuttanayenevāti “yato yato samāpattito
anya-e0104n0:1591_10: vuṭṭhāyā”tiādinā vuttanayena. Tasmā “tatrāpi hi vipassanā”tiādinā idha vuttanayena tadattho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1592_0: 801. Evaṃ vipassanāya bojjhaṅgādiniyāmikataṃ dassetvā idāni paṭipadādiniyāmikataṃ
anya-e0104n0:1592_1: dassento “sace panāya”ntiādimāha. Tattha ayanti saṅkhārupekkhā vuttā. Sāpi hi kāmaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1592_2: “imaṃ vāraṃ rocesu”nti ettha kalāpasammasanāvasāne udayabbayānupassanāya pavattamānāya
anya-e0104n0:1592_3: uppannassa vipassanupakkilesassa tikkhattuṃ vikkhambhanena kicchatāvāraṃ dukkhāpaṭipadāti
anya-e0104n0:1592_4: rocesunti vadanti, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vahante
anya-e0104n0:1592_5: uppannaṃ vipassanānikantiṃ dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariyādiyatī”ti vuttattā pubbabhāge
anya-e0104n0:1592_6: muñcitukamyatādibhāvena pavattamānā saṅkhārupekkhā attano paṭipakkhe kicchena kasirena
anya-e0104n0:1592_7: vikkhambhentī dukkhāpaṭipadāpakkheyeva tiṭṭhatīti. Tenāha “ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1592_8: Keci pana “yena ñāṇena vipassanupakkilesā vikkhambhitā, tena saddhiṃ idaṃ ñāṇaṃ ekattanayavasena
anya-e0104n0:1592_9: ekaṃ katvā ‘ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā’ti vutta”nti vadanti. Sappayogenāti cittappayogasaṅkhātena
anya-e0104n0:1592_10: saussāhanena. Sasaṅkhārenāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Ubhayenāpi vikkhambhanassa kicchasiddhimeva
anya-e0104n0:1592_11: vadati. Vipariyāyenāti adukkhena appayogena asaṅkhārena. Maggasaññitaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1592_12: anugantvā parivasati vippavasati etthāti parivāso, vipassanā parivāso etassa atthīti
anya-e0104n0:1592_13: vipassanāparivāso, maggapātubhāvo, taṃ pana sīghaṃ kurumānā khippābhiññā nāma hotīti
anya-e0104n0:1592_14: vuttaṃ “saṇika”nti. Kurumānā ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāti yojanā. Yato maggo āgacchati,
anya-e0104n0:1592_15: taṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ, tasmiṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne. Maggassa pabhavaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā nāmaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1592_16: detīti sambandho. Dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādivipassanānayo añño, añño eva maggoti
anya-e0104n0:1592_17: āha “attano attano maggassā”ti. Tena āgamanato laddhanāmena “dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā”tiādīni
anya-e0104n0:1592_18: cattāri nāmāni labhati. Na hi maggassa sarasato edisaṃ nāmaṃ atthi.
anya-e0104n0:1593_0: Sā panāyaṃ vuttappabhedā paṭipadā. Nānā hotīti visuṃ visuṃ hoti. Ekassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0104n0:1593_1: catūsupi maggesu ekāva hotīti niyamo natthi calanato. Ahesunti vuttaṃ, amhākaṃ bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1593_2: sandhāya hontīti pana vattabbaṃ. Sabbesampi hi sammāsambuddhānaṃ cattāropi maggā
anya-e0104n0:1593_3: sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññāva hontīti. Paṭipadāpasaṅgena adhipatimpi dassetuṃ “yathā
anya-e0104n0:1593_4: cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Adhipatayoti chandādiadhipatayo. Pubbābhisaṅkhārānurūpañhi maggo
anya-e0104n0:1593_5: paccekaṃ chandādhipateyyo vā hoti vīriyādīsu aññatarādhipateyyo vā, na kassaci niyamo
anya-e0104n0:1594_0: 802. Pubbe vuttappakārato sātisayaṃ katvā anavasesato maggassa nāmalābhe kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1594_1: dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sarasenāti sabhāvena attano pavattivisesena.
anya-e0104n0:1595_0: Kāmañcettha yathā āgamanena vinā saguṇena, ārammaṇena ca maggassa nāmalābho avavatthito,
anya-e0104n0:1595_1: evaṃ paccanīkena vinā saraseneva nāmalābho, tathāpi sarasādayo paccekaṃ nāmalābhassa
anya-e0104n0:1595_2: kāraṇamevāti dassetuṃ “sarasena vā”tiādinā sabbattha aniyamattho vā-saddo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1595_3: Te ca asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha sammasitvāti sammasanahetu.
anya-e0104n0:1595_4: Hetuattho hi ayaṃ tvā-saddo “ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti, sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī”tiādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1595_5: viya, maggakattukāya vuṭṭhānakiriyāya ekantikahetubhūtā saṅkhārupekkhā phalūpacārena
anya-e0104n0:1595_6: “vuṭṭhātī”ti vuttā. Yasmā vā saṅkhārupekkhāti vuṭṭhānagāminiyā etaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1595_7: tadantogadhañca gotrabhuñāṇaṃ nimittato vuṭṭhāti, tasmā vuttaṃ ekattanayena “sammasitvā
anya-e0104n0:1595_8: vuṭṭhātī”ti. Animittavimokkhena vimuccatīti animittasaññitena vimuccanena vimuccati,
anya-e0104n0:1595_9: “maggo”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Vimuccatīti vā taṃsamaṅgī ariyapuggalo. Sesadvayepi
anya-e0104n0:1595_10: eseva nayo. Idaṃ sarasato nāmaṃ nāmāti idaṃ nimittādivirahato animittaṃ appaṇihitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1595_11: suññatanti tividhampi maggassa sabhāvato siddhanāmaṃ nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1596_0: Esāti maggo. So ca kho pubbabhāgamaggena saddhiṃ ekaṃ katvā vutto ekattanayena. Idaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1596_1: paccanīkato nāmaṃ nāmāti idaṃ niccanimittādīnaṃ paṇidhiyā, attasaññāya ca pahānavasena
anya-e0104n0:1596_2: laddhaṃ maggassa animittādināmattayaṃ paṭipakkhato siddhanāmaṃ nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1597_0: Suññattāti vivittattā. Na hi magge rāgādayo santi. Rūpanimittādīnanti rūpanimittavedanānimittādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1597_1: gahetabbānanti adhippāyo. Rāganimittādīnanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Saviggahānaṃ viya
anya-e0104n0:1597_2: upaṭṭhānañhettha nimittanti adhippetaṃ. Idamassa saguṇato nāmanti idaṃ rāgādivivittattā
anya-e0104n0:1597_3: rūpanimittādipaṇidhiādiabhāvavasena assa maggassa saguṇato siddhaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1598_0: Svāyanti so ayaṃ maggo. Suññatanti sabbasaṅkhārasuññato, attasuññato ca suññataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1598_1: Sabbasaṅkhāranimittābhāvato animittaṃ. Taṇhāpaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvena appaṇihitaṃ. Idamassa
anya-e0104n0:1598_2: ārammaṇato nāmanti yathā sukhārammaṇaṃ rūpaṃ “sukha”nti vuccati, evaṃ suññatādināmassa
anya-e0104n0:1598_3: nibbānassa ārammaṇakaraṇato idaṃ assa maggassa suññatādibhedaṃ ārammaṇato siddhaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1599_0: 803. Anattānupassanā attasuññatāya diṭṭhattā sarasato suññatā nāma. Tassā suññatāvipassanāya
anya-e0104n0:1599_1: maggo vipassanāgamanena suññato. Animittā nāma niccanimittādīnaṃ ugghāṭanato. Idaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1599_2: pana maggassa animittanāmaṃ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Abhidhamme
anya-e0104n0:1599_3: sarasaṃ anāmasitvā paccanīkato nāmalābhato. Yo hi saguṇārammaṇehi nāmalābho, so sarasappadhāno
anya-e0104n0:1599_4: hoti, saraseneva ca nāmalābhe sabbamaggānaṃ suññatādibhāvoti vavatthānaṃ na siyā.
anya-e0104n0:1599_5: Tasmā abhidhamme satipi dvīhipi kāraṇehi animittanāmalābhe paccanīkatova nāmavavatthānakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1599_6: gayhatīti tadabhāvā na labbhati. Atha vā na labbhatīti aññanirapekkhehi saguṇārammaṇehi
anya-e0104n0:1599_7: na labbhati. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Abhidhamme sarasapaccanīkehi sahitehi nāmalābhato. Paccanīkañhi
anya-e0104n0:1599_8: vavatthānakaraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalassa sarasassa nāmahetubhāvo abhidhamme natthi,
anya-e0104n0:1599_10: sarasantare paccanīkasahitena sarasena nāmaṃ labhanti. Animittamaggassa pana vipassanā
anya-e0104n0:1599_11: nimittapaṭipakkhā na hoti, sayaṃ nimittaggahaṇato nimittaggahaṇānivāraṇāti tadanulomo
anya-e0104n0:1599_12: maggopi na nimittassa paṭipakkho. Yadi siyā, nimittagatavipassanāyapi paṭipakkho
anya-e0104n0:1599_13: siyā, tasmā vijjamānopi saraso vavatthānakarapaccanīkābhāvā abhidhamme animittanāmadāyako
anya-e0104n0:1599_14: na gayhatīti. Yadi evaṃ, aniccānupassanānulomo maggo abhidhamme asaṅgahito siyāti?
anya-e0104n0:1599_15: Na, suddhikapaṭipadānaye tassa saṅgahitattā. Tasmā eva hi so vutto. Suttante pana
anya-e0104n0:1599_17: labbhatī”ti. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Āgamanavasenapi maggassa
anya-e0104n0:1599_18: animittanāmaṃ labbhatiyevāti dassetuṃ “tatrā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Āgamanīyaṭṭhāneti āgamanapaṭipadāṭhāne.
anya-e0104n0:1602_0: 804. Adhimokkhasaddhāti pasādabhūto vatthugato nicchayo adhimokkho. Tasmā tathābhūtā
anya-e0104n0:1602_1: bhāvanāvisesena kiccato adhimattatāya balavatarā nibbattati. Supaggahitanti suṭṭhu
anya-e0104n0:1602_2: paggahitaṃ. Asallīnaṃ paṭutarabhāvena paṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthaṃ vīriyaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1602_3: Sūpaṭṭhitāti tikkhataratāya ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvena suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā sati hoti. Susamāhitanti
anya-e0104n0:1602_4: passaddhisukhānaṃ sātisayatāya suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ ārammaṇe sammadeva ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1602_5: viya hoti. Tikkhatarāti anulomañāṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthabhāvena sātisayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1602_6: tikkhā sūrā. Saṅkhārānaṃ vicinanepi majjhattabhūtasaṅkhārupekkhā paññā uppajjati.
anya-e0104n0:1602_7: Aniccāti vā…pe… sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaratīti aniccādīsu ekenākārena sammasantī
anya-e0104n0:1602_8: sattakkhattuṃ pavattitvā bhijjantī bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇā nāma hoti tato paraṃ bhavaṅgassa
anya-e0104n0:1602_9: vāroti katvā. Saṅkhārupekkhāya katanayenevāti aniccādinā ālambanakaraṇanayeneva,
anya-e0104n0:1602_10: na sammasitanayena. Tenāha “ārammaṇaṃ kurumāna”nti. Āvaṭṭetvāti nivattetvā cittassa
anya-e0104n0:1602_11: bhavaṅgavasena vattituṃ adatvā. Visadisacittapavattisaṅkhātāya vīciyā abhāvena avīcikā,
anya-e0104n0:1602_12: cittasantati. Kiriyamanodhātuyā hi bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite kiriyamayacittapavattivipākacittuppattiyā
anya-e0104n0:1602_13: savīcikā santarā, na evaṃ manodvārāvajjanenāti vuttaṃ “avīcikaṃ cittasantatiṃ anuppabandhamāna”nti.
anya-e0104n0:1602_14: Tathevāti yathā atītāsu dvattiṃsajavanavīthīsu saṅkhārupekkhā “aniccā”ti vā “dukkhā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1602_15: vā “anattā”ti vā saṅkhāre ārammaṇamakāsi, tatheva. Parikammanti vuccati maggassa
anya-e0104n0:1602_16: parikammattā paṭisaṅkhārakattā. Upacāranti vuccati maggassa āsannattā, samīpacārikattā
anya-e0104n0:1603_0: Ayañca nayo kāmaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ paṭhamajavanassa paṭisaṅkharaṇaṭṭho, dutiyassa tato
anya-e0104n0:1603_1: āsannaṭṭho, tatiyassa heṭṭhimuparimānaṃ anulomaṭṭho ca yuttoti vutto, tathāpi sabbesampi
anya-e0104n0:1603_2: imā samaññā sambhavantīti dassetuṃ “avisesena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āsevananti
anya-e0104n0:1603_3: ādarena sevanaṃ. Purimabhāgapacchimabhāgānanti heṭṭhimānaṃ, uparimānañca dhammakoṭṭhāsānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1603_4: Aṭṭhannanti udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ. Sabbāpi vipassanā lakkhaṇattayasammasanakiccāva,
anya-e0104n0:1603_5: idampi tathevāti vuttaṃ “tathakiccatāyā”ti. Uparīti magge. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1603_6: tathakiccatāya anulometi sammosādipaṭipakkhavidhamanato. Idāni anulomañāṇassa tadubhayakiccānulomaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1603_7: vitthārato dassetuṃ “tañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha anulomañāṇaṃ saccapaṭicchādakamohakkhandhādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1603_8: sātisayaṃ vidhamanena lokiyañāṇesu ukkaṃsapariyantagataṃ, tato eva heṭṭhā nibbattitaudayabbayañāṇādīnampi
anya-e0104n0:1603_9: kiccaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena atthato sādhentameva hutvā pavattati, tathāpavattamānañca
anya-e0104n0:1603_10: tesaṃ kiccaṃ anulomentaṃ viya hotīti āha “udayabbayavantānaṃ…pe… tathakiccatāya anulometī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1603_11: Tattha “bhayato upaṭṭhita”nti imināpi ārammaṇasīsena ñāṇabyāpārameva vadati sappaṭibhayānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1603_12: saṅkhārānaṃ yathāsabhāvadassanadīpanato. Sesesu pana sattasupi ṭhānesu ñāṇabyāpārova
anya-e0104n0:1603_13: dassito. Yasmā etaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ aniccādīsu aññataralakkhaṇavaseneva saṅkhāre ārabbha
anya-e0104n0:1603_14: pavattati, tasmā vuttaṃ “aniccalakkhaṇādivasena saṅkhāre ārabbha pavattattā”ti. Tāya
anya-e0104n0:1603_16: tāya. Na hi anulomañāṇe tathā anuppanne gotrabhuñāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ālambituṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0104n0:1604_0: Vuttamatthaṃ opammena pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha aṭṭhannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1604_1: vohārikamahāmattānaṃ agatigamanaṃ pahāya taṃtaṃvinicchayakaraṇaṃ viya aṭṭhannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1604_2: yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ pahāya saṅkhāresu udayabbayādipaṭipatti, rañño majjhattabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:1604_3: viya anulomañāṇassa purimapacchimadhammakoṭṭhāsassa anukūlatā. Tenevāti heṭṭhimañāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1607_0: 805. Kiñci asaṅkhatārammaṇampi ñāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā ekasaṅgahanti katvā “saṅkhārārammaṇāyā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1607_1: visesanaṃ kataṃ. Tañhi visesato vuṭṭhānaṃ ariyamaggaṃ gacchati upetīti vuṭṭhānagāminīti
anya-e0104n0:1607_2: vattabbataṃ labhati. Tenāha “sabbena sabba”ntiādi. Asammohatthanti tattha tattha
anya-e0104n0:1607_3: sutte pariyāyantarehi āgatāya sammohābhāvatthaṃ. Suttasaṃsandanāti suttānaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1608_0: Ye lokiye saṅkhāre ārabbha anulomapariyosānā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā pavattati, taṃsannissitā
anya-e0104n0:1608_1: tappaṭibaddhā taṇhā tehi vinā appavattanato tammayā nāma, tammayāva tammayatā, tammayā
anya-e0104n0:1608_2: vā taṇhāsampayuttā khandhā, tesaṃ bhāvo tammayatā, sā eva taṇhā. Tappaṭipakkhā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā
anya-e0104n0:1608_3: atammayatā. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tammayatā nāma taṇhā, tassā pariyādiyanato
anya-e0104n0:1608_4: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā atammayatāti vuccatī”ti. Nissāyāti taṃ atammayataṃ nissayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1608_5: katvā, bhāvetvāti attho. Ekattāti ettha ayaṃ pāḷi “atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā rūpesu…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1608_6: phoṭṭhabbesu, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā”ti, sayampi nānāsabhāvā,
anya-e0104n0:1608_7: nānārammaṇanissitā cāti attho. Sā pana samādhisampayuttā vipassanupekkhā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1608_9: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā”ti. Yā hi taṃtaṃarūpacittuppādapariyāpannā
anya-e0104n0:1608_10: upekkhā, sā ekasabhāvattā, ekārammaṇattā ca ekattā, ekattasitā cāti vuccati, sā pana
anya-e0104n0:1608_11: taṃtaṃjhānasahagatavedanupekkhā ca tadārammaṇavipassanupekkhā cāti vadanti. Taṃ pajahathāti
anya-e0104n0:1609: Nibbidāti vuṭṭhānagāminī. Tattha hi sutte virajjatīti maggakiccamāha, vimuccatīti phalakiccaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1610: Susimasuttaṃ nidānavagge. Tattha dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminīti vuttā dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ paṭiccasamuppāde asammuyhanavasena pavattanato. Nibbāne ñāṇanti maggañāṇamāha.
anya-e0104n0:1611: Saññā kho, poṭṭhapādāti ettha kāmaṃ “saññā”icceva vuccati, pubbe pana “saññaggaṃ phusatī”ti vuttattā āha “saññagganti vuttā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1612: Paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti tadekadesabhūtā vuṭṭhānagāminī vuttā. Samudāyesu hi pavattā vohārā avayavesupi pavattantīti. Pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅganti pārisuddhiyā padhānakāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1614: Kittitāti thomitā ariyamaggādhiṭṭhānatāya. Mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esanaṭṭhena mahesinā sammāsambuddhena. Santakilesatāya santā. Yoganti bhāvanaṃ, bhāvanābhiyogaṃ vā.
anya-e0104n0:1619_0: 806. Idāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddese anuppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaraṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0104n0:1619_1: taṃ tāva dassento “ito paraṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ hotī”ti āha. Ito paranti ito anulomañāṇato
anya-e0104n0:1619_2: upari. Tanti gotrabhuñāṇaṃ. Neva paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ bhajati aniccādivasena
anya-e0104n0:1619_3: saṅkhārānaṃ aggahaṇato. Na ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ bhajati satipi nibbānārammaṇatte
anya-e0104n0:1619_4: kilesānaṃ akhepanato. Tato evetaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ visayaṃ uddesantaṃ dassanakiccaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1619_5: karontaṃ kiriyamanodhātu viya maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ vuccati. Antarāti chaṭṭhasattamavisuddhīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1619_6: vemajjhe. Abbohārikameva hoti ubhayavisuddhilakkhaṇatābhāvato. Tathāpi vuṭṭhānagāminiyā
anya-e0104n0:1619_8: saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti. Etenassa paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhibhajanaṃ dasseti. Sotassa
anya-e0104n0:1619_9: ariyassaādito pajjanaṃ sotāpatti, so eva maggo, sotaṃ vā ariyaṃ ādito pajjati adhigacchatīti
anya-e0104n0:1619_10: sotāpatti, paṭhamako. Tassa maggo sotāpattimaggo. Paṭisandhivasena sakideva imaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1619_11: manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī, tassa maggo sakadāgāmimaggo. Paṭisandhivasena
anya-e0104n0:1619_12: kāmabhavaṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmī, tassa maggo anāgāmimaggo. Kilesādīnaṃ hananādinā
anya-e0104n0:1619_13: arahaṃ, aggamaggaṭṭho. Tassa bhāvo arahattaṃ, so eva maggoti arahattamaggo. Catūsu
anya-e0104n0:1619_14: maggesu ñāṇaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0104n0:1620_0: Tehi tīhipīti heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ anulomañāṇānaṃ vuttattā vuttaṃ, tīsu vā dvinnaṃ antogadhattā.
anya-e0104n0:1620_1: Tīhipīti vā vikappantarasampiṇḍanattho pi-saddo, tena tīhipi dvīhipīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:1620_2: Attano balānurūpenāti attano attano ānubhāvānukūlaṃ. Paṭhamañhi anulomañāṇaṃ sabboḷārikaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1620_3: dutiyaṃ tato nātioḷārikaṃ, tatiyaṃ tato nātioḷārikaṃ tamaṃ antaradhāpeti. Atha vā
anya-e0104n0:1620_5: hi anulomañāṇassāpi maggañāṇassa viya saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattānaṃ pavattiākārasiddho
anya-e0104n0:1620_6: attheva mudutikkhatāviseso. Palibodhato upaṭṭhāti palibodhabhāvapaṭicchādakassa tamassa
anya-e0104n0:1620_7: antaradhāpitattā. “Āsevanante”ti iminā dutiyassa vā tatiyassa vā anulomañāṇassa anantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1620_8: gotrabhuñāṇuppatti, na paṭhamassāti dasseti tassa anāsevanattā. Na hi aladdhāsevanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1620_9: gotrabhuñāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti. Nimittādivirahato, tabbidhurato ca “animitta”ntiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1620_10: nibbānaṃ visesitaṃ. Puthujjanagottanti ariyehi asammissaṃ puthujjanasamaññaṃ. Gottanti
anya-e0104n0:1620_11: hi ekavaṃsajānaṃ samānā samaññā, evaṃ idhāpīti. Puthujjanasaṅkhanti tasseva vevacanaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1620_12: puthujjanabhūminti puthujjanavatthuṃ. Ekantikatāya ekavārameva ca uppajjanato apunarāvaṭṭakaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1621_0: Bahiddhā vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭaneti asaṅkhatadhātuyā bahibhāvato bahiddhāsaññitā saṅkhāragatā
anya-e0104n0:1621_1: vuṭṭhānabhūte vivaṭṭane nipphajjamāne paññā. Abhibhuyyatīti abhibhavati. Pakkhandatīti
anya-e0104n0:1621_2: anupavisati. Ettha ca “uppādaṃ abhibhuyyatī”tiādinā puthujjanagottābhibhavanaṃ tadatikkamanamāha.
anya-e0104n0:1622_0: 807. Ekāvajjanānaṃ nānāvīthitā natthīti na taṃnisedhanāya ekavīthiggahaṇaṃ, atha
anya-e0104n0:1622_1: kho nānārammaṇānampi ekāvajjanānaṃ nānāvīthitā natthīti dassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1622_2: Mahāmātikanti mahantaṃ udakavāhakaṃ. Laṅghitvāti anotaranto eva atikkamitvā. Ullaṅghitvāti
anya-e0104n0:1623_0: Aṭṭhahi ñāṇehi anukkamena āhitavisesaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ nibbānārammaṇassa ñāṇassa paccayo
anya-e0104n0:1623_1: bhavituṃ samatthaṃ jātanti āha “udayabbayānupassanādinā vegena dhāvitvā”ti. Rūpaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1623_2: anekasantatisambandhatāya anekavaṭṭaracitā rajju viya hotīti vuttaṃ “rūparajjuṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1623_3: Attabhāvassa rukkhaṭṭhāniyatāya vuttattā taṃsambandhadaṇḍaṭṭhāniyatā vedanādīsu ekasseva
anya-e0104n0:1623_4: yuttā, na vedanādisamudāyassāti vuttaṃ “vedanādīsu aññataradaṇḍaṃ vā”ti. Anulomāvajjanenāti
anya-e0104n0:1623_5: anulomassa āvajjanena. Yena āvajjanena anulomañāṇaṃ uppajjati, tena taṃ ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1623_6: “Paṭhamena anulomacittena ullaṅghitvā”ti idaṃ sakkāyatīrassa tassa atikkamanārambhatāya
anya-e0104n0:1623_7: vuttaṃ. “Dutiyena nibbānaninnapoṇapabbhāramānaso”ti idaṃ tassa sabbasaṅkhārato sātisayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1623_8: alaggaṃ hutvā visaṅkhāre allīnabhāvato vuttaṃ. Nibbāne ārammaṇakaraṇavasena patati
anya-e0104n0:1623_9: yogāvacaro. Ekārammaṇeti ekavāraṃyeva ālambite ārammaṇe. Tenāha “aladdhāsevanatāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1623_10: Tena ekārammaṇe āsevanā upakāravatī, na tathā nānārammaṇeti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1624: 808. Tatrāti anulomagotrabhūnaṃ itarītarakiccākaraṇe. Nakkhattayoganti nakkhattena candassa yogaṃ, nakkhattayogavibhāvaniyaṃ vā kālaṃ, divasanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1626_0: Evaṃ nibbattāhīti anulomañāṇāni viya saṅkhāre anālambitvā ahaṃ viya nibbānārammaṇe
anya-e0104n0:1626_1: vattāhīti maggassa gotrabhunā dinnasaññāmuñcanaṃ, anubandhanañca nibbānārammaṇakaraṇameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1627_0: 809. Tatrāti tasmiṃ gotrabhunā dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvā viya tena gahitārammaṇeyeva
anya-e0104n0:1627_1: vattitvā maggassa lobhakkhandhādinibbijjhane. Usuṃ asati khippatīti issāso, dhanuggaho.
anya-e0104n0:1627_2: Saragocaraṭṭhānaṃ nāma aṭṭhausabhamattaṃ. Tañca kho dūre pātino majjhimapurisassa
anya-e0104n0:1627_3: vasena catuhatthāya yaṭṭhiyā vīsatiyaṭṭhi usabhaṃ, tena aṭṭhausabhamatte padese hatthavasena
anya-e0104n0:1627_4: cattārīsādhikachasatahatthe padese. Phalakasatanti asanasāramayaṃ phalakasataṃ. Kumbhakāracakkasadise
anya-e0104n0:1627_5: cakkayante. Āvijjhitvāti bhametvā. Daṇḍakaghaṭṭanāya uppādetabbasaddo daṇḍakasaññā.
anya-e0104n0:1627_6: Phalakasatavinivijjhanassa paccayabhūtā daṇḍakasaññā viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ lobhakkhandhādinibbijjhanassa
anya-e0104n0:1627_7: maggañāṇassa paccayabhāvato. Issāso viya maggañāṇaṃ nibbijjhitabbanivijjhanato.
anya-e0104n0:1628_1: Saddhādhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ hiridhanaṃ ottappadhanaṃ sutadhanaṃ cāgadhanaṃ paññādhananti
anya-e0104n0:1628_2: imesaṃ sattannaṃ ariyadhanānaṃ. Sammukhībhāvanti paccakkhasiddhiṃ. Pāṇātipātādipañcaverāni
anya-e0104n0:1628_3: ceva pañcavīsatimahābhayāni cāti sabbaverabhayāni. Aññesañca ratanattaye niviṭṭhasaddhādīnaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1628_4: Samudāye pavatto sotāpattimaggasaddo tadekadesepi pavattatīti āha “sotāpattimaggena
anya-e0104n0:1631_0: 811. Tasseva sotāpattimaggacittassa. Kāmañcettha nātitikkhapaññassa dve, tikkhapaññassa
anya-e0104n0:1631_1: tīṇi phalacittāni honti, avisesato pana gahitassa maggassa vasena “dve, tīṇi vā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1631_2: vuttaṃ. Samādhimānantarikaññamāhūti yaṃ attano pavattisamanantaraṃ niyameneva phalappadānato
anya-e0104n0:1631_3: ānantarikasamādhīti āhūti attho. Anantarameva pavattanakaṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ, tattha
anya-e0104n0:1631_4: niyutto, taṃ vā payojanaṃ etassāti ānantariko, maggo.
anya-e0104n0:1632_0: Āsevananteti āsevanato ante, āsevanalābhino anulomañāṇassa anantaranti attho. Laddhāsevanameva
anya-e0104n0:1632_1: anulomaṃ gotrabhuṃ uppādeti. Upari pana cha, satta vā javanāni pavattanti, tasmā
anya-e0104n0:1632_2: cattāri phalacittāni hontīti vadeyyāti āha “sattacittaparamā ca ekāvajjanavīthī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1633: Taṃ pana na sārato paccetabbanti yojanā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
anya-e0104n0:1634_0: 812. Ettāvatāti paṭhamamaggānantaraṃ phalassa uppattimakkena. Bhusaṃ pamattopīti
anya-e0104n0:1634_1: devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ pamattopi. Yesaṃ yathāvuttaāvajjanajavanacittānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1634_2: uppattiyā esa sotāpanno paccavekkhati nāmāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1635: Eteneva pasaṅgena sesānaṃ ariyānaṃ paccavekkhaṇāni dassetuṃ “yathā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1636_0: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedoyeva ceso, yadidaṃ pañcannaṃ, catunnañca paccavekkhaṇānaṃ dassananti
anya-e0104n0:1636_2: kassaci na hotīti dasseti. Lobho eva lobhadhammo.
anya-e0104n0:1638_0: 813. Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāyāti etesaṃ kilesānaṃ tanubhāvatthaṃ. Tattha dvīhi
anya-e0104n0:1638_1: kāraṇehi tanubhāvo adhiccuppattiyā, pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya ca. Sakadāgāmissa hi vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa
anya-e0104n0:1638_2: viya kilesā abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti, kadāci kadāci viraḷākārā hutvā uppajjanti. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:1638_3: uppajjantāpi maddantā chādentā andhakāraṃ karontā na uppajjanti, dvīhi pana maggehi
anya-e0104n0:1638_4: pahīnattā mandamandā tanukākārā hutvā uppajjanti. Keci pana “sakadāgāmissāpi kilesā
anya-e0104n0:1638_5: cirena uppajjanti, uppajjantāpi bahalāva uppajjanti. Tathā hissa puttadhītaro dissantī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:1638_6: taṃ akāraṇaṃ vatthupaṭisevanena vināpi gabbhaggahaṇasabbhāvato. Tasmā vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n0:1638_7: dvīhi kāraṇehi tesaṃ tanubhāvo veditabbo. Dutiyāyāti gaṇanavasenapi dutiyāya, uppattivasenapi
anya-e0104n0:1638_8: dutiyāya bhūmiyā. Pattiyāti sāmaññaphalassa paṭilābhāya. Tañhi sampayuttānaṃ nissayabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1638_9: te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi. Yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati
anya-e0104n0:1638_10: uppajjati, na nibbānaṃ viya apātubhūtaṃ, tasmāpi “bhūmī”ti vuccati. Yogaṃ karotīti
anya-e0104n0:1638_11: vipassanābhiyogaṃ karoti. “Navahākārehi indriyāni tikkhāni bhavantī”tiādinā vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n0:1638_12: yadaggena indriyānaṃ tikkhataṃ sampādeti, tadaggena balāni, bojjhaṅgāni ca paṭutarabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1638_13: āpādento indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā lakkhaṇattayatīraṇavasena ñāṇena parimaddati.
anya-e0104n0:1638_14: Tattha aparāparaṃ ñāṇaṃ cārento parivatteti. Tenāha “vipassanāvīthiṃ ogāhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1638_15: Vuttanayenevāti udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ uppādane vuttanayena. Gotrabhuanantaranti ettha
anya-e0104n0:1638_17: ariyagottabhavanato ca nippariyāyato gotrabhūti vuccati, idaṃ pana taṃsadisatāya
anya-e0104n0:1638_18: pariyāyato gotrabhu. Ekaccasaṃkilesavisuddhiyā, pana accantavisuddhiyā ārammaṇakaraṇato
anya-e0104n0:1638_19: ca vodānanti vuccati. Tenāha paṭṭhāne “anulomaṃ vodānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti
anya-e0104n0:1638_21: gotrabhudhammā samādhivasena uppajjanti, dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”tiādīsu
anya-e0104n0:1638_22: gotrabhunāmenevetaṃ āgataṃ, tasmā idhāpi “gotrabhuanantara”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1641_0: 814. Sakidevāti ekavāraṃyeva. “Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā”ti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro
anya-e0104n0:1641_1: vajjetvā ekova gahito. Ekacco idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva loke parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n0:1641_2: ekacco idha patvā devaloke parinibbāti, ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n0:1641_3: ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti. Ime cattāropi idha na gahitā. Yo
anya-e0104n0:1641_4: pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1642: Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ anavasesappahānāyāti tesaṃyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanukatānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ niravasesappahānāya. Paṭisandhivasena kāmabhavassa anāgamanato anāgāmī.
anya-e0104n0:1645_0: 815. Opapātikoti upapātayoniko. Imināssa gabbhaseyyā paṭikkhittā. Tattha parinibbāyīti
anya-e0104n0:1645_1: tattha suddhāvāse parinibbāyitā. Anāvattidhammo tasmā lokāti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:1645_2: tasmā lokā idha anāvattanasabhāvo, buddhadassanadhammassavanānaṃ panatthāya āgamanaṃ hotiyeva.
anya-e0104n0:1646_1: nissesappajahanatthāya. Tattha rūpabhave chandarāgo rūparāgo. Arūpabhave chandarāgo
anya-e0104n0:1649_1: yathā “mahāmoggallāno”ti. Na hi cūḷakhīṇāsavo nāma atthi. Antimadehaṃ dhāretīti antimadehadhārī.
anya-e0104n0:1649_2: Khandhakilesābhisaṅkhārabhārānaṃ ohitattā oropitattā ohitabhāro. Anuppatto sadatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1649_3: sakatthanti anuppattasadattho. Sadatthoti ca arahattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tañhi attupanibandhanaṭṭhena,
anya-e0104n0:1649_4: attānaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena, attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano atthattā sakatthoti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:1649_5: Parikkhīṇāni dasapi bhavasaṃyojanāni etassāti parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano. Khandhādiatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1649_6: sammā aññāya vimuttoti sammadaññāvimutto. Aggo ca so dakkhiṇeyyo ca, aggadakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1651: 817. Catunnaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ vasena catuñāṇāya. Ānubhāvavijānanatthanti satipaṭṭhānapāripūriādikassa ānubhāvassa bodhanatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1652_0: Paripuṇṇā bodhipakkhiyā etassāti paripuṇṇabodhipakkhiyo, maggo. Tassa bhāvo paripuṇṇabodhipakkhiyabhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:1652_1: Vuṭṭhānabalehi sampayuttatāva vuṭṭhānabalasamāyogo, ye saṃyojanādayo yena paṭhamamaggādinā pahātabbā.
anya-e0104n0:1653: 818. Bujjhanaṭṭhena vā bodho, maggacittuppādo. Tassa bujjhanakiriyāya anuguṇabhāvato pakkhe bhavāti bodhipakkhiyā.
anya-e0104n0:1654_0: 819. Tesu bodhipakkhiyesu. Ārammaṇesūti kāyādiārammaṇesu. Okkhanditvāti anupavisitvā.
anya-e0104n0:1654_1: Pakkhanditvāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Upaṭṭhānatoti asubhākārādiggahaṇavasena upagantvā
anya-e0104n0:1654_3: maggasatipaṭṭhānavasena veditabbaṃ. Tattha hi ekāva sati catukiccasādhanavasena pavattati.
anya-e0104n0:1655_0: 820. Padahantīti vāyamanti, kāyacittāni paggaṇhanti vā. Asobhāhetūnaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1655_1: pajahanena, sobhāhetūnañca vodānadhammānaṃ bhāvanena sobhanaṃ, sundaranti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1656_0: 821. Pubbe vuttenāti iddhividhañāṇaniddese vuttena. Ijjhanaṭṭho nipphajjanaṭṭho,
anya-e0104n0:1656_1: paṭilābhasampadā vā, yena vā ijjhanti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā honti, taṃ ijjhanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1656_3: adhipatipaccayabhāvo. Tasmā sotāpattimaggo ijjhatīti iddhi, tasmā sampayuttā chandādayo
anya-e0104n0:1656_4: pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena pādo. Tassā eva phalabhūtāya vuṭṭhānagāminiyā chandādayo pubbabhāgakāraṇaṭṭhena
anya-e0104n0:1656_5: pādo. Soti iddhipādo. Ime lokuttarāvāti ime yathāvuttā chandādayo uttaracūḷabhājanīye
anya-e0104n0:1656_6: āgatanayena lokuttarā veditabbā. Chandādiadhipativasena paṭiladdhadhammāpi phassādayo
anya-e0104n0:1656_7: iddhipādā hontīti attho. Kāmañcettha iddhipādo no adhipati, adhipati vā no iddhipādo
anya-e0104n0:1656_8: nāma natthi, yathā pana ekasmiṃ rajje rajjārahesu catūsu rājakumāresu ekasmiṃ kāle
anya-e0104n0:1656_9: ekova rajjamanusāsati, na sabbe, evaṃ ekamekasmiṃ cittuppāde ekova adhipati, iddhipādo
anya-e0104n0:1657_0: 822. Assaddhiyaṃ saddhāpaṭipakkhā akusalā dhammā, avatthugato pasādapatirūpako micchādhimokkho
anya-e0104n0:1657_1: vā. Kosajjaṃ thinamiddhapadhāno akusalacittuppādo. Pamādo satisammoso tathāpavattā
anya-e0104n0:1657_2: akusalā khandhā. Abhibhavanasaṅkhātena adhipatiyaṭṭhenāti assaddhiyādīnaṃ abhibhavanato
anya-e0104n0:1657_4: sampayuttadhammesu adhipatiyaṭṭhena. Assaddhiyādīhi cāti ca-saddo samuccayattho aṭṭhānappayutto,
anya-e0104n0:1657_5: tasmā akampiyaṭṭhena ca sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca balanti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1658_0: 823. Bujjhanakasattassāti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ paṭivijjhanakasattassa. Yo heso
anya-e0104n0:1658_2: kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva
anya-e0104n0:1658_3: vā sacchikarotīti bodhīti vuccati ariyasāvako, tassa bodhissa bujjhanakasattassa
anya-e0104n0:1659_1: nava sivathikapabbāni cāti evaṃ cuddasavidhena. Kāyaṃ pariggaṇhato ca kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1659_2: labbhati, na vedanādayo pariggaṇhato. Esa nayo sesesupi. “Sukhaṃ vedana”ntiādināti
anya-e0104n0:1659_5: vasena pañcavidhena. Imasmiṃ attabhāveti paccuppanne attabhāve. Anuppannapubbanti
anya-e0104n0:1659_6: attano abhūtapubbaṃ. Parassa uppannaṃ akusalaṃ disvā tannimittañca vadhabandhārahādīnīti
anya-e0104n0:1659_7: adhippāyo. Tassāti tādisassa. Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā “tāniyeva osadhānī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1659_8: Tassa pahānāyāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Jhānavipassanā ito aññasmiṃ attabhāve uppannapubbāpi
anya-e0104n0:1659_10: gahaṇaṃ. Tesu vuttesu sesiddhipādasesaviratiyo atthato vuttāva hontīti lakkhaṇahāravasena
anya-e0104n0:1659_11: ayamattho veditabbo. Evaṃ nānācittesu labbhanti pubbabhāge ete satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādā.
anya-e0104n0:1659_12: Catunnaṃ ñāṇānanti catunnaṃ ariyamaggañāṇānaṃ. Kāmaṃ sabbepi bodhipakkhiyadhammā
anya-e0104n0:1659_14: vuttaṃ “phalakkhaṇe ṭhapetvā cattāro sammappadhāne”ti. Avasesā tettiṃsa labbhanti,
anya-e0104n0:1659_15: te ca kho pariyāyato, na nippariyāyatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:1660_0: 825. Sesesu panāti iddhipādādīsu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu. Yathā sativīriyesu “satipaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1660_2: vaḍḍhanaṃ atthi, īdisaṃ hāpanavaḍḍhanaṃ natthīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1661_0: 826. Idāni sabbesu eva yathārahaṃ labbhamānavibhāgadassanatthaṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1661_1: Tattha tesūti sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammesu. Chaddhāti ekadhā dvedhā catudhā
anya-e0104n0:1661_2: pañcadhā aṭṭhadhā navadhāti evaṃ chappakārena te bhavanti.
anya-e0104n0:1662_1: pītipassaddhiupekkhā bojjhaṅgavaseneva, saṅkappādayo maggavasenevāti evaṃ nava ekavidhāva honti.
anya-e0104n0:1663_0: Cuddaseva asambhinnāti sati vīriyaṃ chando cittaṃ paññā saddhā samādhi pīti passaddhi
anya-e0104n0:1663_1: upekkhā sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvoti ime asambhinnā padantarasambhedena
anya-e0104n0:1663_2: vinā aggahitaggahaṇena gayhamānā cuddaseva ca sabhāvadhammā. Cuddasāti ca ukkaṃsaparicchedena
anya-e0104n0:1663_3: vuttaṃ. Tañca kho paṭhamajjhānikamaggacittuppādavasena, dutiyajjhānike pana sammāsaṅkappābhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1663_5: idampi ukkaṃsavaseneva vuttaṃ, avakaṃsato pana vuttanayena ekasmiṃ khaṇe chattiṃsa,
anya-e0104n0:1663_6: pañcatiṃsa honti, catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ ekajjhaṃ anuppajjanato ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva
anya-e0104n0:1663_7: iddhipādassa sambhavoti dvattiṃsa ca hontīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1664_2: ca vuttitoti abhedassa cittiddhipādādikassa sarūpeneva pavattanato ca.
anya-e0104n0:1665_0: Etthāti ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ. Kasmā pana bodhipakkhiyesu jhānakoṭṭhāso na gahito,
anya-e0104n0:1665_1: nanu jhānarahito ariyamaggo natthīti? Saccaṃ natthi, tato eva na kho panetaṃ evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1665_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ “bodhipakkhiyesu jhānaṃ na gahita”nti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇassa jhānassa
