anya-e0104n0:1665_3: maggaggahaṇeneva gahitattā. Tañhi sandhāya “yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetī”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1665_4: vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇassa panettha sambhavo eva natthi. Aparo nayo –
anya-e0104n0:1665_5: kasmā pana bodhipakkhiyesu jhānakoṭṭhāso na gahito, nanu jhānarahito ariyamaggo natthi,
anya-e0104n0:1665_6: na ca taṃ paṭipadā viya ekantapubbabhāgiyaṃ, nāpi ekaccapaṭisambhidā viya magganissando,
anya-e0104n0:1665_7: atha kho maggacittuppādapariyāpanno, yato “lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetī”ti vuttaṃ, maggamaggaparivāradhammā
anya-e0104n0:1665_8: ca bodhipakkhiyadhammāti? Vuccate – yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ jhānarahito ariyamaggo natthī”ti,
anya-e0104n0:1665_9: tattha na ariyamaggasampayogamattena jhānassa bodhipakkhiyatā labbhati atippasaṅgato.
anya-e0104n0:1665_10: Āhārādīnampi hi bodhipakkhiyatā āpajjeyyāti. Etena maggacittuppādapariyāpannatā bodhipakkhiyabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:1666_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “maggamaggaparivāradhammā ca bodhipakkhiyā”ti, tattha parivāraṭṭho
anya-e0104n0:1666_1: kiṃ sahapavattiattho, udāhu parikkhāraṭṭhoti? Yadi purimo pakkho, so pageva nillocito.
anya-e0104n0:1666_2: Atha dutiyo, idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pavattamānaṃ jhānaṃ maggassa parikkhāro? Yadi
anya-e0104n0:1666_3: sahajātādipaccayabhāvena, evaṃ sati phassādīnampi maggaparikkhāratā āpajjati. Atha
anya-e0104n0:1666_4: paṭipakkhavidhaṃsanena, na sabbe jhānadhammā paṭipakkhavidhaṃsanasamatthā. Na hi
anya-e0104n0:1666_5: vicāro, vedanā ca kassaci saṃkilesadhammassa ujupaṭipakkhabhāvena pavattanti. Yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1666_6: pana peṭake “sukhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassa, vicāro vicikicchāya paṭipakkho”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1666_7: taṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ. Na hi sukhaṃ sayaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassa paṭipakkho, paṭipakkhassa
anya-e0104n0:1666_8: pana samādhissa paccayatāya paṭipakkho. Na ca vicāro paññā viya, adhimokkho viya
anya-e0104n0:1666_9: vā vicikicchāya paṭipakkho, paṭipakkhassa paṭirūpatāya pana paṭipakkho vutto. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:1666_10: pītipi na byāpādassa adoso viya ujupaṭipakkho, adosasampayogato pana paṭipakkho vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1666_11: Tena vuttaṃ “taṃ pariyāyena vutta”nti. Vitakkasamādhayo eva pana jhānadhammesu ujukaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1666_13: abhāvato na cassa bodhipakkhiyesu saṅgaho kato. Yasmā pana sammāsaṅkappo, sammāsamādhi
anya-e0104n0:1666_14: ca maggapariyāpannā jhānadhammā, tasmā te sandhāya taṃsampayuttatāya vā itarepi gahetvā
anya-e0104n0:1666_15: pariyāyena vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānika”ntiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1668_0: 827. Vuṭṭhānaṃ nimittato, pavattato ca vuṭṭhānaṃ. Balasamāyogo samathavipassanābalehi
anya-e0104n0:1668_3: samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī”ti. Nimittārammaṇattā nevanimittā vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n0:1668_4: pavatti…pe… chindanato na pavattā vuṭṭhātīti yojanā. Tattha nimittato vuṭṭhānaṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1668_5: nissajjitvā nibbānārammaṇakaraṇaṃ. Pavattato vuṭṭhānaṃ hetunirodhena āyatiṃ vipākappavattassa
anya-e0104n0:1668_6: anuppavattidhammatāpādanaṃ. Tenāha “samudayassa asamucchindanato pavattā na vuṭṭhātī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1669_0: Dubhatoti ubhato, da-kārāgamaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Dubhāti vā padantaramevetaṃ ubhayasaddena
anya-e0104n0:1669_3: tassā micchādiṭṭhiyā anuvattakehi vicikicchādikilesehi. Khandhehīti etthāpi tadanuvattakasaddo
anya-e0104n0:1669_4: ānetvā sambandhitabbo. Te ca micchādiṭṭhiādipaccayā uppajjanārahā veditabbā. Micchāsaṅkappātiādīsupi
anya-e0104n0:1669_5: tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti. Bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhātīti
anya-e0104n0:1669_6: pāḷi saṃkhittā. Yathā micchādiṭṭhimicchāsaṅkappā, evaṃ micchāvācādayopi apāyagamanīyā
anya-e0104n0:1669_7: eva veditabbā. Micchāvācākammantājīvā cetanāsabhāvā. Micchāsati tathāpavattā cattāro
anya-e0104n0:1669_8: khandhā. Uparimaggattaye sammādiṭṭhi taṃtaṃmaggavajjhā mānato vuṭṭhāti. So hi “ahamasmī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1669_9: pavattiyā diṭṭhiṭṭhāniyo, micchāmaggato panettha vuṭṭhānaṃ anuddharitvā taṃtaṃmaggavajjhasaṃyojanānusayeheva vuṭṭhānaṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1670: Aṇusahagatāti aṇubhāvaṃ gatā pattā, tanubhūtāti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1671_0: 828. Evaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni balasamāyogaṃ dassetuṃ “lokiyānañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1671_1: Samathabalaṃ adhikaṃ hoti samādhibhāvanābhāvato. Vipassanābalaṃ adhikaṃ hoti ñāṇuttarattā
anya-e0104n0:1671_2: vipassanābhāvanāya. Samānabhāvena yuge naddhā baddhā viya hontīti yuganaddhā. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:1671_3: “aññamaññaṃ anativattanaṭṭhenā”ti, kiccato anūnādhikabhāvenāti attho. Tato eva samāyogoti
anya-e0104n0:1672_1: kilesehīti adhippāyo. Avikkhepo samādhīti samucchindanena vikkhepassa ujupaṭipakkhabhūto
anya-e0104n0:1672_2: samādhi. Nirodhagocaroti nibbānārammaṇo. Vuṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti vuṭṭhānakabhāvena nimittato,
anya-e0104n0:1674_0: 829. Ye dhammāti ye saṃkilesadhammā. Saṃyojanādīsu saṃyojanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena
anya-e0104n0:1674_1: saṃyojanāni, vibādhanaṭṭhena, upatāpanaṭṭhena vā kilesā, micchāsabhāvāti micchattā,
anya-e0104n0:1674_2: loke dhammā lokapariyāpannā dhammāti lokadhammā, maccherassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vāti macchariyaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1674_3: viparītaṭṭhena vipallāsā, ganthanaṭṭhena ganthā, ayuttā gatīti agati, āsavantīti
anya-e0104n0:1674_4: āsavā, ohanantīti oghā, yojanaṭṭhena yogā, nīvarantīti nīvaraṇāni, dhammasabhāvaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1674_5: atikkamma parato āmasantīti parāmāsā, bhusaṃ ādiyantīti upādānāni, appahīnabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1674_6: santāne anu anu sentīti anusayā, malīnabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena malā, akusalakammāni ca
anya-e0104n0:1674_7: tāni sugatiduggatīnaṃ, tattha nibbattanakasukhadukkhānañca pathā cāti akusalakammapathā,
anya-e0104n0:1674_8: cittaṃ uppajjati etthāti cittuppādo, cittacetasikarāsi, akusalo ca so cittuppādo
anya-e0104n0:1675_0: Khandhehi khandhānanti idhalokakkhandhehi paralokakkhandhānaṃ. Yāvañhi teti te rūparāgādayo
anya-e0104n0:1675_1: yāva pavattanti na samucchijjanti, tāva etesaṃ khandhaphaladukkhānaṃ anuparamo avicchedoti.
anya-e0104n0:1675_2: Etena tesaṃ saṃyojanatthaṃ vibhāveti. Uddhanti rūpārūpabhavesu, tatiyamagguppattiyā
anya-e0104n0:1675_3: vā uddhaṃ. Uddhaṃ bhajantīti uddhaṃbhāgā, rūpārūpabhavā, tesaṃ avicchedahetutāya
anya-e0104n0:1676: Kilissanti, kilesenti cāti duvidhampi atthaṃ dassento “sayaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhattā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1677: Micchāvimutti “lokathūpikādīsu mokkho”ti pavattamicchāvimokkho. Abhinivisanādivasena micchā viparītaṃ na sammā pavattanato micchāñāṇaṃ mohova.
anya-e0104n0:1678: Lokappavattiyāti khandhappavattiyaṃ sati. Anuparamadhammakattāti puññapāpavasena aparāparaṃ avicchijjanato. “Lābhahetuko lābho”tiādinā kāraṇopacārena.
anya-e0104n0:1679: Āvāse macchariyaṃ, āvāsahetukaṃ vā macchariyaṃ āvāsamacchariyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1680: Tayoti vatthuṃ abhinditvā vuttaṃ, bhinditvā pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti.
anya-e0104n0:1681_0: Ganthakaraṇaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ ganthananti taṃ rūpakāyepi labbhatīti
anya-e0104n0:1681_1: āha “nāmakāyassa ceva rūpakāyassa cā”ti. Tattha byāpādassāpi abhisajjanupanayhavasena
anya-e0104n0:1681_2: pavattanato ganthanaṭṭho veditabbo, yato tassa paṭighasaṃyojanabhāvo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:1683: Savanāti pavattanato. Savanatoti kilesāsucibhāvena vissandanato. Puna savanatoti pasavanato.
anya-e0104n0:1684_0: Ākaḍḍhanaṭṭhena, duruttaraṇaṭṭhena cāti etena oghā viya oghāti dasseti. Ārammaṇena,
anya-e0104n0:1684_1: dukkhena ca viyogassa appadānasaṅkhātena yojanaṭṭhena yogāti dasseti, saṃkilesakaraṇaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0104n0:1684_2: attho. Tesaññevāti kāmarāgādīnaṃyeva. Te hi sotavasena vattamānā soto viya sotapatite
anya-e0104n0:1684_3: satte apāyasamuddaṃ pāpenti, saṃsārasamuddato ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na denti, yathāgahitañca
anya-e0104n0:1684_4: ārammaṇaṃ vissajjituṃ na denti, yādisañca pāpaṃ katvā dukkhappatte punapi tādisena yojenti.
anya-e0104n0:1685_0: Cittassāti kusalacittassa, visesato jhānacittassa. Ādito varaṇaṃ āvaraṇaṃ. Kilesavāsanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1685_1: netvā varaṇaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ. Kuṭṭakavāṭādīhi viya pidahanaṃ paṭicchādanaṃ, taṃ pana kusalādīni
anya-e0104n0:1686: Tassa tassa dhammassa sabhāvanti kāyādikassa tassa tassa dhammassa asubhādisabhāvaṃ. Abhūtaṃ sabhāvanti subhādisabhāvaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1687_0: Thāmagataṭṭhenāti thāmagatabhāvena. Thāmagatanti ca anaññasādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1687_1: sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Yena te eva bhagavatā “anusayā”ti vuttā. Anusayanañca maggena
anya-e0104n0:1689_0: 830. Sesāti anapāyagamanīyā. Sukhumā kāmarāgapaṭighāti sambandho. Catutthañāṇavajjhā
anya-e0104n0:1689_1: evāti avadhāraṇena paṭhamañāṇādivajjhatā nivattīyati. Tayidaṃ niyamadassanaṃ aññatthāpi
anya-e0104n0:1689_2: netabbanti dassento “parato”tiādimāha. Tattha “niyamaṃ na karissāmā”ti etena niyame
anya-e0104n0:1690: Lobha…pe… catutthañāṇavajjhānītiādīsu paṭhamañāṇādīhi hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvānīti adhippāyo veditabbo. Ādisaddena oḷārikasukhumatā gahitā.
anya-e0104n0:1692: Agatīsu chandādayo kiñcāpi uparimaggavajjhā, tathāpi taṃmūlakassa akattabbakaraṇassa, kattabbākaraṇassa ca apāyagamanīyatāya paṭhamamaggavajjhā.
anya-e0104n0:1693_0: Katākatākusalākusalavisayaṃ yaṃ vippaṭisārabhūtaṃ kukkuccaṃ, taṃ idha tatiyañāṇavajjhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1693_1: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana “kukkuccapakatatāya āpattimāpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ kukkuccaṃ, taṃ sandhāya
anya-e0104n0:1693_2: “kukkuccavicikicchā sotāpattimaggena pahīyantī”ti aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā dvinnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1693_3: vacanānaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo. Aññesupi edisesu ṭhānesu adhippāyo maggitabbo, na
anya-e0104n0:1693_4: virodhato paccetabbo. Oḷārikānavasesappahānaṃ vā sandhāya kukkuccassa paṭhamatatiyañāṇavajjhatā
anya-e0104n0:1693_5: vuttāti veditabbaṃ. “Bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1693_6: bhuñjitu”nti, “kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesī”ti pana āgataṃ kukkuccaṃ, na nīvaraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1693_7: arahato uppajjanato, nīvaraṇapaṭirūpakaṃ pana “kappati na kappatī”ti vīmaṃsanabhūtaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1694: Kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā aṇusahagatā tatiyañāṇavajjhā. Oḷārikānaṃ pana dutiyañāṇavajjhatā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva.
anya-e0104n0:1696_0: 831. Aphalo vāyāmoti ettha atītānaṃ tāva pajahane aphalo hotu vāyāmo niruddhattā,
anya-e0104n0:1696_1: anāgatānaṃ pana kathanti tesampi vakkhamānaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ ajānanto natthitāmattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1696_2: gahetvā codeti, tathāpi “aphalo”ti pubbe pahātabbānaṃ natthitāya codanā katā, idāni
anya-e0104n0:1696_3: pahānassa. Yadi hi pahānaṃ atthi, kathaṃ pahātabbā santi? Atha pahātabbā santi, kathaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1696_4: pahānaṃ hoti? Pahātabbā ca santi, pahānañca hotīti vippaṭisiddhametaṃ. Kasmā? Pahātabbesu
anya-e0104n0:1696_5: santesu pahānassa asambhavato tadupago vāyāmo aphalo ālokatamānaṃ sahāvaṭṭhāne sati
anya-e0104n0:1696_6: ālokassa aphalatā viya. Athāpi kathañci pahānaṃ siyā? Saṃkilesikā ca maggabhāvanā
anya-e0104n0:1696_7: āpajjati pahātabbapahāyakānaṃ sahāvaṭṭhānato. Vippayuttatā vā kilesānaṃ cittavippayuttasaṅkhāravādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1696_8: vippayuttasaṅkhārānaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. Taṃ pana nesaṃ vādīnaṃ yathā matimattaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1696_9: evamidhāpīti dassento āha “na ca paccuppannakileso cittavippayutto nāma atthī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1696_10: Arūpadhammā hi ekavatthukādibhāvena vattamānā khaṇattayapariyāpannā paccuppannā,
anya-e0104n0:1696_11: te kathaṃ cittena vippayuttā nāma siyuṃ, tasmā nattheva vippayuttatā kilesānaṃ. Āveṇikāti
anya-e0104n0:1696_12: asādhāraṇā, sayameva uppāditā pāḷi anāruḷhāti adhippāyo. Pāḷiyaṃyeva hi paṭikkhittanti
anya-e0104n0:1697_0: Vinibaddhoti mānena patthaddhacitto. Parāmaṭṭhoti micchābhiniviṭṭho. Thāmagatoti
anya-e0104n0:1697_1: thāmagatakileso thirabhāvagatānusayo. Tena hi natthi maggabhāvanāti yasmā tīsupi
anya-e0104n0:1697_2: kālesu kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ na yujjati, tikālikā ca kilesā, tasmā natthi maggabhāvanā,
anya-e0104n0:1697_3: tāya sādhetabbaṃ kiccaṃ natthīti attho. “Na hi natthi maggabhāvanā”tiādinā catukkhattuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1697_4: vuttassa paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhepo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ “pāḷiyaṃyeva hī”tiādiṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1698_0: Evamevāti yathā ajātaphale taruṇarukkhe mūle chinne asati chedane āyatiṃ uppajjanārahāni
anya-e0104n0:1698_1: chedanapaccayā anuppajjamānāni vinaṭṭhāni nāma honti, evameva maggabhāvanāya asati
anya-e0104n0:1698_2: uppajjanārahā kilesā maggabhāvanāya anuppajjamānā “pahīnā”ti vuccantīti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1698_3: veditabbaṃ. Uppādoti uppādasīsena uppādavanto khandhā vuttā. Anuppādeti nibbāne.
anya-e0104n0:1698_4: Ajātāyeva na jāyanti, tasmā pahīnā nāma hontīti “natthi kilesappahāna”nti paravādinā
anya-e0104n0:1698_5: kato paṭikkhepo “na hī”ti paṭikkhitto. Te pana neva uppajjitvā vigatā, nāpi bhavissanti,
anya-e0104n0:1698_6: na ca uppannāti “atīte kilese pajahatī”tiādi na vattabbanti dasseti. Hetunirodhāti
anya-e0104n0:1698_7: dukkhahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ nirodhā. Dukkhanirodhoti āyatiṃ uppajjanakadukkhassa nirodho.
anya-e0104n0:1699_0: 832. Etenāti “ajātāyeva na jāyantī”tiādivacanena. Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1699_2: attho. Vattamānādiuppannavidhuratāya bhūmiladdhuppannā eva nāma teti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1700_0: 833. Anubhavitvā, bhavitvā ca apagataṃ bhūtāpagataṃ. Anubhūtabhūtā hi bhūtatāsāmaññena
anya-e0104n0:1700_1: bhūtasaddena vuttā. Sāmaññameva hi upasaggena visesīyatīti. Anubhūtasaddo ca kammavacanicchāya
anya-e0104n0:1700_2: abhāvato anubhāvakavācako daṭṭhabbo. Vikappagāhavasena rāgādīhi, tabbipakkhehi ca
anya-e0104n0:1700_3: akusalaṃ, kusalañca ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati, na vipāko kammavegakkhittattā, nāpi
anya-e0104n0:1700_4: kiriyā ahetukānaṃ atidubbalatāya, sahetukānañca khīṇakilesassa chaḷaṅgupekkhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1700_5: uppajjamānānaṃ atisantavuttittā. Ettha ca purimanaye kusalākusalameva vattuṃ adhippāyavasena
anya-e0104n0:1700_6: “bhūtāpagata”nti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ “uppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya uppannānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1700_7: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā”ti ettha “uppanna”nti gahetvā taṃsadisānaṃ pahānaṃ, vuddhi
anya-e0104n0:1700_8: ca vuttā. Pacchimanaye ca-saddena kusalākusalañca ākaḍḍhitvā sabbaṃ saṅkhataṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1700_10: kammañca tato uppajjituṃ āraddho vipāko ca anāgato okāsakatuppannoti vutto okāso
anya-e0104n0:1700_11: kato etena, okāso kato etassāti ca atthadvayavasena, yaṃ uppannasaddena vināpi viññāyamānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1700_12: uppannaṃ sandhāya “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1701_0: Tāsu tāsu bhūmīsūti manussadevādiattabhāvasaṅkhātesu upādānakkhandhesu. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1701_1: santāne anuppattidhammataṃ anāpāditatāya asamūhataṃ. Asamūhatattāyeva hissa natthīti
anya-e0104n0:1702_0: 834. “Kā bhūmi, ko vā bhūmiladdho”ti āsaṅkaṃ nivattetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1702_1: “Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā”ti etena khandhānaṃ apariññātataṃ dasseti, na ārammaṇabhāvamattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1702_2: tebhūmakaggahaṇeneva tassa siddhattā. Apariññātā hi khandhā kilesānaṃ bhūmīti adhippetā.
anya-e0104n0:1702_3: Khandhesu vatthubhūtesu. Ārammaṇavasenāti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena. Atītānāgate, pageva
anya-e0104n0:1702_4: paccuppanneti adhippāyo. Tanti taṃ aññasantānagataṃ kilesajātaṃ. Tato aññasmiṃ santāne
anya-e0104n0:1702_5: ārammaṇakaraṇamattena bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma yadi siyāti sambandho. Tassāti kilesajātassa.
anya-e0104n0:1702_6: Appaheyyato parasantatipatitattā na koci bhavamūlaṃ pajaheyya. Bhūmiladdhañhi anusayitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1702_7: nāma hotīti adhippāyo. Vatthuvasenāti uppattiṭṭhānavasena. Yattha yattha bhave, santāne
anya-e0104n0:1702_8: vā. Pariññātānaṃ abhūmibhāvato “apariññātā”ti vuttaṃ. Uppādato pabhutīti tesaṃ khandhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1702_9: uppajjanato paṭṭhāya. Kilesānaṃ appahīnabhāvaṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1702_10: tesu khandhesu kilesajātaṃ anuseti, tasmā taṃ anusayitaṃ kilesajātaṃ, teneva anusayanasaṅkhātena
anya-e0104n0:1703_0: 835. Tattha ca bhūmibhūtesu khandhesu na sabbe sabbesaṃ vatthū honti, atha kho viseso
anya-e0104n0:1703_1: atthīti taṃ dassento āha “yassa yesū”tiādi. Tattha yassāti yassa puggalassa. Yesūti
anya-e0104n0:1703_2: satipi ajjhattabhāvasāmaññe yesu atītādikāmāvacarādibhedabhinnesu khandhesu. Te eva
anya-e0104n0:1703_3: yathānusayitā khandhā. Kiṃ panete kilesā ārammaṇaṃ karontā viya paricchijja paricchijja
anya-e0104n0:1703_4: anusentīti? Yato te eva khandhā tesaṃ kilesānaṃ vatthūti vuttā, na heva kho anusayānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1703_5: vatthuṃ paricchijja pavatti atthi. Atītādikāmāvacarādivasena pana yathāparicchinne
anya-e0104n0:1703_6: vatthusmiṃ yo kilesānaṃ appahīnaṭṭho, so paricchijja pavatto viya hotīti “atītakkhandhesū”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1703_7: vuttaṃ. Tena vatthuvasena bhūmiladdhaṃ hotīti vatthubhedena siyā tassa bhedoti dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1703_8: Tathāvavatthitabhāvato eva hi “aññataro lolajātiko taṃ rasapathaviṃ aṅguliyā sāyī”tiādivacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1703_11: Yathā cettha rūpārūpāvacarakkhandhe atikkamitvā pavatti, evaṃ kāmāvacarakkhandhe
anya-e0104n0:1703_12: atikkamitvā pavatti hotīti āha “esa nayo rūpārūpāvacaresū”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1704_0: Pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavanavasena ca kilesānaṃ anusayanaṭṭho anumīyati tadabhāve abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1704_1: Yassa ye anusayā pahīnā, tesaṃ vatthu tena samatikkantaṃ pariññātattāti kuto nesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1704_2: bhūmisamaññāti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “sotāpannādīsu panā”tiādi. Idha vaṭṭamūlakilesāti
anya-e0104n0:1704_3: anusayā adhippetā, na avijjā, bhavataṇhā ca. Yaṃ kiñci cetanācetasikabhedaṃ, kāyikādibhedaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1704_4: vā. Itīti evaṃ, appahīnānusayattāti adhippāyo. Assāti puthujjanassa. Te panete anusayā
anya-e0104n0:1704_5: atītādikāmāvacarādivasena yathāparicchinne tattha tattha vatthusmiṃ anusayantāpi
anya-e0104n0:1704_6: te te pañcupādānakkhandhe avibhāgeneva vatthuṃ katvā anusentīti dassento “tassetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1705_0: 836. Idāni tamatthaṃ anvayabyatirekavasena upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “pathavīrasādi viyā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1705_1: vuttaṃ. Rukkhagacchalatādīnaṃ paccayabhūto sasambhārapathaviyā raso pathavīraso.
anya-e0104n0:1705_2: Āporasepi eseva nayo. Sākhā nāma khuddakasākhā. Pasākho viṭapo. Rukkhapaveṇinti rukkhaparāparaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1706: Maṇḍūkakaṇṭakoti eko macchakaṇṭakoti vadanti. Anupādānoti pahīnacaturupādāno, rūpādīsu vā kiñcipi agaṇhanto.
anya-e0104n0:1707_2: āpāthagate ārammaṇe ādito pavattajavanavāresu anuppajjamānampi. Adhiggahitattāti
anya-e0104n0:1707_3: ayonisomanasikārena abhiruyha gahitattā, daḷhaṃ gahitattāti attho. Aparabhāgeti aparasmiṃ
anya-e0104n0:1707_4: kālabhāge, kālantareti attho. Ekantena uppattitoti paccayasamavāye sati tathā ayonisomanasikārassa
anya-e0104n0:1707_5: tattha nibbattattā niyamena uppajjanato. Kalyāṇigāmeti evaṃnāmake gāme. Rohaṇe kira
anya-e0104n0:1707_6: abhirūpānaṃ itthīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya so gāmo tathā vuccati. Cittasantatimanāruḷhanti
anya-e0104n0:1707_7: paccuppannataṃ paṭisedheti. “Uppattinivārakassa hetuno abhāvā”ti etena paccaye sati
anya-e0104n0:1707_8: paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahatāya avikkhambhitassa uppannatāpariyāyoti dasseti. Nanu
anya-e0104n0:1707_9: ca asamūhatuppannampi paccaye sati uppajjanārahameva? Saccametaṃ, pahānavisesabhāvakato
anya-e0104n0:1707_10: pana nesaṃ bhedo. Yathā avikkhambhitāsamūhatabhūmiladdhuppannaṃ sati paccayasamavāye
anya-e0104n0:1707_11: uppajjanārahaṃ, evaṃ ārammaṇādhiggahituppannampīti tividhassāpi bhūmiladdhena ekasaṅgahatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:1708_0: 838. Akusalampi bhūtāpagatuppannaṃ atītattā na pahātabbaṃ, tathā ekaccaṃ okāsakatuppannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1708_2: Kenacīti catūsu maggañāṇesu kenaci. Tassāti yathāvuttassa catubbidhassapi uppannassa.
anya-e0104n0:1708_3: Taṃ uppannabhāvaṃ vināsayamānanti anuppattidhammatāpādanena uppajjanārahataṃ vināsentaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1708_4: Paṭhamaṃ lokiyañāṇena yathābalaṃ pahīnameva lokuttarañāṇaṃ pajahatīti lokiyaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1710_1: “dukkhaṃ pariññeyya”ntiādinā, “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passatī”tiādinā ca vuttāni.
anya-e0104n0:1710_2: Yathāsabhāvenāti aviparītasabhāvena. “Jānitabbānī”ti vatvā tesaṃ jānanavidhiṃ upamāvasena
anya-e0104n0:1710_3: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva vuttanayena dassetuṃ “vuttaṃ heta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1711_0: Tattha yathā padīpotiādi ekassa ñāṇassa ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni kathaṃ sambhavanti.
anya-e0104n0:1711_1: Na hi tādisaṃ kiñci loke diṭṭhaṃ atthi, na ca vacanaṃ labbhatīti antolīnacodanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1711_2: manasi katvā vuttaṃ “pariññābhisamayenā”ti. Anavasesato paricchijja jānanasaṅkhātena
anya-e0104n0:1711_3: paṭivijjhanena abhisameti asammohavasena paṭivijjhati. Pahānābhisamayenāti samucchedappahānasaṅkhātena
anya-e0104n0:1711_4: paṭivijjhanena asammohato abhisameti. Maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayenāti maggañāṇaṃ sammāsaṅkappādisesamaggaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1711_6: ariyamaggabhāvanāsaṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena abhisameti aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ asammohato
anya-e0104n0:1711_7: paṭivijjhati. Maggañāṇañhi sampayuttadhammesu sammohaṃ viddhaṃsentaṃ attanipi sammohaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1711_9: paṭivijjhanena. Pāpuṇātīti adhigacchati. Svāyaṃ adhigamo dassanapaṭivedhoti āha “passati paṭivijjhatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1712_1: saccāni asammohapaṭivedhena maggañāṇaṃ paṭivijjhatīti evaṃ yuttivasena vibhāvitaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1712_2: ekapaṭivedhaṃ āgamenapi sādhetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. “Sabbaṃ veditabba”nti
anya-e0104n0:1712_3: iminā “yo dukkhasamudayaṃ passati, so dukkhampi passatī”tiādinā āgataṃ samudayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1713_0: Na cetaṃ kālantaradassanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho ekapaṭivedhamevāti dassentena
anya-e0104n0:1713_1: “maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ, dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇa”ntiādinā aparaṃ suttapadaṃ ānītaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:1713_2: hi “yo nu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passati…pe… paṭipadampi
anya-e0104n0:1713_4: sādhetuṃ āyasmatā gavampatittherena vuttaṃ, paccekañca saccattayadassanayojanā katā.
anya-e0104n0:1713_5: Aññathā kamābhisamaye purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādiṃ passato dukkhādidassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1713_6: puna avattabbaṃ siyā, vuccamāne ca sabbadassanaṃ dassanantaraparamanti dassanānuparamo eva siyāti.
anya-e0104n0:1714_2: ālokaviddhaṃsanasadisatā, tena tena maggena yathā yathā nirodhassa sacchikiriyā,
anya-e0104n0:1714_3: tathā tathā kilesasnehapariyādānaṃ hotīti nirodhasacchikiriyāya snehapariyādānasadisatā
anya-e0104n0:1715: 840. Obhāsetīti pakāseti. Kilesapaṭippassaddhinti sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamabhāvato kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhibhūtaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1716: 841. Appetīti pappoti. Dukkhapariññāya sakkāyatīrasamatikkamabhāvato orimatīrappahānasadisatā, maggabhāvanāya sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammāvahanatāya bhaṇḍavahanasadisatā.
anya-e0104n0:1717: 842. Pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ assāti pavattañāṇo, maggo. Assa maggassa.
anya-e0104n0:1718: Tathaṭṭhenāti tathasabhāvena, pīḷanādiaviparītasabhāvenāti attho. Ekapaṭivedhānīti ekajjhaṃ paṭivijjhitabbākārāni.
anya-e0104n0:1719_0: Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhotiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā buddhānussativaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
anya-e0104n0:1719_1: Ekasaṅgahitānīti ekeneva saṅgahitāni. Kena? Tathaṭṭhena, saccaṭṭhenāti attho. Yaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1719_2: ekasaṅgahitantiādi ñāṇassa ekapaṭivedhadassanaṃ. Maggañāṇañhi nirodhameva ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1719_3: karontampi yo so dukkhādīsu tacchāvipallāsabhūtabhāvasaṅkhāto saccaṭṭho, tappaṭicchādakasammohaviddhaṃsanena
anya-e0104n0:1719_4: taṃ yāthāvato paṭivijjhantaṃ paccakkhaṃ karontameva pavattati. Yato aparabhāge pīḷanādayo
anya-e0104n0:1719_5: soḷasapi saccaṭṭhā ariyassa hatthāmalakaṃ viya yāthāvato upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0104n0:1720_0: 843. Atthāti ñāṇena araṇīyato atthāti laddhasamaññā ākārā. Aññasaccadassanavasenāti
anya-e0104n0:1720_1: samudayādisaccantaradassanavasena. Āvibhāvatoti pakāsabhāvato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
anya-e0104n0:1720_2: ye ākārā dukkhādīsu sabhāvavasena, saccantaradassanavasena ca āvibhavanti, te pīḷanādayo
anya-e0104n0:1720_3: cattāroyevāti soḷaseva vuttā, na aññeti. Ayamattho idhādhippetoti kathamidaṃ viññāyatīti
anya-e0104n0:1720_4: āha “tattha katamaṃ dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādi. Tenetaṃ dasseti – yasmā pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ visuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1720_5: ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi saccañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ kiccanibbattivasenapi, tasmā viññāyati “sabhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:1721_0: Kiccanibbattivasena dassanaṃ āvibhāvato dassanasadisanti taṃ anāmasitvā itarameva
anya-e0104n0:1721_1: dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Tatthāti tesu dvīsu dassanesu. Āyūhitanti piṇḍavasena
anya-e0104n0:1721_2: nibbattitaṃ. Yañhi kiñci paccayuppannaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ samuditameva nibbattatīti.
anya-e0104n0:1721_3: Saṅkhatanti paccayantarehi samecca sambhūya kataṃ. Rāsikatanti puñjakataṃ. Anekameva
anya-e0104n0:1721_4: hi paccayuppannaṃ ekajjhaṃ nibbattamānaṃ attano paccayehi rāsikataṃ viya hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:1721_5: Tasmāti samudayena āyūhitattā. Assāti dukkhasaccassa. Yasmiṃ santāne uppanno, tassa
anya-e0104n0:1721_6: kilesasantāpaharo. Sayampi kilesapariḷāhābhāvato susītalo. Santāpaṭṭho āvibhavati
anya-e0104n0:1721_7: uḷāradassanena tadaññassa anuḷārabhāvo viyāti dassento āha “āyasmato”tiādi. Avipariṇāmadhammassa
anya-e0104n0:1721_8: niccasabhāvassa vattabbameva natthi paṭipakkhato āvibhavanākārassa sukhasiddhito.
anya-e0104n0:1722_0: Nidānaṭṭho āvibhavati idamassa nidadātīti. Saṃyogapalibodhaṭṭhā paṭipakkhavasena
anya-e0104n0:1723_1: asaṅkhatabhāvoti evaṃ acchariyabbhutasabhāvopi ariyamaggo saṅkhato eva, ayameva ca
anya-e0104n0:1723_2: eko asaṅkhatoti nirodhassa asaṅkhatabhāvo supākaṭo hoti. Dukkhaṃ visaṃ maraṇadhammato
anya-e0104n0:1724_0: “Maggo”ti sambhāvetabbataṃ patto sukhumasantabhāvena upaṭṭhito nikantibhūtopi nāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1724_1: samudayo hetu nibbānassa pattiyā. Ayaṃ ariyamaggo hetūti maggāmaggañāṇadassane vuttanayena
anya-e0104n0:1724_2: maggassa hetuṭṭho āvibhavati. Nirodhadassanenāti ativiya nipuṇassa paramagambhīrassa
anya-e0104n0:1724_4: ādīnavappattiyā vipulatarādīnavassa dukkhasaccassa dassanena. Tappaṭipakkhato ādhipateyyaṭṭho.
anya-e0104n0:1724_5: Tenāha “anekarogātura…pe… uḷārabhāvo viyā”ti. Evamete yathārahaṃ anvayato, byatirekato
anya-e0104n0:1725_0: Ekekassāti ekekassa atthassa, pīḷanāyūhananissaraṇaniyyānaṭṭhe sandhāyāha. Tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1725_1: tiṇṇanti saṅkhatādiatthe. Ye pana vādino. Nānābhisamayanti nānāñāṇena abhisamayaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1725_2: catunnaṃ saccānaṃ nānākkhaṇe nānāñāṇena paṭivijjhananti attho. Yadi hi maggañāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1725_3: catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayo siyā, dukkhadassanādīhi paṭhamamaggādīhi pahātabbānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1725_4: saṃyojanattayādīnaṃ ekadesappahānaṃ āpajjati. Tathā ca sati ekadesasotāpattimaggaṭṭhatādippasaṅgo.
anya-e0104n0:1725_6: phalānaṃ maggānaṃ viya catukkatā siyā. Tathā ca sati ekadesasotāpannatādippasaṅgo.
anya-e0104n0:1725_7: Kiñca bhiyyo – yadi maggañāṇassa nānābhisamayo siyā, aññena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ passati.
anya-e0104n0:1725_8: Aññena samudayaṃ, aññena nirodhaṃ, aññena maggaṃ, evaṃ sati maggakiccaṃ aparipuṇṇameva
anya-e0104n0:1725_9: siyā. Maggadassanena hi dvayagati, teneva vā tassa dassanaṃ, aññena vāti. Tattha
anya-e0104n0:1725_10: paṭhamo tāva pakkho na yujjati attani pavattiyā asambhavato. Na hi teneva aṅgulaggena
anya-e0104n0:1725_11: tameva parāmasituṃ sakkā. Atha aññena anavaṭṭhānappasaṅgo “yena maggaṃ passati, sopi
anya-e0104n0:1725_12: maggo. Tampi yena passati, sopi maggo”ti. Tasmā ekābhisamayato yathāvutto asammohapaṭivedhova
anya-e0104n0:1725_13: yutto. Apica paricchinditabbaṃ, samucchinditabbañca saccadvayaṃ ārabbha pavattamānassa
anya-e0104n0:1725_14: maggañāṇassa paricchindanasamucchindanāni na sambhavanti tato anissaraṇato. Na hi
anya-e0104n0:1725_16: Nibbānārammaṇena pana tattha, itaradvaye ca sammohaṃ viddhaṃsentena sakkā kātunti
anya-e0104n0:1725_17: ekābhisamayo eva yutto. Ayaṃ pana attho pāḷiyaṃ āgato evāti “tesaṃ uttaraṃ abhidhamme
anya-e0104n0:1727_0: 845. Abhiññāpaññātiādīnaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Apica sutamayāya, cintāmayāya,
anya-e0104n0:1727_1: ekaccabhāvanāmayāya ca abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya ñātā abhiññātā. Āveṇikā bhūmi pariññantarānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1727_2: avisayabhāvato. Na hi nāmarūpaparicchedapaccayapariggahaṇavasena tīraṇapariññādīnaṃ pavatti atthi.
anya-e0104n0:1728_0: 846. Anulomañāṇampi aniccādivaseneva saṅkhāre ārabbha pavattati, pageva paṭisaṅkhānupassanādayoti
anya-e0104n0:1728_1: āha “yāva anulomā āveṇikā bhūmī”ti. Kāmañcettha tīraṇapariññābhūmiyaṃ ñātappahānapariññāyopi
anya-e0104n0:1728_2: laddhāvasarā, tattha pana yathā tīraṇapariññā sātisayaṃ kiccakārī, na tathā itarāti āveṇikaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1729_0: 847. Nippariyāyena pahānapariññā nāma maggañāṇanti “yāva maggañāṇā bhūmī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1729_1: Ayaṃ idha adhippetāti idha abhisamayakāle kiccavicāre ayaṃ pahānapariññā adhippetā
anya-e0104n0:1730_0: Tadatthāyevāti pahānapariññatthā eva. Atha vā tadatthāyevāti pahānatthā eva. Atha
anya-e0104n0:1730_1: vā tadatthāyevāti maggatthā eva. Ñātatīraṇapariññā hi yāvadeva maggādhigamatthāya
anya-e0104n0:1730_2: pavattā. Niyamato ñātā ceva tīritā ca honti ñātatīritabhāvehi vinā pahānābhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:1730_4: pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ viya sāmaññalakkhaṇampi paṭivijjhatīti vuccati
anya-e0104n0:1731_0: 848. Pariññā viyāti tividhatāsāmaññaṃ nidasseti, na pariññāpahātabbatāsāmaññaṃ vikkhambhanappahānassa
anya-e0104n0:1731_1: aripaññākiccabhāvato. Kāmacchandādayo yathā na cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhanti, evaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1731_2: pariyuṭṭhānassa nisedhanaṃ appavattikaraṇaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ, vikkhambhanameva pahānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1731_4: paresampi pākaṭattā. “Na sahasā cittaṃ ajjhottharantī”ti idaṃ paṭiladdhamattassa
anya-e0104n0:1731_5: jhānassa vasena vuttaṃ, subhāvite pana paguṇajjhāne yāva carimakacittampi na ajjhottharanteva.
anya-e0104n0:1731_6: Atha vā jhānassa pubbabhāgepīti jhānādhigamatthāya pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā. Pacchābhāgepīti
anya-e0104n0:1731_8: Dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ paṭipakkhā dutiyādīsu appitesuyeva vikkhambhanti, tato tato vuṭṭhitamattassa
anya-e0104n0:1732_0: 849. “Padīpena andhakārassa viyā”ti idaṃ paṭipakkhena pahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1732_1: Paṭipakkho hi padīpo andhakārassa, ghaṭappahāro pana sevālassa na paṭipakkho, kevalaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1732_2: pavattinivāraṇamattameva karotīti. Tena asatipi ujuvipaccanīkatāya dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1732_3: vitakkādīnaṃ vikkhambhanassa taṃ nidassanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati. “Vipassanāya avayavabhūtenā”ti
anya-e0104n0:1732_4: idaṃ idhādhikatatadaṅgappahānassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlavisodhanādināpi hi tadaṅgappahānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1732_5: hotiyevāti. Ñāṇaṅgenāti ñāṇasaṅkhātena kāraṇena. Tadaṅgena tadaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1732_6: Sati vijjamāne khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte kāye, sayaṃ vā tattha sati diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
anya-e0104n0:1732_7: “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā nayena vuttā attānudiṭṭhi. Soḷasavatthukā, aṭṭhavatthukā
anya-e0104n0:1732_8: ca kaṅkhāva malaṃ kaṅkhāmalaṃ. Samūhagāhassāti “attā attaniya”nti evaṃ pavattasamūhagahaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1732_9: pahānaṃ kalāpasammasanena ekādasasu okāsesu pakkhipitvā vikiraṇavasena khandhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1732_10: dassanato. Assādasaññāyāti pañcakkhandhe assādanavasena pavattamicchāsaññāya. Appaṭisaṅkhānassāti
anya-e0104n0:1732_11: paṭisaṅkhānapaṭipakkhassa mohassa. Anupekkhanassāti apekkhāya. Saṅkhāresu niccādigāho
anya-e0104n0:1732_12: saccapaṭilomagāho maggasaccādhigamassa vilomanato. Sādīnavesu anādīnavasaññitā, anādīnave
anya-e0104n0:1733: Evaṃ visuddhikkamena tadaṅgappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni aṭṭhārasamahāvipassanāvasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ vā pana pahānanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1735: Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ vasena ghanaggahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā, tassā ghanasaññāya.
anya-e0104n0:1736: Nirodhe adhimuttatā, tāyāti tiyaddhagatānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhameva disvā tattha adhimuccanavasena pavattapaññā, tāya. Āyūhanassāti abhisaṅkharaṇassa.
anya-e0104n0:1737_0: Taṃ taṃ paricchedanti ādānanikkhepādikaṃ taṃ taṃ paricchedaṃ. Aññathāpavattidassananti
anya-e0104n0:1737_1: vuttaparicchedato pubbe, pacchā ca aññākārappavattiyā dassanaṃ, avatthāvisesappavattidassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1739: Saṃsayamicchāñāṇānaṃ vasena sammuyhanaṃ sammoho, so eva abhinivesoti sammohābhiniveso. Saṅkhāresu leṇatāṇabhāvaggahaṇaṃ ālayābhiniveso, atthato bhavanikanti.
anya-e0104n0:1740_0: Yathā cittaṃ saṅkhāre muñcitvā vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandati, tathā pavattanato saṅkhārupekkhā
anya-e0104n0:1740_1: ca anulomañca “vivaṭṭānupassanā”ti vuttaṃ. Niviṭṭhabhāvena ogāḷhabhāvena pavattasaṃyojanādikilesā
anya-e0104n0:1741_0: 851. Asanivicakkaṃ asanimaṇḍalaṃ. Evaṃ pahānanti anuppattidhammatāpādanamāha. Kammakilesānaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1741_1: sabbesampi vā saṅkhārānaṃ khayaṃ nirodhaṃ gacchatīti khayagāmī, ariyamaggo. Lokuttaraggahaṇeneva
anya-e0104n0:1741_3: nippariyāyataṃ upādāya. Tadatthānevāti samucchedappahānatthāneva. Tena vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1741_4: maggasambhāratamāha tehi vinā asijjhanato. Atha vā tadatthānevāti maggatthāneva.
anya-e0104n0:1741_5: Tena tadatthatāya tesaṃ taṃkiccataṃ dasseti. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. Tamevatthaṃ upamāya
anya-e0104n0:1741_6: dassetuṃ “paṭirājānaṃ vadhitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yampi tato pubbe katanti yaṃ tatorajjappattito
anya-e0104n0:1741_7: pubbe kataṃ paccantasādhanaduggaviddhaṃsanādi. Yathā idañcidañca raññā katantiyeva
anya-e0104n0:1741_8: vuccati, evaṃ lokiyañāṇena sādhitānipi vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānāni samucchedappahānavasena
anya-e0104n0:1741_9: pavattassa maggassa kiccabhāvena vuccanti, tadatthatāya, tesaṃ taṃsantatipatitatāya
anya-e0104n0:1742_0: 852. Lokiyassa, lokiyā vā sacchikiriyā lokiyasacchikiriyā. Evaṃ lokuttarasacchikiriyā
anya-e0104n0:1742_1: veditabbā. Lābhīmhīti lābhī amhi. Tathā vasīmhīti etthāpi. Paccakkhato ñāṇaphassenāti
anya-e0104n0:1742_2: paccakkhato ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātena ñāṇaphassanena. “Paccakkhato”ti ca iminā anumānato
anya-e0104n0:1743: Jhānamaggaphalāni viya attano santāne anuppādetvāpi tappaṭicchādakasammohaviddhaṃsanavasena tathāviddhaṃsanapavattañāṇaṃ aparappaccayañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1744: Passanto paccakkhato jānanto. Amatogadhanti amatapariyāpannaṃ, amatasaṅkhātanti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1745_0: Sotāpattimaggo paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato dassanaṃ, tena dassanena sacchikiriyā dassanasacchikiriyā.
anya-e0104n0:1745_1: Kiñcāpi gotrabhuñāṇaṃ tato paṭhamataraṃ nibbānaṃ passati, ālambanakaraṇato disvā
anya-e0104n0:1745_2: kattabbakiccākaraṇato pana na dassananti vuccati. Sā duvidhāpīti sā dassanabhāvanāvasena
anya-e0104n0:1745_5: pana iminā maggaphalesu paccavekkhaṇasacchikiriyaṃ. Imassa ñāṇassāti imassa yathādhigatassa lokuttarañāṇassa.
anya-e0104n0:1746_0: 853. Abhimatāti adhippetā. Bhāvanā nāma uppādanā, santānaparibhāvanā cāti tadubhayaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1746_1: dassento “lokiyāna”ntiādimāha. Yadaggena hi lokiyā kusalādayo uppāditā, vaḍḍhitā
anya-e0104n0:1746_2: ca, tadaggenassa sīlabhāvanā, kāyabhāvanā, cittabhāvanā, paññābhāvanā ca lokiyā nipphāditā
anya-e0104n0:1746_3: hoti, tāya ca santānopi paribhāvitoti. Tāsu lokiyalokuttarabhāvanāsu idha ñāṇadassanavisuddhikathāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1746_4: lokuttarabhāvanā adhippetā, na itarā tassā sambhārabhāvato. Catubbidhampetaṃ ñāṇanti
anya-e0104n0:1746_5: etaṃ catubbidhampi ariyamaggañāṇaṃ lokuttarāni sammāvācādibhedāni sīlādīni uppādeti.
anya-e0104n0:1746_6: Kathaṃ? Sahajātādipaccayatāya. Sīlādīnīti ettha ādi-saddena samādhissa gahaṇaṃ, na
anya-e0104n0:1746_7: paññāya. Na hi tadeva taṃ uppādeti, maggacittuppādo pana uppādeti. Tadantogadhabhāvā
anya-e0104n0:1746_8: sammāsaṅkappo. So hi pañcakkhandhasaṅgahitoti vadanti. Sīlādīnīti vā phalasīlādīnampi
anya-e0104n0:1746_9: gahaṇanti paññāyapi gahaṇaṃ yujjatiyeva. Sahajātapaccayāditāyāti ettha ādi-saddena
anya-e0104n0:1746_10: anantarapaccayāditāyapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tehi ca santānaṃ vāsetīti tehi samucchindanapaṭipassambhanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1746_11: pavattehi lokuttarehi sīlādīhi ariyapuggalo attano santānaṃ paribhāveti. Yaṃ nissāya
anya-e0104n0:1746_12: parāvuttīti vadanti. Yathā pariññattayampi pahānattayampi maggañāṇassa kiccanti vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1746_13: pariyāyena, na evamidha. Idha pana lokuttarabhāvanāva assa maggañāṇassa kiccaṃ. Na
anya-e0104n0:1746_14: hettha bhāvanāya pariyāyo labbhatīti avadhāraṇaṃ. Tena lokiyabhāvanaṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0104n0:1747_0: Evaṃ sarūpeneva āgatāyāti “cittaṃ bhāvaya”nti samādhi viya cittasīsena anāgantvā
anya-e0104n0:1747_1: “paññaṃ bhāvaya”nti evaṃ sarūpeneva āgatāya paññāya. Yaṃ vuttaṃ uddesavasena. Ettāvatā
anya-e0104n0:1747_2: taṃ vitthāritaṃ hoti. Ayañca pañho vissajjito hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1752_1: akatvā “ayampi paññābhāvanāya ānisaṃso, ayampī”ti anupadadassanavasena vitthārato
anya-e0104n0:1752_2: pakāsetuṃ na sukaraṃ atibahubhāvato. Assāti paññābhāvanāya. Nānākilesaviddhaṃsananti
anya-e0104n0:1754_1: “ariyamaggakkhaṇe”ti visesavacanaṃ, tabbhāvabhāvato vā. Siddhe hi samucchedappahāne
anya-e0104n0:1755_0: Bhīmavegānupatitāti sakalaṃ lokaṃ bhindantena viya bhīmena bhayānakena vegena sahasā
anya-e0104n0:1755_1: patitā. Siluccayeti pabbate selaputhule. Satejujjalamaṇḍaloti saradakālasamiddhena
anya-e0104n0:1755_3: Sandiṭṭhikanti paccakkhabhūtaṃ. Jaññāti jāneyya. Idhāti imissaṃ paññābhāvanāyaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1757_0: 856. Ariyassa maggassa phalaṃ ariyaphalaṃ, ariyañca taṃ visuddhattā phalañcātipi
anya-e0104n0:1757_1: ariyaphalaṃ, tassa raso, paṭippassaddhivimuttisukhaṃ, anubhavanaṃ nibbānārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:1757_2: tassa paṭisevanaṃ. Tatrāti tesu dvīsu ākāresu. Assāti ariyaphalassa.
anya-e0104n0:1758_0: 857. Saṃyojanesu pahīnesu sabbepi kilesā pahīnāyeva hontīti saṃyojanānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1758_1: Saṃyojanappahānamattameva ariyamaggassa phalaṃ nāma, na aññaṃ kiñci atthantaraṃ vipākabhūtanti
anya-e0104n0:1758_2: adhippāyo. Tenāha “phalaṃ nāma na koci añño dhammo atthī”ti. Ke panetaṃ vadantīti?
anya-e0104n0:1758_3: Andhakādayo. Te hi “arahattaṃ arahattanti, āvuso, vuccati…pe… mohakkhayo”ti suttapadassa
anya-e0104n0:1758_4: atthaṃ aññathā gahetvā nippariyāyato “arahattaṃ nāma kiñci natthi, kilesappahānameva
anya-e0104n0:1758_5: tathā voharīyatī”ti vadantā sesaphalepi paṭikkhipanti. Idaṃ suttampīti paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷimāha.
anya-e0104n0:1758_6: Pakaṭṭho ukkaṭṭho yogoti payogo, ariyamaggo, payoganimittaṃ jātakilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhi
anya-e0104n0:1758_7: payogapaṭippassaddhi. Yā pana ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā labbhamānāpi yassā vipākapaññāya
anya-e0104n0:1758_8: nippajjamānāya nippajjati, sā paṭippassaddhiyaṃ nipphādetabbāyaṃ paññāti paṭippassaddhipaññāti
anya-e0104n0:1758_9: vuttā. Sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā vuṭṭhātīti sammādiṭṭhiyā ujuvipaccanīkadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1758_10: vatvā tadaññatopi vuṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “tadanuvattakakilesehī”ti vuttaṃ, tassā micchādiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0104n0:1758_11: sampayogato, upanissayato ca anuvattakakilesehi. Tena tadekaṭṭhappahānamāha. Khandhehīti
anya-e0104n0:1758_12: tadanuvattakakkhandhehi, tāya micchādiṭṭhiyā sampayuttakkhandhehi ceva tappaccayā
anya-e0104n0:1758_13: āyatiṃ uppajjanakkhandhehi cāti attho. Bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehīti yathāvuttakilesakkhandhehi
anya-e0104n0:1759_0: Evaṃ maggakiccaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa vasena phalaṃ dassetuṃ “tampayogapaṭippassaddhattā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1759_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha tampayogapaṭippassaddhattāti tassa ajjhattabahiddhā vuṭṭhānādipayogassa
anya-e0104n0:1759_2: paṭippassaddhattā. Maggo hi nimittato, pavattato ca vuṭṭhahanto kilese pajahatīti
anya-e0104n0:1759_3: attano khaṇe taṃ payogaṃ karoti nāma, phalakkhaṇe panassa so payogo paṭippassaddho
anya-e0104n0:1759_4: vūpasanto nāma hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “tampayogapaṭippassaddhattā”ti. Uppajjatīti maggānantaraṃ
anya-e0104n0:1759_5: dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā uppajjati. Phalasamāpattikāle pana bahukkhattuṃ, nirodhā
anya-e0104n0:1759_8: yathāvuttā vipākā sammādiṭṭhi nāma, etaṃ ariyamaggassa phalanti veditabbaṃ. Vitthāretabbanti
anya-e0104n0:1760_0: Cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, ime dhammā appamāṇārammaṇāti appamāṇārammaṇatāya maggehi
anya-e0104n0:1760_1: nibbisesatāya. Tathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaṅkhāto mahaggato dhammo nirodhato vuṭṭhānavelāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1760_2: appamāṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayoti ariyaphalassa anantarapaccayatāya
anya-e0104n0:1760_3: ca dīpanāti evamādīnipi ettha ariyaphalassa sabhāvadhammabhāvena atthitāya sādhakāni,
anya-e0104n0:1761: 858. Phalasamāpattiyanti phalapavattisaṅkhātāya samāpattiyaṃ. Assāti ariyaphalassa. Sarūpakattukāraṇākāraṭṭhitivuṭṭhānānantaravasena idaṃ pañhākammaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1762: 859. Ariyaphalassa nirodhe appanāti ariyassa phalajhānassa nibbāne ārammaṇabhūte appanākārena pavatti.
anya-e0104n0:1763_0: 860. Sabbepi puthujjanāti jhānasamāpattilābhinopi puthujjanā na samāpajjanti, pageva
anya-e0104n0:1763_1: itare. Ariyā sabbepi phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjantīti kāmaṃ sāmaññajotanā, sā pana
anya-e0104n0:1763_2: visesaniviṭṭhāyeva hoti. Adhigatattāti pana hetukittanaṃ. Uparimānampi heṭṭhimāya
anya-e0104n0:1763_3: lokiyasamāpattiyā viya samāpajjanaṃ sādhentaṃ viya ṭhitanti taṃ nivattento “uparimā
anya-e0104n0:1763_4: panā”tiādimāha. Tattha uparimāti sakadāgāmiādayo. Heṭṭhimanti sotāpattiphalādiṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1763_5: Na samāpajjanti satipi adhigatatte. Kasmāti ce? Kāraṇamāha “puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena
anya-e0104n0:1763_6: paṭippassaddhattā”ti. Etena uparimo ariyo heṭṭhimaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati attanā
anya-e0104n0:1763_7: adhigatattā, yathā taṃ lokiyasamāpattinti, evaṃ pavattaṃ hetuṃ byabhicāreti. Na hi
anya-e0104n0:1763_8: lokiyajjhānesu puggalantarabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma atthi visesābhāvato. Idha pana asamugghāṭitakammakilesanirodhanena
anya-e0104n0:1763_9: puthujjanehi viya sotāpannassa, sotāpannādīhi sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ puggalantarabhāvūpagamanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1763_10: atthi. Yato heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā phaladhammā uparūpari maggadhammehi nivattitā paṭipakkhehi
anya-e0104n0:1764_0: Apica kusalakiriyapavatti nāma aññādisī, vipākapavatti ca aññādisī, anantaraphalattā
anya-e0104n0:1764_1: ca lokuttarakusalānaṃ heṭṭhimato uparimo bhavantaragato viya hoti. Taṃtaṃphalavaseneva
anya-e0104n0:1764_2: hi ariyānaṃ sotāpannādināmalābho. Te sace aññaphalasamaṅginopi honti, sotāpannādināmampi
anya-e0104n0:1764_3: tesaṃ avaṭṭhitaṃ siyā, tena tena jhānena gahitapaṭisandhiko viyāti tassa tassa ariyassa
anya-e0104n0:1764_4: taṃ taṃ phalaṃ bhavaṅgasadisanti na uparimassa heṭṭhimaphalasamaṅgitāya lesopi sambhavati,
anya-e0104n0:1764_5: kuto tassa samāpajjananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Heṭṭhimā ca uparimanti heṭṭhimā ca sotāpannādayo
anya-e0104n0:1764_6: ariyā uparimaṃ sakadāgāmiphalādiṃ na samāpajjantīti sambandho. Tattha kāraṇamāha
anya-e0104n0:1765_0: “Attano attanoyeva pana phalaṃ samāpajjantī”ti iminā sabbepi ariyā attano attano
anya-e0104n0:1765_1: phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjantīti atthe āpanne tattha kesañci matibhedaṃ dassetuṃ “keci
anya-e0104n0:1765_2: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ete hi samādhismiṃ paripūrakārinoti yasmā hi te “uparimā dve”ti
anya-e0104n0:1765_3: vuttā anāgāmino, arahanto ca samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino, itare pana sīlesu paripūrakārino,
anya-e0104n0:1765_4: tasmā dve eva phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjantīti. Na hi samādhipāripūriyā vinā samāpattivaḷañjanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1765_5: sambhavatīti adhippāyo. Tanti “samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino”ti tehi vuttakāraṇaṃ. Akāraṇamevāti
anya-e0104n0:1765_6: ayuttiyeva. Kasmāti ce? Āha “puthujjanassāpī”tiādi. Tassattho – sabbaso asamucchinnakilesassa
anya-e0104n0:1765_7: puthujjanassāpi attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ labbhati, kimaṅgaṃ pana
anya-e0104n0:1765_8: samucchinnekaccakilesānaṃ heṭṭhimānaṃ ariyānaṃ, tasmā tesaṃ samādhismiṃ aparipūrakāritā
anya-e0104n0:1765_9: attano phalasamāpattiṃ asamāpajjanassa akāraṇanti. Yutticintā nāma pāḷianāruḷhe atthe
anya-e0104n0:1765_10: yuttā, ayaṃ panattho pāḷiāruḷhoti kāraṇāpadese anādarakaraṇamukhena pāḷiṃ dassento
anya-e0104n0:1765_12: Sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāyāti sotāpattiphalasamāpattiyā samāpajjanatthaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0104n0:1766_1: uddhaṭattā tato pubbe āgatā maggaphalavārā appaṇihitavasena vuttā. Tattha anattānupassanāmukhena,
anya-e0104n0:1766_2: aniccānupassanāmukhena ca pavattānaṃ phalasamāpattīnaṃ purecarā gotrabhudhammā navadasabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1766_3: vuttāti veditabbā. “Sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāyā”tiādinā pana catūsupi phalesu ekasadisaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1766_4: desanāya āgatattā sotāpannasakadāgāminopi attano phalaṃ samāpajjantīti viññāyati.
anya-e0104n0:1766_5: Maggānantaraphalavasena taṃ vuttanti ca na sakkā vattuṃ vipassanāvasena dasannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1766_6: gotrabhudhammānaṃ dassanavasena desanāya āraddhattā, maggavāreneva ca tadatthasiddhito.
anya-e0104n0:1766_7: Na ca maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ “phalasamāpattī”ti vuccati visuṃ parikammābhāvato. Tasmā
anya-e0104n0:1767_0: 861. Payojanampi tadatthāya paṭipattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti tannimittaṃ paṭipajjanatoti
anya-e0104n0:1767_2: vissajjitaṃ. Kasmāti vā sampadāne nissakkavacanaṃ, kissāti vuttaṃ hoti. Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthanti
anya-e0104n0:1767_3: diṭṭheva dhamme kilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamena santena sukhavihārena viharaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1767_4: Satipi vipākabhāve parikammena vinā anuppajjanato phalasamāpattidhammānaṃ tassa tassa
anya-e0104n0:1767_5: ariyassa rucivaseneva pavatti, yato nesaṃ sādhipatitāti āha “addhāna…pe… samāpajjantī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1768_0: 862. Dvīhi ākārehīti dvīhi kāraṇehi. Yathā hi lokiyajjhānānaṃ samadhigamo sampayogasamaṅgibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1768_1: sijjhamāno pahānaṅgasamatikkamamukhena vuccati tathā samadhigantabbattā, evaṃ phalasamāpattipi
anya-e0104n0:1768_4: hi sabbaphalacittaṃ saṅkhārato sabbaso nibbinnavirattacittassa tato vinissaṭanibbānārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1768_5: pavattati. Evaṃ pavattamānañca taṃ nibbānato aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā, nibbānassa
anya-e0104n0:1769_1: vā samāpajjitabbāya phalasamāpattiyā. Samāpattiyāti samāpajjanatthāya. Sabbanimittānanti
anya-e0104n0:1769_2: rūpādisabbasaṅkhāranimittānaṃ. Amanasikāroti ādīnavato disvā vissaṭṭhatāya anāvajjanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1769_3: asamannāhāro. Animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāroti sabbasaṅkhāranimittābhāvato animittāya.
anya-e0104n0:1769_4: Kehici paccayehi na saṅkhatattā ca asaṅkhatāti laddhanāmāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā phalasamāpattisahajātena
anya-e0104n0:1769_5: manasikārena manasikaraṇaṃ, tassā vā dhātuyā phalasamāpatticittasaṅkhāte manasikaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1770_1: navannampi ñāṇānaṃ byāpāraṃ vadati. Tenāha “pavattānupubbavipassanassā”ti. Saṅkhārārammaṇagotrabhuñāṇānantaranti
anya-e0104n0:1770_2: saṅkhārārammaṇassa “vodāna”nti laddhanāmassa gotrabhuñāṇassa anantaraṃ. Kasmā panettha
anya-e0104n0:1770_3: gotrabhuñāṇaṃ maggañāṇapurecārikaṃ viya nibbānārammaṇaṃ na hotīti? Phaladhammānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1770_4: aniyyānikabhāvato. Ariyamaggadhammā eva hi niyyānikā. Vuttañhetaṃ “katame dhammā
anya-e0104n0:1770_5: niyyānikā? Cattāro maggā apariyāpannā”ti. Tasmā ekantena niyyānikasabhāvassa ubhatovuṭṭhānabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:1770_6: pavattamānassa maggañāṇassa anantarapaccayabhūtena ñāṇena nimittato vuṭṭhiteneva
anya-e0104n0:1770_7: bhavitabbanti tassa nibbānārammaṇatā yuttā, na pana ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā tassa
anya-e0104n0:1770_8: vipākabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamucchindanato aniyyānikattā avuṭṭhānasabhāvānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1770_9: phalañāṇānaṃ purecārikañāṇassa kadācipi nibbānārammaṇatā ubhayattha anulomañāṇānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1770_11: sātisayaṃ padālanena lokiyañāṇesu ukkaṃsapāramippattāni maggañāṇānuguṇāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0104n0:1770_12: Phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana tāni tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā
anya-e0104n0:1770_13: tattha kilesavikkhambhane nirussukkāni kevalaṃ ariyānaṃ phalasamāpattisukhasamaṅgibhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:1770_14: parikammamattāni hutvā uppajjantīti na tesaṃ kutoci vuṭṭhānasambhavo, yato nesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1771_0: Evañca katvā “sekkhassa attano phalasamāpattivaḷañjanatthāya udayabbayādivasena saṅkhāre
anya-e0104n0:1771_1: sammasantassa vipassanāñāṇānupubbiyā phalameva uppajjati, na maggo”ti idañca aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1771_2: samatthitaṃ hoti. Tenāha “sekkhassāpi phalameva uppajjati, na maggo”ti. Nibbānārammaṇe
anya-e0104n0:1771_3: appanajjhānavasena yathāparicchinnakālaṃ nirantaraṃ phalacittasseva pavattanaṃ samāpajjanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1771_4: phalasamāpattīti āha “phalasamāpattivasena nirodhe cittaṃ appetī”ti. Yadi anupubbavipassanānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1771_5: vasena phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ, tena nīhārena sekkhassa uparimaggenāpi bhavitabbanti
anya-e0104n0:1771_6: anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “phalasamāpattininnatāyā”tiādi. Tena aññoyeva vipassanācāro ariyamaggāvaho,
anya-e0104n0:1771_7: añño phalasamāpattiāvahoti dasseti, svāyaṃ vipassanāya vibhāgo vutto eva. Ye panāti
anya-e0104n0:1771_8: abhayagirivāsino sandhāyāha. Te hi maggaphalavipassanāya āloḷetvā vadanti. Teneva
anya-e0104n0:1771_9: hi “evaṃ satī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Arahā paccekabuddho bhavissati yadi itaratthāpi vipassanā
anya-e0104n0:1771_10: tadatthāya saṃvatteyyāti adhippāyo. Pāḷivaseneva ca paṭikkhittanti “dasa gotrabhudhammā
anya-e0104n0:1771_11: vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti maggatthā phalatthā vipassanā visuṃ katvā pavattapāḷivaseneva
anya-e0104n0:1771_12: tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭikkhittantipi na gahetabbaṃ, aññathā “dasa gotrabhudhammā”ti vacanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1771_13: virujjheyyāti. Idameva pana gahetabbanti vuttassevatthassa nigamanaṃ. Phalañcassātiādi
anya-e0104n0:1771_14: mahaggatavipākānaṃ viya lokuttaravipākānañca kusalasarikkhatādassanaṃ. Jhānato sarikkhatādassaneneva
anya-e0104n0:1772_1: idha ṭhitīti. “Cande vā sūriye vā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti kālāvadhiggahaṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:1773_0: 865. Sabbānevetānīti rūpanimittādisabbāneva etāni ekato kāmaṃ na manasi karoti asambhavato.
anya-e0104n0:1773_1: Sabbasaṅgāhikavasenāti anavasesapariyādānavasena. Samudāyasaddā hi avayavesupi pavattanti,
anya-e0104n0:1773_2: avayavabyatirekena ca samudāyo na labbhatīti avayavagatampi kiccaṃ samudāyavasena
anya-e0104n0:1773_3: vuttaṃ. Tasmāti sabbesaṃ saṅkhāranimittānaṃ ekato manasikārābhāvato. Yasmā bhavaṅgacitte
anya-e0104n0:1773_4: uppanne phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “yaṃ bhavaṅgassā”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:1773_5: Bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇaṃ nāma kammādi. Manasi karototi bhavaṅgasahagatena manasikārena
anya-e0104n0:1773_6: manasi karoto, taṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgamanasi karoto.
anya-e0104n0:1774_0: 866. Phalassa phalameva vā anantaraṃ hoti purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1774_1: Bhavaṅgaṃ vā sabbapacchimassa. Phalānantaraṃ maggavīthiyaṃ, phalasamāpattiyañca.
anya-e0104n0:1774_2: “Yena phalena nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ hotī”ti idaṃ phaluppattiyā nirodhā vuṭṭhānabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1774_3: vuttaṃ. Tanti nirodhāvuṭṭhānabhāvena vuttaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ vā aggaphalaṃ vā. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanānantaranti
anya-e0104n0:1774_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa kusalassa, kiriyassa vā anantaraṃ satipi sattāhātikkame
anya-e0104n0:1775_1: Subhanti asobhanatāya kilesassāpi abhāvato sobhanaṃ. Taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ lokāmisaṃ vantaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1775_2: chaḍḍitaṃ etenāti vantalokāmisaṃ. Vūpasantakilesatāya, susantatāya ca santaṃ. Yena
anya-e0104n0:1775_3: dhammena yogato samaṇo nāma hoti, tassa ariyamaggasaṅkhātassa sāmaññassa phalanti sāmaññaphalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1776_0: Ojavantenāti sabhāvasampannena. Sucināti kilesāsucivirahato parisuddhena. Sukhenāti
anya-e0104n0:1776_1: anuttarasukhena. Abhisanditanti sabbaso lūkhabhāvāpagamanena sinehitaṃ. Sātātisātenāti
anya-e0104n0:1776_2: mahaggatasātato, lokuttarakusalasātato ca ativiya sātena madhurena. Maggasukhatopi
anya-e0104n0:1776_3: hi phalasukhaṃ santataratāya paṇītataraṃ. Amatena sammoditaṃ. “Madhuṃ viyā”ti iminā
anya-e0104n0:1777: Tassa ariyassa phalassa rasabhūtaṃ sārabhūtaṃ taṃ sukhaṃ paññaṃ bhāvetvā yasmā paṇḍito vindati paṭilabhatīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1779: 867. Tatrāti tasmiṃ “nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpajjanasamatthatā”ti saṃkhittavacane. Idaṃ sarūpādivasena pañhākammaṃ. Katthāti kasmiṃ bhave.
anya-e0104n0:1780_0: 868. Anupubbanirodhavasenāti vipassanānugatā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ārohantena taṃtaṃpaṭipakkhanirodhamukhena
anya-e0104n0:1780_1: tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ anupubbato nirodhavasena. Yathāparicchinnakālaṃ yā cittacetasikānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1780_2: appavatti, ayaṃ nirodhasamāpattīti attho. Ke samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjantīti kāmaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1780_3: samāpajjanasamatthā padhānatāya paṭhamaṃ pucchitā, tabbissajjanaṃ pana garubhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1780_4: pacchā vissajjetuṃ asamāpajjanake tāva dassento “sabbepi…pe… na samāpajjantī”ti āha
anya-e0104n0:1780_5: yathā “vāmaṃ muñca, dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā”ti. Tattha “sabbepī”ti idaṃ puthujjanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1780_6: visesanaṃ. Te hi aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ lābhinopi alābhino viya samādhismiṃ aparipūrakāritāya
anya-e0104n0:1780_7: nirodhaṃ samāpajjituṃ na sakkonti. Kāmacchandādisamucchindanena hi samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritā,
anya-e0104n0:1780_8: na jhānādhigamamattena. Anāgāmino, arahantoti ettha sukkhavipassakā ca anāgāmino,
anya-e0104n0:1780_9: sukkhavipassakā ca arahantoti sukkhavipassakasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Ubhayepi cete
anya-e0104n0:1780_10: satipi vipassanābale samādhibalassa abhāvato nirodhaṃ na samāpajjanti. Anupubbavihārasambhavataññevettha
anya-e0104n0:1780_11: samādhibalaṃ icchitabbaṃ. Purimakā pana tayo satipi samādhibale vipassanābalassa
anya-e0104n0:1780_12: abhāvato, aparipuṇṇattā ca samāpajjituṃ na sakkonti. Aparipuṇṇatā cassa saṅkhārānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1780_13: na sammā parimadditattā. Aṭṭha samāpatti…pe… samāpajjantī”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1780_14: pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “dvīhi balehī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tayo ca saṅkhārānanti ettha tayoti
anya-e0104n0:1780_15: sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ, tiṇṇanti attho. Ñāṇacariyāhīti ñāṇappavattīhi. Nirodhasamāpattiyāti
anya-e0104n0:1780_16: nirodhasamāpajjanāya ñāṇaṃ. Ayañca sampadāti ayaṃ baladvayasamannāgamādikā yathāvuttanirodhasamāpattiāvahā
anya-e0104n0:1780_17: sampatti. Anāgāmikhīṇāsaveti anāgāmino ceva khīṇāsave ca.
anya-e0104n0:1781_0: 869. Samathabalanti kāmacchandādike paccanīkadhamme sametīti samatho, so eva paṭipakkhehi
anya-e0104n0:1781_1: akampiyaṭṭhena balaṃ. Aniccādivasena vividhehi ākārehi passatīti vipassanā, sā eva
anya-e0104n0:1781_4: cittassa ekaggatāsaṅkhāto yo avikkhepo, taṃ samathabalaṃ. Byāpādavikkhambhanassa
anya-e0104n0:1781_6: Thinamiddhavikkhambhikāya vibhūtaṃ katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitaālokasaññāya vasena.
anya-e0104n0:1782_0: Evaṃ upacārassa jhānassa vasena samathabalaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1782_1: vasena paṭipakkhehi anabhibhavanīyatāya ca balappattivasena dassetuṃ “paṭhamajjhānenā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:1782_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha nīvaraṇeti nīvaraṇanimittaṃ nīvaraṇapaccayā. Na kampati jhānasamaṅgipuggalo,
anya-e0104n0:1782_3: jhānasampayuttasamādhi vā. So hi visesato idha “samathabala”nti adhippeto. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:1782_4: hi kenaṭṭhena samathabalanti balaṭṭho pucchito. Uddhacceti uddhaccanimittaṃ. Uddhaccasahagatakileseti
anya-e0104n0:1782_6: Na kampatītiādīni aññamaññavevacanāni. Kampanaṃ vā ṭhānāpagamo. Calanaṃ paribbhamanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1782_7: Vedhanaṃ sandhāvanaṃ. Uddhacce na kampati, uddhaccasahagatakilese na calati, uddhaccasahagatakkhandhe
anya-e0104n0:1782_8: na vedhatīti vā yojetabbaṃ. Uddhaccaggahaṇañcettha samathassa ujupaṭipakkhatāya tadabhibhavena
anya-e0104n0:1782_9: balappattidassanatthaṃ. Tenetaṃ aṭṭhannampi samāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇato kiccātisayadassanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1782_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idaṃ samathabalanti yāyaṃ nekkhammādivasena laddhāya cittekaggatāya nīvaraṇādīhi
anya-e0104n0:1782_11: akampanīyatā, tāni ca abhibhavitvā avaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ samathabalaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1783_0: Idāni vipassanābalaṃ niddisanto yasmā vipassanā saṅkhepato sattahi anupassanāhi saṅgahitā,
anya-e0104n0:1783_1: tasmā tato tato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya tāsaṃ vasena anupassanā kātabbā, tattakeneva
anya-e0104n0:1783_2: cettha anupassanākiccaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hotīti “aniccānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ…pe… paṭinissaggānupassanā
anya-e0104n0:1783_3: vipassanābala”nti sarūpato dassetvā puna tā heṭṭhā vuttanayena visayavibhāgena dassetuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1783_4: “rūpe aniccānupassanā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idhāpi paṭipakkhehi anabhibhavanīyatāva balaṭṭhoti
anya-e0104n0:1783_5: dassetuṃ “kenaṭṭhena vipassanābala”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha avijjāyāti dvādasasu akusalacittuppādesu
anya-e0104n0:1783_7: Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva. Avijjaggahaṇañcettha vipassanāya ujupaṭipakkhatāya
anya-e0104n0:1783_8: tadabhibhavena balappattidassanatthaṃ. Tenetaṃ sattannampi anupassanānaṃ sādhāraṇato
anya-e0104n0:1783_9: kiccātisayadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idaṃ vipassanābalanti yāyaṃ aniccānupassanādivasena
anya-e0104n0:1783_10: laddhassa vipassanāñāṇassa niccasaññādinimittaṃ akampanīyatā, tā ca abhibhavitvā
anya-e0104n0:1784_0: Vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā vācaṃ saṅkharonti pavattentīti katvā. Tenāha “pubbe kho,
anya-e0104n0:1784_1: āvuso visākha, vitakketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṃ bhindati, tasmā vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhāro”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1784_2: Te pana dutiyajjhāne vūpasantā hontīti āha “dutiyajjhānaṃ…pe… paṭippassaddhā hontī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1784_3: Kāyena saṅkharīyantīti kāyasaṅkhārā, assāsapassāsā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “assāsapassāsā
anya-e0104n0:1784_4: kho, āvuso visākha, kāyikā ete dhammā kāyappaṭibaddhā, tasmā assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhāro”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1784_5: Te pana yasmā catutthajjhāne vūpasantā honti, tasmā āha “catutthajjhānaṃ…pe… paṭippassaddhā
anya-e0104n0:1784_6: hontī”ti. Cittena saṅkharīyantīti cittasaṅkhārā, saññā vedanā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “saññā
anya-e0104n0:1784_7: ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittappaṭibaddhā, tasmā saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1784_8: Te pana yasmā nirodhaṃ samāpannassa vūpasamanti, tasmā vuttaṃ “saññāvedayita…pe…
anya-e0104n0:1785_0: Ñāṇacariyāsu vivaṭṭānupassanāggahaṇeneva tassa ādibhūtā sesānupassanāpi gahitāva
anya-e0104n0:1785_1: honti tadavinābhāvato. Maggo ñāṇacariyā, phalasamāpatti ñāṇacariyāti maggaphalasamāpattīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1785_2: ñāṇacariyābhāvavacanaṃ maggaphaladhammānaṃ ñāṇapadhānattā, ñāṇena vā indriyādhipatihetumaggapaccayādivasena
anya-e0104n0:1785_3: sātisayapaccayabhūtena sesā maggaphaladhammā caritā pavattitāti katvā tathā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1785_4: Samādhicariyāsupi eseva nayo. Imāhi soḷasahīti aṭṭhannaṃ anupassanānaṃ, aṭṭhannañca
anya-e0104n0:1786_0: Navahi samādhicariyāhīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo aṭṭha samādhicariyā, tāsaṃ upacārasamādhi
anya-e0104n0:1786_1: upacārasamādhibhāvanāsāmaññena ekā samādhicariyāti evaṃ navahi samādhicariyāhi. Tenāha
anya-e0104n0:1786_3: nānāvajjanupacāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, uparisamāpattīnampi upacārassa tatheva
anya-e0104n0:1786_4: vuttattā. Na hi ekāvajjane catutthajjhānādiupacāre pītiādayo sambhavanti. Ettha ca
anya-e0104n0:1786_6: dasseti. Kiṃ panettha samathabalasamādhicariyānaṃ nānattaṃ, kiṃ vā vipassanābalalokiyañāṇacariyānaṃ?
anya-e0104n0:1786_7: Yathā samathabalepi “nekkhammavasenā”tiādinā upacārasamādhinā saddhiṃ aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu
anya-e0104n0:1786_8: appanāsamādhiyeva vutto, tathā samādhicariyāsu, vipassanābalalokiyañāṇacariyāsu ca
anya-e0104n0:1786_9: vipassanāva vuttāti? Kiñcāpi vuttā, vivaṭṭānupassanā pana purecarañāṇādivipassanābale
anya-e0104n0:1786_10: avuttā eva ñāṇacariyāsu vuttā. Apica paṭipakkhehi akampiyaṭṭho balaṭṭho, pañcannaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1786_11: vasībhāvānaṃ vasena suciṇṇatā cariyaṭṭho, eteneva samathabalasamādhicariyānampi nānattaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1787_0: Vasībhāvatā paññāti ettha vaso etassa atthīti vasī, tassa bhāvo vasībhāvo, sā eva
anya-e0104n0:1787_1: vasībhāvatā. “Vasiyo”ti pana pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgavasena vuttattā tāyo dassetuṃ “vasīti
anya-e0104n0:1787_2: pañca vasiyo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha jhānaṃ āvajjantassa nirantaraṃ jhānaṅgesu cittappavattanasamatthatā
anya-e0104n0:1787_3: āvajjanavasī. Samāpajjitukāmassa sīghaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī.
anya-e0104n0:1787_4: Accharāmattaṃ vā katipayaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī.
anya-e0104n0:1787_5: Tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī. Paccavekkhaṇavasī pana āvajjanavasiyā
anya-e0104n0:1787_6: eva sijjhati. Paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva hi tattha āvajjanānantarānīti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
anya-e0104n0:1787_7: vitthāro pana heṭṭhā āgato eva. Ayañca vasībhāvo samādhicariyānaṃ vasena vutto. Ñāṇacariyāsu
anya-e0104n0:1787_8: pana lokuttarānaṃ ñāṇacariyānaṃ vasībhāvāpādanakiccaṃ nāma natthi. Paṭipakkhassa
anya-e0104n0:1787_9: suvihatattā sabhāvasiddho tattha vasībhāvo, lokiyānaṃ pana paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena
anya-e0104n0:1788_0: 870. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesoti anavasesaniddeso. Cuddasahi ñāṇacariyāhi hoti aggamaggaphalānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1788_1: anadhigatattāti. Yadi evanti yadi ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena “soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1788_2: vuttaṃ, tato avakaṃsavasenapi icchitabbaṃ, evaṃ sante kiṃ na hoti nirodhasamāpajjananti
anya-e0104n0:1788_3: adhippāyo. Pañca kāmaguṇā vatthubhūtā etassa santīti pañcakāmaguṇiko, kāmarāgo. Appahīnattā
anya-e0104n0:1788_4: asamucchinnattā. Na hi kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanappahānamattaṃ nirodhassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1788_5: bhavituṃ sakkoti. Tasmāti samādhipāripanthikassa kāmarāgassa supahīnattā. Etena kāmaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1788_6: maggaphalañāṇacariyā lokiyañāṇasamādhicariyā viya nirodhasamāpajjane sarūpena na
anya-e0104n0:1788_7: viniyujjanti tadā appavattanato, tassa tassa pana paṭipakkhassa samucchindanena balacariyānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1788_8: visesapaccayatāya nirodhasamāpattiyā adhiṭṭhānaṃ hotīti dasseti. Esāti anāgāmī. Idañhi
anya-e0104n0:1788_9: “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassā”tiādivacanaṃ anāgāminova nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1789_1: yathārahaṃ anupubbasamāpatti labbhatīti? Kāmaṃ labbhati, sā pana “anupubbasamāpattī”ti
anya-e0104n0:1789_2: na vuccati ekadesabhāvato. Aṭṭhasamāpattivaseneva ca “anupubbasamāpattī”ti vuccatīti
anya-e0104n0:1789_3: dassento āha “paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ uppatti natthī”ti. Vatthussa abhāvāti hadayavatthuno
anya-e0104n0:1789_4: abhāvāti vadanti, karajakāyasaṅkhātassa pana vatthuno abhāvāti attho. Yadi hi āruppe
anya-e0104n0:1789_5: nirodhaṃ samāpajjeyya, cittacetasikānaṃ, aññassa ca kassaci abhāvato apaññattikova
anya-e0104n0:1789_6: bhaveyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutasadiso. Kiñcāyaṃ upādāya nirodhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1789_7: samāpannoti vucceyya, kiṃ vā etāya vatthucintāya. Aṅgavekallatova natthi āruppe nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1790_0: 872. Saṅkhārānaṃ pavattibhedeti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe uppajjane, bhijjane
anya-e0104n0:1790_1: ca, tesaṃ vā kusalādibhedabhinne yathārahaṃ tīhi dukkhatāhi upaddute pavattivibhāge.
anya-e0104n0:1790_2: Cittacetasikavigamehi rūpadhammesu labbhamānāpi saṅkhāradukkhatā abbohārikataṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0104n0:1790_3: Ukkaṇṭhitvāti nibbinditvā. Nibbānaṃ patvāti anupādisesanibbānaṃ patvā viya. Sukhanti niddukkhaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1791_0: 873. Samathavipassanāvasenāti yuganaddhānaṃ viya aññamaññūpakāritāya sahitānaṃ vasena.
anya-e0104n0:1791_1: Ussakkitvāti ukkaṃsaṃ patvā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā, yāva ca anulomañāṇā āruhitvā.
anya-e0104n0:1791_2: Nirodhayatoti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā taṃ nirodhentassa. Aññassa kassacipi
anya-e0104n0:1791_3: cittassa anuppajjanena evamassā nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpajjanaṃ hoti. “Yo hī”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:1791_5: patvā tiṭṭhati taduddhaṃ suddhasamathavipassanāya abhāvato. Yo vipassanāvaseneva
anya-e0104n0:1791_6: ussakkati sace ariyo phalasamāpattatthiko, so attano phalasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0104n0:1791_7: Atha puthujjano, sekho vā maggatthiko tāya ce vipassanāya maggaṃ patvā phale ṭhito,
anya-e0104n0:1791_8: sopi phalasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhaticceva vuccati. Soti ubhayavasena paṭipanno. Tanti nirodhasamāpattiṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1792_0: 874. Yena phaladvayasamannāgamādinā nirodhaṃ samāpajjituṃ samattho hoti, so vidhi
anya-e0104n0:1792_2: sabbāsampi bhāvanānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ pubbakiccaṃ. Tattha saṅkhāreti tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhāne,
anya-e0104n0:1793_0: “Vipassatī”ti vuttaṃ, kīdisī panettha vipassanā icchitabbāti taṃ niddhāraṇatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1793_1: “vipassanā panesā”tiādinā tameva vipassanaṃ tidhā bhinditvā dasseti. Mandā ce vipassanā,
anya-e0104n0:1793_2: dandhābhiññaṃ maggaṃ sādheti. Tikkhā ce, khippābhiññanti ayaṃ mandatikkhatāya viseso.
anya-e0104n0:1793_3: Lakkhaṇappattā pana vipassanā maggassa paccayo hotiyevāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha
anya-e0104n0:1793_4: “saṅkhāra…pe… hotiyevā”ti. Tikkhāva vaṭṭati saṅkhārārammaṇepi sati sabbasaṅkhārehi
anya-e0104n0:1793_5: vivaṭṭanākāreneva pavattanato, maggo viya visaṅkhāragatassa phalassa paccayabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:1793_6: ca. Tenāha “maggabhāvanāsadisā”ti. Yasmā atimandā samathādikā saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhane
anya-e0104n0:1793_7: asamatthā samathaniṭṭhā hoti, atitikkhā ñāṇādikā sātisayaṃ saṅkhāresu dosadassane
anya-e0104n0:1793_8: phalasamāpattiniṭṭhā hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “nātimandanātitikkhā vaṭṭatī”ti. Esa nirodhasamāpajjanako.
anya-e0104n0:1794_0: “Tathevā”ti iminā “nātimandāya nātitikkhāyā”ti imamatthaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Esa nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0104n0:1794_1: “Ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassatī”ti vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1794_2: heṭṭhā vuttanayattā pana taṃ avatvā “catubbidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karoti”cceva vuttanti
anya-e0104n0:1794_3: keci, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Vipassanācārato hi samādhicāro, tasmā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0104n0:1794_4: pubbakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tathā hi paratopi “ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya imaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1794_5: pubbakiccaṃ katvā”tiādiṃ vakkhati, na pana “tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:1794_6: Nānābaddhaavikopananti attanā asambaddhassa parikkhārassa avināsanaṃ. Yathā taṃ na
anya-e0104n0:1794_7: vinassati, tathā adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Saṅghapaṭimānananti saṅghassa paṭimānanāvajjanaṃ. Satthupakkosananti
anya-e0104n0:1794_8: satthu pakkosanāvajjanaṃ. Addhānaparicchedanti jīvitaddhānaparicchedaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karotīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1795: 875. Adhiṭṭhātabbanti cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. Tathā cittuppādanameva hettha adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1796_1: tathā sarīraṃ pavattati, tato paraṃ kilamatīti sattāhameva paricchinditvā nirodhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1797_0: Samāpattivasenevāti nirodhasamāpattivaseneva. Naṃ aggiādiantarāyaṃ rakkhati samāpannako
anya-e0104n0:1797_1: adhiṭṭhānavasenāti adhippāyo. Āyasmato sañjīvassātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā
anya-e0104n0:1798: 876. Etassāti nirodhaṃ samāpajjantassa, nirodhasamāpajjanassa vā. Tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ tassa bhikkhuno upasaṅkamanasamaye vuṭṭhātiyeva. Kālaparicchedasadisañhetaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1799_0: Evaṃ garukāti aggiādīhipi anabhibhavanīyaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāpanato
anya-e0104n0:1799_1: evaṃ garukā hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma, tasmā attano hitasukhaṃ ākaṅkhantena jīvitahetupi
anya-e0104n0:1800: 877. Na pakkosati “satthā taṃ, āvuso, āmantetī”ti. “Vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti āvajjitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1801_0: 878. Jīvitaddhānassāti attano jīvitakālassa jīvitappavattiyā. Āyu eva āyusaṅkhārā.
anya-e0104n0:1801_1: “Āyuusmāviññāṇānī”ti ca vadanti, te cassa pakaticittasseva ārammaṇaṃ honti. Antonirodhe
anya-e0104n0:1801_2: maraṇaṃ natthi carimabhavaṅgena mīyanato. Āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṃ “sahasā maraṇaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1801_4: anissaro siyā, anāgāmino vā aggamaggānadhigamo siyā. Avasesanti nānābaddhaavikopanāditividhampi
anya-e0104n0:1802_0: 879. Kiñcāpi “ekaṃ vā dve vā”ti aniyametvā viya vuttaṃ, dve vāre eva pana niyamato
anya-e0104n0:1802_1: vadanti. Cittavāreti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacittavāre. Nirodhaṃ phusatīti acittakabhāvamevāha.
anya-e0104n0:1802_5: yuganaddhe katvā”ti. Anupubbanirodhassa payogoti paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ, tadanupassanānañca
anya-e0104n0:1802_6: anupubbato nirodhanassāyaṃ payogo. Idaṃ vuttanayena aṭṭhasamāpattiārohanaṃ na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā
anya-e0104n0:1802_7: samāpajjanassa. Tasmā dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ upari cittāni na pavattantīti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:1803_0: Parato acittako bhavituṃ na sakkotīti sakalaṃ yathāparicchinnakālaṃ acittako bhavituṃ
anya-e0104n0:1803_2: akaraṇena, na nānābaddhaavikopanassa. Tassa hi akaraṇena kadāci kevalaṃ tādisassa
anya-e0104n0:1803_3: parikkhārassa avināso na siyā, na nirodhasamāpattivibandho. Ayañca attho mahānāgattheravatthunā
anya-e0104n0:1803_4: vibhāvito eva. Evaṃ sante tīhi ākārehi nirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti āpajjati,
anya-e0104n0:1803_5: tasmā taṃ na sārato paccetabbaṃ. Paṭinivattitvā puna ākiñcaññāyataneyeva patiṭṭhātīti
anya-e0104n0:1803_6: iminā samāpattiyā vibandhe jāte evaṃ hotīti dasseti, avibandheneva pana yathāparicchinnakālavītikkamane
anya-e0104n0:1803_8: samatthitaṃ hotīti keci vadanti. Apare pana “pubbakiccassa akatattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1803_10: aṅgavekallato nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ na ijjhatevā”ti vadanti. Vattasadisañhetaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1803_11: nirodhasamāpattiyā, yadidaṃ pubbakiccakaraṇaṃ. Tasmā tattha yaṃ garutaraṃ, tassa
anya-e0104n0:1803_12: akaraṇaṃ samāpajjanaṃ vibandhatīti apare. Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. “Ākiñcaññāyatane
anya-e0104n0:1803_13: patiṭṭhātī”ti ca idaṃ puna ākiñcaññāyatanassa samāpajjitabbattā vuttaṃ. Samāpajjitvā
anya-e0104n0:1805: 880. Assāti nirodhasamāpattiyā. “Kālaparicchedavasenā”tiādinā catūhi ākārehi nirodhasamāpattiyā ṭhānaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0104n0:1806: 882. Vivekaninnanti nissaraṇavivekaninnaṃ, pageva saṅkhāravimukhatāya, phalacittuppattiyā cāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1807_1: ca matanirodhasamāpannānaṃ avisesaṃ gahetvā pucchā “matassa ca samāpannassa ca ko
anya-e0104n0:1807_2: viseso”ti. Kāmaṃ nesaṃ saṅkhārattayapaṭippassaddhiādīhi aviseso, rūpadhammamattāvasesatāya
anya-e0104n0:1807_3: pana āyuusmāindriyānaṃ apagamānapagamanaṃ visesoti dassetuṃ “yvāya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1808_0: 884. Sabhāvatoti sabhāvadhammato, paramatthatoti attho. Paramatthato hi vijjamānānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1808_1: saṅkhatādibhāvena vattabbataṃ labhati, na avijjamānaṃ. Samāpajjantassa vasenāti yasmā
anya-e0104n0:1808_2: samāpajjantassa ariyapuggalassa samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo
anya-e0104n0:1808_4: nipphannā nāma hoti, tasmā taṃ payoganibbattiṃ upādāya “nipphannā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0104n0:1809_0: Saṅkhāravūpasamato, santadhammasamanvayato ca santaṃ. Ariyehi eva nisevitabbattā
anya-e0104n0:1809_1: ariyanisevitaṃ. Tissannampi dukkhatānaṃ nibbutabhāvato nibbānamiti saṅkhaṃ upāgataṃ.
anya-e0104n0:1809_2: Ariyaṃ paññanti suvisuddhaṃ maggaphalapaññaṃ. Imissāpīti nirodhasamāpattiyā. Samāpattisamatthatāti
anya-e0104n0:1811_1: Avisesenāti dassanamaggapaññādivisesena vinā, etissā lokuttarapaññāya. Ānetvā hunitabbanti
anya-e0104n0:1811_2: āhunaṃ, dūratopi ānetvā dātabbadānaṃ, taṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti āhuneyyo. Pāhunaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1811_3: vuccati āgantukadānaṃ, taṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti pāhuneyyo. Dakkhiṇaṃ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo,
anya-e0104n0:1811_4: añjalikaraṇaṃ añjalikammaṃ, taṃ arahatīti añjalikaraṇīyo. Anuttaraṃ uttamaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1811_5: puññaviruhanaṭṭhānanti anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassāti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro
anya-e0104n0:1812_0: 886. Mandāya vipassanāya āgatoti atikkhāya vipassanāya vasena paṭhamamaggapaññaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1812_1: bhāvetvā sotāpannabhāvaṃ āgato. Saddhādīnaṃ mudūnaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena mudindriyopi
anya-e0104n0:1812_2: samāno. Sattakkhattuparamoti sattakkhattuṃ paramā bhavūpapatti attabhāvaggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0104n0:1812_3: tato paraṃ aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nādiyatīti sattakkhattuparamo. Saṃsaritvāti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:1812_4: aparāparaṃ gantvā. Dukkhassantaṃ karotīti vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantaṃ pariyosānaṃ karoti.
anya-e0104n0:1812_5: Ayaṃ kālena devalokassa, kālena manussalokassāti missakassa bhavassa vasena “sattasugatibhave
anya-e0104n0:1812_6: saṃsaritvā”ti vutto. Kulato kulaṃ gacchatīti kolaṃkolo. Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato
anya-e0104n0:1812_7: paṭṭhāya hi nīcakule upapatti nāma natthi, mahābhogakulesuyeva nibbattatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:1812_8: Dve vā tīṇi vā kulānīti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhave. Iti ayampi missakabhaveneva
anya-e0104n0:1812_9: kathito. Desanāmattameva cetaṃ “dve vā tīṇi vā”ti. Yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsarantopi
anya-e0104n0:1812_10: kolaṃkolova hoti. Attabhāvaggahaṇasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃyeva khandhabījaṃ etassa atthīti
anya-e0104n0:1812_11: ekabījī. “Mānusakaṃ bhava”nti idampi desanāmattaṃ. “Devabhavaṃ nibbattetī”tipi vattuṃ
anya-e0104n0:1812_12: vaṭṭatiyeva. Ko panetesaṃ imaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti? Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā. Sace
anya-e0104n0:1812_13: hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti, ekabījī nāma hoti. Tato mandāya
anya-e0104n0:1813_0: 887. Paṭisandhivasena sakiṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī. Sakidevāti ekavāraṃyeva. “Imaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1813_1: lokaṃ āgantvā”ti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito. Ekacco
anya-e0104n0:1813_2: hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāti, ekacco idha patvā devaloke parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n0:1813_3: ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāti, ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā
anya-e0104n0:1813_4: parinibbāti. Ime cattāropi idha na gahitā. Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1813_5: vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ idha gahito.
anya-e0104n0:1814_0: 888. Paṭisandhivasena idha anāgamanato anāgāmī. Indriyavemattatāvasenāti saddhādīnaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1814_1: vimuttiparipācakaindriyānaṃ paropariyattena. Pañcadhā idha vihāya niṭṭho hotīti so
anya-e0104n0:1814_2: anāgāmī antarāparinibbāyiādibhāvena pañcapakārena imaṃ lokaṃ pajahitvā parinibbāyanako
anya-e0104n0:1814_3: hoti. Āyuvemajjhassa antarāyeva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanato antarāparinibbāyī.
anya-e0104n0:1814_4: Upahaccāti vā upagantvā kālakiriyaṃ. Appayogenāti adhimattapayogena vinā appakasireneva
anya-e0104n0:1814_5: tikkhindriyatāya sukheneva. Sappayogenāti ettha vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:1814_6: Uddhaṃ vā hi bhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ, vaṭṭasotaṃ vāti uddhaṃsoto. Uddhaṃ vā
anya-e0104n0:1814_7: gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṃsoto. Paṭisandhivasena akaniṭṭhabhavaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1815_0: Yatthupapannoti avihādīsu yattha yattha upapanno. Imesaṃ pana anāgāmīnaṃ pabhedajānanatthaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1815_1: uddhaṃsotaakaniṭṭhagāmicatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ – yo hi avihato paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke
anya-e0104n0:1815_2: sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo pana
anya-e0104n0:1815_3: heṭṭhā tayo devaloke sodhetvā sudassīdevaloke ṭhatvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto
anya-e0104n0:1815_4: naakaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo ito akaniṭṭhameva gantvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ nauddhaṃsoto
anya-e0104n0:1815_5: akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo pana heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva parinibbāti,
anya-e0104n0:1815_6: ayaṃ nauddhaṃsoto naakaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Ete pana avihesu upapannasamanantarā āyuvemajjhaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1815_7: appatvā, patvā ca parinibbāyanavasena tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyī,
anya-e0104n0:1815_8: eko uddhaṃsototi pañca. Te asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyivibhāgena dasa honti. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:1815_9: atappasudassasudassīsūti cattāro dasakā cattālīsaṃ. Akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsoto natthi.
anya-e0104n0:1815_10: Tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyīti cattāro. Te asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyivibhāgena
anya-e0104n0:1816: Sotāpannā pana paṭipadābhedena cattāro sattakkhattuparamā, cattāro kolaṃkolā, cattāro ekabījinoti saddhādhurena paṭipannā dvādasa, tathā paññādhurenāti catuvīsati.
anya-e0104n0:1817: Sakadāgāmino suññatavimokkhena vimuttā paṭipadāvasena cattāro, tathā animittaappaṇihitavimokkhehīti dvādasa.
anya-e0104n0:1818_0: 889. Tathā arahanto. Te pana dvādasa paññāvimuttā, dvādasa ubhatobhāgavimuttā, dvādasa
anya-e0104n0:1818_1: tevijjā, dvādasa chaḷabhiññā, dvādasa paṭisambhidāppattāti samasaṭṭhi honti. Evamete
anya-e0104n0:1818_2: saddhiṃ paccekasambuddhasammāsambuddhehi chacattālīsādhikasataṃ ariyā. Yasmā tesaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1818_3: ariyabhāvasiddhi ariyāya paññābhāvanāya, tena vuttaṃ “āhuneyyabhāvādisiddhipi imissā
anya-e0104n0:1818_5: hotīti ubhatobhāgavimutto visuṃ gahito. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttanti yaṃ catutthamaggapaññābhāvanaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1818_6: sandhāya heṭṭhā saṅkhepato gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pana vuttākāraṃ nigamanavasena
anya-e0104n0:1818_7: dassetuṃ “maggakkhaṇe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ catūsupi maggakkhaṇesu taṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭeti
anya-e0104n0:1818_8: nāma, phalakkhaṇesupi yathārahaṃ vijaṭitajaṭo, aggaphalakkhaṇeyeva pana sabbaso vijaṭitajaṭo,
anya-e0104n0:1818_9: tato paraṃ vijaṭetabbāya jaṭāya abhāvato. Tenettha heṭṭhā heṭṭhimamaggapaññābhāvanānisaṃsassa
anya-e0104n0:1819: Ratinti abhiratiṃ, abhirucinti attho. Tatthāti ariyāya paññābhāvanāya.
anya-e0104n0:1820: 890. Imissā gāthāyāti imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ. Gāthā hi attano atthabhūtassa visuddhimaggassa ādhārabhāvena vuttā, sāmivacanaṃ vā etaṃ atthassa taṃsambandhibhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:1824: 891. Imissā dāni gāthāyātiādīnaṃ gāthānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto eva. Svāyaṃ “visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissa”nti evaṃ paṭiññāto visuddhimaggo ettāvatā bhāsito hotīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:1825_0: 892. Tatthātiādīsu ayaṃ padasambandhena saddhiṃ saṅkhepattho – tesaṃ “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tigāthāyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1825_1: vuttānaṃ sīlādippabhedānaṃ atthānaṃ pañcannampi mahānikāyānaṃ aṭṭhakathānaye aṭṭhakathātantiyaṃ
anya-e0104n0:1825_2: tattha tattha vutto yo vinicchayo, yebhuyyena taṃ sabbaṃ samāharitvā samānetvā nikāyantarassa
anya-e0104n0:1825_3: nikāyagatavādadosasaṅkarehi mutto so nicchayo yasmā pakāsito, tasmā visuddhikāmehi
anya-e0104n0:1836: Sā esā paramatthānaṃ, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0104n0:1840: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
anya-e0104n0:1845: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
anya-e0104n0:1846: Sammā vassatu kālena, devo rājā mahīpati;
